links_reviews_text: Overall fit TTS, tulle on the back of the skirt was bent from shipping which was sort of annoying. Comfortable and received many compliments at the charity event I wore it to.
Tons of people complimented this dress both online and in person. I loved it and will rent it again :)

Wore this to an amazing over-the-top special wedding and it was perfect. Not something I would ever have worn otherwise but perfect for this event. Comfortable, showstopper, fit well, unique. Very happy I rented it. Regular strapless bra worked fine with it, and no need for shapewear.

links_reviews_title: Dress was gorgeous and received several compliments!
links_reviews_text: Dress was absolutely gorgeous. I am 5'6" and 140 lbs with a 34C bust. I am typically a 4-6/size small. The 6 fit okay - I possibly could have used the 4 but I was only sent the 6 since this was a backup dress that had to be shipped at the last minute bc my original was unavailable. Just gorgeous and will order again!

It fit well and wasn't too tight so was comfortable. My husband also loved this dress. A little on the short side but is cute since has a high neck. The lace under the lace is hard to see but is beautiful.

I wanted to love this but it arrived and looked nothing like the pretty gold color on the model or even the one displayed in pics. I attached pics of it under the lights to try and show it. In my opinion it's more cheap flea market gold or the color of New Years eve streamers. I did like the high neck and if I had gotten one size down the tight fit may have helped it be more flattering. Instead it fit funny and the nudeish slip underneath didn't help out my coco skin tone. Overall the up close color and pattern reminded me more of my grandmas Sunday wear then party vibe. Also the lace was torn in certain areas and the meshing at the bottom was flipped out funny so I decided to return rather then wear to a party like I originally planned. The pics of the other girls looked super cute so I'd say order on the cautious side
Rented this for NYFW and loved. A little short so better for petites :)
Unique dress. Wore to a #KYDerby party. Fit well. Snug enough to go without a bra and be very supported.

links_reviews_title: Another look I wouldn't have picked solo but felt great in it thanks to Jess! Everyone loved it.
links_reviews_text: There really isn't much stretch but it fit well. I wore Spanx under it
This dress fit like a glove for a petite girl like me. I got so many compliments on this dress. Would recommend.

Rented this with my Unlimited for Birthday dinner dress, as a backup, ended up not wearing my first choice and instead wore this, it was perfect!! The details and fit are great, it is elegant and still sexy and fun!! The lining inside has stretch, so the dress doesn't fit right and is very comfortable. You will need help, as usual with sipping and buttons at neck. The lace and net flare at the hem can get a little wonky after sitting for a while, overall a great dress-wore it twice!!

Wore this to a New Years Eve / Engagement Party. Hard to sit in it because of the fabric of the skirt. It wasn't tight but didn't have much give and felt a bit itchy. But I felt pretty in it and got tons of compliments.
So comfortable and unique. This dress is a must try! Lots of compliments. The design is so pretty. Try it won't regret it!

The dress is gorgeous in person. Very well made and so many pretty details. It's cut short with a fun mesh detail that gives volume to the skirt. I'm normally a 2 and I wore a 4 in this dress and it fit perfectly! No wiggle room so I'd recommend sizing up. Came with a gold liner so I could wear any bra so long as it has nude straps. I imagine it would look good with black tights too!

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, great for the holidays!
links_reviews_text: Runs small, and very short but looks great with black opaque tights.
Fits well and the length hits just right on my 5'3" frame. Bonus: not too itchy!

I got lots of compliments on this at the holiday party. The fabric detail is gorgeous. I think I would have chosen one size smaller though. I put a strapless bra on under to fill out the top. The size 8 had a little bit of a straight down/ baggy effect on me, especially because it is not fitted at the bottom, but has tool.

This dress was a selection for a last minute replacement and my friend urged me to try it. This is a style I would NEVER try on my own - I am a bigger girl with a "generous" chest and I thought the high neck and the lack of sleeves would combine to make me into a blobby nightmare. I WAS SO WRONG. I loved how I looked and felt in this dress. It fit with room to breathe and the skirt length was a good balance between sexy and appropriate (with tights) for a workplace wedding. The dress is lined except for the part of the dress overlying the upper chest; this allows skin to peak through and soften out that high neck. The gold overlay fabric is gorgeous and glam. I hardly noticed the lack of sleeves, and although I thought the boxy shape of the dress would only compound my boxy frame, it nipped in just enough at the waist to feel fashionable and attractive. The only problem area is the zipper in the back, which has a bit of trouble getting up through the lining and the gold lace at the waist seam. I got compliments from everyone I talked to all night and I felt fantastic. Really glad that I took a chance on this dress and will keep it in my rotation for the future. (for measurement comparison, I am 5'5", ~200lb, 38G, and usually wear a 14/16)
I rented this for a 1920s themed party and it worked perfectly with my accessories. The bottom was a bit stiff and a little difficult to maneuver, but otherwise it fit great and true to size.

Wore this to two functions in two cities within three nights. One indoor at an architectural function in an ornate and historic building, the other an outdoor wedding in the mountains with fall foliage. Plan was not to wear this dress to both, but I loved it so much I figured why not?! This is one of my favorite dresses to date; perfect fit, very unique look and material, comfy enough to sit and dance in and flexible enough in style to wear to two very different occasions. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Super cute, and appropriate for fall.
links_reviews_text: This was one of the best fitting rentals I've ever gotten. I'm short and this was the perfect length on me, though I can't imagine it being long enough on anyone much taller. Great fabric, cute cut. Would rent again!

Wore this to a fall wedding, received so many compliments on the dress and how unique it was. True to size and fairly comfortable. When you sit, the tulle on the bottom pokes at the back of your legs a bit but it didn't bother me too much because I was too busy dancing ;) absolutely recommend.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress. So so short on me at 5' 8". But exactly as pictured online.
links_reviews_text: Was worried the color might wash me out - no it was so pretty. I knew it would be short based on model and where it hit her but I tried anyway but could wear it so short.
Perfect fit but didn't wear because of a quality issue. It fit like a glove but was very stiff--the bottom netting is very thick and arrived crumpled and I couldn't get the weird shape out of it.
I loved this dress! It fit perfectly and I received countless compliments all evening. Perfect cocktail dress.

Fit me flawlessly although I can see anyone taller than me having length issues. Wore this belted to make it look a little more "finished". Got so many compliments! My favorite thing rented on RTR so far.
Loved the dress and fit however the outdoor wedding was so hot I don't recommend the fabric if it's really hot. Lots of compliments.
Very comfortable, and you do not have to wear a bra. It has support stitched into the dress. I received compliments all night. Loved the open back design.

links_reviews_title: The best service and the best way to safe money if you are looking to use a OUTFIT JUST 1 time
links_reviews_text: #miamifashionweek
Fits very well however the fabric was a little bit itchy on my arms especially on the dance floor. Liked it but would probably not rent again

The craftsmanship of this dress is really exceptional. It's a very fancy cocktail dress. I didn't like the color- it is, unfortunately, just as it appears in the photos, a brownish gold. The length was good for me and it's true to size. Prolly better in the autumn as it reads more like a brown.

Wore this dress to a work event. Originally wasn't too excited about wearing it, but it fit fine so I was going to make work. Full make up, up-do, and high heeled aqua sandals made this a fabulous look. The high neck and gold lace make accessories unnecessary. The outer gold lace is broken in a few places, but it's only noticeable up close.
Beautiful fabric and color! Dress was stunning . The skirt did ride up a little but it wasn't a deal breaker for me. Fit was as expected
Instead of wear springy colors I chose 'tis beauty by Catherine dean and loved it. Just wish I had taken a full body shot for y'all!

links_reviews_title: It is perfect party/GNO dress. Either OTK boots or pumps would look great with this dress.
links_reviews_text: The bottom of the dress was stiff. For my height, it landed mid-thigh. It was pretty short. For my body type (apple), this dress's waist band lands at a person's natural waist. If you are short-waisted, this is the dress for you.

Looks great on others but didn't work on me. Must have narrow hips and no bottom. Weird wiry material. Great concept though. Would have liked if it flattered my body and the material could be adjusted. I liked the look of the fabric (artistic). Great length for petites. No stretch.
Fun Dress. Not your ordinary style.
Really gorgeous construction and details of this dress. However, it runs extremely small in my experience. I am a 12/14 and could not even begin to get the 14 on. My measurements are 44 - 34 - 44.

links_reviews_title: Super cute! Structured and edgy. Wore with black booties!
links_reviews_text: Structured top with flared skirt

I knew when I rented it that the fit might not be ideal for my body type but that I'd try it out because I am petite. I had to kind of since the waist up so that it fit better around my hips. Not good even if your even slightly curvy
The fit was not great (super loose in the stomach, tight on the hips) - but the bold pattern hid any issues. I got so many compliments! The material is also super thin - but that did not bother me.
I loved the print and color IRL. Fit was a bit weird there is a lot of draping in the boob area and it hits low on the waist but when you step back it's very beautiful!

I wanted to love this dress but the fit was off. The fabric does not stretch at all. It was super tight around my hips (and i have small hips) forcing the fabric to bunch because I couldn't pull it down. Maybe sizing up would help? That said, color was so pretty and it would be great for summer since it's so lightweight.
Very nice but thin material like a dress slip. Not stretchy I couldn't pull it down over my hips. Didn't wear.

Loved the color - it definitely gets you noticed. But the cut is really weird! Tight around the very top of the zipper and bust (and I'm an A cup!) but then oddly wide in the torso fabric. Then the hips are back to super tight, but flowy on the bottom. The silk and the pattern make it look very nice in person too. Guess you have to have zero ass for this to hang properly. I mean, I still wore it! Just didn't like it enough to take a pic in it!
Very bizarre fit. Really did not fit at all honestly and it was paper thin

Just like the other reviews mention... this dress is a bit awkward. It's a beautiful fabric and very light weight but the construction of it and how it falls in the torso region wasn't doing me any favors. It just bubbled and couldn't get it to lay flat. Made me look pregnant in a way.
Cute dress but hips are extremely narrow. The dress is cut completely wrong making it impossible to wear unless you have zero hips/butt.
The material was much thinner than I was expecting giving the dress a slinkier look than I was going for.
Fits small
Listen to the other reviews and don't order! I even went up two sizes, wearing the 3 (I'm usually a 4). Very tight in the hips, loose everywhere else. Not worth it.
Run super super small, I couldn't put it on, I think fits my arm only, I was looking forward to wear it but I guess I need the biggest size

links_reviews_title: Loved it, but right at the hips
links_reviews_text: I love this dress but will size up next time. It's super light and perfect for a hot summer day. I wore it to work with a jean jacket and white wrap heels and then wore it over the weekend with white sneakers. I have hips and a butt so it was a bit tight around that region. Additionally it drops a bit in the back so a bit hard to wear a bra and it was a bit tight around rib cage so I just folded under the extra fabric.

Dress is very cute and quality of the dress is good. I sized up (typically a medium but got the equivalent of a large) because a lot of reviews said it was very tight throughout the hips. Even sizing up I still had a huge struggle getting the fabric over my hips!! I ended up tucking in the extra fabric and it actually worked/looked okay. Overall love this dress but the fit isn't right if you have any hips at all.
Even though I sized up, based on other reviews, the dress is too tight in the hips. The fit is not proportional. Way too big on top, and strained at hip. Did not wear.

links_reviews_title: So pretty, but very strange fit.
links_reviews_text: I was so excited to get this dress in the mail! I sized up based on reviews, too. Thank god this came early and I had time to swap for a different dress because I don't think any size would work for me! I am typically a 4 in dresses, so I ordered sizes 1R and 2R. I got the 1R on and it fit everywhere except the hip area was SUPER tight. The 2R was huge everywhere but still tight in the hips, making both sizes unwearable. I would only suggest someone wear this if they are tall and very narrow. I've never worn anything else by this brand, but they got the fit so wrong on this one. I think it could have been beautiful if I could have worn it. Over-all would not recommend.

links_reviews_title: Way too small. Unfortunately I couldn't wear it. The fabric is not stretching and there is no give.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous pattern. Runs very small
Have you agree with everyone else in the reviews -- I usually wear a size 0-2, jeans size 25. but could not get this dress over my butt! Sad because it is otherwise beautiful.
The fit didnt work for me. tight in the legs and big in the belly. Almost felt like someone pregnant wore it and stretched it out

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, made for thin bodies!
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful but left little room for any curves. Ultimately did not wear it.
The material was SUPER flimsy and thin...because of the low back, I would have worn this without a bra, but it would have been too sheer to do so.
The fit was very tight around the hips. I am 5'8 and 145 and both the 1R and 2R were too small in the hips with lots of room in the chest.

RTR is not to blame for no one being able to wear this dress. It's so cute and looks amazing on the model. I am a pear shape so I always rent dresses that are more free flowing below the waist and I size based on my upper half basically. Unless reviews prove for me to do otherwise. Unfortunately when I rented this dress there were not yet reviews. Before my dress shipped some reviews were in and I kept up with them seeing the dress runs VERY small. I typically wear a 4 or 6 when renting so naturally I got the sizes 1 & 2 (4-6 & 6-8). After reading the reviews I quickly changed my order to sizes 2 & 3 (8-10). STILL much too small. I could put it on and zip it but it did not hit right on my body and then the top was too loose. Basically not meant for my body type. If you are thin all over this would be great for you (but you should still size up). I blame the designer for the sizing so no hard feelings because RTR is amazing and rushed me two replacements, both of which I loved! One last tid bit, the dress is tissue thin and I don't think I would have been comfortable anyway. It's a gorgeous dress, just rent cautiously!
I loved the back of the dress and the way the top fit.
Dress was large in chest but smaller in rib cage. Very strange fit- didn't wear
fits very small in the boobs, and is much shorter than I anticipated

links_reviews_title: Cute but had to send back without wearing
links_reviews_text: Very weirdly tight in the hips due to two lines of stitching down the front and back of the dress that don't need to be there and makes the fabric weirdly bunch up? It's strange because the dress has plenty of room and should fit but something with the hips keeps it from happening. Will likely size up and try again but I fear then it will be too big

links_reviews_title: Needs to be wore with correct body shape
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately this dress didn't work for me. I am 5'10" 140 pounds for reference and sized up. This dress was very tight in the hips and I was hoping for it to hang more and be flowy. I believe you need to have a straight figure to make this dress work.
I ordered the wrong size- will re-order a size up
This is very pretty fabric and the print is lovely but the fabric pooled above my hips because it is cut narrowly (or maybe just completely straight) through the hips. Size up if you have hips!

I've rented other items from this brand and haven't had any fit issues until this dress. Like many other customers, I could barely fit this dress over my hips while the top part felt large. I'm usually a 6/8 in dresses and thought the 2R was not a good fit. Ended up swapping this dress for another style.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress, Not for Curvy Ladies
links_reviews_text: I love this dress! The fabric, style, everything except one thing... it is too tight around my hips (and baggier at my waist) so it sits up high (I belted it to hide the foldover). So it is beautiful, but if you have hips, this may not be perfect for you. Also... size up!! I went up a size and it still didn't fit my hips, although the waist was large so if you are straight and thin then maybe don't size up.

links_reviews_title: Super weird sizing, runs very small
links_reviews_text: I used the brands sizing to order, but it was SO small. Like couldn't even get around my hips. Seemed overall like an odd cut as parts fit or were baggy but the middle was so snug. Material very thin.

Super adorable dress. I loved the bold print and that the straps were adjustable. The only thing is that it runs VERY small. I normally wear a size 4, so I originally tried the size 1, but I couldn't get it over my hips at all. Sized up to a 3 and it fit perfectly. Size up and you will love this dress!
Unfortunately, this dress was way too small. I'm usually a size 0-2, and I couldn't even pull this dress down over my hips.
Cute dress, but smaller than expected.

I'm between a size 2 and 4, so I went up to a size 1 with this dress. I'm not that hippy and I can't even pull the dress down over my hips. I imagine I need to go up an additional size or 2! The odd thing is is that there is a ton of space up top. So size 1 is perfect if you have a long torso and super slim hips. Interested to see if this dress works for anyone else. Had to send it back without wearing.

links_reviews_title: Cute but fit a little strange. Was huge in the waist and small around the butt
links_reviews_text: Cute

Good support for the girls and tight through the waist as always. I love Herve. I got tons of compliments on this one! It is very short in the back, but I was okay with it because of the event where I wore it. I did think the stripes were going to be brighter colors than they were in person... even white stripes were more of an off white or cream.
Perfect NYE dress, fit snugly enough that I didn't need a bra. Would recommend wearing a thong or seamless underwear.

A bit lower scooped in the front (obvious in pics) so if you're not as full in that area you may not be as much a fan of that but I liked it a lot more than I anticipated and it had the gorgeous body hugging fit you'd expect! While still being comfortable!

I absolutely adore these Herve' Leger bandage dresses- they suck you in as well as accentuate in all the right places- I ALWAYS receive a TON of complements! This dress in particular was a HIT at the most recent event I wore it to...
Loved this fit!

links_reviews_title: This dress will make you feel like $1M
links_reviews_text: I didn't get to wear this :( but only because my plans changed. I will be renting this again! Super flattering if your tummy is less than flat, and no bra needed (even with 34gs). I toyed with keeping it just in case an opportunity came to wear it, but alas passed it on so someone else can rock it for a night. Definitely rent this!
Loved the fit of this. Was short, but did not ride up at all, and the bandage structure allowed me to go braless- always a plus!

links_reviews_title: My birthday party with my girl friends
links_reviews_text: Very tight. Flattened out my breasts.
True to size. Super thick/forgiving material- no bra or shapewear needed!
Love this dress! Date night with hubby! It will be hard to send back
This dress fit like a glove! Incredibly flattering and comfortable! I dressed it down with a jean jacket to wear to a concert. Lots of compliments and I felt awesome!

links_reviews_title: Very form fitting, LOTS of compliments
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Would rent again. Very form fitting. Im usually a 4-6 but closer to 4 now since i have lost some weight. I didnt need to wear a bra with this dress which was a plus. I could dance just fine but limited range for my legs since the stretch of the dress is quite "firm". Got soooooo many compliments. Luved it!

links_reviews_title: It's an Herve. It's a body con. It is what it is.
links_reviews_text: I liked it. Don't love it. The scoop neck design someone didn't not love the girls and made me look flat. The back was too low to wear a traditional strapless bra so I just went without. Meh. The dress however was in great condition given it's a rental Herve and these get rented a ton. The pattern of the ribbons accentuate curves.
Perfect dress for Vegas! Hugs every curvy and smooths everything out! Great for curvy women and big bust. You do not even need a bra! RENT this dress you will love it.
Difficult to zip by myself BUT I have never felt sexier. I loved the way it fit my entire body, especially my smaller chest.
Looks gorgeous on rent it fits right everywhere
The dress is stretchy, but the perfect amount of tight. I wore it for an evening work event and received compliments all night
When i told people I'd rented the dress they demanded I buy it. It fits incredibly and accentuates a woman's curves.

I got compliments all night long! Very tight fit but the material and shaping made it the most flattering dress I have ever worn. Definitely could tell how how quality it was! Definitely renting this brand again!
Comfortable fit great
Perfect for a party or semi-formal event. Fits tight in all the right places and provides full coverage. Would highly recommend and consider renting again.

This Herve was so beautiful and comfortable to wear. I may have been able to get away with the xs as the arm holes were slightly large and it wasn't too tight at all. I loved how even though this was short and tight it didn't ride up at all and I was comfortable all night as I wore this to a club in Vegas. Contemplated keeping this one since it's such a classic.
Herve ... that's all I have to say - amazing experience I wish my closet was made entirely of this designer

I wanted to wear the small but it had a red stain on the white part. The medium still fit well. I wore this to a whiskey tasting event. As others have mentioned the zipper is very stiff I am glad I got ready at work because I needed someone to zip me up. The dress hugs every curve and I received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Herve Leger never lets me down!!
links_reviews_text: Felt like a goddess in this. Definitely buying. Herve fits snug...so make sure to stay true to your size, unlike a lot of high-end ones where you size down.
Great dress...tight and sexy. Nice thick material, traditional Herve Leger. True to size and did not need to wear a bra. Perfect for a party night with friends!

Great style, the color stripe makes it a little more fun/sexy, not super dressy. Fits true to size but it's still tight. The back is too low for most bras but the fabric is thick and tight and I was fine without. Chic and sexy but not over the top. Loved it!

Incredibly comfortable and super-sexy, this dress brought compliments throughout the night. I wore this to a themed adult "prom" party celebrating a dear friend's 5th anniversary of his uber-successful restaurant. The "elastic" bandage style of this dress hugged me tight and didn't ride up through hours of dancing and partying. The open back and stretchy material were perfect for my large swimmer back and ribs. If I had planned better, I would have worn a sticky bra with more push-up, as the girls are a bit petite, but I am still thrilled with this dress. I'll absolutely be renting a Herve again.
Loved the strong texture of the dress. I didnt love how I looked in it but the dress was great lol

This dress is perfect for a sexy night on the town or a party. I was compliment on stop and it fit like a glove but was still comfortable. It's excellently made which is no surprise from this designer. Just have to tell you if you're considering getting it... JUST DO IT!

links_reviews_title: Hear the slot machines jingle when you get it zipped?
links_reviews_text: It is what it is; you know what you're (literally) getting into here. Don't pretend you look classy just because this is expensive - but yes, you look hot. I deluded myself by topping this with a blazer to try to force a day-to-night look. It obviously failed miserably (didn't help that it poured, so I also wore high boots. I know: I'm old enough to know better). I own a few HL dresses and swimsuits in XS but this ran quite small for a Small and there's no way XS could've worked. I know what you're thinking: but the fabric is so thick and tighter works better in these to sculpt and slim...but stop thinking it, because the smaller size won't zip and it will be plenty tight and supportive. Err on bigger. I'm usually a 2. Refreshingly, this wasn't at all pulled or stretched out (HL don't hold up well for the price at all - I honestly feel the similar bandage dresses in BCBG are just as flattering, tons more affordable, and hold up beautifully, but that's irrelevant). Fit: I am a mom with a gut, so definitely needed a serious girdle for the pooch in this. I was very bummed that there are totally pointless back cutouts at the straps that prohibit a regular bra. I had to wear a strapless and it still poked up in the back. I will rent again for Vegas or Miami (it actually looks a little adorable with the right sneakers if you needed to), but it's definitely too youthful for me in the (sad) real world.

Wore this for a girls night- it is very fitted. I can usually wear XS in most bandage dresses and could barely get the zipper up. The small fit like a glove. Very sexy dress! Like most bandage dresses though- it was not the most comfortable thing to wear, but worth it!

This dress is super fun. Great colors and it definitely sucks you in creating a nice hour glass shape. The back is unique too. I wear a small in most dresses but ordered a medium bc I knew it was spandex and even the medium was really tight so I'd suggest sizing up for back up.

I would say it's true to size. The M wasn't available but the L wasn't that much of a different. Dress do have some stretch to it. Such a pretty dress. Thick material. Was able to wear with a strapless bra. Gots so much compliments at the event I was at. I would definitely rent this one again.

As Herve Leger goes, this dress fit like a glove. I got so many compliments from not only my family but people I had never met before. I'm 5'9" and 145 lbs with a pretty athletic build. It was an incredible dress.

links_reviews_title: Herve did not disappoint! A Looker!!
links_reviews_text: This was my first Herve and was recommended by Samantha (stylist) to go for a small based on my measurements and it was perfect! I was able to eat a full dinner and still party all night at the club after and it held me to the right spots and yet still feel comfortable! The design was a looker and I felt so sexy in it!
This dress was pretty and fit great. It was a heavier material so probably not the best for a hot summer event. I got tons of compliments and felt great.

links_reviews_title: Best Homecoming Ever in Stunning Herve Léger Dress!
links_reviews_text: Pros: Comfortable, photographs well, shows off curves, eye-catching, no bra necessary, disguised flaws, very flattering Cons: Fairly short (but not too short, depends on personal preference), shows off curves (again, personal preference), dress seemed slightly stretched out upon receiving. Either that, or I misread the size chart, and a small would have sucked me in the way these dresses are supposed to. OVERALL: Excellent rental, I highly recommend this to anyone who doesn't mind showing a little skin!
Herve has done it again. Heavy, curve hugging material. Holds everything in place for a huge dinner. Charity event at the Nomad hotel.

links_reviews_title: Can't go wrong with an Herve Dress!
links_reviews_text: Classic Herve Leger dress! Always super figure flattering, shows off everything well! Great accent colors and back detailing! Definitely need to wear a strap less bra. Love the tight stretchy fabric!
Vavavoom this dress brings all the heat. Loved the low cut and still felt secure in place. Not too short for the taller girls. Gorgeous fabric. Fit like a glove.
Love the overall fit and how flattering it is. You will most definitely need fashion tape to ensure that the girls don't pop out. Other than that everything else was great.
Great fit! I did use a pin to close the top higher, it showed too much chest for me! Very vibrant color. I received compliments from total strangers at dinner! :)
Loved!! Many compliments
I sized up and it Fit really well. Front is very plunging but nothing that dress tape couldn't fix. I loved this dress and received a ton of compliments.
Beautiful dress! Great fit!!

Absolutely stunning - go towards a smaller size as the be prepared with dress tape, stick on bra (I wore a string bikini top & tape as DD tuff) The ruching and fit hides and contours while highlighting all the attributes Absolutely comfortable elegant fabric and details Not for the faint of heart or shy as this is an absolute all eyes on deck - fabulous showstopper! Would definitely wear again even though it's a tough repeat it is definitely worth the sequel! Have fun girls Xo Lauren

links_reviews_title: Stunning deep V with a classy edginess
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable and flattering dress! Only con: if you are on the flat chested side like myself... you will 100% need boob tape. The shoulders slide off and without the tape you will 100% have a mishap. Other than that; total showstopper

I was stopped by just about everyone at the event I went to about this dress. It was so gorgeous and super sexy. Rouched in all of the right places. Totally complimentary: and the material is amazing. It's a very very very wide and low V - I actually used fashion tape AND a safety pin to control it slightly - no bra. Keep in mind that when you sit the V also gets significantly more pronounced. I paired with gold hoop earrings and dark green suede pumps,
Like this dress overall but too open in the chest, maybe fixable with fashion tape/taping, but would prefer it just wasn't so open. Not suitable for my event.

links_reviews_title: The Sexiest Dress I Have Ever Worn
links_reviews_text: oh boy will you turn heads in this little pink number. the dress fit me perfectly. had to use some double sided tape for the girls but it worked out perfectly. only two cons. be careful when sitting because of the bust being so low you have to always be aware of your bust area for spilling out. the fabric is amazing but if wet will show a clear as day mark until it dries. I wore it in ac for a friends birthday and i felt like a trillion bucks.
This dress is simply unforgettable. The fit, the cut, the color...just wow! It was super comfortable and hid any problem areas. Would wear again!!
The dress is true to size everywhere except the bust. I ordered a back up size and the dress still capped open at the top. Beautiful material and style but unable to wear.

links_reviews_title: Wore something else, but hope I can wear one day!
links_reviews_text: This showed all the right things and hid all the ones I don't love. I would say it runs a little big, but I also have a small bust. This is way more of a hot pink than red.

Wow. This didn't work on my body. Tried several different sizes. I'm NOT afraid to show side boob, cleavage, low low cut, super mini hemlines, skin-tight - but this was just weird. I looked trashy, and not in a good way. The puffy shoulders on my already broad shoulders looked very drag-like. I think if I had a bigger chest, it would have worked better. Wanted to love it, but nope.
Not as cinched as I would have liked. Low cut, may require tape. Size down.

links_reviews_title: Way too much, not enough coverage
links_reviews_text: I'm all about showing a little skin, but I do not understand at all how anyone could wear this dress without fashion tape. Even with fashion tape, it was impossible to wear out of the house. The photo makes it look like there is a hidden front clasp, but nope.

links_reviews_title: Must have large chest to fill up
links_reviews_text: This did not work for me, sadly. I loved the silky cranberry color and style of the dress but I needed a larger chest to fill out the top. It did not fit at all.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my brother's cocktail wedding reception. Received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I'm petite and even shorter in the torso so the sagging of the front on me was no surprise. I wore a crystal bra and fashion tape but that's the norm for me. Loved the color and the style.
Very booby so beware
I have been looking for short like this for a while and these were very cute. Although it did run a little bigger than expected.
Loved these shorts! Really cute, great for the office, and comfortable in the heat. Never been a fan of "work shorts" but these really worked. Highly recommend!

Okay, so here are some random observations about my lived experience in these dressy little shorts: not everyone loves pleats. I, having no hips, no torso to speak of, and gymnast' legs, looove pleats. // These shorts were flattering, super comfortable, and stylish. They are high rise; they sit at the natural waist // Dressing "sexy" is pretty low priority for me, but these could be spiced up with some heels and a silk camisole, if one just had to. // I think these shorts are pretty versatile. That being said, I think a belt of some sort is a must with these, no matter what vibe you're going for. // Overtly sexy or not, my bf thought they were hot. // I almost thought I wasn't going to get to wear these, bc the weather got cold and I had other things I wanted to rent through unlimited before it got oppressively hot (I live in Houston). I decided to try them On with some opaque tights, and I'm glad I did. // The end.
Was hesitant about the pleats, but they kind of work! Do be sure to wear with a belt and a crisp blouse. Looked professional for work. Comfortable as well. A tad big in the waist.
I wore it work a couple of times. It's long enough to be modest but short enough to not.look like Bermuda shorts. Tight in the hips and crouch. But with shapewear it fits really well.
These shorts fit me okay but for work purposes the 2 would've been longer and probably more work appropriate! Super cute and would bring life to any outfit!

links_reviews_title: OK shorts, very big in waist/hip
links_reviews_text: I am between 0 and 4 in clothes, this would have been a 0 situation, which was very surprising. I tucked a heavy sweater in and still had room. Shorts were OK but not good enough to pay for. Got quite a few compliments.

links_reviews_title: Nice light material - great summer dress
links_reviews_text: The back is lower so the shoulders didn't really stay up perfectly on me. Adjustments were necessary. Overall good though. Elastic waist

I will definitely be renting this dress again! The fit was so flattering and I received so many compliments. You could dress this up with heels or wedges, or dress down with sneakers. Perfect spring dress

links_reviews_title: Wore for my LinkedIn profile pic
links_reviews_text: Open back is a little loose. If you go smaller wouldn't fit across the bust if you are a C cup or larger.
Love this dress, so comfortable and the cutest little details. I felt like a chic 80's princess!

If this dress wasn't way out of my budget I'd buy it in an instant. Will definitely be renting again. I got loads of compliments and it felt very cute. The bodice was a bit long for my 4'11 frame but the elasticated waist meant that that didn't matter too much. Luckily the back was low enough to look good but not so low that my bra strap was an issue. Definitely rent this dress!

This is a really cute dress. I like how lightweight it is and the color is really vibrant. I ordered the L and the M and the M was just a little tight around the waist and was short enough that I felt more comfortable in the L. But, I will say the one drawback is that the way the seaming comes together in the back, the white lining shows up (you can see it in my selfie where I'm focused on my braids but you can also see what I mean about the white material). The back is wide and LOW. Super cute dress!
Absolutely obsessed. Considered purchasing
This is literally my new favorite piece from RTR. Perfect dress to go from work to dinner. I will be renting again may even buy it !!

I loved wearing this dress. The shoulders have this "built-in" puff material so it got a little itchy. That said, the color is vibrant and style is flattering. The dress is VERY short. Great party dress. I wore it with white shoes, but would look cute with nude too.
Wore this twice - got so so many compliments both times. Definitely runs on the short side so if you're taller than 5'6ish you probably want to size up for length.
Beautiful colors and perfect for petites!! Might need to size up since im breastfeeding my cup sizes went up. Definitely would rent again.
My only complaint is the open back caused the shoulders to be really wide and hard to stay up. Still a cute dress and might fit someone better that has broad shoulders.
True to size. Hits mid thigh. Cute for day time or dressing up for nighttime.

links_reviews_title: this is an AMAZING dress.... but couldn't wear because it arrived damaged :(
links_reviews_text: The material of this dress is super fragile, so unfortunately mine came damaged. That being said, i will Redmond it again because it is SO cute on
The arms were tight but the chest and waist were super large. I think this can be flattering with some tailoring, but it made me feel bigger than I am.
I really wanted to love this. Didn't do anything for figure and very cheaply made. Pros- it came with tags on!

I was so excited to wear this dress and my event actually got canceled. The 8 fit perfectly, such a flattering dress and gorgeous color. I'm 5'7 without heels and got a LONG just in case and it was the right choice. Will definitely rent it again for another event!

Absolutely loved this dress. It was feminine and very comfortable - I felt great in it all night! Like other reviews mentioned, it does show underwear lines easily, so pick out what you are wearing underneath carefully. I did find it to be fairly true to size, I usually wear a 2 or 4 and the 4 was perfect. I am 5'9" and found the leg slit to be the perfect length, but I could see how it would be a bit short for shorter girls.

The fit was a little weird. It hangs or is loose in the belly area and the fabric is already stretchy on its own. It rides up if you are moving around a lot and needs constant adjustments. Gorgeous color and silhouette though!

links_reviews_title: Absolutely love this dress! Comfortable and easy to wear. Color was so beautiful. Super flattering!
links_reviews_text: It was very true to size. Loved the color! The silt was to too revealing! Perfect length too with heels!

This dress was so fun to wear and different than anything I've ever worn to a wedding! I wore it to my fiancé's sisters wedding in September, and it was great for the occasion, lots of compliments and the color is so pretty. A few things to note- if you're on the short side, it's a little long so wear high heels. I'm 5'5 and wore 4 inch heels and it was still dragging a bit. Also, the slit is a little high so be careful which way you cross your legs sitting down lol.
The dress was a great fit. The color was perfect for summer. The slit was a bit too high but I still liked it

I am 5'1 (very short) and I got this dress in 2R and it fit me very well. (I would say I'm normally a 4). If you are short don't worry about it being too long in R size (vs petite) because my length was perfect with heels!

links_reviews_title: I was able to dance all night in this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress is perfect for almost any wedding. I was a bridesmaid and was given the color lilac for the bridesmaids dresses and this was the perfect shade of lilac for my skin color. And the slit was a sublet way to be dramatic and sexy. I got so many compliments! And the slit also kept me cool as it was an outdoor wedding in August!
What a magical dress ... hearts hearts hearts and more hearts

links_reviews_title: Customer service was extremely helpful, arranged early delivery.
links_reviews_text: Many compliments! Sexy yet classy
I loved the lilac color of this dress! It is a perfect formal dress.
The dress is a little long so unfortunately I didn't have the shoes for it so hope to rent again in the future! Dress is definitely sexy and comfortable!
This is a beautiful dress that fit my petite figure very well. The fabric is light and great for moving around and dancing.

Received so many compliments on this dress. Fit a tad big in the hips but I actually liked that so I could dance. Typically wear a 0 and glad I ordered the 0 in this dress. If it were mine I would have it altered just a small amount but over all was perfect!

I was SO in love with this dress, it pained me to send it back. The fit was fantastic and was so comfortable. Because of my pear shape I had to watch the slit since it wanted to creep up here and there, but overall I had no issues with the dress. The dress even supported my 36DDD cup size without a bra (literally unheard of.) I've never received so many compliments in one night! I would highly recommend this dress.
I loved this dress! The color was great and it fit really well except for in the stomach. The stomach was a little big but it worked well

links_reviews_title: This dress was totally stunning, the color is gorgeous on tan skin. I got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: around the bust its slightly tight. I am not big at all,about a b and it was pretty tight. also slightly loose on the stomach, im usually a zero or two and I got the two and it hugged my thighs but was loose on the stomach. overall tho the fit was good and I loved the way it looked

The dress was amazing! I loved everything about it. I'm 5'2 and 140 lbs so it was was a little long for me. Also I would of gotten a size down because it was big around the chest area but everything else was great. Definitely would recommend

links_reviews_title: The long length was great and I got tons of compliments from people!
links_reviews_text: I’m 5’8” 145 lbs 36B and the dress fit perfect. I loved the long length so that I could wear heels
For a little big and long. Otherwise was perfect.

This dress shows every single line. If you have any booty it will show any underwear lines. The leg slit is also very high in my opinion especially sitting down. I wanted to wear the 2R but went for the 2L just to get the leg slit a little lower. Can't wear any sort of shape wear underneath without lines showing so keep that in mind. The color is gorgeous but it wasn't the most flattering fit on my body

links_reviews_title: Perfect color- great for tall girls
links_reviews_text: 5'9, 140 lbs, the 4L fit perfect. I was able to wear with a strapless bra with no issue, you can wear seamless panties, but not boy shorts. This color really stood out and I felt great all night. Very comfortable. The dress did have a light black stain on the back, like someone brushed against a tire getting out the car, but I wore it anyway... I had no choice and I'm not sure anyone noticed. Great choice for Spring.

I wore this dress to my Barrister Ball/Law School Prom. I got so many compliments. I'm 5'5 129 lbs, 32DD and the 4R was a little too big on my stomach and I had to keep pulling it up. I still think it looked great & was very flattering. Wish I could keep it!
Great dress and great color. The dress is super long and if you are under 5'4 I would not recommend this dress. Make sure you wear high heels or else the dress will be dragging on the ground.

links_reviews_title: Great dress and very comfortable! Easy to dance and walk in too.
links_reviews_text: I’m 5’11 & ~150lbs. The 4L fit perfectly and was very complimenting.
I have a small chest a lil loose up top and could be a little baggie around my stomach but loved it still looked great
Was a little long but overall fit perfectly

Let me start off by staying that this was my backup dress and I had no intention on wearing it, but wow am I glad I did. Everything about this dress is utter perfection. Quality, size, color, comfortableness, everything. I received soo many compliments on it. I sized down from my regular size (8R) and based it off what other women wore, so that actually helped more than the size chart. The length was perfect, I wore 3 inch heels and it still reached the floor without dragging it. Spanx are recommended if you have a bit of a belly like me (I didn't wear them, but it would've looked better if I did). I have a pretty big butt and boobs and this dress still made me look elegant and less voluptuous. The slit is high, but not high enough that you'd flash anyone. The only con about this dress is that I had to return it.

I felt so beautiful in this dress! Everyone kept complimenting me. The fabric is pretty thin however so finding spanx that didnt leave a like was very difficult. I also had to wear a bra with the dress. It's lined though so it's not see through, just shows every little line and bump under the dress.

The color and cut were absolutely gorgeous. I got so many compliments on this dress. I'm in between 2-4 and rented the 4R and 4L because I wasn't sure on length. There was room on the shoulder strap that I had to tape down but otherwise felt great in it! Ended up going with the 4L because of my high heels, and the hem fell perfectly around my feet. Would totally recommend this dress - you're going to feel and look fantastic!

links_reviews_title: This dress made me stand out amongst the crowd!
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit! I'm 5'6 and 175 lbs with a pear/hourglass body and this dress perfectly complemented my body type! The side slit wasn't too revealing which I loved. I didn't wear a bra underneath but the dress was made well enough so it held me up. Maybe some spanx would've helped smooth out lines, but my seamless underwear and the dress did a good job at keeping me in. This dress was my backup for the wedding I attended, but I ended up wearing it because of how much I loved the way it just fit like a glove. You'll love this dress do yourself a favor and rent it!!

links_reviews_title: This dress is heaven, when it fits right
links_reviews_text: The color of this dress is prettier in person-especially on pale skin. The cut of the dress is gorgeous and made to compliment your body. I am a true size 0 and the size 0 for this dress was a little big. It's possible a previous renter stretched out the size 0 I received as the bust and the sides were what were loose. If you are a true size 2, get this dress! But if you are a true size 0, then beware it won't fit as well as it could- I used some fashion tape to make it work. I received compliments all night long. This dress is long, I wore 4 inch heels and it almost touched the ground.

links_reviews_title: So easy and I loved how affordable this outfit was- looked great
links_reviews_text: Loved how easy, glamorous and affordable this was!!
It was stunning and got so many compliments . Fit comfortably and great to dance in!
Great for large hips! But size down if your petite or have a small torso.

I'm about 5'5"-5'6", 130-133lbs, and an athletic build. I wore this dress to a wedding in Florida. It was really beautiful, and I felt confident and comfortable all night. It photographed very well. As other reviews stated, it isn't tight. I usually wear a 4, but I wore the 2 and felt I could maybe even pull of the 0 since there was a little extra material in the waist/chest. The dress looked great though, and I was able to enjoy the dance floor, surf and turf, and open bar without fear of it feeling too tight or getting bloated. Would recommend for sure, just size down if you have a small waist or want it to be tighter.
Got lot of compliements on the dress! Fits like a glove. I'm 5'4" 117 lbs and got 2R and fit well. Color is true lilac and to die for!
I got so many compliments and felt so pretty in this dress. Loved loved it!

links_reviews_title: This was the dress of my engagement photo dreams! Sexy but also classic and timeless.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove. I ordered the 0R and the 2 but wound up going with the 0. The slit was very sexy but not too much to wear for a photo shoot or even a wedding or some other black tie event. There are no cons to the dress. Only pros- color was beautiful in, comfortable fabric, fabric was slightly heavy not super lightweight but does not deter from the appeal of this dress.

This gown was perfect for an event I was attending! Beautiful light lilac / pink color. Good thing I ordered a back up size! It was extremely large on me. I actually could have still sized down from the 2. I usually wear a 4 for your reference when ordered.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a date night!
links_reviews_text: The Hervé Léger dress is a head Turner! I went up a size.
Love everything about this dress : the fit, the material, the color!
Compliments all night long! Needed help zipping this one up, but really felt great on.
Slimming but a bit long and shoulders needed constant readjusting if you wanted to wear off the shoulder (like the model). Colors are beautiful for Fall.

I rented this for a black tie, weeknight fundraiser in NY. I love Hervé, but there are two things I always look for and this one checks both boxes: 1) flat with relatively wide bands of fabric and 2) length (not too short). I loved that this dress was on the longer side so I didn't have to keep pulling it down.
Absolutely loved this dress! Wore to a wedding and got so many compliments. Loved the neckline and the detailing of the dress added a fun touch while still staying sleek.

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress for Moroccan Mayham Party!
links_reviews_text: So cute and fits perfect! I was worried it would be too tight and make me uncomfortable, but it was the exact opposite. This dress was perfect!

links_reviews_title: Some RHONJ, my friends and I attended a Gay Pride Flag raising ceremony and after party.
links_reviews_text: It fits well and it is beautiful, but I had to keep checking my chest out to make sure that everything looked great. Marge Sr. LOVES this dress, so it is a total win!

A touch tighter than some other Herve's I have rented. The colors are way better in person. It's a pretty dress. I loved it. The top can be a tad annoying to pull down your shoulders all night but it's great. Lots of compliments.

I can't say enough about this dress, it was so gorgeous! Made me feel amazing! I got so many compliments, and every picture I took looked professional! The length was perfection it hit me right at the knee, it held everything in, and was comfortable. The only thing I can say is the top of the dress fits a little weird. When you pull it off your shoulders it gives you a little underarm cleavage, when you wear it a little higher on the shoulder it gaps either in the front or back.
This dress is extremely forgiving and flattering. Runs small. I struggle with "over 50" weight gain and I loved what this dress did for me

links_reviews_title: Modest and sexy all in one
links_reviews_text: Flattering for pear shaped and hour glass alike. My sister pear as pictured in the picture looked classy, modest and sexy all in one! This is a winner!

This was a fun, sexy yet classy dress. I wore it for a fancy night out in Vegas. It was a head turner for sure. These bandage dresses are VERY form fitting and tight. Not much, if any room for forgiveness. Shows every roll or bump.

I've wanted to wear an Hervé Leger Bondage dress for probably the last 15 years - and the reason that I finally could without spending that months rent on a dress is one of many why I love RTR! But about the dress: fit is amazing, just like I've always heard, hugs Your body in all the right ways. While skintight it is still reasonably comfortable and easy to walk in (had my doubts when I tried it on). True to size as it's super stretchy. All in all perfect!

Ordered this dress very last minute when the one I ordered suddenly wasn’t available. This was for an awards dinner for my husband. I’m very glad I ended up going with this dress. It was very comfortable, sexy, fit great, not too fancy, but still looked “special.” I received tons of compliments. I will say, it fits TIGHT! I am 107 pounds and the XS was tight! If I order this designer again, I will go with the small. The straps were also a little difficult to keep down and kept creeping up, but I think it still looked great! Overall, very happy with this dress!
Snug fit but flattering form and ideal length.
My daughter wore this for a formal dance at her school and it was perfect, the color was beautiful on her

links_reviews_title: This dress is it! So beautiful.
links_reviews_text: Color, detailing, fabric and fit were all on point. Love it!

I rented this dress for a fundraising gala that was black tie optional but where the theme was festive enough that I could get away with something bold and fun. This dress is made of scuba suit like material (not sure the official term) so it's extremely fitted - definitely size up unless you are a real string bean. I opted for the Large since I have a full bust and a challenging tummy area. Normally I wear a Medium or Size 8. Even though the straps slipped around slightly I was happy with the larger size as the tummy area was sufficiently tight even with slimming undergarments. I wore a strapless bra with tape and everything stayed together nicely. The dress is of very high quality and style - fabric is very heavy and fitted. Easy to travel with since it doesn't wrinkle. I will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: This dress was absolutely stunning! I wore it to my law school prom and it was a showstopper.
links_reviews_text: This is a classic bandage dress that is extremely form fitting all the way around. I’m a size 0/2 and the Small was almost too tight. However, the material stretches a considerable amount while still sucking you in. It's also impossible to walk up the stairs in this dress. I cannot wait to wear this dress again! I’ve never received so many compliments in one night. Would 100% recommend.
Love love love this dress.

I am a very small women and normal fit into little girls clothes. I got the extra small and never in my life have I struggled to zip and dress up like that. Still a great dress and fits like a snug glove. Got a ton of looks and complements
Dress runs small so size up, but otherwise fits like a glove, absolutely beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Very slimming dress. Sexy and elegant all at once.
links_reviews_text: Getting the zipper all the way up was tricky due to the snug nature of the dress. I had to zip it fully at my waist then pull the dress up over my shoulders.
Did not wear it for this wedding because it will be a bit cold in Michigan. Cant wait to rent it again for the next special occasion though. Amazing dress.

Cute dress, stretches pretty well but I still think Herve Lager runs small in general. Nice color, fairly flattering fit (although I do think it made my butt less shapely), just not totally right for the occasion.

links_reviews_title: I knew to size up in this brand and the medium fits beautifully.
links_reviews_text: I wore it to dinner at a nice French restaurant and my husband loved it.

links_reviews_title: super small. at least 2 sizes smaller
links_reviews_text: need a bigger size
i usually wear S, this I rented M, still small around belly, showing belly fat! although i'm thin: 5'5", 115 lbs, 34C. And the shoulder design is not great, move around a lot.

links_reviews_title: This was a unique dress in a sea of black cocktail dresses.
links_reviews_text: It fit like a glove. I like the thick material because it holds you in. I wore another bandage dress and loved it as well. They are very flattering dresses.
This dress is amazing and it definitely has the wow factor. I loved it so much. Fits like a glove!
Fits like a glove - got complimented all night
Beautiful dress. Loved the color. Unfortunately I didn't wear this dress. It ran a little small in my opinion.

I normally wear a medium/ large, anywhere from 8-12. In Herve Leger I wear a 10 comfortably, but this is Herve Leger Paris, and I could barely fit it over my legs. Felt like a size 4/6 max. So sad bc the color is gorgeous and the quality is of course impeccable- but most definitely not a large!
Great fit! I wore it to three different events and got many compliments.
Good midi length- worn to dinner- arms werent too much of an issue since they are not completely on the shoulder Hides the midriff Perfect colors
Beautiful dress, but I didn't wear it because it fit weird around my armpits/boobs. Looked awesome from the back, though.

links_reviews_title: Always wanted to try a Herve leger
links_reviews_text: And I did and I didn't like it. I will try another but this one was just not me. If you are like me, you've got some underarm fat and some side chub. It all just squished out and looked horrible. I didn't get that Herve leger affect that his dresses are supposed to give. The spanx effect or whatever. I was blobbing out all over the place and the way I looked in it was more unflattering than I had ever looked. The bandage dress might just not be for me.

This a definitely a typical Herve Leger dress - very body-con, yet still flattering. I loved the bright colors - very spring appropriate. As per the bandeau style, the fit is tight, but true to size. I would definitely recommend this for a sexy upgrade to a date night or party outfit.
Super gut sucking and flattering. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: One of a kind but classic and eye catching
links_reviews_text: I am 5'2" so it is hard to find a long piece like this that fits. I am contemplating buying because I love it so much. Wore it to Per Se in New York and to a Christmas Eve party. Classic tuxedo top and is super comfy with pockets. I wore 5 inch simple strap Sandals and it fit perfect!

links_reviews_title: Pockets in any formal outfit is such a win.
links_reviews_text: So classy. And comfy!!
Great jumpsuit. Very comfortable and fits perfect.

links_reviews_title: It looked great, I was comfortable, and I had a wonderful experience. Would definitely rent again!
links_reviews_text: I had two sizes shipped to the hotel I was staying at in New York City. They were waiting for me when I checked in. The smaller of the two fit well, though it was a bit bunchy on top as my torso was too short for the outfit. The bust was also a bit larger than I needed. However, with the right enhancing bra, it ended up fitting well. It was super comfortable and perfect for the event (opening night of a Broadway show and after party). I felt great! So easy to return to a UPS the next day.

links_reviews_title: Need a bust to fill out the top
links_reviews_text: The top was way too big and gaped so I guess I needed more of a bust to fill it out! I needed lots of fashion tape to keep it from gaping and drooping (can't pin it because it's a jumpsuit that has to come down for the ladies room). Requires a racer back / convertible bra so straps don't show. The flat front and wide leg is flattering. Good with heels.

links_reviews_title: The satin lapel on this outfit really dressed up this jumpsuit.
links_reviews_text: An option for an hook&eye clasp to close the garment over the chest area so you don’t fall out. Garment tape did not work in my case.

links_reviews_title: Perfect work jumpsuit--even for California summer!
links_reviews_text: This is a great piece to wear to work in the summer time. I work in Palo Alto. It looks like it would be a hot and heavy jumpsuit, only for winter wear. But the fabric is very breathable. As long as you use some tape to tape the front part down around your breasts it can be totally workplace appropriate. Very comfortable and very easy to get in and out of for bathrooms

I've decided recently that i just don't like wearing dresses. Maybe it's the fit of them, maybe if the thigh chafing, either way, I knew I didn't want to wear a dress to a friends wedding in the San Juan Islands. I started looking for cute alternatives and was only finding rompers (which I also hate) and a friend suggested a jumpsuit. I started looking at the selections and found this classic beauty. I was really hesitant since I'd never worn anything like this before but let me tell you, it was fantastic!! It was cute, elegant, just enough of a V cut and it fit in all the right places. I did have to wear heels since I'm only 5'3" but with 3.5" heels it was the perfect length. I got tons of compliments, paired it up with a layered necklace some gold statement stud earrings. I will say that if you are smaller chested wear a bralette. I wish I could have kept this. It was so comfortable and flattering everywhere.

Loved this jumpsuit! It was comfortable and a good material. Love that it had pockets! Quick notes: I had to pin the front which was a little loose but easy to fix, and I tied a black belt around the waist to give it a little more figure again super simple. Highly recommend!
I got so many compliments on this jumpsuit. Felt like a total bad ass the whole night!
Fits like a glove. Loved not having to wear a bra with this jumpsuit! Chaperoning a Prom never felt so glamorous.

links_reviews_title: Super classy, yet edgy for a work gala
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a work charity gala. Got so many compliments and felt great. It has pockets, so I didn't have to carry my phone or lipstick with was great. It does get a little wrinkled, but you can't really tell with the black material. Definitely needs a camisole or shirt underneath. I used a lacy black tank top and it looked like it was part of the outfit. Some people may benefit from a belt to keep it closed. Pants were very long so 2 inch or higher heels are a must. I would definitely rent this again!

I was hesitant to rent the runway but it was the best decision of the night. The backup size was genius. I have a nice round behind and while the 12 fit my top it was too tight on my butt, the 14 was a little loose on top but but pushup bra filled it in perfectly. I got so many compliments and i felt great!

links_reviews_title: Was so comfortable and had been compliment all night.
links_reviews_text: Other than the length it ran true to size. I pinned to front together because I just don't have a bust to fill it. It ran EXTREMELY long. I had two inch heels in but even three inches would not have been enough. Easy fix with hem tape. Loved it overall!

I wore this for my company holiday party and it was a great choice! I got many compliments. The piece is simple, but can be dressed up with fun earrings and heels. Unlike other reviewers I had no problem with the length. They hit perfectly with my 3" pumps. The neckline was too low for my event so I pinned it (actually, did a temporary sew job) to where I felt it was appropriate.
Great fit, super flattering. I wore a white bustier to contrast since this was a black and white Party, but you could pin it more closed if you prefer.
I'm 5'10... so it was a little big - but I went a size up for length. Very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Tough to get in and out of, classic glamour
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a work conference. Paired with a wolf blouse this jumpsuit nicely recreates menswear pants/vest. It looked super chic. The clips on the back of the neck were an issue- they got tangled in my bun and were very tough to do or undo on my own. If you rent this give yourself plenty of time before heading to the restroom as it can be a several minute affair to get out of it. That being said, I loved this look and will rent again.

I followed the other reviews and sized up. Glad I did as it is slim through the legs. Low cut so bras will show unless you pin. I was looking forward to wearing mine but unfortunately it had a tear in the back. I will probably try again.

links_reviews_title: This was my beautiful daughters wedding. Special special day.
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size. Loved everything about it. However as you can see from the photos if you are large chested you will surely need something below the top. I first chose a bralet, but quickly decided that would never work for my daughters wedding. I switched to a black cami and it worked perfectly. I felt great all evening long. It is a bit tricky getting in and out of for bathroom breaks, but well worth it.
Very flattering for bigger busts and hides any problem areas but not sure how many occasions it works for

links_reviews_title: Used for a work related conference. Loved it. I put a nude colored tank under low cut front
links_reviews_text: Recommend tank under since it is low cut and shifts easy

I loved this jumpsuit! I hosted a big philanthropy event for my university and this was perfectly stylish and comfortable enough to run around in. I personally can't not wear a bra so you can see my strap but it really wasn't a big deal at all and went well with the look. Being 5'2" (on a good day), I was concerned that this outfit would emphasize how short I am but the deep V actually elongated my body. I received so many compliments throughout the night and felt good in it too. The only downside (as it is with ALL jumpsuits) is that it took 2 people to go to the restroom. I was drinking a lot of water and had to pee constantly, luckily I had someone there to unzip and zip me up each time. I definitely recommend this outfit for a good (and well deserved) confidence boost.

Loved trying a new look with this jumpsuit. Very slimming and fabric didn't wrinkle. Three things though: 1. The top is open all the way. I had to pin it. 2. At 5'6" with a long torso it JUST fit. Any taller and I couldn't have worn. Also wish I had the tall length. Wore kitten heels to accommodate. 3. You cannot go to bathroom alone in this.

I loved this jumpsuite, I felt comfortable all night. I wear 12-14 depending on brands, ended up wearing the 12. I'm 5'9", I was worried about the legs being too short for pumps, the pant cuff hit perfectly around my ankles. Got compliments all night. I did have to ask girls for help unhooking the top when using the restroom, but i would wear it again.

links_reviews_title: Classy, great quality jumpsuit with just the right amount of sultriness!
links_reviews_text: I was in absolutely in love with this jumpsuit. I felt classy and sexy at the same time, and got complimented on it all night. The material was thick enough that it felt expensive, but not too bulky and was slimming through the waist and thighs. I have a small waist, so it was a tiny bit loose on mine, but it wasn't noticeable. I also pinned the low cut V neckline shut at the very bottom since it was a work event. It's longer than it appears on the tall model- I wore high heels and it just barely missed the floor. I wish I could buy and keep it!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for NYE. I received so many compliments all night.
links_reviews_text: This made me feel sexy! Though it's really long I'm 5'5 had to wear tall heels and still dragged a little. I'm 34DD(D) and the top was still a little big but sexy. I didn't wear tape just wore a lacey bra. I rented 4R and backup 6R and wore the 4R.

links_reviews_title: A jumpsuit for those unsure about jumpsuits
links_reviews_text: I admit, I was unsure about renting a jumpsuit. I'm curvy and wasn't sure how flattering it would be. I will say, if you are unsure as well, this is a great starter jumpsuit! The cut is very flattering -- forgiving if you have a tummy! The wide legs made it very comfortable. The only criticism I have is that it was pretty low cut, so i had to wear a cami under it. I felt pretty mich like a rockstar the while evening! Will rent again. Oh, and the tattoos in my pic are not real. The party theme was vintage circus... i went as the tattooed lady!

This was my backup outfit. I think I go with my backup choice more times than my first voice. Lesson- always order a backup!! I'm fairly busty, so I did have to pin the front a bit, and if they'd had a long, that might have fit slightly better than the regular, but it worked. If your torso is long you'll definitely need that. I received loads of compliments. Loved that I had pockets!

The jumpsuit fit really well! I’m 5’7” and it was long enough that’s I had to wear heals. The neckline was pretty deep but seemed to stay up fine. I’m between a 4 and a 6 and wore the 4. Was very nice for a work holiday party and I got a number of compliments.

links_reviews_title: rented this with the idea I was going to wear a shirt under it for work
links_reviews_text: May have worked, but the trip I was going on was cancelled. Cute jumpsuit.
It is definitely low cut but you can pin it higher for a work or more conservative event. Very flattering. Loved it.

Wore to a weddig, super comfortable to dance in and wear for hours. Wore a deep cut bra but nothing plungy and it worked with a safety pin. If It made sense, this item would be standard rotation for me in my wardrobe

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit made me change my mind about wearing jumpsuits! I loved it and the fit was perfect.
links_reviews_text: Pros: I could wear a regular bra, just changed the straps to racer back style. The length was perfect with heels and I'm 5"4'. It fit well all around, in the bust and the waist, too. Only "con" (and I use quotations because it's really no big deal) was that I used a safety pin to close up the front a bit, while still leaving enough cleavage to be flattering. I wish I owned this piece of clothing!

links_reviews_title: Short torso! Moose knuckles for days
links_reviews_text: I'm 6ft pear and this torso did not fit at all. I had to pick a side if you know what I mean, and I could hardly walk! Also the bottom was way tight-- guess I need a 16, but the top was great even a little big. In the end I did not wear it of course. Too bad bc it is cute.

Loved the pants suite. I typically don't wear pants to company parties but I went on a whelm and got out my comfort zone. I love it! I got so many compliments. It's a defiant re-rent!?!? I love rent the runway and definitely be a repeat Shopper. Keep up the great selection.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear because it was too short for my torso and too tight in the bust
It is a beautiful jumpsuit but it didn't fit in the hips.
links_reviews_text: Looked great but too slim in the hips.
Didn't get to wear this as it was a bit snug in my core region. I normally wear a size 12, but it was a bit snug on my core region. Everywhere else fit great.

I loved this! I wore a black blazer over it at work and when I felt warm could take it off and still look very professional. I wore a 2R and am 5'2" and the pants didn't drag once I was wearing some 4 inch heels or long in the torso area, I loved the fit, it's hard to find a good fit with jump suits being so short and having a larger chest and booty.
Flowy dress with a gorgeous material. I wore this for a holiday get together but also paired it with a chunky sweater, belt and flat black boots for a more casual look.

This is a quality number! Runs true to size, bigger busted girls will need to size up. Wore a cami to make it family and work appropriate. The sleeves are huge, but really make the dress even more of a statement. I thought the pleats might make me look a bit heavy but i was pleasantly surprised! This would be great for a wedding, shower, evening out, just a really beautiful dress!
A gorgeous dress that's both elegant and fun. The sleeves are huge but that's what I loved about it! The waist is pretty snug.
I loved this dress. The sleeves are huge and I thought it was so much fun!

Fab fab fab! I can't get over how great the sleeves are on this dress, although you need to be careful reaching over the dinner table. lol. This dress had a lot of movement as well and was very flattering.

I have a smaller bust but when a size up (usually a 4) based on the earlier reviews. I think if you've got a slightly athletic shape you can get your usual size. Got loads of compliments while wearing. Sleeves were a little OTT but embrace it and rock it!
Had to order a larger size to fit my large boobs. But the dress is beautiful.

This dress is lovely and well constructed. I especially like the color and the pattern, and the pleats give it nice movement. However it's low cut and feels a little tight because there's zero stretch. Which means the wrist and waist are tight. I do love the long length. And though the sleeves are HUGE I don't mind them. Just had to be careful they didn't get caught on anything. Also this is much more low cut than it appears.

links_reviews_title: LOL OMG THESE ARMS THO (didn't actually wear)
links_reviews_text: Look at how hilariously voluminous these arms are!!!!!!!! If you're into the arms (there's LEGIT no way to make them less dramatic), then be prepared for the fit of the body to be a little large--I'm between a 12 and 14 and this felt like I was swimming in it. Pics provided so you can see what it looks like on a body like mine. :)

links_reviews_title: I got the dress for a wedding and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Although I'm usually a 2, I would suggest sizing up based on your waist and bust area. The sleeves are huge and super flowy, but due to the nature of the event, it was suitable. The deep green floral pattern fit the setting since the leaves were just changing. I got compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: Pretty, but sleeves overwhelm the dress
links_reviews_text: Very pretty dress, but the proportions feel a bit off. I love the print and the pleats, but the volume of the sleeves is enormous, and they overwhelm the dress. Pretty, but glad I rented it rather than bought.

links_reviews_title: Crazy big sleeves but I liked it
links_reviews_text: No stretch. Really giant sleeves. Like they got caught on a lot of things. Pretty dress. Heavy. Not for warm weather. Overall I liked it. Oh, very low cut. Would not have been wearable without a cami.
ran a bit too small unfortunately so didn't wear
I don't even know what to say here. The dress ran huge - the sleeves were insane and the length was awful on me.

Great dress, but super heavy. Definitely felt a little out of place renting it in the summer. The sleeves were my favorite part, but they are incredibly billowy. Also felt a little too dressy for everyday work, but was great for a work dinner.
fit well, rather loose
I felt like I was drowning in the fabric. It "runs large" only in that way - like I don't think sizing down would have fixed the unflattering-ness of this dress.
Couldn't wear the dress because it was not bump friendly.
Dress is cute, flirty. I actually like the sleeves. Too high-waisted - could not wear .
I loved this dress. A great length, the pleats moved so well and the sleeves were a ton of fun!

links_reviews_title: Beautifully made, tricky fit if you aren't tall with a small waist
links_reviews_text: This dress is really beautifully constructed - great materials. The sleeves are indeed billowy - I love billowy sleeves and this dress has 3x the billow, which I loved. It's definitely more unique on than in the picture due to the fit - but beware, if you're below 5'8" the length/sleeves may drown you. ALSO, the waist does not give at all. I have a 28/29 waist; the 12 had a bit of room in it and I needed a belt to cinch in a bit of fabric, but it was difficult to take on/off. I would definitely rent again though - just in a 10, my true size!

This dress has no give and is tight to the rib cage, so order up if you want breathing room. The v neck is very low cut, so the girls will be out to say hello! I was surprised by the weight of this dress - it's a lot of fabric! The sleeves are also too big and puffy - I can't imagine what event I would want to wear this to
The dress is pretty, however the sleeves were too large for my personal taste.
The sleeves are TOO MUCH! This dress would have been perfect if they were smaller!

links_reviews_title: The cut was lower than anticipated and showed my entire front bra. Couldn't wear :(
links_reviews_text: The cut was lower than anticipated and showed my entire front bra. Couldn't wear :(
I found this dress to be flattering, but it does drown you in material. It had two petticoats and the sleeves were really wide. The neckline is also really deep, and I needed a cami.

This dress is really beautiful. Fabric flows nicely and the pleats are flat against the bodice. The sleeves, while beautifully made, are a bit much. If I owned this dress, I would have them pulled in a bit. Overall, great dress.

This dress is really really well made. It runs pretty true to size, maybe a little small. It's really gorgeous. I didn't mind the large sleeves at all. They are very elegant. BUT it was way too low cut to wear. Almost my entire bra was showing in the front. If you're very tall pretty small in the bust, I think it would look awesome.

This dress is beautiful in person. The fabric is gorgeous and it wears more green than the photographs. It is quite low cut in the bust which wasn't ideal for my work. The sleeves are very blousy and far bigger than I expected- so big so that I couldn't wear the dress. The dramatic flair may have been better suited for an event than my regular day at the office
Beautiful fabric but the construction was flawed. Waist fit fine, skirt was great, but there was so much fabric in the arms, it was annoying. I tried on and sent right back.
