links_reviews_title: the color and pattern is really gorgeous
links_reviews_text: This dress fits really nicely. The V in the front is a little deep for everyday but will be perfect for an evening event. The fullness of the skirt is fun, and the sleeves were a great surprise. I didn't realize that the sleeves were so dramatic and full when I ordered it, and am loving them! It's very flattering on my curvy body, and the fabric is really pretty.

links_reviews_title: So pretty but sleeves are huge!
links_reviews_text: The colors and the cut of this dress are gorgeous! It is black/dark grey floral on a dark green background. It fit true to size except for the sleeves. They had so much extra fabric it felt like I had wings. They were also so long they came past the end of my hands and I have long arms. I so wanted to wear this beautiful dress but couldn't because of the sleeves.
This dress will not be flattering on anybody. It has huge pleated sleeves and pleated skirt. Overall, misshapen
I loved the pattern and was impressed with the high quality construction. Came new with tags! Overwhelmed by the amount of material to the dress unfortunately. Okay for one wear but won't rent again.

links_reviews_title: This dress is not flattering - the fit is very wide everywhere and it gives you no shape.
links_reviews_text: I thought this dress had sequins embroidered throughout the pattern, from looking at the photo. When I received the dress I was disappointed to learn that it was just a flat floral pattern. The fit of the dress is not flattering regardless. Returning without wearing.

Such an amazing looking g outfit, but beware this fits better for bra sizes C or under. I had to squeeze my D's in this but it worked. Also runs small. I usually order a 4 or 6 and the 6 fit me a little tight but worked. I suggest ordering a size up, especially if you're bigger chested.

links_reviews_title: Stunning and comfy - perfect for formal and fun
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. You can wear with or without a strapless. Tons of compliments and super comfortable. I ended up buying it - so in love. Straps were a little loose but not bad at all. Overall my absolute favorite rental.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for an event in Vegas and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this romper! I ordered a size 10 and it zipped up tight around the chest area. I am glad I ordered a 10, but I am usually a 8. Because it was so tight I didn't have to wear a bra which was a plus. I loved the cut out bow top, so cute. Would rent it again for a night out. + plus it has pockets! Win Win (please ignore sock and mess in the background)

links_reviews_title: Love this! Wore in Palm Springs
links_reviews_text: So cute have rented in white and black. This time for honeymoon in Palm Springs.

Cute and comfortable. I opted for a size up which fit perfect. Great to hide your stomach if it's not super flat. I don't like things too tight around the tummy area. The material is thick. I rented it in both black and white. Dressed it up with a cute blazer or also a faux leather jacket.
This outfit gives you confidence! It was perfect for an evening out with my husband. It's oh so comfy and very stylish! It was so hard not to purchase it.
I wore it in Vegas for Mexican independence weekend for a night out at the clubs. Defiantly the right outfit for that night. Highly recommend super fabulous!

I got so many compliments! Loved it & it was super comfortable! It was sexy and not overly revealing. While the fit is super small, the 10 fit great for my hips & a tad long in the straps. I'm normally like a 6 in RTR dresses. The 8 was sold out but I'm glad I got the 10 as a backup!
Great but runs really small! I'm usually a 2 or 4 and an 8 fit! I am 5'9 too and it's usually hard to find a good romper
Super cute! In love with the bow detail in front. Pretty true to size except a tad short- found myself tugging the back down a little

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my 30th birthday and I loved it!
links_reviews_text: Perfect for a cocktail or birthday

Rented this for a bachelorette party, such a fun romper. You can tell it's very high quality and I received many compliments! Only thing that was a bit difficult was the zipper, I needed help getting it on and off because it stuck. But still an awesome piece!

links_reviews_title: Loved this romper! So much fun for a night out.
links_reviews_text: No bra needed. Shorts have pockets. What more can you ask for!

Got so many compliments on this piece--wore it two nights in a row! I'm typically a 0 and found the zipper challenging with the thick band in that size, so I sized up to a 2. Cute, comfy, has pockets, and has a bow. What more could you want?

links_reviews_title: This romper fit great and was really fun to wear for a bachelorette party.
links_reviews_text: Looked great, received many compliments and loved the romper. It was a great romper but no give so don't eat too much while sitting down.
The ultimate variation to the little black dress. This little romper made my birthday party night even more unforgettable. Great fit! It has pockets! It is SEXY and short and looks amazing on.
Definitely go a size up because it runs a little small. This is the cutest romper. Received many compliments. And I loved the fact that it had pockets. Why doesn't everything have pockets right? Lol

I rented this romper for my bachelorette party in Vegas and wore it to see Magic Mike. I usually wear a 0 but RTR was out of that size so I decided to give the 2 a try. The 2 fit well and zipped perfectly over my chest area, however I have no way of knowing how it would have compared to the 0. It was definitely cute, comfy, and just the right amount of sexy.
Fit like a glove! Wore it to a concert and got so many compliments!

I never write reviews but I absolutely loved this romper! I'm normally a 4, but this was a 2 and fit perfectly so perhaps it runs slightly big. So comfortable yet chic. you can definitely do the splits in it, if that's your thing. Was tempted to buy it!!
Wore this out to dinner and the club in Vegas! Super easy to dance in, fun and comfier than expected, only complaint is I wish the bow would stay up and wouldn't slightly cover the keyhole opening.

I loved this a lot but did not wear as it was a ridiculous amount of cleavage. If my chest was smaller or I was going out to party it would have been great but I rented it for a first date. I didn't feel like that much skin was appropriate. It runs really small. I would size up one if not 2 sizes. I am between a 6 and an 8 and the 10 barely fit.

links_reviews_title: Big bow, tasteful cutout, AND POCKETS??? I'm obsessed!!!!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for graduation photos with my friends + one of my ceremonies. Everyone loved it!!! The shorts are very voluminous, but they flare out to the point where it looks fun instead of just too big. No need to wear a bra which is a major win. My only issue was the zippier was a little tricky to zip and unzip-- I had to have a friend help every single time. I initially sized up for length (rompers usually fit me a little weird because I'm on the taller side), but when it came in, I honestly don't think a smaller size wouldn't fit my hips/waist. This is such a fun romper and one of my favorite things I've rented!!

This romper was perfect for my graduation party! Paired with some red heels to spice up the all black look. It was really comfortable and not too revealing. I rented the 6 even though I'm usually a 4 and it fit perfectly!

links_reviews_title: The most incredible little romper situation - the bow detail, the pockets. Literal perfection.
links_reviews_text: This romper was everything. Super flattering, comfortable, and the perfect little get-up for a fashion show after-party. I am a 34DDD and the girls were held beautifully, just enough revealed to be hot, but still kept it classy. Additionally, i am 5'11 with long legs, and while there may have been a cameo appearance from a butt cheek or two through out the night, over all the tailoring and the pockets of the shorts was very tasteful. I need this in my life, if not as a purchase, for sure to rent again!

links_reviews_title: Cute and sassy for my friends bachelorette
links_reviews_text: This fit perfectly and I was getting compliments all night long. Highly recommend! So comfy too.
Perfect for dancing and fits true to size. I'd say that unless you have very large breasts go with your size or smaller. I have an apple butt and the hips were no problem.
The zipper was a pain, but it fit so well. Super comfortable as long as you're not sitting for a while. Pockets; AMAZING

As someone who looks terrible in most rompers, this has to be THE most flattering I've ever worn. Being 5'9 this definitely was very short in the back but the fabric is thick and the cut is so flattering, I loved loved loved this rental.
Fit perfectly. Being on the petite side, rompers get tricky, but this was a great length... nice n short.

Love the romper itself but didn't love the way it looked on me. Was a bit big in the chest bc I have a very small chest and it was a bit large in the hip/butt region. wasn't the most flattering on my body but still very cute and good for the occasion

I wore this to a New Year's Eve party. Very cute and easy to dance in. Straps are percent for wearing a normal bra with. Very comfortable. It was a little tight length wise, I have a long torso and have trouble finding rompers that fit right. I would definitely recommend.
Satin fabrication makes it so comfy. Love the details. Lots of compliments. There are pockets!

links_reviews_title: This dress + roller skates = good times
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my friends Top 40 Disco Inferno Birthday and it was tons of fun. Went braless because: disco... and I didn't need to wear one and it was completely fine. I actually don't remember any issues wearing this and that is probably the highest compliment you can pay a pair of formal shorts with a bow. Got lots of rave reviews and before you knock wearing roller skates all night realize that they are flats with ankle support. The pleats are both forgiving and expanding which is both a good and bad thing. It was very comfortable but one photo was taken at a low angle and I looked a little expansive.

links_reviews_title: Loved this! Wore it for a bachelorette party.
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable, has pockets, and the bow detail and cutout is super fun. I stood out in a romper vs a dress, too. This does run small though - I’m normally a 4/6 and had to get an 8.

links_reviews_title: I wore this romper for my birthday party & it was a show stopper! I received compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: waist was a little snug for a 6 considering I often wear a 4

I rented this for a surprise birthday party. I was totally over dressed as far as formalities go and a little under dressed as far as skin showing. It was Halloween weekend so I just went for it. It fit perfectly. I wore it with shiny nude tights for the event and nude patent leather pumps. Loved renting the item and was very pleased with the condition the item I wore was in. The size 8 seemed a bit worn.
Wore this for my 21st birthday. Perfect fit- bottoms are a little loose but I think are supposed to be that way. Super comfy and has pockets!
This is one of my favorite outfits I've ever worn to an event. I'm considering buying it! Got lots of compliments, and it fit perfectly.
Renting this for a bachelorette and it's a showstopper! It's a little uncomfortable to sit in because it's a romper but the pain is worth it!
You need to rent this dress!! It's the perfect flirty date night dress, it's warm when paired with tights and a jacket! I'm sad I had to send it back and I'm considering buying it!
Super cute dress, fit perfectly! My only complaint is that the slip barely covered anything. I was inspired by Fergie and went with visible undergarments

links_reviews_title: Classic lace dress with a touch of modern flair!
links_reviews_text: This is my second time renting a dress from RTR. Just like the first one, I was highly impressed with this dress. I got so many compliments on this dress! Great for a fall, winter, early spring wedding. Can we worn for a semi-formal to formal event. Fit was perfect! It is a little itchy at first, but got better. #Wedding #Elegant #Timeless
This dress was so much fun! It twirls really well and the fit was perfect. I will say the slip was very short but it worked!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Lace Dress for Daughter's College Graduation
links_reviews_text: Perfect pretty dress in style, quality, fit, and size. Wore this dress to my daughter's college graduation and received so many compliments on it. I'm 4'11, size 36 C bra, and 28 waist. The dress was size 4 Petite and fit TTS, hit right at my knees, and sleeve length fit well. The slip was separate and fit great however the sleeve would slide off my shoulders at times. I loved the beautiful lace, boxy shoulders, and the flattering cut of this dress.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for my companies annual awards banquet and it did not disappoint!
links_reviews_text: The dress does run a little big so I ordered my normal size and a size smaller but ended up wearing my normal size as I wanted to be comfortable all night. The material is very flattering and the dress was the perfect length on me. I would definitely rent again!

I wore this for a Christmas party for my husband's job. When I tried it on, it was really scratchy because the fabric is all lace. When I actually wore it to the event, I didn't notice the scratchiness at all. There was a lot of excess fabric in the waist at the back and I usually wear size 6 or 8, but maybe that was intentional. I wouldn't have sized down due to the short length, but I also have a long torso. The poofier shoulders, lace, and flouncy skirt gave me some 80s vibes, but I think it was still cute. I received many compliments. I loved that I could wear a normal (nude) bra.

links_reviews_title: Super cute style and comfortable fit!
links_reviews_text: The waist was a bit big but I added a belt to cinch it in a bit. Puffy shoulders were adorable.

I ordered a 6 and an 8- definitely needed to size down. Good idea to grab some safety pins for adjusting the slip straps as they were super loose and my bra kept peeking out. Other than that, so cute and comfy!

I was glad that so many reviewers had mentioned how large it was. I ordered 2 sizes down and it fit fine. It was a little shorter than I would have liked, but with opaque tights it wasn't too revealing. I got lots of compliments on the detail & also how perfect it was for the occasion: an afternoon Catholic wedding & evening reception, in Ohio, in November. I wore a stick-on bra since it has an opening in the back. I was able to dance all night and was perfectly comfortable. Loved this dress!!

links_reviews_title: LOVED this dress! Very unique and fun. Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Ran a little large but was comfortable

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Definitely order a size smaller.
Gorgeous dress that feels and looks expensive. Received many compliments all night
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size and very forgiving if you want room to eat :)

This was a fun dress that made me feel spectacular. As the reviews said, it ran big. I got a size down (usually wear a 12). It's got a short slip and then the outer shell. I have a very full chest, and it worked well for me with plenty of room. I had fun and felt comfortable to dance the night away!
Received lots of compliments on this dress. Cons: the slip is not attached to the dress but comes with the dress.

links_reviews_title: I rented this stunning and classy dress for a work event. It exceeded my expectations. Great piece!
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size and easy to zip, as zipping dressing with this material can be challenging at times.

links_reviews_title: Very forgiving! Almost Purchased I loved it so much.
links_reviews_text: The most flattering dress I've ever worn. It hid all the little bumps and curves I hate and accentuated the rest!
I wore this for my birthday party and it was everything I could have hoped for and more! The fabric is nice and thick, all the little details were stunning! I didn’t want to give it back!

links_reviews_title: This was perfect for a full-night of moving and shaking. This was for a cocktail party.
links_reviews_text: Fit great and it was really comfortable. I want to buy this one!!

links_reviews_title: Details are everything! Photo doesn't do intricacy justice.
links_reviews_text: I ordered my true size 10 and the 8. Ended up wearing the slip of the size ten and dress size 8. Was still very lose and comfortable. The dress is basically see through so you wear the slip. Very classy though and flowy dress great for dancing. Would highly recommend. Great compliments and felt so beautiful.

His dress is gorgeous and comfortable on. Lots of room in the waist for comfort and eating;) Like other reviews it does run large. The slip that the dress comes with is ill fitting, but not noticeable since the dress is thick and busy.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to an art museum fundraiser and this dress was perfect.
links_reviews_text: Definitely size down--this is a bit of a wide but short fit. I'm normally an 8 up top and a 10-12 in the hips, but was definitely able to wear the 8 with plenty of room to spare in the waist. I considered pinning the waist smaller but couldn't get it to lay right. The slip is short, and I would not have felt comfortable without wearing tights, so if you're tall, this may not work for you.. Fabric is heavy, good for a winter cocktail party.

Waist was a little lower than empire which created a lot of fabric right over your stomach. It had a maternity dress vibe except for the slip. The slip was tiny and short and made for someone with a small chest. I wore the 4 slip and the 2 dress. I loved the shoulder detail and the sleeves had slits so you push them to 3/4 if you got hot. Fabric is thick and warm. I got lots of compliments but I don't know if I would rent this same dress again.

links_reviews_title: Getting to Celebrate the happy couple and dancing the night away!
links_reviews_text: I’m glad I read the reviews beforehand to size down. I normally wear a size 6, but chose a 4 and it fit perfectly. The slip is pretty short like the other reviews stated, but it didn’t bother me. I’ve never had a dress that made me want to twirl so much. My husband is convinced I ordered it specifically for that reason. Got a lot of compliments, felt comfortable and beautiful in this dress. Highly recommended this one!

Ordered this dress for myself but it fit a little too baggy to be cute, and not lose enough to be babydoll. My daughter is a size 2-4 and tried it on and it looked amazing. She ended up wearing it as a babydoll dress and we both loved it.

links_reviews_title: 2 Months Post-Partum & Looked Great in This!
links_reviews_text: I needed a dress that would be professional enough to wear around my colleagues but also fun enough for a party. I wore this to an evening, dinner & awards event at my company's annual sales conference. Since I just had a baby 2 months prior and still had a little poochy, post-baby belly, I wasn't about to go out and buy a brand new, expensive dress that would only be worn once. Like many of the other reviews state, this dress does runs large, but as long as you plan for that, you're good. This dress hid my post-baby tummy nicely but wasn't hanging off of me either. Pre baby, I wore a size 6/7 dress. Currently, I'm more like a size 8 or 10, due to the ridiculous 55 lbs I gained while pregnant, but I was still able to comfortably wear a size 6 in this dress. I received a lot of compliments on it. The material was a nice, heavy quality, and I felt pretty fabulous for the first time in about 11 months. Thanks RTR!
I received so many compliments. I recently had a baby and it was very forgiving.

Gorgeous dress and the details make it perfect!!! Does run large- usually 4/6 and made the size 4 work but probably could have done a size 2. The slip is separate and much shorter than dress so that made it annoying but overall loved the dress.

I can't say enough good things about this dress! I received so many compliments when wearing this dress. I loved the flowy skirt and couldn't help but twirl - photo proof attached! I will say that the slip was so so short that I ended up buying a new one. I wore this dress to two events - and I never wear the same dress to an event back to back! I am considering purchasing it because I loved it so much. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous and comfortable dress for a black tie winter wedding.
links_reviews_text: I adore this dress. I wore it to a New Year's Eve black-tie wedding reception. The lace is thick, so this dress was perfect for an event in the dead of winter. It fits true to size, or maybe a tad large. I am in between a 4 and a 6, and wore the 4, which fit perfectly. It wasn't too short, so it was great to dance in. I received tons of compliments, and would absolutely wear this again.

links_reviews_title: This dress is different and classy.
links_reviews_text: Lovely dress. Didn't come with the slip so I had to problem solve. Awesome dress.

I typically wear a size 4. I had both the size 2 and size 4 sent and ended up wearing the 2. I am 5’2 and about 130lbs with a more athletic broad shoulder build. This dress fit perfectly for my wider shoulders. I loved the long sleeves for a winter event. I got loads of compliments on the dress!

links_reviews_title: Because RTR know what are your looking for, that night the dress is so simple and classy looking.
links_reviews_text: The fits is to big for me. Pros simple and classy

links_reviews_title: Unique silhouette - comfortable and dance ready!
links_reviews_text: Fabulous dress worn for an office holiday party. Perfect cut for us shorties. Really comfortable and great for dancing. Just like other reviews, I would recommend sizing down - although I did end up wearing the larger size in the slip and smaller size dress.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress! Great for a holiday party
links_reviews_text: This dress is really cute but it was a little too cutesy for me. The sleeves were more poofy than I thought they would be and the back wasn't as open as it looked on the model. My friend ended up wearing it instead. She looked great! The dress comes in two pieces: a silk slip and the lace overlay.

I really loved everything about this dress. It's even prettier in person! I usually wear a 12 and easily wore the 10 but I did wear the 12 slip underneath for a little more relaxed fit. It's definitely the perfect dress to twirl in! As other reviewers noted, it's a heavier fabric dress so perfect for winter time. Really loved this RTR experience.
The material and quality are dreamy. I love this dress. Slightly long sleeves for my short self, but no big deal.

links_reviews_title: Wish smaller size was available, but looks cute with a belt.
links_reviews_text: Lots of waist space with this dress and the material is not the comfiest, but comes with a nice slip and is overall flattering.
The dress fitted perfect. Confortable to wear only a bit heavy. Got many compliments

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Wore on my wedding day in Chicago and received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect, and the shoulders were gorgeous and unique. Wouldn't change a thing.
True to size, comfy, cute and fun!
A little tight in the ribs but other than that loved it. I wore it at my boyfriends brothers wedding.

I wore this to an outdoor wedding and it was super hot, but the dress's fabric is extremely lightweight so I was fine. The straps are adjustable and I didn't have to wear a bra because the fit was tight on top. I will say sizing up is a must, I'm usually a 0 or 2 and could barely squeeze into a 4. Overall great dress, wish I could've kept it.

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress, gorgeous material. Echoing other reviews, definitely order 1-2 sizes up (two sizes up if you're bustier, like me, as the top is pretty tight. I usually wear a 4, but I ended up wearing the 8, which fit perfectly. Would definitely rent again!
I normally wear a 6 and the 10 was tight on me.

Loved this dress! I'm usually a 4 or 6, but after seeing the other reviews, I ordered 6 and 8, and ended up wearing the 8. I usually prefer to wear a bra but the way this fit it wasn't necessary. The material was very nice. I'm 5'9" so the length was great for me, especially since it was for my Grandmother's birthday party. Would definitely wear this again!

links_reviews_title: Too small for the length to work
links_reviews_text: The dress is really beautiful and summery-y. I wanted to wear it to my bridal shower. I read all of the reviews and sized up two sizes, which did fit my chest/hips fine. But going up two sizes meant that the length was awkwardly just above my ankles. Not flattering, overall. Luckily I had ordered a second style as a backup, and wore that instead.

Bailey 44 runs very small. I originally rented this dress in a 0 but couldn't zip it (recommend sizing up!) I rented again in a 2, and it fit like a glove. A little tight in the rib cage while sitting- but not to the point of discomfort. Silky material, but no give. Adjustable straps. Obviously, at 5'2 its not a true midi on me, but hit about mid shin. The dress is lined so its not see through. I'm a 30C & was able to comfortably not wear a bra (if you prefer to wear one, I recommend sizing AT LEAST 2 sizes up). Loads of compliments all night long! One of my favorite rentals to date! **paired with Tory Birch Sand Envelope Clutch**

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a post-rehearsal party. I followed the advise of other reviewers and sized up.
links_reviews_text: I loved the dress, and may want to purchase permanently. I received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Sizing-up for this Presentation-Ready Floral Shiny Beauty
links_reviews_text: I read the other reviews about sizing - and they are very true. You need to size way up! I am normally a 6, and the size 12 was a perfect fit for me, fit like a glove. The pattern is gorgeous, and there is a really beautiful shiny sheen to the fabric. I did wish the dress was a little shorter, it fell at the middle of my calf. Overall, lots of compliments from others, it was perfect for my snappy casual graduate presentation to family and friends.
Wore this for my husband's graduation ceremony. Followed others' recommendations to size up.

I'm so glad I read the other reviews - the bodice on this dress is TIGHT. I ended up going up a size, with serious thoughts about going up two sizes. For reference, I'm a B cup. I did appreciate that the straps were adjustable. I'm 5'2 and the length was long on me - but that was expected. This wasn't my favorite rental from RTR, but I loved the print and it fit in perfectly at the event I attended.

Loved the dress, fit and material. Thankfully this dress did have adjustable straps. Unfortunately, even though this dress fit me in the body, it did not accommodate or fit me in the chest. I was unable to zip it all the way up (like the zipper wasn't even close). I'm a 38C. I just tucked in the zipped and wore with sweater because the dress was very pretty.
Perfect midi for me being 5’1, slightly small in the bust area (34C)
Great fit, a little tight in the stomach and chest (best for smaller boobs). I would recommend wearing spanx with it. Beautiful cut, fabric and pattern.
I loved this dress it's fun and very springy! It does run VERY small I ordered a 10R when I usually wear 6 but the 10 for like a glove on me! Order it!!

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove (in one size larger than usual)
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my spring engagement party! It had the perfect amount of white without being too bridal. I wish I would've bought this dress. So many compliments and the best part is you don't have to wear a bra! I highly recommend going one size up from what you normally wear. Incredibly comfortable. 11/10

I had rented this before in one size up since the reviews said it runs small. But i still couldn't wear it. It was beautiful though and the material is so nice! Rented it 4 sizes up and that's what fit me. I'm normally a 6, and I wore a 12 and it was still pretty tight. I got a lot of compliments though

This dress was such a beautiful print, it has a bit of a sheen to it making it fancier than a typical every day summer dress. I wore it out to lunch with sandals and a denim jacket for casual, and the next day with nude heels and jewelry and a blazer for a theater event. Definitely pay attention to the reviews and order up, typically I am a two but the six fit perfectly. I wore it with a regular nude bra with no problem. I would definitely rent this one again.
It’s a beautiful silk dress with beautiful pattern. It just runs really small at the ribs so may want to up two sizes.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress with a whimsical print - very tight in the ribcage! DO rent this dress, but do size up.
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress for a casual-ish rehearsal dinner at a cidery for a summer wedding. LOVE the print and the dress overall was perfect for the setting in the Catskills mountains. It was, however, almost too tight across my ribcage to wear! This was a bonus dress in a RTR promo so I only had one size; the size up would definitely have been the move. By contrast, I wore a 2R in a different dress for the actual wedding - and here the 4 was too small. Rent this dress, but size up! The print is so fun - the florals being oversize is unexpected and makes it funky. The style of the fabric almost gives it a canvas/almost denim look, and there's visible stitching as a style element, making it a little bit more on the casual side than the listing really shows.

links_reviews_title: Lovely for an engagement shoot in the park
links_reviews_text: This material does not have much give. I suggest going up 2 sizes. The plus is the straps are adjustable. The rib cage area was tight and I wore the size 8. However looks great in pictures.
I'm short so I think this dress would look better on someone over 5'4". I couldn't wear a bra bc the rib area was so tight, but it was still a solid rental.

links_reviews_title: Snug in the chest but SO cute!!
links_reviews_text: Beauty is pain. This dress was gorgeous once I was able to squeeze into it and I received SO many compliments!

Based on the other reviews, I rented a size up (I wore an 8 and normally wear a 6). The 8 fit perfectly! It was very comfortable and a beautiful fabric and print. I will probably rent this dress again and would recommend to others!

I loved this dress, but I'm VERY glad I read the reviews and sized up!!! The top is structured and holds everything in nice and tight, but there is no stretch! The skirt is flowy and beautiful! Will definitely look for an excuse to rent again!
Great dress! Very comfortable, got lots of compliments! Fits a little tight.

links_reviews_title: Super cute dress- there were problems though!
links_reviews_text: Dress was awesome! Runs small. Made for small chested woman. Package was delivered a day after rented arrival date! Huge inconvenience. I did get compliments:)

links_reviews_title: Trust the reviews, this runs SMALL! But absolutely beautiful!!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a wedding tea, and was stunned with the quality! Very light, silky fabric, and fully lined. I also loved the silhouette and general fit. HOWEVER, be advised that this dress runs EXTREMELY SMALL! I usually fall between a 2 and 4, (leaning towards 2) and rented the 6, with it just baaaarely being comfortable! I recommend sizing 2 sizes up. Or even 3! But, in general, beautiful beautiful dress, and I would 100% rent again in an 8 instead

links_reviews_title: Very unique, eye catching summer wedding dress. I got several compliments!
links_reviews_text: I'm normally a size 8 and I ended up wearing the size 12. (I rented larger sizes based on other reviews). Overall a beautiful dress that I enjoyed wearing!

Beautiful dress I got several compliments throughout the day. It was really hot out but the dress was still nice and cool! The bodice is pretty tight though not uncomfortable I probably could've gone one more size up. The 2 wouldn't even zip haha!

Wore to a baby shower. It definitely runs small. I usually wear a 4, sometimes 6 and just zipped into the 8. It was tighter in the ribcage, but fit fine elsewhere. Otherwise very flattering. I recieved many compliments and felt comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Will rent again in a bigger size!
links_reviews_text: Very cute spring dress but it does run small and the material is not forgiving. It's tight in the bust and chest and that's where I am the smallest. It fit my wide hips just fine. I'm usually 4-6 and I could barely zip the 6. To make it work I decided to partially unzip it (so I could breathe) and wear a shirt over it. It looked okay but I'll try this one again in a bigger size.

I rented this dress and ended up wearing it on Easter. It is gorgeous! The fabric, print, cut...everything! Received lots of compliments! Its a perfect spring/summer dress. Looked great with a jean jacket for a more casual look. I wore mine with my nudist heels from Stuart Weitzman to keep it simple since the print is such a statement. It hit me about at my calf, would definitely say it looks better with heels for shorter girls (like me) :)

This dress is so fun, beautiful but totally tight. Very tight around the rib cage, even for a small busted lady like myself. If you're small framed this is the dress for you. Big busted ladies DO NOT RENT. You will regret. Even if you size up, it just won't look good I dont think. There is just no give in the fabric around th bust and rib cage area. I cant really breathe when i wear it, but whatever. It was cute for a day at the garden with my fiance!
A beautiful torso and chest fit. The size was snug and perfect. Gorgeous silky fabric.

links_reviews_title: This dress is comfortable and nice to wear to wear.
links_reviews_text: The top area was a little tight although it fits pretty well.
Came as a replacement for a backup size. I didn't pick out the dress but it would have been great if it had been the right size.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for non-black tie wedding in New Hampshire
links_reviews_text: I went a size up because of the reviews. It was perfect. I have a small bust and this dress was the perfect amount of cleavage

links_reviews_title: Couldn't even zip it up but so pretty!
links_reviews_text: I LOVE the fabric of this dress but I couldn't zip t up!

links_reviews_title: So cute and flirty! Fabric has no give size up.
links_reviews_text: This dress does NOT stretch, so I had a hard time zipping the bust up! It was so worth it because I felt amazing wearing it. The dress is so flattering and I got away with no bra - a total bonus!

links_reviews_title: i could find the exact dress for the right occasion.
Great Dress but Definitely Runs Small
links_reviews_text: This dress was really pretty (I wore it to a rehearsal dinner), but as other reviewers had shared it runs really small. I am usually a 2 or 4 in a dress and I wore the 6 in this one- the straps were a little large (I am also short at 5'1) but I couldn't have worn it any smaller in the waist. If you order with the sizing in mind, it's a great dress and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Five Stars for a Michelin Three-Star
links_reviews_text: Couldn't have asked for a more perfect dress for our visit to the Inn at Little Washington. Usually wear a 2, but do have a wider ribcage, and wore a 4 in this based on review noting it ran slightly small. Needed help on the last little zip up, so was still snug, but comfortable. So many compliments and perfect for a special event in Spring/Summer.

Ton of compliments. Zipper was a little tough to get all the way up. Normally I'm a size 2 and the 4 was pretty snug. The sleeves make it impossible to lift your arms up unless you move them up to your shoulders. 4 stars because it was a very casual wedding so there wasn't dancing and it looked great.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my husband's 30th birthday party
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'6 and 115 pounds (small chested) and typically always fit into a size 2. Despite reading the other reviews about the tiny waist, I still thought I would have no issues but I was wrong. I had to put this dress on backwards to get the zipper up - the embroidered waist ban is definitely too tight. I would size up next time I rent this brand. Other than that, I got a lot of compliments but decided to switch to another dress for dinner so I could enjoy my italian food.

Took 4 friends to zip me in & I am on the small side of XS! Crazy... but overall was comfortable once it finally zipped. No bra needed. The lace on the top was a little uncomfortable though after a while because i sunburned my shoulders.

Super cute dress. It may be kind of tight on the shoulder area if you plan on reaching your arms above shoulder height. It likely won't be an issue for most though. I only noticed it when I was trying to unzip the dress myself and when I was reaching in the backseat of my car. There was a slight tear on one of the straps along the neckline, yet I wore it anyway as it was hardly noticeable.
Love this dress.
Really nice detail. Very sexy.
Loved it! A little tight in the chest, but it was nice because I didn't have to wear a bra
I absolutely loved this dress and it fit great!

I loved wearing this dress to a wedding. While it did run small, I still wore my normal size. It was a tad tight in the waist but I think going up a size would've been too loose. I received many compliments and I'll definitely be keeping in my favorites.

links_reviews_title: No bra needed and no "sucking in" the tummy needed
links_reviews_text: This dress is pretty true to size. I teeter between a 6 and a 8. The 8 fit perfect, except the straps may have been slightly too big. The dress is unique, and had fun layers without being too much. No bra needed at all, and I felt fully supported. With the layers and eyelets no need to sucking in the tummy. Could move, dance, take pictures, pose, etc. Wore it to my husband's 40th birthday party, with a block heel, big earrings and bright lipstick. Navy in color that looks navy, not black at all.

This wasn't the original dress I ordered, it got caught up and would not arrive on time, thanks to incredible customer service, I was able to go to the RTR store in Chicago and pick out a different dress at no cost. I found this different, fun dress and I could not have been more happy! It was so comfortable, it fit really well! I wore a strapless bra but really could have gone without. The structured lace provided the right amount of coverage. It was just a little hard to lift up my arms with the cold shoulder design but overall it was great! I received so many compliments as it is not your typical style for a wedding but not so crazy that it took any attention from the bride (very important)! I'd recommend it for any occasion!

I wore this dress for my best fiends engagement party. It was the perfect combo of family friendly and ready to go out in for the evening. So comfortable and didn't need to wear a bra either. Great dress!
Major con: I couldn't zip the back all the way up. I had to zip up to my waist and then do the hook but left it open. It runs VERY small and fabric has no stretch
I am always a size 4 or 6. Based on the reviews, I decided to go up a size and wore the 8. I was so glad I did. The sleeves were a bit big, but overall this was a good rental.

It fits true to size, not constricting unless you try to raise your arms too high, but that wasnt really an issue. The arm straps move pretty easily if you need to reach for something. The only con about this dress that I found was the zipper. That thing is TOUGH. I had to get my husbands help to zip it all the way. Overall, very nice dress!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress for a day at Keeneland!
links_reviews_text: The layers made it possible to not wear a bra and that part was snug so it worked well. Very flattering and different!

I would say this runs a little small compared to other size 4's and the dress that I received - the zipper was next to impossible to zip up. It just wasn't smooth. The arms are super restricting too. Do not try and dance or lift them too high as it will just not happen. Fun dress though for one night!

links_reviews_title: Such a gorgeous fit! Loved everything about it!!
links_reviews_text: The dress fir very well! No complaints!

This dress is really fun and I loved the straps! The ruffle is big enough that it's basically another layer, but it is still flattering since the waist is fitted right below it. I personally don't love the way it looked on my chest because it flared out instead of laying flat due to my large bust. However, I thought the length and fit were perfect for a variety of different events.
I rented it twice Worn w strapless bra Fitted at waist Zipper was very hard to get up Otherwise perfect dress Size up if full cheated or larger waist bc there is no give to the fabric
I am normally a 0-2 and I could not zip the 2 so definitely size up!
It is such a cool dress that makes you look slim and on trend. My only issue is that is does run small, but if you have someone to help you get in it, you're set.
Couldn't wear it, but it was cute!

links_reviews_title: Very beautiful details. Got a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Very tight. No stretch at all. I would size up.
Small in the waist
Very unique. Cute summer dress in navy. Just decided to wear something else.
Can't wear it, too small on chest. Should rent 2 sizes up

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but not the right fit for me.
links_reviews_text: This dress runs very small. It has no stretch and it’s very fitted in the mid section.

links_reviews_title: Although I am petite, my bust is 32DD and I was not able to zip up the back.
links_reviews_text: #fun
Didn't wear but fit as expected
Fits a little awkwardly for a tall girl.
I rented this for a wedding. The photo looks so cute but when I tried it on it runs tight through the waisted and loose on shoulders. Just didn't look flattering. Returning
Great color and texture. Good transition piece for fall because it could be work with tights, but it runs small. Consider sizing up if you have a large chest.

links_reviews_title: I did not end up wearing this.. a little too much fabric
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size; too much fabric / layers for me and was not flattering. Also a little too short with heels.

links_reviews_title: Pretty, but runs small in the chest.
links_reviews_text: Very pretty, but no stretch to the fabric whatsoever, so would not zip up around the bust. Also, it is probably a little too "poofy" for someone of small stature. If you are shorter than 5'5", you probably want sky-high heels here.
Another great dressy RTR rental. Fits true to size. Got tons of complements and had fun dancing in it all night long.

This dress is way better on than you'd think. It's super flattering and comfortable and shows off the waist without showing the tummy because of the draping and the way the fabric falls. Love the color. Wore it to my 20th high school reunion and it was perfect -- cute without trying too hard! :)

Pros: This dress is underrated... Very flattering on a curvy body, & gorgeous color- when the sunlight hits it appears it's on fire. Great for work & out afterward. Lots of compliments. Cons: fabric is very thin, I highly recommend wearing a spandex Cami style slip underneath.

links_reviews_title: So comfy, unique, and great for nursing
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress for everyday wear. I felt very fancy, casual and I especially loved this dress because it was great for nursing (I currently have a 5 month old). There is a clip at the chest making it super easy to pull it open. The only catch is that this dress wrinkled and stained easily (even water will leave a stain). I received many compliments. Will definitely rent again.
Nice soft material but dress was not flattering. I ordered the 6 but I don't think the 8 would have helped. I usually wear between a 6 and 8.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, but you will definitely need to have this pressed before wearing.
links_reviews_text: The color was bright and lively, but the material was thin. The fit is to size, but in order for the dress to hang properly, you will need to have it pressed prior to wearing. It was okay.

links_reviews_title: Strange hem / poofy cut on lower half
links_reviews_text: The pics for the dress strategically only show the side with the normal hem. The other side is a cross between MC Hammer pants and a dress. Not flattering on me. Elastic waistband. Gaping top with only one snap. I was unable to wear it in public for fear of flashing people.

links_reviews_title: High slit on anterior thigh makes it too revealing for work
links_reviews_text: The slits all the way up the anterior thigh made in inappropriate for work, which is what I rented it for, and the weirdly-fitting bodice was not at all flattering on my particular figure. Unable to wear, went straight back in the bag to return. Do not recommend.
Fit well. Odd cut. No pockets. Low cut thin material nice color
While it draped well, it's absolutely see through. I would have worn it as a pool cover up but couldn't be bothered.
The color and fit were amazing!!! So fun and comfy while looking super stylish!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on the dress and color.
links_reviews_text: Interesting design

links_reviews_title: Hoped to wear this for a work gala.
links_reviews_text: A bit tight in the back and see thru so ended up returning without wearing.

I usually wear a size 4, the design of the dress is very loose at the top so I wore a size 0 for a slimmer fit. The dress color is beautiful and the split is at a sexy, yet elegant length. Because the dress is silk, it crinkled a bit towards the end of the night, but it didn't look too bad and was expected/worth it.

The color of this dress is super fun! The asymmetrical hemline is a lot of fun. It was a little high maintenance making sure I wasn't popping out of the top. You might choose to double stick tape instead of rely on the snap. Over all cute and a lot of compliments

links_reviews_title: Quality was not what I expected for a dress with this price tag. I didn’t wear it.
links_reviews_text: Not flattering on an athletic build
The top is loose and doesn't fit like the bottom. It only has one snap in the top so it gaps open. The bottom has extra unnecessary fabric.

links_reviews_title: This item lays very strangely. Not sure if it is just the manner in which it was pressed.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size but the cut of dress or the manner in which it was pressed was off.

Loved the color of the dress and it fit ok but looked beyond odd. Like I put it on twisted up and decided not to straighten it. I like to think that I am pretty flexible with my clothing choices, but the unusual hem didn't work for me.

Draped nicely and I received tons of compliments. It was a little tricky to get on. I had trouble sliding the arm holes up over my shoulders. Has a snap at the bust line to keep it closed, but I didn't like that it could be seen, so used some fashion tape to hide anyway

links_reviews_title: I didn’t like how the top of the dress fit. It was too loose on me and gapped
links_reviews_text: It didn’t fit well

links_reviews_title: Fun. Professional. Black Halo one of my favs!
links_reviews_text: Thicker material. Best in cooler weather. Great fabric. Rich vibrant orange color. I added a wide belt to color block.. it was too cute. True to size. Flattering. Slimming and asymmetrical hemline is fun!
I've rented this dress twice and it always gets rave reviews! The color is gorgeous and different. The cut is also unique and it makes you feel like the dancing emoji girl
My work friend and I rented the same dress. We both loved it!

Loved this dress! Nice bright color and has a lot of flare. I ended up wearing shapewear underneath because it's not a forgiving fabric. I usually wear a 4 but sized up to a 6 and that was a good idea!
Lovely quality and color. The high low cut made one side reveal more than I preferred sitting but looked great standing and dancing. Beautiful bright color. Definitely stood out

LOVED this dress that I thought would be my backup for this wedding, but ended up being the front runner. The fabric has a good amount of stretch and is very flattering. The color is more orange/coral in person, whereas it looks very red in photos. I received so many comments at the wedding - would definitely rent this one again! Only complaint is that the lining of the dress kept hiking up, but it wasn't a huge deal.

links_reviews_title: The dress was very fun! I loved the ruffle details on the sleeves and skirt, very fun to dance in.
links_reviews_text: For me, I have very wide hips, so there’s always a risk when shopping online. I normally wear a 16 in jeans, so I sized up to an 18 in this dress. It was very tight on the hips and the slit was very high. Dress kept riding up when walking/dancing. I am mostly legs though, so my hip/leg combo, I think, just wasn’t a good fit for the dress.

I just had a baby 3 months ago so I struggled through several dresses that were unflattering to my postpartum physique until I came across this one. It was comfortable and I got a lot of compliments on it! The fabric was a bit lighter than I thought it would be from the pictures but it didn't feel cheap. I would recommend this dress.
Very form fitting. Not much stretch to it at all. Loved it.

This was an amazing dress. Love the bright orange and the ruffle/slit. Lots of compliments on this one. Crepe material was lined nicely and did not wrinkle. Overall, I LOVE Black Halo....so it's always a treat to wear these designs!

links_reviews_title: Light and bright for spring and summer!
links_reviews_text: This dress pretty much fit like a glove. It slightly pulled across the hips because I have a bit of a booty. I wore nude shape-wear underneath to hold everything up and also because the crepe material, although lined, is a bit thin. The light weight fabric is ideal for Spring and Summer. I'm planning to wear this to work or for a daytime event. Note that it's more orange than red. Very vibrant!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable red dress that goes day to night!
links_reviews_text: I'm a 5'4 110 lb. and 32B, and usually get 2 for Halo and this dress fit perfectly! It's super comfortable to wear from day to night! Got lots of compliments for this dress! Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Nice color and texture, runs small
links_reviews_text: Really nice piece, loved the color although I typically don't do this bright of a color for a wedding - it worked out great. Ran slightly large, as I'm normally a dress size 8.

I never thought I would wear so much orange but I loved this dress! The fabric feels nice and it is very flattering. Maybe a bit too fancy for work but I wore it anyway. Some strangers at a cafe near a table once asked me if I could stand up so they could get a better look at the dress. Highly recommend, especially for curvy ladies.

The color of this dress is great, especially for summer! The size 8 fit perfectly. The high part of the dress may be a little too high for work, but depending on the office you might be able to pull it off! I would rent this dress again!
usually i get 4 , but in this dress 6 would sit better, was tight over hips, i was not crazy about shape on me.,other wise nice dress

links_reviews_title: Fun, fitted dress that was perfect for a summer event.
links_reviews_text: I rented this as my backup dress for a gala with "festive cocktail" attire. I was surprised when I opened the bag that the fabric is textured because you couldn't see it in the photos, but it was heavy fabric and ended up looking quite expensive on. I ended up wearing this instead and LOVED it. Fits snugly, and I wore a slip underneath. The shorter part of the hem is quite short, but the ruffle detail made it appropriate and the length of the other side allowed it to remain modest when seated by crossing your legs. I got lots of compliments! I'm 5'5" and 135 lbs, with DD chest. The fit was good, but a little snug for my post-baby body that still needs some toning.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fun dress for party! It is super cute and flattering!
really great dress, loved the fit and color

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Color and a Flattering Silhouette
links_reviews_text: This dress was classy, flirty, fun and flattering. I received tons of compliments. As a taller curvy women it can be hard to find a dress that is comfortable and cute at the same time. The fabric has some stretch and texture which helps with this. Keep in mind that if you are a women that wears spanx you will either have to slightly tuck up one leg or wear ones without shorts as the curve of the dress may make them visible. But, it was very easy to adjust.

This dress was made for dancing, but I wore it to work instead. It's a smaller 8 (doesn't run small, but is on the smaller side). The material clings on to every fault, so either size up to wear spanks or be prepared to suck it in all day. That all said, I received so many compliments on the cut, the color and the style. The asymmetrical hem feels a little short, but does not ride up while sitting and was perfect for my conservative office. Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: This dress was everything! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress comes in a little more orange-y color than the pictures show but honestly that color is more flattering! This dress was a show stopper. I got so many compliments at my best friends bridal shower that was cinco de mayo themed. I was a little nervous because it didn't have any reviews and then i was shocked because the dress was amazing! So comfortable too! Great quality. I might buy it!

I love the vibrant orange and the crepe like fabric. It was a little tight on me and the slit was a smidge higher than I'd do without pantyhose, as such were I to rent it again I'd go up a size. That said, I could have done Spanx and been fine - picture is without any Spanx. I did not end up wearing for my event as the other option I received was just too perfect, but I might rent again if I have another event in the future.

links_reviews_title: I ended up not wearing this because I was self-conscious about the way it hugged my stomach.
links_reviews_text: The dress is absolutely gorgeous - beautiful color and cut. It would have looked fabulous on someone with a slightly different body type. Wish I could have worn it!
Wore this dress to speak at a fundraiser. Fit like a glove and the skirt flowed magically when I walked. The fabric has a subtle texture to it. Second time I rented it!
Beautiful color. Lovely hemline. I received a lot of compliments in this dress.
Fit and very bright color were great - but looked too Copacabana for fall, so I did not end up wearing.
It looks like a simple dress in the pic, but IRL it's a lot. It's more formal than what I was expecting.

links_reviews_title: Super fun and a bit of a fashion risk!
links_reviews_text: This is a little louder than an item I'd typically purchase for myself, but I loved it! I got a ton of compliments on it throughout the day and it was comfortable and flattering. I do think it has potential to be less than flattering in the stomach area, depending on your shape and which size you choose! If you're looking to conceal that area, recommend sizing up!

I rented this for a work event and got compliments all night. I ended up sizing up as it was a little tight in the bust and the slit was a little higher than I would have liked on my regular size. The material was great although a little thin so I wore spanx. Super comfortable and fun dress to wear!
Very cute and fits well everywhere but on the bust, but I'm a 36G so I tend to have issues zipping up around my bust. So if you have a large bust maybe order a size up.
I wish I had taken a picture in this dress. It is fun to dance in and looks great on.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color but to snug in bust.
links_reviews_text: Pretty color but too snug in bust and lining was awkward.
Sadly it was a bit small for me, going to try a size up because I really love the color and cut of this dress! Afraid it won't fit in the shoulders in the 6.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for a summer wedding and the color and style of dress was perfect.
links_reviews_text: Make sure you have some good spanx because this dress is very form fitting.

To make a long story short my original dress was not available last minute so I found this dress as a replacement and I absolutely loved it. I think it was better than the original dress I ordered. I got a ton of compliments on the dress, the color, the fit. I would order it again.
Style was perfect. Length was grey. Ruffle sleeve was on point. I did fit it a little tight in the belly area though

links_reviews_title: Great dress but runs small and tight and thin material that shows VPL / all curves....(in a bad way)
links_reviews_text: I really wanted to wear this dress as I LOVED the style and cut and color for a party. I originally rented the 4 and had to upsize to the 6 to feel more comfortable. Sadly, the dress still showed all the curves, bra lines, and had VPL's that I decided not to wear it to the event. The material did not have much stretch and was definitely not forgiving. I'd recommend sizing up for sure, maybe twice if you're already on the bigger end of your size.

links_reviews_title: Lovely color but the lengths of the sleeve and the bottom ruffle made it look costume
links_reviews_text: fits nice, nice fabric, but the sleeve ruffles are really big.
This dress is so fun but still modest enough for work. The color is gorgeous, and the asymmetrical hemline is interesting without showing too much leg. Received many compliments in the office.

Rented for a cocktail style wedding in Palm Springs and this was the perfect style for me! I could have sized down since the fabric has some give but the size 6 still fit perfect and hit all my curves incredibly. I felt sexy and confident the whole night!

links_reviews_title: looks simple but far from it
links_reviews_text: this really accentuated my chest ( which I already don't have much of since I lost some weight) so I was very pleased with that, also perfect for us straight/athletic girls. It didn't make me look boxy at all! This was a winner for New Years! Don't let the picture of the model fool you it's much better in person.
I rented the 8 (I'm normally a 10) and it fit everywhere except the chest, this is absolutely not for someone with my chest size of 34DDD. It's cute though.
Great dress! Definitely turned heads in this one!

links_reviews_title: Not for those with an hour glass shape. beautiful dress, but fabric is stiff and doesn't give.
links_reviews_text: I think it might be uncomfortable to wear in hot weather. I really wanted to like it.
This dress is classic and sophisticated. Great style and perfect fit. I wore it to a country club event. I'm usually a size 4-6 and this fit like a glove!

links_reviews_title: Uniqiuely casual yet elegant look! Definitely a sophisticated head turner.
links_reviews_text: The cotton material feels a bit heavy with little to no give and is noisy in motion.

links_reviews_title: Runs very large, especially in the stomach area
links_reviews_text: This is such a cute dress, but unfortunately it wasn't very cute or comfortable on me. I sized down to an XS and it still was incredibly baggy and loose, which is made worse by how thick and heavy the dress material is making me look like I was wearing a blue burlap sack. It would be very relaxed and casual for a vacation but I personally thought it made me look about 15 lbs heavier on with all the excess material. It also wasn't comfortable, the material is heavy and scratchy and after 30 minutes had already started to rub against my armpit area to leave marks.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dramatic collar. Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Dress is not like new. It has seen some love. Still a great rental. If it was in better condition, I would have considered purchasing.
Looks and fits great.

I got a larger size bc my hips are bigger, but the downside is the top was way to big. While it does have a heavier fabric I didn't find it too heavy for my outdoor work bbq. Received many compliments
I'm a size 12 rented size L it fit tight at my hips I returned unworn. The fabric reminded me of canvas material, stiff not breathable .
TTS, very comfortable, can be dressed up or down but always looks sharp.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for a casual summer wedding. Classy, comfy and understated sexy.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect. The slits added some sexiness which kept the dress from being too motherly. Lots of compliments! Felt gorgeous the entire night- hated to take it off.

I know for sure I am going to regret not purchasing this dress! It was so perfect for the brunch after my wedding and on our honeymoon. I wore this dress so many times - I didn't want to send it back. I'm already regretting not purchasing

links_reviews_title: LOVED the style, but chose the wrong size
links_reviews_text: I'm excited to rent again and try a smaller size. I usually overshoot on sizing, because at least you can usually belt it or something, but this style didn't work with any of my trusted waist cinching hacks and still looked huge on me. I usually wear a 10 in designer labels and definitely should have chosen the medium in this. The style of this is very classic preppy and looks great! See all of my rentals and how I wore them on my YouTube channel (Pointe Boutique).

links_reviews_title: Chic and unique for a summer bbq party
links_reviews_text: Some people complained about the thick fabric but I wore this on a hot day and was very comfortable. The dress doesnt wrinkle and looked very crisp all day long. I am 5'10 so length was great. I could an issue for someone who is shorter.
I'm only 5'1" and this dress was too long, even with heals.
Wish I could have bought this. It was so elegant. Everyone loved it and I felt positively regal. The fit is nice for those with a little tummy. It masks it perfectly.

I rented this for a work event, but could not wear it. It runs quite long and the material is extremely stiff. It doesn't hold a wrinkle which is good, but I found it just too uncomfortable to wear all day. RTR was great with the return and found something better to wear.
Slimming dress.
The dress fit well and was very comfortable. Great for summer.

links_reviews_title: Very thick fabric. Hot for summer.
links_reviews_text: Beautifully constructed dress. Love the white detail work. Dress is thick and lined which add structure but makes me feel hot.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, but had to return :/
links_reviews_text: The fabric of the dress is very heavy and it's very large in the hips.
Loved the dress unfortunately it was to big for me but I will rent again in a smaller size
Ok- wouldn't rent again. Stiff material

A little long for petite (5'3") but doable with a small heel. Accommodated 32 week belly with a little room to spare. Neckline did come up a smidge high but overall got a lot of compliments and was comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Fabic is nice and thick, the details on the neck and bottom make it so special.
links_reviews_text: Fit was lovely - I felt very confident in this dress and received so many compliments!

This dress fit a little large in the waist and the fabric was WAY thicker/more warm than I anticipated. I ended up wearing it on the plane to Cabo and it was comfy and stylish. Cute with little sandals and a beach hat. Makes a statement but not the best fitting.
If you have a larger chest or wide hips order on size larger

WOW!!! This dress might not be going back. The material is phenomenal - structured and refined. The cut is comfortable and forgiving - it hangs beautifully. The style is unique. This is a statement dress! Wear this dress to be seen. It is effortlessly elegant but also so freakin cool!
If someone has a small waist, no pooch, and curves, then this dress is for you! It was cute but not super flattering on me. Backside was nice, neckline is nice, but think it could use a cinched waist

Loved this dress! Wrinkle free fabric was perfect for a week of travel in Mexico. I'm usually an XS or S, but generally size down for Joie, and it fit perfectly. Straps were adjustable and length was good for either sandals or heels. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Different than something I'd usually pick!
links_reviews_text: Rented for a wedding rehearsal dinner! Wasn't sure what to expect but ended up liking the style! It was different than something I'd usually wear and I'm glad I gave it a shot. It fit true to size, but maybe some spanx would be nice to hide the after meal belly.. I like that you can shorten or lengthen the straps depending on how high/low you want the neckline to fall. The material is on the thinner side but comfortable!
The fit of this is very comfortable and just gently hugs your curves. I feel like it was really made delicately and with thought. It's a lovely design!

links_reviews_title: A fun twist on a sleek dress!
links_reviews_text: I am a true pear and loved this dress! It was fun, flattering and flirty. Got a lot of compliments. It is sewn to fit curves which I like but may not be great for those who are slimmer.

links_reviews_title: Easy dress, dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Adjustable straps, flattering neckline, easy fit.
Walked over 17k in this dress around Rome! So comfortable and breathable.
Was a little larger than I would have liked it to be. But still wearable and comfortable. Everything fit correctly just lose on the lower back side (torso area). Would still rewear many times again!

I wore this for an anniversary dinner with my husband, and it was perfect for the occasion. I loved the just-below-the-knees length, and the material is light, cool, and comfortable. It fits a little loose, but that was forgiving in all the right ways--ie I never worried about looking like I'd had too much dessert. I won't say it's the sexiest or most striking dress I've ever worn, but it's classy and timeless. I felt great in it.
Worn for a wedding Memorial Day weekend. I wore spanx under but would have been fine without. It was more like an ankle length dress for me but looked cute with heels.

links_reviews_title: This was the back up dress sent when the first dress was too small. Worked out well.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a graduation. Fit great. Lined nicely - not too sheer but still light fabric. Great for a warm event

This dress was very comfortable to dance in and sit in at a wedding I attended. I was worried that the shape of the dress would be unflattering, or that it would look like a shift dress, but the dress has a really nice form to it. If you have curves you would be able to see them (although I am not a curvy gal)! I generally wear a size 6 dress and am pear shaped, but can sometime get away with a 4 if the dress is loose at the hips - I could have worn the S or the M in this dress. Loved that the dress had adjustable straps. Would rent again!

This dress is exquisite... the fabric and fit exceeded my expectations. Beautiful and versatile... wore it to work with a flowy cardie and heels, Easter Sunday with flip flops (I was the hostess and on my feet all day!) and denim jacket, and to a happy hour that turned out to be an engagement party, this time with denim and booties. It broke my heart to zip it in the bag, but will def wear it again this summer!

This dress was perfect for what i was looking for. It was very flattering, fit true to size and the material was nice (thought it would look/ feel cheap). The length fell past my knee. I felt very sexy with out showing too much. I would wear again.
This dress looks great but it runs a little larger than I expected. Very comfortable dress for a warm weather.

Lovely cut and drape and perfect length on this slip dress (I'm 5'5"). Could look equally cute for date night with strappy sandals or like I wore it, with a long cashmere duster and d'Orsay flats for work. Comfy and quality fabric. Versatile and flattering.

links_reviews_title: This dress is slim fitting, body skimming perfection!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved wearing this dress and will have a difficult time sending it back. It is absolutely gorgeous, the print is beautiful and the fit and length are the best part! Very comfortable and easy to move and breathe in but it still made me feel flouncy and flattered!
—works well with short torso gals :)
One of my favs I wanted to but! It fits true to size and the fabric is gorgeous
Beautiful blue color, slimming and was a perfect length (I’m 5’3”). Would have bought this if it was a little cheaper.

links_reviews_title: A little more causal that I thought it would be.
links_reviews_text: A little loose on top, great length though.

links_reviews_title: Pretty navy dress, great for a bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: The dress was the perfect tea length on my long legs. The bust area was a bit tight with a bra on (necessary for me) but it was a flattering color and pattern for a day time party.
Loved it. Super comfy!

Wore this at a bachelorette in Nantucket in June and got a lot of compliments, even though I was worried about it looking winter-y. I later wore it out to dinner in nyc with a cropped lavender cashmere sweater and it was super stylish!

Loved this dress, wanted to buy but thought the price was too high. Very comfortable, cute, and appropriate to wear at many different occasions. Wore to work on a Friday with a blazer. Went out with friends after work and switched from blazer to jean jacket. Went out with my husband and wore alone with heels and felt very sexy. If this goes on sale I will purchase. Easy to wear also, felt comfortable in the Large but could've sized down.

This dress was my back up dress for the wedding. I ended up wearing it to work because I had it and it fit really nice. I really loved the length and the fabric of the dress. This was a great back up!
Loved this dress. Wore to a wedding in Santa Barbara and it was so comfortable. Not skintight but had shape and was flattering. Considered buying it I liked it so much!

I rented this for my anniversary with my boyfriend and it was gorgeous and SEXY! This skims the body perfectly without being too tight - loose enough to flounce around but close enough to be slightly body con. I NEVER wear anything that fits close to the body and loved this dress. Plus the fabric is beautiful, soft and silky.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but not particularly flattering. Was fine for an everyday look.
links_reviews_text: The fit was just ok. The stomach was loose and rather than being flattering, I thought it made me look a little poochy. I wore it for a day out shopping but would not rent again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit, comfortable, nice for a dinner date.
links_reviews_text: I'm normally wear sz 4. The style of this dress is like a shift-style, so it fit well at the bustline and it was not snug around my waistline and hips. I wore it with black strappy sandals with 2" heels, and it looked very nice together.
The dress is supper cute but not for big busted and thick bottomed individuals like my self

links_reviews_title: Pretty light weight dress but neck lays strangely
links_reviews_text: Super pretty pattern and fits well. It has bubbly sides that I am not sure I am a fan of. The neck lays strange with my body shape. It doesn't hand and it isn't fitted.

Wore for work with a cardigan and pumps, and then last minute threw it in the suitcase for vacation. Wore it with chunky dad sneakers and fanny pack in New Orleans and was so airy and comfortable! LOVED this dress!
Paired great with a blazer, would rent again for a wedding
Gorgeous! Easy fit.

So confortable! I wore this many times. It can be dressed up with heals, or dressed down with sneakers. It fit live a glove :) I have success and find beautiful dresses on RTR, but this is the only dress i've ever wanted to purchase. This is a timeless silhoutte!

Perfect for a VERY casual affair. It's midi length, so would look GREAT w/ blue flipflops. Colors & flow of the dress are flattering & hides any flaws. Not for someone who wants to stand out & be noticed.
perfect fit, soft material

links_reviews_title: Not fitted as shown in the model photo; very thin material
links_reviews_text: The photo implies that this is a fitted dress. It is not-- it is flowy (no zipper) and made of extremely thin material. It looks beautiful on the model here but suspect it would be difficult to achieve this actual look without being able to modify the dress.

I thought this dress was fine in and of itself. The fit was a little off on me - I'm 5'10 with a long torso and found that the dress hit me in a weird place. The fabric is as shown in the picture, but again wasn't really the best fit to my personal style. If you're looking for a dress for rotation, I think it's fine, but nothing special.

This was my second time ordering this skirt. The first time I ordered a 2 and couldn't even get it on. This time got a 4 and it was still snug. Not the most comfortable but wore it anyway because it was fun and different. But definitely size up, arguably by two sizes and not just one.
From work attire to date outfit, it is a versatile piece for every occasion!

links_reviews_title: Loved the look. Flirty, yet comfy! Something fun to wear to bday dinner.
links_reviews_text: Size 4, tire to size

links_reviews_title: Different than my normal wear but I loved this skirt - so fun and can dress up or down which I love
links_reviews_text: Fits a bit small - I'm usually a 6 but sized up based on reviews and definitely glad I did!

Well made skirt, true to size. I used it for a dance festival so the way it moved was really great. Debating buying the skirt, but it is more of a statement skirt for a few times use. Definitely rent it if you are considering!
I normally wear a 4 but I read the reviews and got a 6. It fits just like a 4. I love this skirt! Perfect for work and dinner after! And I received tons of compliments
I loved everything about this skirt but a few notes it runs small and will not fit if too tight. and is not stretchy at the top. It definitely is tight in the stomach.
Sexy and flattering really enhances your curves! Loved the cut with one side higher than other. Parked with black sweater or tank top.
Fit like comfortable glove.

links_reviews_title: Fun detail and definite waist definition
links_reviews_text: Fun piece to wear from work to dinner. I normally wear a 6 but should have gotten an 8. The hips are somewhat narrow and the waist comes in so this is a size up for a pear shape for hips and prob difficult for an apple shape. I have a 26 waist and 38 hips and the 10 fit a little low but was completely accommodating. I don't think I'd rent this again but it's fun to wear once.
such a great skirt! definitely runs small so order up 1&2 sizes! i'm usually a 0 and i wore the 2, but it was still too tight, a 4 would have been better but it still worked.

So many compliments on this dress. It's a little shirt in front but the material is thick so stays in place. I would rent again! I'm 5'9 and straight figure. I usually wear a 2 but went with the 4 after reading reviews. Fit great with breathing room.
Made my curves look extra special. Made me feel like a million bucks. Wore it to a dance party, and to a special night out dinner.

links_reviews_title: This skirt was an absolute home run! Everyone loved it and actually thought it was a dress.
links_reviews_text: I paired with just a simple blank tank and it looked great!

links_reviews_title: Loved!! Everyone commented on this. Really comfy too
links_reviews_text: My favorite rental so far. Does run small so ordering a 6 (usually a 4) was smart.

Wore this skirt out to dinner with friends and also wore it to work (with tights and a turtleneck). Very versatile and cute, got lots of compliments. Definitely size up - the 6 fit me perfectly and I'm always a 4. Photo is blurry because it was a boomerang!
I felt like I was channeling SJP in this outfit! Loved it!!
Loved this skirt! Fitted perfectly and the structured material ment it was very flattering on the waist/hips.

links_reviews_title: It's never been this fun to twirl!
links_reviews_text: Loved the show-stopping flare of this skirt. I decided to wear it to work and then dancing with my boyfriend. Got compliments all day and night. Note to ladies with curvy bottoms: this is tight around the tush. I was just able to zip it up but found that it pulled on the hips and butt, and was a bit loose/gaping at the waist. This is a common problem for me with skirts and pants though, and thankfully it wasn't so far off that it felt uncomfortable or looked odd. Will definitely rent again!

As other reviews said, the waist runs very small on this skirt. I couldn't zip up a 6; normally I wear a 4 or 6. I should have sized up, but I'm not sure it would look very good on my body type anyway, so maybe it's just as well.

Very fun skirt. Made me want to dance and jump around. I've never felt so girly. The only hard part is finding something to go with it. It's a standout piece so you don't want to overshadow it or be too much. I finally settled on a black cropped fleeced vest tucked in.
I didn't end up wearing this piece because the 4 didn't come anywhere close to fitting me. But I'm going to try it again and size up to an 8.
So much fun to wear. I got tons of compliments. Made of quality material. Definetly size up. I am a 6 or 8 and should have gotten a 10.
I'm a 6 but should have gotten the 10
Beautiful and unique. So many comments. Loved it. Runs small.
Professional with pizzazz.
Unfortunately I couldn't get it to zip up all the way but it would have been beautiful. Will definitely rent again in a size up instead.
Tight around the hips. Go up one size.
This was very tight in the waist. I ordered in a size zero, which I was able to zip up but only barely. Recommend going one size up.

links_reviews_title: High low with a little too much high
links_reviews_text: I am 5'1" and the front of this skirt hit 5 inches above my knees while I was standing... I couldn't even think about sitting. Super cute cute, color and material but it was just too short for my comfort level.
tight waist
Very tight at the waist and the seam was ripped at the bottom of the zipper.
Fits great, high quality. Got lots of compliments. Will be wearing again before I return.
Wasn't friendly if you have a butt
I was surprised it was a zip and not a wrap.... but I was nowhere close to being able to zip up my regular size.... great material and quality. Will try in bigger size!

After reading reviews on this super-cute skirt, I ordered a size up (2 versus my usual 0) and was so bummed that even the 2 was a bit too snug for my liking.
