Sure, I could have worn it and suffered through my inability to take in a deep breath OR eat any food all day/night, but you have to draw the line somewhere, right?! I would potentially order it again, but in a size 4.
So flattering!!!

The skirt is beautiful & made of a stretchy yet shaping material. However, it runs INCREDIBLY small. I am always a size 12, but had to return this skirt because I couldn't even zip it. It was a sad day.

links_reviews_title: It was an awesome piece to wear. Received many compliments and I highly recommend.
links_reviews_text: Beautifully constructed garment. It runs narrow through the waist. Wore with a black tank and it all blended like it was a dress. Showstopper piece.

links_reviews_title: Teachers! Great dress for Fall Conferences
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, isn't low cut or too tight for work. Short if you need to move around a lot but great for conference day to sit in all day. I paired this with a blazer and heels and got so many compliments.
Totally different than my normal style but I loved the movement in this piece.
Got so many compliments at work on this dress- fit was loose and cozy, the pleating detail is gorgeous. The elastic cuffs at the end of the sleeves are tight- that was the only issue I had
I would've purchased if I had gotten an xs instead of s but still wore it and loved it
Fit perfectly. The color was beautiful and loved wearing it to work.

This dress had a very unique shape and a pretty color. It was a little shorter than I thought it might be, but not too short to wear to work. The sleeves were very billowy, which was not the most flattering. I wore it to work and out after, a good transition piece!

links_reviews_title: A nice spring color and unique design.
links_reviews_text: Fabric quite thin so did not hide edges of bra. Also sleeves vey poofy. Was an okay dress but nice to have a light purple for springtime.
Love the color and the pleats. Interesting detail on the cuffs also

Rented for work and church. Way out of my style comfort zone (dropped waist), but it wore beautifully. There was a little bit of pull on the button right over the bust, but adjusting the fabric made it fine. Good dress for nursing moms. This would've been a great option for my daughters baptism last spring.
Only con was that it's a little short. Really comfy everywhere else though

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my daughter's cake smash!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful, comfortable dress with a unique cut. Loved the color and details on the bottom. It's a little more fitted at the hips than I expected but comfortable. The dress is also a little short, which may be a problem for taller women.

links_reviews_title: Great dress. A little heavy so not for summer.
links_reviews_text: I wore with tights and liked the look. It might have felt too short without.
Light, pretty dress that can be accessorized in multiple ways. The fit is loose and low waist. Material is great!

True to size, but sizing up would be fine bc it's a loose fitting dress. The color is nice and it got lots of compliments. Very comfortable to wear, though the arm band elastic was a little tighter than expected
Got so many compliments! Beautiful dress

This dress is really cute and fun for work. It wasn't form fitting on me, which I liked, but think the top might be tight on those with a bigger bust. Good length for heels or flats depending on the occasion.

links_reviews_title: Compliments all day by strangers and coworkers
links_reviews_text: Beautiful great, comfortable. Elastic sleeve band can be a little annoying after some time but nothing super uncomfortable. The medium was not available so I ordered a large. It was baggy but still cute. I generally wear a size 8, the large was roomy. You can size up or down, no matter what it looks great.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful lavender color and unique style
links_reviews_text: The bottom part of the sleeves is a plastic/elastic material that I was not a huge fan of at first, but grew to love throughout the day because you can easily adjust the sleeve length and it will stay put. On the shorter side for work, but color was adorable!

links_reviews_title: Great color, easy to wear and a great length
links_reviews_text: Great length for someone who is taller, I am 5'8" I have a large chest and it didn't gape in the from. Major plus.
Stunning dress! So gorgeous in person. Great length (I'm 5'5") above knee. Fabulous fabric with a great flow. Love the cuffs. The cut and style are fun yet professional. Highly recommend!

I wore this to a Spring fundraiser after work and it was perfect! I wouldn't normally wear this to work but it was so comfortable I wore with flats to work then swapped out heels for the party! I got lots of compliments! I think the pleats and color are stunning! I would definitely recommend renting this. I'm 5'4 and length was conservative but not too long. It's runs tts and xs was perfect, not too tight at all.
Very classy and cute!
This dress was perfect for a derby party. Even though I believe i have wider hips, the small did not pull across the hips and draped perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful modest dress with feminine details!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress. It was quality silk material and nicely made. Slightly short for taller girls, but not enough to feel uncomfortable. Beautiful in person!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a spring fundraising event
links_reviews_text: Comfortable dress with the perfect details on the sleeves and skirt. Lilac color is gorgeous. Got a ton of compliments on the color and fit. People asked if I had lost weight! Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Loved this perfect for spring and long enough for tall ladies!
links_reviews_text: Got this for Easter and loved it. I'm tall 5 10' and even with heels it was comfortable for family and church and wrangling 2 babies.
Such a miss. It's boxy through the hips so it doesn't give any shape. I have a long torso and it was pretty short on me. Okay for running around but too short for work.
Super cute color and fit. It's a casual, boxy silhouette - so don't expect it to be form-fitting.

I've worn this before, to church on Christmas Day, but rented it again for an easy work look. I really love the look of this, but even I was surprised to get compliments from literally everyone. Leather leggings and Doc Martens boots edged it up a bit.
Cute fit and really cute on.
Really wanted this to work for me but it was a little short. Loved the quality, color and style! If this comes in a tall I'll def rent again.
Love this dress. The color is beautiful and the loose fit offsets the overall girliness of the ruffles. Long enough to comfortably wear to work but would definitely wear to social events/on weekends.
Fit well, nothing super exciting about it though.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Shirt Dress with Flirty details
links_reviews_text: Love everything about this dress-The light purple color was amazing; the fit was lose but has shape; the details on the sleeve were so delicate and lovely. Would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, perfect for daytime wedding
links_reviews_text: I think it's pretty in person but not a super photographic dress
Fun color, forgiving shape. A little short, tighter through the chest Fit but I'd size up if I was purchasing
Fit is great! Beautiful dress. Lots of compliments!
Very short for a tall person. Not recommended if you have to pick up small children while wearing it.
This is a vey beautiful dress with a unique color and design. It's very flowy and a little on the short side but I loved wearing it.
A little loose in the middle but not in a bad way, comfortable and feminine. Nice lavender color easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: Needs a belt, but very pretty
links_reviews_text: I got lots of compliments but it took me a while to even like this dress once I put it on. Like others have said, it's not very flattering. This was easy to fix with a belt. It's thinner fabric but can be worn in spring, fall, or warmer winter days.

I received a ton of compliments however I didn't love the way I looked. The cut and fabric was AMAZING but as I'm 5'3 it ran very long. The shape was funky but I couldn't appreciate the asymmetry as much due to length. I also didn't think it was very flattering on my body.

links_reviews_title: Got a million complements in this dress! Love how flowy it is.
links_reviews_text: The color is just as pictured! Perfect for summer to fall transition.

links_reviews_title: Countless compliments on a dress that was cozy as pajamas
links_reviews_text: Fits a bit baggy. Once I wore with a belt for structure. This is an eye-catching dress for work or fun. It is light but definitely lined and not sheer. Has good movement as you walk.
Be prepared to get noticed in this dress. It's very beautiful but certainly fashion forward. If you embrace it you'll love it!

I would say this is a very comfortable dress to wear, I wouldn't say it was the most flattering but at the right angle it was amazing and I love the colors!! I wore it with little white tennis shoes and was so comfortable

links_reviews_title: I actually really like this dress. It is very long but it's totally my style and I love the designer
links_reviews_text: Super cool if you are into the oversized look.
I just got this today and I am sending it right back. I don't know how tall the model is but this drug on the ground and I am 5'7". I felt like I looked like a Hare Krishna. Not for me.

I'm 5'6" and this touched the ground on me even on my tippy toes. Since it's asymmetrical the long side hangs down far if you are not tall. This would have been cuter if the hem was like a foot shorter on me.
runs super small so I wasn't able to wear it. Will size up and rent it again.
Tight

links_reviews_title: This material is very heavy. It looks matronly if you are not super tiny.
links_reviews_text: Tight in the middle and material is heavy. Odd length too.

links_reviews_title: I put this on and my boyfriend said I looked regal. He rarely expresses compliments like that!
links_reviews_text: Love this dress but definitely want to size down next time. Overall the fit was like I was wearing my big sister's dress; however, with such a gorgeous creation I didn't care. I'd love to buy if I had an extra grand laying around!

links_reviews_title: So much fabric and much longer than expected. I didn't end up wearing it.
links_reviews_text: It just didn't look how I expected.
this dress is super cute, but it is way too long on my 5'4" frame... if i wore 4 inch heels, the dress would still be dragging on the ground.

links_reviews_title: Didnt wear it. Didnt love it on.
links_reviews_text: Just didnt it right.
Beautiful dress, love the fabric, design and cut. It just didn't fit me across the bust. Super bummed b/c I loved it!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for if you're trying to dress up like a fairy princess
links_reviews_text: This is truly a great fit and I loved the shape it gave me. I got this dress for .. well I'm unsure. I thought it could be an every day thing or that I could dress up for a date or something, but it ended up looking like I was trying to play dress up as a fairy princess or something. I can't figure out the fabric or colors or whole situation with this dress, and so I just wore it in my house one day for funsies.

The dress felt awkward so I didn’t wear it. The sleeves are really snug and wouldn’t hang naturally so I kept pulling them down while I was trying it on. And even when the sleeves were lowered, they made me feel bulky as they have a bubble shape to them. It’s really well made but doesn’t offer much as far as shape is concerned. I think a belt did the trick but I couldn’t get over the issue with the sleeves. Just wasn’t flattering.

It fit me well and was nice for spring. The material doesn't have much give but the cut isn't skin tight. I think the material would be a bit hot for the middle of summer. I liked the length and got a lot of compliments. The longest part was an inch or two off the floor for me and I'm 5'8". If definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, but couldn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: This was a full size too small for me. Although the piece is beautiful in the photographs I found the shoulders, chest and sleeves hung weird. Although I could zip it up (usually I wear a size 0-2) this was really uncomfortable and did not fit like the photograph.
Great for a spring wedding

I wore this on a peach picking excursion, and while the style fit the bill, the fit was rough. I was definitely too busty for the design in the top and the dress kept riding up all day and just looked silly. I had to constantly adjust it. It just didn't sit right.
This dress was great! It's light and fits perfectly. I got so many compliments. I wore this to a car show and it was perfect and easy to wear for the day.

links_reviews_title: The looks I get from everyone when I walk in a room. I may have to purchase.
links_reviews_text: Fits perfect. Great dress!
Rented for every day use. Felt very sheer. Loose and fun.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a VERY hot graduation day!
links_reviews_text: It was a tiny bit low in the front but a small pin in the back fixed the problem. Turned out to be a great dress for a VERY hot graduation day.
A bit loose at the waist but otherwise fits well. Flowy and nice material for the summer.
I wasn't sure how I would like the stripes on me-to my surprise, the dress fit beautifully & I loved the colors!

No zippers, slips easily over your head and skims, doesn't cling. I love this dress. Dramatic and fun but not overly serious. Very comfortable. Agree suited for taller people, which I am, so Yeay! It did slip a bit in the chest and one of my male coworkers got a bit of a thrill. Sit up straight in this one. I'd definitely buy it, suits me to the ground. Got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Spectacular stripes and lots of movement
links_reviews_text: This dress dances when the wind blows- the red is vibrant and the other striped is a bit more cream so the contrast in colors is less harsh than it would be with a bright white. I belted the dress so it was less of a sack

links_reviews_title: Just too snug for larger breast
links_reviews_text: Didn't fit the best in the chest area. 36DDD was just too snug.
Fit true to size. Easy to wear a strapless bra for more cleavage. Did need ironing so if you're traveling with this one make sure you have a steamer.

links_reviews_title: I’m 22weeks pregnant and this dress made me feel so nice
links_reviews_text: True to size, easy to wear with bra, stripes work well for curves

links_reviews_title: I should have gotten a 0 but wasn't familiar with the brand. I made it work with some fashion tape.
links_reviews_text: light fabric. great in hot weather. flowy and feminine.

I got this for a summer wedding and thought it was a bit too casual for the event (in terms of the fabric and the simple cut/look). Might be really cute for a summer work event or party tho? I just thought it was a pretty meh dress. Fits true to size and is very comfortable on.
x

links_reviews_title: Did not choose this dress for my party
links_reviews_text: Fabric was a bit too thin, slightly see through
Amazing fit and it was flattering in my shape
Loved the fit and fabric of this dress. The only reason this isn't five stars is that it has a lot of give in the busy area on hot summer days.

links_reviews_title: I didnt wear it. The neckline was not flattering and it seemed like it wrinkled very easily.
links_reviews_text: None
It fits, it just makes your hips look very wide without doing any favors on top.

links_reviews_title: Really pretty and dramatic without being too dressy.
links_reviews_text: It's maybe a little large, but it's also a loose style that's meant to have a lot of flow. It's very comfortable to wear!

links_reviews_title: didn't wear it, too tight on the hips, better for taller types
links_reviews_text: N/A

The top of the dress was so baggy on my ample bosom (36 D) that I thought maybe I got the wrong size. Nope. label said 10. It looked like a baggy pillow case on me though so I didn't wear it. Luckily this was an add freebie promotion. I was hoping to wear it to a picnic though.

Quality dress with a fun pattern. As others have said this is not white but cream. It was too thin for me to wear. I'd think it would be tough for anyone with any curves. It would be hard to wear spanx under this.
The straps were a bit long so it was loser fitting on the top. But, other than that it was a great dress for a spring party!

links_reviews_title: pretty dress, good fit but was piling and looked overused.
links_reviews_text: pretty dress, good fit but was piling and looked overused.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing this dress.
links_reviews_text: Fit was too loose for me and the bow was long and droopy - didn't really read as a bow. I liked the creamy white with the red color.
Very comfortable and cute dress. Could wear a bra with it because the straps showed, but it was actually OK going braless. Lots of compliments, would 100% rent again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress runs a little large
links_reviews_text: Dress is really soft, and lays nicely across the body. I'm between a 4 and 6, and the 4 fit nicely around my hips but was looser under my bust (I'm a 34C, 132lbs, 5'4). The fabric is more casual than I thought based on the photos, so read the description. I decided not to wear this because I just wasn't feeling the stripes for the occasion and also the length hit my legs a little low for my height, making me look shorter than I'd like. But this would be amazing on someone taller and is very comfortable fabric and very flattering cut of the stripes!

links_reviews_title: the bias cut just didn't work on me
links_reviews_text: I have a short waist and so the bias cut didn't flatter me. A very pretty dress
Rented for red/black/white party on vaca- perfect and different from all the others
The fit was a little large but worked.
The straps were too long and the dress was floor length on me.
This was so light and comfortable. This piece just slid on and it was so soft and breezy to wear. I paired it with a denim crop jacket and some natural mules and it was perfect for a book signing.
Too big and shapeless

This was one of most unflattering dresses on my body type I have seen in a long time. I am pretty athletically built, muscular shoulders, chesty, etc and this made me look like a football player! The material around the waist area made me look flabby. i think it would work on a super skinny, super model body type where it would just hang on them. That is not me!
sexy; fun!
Perfect for warm temps, lightweight fabric.
Flattering and easy

links_reviews_title: Just how great I felt in this dress! So striking
links_reviews_text: Such a beautiful dress and it really does perfectly hug your body which is rly important for me. It's true what they say about the arms but it was alll worth it.

links_reviews_title: Sweet and Sexy vibrant red short dress for Valentines
links_reviews_text: I am a size 6-8 but since I wanted breathing room for bust I sized up to 10 and had a perfect fit! Recommend a tight push-up strapless bra. Great thick stretch quality material. Would consider buying. Must Rent!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! Second time renting
links_reviews_text: Color is beautiful! Fabric is thick enough that I didn't need to wear a bra. I did choose to wear a sticky bra the second time around because I felt like the top part that folds over the arms sort of pressed my chest down. I did have a hard time with the fabric over my arms riding up while dancing. Got so many compliments!

Loved this so much! COMFORTABLE and true to size. Great for petites. Classy, yet flirty. Pro: arm holes, so shoulders stay in place, thick material for colder months, cute details! No major cons, but you can't raise your arms too high. It's short, but that was my goal. I typically don't wear red, but this changed my mind. GO FOR THIS ONE!! I felt amazing.

I rented this for a Christmas wedding and absolutely loved it! It's been my favorite dress I've ever rented. It was tight but not unflattering, I felt great the whole night. It was a bit short even though I'm pretty petite (5'1")

links_reviews_title: Amazing Wedding and Amazing dress to go with it!
links_reviews_text: I literally want to buy this dress and keep it forever. It hugs in all the right places and made me feel so confident!

Fits like a glove! I got so many compliments in this dress. A little short if you have longer legs, but I chose to own it. The sash could have used some stitching along the borders, it was simply just cut and it looked a little cheap if you saw it up close. Only downside!

This dress is a snug fit. There is no zipper so prepare to wiggle in and out of it. It is a very flattering fit. It will limit your arm range of motion. It did hold everything in place so well, I only wore pasties even though I am quite busty.
Super cute! Fits well. Hides unflattering sides and looks amazing with any hair/accessories/shoes

This dress was wonderful. Super form fitting but very stretchy, no zipper but still managed to get in! It was short even for me at 5' 3", but I like them that way. Careful for the length of Spanx though. The color was great, a really good holiday red.

I will echo what others have said, which is that the material of the dress hugs in all the right places and is extremely flattering. The fold over of the sleeve is NOT as thick as what is shown in the model photos. I had to constantly pull it down if it wanted it to look just as it does on the model, otherwise it rolled up ever so slightly. That was not a dealbreaker for me. I absolutely loved this dress and so did everyone around me!

links_reviews_title: Makes you feel so good about yourself!!
links_reviews_text: Perfect for a special occasion!! Just the right kind of snug with a belt across the stomach. Can dress up or down!
No zipper so it's stretchy You can wear the sleeves or not so I loved that The tie you can play with Amazing red color Loved it

Looked great in photos and made me look thin. Cons was very short if you're taller (I am 5ft) and the top isn't very practical. You are constantly pulling the top over your shoulders to lay properly. As you can see another girl at the party happen to have same dress.
This dress made me feel sexy, classy & overall comfortable. Highly recommend!!
Loved the dress. So flattering. I listened to the reviews and went a size up and it worked out.

Wore to a wedding. Size 0 - which is what I usually wear. Fit very well - true to size. Flexible fabric. I received many compliments! Only con would be that it was a little shorter in the front than I expected, but still loved it and would rent again!
Great fit, super comfortable. I usually wear a size 4 but went a size up to add a little extra length. Beautiful fit and the color really popped. Non-stop compliments all night.

Absolutely don't rent if you hate feeling like a million bucks! Wonderful dress no complaints. Thicker flattering material. If you're 5'9 like me be prepared for it to be a little on the shorter side but that's part of its charm

This dress is a show stopper. Fits snug in all the right places and the thicker material holds any "extra" in and hides any trouble areas. It runs a little short in the front and rides up slightly but nothing that would stop me from renting again. I didn't wear a bra with the dress but again the material held the girls up and in. I received so many compliments on our night out and I felt beautiful.

What I loved: the color, the material was thick so I didn't need any shape wear, the dress itself is gorgeous. What I didn't love: it runs small, I am normally a 6 and wore the 8, but wish I would have gotten the 10 for length. I ended up wearing it one shoulder like some other reviewers did just to give myself an extra 2 or 3 inches of length so I could dance. Really wish I could have worn it like it should have been, off both shoulders, as I think it would have been a more impactful dress that way.

This dress was very comfortable (although warm on a hot day being it's so thick). It's incredibly forgiving and flattering. I wasn't as concerned as I thought about the length but did find myself adjusting the top a lot (small chested) Would definitely rent again!
Wore this in Vegas and I felt so comfy and sexy! His all my insecure spots...

links_reviews_title: Not for Ladies on the Taller Side
links_reviews_text: I really wanted this dress to work. It was cute and the fabric was stretchy, but the slit in the middle would have shown everything I had on the dance floor. The fabric over the boobs also would not have stayed put as it kept folding up. My shorter friend ended up wearing it and it looked great on her! lol

The dress ran small so I would definitely size up! I got a ton of compliments and it was generally very flattering! This dress is extremely form fitting, which might have deterred me if I would have known. I also could not figure out how to arrange the belt to make it look like the model photo. The material is also a lot heavier than it appears in the picture!
I loved this dress- it was compliment city and I felt good in it too. Photographs well and was flattering. Runs small and I sized up one. RENT THIS!
I love this dress! Beautiful, vibrant color! Thick, stretchy fabric but does run slightly small.
Extremely flattering. Received many compliments on this dress that I rented for a wedding reception.

I was a little hesitant about ordering this dress for a wedding because of the tightness and bright color. It definitely was tight and a tad short. I am usually a 0-2 in clothes, and ended up wearing the 4 because it was a bit longer. The armholes were a bit tight, but I was still able to dance all night. I received SO many compliments and felt beautiful all night.

links_reviews_title: I got alot of compliments with this dress! Perfect Fit, Beautiful red! Felt like queen!
links_reviews_text: #showstopper!
Beautiful thick fabric, loved the color, was the perfect length. It was comfortable. Stayed in place.
Great quality! I sized up and the dress fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: By far, the most compliments I have ever received about an outfit
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove, great flattering fabric and a beautiful shape. The red colour is stunning. A truly eye-catching dress!

I wore this dress to a bachelorette party. As a short curvy woman I was nervous about renting because it can be difficult to find dresses that fit well. This dress was perfect- the material was really thick and the wrap cut was flattering. My only issue is that the arm holes were a little tight and the sleeves would ride up while dancing.

The dress runs a little small and is pretty short. I am 5'6", 34DDD usually wear a 6-8 and I wore the 10 for more breathing room and a tad bit more length. The sleeves are a bit tight for athletic build, and they ride up a bit when moving around. But I received tons of compliments! The material is stretchy and was super comfortable for a wedding with dancing and eating.

Overall a duper flattering dress. The only down-side is it does ride up a significant amount, so if you plan on doing any dancing it poses a challenge. The length was the only thing that made me the teeniest bit self conscious. For photos i's amazing, just need to watch it on the dance floor

I didn't end up wearing this dress, though it was fun. I usually wear either a 6 or 8 and tried both. The 6 was too tight so would have gone with the 8. I'm pretty busty (34DDD) and felt that the dress wasn't doing much to help in that department (couldn't get it to work with a bra and felt like the off the shoulder arm band was pushing the girls down too much). Otherwise, would've been great! It's a thicker elastic fabric so I imagine would be comfortable to wear for the evening.
It was a great Vegas dress. Short on my petite frame so tall girls be warned! Material is very thick so forgiving for its snug fit. It was definitely a sexier look than I intended.

I normally wear a zero and the smallest available size was a 4 so I was nervous the dress wouldn't work but like other reviews stated, sizing up was the way to go! It fit perfectly and comfortably! I received tons of compliments from the style of the dress to the color. It is a showstopper and will definitely make you stand out!

links_reviews_title: I am 5’1 and 102 lbs. the 2 was tiny and 4 fit like a glove. Cute dress!
links_reviews_text: Runs small

Loved this jumpsuit. Such a breezy fit, but you have to size up because that zipper is tricky. Great fabric, great fit, and I'm a short girl (don't let the heels fool ya). Goes great with any color accessories.

links_reviews_title: Hugs in all the right places!
links_reviews_text: Very flattering and comfortable! Super easy to dance in. Was very happy with my rental!

links_reviews_title: Cool concept but the fit was strange
links_reviews_text: I liked color, the floral sash and the floral inset going down the one side but the fit was just off. The waist was too high on me, the hips were too tight and the crotch was very long. The pockets on the jumpsuit were a good idea but they sat right on my stomach and made it look lump in person. If I put anything in the pockets, you would be able to see everything. The top of the garment fit great but the bottom half was just weird. I don't think sizing up would have helped because the top would have been too big. Overall, it was a beautiful garment but the fit was very strange. The picture doesn't seem to show any of these issues but I didn't feel good in the garment so I decide not to wear it.
Loved wearing this for Thanksgiving feast and a beach walk with my husband.

The jumpsuit actually ran a little big. I could have used one size smaller. It was most big in the seat. It also came EXTREMELY wrinkled and was so difficult to iron. Lots of compliments though, so still a successful rental

links_reviews_title: Perfect jumpsuit for a stylish brunch event with friends!
links_reviews_text: Wore this jumpsuit to a Fashion Brunch Event with my girlfriends and received so many compliments. The fit was very flattering on my short, curvy frame. Paired this outfit with my brown gold and wooden Jimmy Choo heels. The colorful ribbon on the side made this jumpsuit a true statement piece. Looked & felt sophisticated & trendy!! Would rent again. The Capri Length was perfect for my 5'O height. No hemming needed.

links_reviews_title: Super cute but not ideal for shorter girls
links_reviews_text: I had been obsessed with this jumpsuit for a while and finally had an event to which I could wear it. Unfortunately, it was a bit long in the torso area for me. For it to fit me well I'd have to alter it to shorten the shoulder area which would pull the whole top up. It would be perfect then. Also, it's not totally obvious from the photos. The pants have a small panel that matches the ribbon down the the leg that is on the same side as the ribbon. It's cute, but if you were expecting the ribbon to be the only accent, you'd want to know that.

Wanted to love this but should have really examined the picture. The fit was very 70's with high waist and drop crotch. Overall I went with the look and played it up for a Derby party. Got compliments but personally didn't love it

I loved how unique this piece was! I ordered up a size because a couple of reviews stated that it bunched in the hip. I probably could have gone with my normal size but the larger size was more flowy and comfortable. The length was also about mid calf, which was not a problem for me. Loved this!

links_reviews_title: Cute outfit, not really for short girls
links_reviews_text: As you can see, my picture looks nothing like the picture of the model. The cute capri style was a full length pant on me, which would've worked out fine, except the crotch was a little low. It was big and flown enough that my friends through I rolled up to the birthday party in a flow maxi dress, so it worked out. If you have a short torso I would not recommend this jumpsuit. The details were cute with the floral stripe down the side and the extra material draping over the front and back of the right shoulder. I just wish it would've fit my petite frame better. The zipper was a little tough, so I wouldn't recommend wearing this jumpsuit if you are planning to drink a lot because lots of bathroom breaks could be a challenge. But if you're tall and you a camel, you need to try this jumpsuit!

links_reviews_title: Great color ! Not so flattering where the hem line hits but still cute.
links_reviews_text: Super cute! Lots of compliments!
Didn't have to wear a bra with it; supported my 32dd chest very well. Super comfortable great fit cute colors

It fits tight on middle part, so i should have to control eating to void my belly jelly :) Iron it! It looks way better and fancier Fantastic color in blue However, little bit of inner piece came out on the shoulder. It makes this beautiful jumpsuit cheaper I tried rolling in all day. ;;
So comfy yet cute enough to wear for a birthday in warm weather. The side detail is nice. Only flaw is the side without the shoulder tends to slide down had to pin to bra to be safe.
This is a perfect outfit to look dressed up but be totally comfortable all night. Unique cut and ribbon detailing. Received a ton of compliments!

Unfortunately this jumpsuit was not S flattering as it appeared online. The main issues were in the hip/thigh area. As you can see in the picture the material gathered around the hips causing the zipper to bulge out, making it unwearable. I did not order the size up so I'm unsure if that would help the fit of the jumpsuit at all.

I don't think this was the most flattering piece of clothing I've ever worn, but it was certainly a blast to wear. I rented it for work, as I have to dress up for my job, and everybody loved it--it gave everybody a huge smile.

links_reviews_title: No event. But the Moms in my piano studio loved the way it looked on me!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. Comfortable!

links_reviews_title: It was VERY small so i didn't get to wear it
links_reviews_text: ran small, otherwise would have been VERY cute

I so wish I could have worn this- I loved the retro look and the fabric. Sadly the review are right- the torso is awkward and the top/bottom aren't quite on the same page...I have a small bottom, large bust. I couldn't get it zipped past my rib cage, and my friend (who is very lean and long) couldn't get it over her hips for some reason? It's like the opposite of the sisterhood of the traveling pants...it fits no one?

links_reviews_title: Really awkward fit in the waist, hips, butt
links_reviews_text: If this weren't so awkward from the waist down, I would love it. I WANTED to love it. I should have trusted other reviews. Where everything fits/hits in the waist, hips, butt including pocket placement is frankly terrible. I thought about wearing it anyhow but hubs gave it a firm thumbs down. I rarely return something without wearing it at least once but I just couldn't with this one.
For short people, this will be a pant length jumpsuit. It was cool to rent because jumpsuits are fashionable now. I wouldn’t want to buy it though. Fit like a glove and looked super cute.

I ordered this first in my regular size which wouldn't zip. I then ordered the next size up which still didn't zip. I found this to run EXTREMELY small. I don't even think the next size up would fit. Never had this issue before. This is super cute jumpsuit but the fit is terrible. Didn't wear.

I'm a very typical size 4. And this just did not fit me. Too big in the bust and too tight in the seat. Was unable to wear and immediately returned it. Which is too bad because it is darling. Better for someone who is straight up and down and less athletic/curvy.
Too tight across the torso. I couldn't even zip it all the way up, although I do have a broad back for my size.
bit tight n didnt like stripe on side
Snug at the waist and a little loose at the shoulder so not a comfortable fit for me.

links_reviews_title: I'm wearing this to lots of events and it is very comfortable and flattering.
links_reviews_text: The contrasting flower trim and long ribbon make it special.
I loved everything about it but it was too small. I couldn't even zip it.
My second time renting this outfit. I absolutely love the fit. I'm 5'0, so it runs to my ankles, but it doesn't drag.

links_reviews_title: Looked really cute and would've been great for my occasion.
links_reviews_text: Wouldn't zip. Had a side zipper and I just couldn't get it over my rib cage region.

links_reviews_title: Nice Royal blue color. Nobody else was wearing anything like it. Got tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Bright royal blue. More snug in the rib cage than anywhere else but not too tight very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: this didn't fit at all. Very short waisted, European sizing didn't seem to convert correctly.
links_reviews_text: didn't wear it- couldn't possibly fit into it
I'm curvy and it caused the stripe down the side to curve with me which made the outfit not look quite right. Would be great on someone tall and lean.

It was a bit snug around my waist and chest. I'm 34C-27-36 and wish I could've tried the size 6, but I wasn't able to order it in time so I ended up wearing it even though it was tight. I really loved the colors and style of the piece. At 5'3" I thought it was a perfect capri length for me.

I returned this, unworn, as it didn't fit me---I am a size 12 and athletic build----I couldn't zip this past my rib cage. It's a bit snug in the middle section, at least for my body type. Overall, it was really cute and I really wanted to wear it, but just couldn't fit into it properly.
Cute jumpsuit. Very comfortable to wear. Hits me right at my ankle for being 5"2.
Loved the dress got so many compliments on it. Fit perfectly.

Loved the dress until 20 mins in! Loads of compliments! Hugs your curves! By the time I got to the event the lining started shifting EVERY 10 mins!!!! I wore this dress for 6 hours y'all! As the emcee I had to have my squad check my every move the entire night. The lining twisted and rode up above my hips constantly. The pic shown was rare one without bulging. Highly recommended 2 sizes smaller- wish I did! I wear a 6 but the 4 was big.
Felt like a rockstar in it!

links_reviews_title: How to Loose a Guy in 10 Days vibes
links_reviews_text: Size down!! Usually a 4, I got a 2L since I'm 5'8 and was perfect with a pair of heels
Perfect fit and comfortable
Love the material, color and fit. The length was great in a 4L. I could wear heels even though I'm 5'9".
The color is stunning and it fit perfectly. Also, extremely comfortable. I would wear this to every event if I could! Easy to walk and move in. Just loved it.

Wore this to an award ceremony and was flooded with compliments. I felt comfortable (most importantly) and if you're someone with athletic shoulders this is really flattering. I could have even sized down because the neoprene really stretches out as you wear it.

This dress was a classic gem. I wore a 6L because that was what was available in the Georgetown RTR and felt as though I could have sized down to 4L. Regardless of being a size bigger, it was flattering and still form-fitting due to the construction of the dress. To top it off, the color was very bright and stood out in a crowd! Easy to move around and not too heavy of material. Highly recommend this dress for any black tie wedding or gala.
The dress for like a glove! Super comfortable! I was able to dance my ass off in it and not feel like anything was gonna fall out of place. Got lots of compliments on the color and style.
This dress was an absolute dream. Stretchy, very comfortable, and hugged my curves just right. You will not be disappointed in this one!
Stretching fabric makes the dress fit all of your curves!

links_reviews_title: Needed stretchy dress for a wedding, very comfortable, many compliments
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable for long wedding event, perfectly stretchy for maternity purposes.

Everyone loved this dress! Color is beautiful, length was great (I'm 5'7" and with heels it didn't drag on the ground, and with flats for dancing I wasn't tripping over it), it was super stretchy so could probably have worn a size down. It definitely shows all the lumps and bumps so I wore some serious shapewear under it, but even then you could see seams. But overall it was a great dress for an evening summer wedding!

love the colour of this dress! took off two stars because it runs quite large, I would recommend going a size (or two) down. the material shows all the details (belly button, nipples, stomach etc) so just be aware of that!

This was not my original RTR dress for this black tie wedding I had but I am so glad it became it! The color was beautiful and the fabric was soft and fitting while a little big since it wasn't my size, it still gave me a great shape. I loved it and got soooooo many compliments
Perfect for a formal wedding. Definitely a show stopper
Stretchy material! Could still wear a strapless bra and the petite length fit my 5'2 body perfectly with heels! Loved this dress

I got complements all night! This dress was a thicker material that was very nice and forgiving. It was also 95° out and wasn't sweating through the dress! So comfortable to dance in and was a little stretchy but hugged the body perfectly. Everyone wanted me to buy this one! I loved it! I also was right in between the two sizes, not much different between the 4 and the 6. Decided on the 6 due to a little more forgiving material in the mid section. Love it! Was also wearing about 3in heels here!

links_reviews_title: Wore to black tie wedding in Napa, CA.
links_reviews_text: Fit was comfortable. Withstood 95 degree temps and didn’t show sweat.

I'm 5'10" and 140lbs and 34C. He long was great length. A little low up top, and slightly loose through waist. But striking dress. I didn't get as many compliments as I thought the dress deserved. Very comfortable tho. Would recommend! Wore it to a charity gala in Los Angeles.

links_reviews_title: Received many compliments on the dress at Gala
links_reviews_text: This dress is a great color and cut, fit really well. I recently lost almost 50 pounds and dropped dress sizes. While both the 14 and 16 fit, I felt more comfortable in the 16. Glad that I chose this dress and would rent similar again if needed.
Perfect color and fit!!! The dress was a perfect fit for a curvey girl!!!!

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved this dress. Beautiful yellow that made it perfect for a spring wedding!
links_reviews_text: I love bright colors and wanted something fun for a spring wedding. I luckily found this dress available last minute and RTR only have in size 0P. I ordered still hesitating that it wouldn’t fit. I’m 5’2 and weigh 127lbs and the dress fit well. I runs a little long so if you are not tall like me, I’d recommend wearing it with very high heels. I received a lot of compliments and felt sexy enough. If you have a small waist like me, this dress is made for you!
I didn't try it in with Spanx but the fit of this dress is sexy! I didn't wear this dress because I had a better option but wanted to leave an honest plus size review
Did not wear because it was too big but it also did not look right up top and I'm broad shouldered.

links_reviews_title: Went to a huge gala at the Ritz and was the only women in yellow against a sea of black. Pop!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit beautifully and so comfortably. The thickness of the fabric and its lining kept everything smooth.
Loved the color! I received so many compliments! A winner for sure! I rented a 2R but a 0P would have been perfect.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for me at 6 months pregnant. The material was breathable and stretchy!
links_reviews_text: The bust was a little big but I ordered a size 8L to accommodate my growing belly. My normal, non-pregnant size is a 4-6. The color was beautiful and the length was perfect!

links_reviews_title: Show stopping dress - fit well and flattering, but the 4L was too long for me.
links_reviews_text: The dress also had red lipstick stains when I got it -which was the only downside other than it being a little too long.

This is a Fabulous Dress.... and it makes you look fabulous! I wear a 4 or 6 but the reviews I read had me thinking I should order a 2 or 4. I am 5'7" and weigh 127lbs . I have a slight pouch of a stomach but if I wear a spanks and hold my breath in all night I can get by. This dress definitely shows every bump and bulge which isn't a bad thing if you can wear spanks. The only Con is that it is a very long dress even in a regular length and you need to be really tall to wear it or wear very high shoes. Which I did. But it wasn't easy finding a high heel 3-4 inches high. The dress is heavy material and bc it is a halter style, I feel as though I had to keep pulling up the sides and back. I even had it pinned behind my neck with a large safety pin to raise it higher. If available in a short size, I say order the short in your size. I loved this dress and wish I could buy it!

links_reviews_title: I ordered it and immediately returned. It's a cute dress but it ran very large.
links_reviews_text: A dress like this needs to fit like a glove in order to rock it. The yellow is much more "yellow" than it appears in the picture. It looks cheaper in person than in the picture.

Beautiful color and good overall shape. It was a little big on the back but showed every bump in my stomach. Thin fabric and light color that creates curves and shadows which is good and bad... I still liked it and might wear it someday in the future with some smooth spans but hard to figure out the right size. The regular was too short and the long was super long even over heels.

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear it. For a petite, it was way too long.
links_reviews_text: Too long, couldn't wear it.
Nothing spectacular about the dress.... just ok..
The dress has no support and without a body spanx or model shaped body, this dress will show it all. Beautiful color but I have too many curves for this one. Also runs slightly big.
Such a cute fun summer dress. Can be worn with heels or sneakers

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfortable but the slit was cut very high
links_reviews_text: This dress was comfortable but the slit was very high cut especially when sitting. Great fabric and seemed high quality. I wish I would have got a L instead of an XL.
The material feels cheap and it came to me wrinkly. Plus the little slit on the side is fun but unfortunately the length is already short so it's not work appropriate
Very pretty and nice fit. Wore for my son 18th birthday

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress just a little tight on the bottom
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, it's light fabric for summer. I ordered because I love the ruched look so much but unfortunately because I have a curvier bottom half it was a little tight on the bottom, especially when sitting. I had to adjust it a lot. But otherwise it's adorable and I would probably still wear it again. Even if you are curvier it's really flattering for the body type
XS is definitely tight but I was in a jam and rented on a prayer it would fit! The little slit is super cute but I had to move very slowly haha would rent again!
I wore this while in vacation to Dubai. It was comfortable and easy to walk in hot weather but it wrinkles a lot. I usually wear 10 (M) or 12 (L) because I have a large bust but XL fits perfect.

I should have gone L and not XL but I get nervous about my hips and bust. This is dress made me feel like a million dollars the second I put it on. It is sliming in the waist and arms. Lightweight, easy to pair and wear. #Wedding #Feminine #Ruffles #DateNight #Floral

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress all day for a graduation and it held up so well - perfect day to night dress!

links_reviews_text: A little bit big on top (I typically wear a 10) M would’ve been small though.
This was cute, but there is a large slit hidden in the ruffles, and it made this way too short/inappropriate for work!
Love the print and cut for my body type Arrived very wrinkly

This dress was perfect for Mother's Day Brunch. I am just under 5'3 and I loved that it wasn't too long on me. It was snug in the bust (32DD) but didn't bother me once it was zipped up. I tried on the small but it was a bit too loose and much longer. This dress felt feminine and flirty but still "mom" appropriate. Loved it!
Loved this dress. Wore to work and then out for Mother's Day. The slit in the front is cute but pinned it for work.
Such a great dress and went so well with my Derby hat! So many compliments. Would recommend for a day wedding or a fun day event that's semi formal.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Slit is weirdly high
links_reviews_text: I loved this dressed. Very flattering. Beautiful pattern. Fit very well. Only problem was the slit. You can't really see it in the photos. But it cuts pretty high on your front left thigh. Disappointed in this because I rented for Easter Sunday. So I felt slightly scandalous at church. Otherwise, great rental.

This little floral mini fit perfectly! I wore it on a Sunday when I was visiting home and got so many compliments! Definitely true to size and the little drawstring accent is so femme. Will rent again!
Cute dress...wore it for a dinner out on vacation. Great details

I got a lot of compliments, wore it for 3 different lunch dates. It is a pretty dress with a gorgeously romantic flower fabric. I never wear an XL but I decided on it after reading g other reviews. Since it's cotton, I figured fabric doesn't give as much. I'm glad I did I'm busty and it fit fine.
It was really flattering!! even with a food baby, you couldnt tell!

This dress is so pretty. I wore it out for a date night and also to church. It's a gorgeous floral print and very flattering without being revealing. I felt so feminine and delicate in this dress and I didn't want to take it off! In fact, I plan to purchase the dress and find more excuses to wear it.

I could not wear this dress to my event as it was unreasonably short. It barely covered my bum at 5’8” and the slit in the front was so high it almost showed my underwear. I would not recommend this dress if you are over 5’5”

Everyone was totally right about the slit. When the wind blows or you sit, it's all the way up to the hip almost. Very careful where you wear it. Also wrinkles like crazy. Pretty colors and is comfortable
This dress runs large. It did not look flattering on me and I did not wear it. It was thin material and not of the highest quality. Unlined.

links_reviews_title: This was perfect for warm summer night parties at Cannes Lions. Recommend for outdoor work events.
links_reviews_text: The cotton is super-breathable and the look is feminine without being too fussy. Perfect fit for my body type.
Tons of compliments
Loved this dress! And got so many compliments. The slit was a little higher than I was wanting, but it still looked great and I felt super comfortable.
I'm between a size 2 and 4 and Small was perfect. The slit is quite high, so wouldn't wear it in a conservative environment. Was flattering and received many compliments from men and women.
This was a super cute dress and fit well in the chest however it was tight in the hips and ran short- cute if you are on vacation though
Loved the print however the dress did nothing for me.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Bride's dress for a backyard engagement party. Fun and flirty while still being classy.
links_reviews_text: This dress is very flattering on if you're petite and have an hourglass figure. It hugs in all the right places and is still very comfortable to wear.
Very pretty but baggy at hips and bunched up when sitting down.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for an outdoor summer event.
links_reviews_text: Hugged all the right curves and was light and airy for a summer party. Great paired with a jean jacket.

links_reviews_title: I got a lot of compliments on the dress at the luncheon. I felt very pretty.
links_reviews_text: It fits true to size.
Too big

Ended up wearing a different option but will def rent again for another occasion. Cute dress. Slit in front makes it pretty short, but flattering cut and nice print would be great for a party or even a casual day out.
True to size. Lots of compliments!
Beautiful dress. I initially ordered it as a backup, but once I tried it on, I decided to wear this one for my event. It's so well made, the fit was amazing!! It's elegant and feminine.
A tad short.
The dress is a bit on the shorter side for my preference and it is very thin fabric. overall cute dress and true to size

links_reviews_title: I live in a small town and needed a dress for an awards banquet. This dress fit the bill!
links_reviews_text: The dress fits well according to size. I did not have cleavage to fill up the chest so I had to use 2 safety pins to close up the gap. It looked great and I got many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Hot dress but runs a bit big if not busty
links_reviews_text: High quality fabric and very unique, sexy lines. Felt very chic, but would size down next time. If you're not busty, there will be extra fabric in top. Lower cut than pictures too
It's a beautiful dress but the low cut was a little awkward. I'm smaller chested so it popped open a lot. Otherwise interesting dress. Wore to a dinner. I'm 5' 5" 120. 34A

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing this dress. Too boxy for my waist.
links_reviews_text: The top of this dress and the length and slit of the skirt were really lovely. However, for me it was a little boxy in the waist from the profile. I can see how it'd be lovely for other people.

I was SO excited to get this dress. It even came with the tags on it! But tiny chest ladies beware. It gaped open on the sides. Super cool dress, great fab Eric, shape, etc. I would have totally rocked it had it not been so large in the bust. Super sad. May try it two sizes down. It was generous in the hips.
I got this dress way out of my size I'm a 4 I got a 10. But it fell on the body very nice oversized.
The dress is very flattering and interesting. Looked amazing and was so comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Cute and romantic Valentine's Day Dress
links_reviews_text: Thought this dress was adorable, comfortable, easy to wear and flattering. Highly recommend.

I wore this amazing dress for a special event and got compliments on it all night! I thought it looked better with a belt so that it pulled the waist in more and it fit true to size! It's been my favorite dress so far and I felt beautiful wearing it!
Great colors and fit. Could be work year round. It is on shorter side so size up if you're tall.

I wore this for my 25th birthday party. I only wish this dress was mine to keep. It fit beautifully, was shape-flattering and comfortable. The embroidery was stunning and the lace was detailed. Just about everyone at my party raved about my dress, I even had strangers approaching me with compliments. Stunning stunning stunning

links_reviews_title: Pop of Color, Festive, Fun and Flirty
links_reviews_text: I wore this twice! Once in Cuba for a Miami Chic themed dinner event when it was hot- there I wore it by itself with a cute open toe shoe. I then I wore it again in Minnesota to a Circus Gala and the pop of color made it all the more festive for the event. This time (pictured) o paired it with leggings, over the knee boots and a bolero style jacket. Both times I wore a belt with it because it is slightly larger in the waist area so cinching it tighter made it look better. Length is perfect!

links_reviews_title: Got compliments all day on this dress
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress, photos really don't do it justice! The floral stitching is so detailed and I loved the open shoulder cut of the dress. Definitely rent this one

links_reviews_title: So comfortable, flattering, and so cute!
links_reviews_text: Got so many compliments. The dress was SUPER comfortable. It was also thick enough that I didn't have to wear a bra, and the neckline being adjustable was an added bonus.
I love the patterns and shape.
This dress was a standout. So gorge and fun to wear to a wedding. So many compliments!
5'8 and had both XS and S delivered. Ended up wearing S for length and it was perfect.
Wore this to a rehearsal dinner in Hudson Valley, NY. Dress was very comfortable and easy to wear. Elastic at the waist creates a nice shape from otherwise flowy dress. Loved it, would rent again!
It was a little short also the tie kept coming undone. Other than that it was perfect!!

I ended up wearing a different dress to my event (baby shower) but this one fit well and was cute. I'm usually a 6 and the medium fit fine. It just was a little too much dress for me and this particular occasion.

I have had my eye on this dress for awhile and was excited to wear it for a Spring wedding. I am petite, but have never had a problem with a dress fitting from RTR. This dress ran very big! I loved it, but felt the XS was cut on the large size. I pinned about 4-5 inches of fabric in the back so it fit right. I still really enjoyed wearing it and got lots of compliments!

The detailing was beautiful and the material was comfortable to dance and move in. The fit could be a bit large, especially around the top, depending on personal preference. This dress was perfect for my school dance.

Fit perfectly, paired it with a Gucci belt and black stockings and it was perfect for my sons christening. Dress was very comfortable and stretchy. Could have fit in the small but the medium was more comfortable on the arms.
5'9" 145lbs. I got the M and the L. I wore the M but it's short. But still cute. I could have warn the L with no problem.

links_reviews_title: Wore the size small. This dress is made with Quality material. I'm 5.4 and weigh 135lbs.
links_reviews_text: Wore the size small. This dress is made with Quality material. All the flower designs are hand-stitched and of the Material does not look cheap. I got a back up medium size but it was too big for me. The small fit perfect. I am 5.4 and Weigh 135lbs.

100% my best rental to date! I am usually a S or M, but they only had XS in stock so I decided to give it a go and it fit perfectly. If you have broad shoulders or larger arms, I'd recommend sizing up because it is pretty restrictive there.

I'm 5'2", 176 lbs, and my measurements are 36-33-46. This dress is beautiful and fits true to size. I received so many complaints that by the end of the night I felt like a star! This dress was very fun and flirty. It would be perfect for a variety of occasions because it can be dressed up or down.
I loved this dress beyond words! I got a lot of compliments on it. It was perfect for the October wedding I attended! It was also really comfortable and flattering!

links_reviews_title: So many people complimented the dress.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 6-8 so I decided to rent the Medium hoping it would not be too small. It actually fit perfectly. The dress is very well made (even the ribbon is not like flimsy and cheap) and the form is super flattering. I got it for my friend's wedding and it was just awesome.
This is a great dress with an easy fit. Wore it for a dinner in Capri. Love it!
This dress is gorgeous. Ive always wanted it but didn't see myself purchasing a dress for 600+ dollars and only wearing it once. It is great quality and looks beautiful in person.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress to feel fashion forward yet proper wedding attire- I adored these sleeves!!!!
links_reviews_text: Such an adorable dress, loved all the details, the shear sleeves, the satin bow on the back, the cinched waste made It stay in place properly! I got so many compliments all evening long. Loved all the colors in the dress makes for a ton of color shoe and accessory options! I was nervous as some reviews said It was too short, I am 5'1 and It came above the knee hitting me at a perfect length. Can't say enough how much I loved this dress, only complaint was the cold shoulder area was a smidge big on me other then that It was perfect, would absolutely rent again!

L was definitely loose on me, I was nervous about length because I am 5’11” but the large was plenty long. I probably could have worn the medium, but i guess i would have been nervous about length. The stomach is a stretch fit that was very roomy, but made comfortable to wear. I loved the embroidery detail, very pretty!

I absolutely loved this dress! It was so feminine and perfect for this baby shower! I was nervous how it might fit since I am almost 6 months pregnant but this dress has lots of give/stretch because the XS still fit and looked flattering! I honestly think this dress would be flattering on any figure...I Would totally rent it again!
Got lots of compliment. The only cons I could think of is the process of wearing is a little bit difficult.

links_reviews_title: Not same as pic but still great
links_reviews_text: This dress is super well made and fits amazing however please be aware that the photo shows a waist line and this dress does not have one. It's super shapeless but somehow still flattering?
The dress looked beautiful. It was a little short for my height. I am 5'10" but it didn't bother me

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my rehearsal and rehearsal dinner. Wast the perfect combo of formal and fun
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable, playful fun and flirty dress. Got so many compliments and wanted to own it - never wanted to return it!
Perfect!
I usually wear a size medium or 8, but to me the dress ran a little larger and was loose fitting. It was very comfortable and fit perfect for my event

This dress was beyond perfect for a Havana Nights themed party I attended. The floral embroidery and ruffle beauty can't be picked up in pictures, but it is gooogeous! I was asked 10+ times where I purchased my dress! I would definitely recommend!
Comfortable to wear. Got a million compliments on this from both women and men.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress, used a black leather jacket as a cover up.
links_reviews_text: Easy fit. Well made dress, loved the details. Caution, dance w/o raising arms or dress rises too!

I rented this for a panel where I was invited to speak as a panelist! Not only is the dress fun and sophisticated, it was very comfortable for an all day event and great for pictures. I would totally recommend this for an informal wedding as well!

links_reviews_title: This dress was incredible! It was flirty, sexy and chic.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'8", this dress was pretty short, but perfect for the daytime event I wore it for. The sexy shoulder cut out was so beautiful. The weather was fairly warm, but the sheer sleeves and open shoulders made it bearable. The skirt is lined, so no concerns about underwear peeking through. The dress came with a fabric belt, but I didn't use it.
I'm 5"11 so it was short on me but not too short still was wedding appropriate
I love this designer! This dress was so feminine and edgy at the same time with the black ribbons, the cold shoulder, and the full skirt. I'm obsessed with the details! Can't go wrong with Alexis.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color but way too short!
links_reviews_text: This shirt has a beautiful color and pattern, but the length is way too short for my taste. From the sides, it's really easy to see your bra, especially if you move your arms at all. I wanted to love this blouse and it was fine on Zoom calls but I would not be comfortable wearing it out in public.

links_reviews_title: I received so many positive comments!

links_reviews_text: This top went well with many different bottom pieces and worked for a day or night out! I got so many compliments.

Really enjoyed wearing this top. The fit and cut were perfect through the torso/chest areas. I loved the ruffle along the neckline. The only con was the arm holes were so large my bra showed. Problem solved by wearing a coat or cardigan to cover the arms. Defeats the purpose of the fun ruffle though.
This shorter top fit my petite frame well. I wore it to work in the late summer. I'll totally rent again in the spring. It would be perfect for Easter brunch or an early summer bridal or baby shower.
Just a bit snug around the rib cage.
I really liked how it fit. I'm a size 16 on top. Had zero issues with it and received compliments.
Like all Parker tops, this was cut a bit short for my height. Loved the pattern and wore with high waisted pants to make it work. Great for spring!
Perfect spring time blouse. I wore this 3x and got compliments every time. Flattering fit.
Fit was nice and it was a very adorable print.
Could be worn on the weekend with jeans or dresses up with slacks and heels for the office. I received a lot of compliments!
Wore to a family dinner--comfortable, colorful and flattering! Showed some cleavage but not too much :)
This blouse fit perfectly, very flattering & comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Nice top for work in the summer
links_reviews_text: For work, I liked that this top covered my shoulders but arms were bare for a warm day. Colors and pattern are pretty.
Love this top. Fits perfectly for an hourglass shaped body. Very comfortable and runs true to size.

links_reviews_title: Super cute top for fun or work
links_reviews_text: The waist is not forgiving. After a large meal it felt tight and uncomfortable- so if you are a little thicker in the middle, go up a size. Otherwise, I wore this a lot- for work paired with a blazer, for fun with white pants or jeans.
I originally rented this for work, but it was super low cut, so I ended up wearing it out for a date night instead. Will definitely rent again!

Really liked this top for work. It is flattering but it does run small and short. I am usually a M and the L fit just right, although still pretty short for me. It worked well with high waisted white pants though!

links_reviews_title: Cute, nice material, large in the arm area
links_reviews_text: Cute top, but ran a big big, and had huge arm holes which made it feel like I was constantly adjusting. Ended up returning it the same day I wore it to get something else. Might try sizing down as the quality was nice and the colors were pretty, but it did not fit great.
Fit was true to size and very flattering. Faux wrap so no worries about opening up on you. Beautiful print.

links_reviews_title: Perfectly pairs with slacks at work or jeans for a nice night out!
links_reviews_text: The shirt is fitted but not too tight/stiff. Flows well! The only semi-negative comment I would give is that it easily wrinkles. I received several comments about how pretty/cute it is and the color is perfect for spring and summer.
Fit like a glove. I usually wear a size 14/16 or XL but sized up due to other reviews. Good decision.
Perfect fit. Great with jeans. Wore with a blazer
Would have worn if it had fit, but colors were a bit out there. Go at least 2 sizes up (if you can!)

Cute top! I wore it to a couple of get togethers and got several compliments! It was a little big on top for me. I wore a strapless bra the second time so I wouldn't have to worry about hiding my bra straps. If the fit were better on top I would have given it 5 stars!
The color and fabric were nice, fit was small for a person with a DD chest.
Fits nice - lots of compliments
Very close fit. sleeves cut in an unflattering way that emphasized armpit fat. Did not wear.

links_reviews_title: Waist band too tight, didn't fit
links_reviews_text: I could not even get this on over my breasts because it doesn't zip all the way open, so I couldn't even wear it. Waist band was too tight to even get on. Could not wear it at all
Loved this top! I did have to go up in sizing to fit my breast though. Other than that it fit great & I received lots of compliments on it! My husband wants me to buy it he liked it so much!
Cute top. Pretty print, flattering cut. Runs small - I rented a medium and am normally a small.
Loved this top. Fun print, great fit and lightweight
I rented this too to wear at the beach with white jeans and it was perfect! Parker typically runs big on me, but I went with my normal size small and it get great! Can't recommend this too enough!

Definitely get a large if you are bigger busted (I'm a 36DD and the large was perfect).. It's definitely nota full length top so make sure you wear high waisted pants. Perfect to wear on a night out or to work.

links_reviews_title: Wore it 3 times - to work twice and for a day time party
links_reviews_text: Loved this shirt! It fit very well, and had a flattering cut. The v-neck is still work-safe, and not too low cut, and the waist is fitted, but then loose again over the belly. I wore it with a black skirt, black cotton pants, and jeans and thought it looked good with everything!

I normally wear a medium/ large top but I have to say the XL fit me great. It's a beat top that flows out ext where you need it to around my tummy. Beautiful color and it feels great against the skin.
Loved the fit and color of this pretty floral top! Flattering fit. Looked cute with white jeans and heels.

links_reviews_title: Run small. Couldn't get it over my 38D chest.
links_reviews_text: I didn't get to wear this unfortunately. The print is gorgeous though! Just not meant for girls with big chests :(
couldn't zip over the rib cage
Cute but too small
Loved the fit of this dress. The body was structured and not tight, but flattering. The pattern was just subtle enough to make it a really cute night out dress

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a girl's night out!
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress for a summer GNO and loved it! The neckline is super flattering and the details with the bust/zipper are great. For flatter-chested ladies like myself - the bra cup stitching is a little high which was hard to fill out and sometimes looked a bit misshaped. However the pattern didn't make this super noticeable (other than for me!)

links_reviews_title: it was stunning on!! I really felt like a show stopper.
links_reviews_text: The dress made my small boobs look like they existed. I really have no cons.

links_reviews_title: The cups are WAY too small
links_reviews_text: I'm someone that is pretty small on top and the cups on this dress didn't fit me at all. They were way too small and also kept riding up. Other than that I loved this dress and it was perfect for a birthday party with friends.
It fit all over nicely with the exception of the bust area - the girls were flattened and pushed way out of the dress. If you are not big busted, it's a really cute dress and true to size.
Boob pockets in size 8 dress made for AA breasts... very strange fit. Did not wear.
Great dress but ran small in the arms and chest. Couldn't wear a bra but the tight fit and built in underwire made it easy to forgo. Size up for more room, and probably more wears.

Dress arrived over a week early, fit perfectly. I suppose I could have worn it more than once, but never did. It's kind of heavy material, but hangs nicely. The dress has bra strap holders, so no worries about straps showing. I normally wear a size 8, this fit true to size. So happy to have this dress for our mafia-themed party!
Love the style and material! Very classy Kate Spade dress. I'm a fan of Kate Spade so this is perfect for a "date night" with my fiancé.

links_reviews_title: Sex and the City Charlotte dress!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a Sex and the City party...it was a perfect Charlotte dress, I looked just like her.

Very classic style. At first I was concerned that the color was too close to my skin tone. It ended up looking good though. The top portion bunched up a little where the darts were, but the bra strap snaps helped. It was perfect for a spring formal event. I liked the bold zipper in the back. The fabric is nice and thick. The skirt sticks out without you having to wear a petticoat.
A gorgeous pink crepe of moderate weight and structure. My only complaint was the slight wrinkled appearance in the skirt.
Runs small so size up. But super comfortable and pretty. I got compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: This was for a vow renewal ceremony
links_reviews_text: Fit was good, material is a little heavy but was fine for winter, very happy with the dress. Received lots of compliments!
A very classy shape and design, but runs large in the bust and the shoulders. Would attempt again, but will size down.

Fun dress that I got TONS of compliments on for a themed brunch. Wish I had sized down but it was super comfortable, a great cut and color. Would have given it 5 stars but the darts on the chest are a little funky and the skirt had some wrinkles in it.

Rented this for City Hall ceremony . The 8 fit better on the top but was a bit tighter around the middle and I wanted to be comfortable . The quality was great, and the shape was cute . I ended up wearing it without a bra because the neckline is a bit low , and a bra pushed me right up and out of the dress haha
Fit well. Don't really need a bra.

links_reviews_title: Mommy and Me Tea Party dress
links_reviews_text: This dress is not my usual style but it was perfect for the event. I winterized it with tights and a turtleneck. My daughter thought I looked like a princess!

links_reviews_title: This dress was timeless. Was perfect for the 50s theme.
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful lots of compliments. The only thing was the fit on the top was very loosely. The size 10 was perfect on top but a little tight at the waste. I ended up warring the 12. Overall the dress was perfect for the occasion.

Reading the reviews I was super anxious about fitting into this dress as I'm on the heavier side of a 16 but it was just so adorable I had to take the chance and I'm so glad I did. I received nonstop compliments and felt fabulous! I have to agree with other reviews, the cut of the bust is unusual, I should have forgone a bra and would have avoided the somewhat smushed look I saw in some pictures. I didn't feel smushed however, which leads me to believe it really is just the way the bust is cut. I was able to wear a normal bra which again I didn't need but was nice, there are snaps in the dress to keep your bra straps hidden. Nice feature. The zipper on this dress is pretty- yet industrial strength which is nice considering the fabric is pretty thick. The front did wrinkle a bit as you can see after all day sitting/standing/sitting/standing doing bridal shower things but I don't think lost its luster; the dress flairs out like that on its own by the way. For reference I'm 5'11", very long legs, short torso, hourglass figure, full 38DD/DDD bust w/ more weight in the tummy, less in the bum and pretty broad shoulders.

links_reviews_title: Love love love Kate Spade and loved this dress!
links_reviews_text: Great A line dress! I needed something to hide that I was 5 months pregnant in my engagement pictures and this was perfect!

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for a fifties themed homecoming dance at a high school.
links_reviews_text: The bust in the dress was not proportional to the rest of the dress (which fit great). The darts in the chest where not in the right spot, creating a flattened and unflattering look across the front of the dress. Very disappointed as I was really excited to wear this dress.

links_reviews_title: Wore to an evening of theater! Not a summer dress.
links_reviews_text: This material was very heavy, not quite appropriate for the warm summer evening theater date I had with my kiddo. No stretch. Wrinkles did not come out easily- I had to really steam it multiple times. It was almost too big on me on the bottom and was definitely too big on top. I don’t think I could have danced in this dress, but it looked gorgeous and was fine for sitting in an air conditioned theater. Would not recommend for work. Too dressy.
The fit was weird, not flattering at all. I was so excited to get this dress, but it wasn't as beautiful as you see it in the pictures. Never thought I would hate a Kate Spade dress so much.

links_reviews_title: Such a flattering dress. No shape-wear needed
links_reviews_text: Bra: 36DDD Jean size 14 Height:5'9 (without shoes) I wore the 16. The 14 was just a hire tight but the 16 was great! The dress fit great it was a flattering a-line dress. Best part, I could wear a normal bra, there was a little connector on the straps of the dress for the bra straps so that they stayed together. I was concerned the pink would be too light and wash me out. But it was a good shade. They matched a pair of Michael Kores pumps I had perfectly. Would wear again

I loved this dress. The dress is beautiful and I received a TON of compliments. My only complaint is that it fit a little weird in the top area. I think without a bra it would have been better, but, unlike most dresses I have rented from RTR, the material was not thick or padded so going bra less was definitely not an option. I think pasties are a necessity if you have any kind of boobs for this dress.

links_reviews_title: This retro 50s dress is truly adorable! I loved it!
links_reviews_text: Great color and fit!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful style and loved the color!
links_reviews_text: This dress looks much better in person I think than in pictures! It is a classic, sophisticated style. It is simple and elegant. It did run a bit large on me. I had ordered my normal size and one size up and went with the one that was my normal size, but feel I could have gone one size down. At a previous event where I had also rented from RTR I had mentioned in my review that there were 6 or 7 other people in the same dress at the same event and that RTR should develop a way to ensure that the same dress is not ordered for the same event. Well it happened again at this event-but there was only one other person and not the 6 or 7 we had last time. In any case, not a situation that any girl likes to find themselves in. Please develop a way to try to avoid this in the future!

I'm usually a size 4, but this dress runs small, so size up. The size 6 fit me quite well. I loved this dress because it hides my love handles while accentuating my curves. It's a beautiful day dress - I wore it to a baby shower. The fabric is nice and thick, but I wasn't hot in it. Simple and elegant.

links_reviews_title: Wore with a jacket for work... lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress with a jacket for work!
Could have gone to a 0 but 2 worked. Will definitely consider again for elegant, formal events.

I rented this dress for engagement pictures, pink and bows are all things me! The dress is very fitted and has no stretch whatsoever. The bottom came wrinkled on both dresses I ordered, so I had to figure out how to smooth it for the pictures. The A-line of the skirt is very structured and it's not a flowy dress at all. Very cute dress, but a tad heavy and very structured. Also, the bow on the size 6 I wore was partially unattached to the dress. I would expect RTR would repair that prior to shipping to a customer.

So many compliments! Heavy, high quality fabric you would expect from Kate Spade. I think it's appropriate for any season. Wore to a bridal shower where all the bridesmaids wore blush.
