I could NOT get away without a bra because my nipples showed, but the straps were not an issue. There was a little button closure under each strap to lock the bra strap in but they were broken which annoyed me a little.

Needed a dress for tribeca film festival party sponsored by Chloe... put this on and my husband said without knowing where I was going "you look like a btl of Chloe" So for that event this was perfect! I will say however that I do agree with some of the other reviews regarding the top of the dress being a little bizarre when it came to dart location... super awkward - but manageable
Perfect fit, true to size, received many compliments. Loved the embellished bow. Very classics and elegant!

This light pink Kate Spade dress is adorable. I wore the 0 and this ran a little bit big on me because I have such a small chest. There is comfortable room in the chest so this dress is great for any cup size. There is also comfortable room in the hips because of the fit and flare style of the skirt. The dress does not have much stretch but is a very comfortable fabric. Because I am so petite at 5'3, this was more of a tea length on me hitting at my shins. I think this dress would be amazing on someone who is taller so that it will hit more at knee length. You can definitely wear a standard bra with this which is great! I love the pink color along with the black bow it is super cute.

I loved the shape of this dress. The fit and flare silhouette was very flattering. Style fits true to size throughout the hips and waist, it is cut a bit narrow in the chest. If you have a larger chest like I do, or a wider rib cage this could be problematic, so size up of that is you. The color is a soft baby pink and the fabric has a satin like sheen. Perfect for a wedding, shower, or religious event.

This dress fit perfectly. I am usually a 14, but chose the 16 since ive never tried a kate spade dress before. It honestly was a perfect fit. Not too lose, not at all tight. It was longer than i expected (tea lenth), but with heels it worked. It was classy and flatereing. The material has a nice weight to it, so you dont have to worry about keeping your stomach sucked in all night! It also has the little tabs to keep your bra straps in place, so you can wear a normal bra!

links_reviews_title: I looked like a 1950's housewife while hosting my dinner party.
links_reviews_text: I hosted a dinner party and this dress was the perfect outfit. It's really feminine. Easy to wear, you can wear a regular bra. The pink of the dress is a blush/dusty rose pink. The skirt of the dress is defiantly full, but for this occasion I liked that look. One negative is the fabric of the skirt wrinkles easily, not a problem for me because I was on my feet most of the night, but if you are sitting down for a while you might have an issue.

links_reviews_title: The bow is to die for!
links_reviews_text: Wore for valentines day and wanted to wear it forever! The big contrasting bow is just my style!

links_reviews_title: Danced the night away and the dress made me feel like a princess.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. Great silhouette.
Thick material but very cute unfortunately the day was hot and went with another RTR option.
I am normally a 10, and I couldn't get this to zip. So sad, because it was my favorite of all the dresses I tried to order for my bridal shower.

links_reviews_title: I love this dress and got a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: It was a little long on me, but I am also short. I loved the bow and the material is very nice.

I wore this dress to a wedding brunch and it was nearly perfect. Fit: The shoulders/sleeves, the waist, the skirt, the length, etc. were all great. My one complaint for the fit was that it's tight in the bust and as a result flattens your chest a little. Fabric: Thick, quality fabric with a comfortable lining. Style: Very cute look. The big bow on the waist makes it pretty girly but the dull color balances it out so it's not too much.
The top portion of the dress was too large close to the shoulders.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful print for a bohemian look
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my family's Christmas dinner. It is a really beautiful print and, because of the darker colors, is very versatile for different seasons. However, it runs very large. I am typically a 6/8 in dresses and the 4 was huge. It also doesn't have any sort of drawstring or belt as the photos would make it seems. I wore a wide leather belt (and you definitely need a belt). It also arrived so staticky that it was almost unwearable.

This was intimidating but draping it and cinching the waist made a huge difference. The material was silky and felt luxe. So many compliments!! I could have sized down to a 2, even as a person with broader shoulders! The 4 looked fine though. I wish I could buy it.

links_reviews_title: Oh my gosh I love this dress!
links_reviews_text: Float and so fun. Very boho vibe. I wore it to the office for meetings.

One of my favorite things I've ever rented on RTR. I only discovered it from seeing it on a friend. I must have scrolled passed it many times bc it doesn't look as cute on the app. Just rented for the 2nd weekend in a row.
I'm obsessed with this dress. It's so pretty in person and so flattering with the tie around the waist. The front slit helps make it feel not so dowdy
This was the perfect dress for a spring day. I loved the slit in the leg and the way it was so flowing. The material is warm so I would not wear on a super hot day.
Wore this for a casual dinner and loved that I could untie it and eat freely :-)

A perfect easy dress that you can dress up or down. I wore it to work and to a night out in New York. It runs large for a nice oversized, relaxed look. I belted the dress for a bit more shape while still keeping the flow. Only thing to keep in mind: it's a static-type dress so I did need to use some scotch guard.

I LOVE A Piece Apart. I own several pieces from the brand and may just add another. This dress is so comfortable, flattering and fun to wear. It flows like a dream and even though it has ling sleeves, it's super airy and lightweight. The slit in the skirt adds a nice flirty touch. A+ dress!
This dress is incredible. It's interesting and flattering. I got four comments about it in one night.

I could not get enough of this dress - I wore it to a luncheon, to work with sneakers, wine tasting, you name it. Definitely size down. I'm usually between a 6 and 8 and the 4 was still a little bit big. There is a tie so you can cinch and create a waist.

links_reviews_title: I wore this three times during my rental.
links_reviews_text: Wow! I was traveling a bunch and needed something versatile. This dress hit the mark. Perfect with heels for a dinner out in Miami, and easily transitioned to colder weather and booties in Nashville. I even wore this to work! Extremely comfortable and can be dressed up and down!

Im usually a size 2-4 and for the 0 because it was so flowy. Fit beautifully. Didn't come with the waist band as picture so I wore my own belt. Got so many compliments. Goes well with heels or flats. I'm 5'4 and it wasn't too long at all. Will definitely rent again.

Loved the fit. It's a bit oversized at first but once you tie the belt and do a little draping action, you are all set. I wore this to a sunday event with sneakers to make it slightly casual. I'm definitely renting this again. It was super comfy.
The dress is very pretty. Made with a lightweight silk fabric. I wore it multiple times and had a lot of compliments each time. I would say it runs a little big . Looks better on than in the photo.

I can't even begin to explain how much I loved the dress. It's the perfect mix of boho and elegance, so perfect for vacation and so easy to wear. I paired it with booties but you could easily pair it with heels or flats sandals if you are tall enough. It's so effortless to wear and such a statement but also understated at the same time with the muted colors. Fits true to size and that's oversized. If anything, size down. I literally cannot wait to read this again. I wanted to buy it so badly but even with the discount it was too much. Check out more photos of this dress on my Instagram @luxeandlouche

I absolutely loved this dress! So light, airy, beautiful, and flattering. I wore it twice on vacation. I can't wait until it's warmer in nyc so I can wear it here! So pretty! Runs slightly large. I sized down to an 8. Very roomy but the tie is perfect to cinch the waist. I'd size down one if you're concerned.

I rented my normal size 12 and it was large, but I could have made it work if it weren't for this unexpected snow storm we're having. It would be beautiful as a beach coverup in summer. It's well made, just incredibly light and informal due to the material. Definitely recommend sizing down one size.

This dress is absolutely amazing. It's all silk so beware of the warmth and static factor but the beaty of the dress was well worth it. I wore it to a party and added a belt and booties, then wore it to a dinner and added a belt and heels and then a third day out and paired it with tall boots and a belt. It comes with a string belt but I just felt it needed a little something extra. I will rent this again for sure.

links_reviews_title: Love!!!! My favorite RTR rent yet!
links_reviews_text: I adore this dress so much! For winter in NYC, I paired the dress with thick sweater tights and a turtleneck with black ankle boots. I didn't know if it was going to work but I received so many compliments. It's such a gorgeous dress. Fits true to size and very versatile.
Packed for a beach vacation. Fabric traveled well and did not wrinkle. Silhouette of the dress is gorgeous and silky. Though the dress is large, it can easily be belted for a blousy easy breezy look.

This was my favorite dress that I wore on vacation. I loved having my shoulders and arms covered because in the evenings it can get chilly outside. The fabric is light weight and packs well. It is very loose so I suggest sizing down to avoid looking messy. I wore it with these mixed stone earrings from RTR.
I loved this print and the flowy sleeves. I would have preferred if the skirt didn't have a slit but it didn't stop me from loving it.

Was definitely indifferent about this dress but it looks much better in person. It runs HUGE though, so size down 1-2 sizes. The belt helped make this work but it didn't do anything for my figure. Was very art teacher boho.
Really wanted to love this dress but it was too much for my small frame. Very oversized and did not include a belt.

links_reviews_title: Great transitional piece with high end shape
links_reviews_text: Well, it arrived without the belt as described in the listing (happens all the time with RTR) but it's a gorgeous dress. I added my own belt, and it was perfect. It's shapeless without, which I like but not for work. It's very thin, almost silk-like, so won't be great for late Fall/Winter but was perfect for a mid September day in NYC. Love the sleeves and cut of the hem. Rent, but make sure to size down and have your own belt handy!
Super interesting pattern on the fabric. It was not particularly slimming because of the cut and volume of fabric, but it felt luxurious and very comfortable. I'd totally rent it again.
And I'm curvy - probably size down 2 sizes and make sure to belt it- the model's picture is misleading (waist is not cinched in)

links_reviews_title: Multiple compliments all day. Worn with navy platform sandals. Fashion forward!
links_reviews_text: Blousy and lightweight. Great for tall ladies except sleeve length. Not too important as this is a summer dress snd the sleeve is blousy. Excellent from day to evening.

links_reviews_title: I wore it to an opening - with a dinner jacket - and the ability to make it more formal was great!
links_reviews_text: it felt overly voluminous...though helped by adding a belt.
I love this dress, wish I had a smaller size.

Dress runs small. I'm normally an 8 but wore a 4. Very forgiving and flattering so works for a lot of body types. I've seen this dress on tall, short, skinny, curvy girls and it works for all. Wish RTR had more dresses like this that work for everyone!
I wore his casual with sneakers for work and got to many compliments. Love this dress!

Very flattering, light and flowy material. Size down, runs on the large side with a tie at the waist. I'm 5'6" so the slit was not high and I was able to wear this to work (business casual) and everyday, but it would be too high if I were any taller.

Such a gorgeous dress. Great shape, great fabric, so comfortable and beautiful. Wore with heels to dinner and flat spectators to a museum. Runs a bit large, but it has a little belt so you can cinch it.
This dress was so pretty and I felt so pretty in it!!
wore it 10x. Very comfortable and got a lot of compliments but was shipped without a belt.
Runs large
So cute! Would def have to rent this number when it's warmer out. TTS.

I love this dress so much that I rented it twice, once during the holiday season and again for pre-spring. You can wear it with leggings and a turtleneck underneath with boots for cold weather or as-is with sandals. It's so flowy and charming, and I think it's one of the best pieces I've ever rented from RTR.
rented this for a costume and it was PERFECT - it was super hot though so beware. It doesn't let any air I'm so I pretty much melted the whole night but served its purpose. TTS

Cute shirt. I didnt wear it because it was a little to too for my chest and didn't go with the look i was trying to put together. Will definitely rent it again, just a bigger size and with jeans or solid black pants

links_reviews_title: This shirt is too fun to just wear dressed up. Sparkles for days.
links_reviews_text: I received the 42 (not sure how that happened) but it was big on me. Which was fine because I just wore it as an oversized sparkle top. I can't tell you how much fun it was walking around Austin in sequins, blue jeans, and tennis shirts. Do it!
Loved this top, a little boxy, but was great for New Years celebration

links_reviews_title: Comfortable shirt for a sequined top
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit of this shirt but mostly loved that it was breathable and was not itchy which is hard to find in a sparkly top.
Very sparkly, lots of compliments. The medium was pretty roomy.
Perfect fit not too tight or loose, flatting fit, stand apart great for night out, party, brunch! If I could keep I would!

links_reviews_title: So cute! A walking disco ball and compliments all night.
links_reviews_text: This was very true to size. I read some reviews saying the arms scratched them, but that was not the case with me! Very comfy and the perfect top from day to night.

Rented this top to wear with laced leather pants for a high impact outfit fit for leading a training. I believe I nailed the elements of being authentic and charismatic that I was trying to convey. If not at least my sparkles made an impression, based on feedback. Loved this top. It was conservative in cut but a rock star in fabric. I could own this!
Could have gone a size down perhaps but overall really dug this top. Lots of compliments. The waist is a little itchy where the sequins fold over underneath, but the rest is lined and fine.

links_reviews_title: Dress code included being sparkly to the max
links_reviews_text: Beautiful, well-made sequin top that I could never afford to buy but that RTR makes available. Yay! The pictures don't do it justice, it's very glittery and super fun. But is also a top that's not meant to be worn in an understated way (in my opinion). I wore it to a big birthday party that demanded guests be bedazzled. I paired it with the Minkpink Red Baddie mini-skirt and a big faux fur. A lot of the reviews say it's boxy, which is true. I remedied that by tucking it in. I got tons of compliments and would definitely rent again if the occasion was right.

links_reviews_title: Huge hit for the company's birthday
links_reviews_text: Disco ball drama was here and everyone LOVED it. I haven't gotten this many compliments on a rental - and transitions well into my Vegas trip this weekend ;) rubs a bit on the arms and neck but that's to be expected. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: A shimmery pop to wear just about anywhere!
links_reviews_text: I love this flashy top by GALVAN! Running true to size with little stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is loose throughout the bust. It works for cup sizes A-D. You are able to wear a standard bra with this top. At 5’4”, the length hit right at the waistband on me. The silver shimmer of this top is dazzling in person! Pair with any color heels and fun pants or skirt to complete your outfit!
I wore this to a concert, work sponsored. It was comfy, not too tight, and the sequins were high quality.

links_reviews_title: Super fun and easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: Great party/night out top. Easy to wear with jeans or pants.

i wore this to my company post-holiday party (i know, its march....) and it was a hit! everyone was complementing my shiny shirt. i loved wearing and felt comfortable all night. I paired it with a black leather jacket and looked great.

links_reviews_title: Perfect combo of dressy and streamlined
links_reviews_text: I got compliment after compliment the evening I wore this top. The tiny sequins gleamed without being over the top, and the high neck worked perfectly with a Lela Rose silvery-tweed, double-breasted evening coat. I felt like a million bucks! Highly recommend. Will rent again.
This shirt worked great for a NYE house party! The 40 was a little big on me but I made it work!
I wore this to a concert, and I got so many compliments!! It fits really well and looks so beautiful and expensive. Love it!
This fit me well and was very comfortable. It is a thicker material so tucking it in would not have worked on me. Received many compliments, especially from the younger girls at the event.

links_reviews_title: It was for a birthday party. I wore it with high-waisted ripped jeans.
links_reviews_text: Torso was a little long, and I have a long torso, but otherwise it was great.
Did not itch at all. Love this brand. Very shiny and sparkly but classic cut

links_reviews_title: Perfect top for my night out!
links_reviews_text: Nice fit, a little itchy, but looked fantastic with my outfit..

This shirt is a true attention getter! It catches all the light and makes you the center of attention. Most sequined items are scratchy, but this was lined and i didn't find it to be scratchy at all. I would say it's true to size, as long as you don't have a large bust. The top fit me well, but was a bit roomy in the stomach area and tighter in the bust (36B). I wore it to my friend's piano recital at a university, and it looked great paired with black jeans and black patent penny loafers.

When you're in your 30s and are longing for adventures of your past decade, buy a ticket to a Robyn concert. Then, channel your inner Robyn and rent this shirt. It will be the equivalent of your Superman cape. Go to the concert, get out of your comfort zone, make new friends, dance hard, get sweaty (you don't have to deal with the dry cleaning, after all!), and relish in all of the complements you get from strangers (including from the opening act!). Feel one with Robyn. Return the shirt and go back to renting blazers and work dresses, but hold onto that feeling of joy/bliss/adventure you felt while wearing it.

links_reviews_title: It dressed up an 80th Birthday party!
links_reviews_text: Flattering fit...striking and comfortable! Wore with jean to dress down but could wear with slacks.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing it. It was too big for me and bunched a ton in the back.
links_reviews_text: Too big but I wanted to wear it...it was like a walking disco ball shirt

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, just wish it came In my size
links_reviews_text: Classy welll made runs big
Just "meh". The hem hit me right at the hips, the darts didn't align with the boobs- it fit but just wasn't flattering. Didn't wear it.
It was super comfy. It is lined and feels like wearing a cotton shirt. Love it
Fun top with a great fit
Wore this adorable dress for my bridal shower. Perfect fit and loved how it flows!
I've rented a lot of dresses and in comparison to others, this one is just okay. It was pretty and I paired it with mustard shoes and cardigan. Good for work!

I fell in love with the full skirt on this dress. It had an empire waist and cinched at the right spot. Pockets were a lovely edition as well. I wore it for a work conference although I wish I had packed a cami to wear underneath. Shifting at all could cause a little cleavage. I even wore this on the plane home. It seems a heavy dress due to the skirt but I was never overheated in it with Dallas weather

Fabulous dress! Lots of room because of the elastic waist and gathered fabric. I was worried about the fit because it's 100% cotton but you'll have no issues if you're an hourglass shape or pear shape. Oh, she has pockets too - winning!

I loved this dress! It was so stylish and comfortable. If it weren't so expensive, I would buy it. I'm pretty short, so the length came to just above my ankles. Also, I used a safety pin for the top bc I wore the dress to work and it is a bit low cut. Best part of the dress: it has pockets!
#perfectfit #complimentgetter #vintagevibe

This might be the most incredible dress I've ever put on my body. It fit perfectly and was easy to slip on. It didn't show too much of my chest, which is always a plus. I wore this to work (serving major brunch vibes) and I got compliments all day. 10/10 will rent again!
elastic is a bit tight at the high waist, but the rest of the fit is perfect. the circle skirt is so fun & can be dressed up or down. loved wearing it & so sad to return.

Got so many compliments on this. Felt very 1950s but brought into today - skirt was full but not poofy and it was so great to have pockets of course! Heads up I am tall and this went below my knee. Easy to wear as you simply slip it on and go and you automatically look put together. Love!
Light, colorful and easy to wear. No complaints. Great for work in a casual office in the summer, a day time bbq or walking around the city. Has a little bit of a 50s vibe. Love the pattern.
I loved the length and cut! A bit big in the chest but not unmanageable. Would keep!
A great, functional work dress with a skirt that blows up really fun with a breeze.

links_reviews_title: Spring floral for work or play
links_reviews_text: Fits greats and lightweight for spring /summer. A little low cut in the chest but I rolled with it

I LOVVVVVVED this dress! The elastic at the waist really fits the dress to your figure, and the cotton fabric and movement as you walk makes you feel like Grace Kelly on a set of an old fashioned movie. It's very low cut at the chest, so I had to put a lace cami underneath, but otherwise, the fit and style is lovely. Wore it to my birthday dinner and felt like it was the perfect dress for the occasion.
Comfortable dress and very flattering.
Rented for a party at a classic car museum

links_reviews_title: I wore it all over the Mediterranean - lovely and comfortable. Easy to put a sweater on top.
links_reviews_text: A bit tight in the underarm but it really didn't bother me.
Loved this dress for Easter at 24 weeks pregnant! It was comfortable and easy to wear and chase around two kiddos but still feel put together
Colors were great. Many compliments at work. Loved that it had pockets. Only issue for me was that it was a little big in the top.

Very comfortable and pretty flattering given the full skirt - the waist nips in nicely. There was also plenty of room in the chest, so good for those with larger breasts. The fabric is a nice weight (good for spring), and even though it's cotton it doesn't wrinkle easily. I also love the print - not your average floral. This is a pretty versatile piece and could be dressed up or down. One thing to note is that it's somewhat low cut, but the opening is so narrow that I felt I could get away with it at work without a camisole. Overall, easy and fun retro-ness.
Liked this mostly, but found the cut a bit frumpy overall. Cute for work, but not a showstopper by any means.

links_reviews_title: Fun statement dress for a bridal shower
links_reviews_text: Stood out in all the right ways. This tea length really felt unique too. I am typically a size 4-6, but the 42 fit me perfectly. I definitely recommend ordering a size or two up.

links_reviews_title: Springtime dress that gets you many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress is very cute and the pockets are plus! The neckline is a bit low and because the chest runs slightly too big -- maybe plan to use fashion tape or wear a camisole. Otherwise, great pattern that is perfect as the flowers start to bloom.
I got this for a trip to Greece.. which didn't happen. This dress fit perfectly. once I paired it with some nice heels I realized that you dress it up or dress it down. it's a keeper.
Loved the way it fit, that it had pockets and that it was cool on warm days. It had A LOT of cloth but was never an issue.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely, lovely dress. I received numerous compliments on the dress!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely, lovely dress. I received numerous compliments on the dress!

links_reviews_title: My favorite style of dress to wear!
links_reviews_text: The dress was very comfortable, but I did wish I had rented a size smaller. I adore this style!! This is what I want to wear everyday... just in different colors. I felt fabulous, feminine, and glorious.
very tight on chest in comparison to rest of dress
This is an adorable dress. Stands out, with bold colors and playful cut. Nice fabric and details. A little low cut but otherwise modest, feminine like 50's Hollywood!

links_reviews_title: Super Cute and Easy to Wear
links_reviews_text: Great easy cotton dress, I wore it to work on a warm day.
Comfy but didn't end up wearing out

links_reviews_title: It's flattering, but emphasizes the bust.
links_reviews_text: I wouldn't want to own this dress, but I did receive a lot of very positive comments from people. It's just not my thing.
Fit was really comfortable, love the fabric and pockets!!
Fit great, very comfortable, lots of compliments on the pattern! A great choice!
I love the print and the dress style but at 5'3 the skirt swallowed me with how wide it was.

This dress is great. Midi lengths can look frumpy on me, but I liked where the hem on this hit. It was a tad bit big in the chest. It had a retro vibe without being costumey. You could wear it to a more casual workplace or a summer party.
True to size. Fabric is thicker and not soft.
Wish I could wear this every day! Love the fit (waist runs really small), the full skirt and heavy but still cool fabric... vintage style without being at all frumpy! My boyfriend loved it too.

This dress was perfect for the baby shower I attended. Very flattering fit both in the neckline, waist and length. I got so many compliments on it! For the shower, I wore this with nude pumps, and switched into gold flat sandals for patio drinks with my husband. I was "thisclose" to buying the dress I loved it so much. Great lightweight fabric, fun print, perfect midi length. love love love.
Fit very well - true midi-length, cinched waist very flattering and top fit well with my small chest
Love the flattering fit! This dress is a classic with a modern design. The sleeves are very pretty.

Love love love this dress! Flattering (I'm pear shape), love the puff sleeve detail & small slit in the back. Wore this twice during the holidays because I loved it so much! I'm definitely considering buying!

i rented this dress for everyday extra and i was very happy with it. the tailoring is amazing and the silhouette is so feminine and sweet. the volume of the sleeves looks cool and really creates the illusion of a tiny waist. the neckline is a bit renaissance/oktobefest - not extremely modest but was passable. the fabric is kind of light for winter and wrinkled in transit. but overall this dress was low key stunning for a wednesday in november. arms were tight but not the worst.

links_reviews_title: Chic and can be dressed up or down.
links_reviews_text: Sleeves are a little snug but such a sophisticated dress. A little sexy in the back with a high slit. Love the fabric and style
This dress is stunning. I got so many compliments. FYI - It's a bit tight around the arms.

I felt STUNNING in this dress. It was so beautiful, a great fabric that wasn't too hot even in the summer. Only giving four stars bc the sleeves were very tight and didn't have any stretch on the bottom. Wasn't unbearable, but noticeable
This dress is so stunning! Simple and chic at the same time! Will rent again!!

This dress is so unique, but still flattering, and work-appropriate. I got so many compliments the day I wore it, including one from a random man on the street who screamed at me "that's a f&@$in hot dress, DUDE!" He is correct. Rent this. The fabric is very lightweight, no lining, good for summer days.

I really loved this dress. It was stylish and sexy in a conservative, respectful way. I wore it to an outdoor wedding and it was simply perfect. I had to get the 6 as it was not available in my usual 4. I am kind of glad that I did as I had read about the tightness of the sleeves. I could have definitely worn the smaller size as the cotton stretched out a bit in the waist and hip areas and by the end of the event, it was nice & roomy.
This dress was the right happy medium between formal and trendy. The length was well below the knees. The sleeves are puffy and they were tight for me but they stayed in place all night.

I wish this had fit me! I'm between a 10 and 12 and ordered the 12. It's a chic midi dress on me and everything fit... except the arm holes. I could put it on but it was so tight I was afraid to move my arms in any way. Was too afraid to wear it out of the house.

This dress is divine. Chic, structured, minimal, yet sexy. The fabric feels like cotton and the sleeves will wrinkle under a coat, so probably better for summer. Rent it, you will feel like a princess.
Love this dress but runs very small! It's tight in the chest and shoulders and also very short. I would size up!!

links_reviews_title: Was such a fun night and loved getting a special dress that was unique!
links_reviews_text: There was no stretch to this dress! It was flattering but pretty short. I definitely couldn't give any hugs :)

Material is stiff and the arms are tight, overall restricted movement, but worth it. I am 5'2" 120lbs, the 4 fit, but if I were to rent this dress again I would opt for the 6. Loved the look of this dress.

New Year's Eve… Friends decided to all dress up, I don't normally wear this kind of stuff. Saw the stress and thought it was so pretty. It fit exactly as I expected and I absolutely loved it. Love the detail in the arms, it was perfect. I wear black tights and black heels. So classy.

Gorgeous details on this dress, but size up one or two sizes. If you have any arm muscles, skip it. I am usually a 2/4 and went with the 6 but it was still too tight across the chest and shoulders. Need a second set of hands to zip for sure, and it was a smidge short. Also not comfortable if wearing for a long time

Wanted to love this dress because it's perfect for my occasion but I have strong shoulders and arms with the size to match, that paired with a 32DD and the entire top half was like a prison. Typically wear a 4-6 so thought a 6 would do it... will try to get an 8 or find another dress... *sigh*
Beautiful dress and love the pop on the sleeves! Very, very snug so go up a size. Kept pull the dress down.
Fit great. No stretch to the fabric but it didn't bother me

links_reviews_title: Sized up and still couldn't zip.
links_reviews_text: The dress was way too tight in my shoulders and chest, and would not zip. I normally wear a 6, and would have needed at least a 10 in this. Length was good for a short girl though!

Love this style of this dress. I am short so the length of this dress worked for me but beware if you are taller than 5'5. I'm a usual size 6 but the size 8 fit me the best. The arms were pretty tight too but I didn't mind. Overall cute LBD!

I loved this dress so much! Perfect length of your shorter to accentuate your legs. Also, I am always cold so I loved the sleeves. I normally wear a 4 but opted for the 6 because it wasn't as restrictive in the arm area. Got lots of compliments and is one I wish I could purchase.

This dress is so unique! The fabric doesn't have any give but it is beautiful! Love the bell sleeves and the flattering silhouette! I sized up to fit my chest and arms but once you get the right size it's a perfect dress!

It was a great dress but as other reviewers mentioned, it has zero stretch. I ended up having to order a second size because although the 2 fit me, I needed someone to zip it for me, which wouldn't do because I was traveling by myself... Arms are quite tight and I couldn't reach the zipper myself. Overall great dress, but get a couple sizes to try!

links_reviews_title: Modern witchy vibes! Perfect for Fleetwood Mac!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to Fleetwood Mac's farewell your- channeled my inner Stevie nicks with this witchy mini dress. Dress is awesome, but very rigid/inflexible. I'd recommend sizing up if you're on the fence. I'm 5'8 and it was VERY short on me. Zipper was impossible to do on my own. All in all worth it! Just size up

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a dinner party/night out in Boston and would highly recommend.
links_reviews_text: This dress has beautiful details in person. It left me feeling comfortable, dressed up, but not over the top.
Did not end up wearing. Cute dress but very short (could not bend over in it at all).

I wore this to bar hop in Universal Studios City Walk on a cold night (50 degrees). I love the pattern and the slight twinkle the flowers have. It fit like a glove and is very flattering. There is no stretch to the fabric but it's still comfortable. It's a little tight on the chest area but isn't restricting. I was still able to lift my arms and drop it like it's hot. I live alone and had to ask my uber driver to zip and unzip my dress. That was not an easy task so plan on having someone help you with that.

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove- runs small!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress, i typically wear a 6, and an 8 was tight- mostly in the bust area. Was so cute, many compliments!! A little short, if you like that!

I agree with other reviews this dress runs VERY small. I usually wear a 2 or 4 and the 4 was so tight in the arms and I couldn't zip it. Unfortunately the larger size was not available for my party, but it would have been a great dress if it was. It is definitely tight in the arms and pretty short, but still love the look of it!
I loved this dress but it definitely runs small. I'm 5'8 and the 6 was so so short!! The fabric was also very itchy. I received tons of complements but was pretty uncomfortable all night!

links_reviews_title: I was comfortable and received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Dress runs small, just the right length for petite women.
While it was a little short for me, I still absolutely loved this dress! I received compliments all night long from friends and guests. I would definitely rent this dress again - what a show stopper!

I wore this dress to our daughters baptism. It fit like a glove - although it does run very small. I am typically a 2 or 4 and the 6 fit snug! I would recommend renting a size or two bigger than what you are used to. It also fits tight in the arms and have zero stretch to it, but was not that uncomfortable. I loved the sleeves and the detail. I wish I owned it!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, but very tight in the arms, even though I got a size larger than what I typically wear.
links_reviews_text: I received many compliments on the dress, which was fabulous because this was not my first choice dress. What was great about this dress was the length. I'm on the shorter side, and I like to wear my dresses short, also, to create a look of a longer leg. This dress certainly worked well in that department. I highly recommend going up a size or two because there is absolutely no stretch whatsoever in this dress.
I ordered a 0 and a 2, but I wore the 0. The arms were a little snug, and the material does not stretch. I receieved many compliments. The fit and length was great.

It is a gorgeous dress with a lot of detailing. The sleeves are absolutely gorgeous and have a very delicate flower overlay. The dress runs both short and small. I am between a 2 and 4 and the 4 was very fitted. The dress was pretty short, so much so that I didn't feel comfortable raising my arms while dancing. Overall, I would wear the dress again solely because it is so pretty, but I would have to accept that it is pretty restricting due to its length.

Things to know: 1. As per other reviewers' advice I sized up one size and boy am I glad I did! This dress was short on me and I also was glad I had opaque black tights so my buns weren't ever exposed. 2. The little dot flowers are an almost glittery silver thread but it's so subtle they read as white. 3. This dress is so cute and I felt super stylish and got compliments galore. It's a little stiff so I was glad to remove it at the end of the day which is why I docked one star, but otherwise it's such a solid dress and it looks way cute. Rent it!

Really loved this dress, the sleaves were super cute! You can get away with wearing a bra with straps. I took away a star because it was a bit tight in the arms/difficult to lift arms up over head. Perfect for my height but taller girls may have issues with length. Was flattering in the stomach area and the material was much more dressy than I thought it would be. Besides it not being the most comfy dress I really loved it and I would rent it again as a back up dress!

links_reviews_title: A tad to short for my curves
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful. I love the details on the arm and chest and the bottom hem. Unfortunately i didnt wear it because it was a tad too short for work or church, black stockings could have done the trick but i still would have had to watch how i bend, crouch all day. I ordered the L/12 and fit wise it was good. Just too short. Curvy girls keep that in mind because your backside could fall out! Haha
Runs small and very short but still wore my usual dress size. Definitely will rent again! Loved the bell sleeve!

links_reviews_title: This dress had more compliments than any other dress I have ever worn.
links_reviews_text: The fit is very tight in the shoulders and arms. I wore this for a dinner and it was manageable.

Absolutely adorable! I chose to wear the 6 (I had also ordered the 4) because the fabric has little to no give. With the high neckline, I was a bit too constricted in the 4. At 5' 2", this was a perfectly appropriate length for my boyfriend's company party, especially with some boots. Major disco diva vibes!
I really loved this dress and got lots of compliments. Perfect design and length. The design of sleeve is very trendy. I would definitely rent it again!
I absolutely love this dress and wish I could keep it forever. It runs true to size and it's very comfortable. The fabric is a little thick and warm so it's better for colder weather.

I love this dress. Before I rented it, I read reviews about the material being thick. It definitely is not a dress I would want to have on for more than 2-3 hours. I rented it for a dinner party in my home.

It was fancier than I expected (the fabric is really intricate and pretty) so I didn't really wear it because I didn't have anywhere to wear it to. But the sleeves were my favorite part. It's perfect to rent because it's on trend right now (but the type of trend you know won't be around long enough to make it a good investment piece). It's true what the other reviews say about the arms. It fit me fine and wasn't snug but the fabric has no stretch so you can't really lift your arms as freely

Unfortunately, I was not able to wear this outside since it wouldn't zip up. The dress itself is gorgeous but it runs very very small. I don't even know if the size 12 could have fit me, I had ordered a 10. The arms were especially tight! It was also super short. I would have worn tights underneath since I'm pretty tall. I would only recommend this to petite girls.

5'7 150lb Wore dress for charity gala. Sleeves are very tight and dress is short. Worked for the few hours I was at the event but definitely not a dress you would want to wear all night. I️ thought I️ looked great in it! ;)

The dress was beautiful and high quality. It is true to size but the fabric has no give. I agree with other reviews, the arms are quite tight and restricts your movement, and the dress overall isn't the most comfortable.

I *loved* this dress. I was worried it would be too hot and even ordered a backup but I just couldn't not wear it! Thankfully I kept cool, and it was so cute. It fit like a glove, was so stylish and fun, and I got a million compliments. It was forgiving for snack eating as well. The sleeves are stiff but nothing intolerable. I suppose if arms are your problem area, be wary, but I have no issues and danced all night. I had multiple people ask where they could buy it.

I wore this dress for my wedding rehearsal dinner and felt so beautiful in it. It's very flattering to my body and have old school Hollywood vibes that made me feel super sophisticated. I was worried I would get makeup on any amount of dirt on it because it is SO white. But wearing this dress was worth the worry. I love the side panels that are hard to see in photos but give it a cute cut. I also love the ruffles at the bottom of the dress. Note that the dress is almost high/low at the hem.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but runs very small
links_reviews_text: I received many compliments, but I felt that I should have ordered a larger size. I had on spanx and it still felt very tight.

This dress was so comfortable and flattering in all the right places. I'm 5'6" 139lbs athletic build and the six fit perfectly. First, it stood out in a sea of black dresses and second the hem was different and flirty! I loved this dress.
I loved the high-low of the skirt, how it flared, and the side twists! Absolutely wonderful!

links_reviews_title: Such a flattering design, so elegant!
Wore this for a black and white gala. Felt super glam and polished in a sea of black!
links_reviews_text: Ordered up a size as other reviews stated and the fit was perfect

links_reviews_title: Enjoying Fete en Blanc for the first time
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress for Fete en Blanc. I usually wear a 12- I have large hips. I'm wearing the 14 and it was snug. One note is the dress isn't a true white yet more off-white, ivory. I love the flow at the bottom... the dress is classy yet I could also dance and not feel restricted. The fabric is high quality and felt really nice. I love the sheer siding. I'm really glad I ordered the back-up size or I would have been in trouble.
I am a 5'2 a 34D and 27 waist and pretty solid size 4 in dresses. This dress fit beautifully for an all white party. Would rent again

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress, lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit...I’m 5,3”, 97lbs
Felt great, fit great, looked great!

Sized down bc I was going for a super tight dress, could have easily worn the 2 as well for a less revealing look. With the tighter version, had to invest in the real good Spanx bc lines showed with any other brand of shapewear. Overall loved this look for a b/w wedding.

links_reviews_title: I really like the windows on the side of the dress
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a white party in Palm Beach. The dress is fitted throughout.

- Classic lines. Clean and sophisticated look. - Because this dress is white and because of the material, I had to wear a nude bra (wish I had worn strapless) and nude spanks otherwise pretty much everything would show. Panties lines, movement of your muscles, etc. I tried to wear pasties but didn't work for me. Might be because of the ones I used. - Fits comfortably up top, but very tight-fitting in the hips and stomach area. Difficulty when sitting with a full stomach. (But looks so nice when I'm standing up tho) I'm usually a 0-2 in tops. 26-27 bottom. - Perfect length on me. I'm 5 3. Inch and a half nude heels plus the mermaid ends of the dress really lengthen my body. - Got sooo many compliments on this dress. - I would recommend it.

This dress was perfect for my small, backyard ceremony after we had to change our entire wedding plan on short notice and I needed a dress to wear (my actual wedding gown wasn’t ready and still needed alterations). I wore my backup size 2. This dress was form fitting, slightly stretchy, and runs small. Side mesh panels under the arms are slightly see-through but not terribly. The skirt is fun when dancing. I would rent again.
I got this dress for a holiday party and it fit really well on me! I'm petite - 5 feet tall, 100 lbs. It was little bit long so will wear heels.
This dress fit veeeeery snugly. That fit in white + the sheer size panels made it a little too much for my event.
Sophisticated summer dress for a cocktail party. It fit like a glove. Fabric was comfortable in the heat. The dress was overall very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I did not wear it, but like the dress a lot!
links_reviews_text: Fits great, very comfy and flattering
I rented a size 6 and 8. This dress was disappointing. I wasn't able to wear either size because they were both too small. Definitely size up! The dress runs small!

links_reviews_title: All white party and this was perfect dancing dress!
links_reviews_text: fit and fabric are wonderful I'm usually a size 8, but only a 10 was available - it fit perfectly!
Beautiful dress. I felt like a million and a half bucks. Beautiful dress, true to size. No cons.

links_reviews_title: The design is detailed and impressive.
links_reviews_text: Runs a little small. There is no give in the material, but it seems breathable. On me, the "high" part of the high-low, seemed too high for the design.

links_reviews_title: I didnt like the shape of the dress
links_reviews_text: Very tight with very flowing bottom making for an odd look
The dress fit was great! I really enjoyed this look. #graduation #photoshoot
I wore this dress to my law school graduation and it fit like a glove! It was super comfy and hugged me in all the right places! Absolutely love it.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing it to the party
links_reviews_text: I wear Halston all the time and am a size 10. This dress did not fit it was way too tight to be flattering.

links_reviews_title: Classy pick, not your average white dress
links_reviews_text: This dress fit my curves perfectly. the side detail makes it look expensive and the flounce hem gives it that something special.

links_reviews_title: I was unable to wear this dress.
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately I was unable to wear this dress as it ran too small and I could not get it fully zipped. Overall it's a pretty dress but the material is much heavier then I expected. It appears more "flowy" online. The details were beautiful however.

links_reviews_title: Could not get my hips into it
links_reviews_text: Cute dress but the hip area is too tight. I'm usually a 2, I would need this in 4.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for my wedding after party and loved it!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable fit, enough flare and perfect white <3
Didn't wear this beauty, I'm 5'1", back zip styles often buckle & create a hump on my back... wish it came in petite! So pretty!

I swapped this dress out from another rental. I loved the idea of the dress, the style is great. When the time came to wear it, it was a mixed experience. The bottom is so fun. The top was gappy and while I ultimately chose not to wear a bra, it didn't have the support I needed to do that comfortably. We needed up calling it an early night because I was pretty uncomfortable. I think if i was taller and more athletically built it would have been a better fit.
I am normally a size 8 in dresses, but this brand runs small. I could not even zip it up. Beautiful dress, wish I could have worn it. Be sure to size up.

Was hoping this would be something more than what it was. Great material to hide my belly's love of pasta. I like that there was extra material on top by the arms to cover any armpit-pudge, but the dress had sewn a band around the waist area that truncated my torso and made me look blocky. The lace detail above the hem was delicate and nice, but wasn't the right dress for the wedding I was wanting to wear it to. Might rent again for another occasion.

I LOVED this dress! I wore it to a cocktail attire dinner. I wore the 6 because it hugged me more than the 8. The dress has a good amount of stretch, so it was comfortable without making me feel like a sausage. The length was perfect for my event. It fell right at the top of my knee (I am 5'7"). I wouldn't hesitate to rent this dress again.
Super cute. Looking forward to wearing again but with nude nylons to show off the beautiful lace!

This dress was great, it was simple and elegant, the fabric was a lovely heavy weight that was forgiving for the body. The lace detail at the bottom was just perfect to make this better then just a simple black dress. I was worried that the length would hit me wrong but with 3" heels it was perfect! Runs slightly large because I'm in between 6/8 dress size and I fit easily into the 6, wasn't even tight!

I wore this both at work and out for a classy dinner. At work I paired the dress with knee-high boots. It made for a more casual look. Then I put the high heels on for dinner. I had multiple compliments all day long. I will buy this once the price goes down.

links_reviews_title: December event- very pretty back up dress!
links_reviews_text: This was my back up dress after my original did not fit. The fabric is very heavy and thick knit- no ironing needed. I don’t think it would work in warm weather but it was perfect for December. Customer service was amazing as I had 2 days to find a back up. They sent the 0, 2 and 4. I wore the 0. I would say I am normally a 2. The zipper was a little stiff. I wore this to a bar mitzvah and it was very appropriate. I could have dressed it up more but I think this would also work great with a jean jacket and flats. The hem detail is pretty- I got lots of compliments!
Fabric was amazing and soft. Fit a little on the bigger size. I normally wear and 8 and went with the 6 easily on this one. The skirt flows nicely and was fun to dance in.

links_reviews_title: Great look for a work event
links_reviews_text: As always, great fit at a great price. Intentionally picked this one for a more modest look, but the waist trip and lace at the knee took it up a notch. Fit well, easy to wear, no need for a special bra. Wore my usual size.
Wore this to temple for high holidays. It runs a bit large and would have like if fit a bit more snug in waist and maybe an inch shorter but was still a great dress.
I rented this for one event and ended up wearing it to two! So cute, simple but the lace detail sets it apart. So comfortable! And the material is very luxurious

links_reviews_title: More of a funeral dress than a party dress
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for an engagement party. I figured it was simple but elegant. It's a beautiful dress, but as my husband put it, looked like I was ready for a funeral. Very boxy up top, and there was barely a noticeable difference in size between the 8 and 10. The bottom of the dress is lovely and has a nice flow to it, but just wasn't appropriate for what I needed it for

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a work awards event!
links_reviews_text: Thick material, unique details on the bottom to add a little flair, super flattering, and the perfect length! Wore the dress to an awards event for work and received many compliments!

links_reviews_title: it was a very heavy dress, and ran a little big around the chest, didn't keep because of this
links_reviews_text: Very heavy dress material -

links_reviews_title: Wore this for our valentine's dinner! Felt great in it! Very comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Good length for me. Helpful that the fabric had some pull to it over my bust.
It was fine
Very pretty and fit well. Elegant.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress. Got many compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: The zipper is a bit stubborn but usable. I’m short and it hit just below my knee so I’d imagine in a normal sized human it would hit at the knee. The material was amazing. I was able to wear a normal bra as well.

links_reviews_title: Work this for a work event-cocktail/dinner/auction-loved it!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great, the length was modest, I had no worries about wardrobe malfunctions all night. I would rent this again. I felt great and received lot of compliments. two thumbs up!
Fit was true to size and the dress is gorgeous. Comfortable and really well made. You can wear a regular bra with it too! I loved it and would definitely wear it again
Nothing overly fancy about this dress but fit really nice and high quality material. Can easily be dressed up with great jewelry!
Heavy/quality material. Fun dress to wear. Flattering. Lace trim is a nice touch making this dress simple yet fun.

links_reviews_title: The dress was the perfect black dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit great, though I was surprised on how heavy the dress was. True to size and overall it looked great.
I loved this dress, but ended up wearing another that showed slightly more skin on top to the wedding I went to. I would definitely recommend this one though, and it fits true to size.
Ordered this as my back up dress. Now I want to buy it! It’s the perfect LBD. Can be dressed up for a cocktail event or wedding. Could also be worn for a work event.
This was a beautiful dress and it fit absolutely perfectly!
Perfect fit. Little dressy for work, but I wore it with flats. Could have worn it to a cocktail party as well with heels.
Great dress. Zipper sucks. Typically in wear a 2 or 4 I could have possibly worn a 2. The length is great as well as the flow of the dress

links_reviews_title: Fun dress, nice fabric weight and flow
links_reviews_text: Size 10 was a bit big, but fit fine given the flowy nature of the cut.
This was my backup dress. It is a very simple black dress but well constructed. I would have definitely worn it, very comfortable.
This might be my favorite rental for work. The material is lovely and soft and the fit is all around classic.

links_reviews_title: Great dress. Very comfortable. Fits well.
links_reviews_text: Got lots of compliments. I was able to wear it to work with a scarf and with a cardigan. Great dress to go out after work.

I actually got this dress as a replacement, ended up wearing it and loving it! It was nice and soft and had a little stretch to it even though the size I ordered fit great. It also was very flattering and hugged in all the right places. I wish I could buy it! I'd definitely rent this one again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for work, but fit more like a midi-dress
links_reviews_text: Wore this to work and it was classy and sophisticated. I am 5 foot 2 inches and it was a tad long, but with heels it looked like a proper midi-dress. Everything else fit well, but I wonder if a zero would have been better.

I'm writing this review while wearing the dress. It is beautifully made and the quality is amazing. The fabric has give and is forgiving, but is also cut in a way that really brings out a nice form. This might be on the fancier side but I'm dressing it down with a sweater for work. I will rent this again and again. It is a tad on the short side, but the lace gives a nice appearance of longer material.
Great dress! Fun...fit was great!

links_reviews_title: So cute and fun! Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a work cocktail party after Labor Day but before the end of summer, so still appropriate time of year weather-wise. It was a hit! I wore easy sandals because I didn't want my feet to hurt in heels and I think this helped it be work appropriate because the slit is high- especially after a little wind. I left the neck unhooked because I saw it in other reviews and it is MUCH better this way! So many compliments and I felt fun and flirty, yet still work- party appropriate. A little tighter in the waist than I hoped, but it worked.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love it. Overall, meh. Beautiful color. Nice light silky fabric.
links_reviews_text: Fit is true to size. Long enough for me. Would've been uncomfortable had I closed the neck area. Preferred it open. Received compliments. Fine for daytime.
I wear a 34D so surprised that I was unable to wear this dress in a medium due to the bust fabric pulling. See photo. Otherwise super cute.

I loved this dress and the material is airy and breezy. I felt comfortable wearing it to a work event (grabbed the white shawl for inside). But the elastic waistband wasn't particularly flattering on me. Otherwise, I would recommend it!
Flattering and comfortable
I really liked this dress. I rented it for a graduation and dinner. Fit was pretty true to size. The neck closure was a little tight so I left it open which I liked the look better that way anyway.
Fit really well and is super comfortable. Bright and perfect for spring!

98 degrees in Atlanta. This is cool and comfy. Fits me perfectly. Nice slit. All silk, feels amazing. I'm a size 12/14 and XL looks great. I wore the top unbuttoned and with gladiator sandals for shopping & dinner.
The top was tighter than I would have liked--I'm a 36DD for reference. The skirt fit well and the slit was fun and not too high. The material is light weight and the dress was comfortable to wear.
Loved this dress. Paired it with a fun blazer for a summer wedding

links_reviews_title: Simple and effortless. Perfect for vacation
links_reviews_text: This dress is effortless. This works well for vacation or a summer dinner date. There is a slit in the front, but not enough to make you feel self-conscious. The dress fits well while still feeling breathable.
This was a very beautiful, casual dress. I wish I would've ordered a small as the medium was a little baggy. The slit added a little sexy to the conservative top.
I loved this dress! It was super comfortable and dry flattering! Perfect for an outdoor wedding!

Not wonderful for the those with a large chest. The open hole in the front was gaping open the entire time. I should have sized up, however that would have made the opening larger. With the LR instead of the XL, the top was tight and caused the back to fit snug rather than lose as shown in the photo. Not a good fit for those of us with large chests.
This dress was perfect for a vacation in Hawaii. It is comfortable and the color is beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Its lovely light fabric and fits well.
links_reviews_text: I love that it is flex material and the fit is very forgiving.
Loved the fit and feel of this dress! Perfect for summer soirée or date night!

links_reviews_title: Nice for summer not fall - and you should size up

links_reviews_text: Nice casual dress. It fits true to size.
This dress was really cute and worked for work and drinks after. I got a ton of compliments! You have to wear a strapless bra due to the top but it looked great so totally worth it!
Would've bought if it were a small but S wasn't available. Loved the pattern but material wrinkled easily. Otherwise, great easy fit comfy dress
Too tight in bust. Couldn't get the right undergarment to work, so wasn't able to wear it.
Comfortable and pretty. Stand-out color and print.

links_reviews_title: Very nice dress for summer. Beautiful, bright orange. Slit is just right, can wear this out or work.
links_reviews_text: Dress fits well, true to size.
I love this dress and will rent it again. It's comfortable and flattering.

links_reviews_title: I wore a back up but loved this dress
links_reviews_text: I gave it a 4 bc for me it was a little tight in the bust area, but I LOVED this dress. It other wise fit great. I run between a 32E / 34D, so just felt like I needed a little more room. I would def try it in a larger size!!!
Fun casual summery dress. Size up if you are busty, otherwise true to size
This has almost a junior fit through the shoulders & torso. Will try reordering in a large. I'm a broad shouldered 8.

links_reviews_title: Too right in the top so I didn't get to wear
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear. Cute style and nice length
Very tight at chest not ideal for a woman with a size d cup

I wore this to work with a jean jacket and got so many compliments! I will say, the fabric wrinkles quite easily and is very delicate, so minus a star there. I wore it again for an evening event with chunky heels too.
Dress is nice and cool for summer.

I am short and busty and often have trouble sizing with RTR. This was the most perfect dress I've ever received, and I would buy it if I had the cash. I wore it fastened at the top with a light blazer to work and wore it opened at the neck to three brunches. The silk feels like a dream in the Texas heat, and I was beyond sad to send it back.
I purchased a M and it fits perfectly.
I loved this dress! Very comfortable and got a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. Very flattering and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Pretty color, so comfy and flattering@

The dress fit nicely except for the bust area. The bust area sagged. I tried to cover it with a short light sweater but even that couldn't help it. Material is good quality and feels good on, just not proportional to my measurements.

links_reviews_title: TTS but top a little tight
links_reviews_text: I loved the print, fabric, and overall quality of this dress. I did not end up wearing it though because it was too tight in the chest area. I am a full 36C and it was too tight. Sad!!

This dress was really fun and could easily be dressed up for a wedding or date night or dressed down for brunch. The color is red with orange undertones, slit goes about halfway up the thigh, and the fabric is pretty flowy but not thin. It runs true to size. The waist is elastic, but it was not stretchy at all in the chest/neck.

links_reviews_title: Ended up being a great rental!
links_reviews_text: At first this seemed frumpy, but with cute boots it totally worked! The waistline is perfect and the length was great for work.
This is a simple sleeveless black dress and it fits really nicely. It's easy to wear. Super comfortable. True to size. Wore in very hot California weather and was comfortable.
This dress ran true to size. I received so many compliments.
Loved this dress. It's comfortable, easy to wear, and I thought it was very flattering. I would absolutely rent again.
Fine to wear to work but felt a little frumpy
Fit very nice. Got many compliments.
I received a lot of flowers on the flower insert, but the zipper was super tricky to do myself.
I wore this to work topped with a black waist level blazer. It was very professional with a fun touch of roses.
Great fit, very flattering and fun streaks of different fabrics

links_reviews_title: Nice for work, easy to accessorize
links_reviews_text: Great fabric and love the red color pop. For me it was just ok, nothing special. Wore to work with a red jacket. Has a nice flow when you walk and a plus that it is fully lined. The shirred waist fit me a bit odd, might be better for an hourglass figure.
I rented this for a funeral. It's conservative and not flashy at all. I can't imagine wearing it anywhere else though. Did it exactly what it was supposed to for me.
Great for the office due to the length and subdued colors.
A black dress with a nicely defined waist and a great midi length. I could wear it and not feel at all self-conscious, loved it so much I used it for two nights out.
Interesting dress, but frumpy on.

This was such a great dress! It was SO flattering--gave me a small waist and flowed nicely over my hips without adding bulk or showing bumps. The red-printed panels added just enough to make this dress "special." I will definitely be renting this one again.

I picked this dress out, but I was just a tad too short for it. So that made it an odd fit for me. It is beautiful it could be worn out, to a wedding, or dressed up at work. I was bummed that I am short.
dressy but not so dressy that you can't wear to work. Fits an hourglass figure perfectly.
Throw and go kinda dress. Flattering and forgiving in the waist area, great for work.

This well-made dress is flattering, conservative, and comfortable, making it the perfect dress for all day at the office. The arms and chest seem a bit tight, so if you are larger on top, I recommend sizing up.

This dress immediately caught my eye when I was browsing through dresses. However, the pictures of the dress look much better than it does in reality. The fit was a little odd for me. Agree that I should have ordered one size up. But I didn't like the pattern or the way it looked on me. Would not want to try the next size.

Going off of what everyone else has been saying.. rent this dress!! The fabric was thick enough to hide any imperfections, but stretchy enough to never want to take it off. I loved this dress so much and can't wait to rent another dress from RTR.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for an adult prom; got many compliments
links_reviews_text: Fits like a glove in the best way

I rented this for a trial try on I wasn't too impressed with the dress quality. Definitely runs a tad smaller. For a day function I see it working but the fabric is so thin I'd be afraid of sweat marks if it was a hot day.

I ended up wearing this sexy dress to a wedding. I ordered a size 2 and 4 and had to size up to the 4 because it's definitely form fitting and snug. The slit up the side was a pleasant surprise and really makes this dress a show stopper. The pink color will also make you stand out. Loved wearing this dress and my fiancé loved showing me off in it.

links_reviews_title: The cut and color are perfection
links_reviews_text: The bold color, high slit and one shoulder cut make this dress a showstopper. It ran a bit big on me, so I'd probably size down if you are between sizes.

This was my first time with RTR and it was great! My dress was perfect for a fancy beach wedding, it looked and felt great. It stayed in place all night, even when dancing, and was form fitting but still let me wear my spank underneath with no issue, the material is thick enough to hide any lines. The color is bright and so pretty, I love it.

LOVED LOVED LOVED this dress. I felt like a Barbie doll for the evening. Wore it to a birthday affair. I have to say though this is bodycon to the max and very snug! Was still able to move and breathe though!

I rented this dress for a Valentine's night out and it was absolutely fantastic. Lots of compliments and super comfy. The material was thinner than I expected so it was hard to add Spanx or anything to hide the imperfections. The top was a little loose but it was not annoying. Overall I loved this dress. The color was perfect and it was easy to move in. Great for a wedding or a night out.

Really nice material that is thick which is a necessity when wearing a tight dress!! I'm usually a 4 or 6 and I went with the 6 because of other reviews which was definitely a good move. I had a little room in the 6 but the 4 would've definitely been too small. My one complaint is that i wish the strap was adjustable but it wasn't a huge issue.
I never wear pink but I loved this dress. I love all likely dresses though, just fits my body well. The fabric is thicker which is nice. Love the length and the slit!

I got so many compliments on this dress and it fit amazing! it was a bit snug so if tight fits are not for you i would size up. other than that the material was of high quality and it complimented my skin tone very well. 12/10!!

Loved this dress. Really form-fitting and shows everything. Beautiful color and stands out. The side slit is really high when you sit, so be aware of that. People loved the dress and got compliments all night.

This dress was a hot little number! I'm 5'1" and wore heals, weight 133 and have an athletic build. This dress was super flattering with the one shoulder, leg slit and form fitting all through the butt and thighs. It's a bright hot pink and the fabric is very good quality. I got so many compliments and felt smokin! This dress runs true to size I would say but had a tighter fit, very little stretch. I would definitely rent again! Loved it!
This dress was definitely a show stopper, I got compliments all night! This dress did run small on me so if you are in between sizing definitely size up.

I absolutely loved the color of the dress!! It looked so much better in person. I received lots of compliments throughout the night. I wore it to a friends wedding! The only issue was the sizing. It runs a little small. I normally wear a size 0 in my RTR dresses but i ended up wearing the 2 which barely fit. It was pretty tight but nonetheless I was able to move and dance which I attribute to the high split!

This was a comfortable dress and a gorgeous color. The single strap was fun, but a little looser than I expected. I wore the size 2, and it fit true to size. My backup was the 4, but I actually wonder if the 0 might have fit better.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Vibrant pink you will definitely stand out, many compliments!
links_reviews_text: It is very form fitting but hugs the right spots. I would say it runs small. Color is much more vibrant than the photo but I loved it. The material is great. Perfect for outdoor summer wedding.
Beautiful color! Fits like a glove!

I rented this dress for my birthday dinner. I'm normally a size 4 and this dress in size 4 was an exact fit for my body with no extra room (had to get assistance zipping it up). Depending on how tight you want the dress to fit some might say that it runs small so I did mark that it runs small. You will definitely want the next size up as an option. Overall, loved the dress!
I loved this dress and got a lot of compliments. It's very snug and would say it runs small. Great material, but kind of think for an outdoor summer wedding

This dress was incredible. Slim fitting to cover everything without being too tight or uncomfortable. The color is everything. Not too gaudy just the right amount of bright to be fun and make a statement at a summer outdoor wedding. Would definitely rent again. Be sure to size up! This runs Small!
The dress fits amazing but runs super small i am usually 12 and had to go up a size

links_reviews_title: The color popped, perfect for a summer wedding.
links_reviews_text: I loved it!! I received a lot of compliments, I felt great in it. You don't need many accessories.
This dress was amazing! I ended up going with a green one since it was a mountain wedding and it seemed more fitting. Would definitely wear for a date night!

links_reviews_title: I ended up wearing the 2 instead of the 0 - I'm normally a 0.
links_reviews_text: I'd say the dress is very form-fitting, hugs in the right areas, comfortable.

I loved this dress! Got so many compliments on it. Based on other reviews I sized up & the bigger size fit perfectly. The dress has some stretch to it so that it hugs your body. Would definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: First time RTR. Great dress! Great service
links_reviews_text: My dress was only available in the 4. RTR sent me a back up but also allowed me to pick any available dresses free of charge bc only one was available. But loved the fit of the 4, and didn't need additional dresses. I'm 5'7, 34B and 132. The dress was beautiful, fit well, stayed in place and the only thing needed were nipple covers which you may get away with wearing none.

links_reviews_title: This dress popped, and it was form fitting while making me feel confident!
links_reviews_text: The dress was true to size. The length was perfect, it was sexy without being too revealing. I received compliments all night long, and I was able to dance without being constrained. The fabric is high quality. It's thick, but not too thick for a summer wedding.

links_reviews_title: Rented for a wedding and it would’ve been great if it fit.
links_reviews_text: This dress ran really small. I ordered a 6 and 8, couldn’t get the 6 on at all. The 8 “fit” but I couldn’t sit down. It looked great though. I think if I had gotten the 10, it might have been too loose on my upper body, so for people with hourglass figures but a smaller chest, it may not be the best fitting dress. The color is awesome and bright, but because of the fit I ended up wearing another dress I rented.

links_reviews_title: Great dress and thank god for 2 dresses
links_reviews_text: Love this dress, usually a 2 but wore the 4... felt thin and sexy without being too sexy for a wedding. Wish I could wear all over again and had gotten more pics in it!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! The color was amazing the style was super cute. Perfect for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: It runs a little small so I recommend sizing up one to two sizes. I wore a size 8 and usually I’m a 4 or 6!
Loved everything about this dress! Comfortable all night, received so many compliments! Perfect color for summer!

I just so happened to have tried this exact dress on at Bloomingdales a while back, but they only had my normal size which is a 2 or 4. I do have a wider rib cage and a broad back, so the 4 was just a bit too tight in my rib cage section. I knew that the 6 would have fit perfectly, but I just thought "not meant to be". I was on RTR looking for a bright fun color for a "black tie optional" wedding dress, and found this dress! I decided to order the 6 and I'm so glad I did. This dress was such a fun bright color, it was comfortable to walk and dance in, and everyone stopped me to compliment the color. I am 5'1", 129 lbs, 34B, and an athletic build. I highly recommend this dress to all!

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments, but bright and tight!
links_reviews_text: This is my third RTR. Arrived clean and intact, and on time! Pros: So many compliments on this dress! Shows every curve, thick and quality material. The slit allows for easy walking and adds style to this midi-length dress! The color and material is perfect for an outdoor summer/spring event! Cons: Supremely tight! This brand, Lively, tends to run small and is form-fitting - I've rented 3 dresses from this brand. I usually wear a 0 or 2, and the top portion fit perfectly (32C)! However, the area around my bottom (usually size 2-4, kind of wider hips/larger bottom) was really form-fitting, as expected from this brand. With the right underthings, I was able to rock this dress, but I was a little self-conscious (I am a bit more conservative) until I started getting all of the compliments.

links_reviews_title: People told me this dress was FIRE
links_reviews_text: I felt fabulous in this dress. I don't own spanx and it was ok without them but ideally I would recommend having some sort of smoothing undergarment for this piece because it's so form fitting.
Size up for sure

links_reviews_title: Very eye catching! Made for a great fun night!
links_reviews_text: This dress was exactly what I was looking for! The color is gorgeous with a tan! Some say it runs small but I feel this dress is made to have a tight curve hugging style and it was absolutely perfect. I would consider it true to size. Also husband was mesmerized, what more could I ask for?!

links_reviews_title: Great pop of color. Size up!
links_reviews_text: Very pretty dress. Beautiful pink color and did not need to wear a bra. Super super small. Ordered my usual size 6 and 8 but had to have them ship me a 10 overnight. Still a little snug but made it work.

I am normally a 4 but the chest was a tiny bit large in the side that was strapless so I went a size down to have a tighter fit across the chest, & not feel like it was sagging down. It was comfortable, great quality, the color was bright & fun for a summer wedding without feeling like I was showing too much skin.
Perfect dress for a spring/ summer wedding! Got a lot of compliments. I was easily able to move around and dance the night away in this dress. I definitely would recommend!
Wore this for my rehearsal dinner at my destination wedding. Definitely need the right undergarments because it is a big sheer but absolutely beautiful with such nice detail along the cutouts.

Wore this to a nice restaurant in Mexico. TTS overall, but the top was a bit big on me, so I used double sided tape to keep the straps up. Hits in the right places and feels trendy and elevated but effortless.

Rented this for a poolside white party. It is very ethereal and runs large. I am petite and could wear flats which I liked, but the bust is really large. Small chested women may not feel comfortable. Had to wear double stick tape to keep the chest from billowing and straps from falling.
Forgot to take a full length photo, but this dress was incredible. I felt like a goddess in it. You can wear a regular (neutral color) bra.

links_reviews_title: Pretty and almost costume like. Not for my small frame
links_reviews_text: It was a bit more Greek goddess looking than I had thought. Very pretty though. Fit perfectly at my waist but big everywhere else. Lots of material on the chest that billowed out and looked like I had saggy pebbles for boobs. It looked ridiculous on me.

Loved this dress. The cut outs are sexy yet classy! I'm on the shorter side so i felt I needed to wear wedges but could have worn flats too. The straps are slightly long and fall down, nothing a little fashion tape won't fix
This is an amazing dress! I probably could have worn a size smaller but they didn't have it so I took the size 6 anyway cause it was soo perfect!
There was a strange poof in the bustline. I have DDs so usually Chest areas fit well

Such a beautiful dress, unfortunately even though it is lined the top is completely see through and the shape makes a bra not an option. I am not modest but it was see through to a point that I couldn't wear it anywhere:(. The fit was great though although the zipper gets stuck at mid point.
Love the cut and material of this dress, but the 6 was too large on me.
Yes, see thru, probably good for vacation, fits right to 29" waist,39" hips
Great dress! I found a soft white bra top to wear with it because it is sheer. I felt great in the dress and was told I looked like a goddess!
Maybe a little snug in the waist.
The dress is pretty but it was too big (size down) and VERY sheer. Since I was not interested in finding a slip to wear with it I passed.
No stretch to this one but fit great
Didn't wear tight around the rib cage loose on the bust
