thin/sheer white dress. looks very grecian and flows beautifully. can only be used as a coverup because there is no bra in the world that wldnt be see through. cutouts v slimming, moves wonderfully as you walk. hit around the ankle. super light. i'm typically a 2 and this was TTS. if you're btwn sizes go up to avoid fat squeezing out. highly recommend for a beach vacation

links_reviews_title: Girls trip on vacation to Jamaica. Beautiful dress.
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress and cut outs. Sexy
I really wanted to love this dress but the weird gapping v neck killed it for me. Ended up sending it back without wearing it.
This dress is so beautiful and so elegant. Perfect for a night out or a daytime brunch.
TOTALLY see-through. This dress is gorgeous, the fit is amazing, the cut-outs make you look small but you can see everything even with nude undergarments.
Endless compliments, wore Multiple times. Would definitely rent again!
Does run a little small so I would size up

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous but not quite right for maternity
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress, but the waist just hits a little low for maternity wear. I could get it zipped but it pushed the bodice up so that there was a ton of extra fabric at the back and shoulders. I hope to rent one day when I'm not pregnant!
I loved this dress - the puffed sleeve, the flowy fabric, the low cut neck, the sheer overlay. Perfect for a summer event!
Great fit and flattering

links_reviews_title: Order several sizes smaller - way, way too big!!
links_reviews_text: Here is the dress straight out of the bag. Excuse the bra, but it shows you how low cut it is. Definitely needs a good steam... It did not fit. I am the last person to say an item is too big. Often, I accept that a larger fit was the designer's intent. But not here. I am usually an 8 in most RTR, and I am wearing the US8 here (tag also says 12 AU size). The band below the bust should be snug, but I probably had an additional 6 inches of fabric. I also wasn't a fan of the double slits in the front. The sheer fabric would be enough sexy for me. Too bad - I was hoping to rock this with some boots at an event where the dress code is cocktail with a western flair. I would order this one 2 to 3 sizes below your usual if you like the look of this dress.
Desk to drinks this dress has it all.

There's weird tutu material in the shoulders. I pulled it under to stops them from looking padded, but beware. Otherwise very pretty dress. Also, the sizing is a little odd, like Australian or something. The tag said 6R but US 2, so take with that what you will.

Loved this dress. It was comfortable and not constricting for a birthday dinner. True to size, wore a US10/AUS14. Fabric is light and airy. I have a large chest and just used a sticky bra and fashion tape. Wish I could keep this piece!

What is up with the sizing of this thing? I'm normally 10 but they recommended 14. Everything about it was awful. Looked like it had shoulder pads, was boxy. I tried it on for my friends and they literally said, 'awful'.
This dress is a great color but it was really low cut. I bought it for an event that I wanted to be a bit more conservative for (with long sleeves) but there was no way with that neckline
I love everything about this dress. It's fancy and sexy. The color is gorgeous.

links_reviews_title: I just loved this sparkly top!
links_reviews_text: Very sparkly for a party or special event. I wore it for NYE. I also need a large. The XL was a little big for me, but still worked.

Very comfortable fit. I wore both the small and medium. I wore to a fundraiser at my sons school with black pants and heels. I also wore it for a night out with skinny black jeans and heels. Small size fit me better. Got lots of compliments!!!
This top was what I needed for dressing down yet feeling festive during holiday parties. Can be dressed up or down easily and is flattering/forgiving if you aren't in the mood for tight tops.

links_reviews_title: So beautiful and works for many occasions
links_reviews_text: Love this top. Looks great and can be dressed up or down. I think I may have to buy it.
This was very comfortable and great detailing in the back
loved this top - very festive! The top fit perfectly was not too long on my petite frame. I received lots of compliments and was able to wear it to two different parties.
The back details are the icing to the cake. Long enough to wear with leather leggings and I'm 5'10".
I absolutely love the top! the sparkling texture adds a fun vibe. Perfect for the holiday season cocktail parties or girl night outings!

I got this for my daughter to wear to an event and one of the things I love about it is that it is extremely flattering on a well-endowed lady and doesn't accentuate the waistline...not a problem for my daughter but perhaps a consideration for some. The material is gorgeous and you will want this for the holiday season.
Show them curves!! Sexy dress. Wore on a date with my husband. Amazing.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for evening out in NYC
links_reviews_text: This dress was super comfortable wear. The little cut out on the side made this dress even more special. I felt spicy in it and it worked well with my curves.
This was so hot. Absolutely amazing
Great fit and material for a LBD hugging all the right places with flattering shape. Great for girls night out in NYC!
Felt sexy in this dress. Perfect for dancing.

links_reviews_title: Super flattering for every body type
links_reviews_text: Great fit, I would 100% wear again and again

I really liked it- I ended up wearing the m because it was more forgiving on my stomach. I wore a coat most of the evening so you couldn't see the little cut out, so it just looked like a solid black dress. I really liked it- but it wasn't jaw dropping like some of the other dresses on RTR

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and can wear a regular bra!
links_reviews_text: This dress was great! Flattering, simple, warmer for the colder weather and fit well. I went with the Small and was pleasantly surprised to have the top a bit tighter than the bottom (normally it's the reverse). I am a bit smaller on top so this was perfect for me. I was able to wear my regular bra and my black booties since it was a cooler evening. My only issue with this dress was that it rode up high and fast. We walked to dinner about .4 miles and I had to pull it down the whole time. Which was surprising given it wasn't super tight to begin with. So just be aware if you have to walk a bit of a distance :) . Great option for LBD for sure!

links_reviews_title: Fun 90's look but not beautifully made
links_reviews_text: I liked the vibe of this dress, but the garment has a fold-over bit of fabric below the waist, to hide the seam at the point of the peekaboo. This creates a crease, as if it were the top of your stockings. Otherwise fun, and warm, and certainly on-trend with the 90's comeback lately!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my birthday and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! So flattering! I got so many complaints.

links_reviews_title: Great fit! A little tight but holds you in and doesn't make you feel uncomfortable
Its fine...until you move! Or breathe!
links_reviews_text: Super cute and super stylish. Warm. But it shifted around on me. I didn't wear panties or hose since they would show through the hole. It was cute and I got lots of looks and comments. But I don't like clothes that ride up and shift around. I included 2 views so you can get a good idea. Also, if you have a poochy stomach, and it bothers you when it sticks out, this is probably not the dress for you.
Really enjoyed this dress. Material was thick but still comfortable. Even with the cut out, I was able to wear spanx rolled down slightly. I wore it with thigh high boots and loved the look!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a romantic date!
links_reviews_text: For really well and, I loved the cutout. The turtle neck seems daunting but it's perfect to keep that classy look.
Wore for date night dinner with the girls! Dress is a nice thick material for cold weather
i didnt have a big night out to wear this to so I just wore to a brewery event. I felt great in it. Would be great for a fun dinner out or girls night
I usually wear a size 14 or 1X. This has awesome stretch and can go form day to night look. Remove tights and pair with heels or strappy sandals.

Sexy! Very fitted however stretchy. So it made the dress comfortable and held everything together in the right places. I'm not usually one to wear cutouts around the tummy area but this worked out in the perfect spot.
Material, style, and comfort make this dress a MUST HAVE in my wardrobe! I would wear this dress A LOT!! My plan is to buy :)

This dress was great, but not a knockout. It's mostly just a black dress! Very tight, but the cutout is a little awkward. The mock turtleneck was tight on my neck. Not my favorite RTR, but a good dress for a night out if you need one.

This dress is amazing! It fits very snug though-is somewhat stretchy but has some structure. There is no hiding anything in this dress. Every curve will show-so keep that in mind if you want some extra room or flexibilty-this may not be your dress Wearing a bra is obviously doable-but every seam will show through-im small enough in that area that i could opt out. A bigger busted woman may not have that same option. Overall i loved this dress. I got so many conpliments with this updated classic. I want it permanently in my closet!
Conservative. fitted and sexy- absolutely stunning and appropiate - cute cut out on the side - easy to move in and have fun- i paired it with stockings

Not going to lie--I wasn't sure about this dress when I pulled it out of the garment bag, but omg is it perfecf. It fits like a glove with rouching in the right places. The cut out is adjustable and the fabric is the perfect weight for chilly weather. I paired it with a pair of thigh-high boots and statement earrings. I'll be renting this dress all winter!
Ended up wearing a different dress. Tried this on. Sophisticated but still sexy

links_reviews_title: love it. super sexy. i want to buy it.
links_reviews_text: great
it covered and showed exactly what i wanted to there wasn't bunching or riding up it very function able

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Classy and sexy at the same time!
links_reviews_text: Really loved the fit of this dress, even with the cutout it was super flattering!

This dress was just OK. I didn't love it and didn't end up wearing it for a bachelorette party I was going to. It just didn't really do much for my figure--I'm 5'7'', 126lbs and a 34A bust. I think it would look better on someone who was a little curvier.

links_reviews_title: It was ok once I had dress on. Won't rent it again
links_reviews_text: Not impressed
I ended up not wearing this dress. Didn't really accentuate curves. More than anything, seemed to hide my femininity. Not really the sexiest dress I've ever tried on.

I'm usually a 12 or 14. I read all the reviews. It seems like this dress was recommended for curvy girls. And it seems like it ran pretty true to size. So I ordered an L and XL based off of sizing info. Neither fit.

links_reviews_title: Is it possible to marry a dress?!?
links_reviews_text: This curve-hugging yet sophisticated dress made me feel gorgeous, confident, and sexy all at once. I even wore it with spanx leggings and the waist cut-out was not a problem at all. I might just buy this dress... it's phenomenal.

Another great Susana Monaco dress. Fabric is stretchy enough to make sizing a non issue and just heavy enough to smooth over any problem areas. High neck and sleeves balance out the sexiness of the cut out and the tighter fit
This dress fit like a glove. I would recommend it to anyone looking to wear something warm but sexy during the winter.
The dress runs big and the material is very thin. Being thin it bunches awkwardly all over. I would chosen a different LBD
Super comfy and easy to wear but sexy
I'm a bartender in a fine dining steak house and received lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Paired with knee high leather boots
links_reviews_text: #femmefatal

links_reviews_title: Great dress. Lots of compliments. Classy, comfortable, and very flattering.
links_reviews_text: Hugged all the right places, but not too tight. Classy but also sexy.
It was a great dress, really comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Loved the flow of this dress!
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments on this dress! It was a snug fit, one size up, had it been available may have been perfect, especially with the side zip! But it worked out great.

Loved this dress! So chic and it was comfy too! Fit was TTS, though a little on the shorter side. I wore to the office, but probably wouldn't have felt comfortable without the tights. Also beware of cleavage, it was a little much so I fixed with a safety pin!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a cocktail attire party!
links_reviews_text: Great dress. Got compliments all night. Light and comfortable. Had to use some fabric tape because it's pretty low cut, but it worked great. Highly recommend!

Rented this for date night & loved it. Taking one star off because it was big in the upper body, but I'm small chested. Nothing a safety pin couldn't fix but would fit even better in the upper body for girls with a bigger bust. Material is great quality & fit is very flattering otherwise!

links_reviews_title: The perfect fun and flirty dress! I love it.
links_reviews_text: I have a D bust and this dress fit perfect. It also cut in at the waist making it so flattering. The 2 fit like a glove. It’s hard to find a good shorter dress since I am short but this was a great length for me.

links_reviews_title: This dress was too short to wear for a work event.
links_reviews_text: Too short for a work event unfortunately.

links_reviews_title: Chic, fun dress for a winter anniversary date
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. At first I was worried that it was a little short for me, but having the long sleeves made me feel a little more covered up. The skirt moved easily, so I when I sat down, it didn't ride up too much. It was also very comfortable. I thought it was a sexy look without being over-the-top. Perfect for an anniversary night out with my husband!

I have a big chest and can rarely find any dresses that are low cut that I can get away with. This dress was perfect and made me feel super cute all night. It was low cut for sureeeeee, but it looked so cute I just owned up to the cleavage lol. Excuse my face, I am way happier than I seem!
This fits very true to size, but may be a little short on anyone on the taller side. It's super flattering on and forgiving of any "problem" areas.
Loved everything about this dress! Perfect fit!

It was so so close to being really pretty. I ended up not wearing it because the chest line was asymmetrical and my bra showed on the left side no matter what I tried. The snap to keep the top closed didn't stay shut. Length was good, but it just didn't work overall. Returned without wearing.

Dress was perfect for dinner. Love the fit, hit me perfectly at mid-thigh and the V-neck wasn't to low but was still sexy (I'm 5' 5.5"). Long sleeves make it nice for a cool summer night, but its still a light-weight fabric so very comfortable with lots of movement.

links_reviews_title: I had compliments on this simple black outfit, yet, I even more so loved it because I was comfy!
links_reviews_text: Perfect size, very comfy, and super cute for a quick informal party or event.
This dress would be good for the weekend but not work. It was pretty short and the button on top kept popping open. Liked it a lot but have no where appropriate to wear it so returned it.

links_reviews_title: Its flirty and fun. Everyone loved it.
links_reviews_text: It fit well, but ran a little low in the breast area for church. But it is flirty and conservative. Perfect for church.

links_reviews_title: I wore the dress to chaperone my schools’ prom. I felt sophisticated but fun!
links_reviews_text: Great fit and very flattering. I’m short so the length was not an issue. It was very low cut, which made me nervous, but all in all it was a fantastic dress. I received a ton of compliments!
Great quality and fit. Elegant and comfortable.
Great dress and material but way too tight. I will be ordering in a bigger size.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit!! I'm petite and length was perfect
links_reviews_text: Perfect for petite body
V neck is a little deep, pin or camisole needed
Great fit and very sexy neckline and short length great for date night.

I really like this dress, but I hate that you can't roll/push the sleeves up because the closure is button with no stretch and the silky fabric won't stay folded. Other than that a good dress! Wore it to work.
This dress is very flattering on - I had co-workers continue to tell me all day how nice it looked on and they wish they could pull it off!

links_reviews_title: This dress fit perfect to my body.
links_reviews_text: I have a large chest region and this dress accommodated and I felt great in it!! Will rent this one again

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing it
links_reviews_text: The fit was good and it was a cute length. The silhouette wasn't for me but maybe someone else. I'd try another Parker dress

Sooo soft and comfortable. I'm not a huge fan of things that accentuate my shoulders, and this one did just a little, other than that I loved the fit and look. I have black short hair so it made me feel a little like a gothic or Victorian doll with all the ruffles. I wore this twice, once to a lunch with some friends, and another to a Sunday brunch. My partner said it was "business-y" but I found it to be more of a casual date dress. There is a snap at the V-neck which lets you be a bit more or less revealing, depending on your bust. I found that I didn't like how you could see the snap a little when it was un-snapped, so I kept it snapped as much as possible, though sometimes it would come undone on its own. I have a large chest for my size so this may not be an issue for most people. If I owned this dress I might either remove the snap altogether for a deeper neckline, or stitch it shut so it wouldn't come apart at all.
This was cute but fit kind of strangely - so big in shoulders I used a hair tie to keep it from dipping crazy low but also short. It was cute for a night out but didn't love it because of the fit.
Low cut, shows more cleavage than picture
I loved this dress! I am 6 months pregnant and am very self conscious right now and like clothes that cover my body. This was perfect. Covered my stomach and made me feel attractive.
Soooo comfortable even 19 weeks pregnant.

Great dress!! Very stretchy material, which makes it run a little large and perfect to stretch around a pregnant belly. Material is a little heavy and could be hot in summer months. Slightly long. I am 5’5 and dress hit right below the knee, would have liked it right above the knee. The top actually fit nicely even though I am smaller chested. Good stretch for small or large chest. Sides will pocket/stick out if you don’t have hips or dress is too large. Rented the 14 as well and the sides pocketed out.

Wonderful words from friends and strangers stating the beautiful color of this dress. It fits pretty true to size. I wore the 8 which was a tiny bit too big in the top but more comfortable than the 6 which was a tiny bit too tight at my arm pit.

I rented this for a work meeting and got so many compliments. This dress was so flattering and comfortable. The color is just gorgeous. I felt like a million bucks all night. Also had a colleague wear a very similar dress - also from RTR

I loved this dress! It was super forgiving and incredibly comfortable. I maybe could have gone a size smaller because I kept adjusting the off the shoulder side and pulling it up. But I would totally rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on the color and cut.
links_reviews_text: Runs about 1 size big, but very comfortable. No need for a bra with this dress (which is always a good thing). Dres was in perfect condition.
Dress fit perfectly. It was very flattering and I received soooo many compliments. It was beautiful and made me feel like an appropriately dressed diva! #weddingguestwiththemostest

I rented this for a wedding and really loved it. When I first tried it on I wasn't sure, but once I had my hair and makeup done it popped. The color was great and I loved the long drap up top. I was 15 weeks pregnant at the time so I went up a size to 16 from my normal 14 given my boobs are already enormous. It was roomy and not too tight which I liked. I could also zip it myself without any help - always a plus! Packed it in a suitcase to fly to the wedding and it didn't wrinkle either.

The overall dress fit great!! Color is super nice as well. The dress I was sent was full of snags. Unable to be worn for the event rented for due to condition. Customer was excellent to work with regarding issues.

links_reviews_title: So comfy and tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for my work fundraiser, would definitely rent this again! Tons of compliments!
I got lots of compliments on this dress for an engagement party. I'm curvy and the dress fit perfectly, plus super comfy!

I was bored with dresses in my closet so I gave RTR a try and loved the dress! The rental and return process was so easy! I got many compliments on the dress and it was perfect for an October wedding in the South!
It ran a little large but nothing crazy - I'm also 5'0 tall. I felt very elegant/classy. Loved this dress, I would definitely buy it if I had more formal events to attend.
Loved this dress! It was so comfortable, plenty of stretch for this growing bump of mine. It is super flattering, and the color is vibrant.
This was a flattering and comfortable dress! Not too tight so I could move around and dance.
Fit very well! Love how thick the fabric is as well as stretchy! Beautiful color! Forgiving dress!
Loved this dress! Super comfortable. I am 5'2 155 pounds during my 3rd trimester
This dress is amazing. I'm 5ft 7in, size 14 or so. This dress fit PERFECTLY. It is very forgiving if you have a bit of a belly like me. I got a lot of compliments and felt gorgeous in it.

I rented this for a cocktail attire wedding. I was a little concerned about this dress because I am curvy through the hip and thigh. But it was perfect! Plenty of stretch and it never felt too tight. I'm a 34DD and I felt comfortable dancing the whole night. As other reviewers noted, the dress is much more purple than the photo shows. I loved the actual color more.
In a crowd of black wedding guest dresses, this one stood out. Comfortable dress, I wish I could keep it.

links_reviews_title: Had a great night with friends out on the town.
links_reviews_text: Fits great, very comfortable, stretchy material!

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: Fit great and so comfortable! FYI color is a lot more purple than it looks in the photos online. But still beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Amazing wedding in an amazing dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit was great! I’m usually between a 4-6 and ordered the 6. Probably could have fit in the 4 for a more body con look, but the 6 was more comfortable to dance in. Does run long, I’m 5’8” and it hit me mid knee. Side zip can be a tad bulky, but still cute. Loved the bright purple color! I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Would have worked for a wedding
links_reviews_text: It was my second choice for a wedding. I'm a 14 and they only had a 16 and it was a bit too big.

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments about the dress and overall look.
links_reviews_text: True to size, for those with a little tummy, spanx is helpful.

links_reviews_title: The dress was a hit at the wedding. Received complements all night.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 12-14. I gained a few pounds so I ordered the size 16 and 14 as a back up. I think I could have worn the 12. It ran big in the hip area and the fabric where the zipper is kinda stuck out. Other than than that I loved the dress and it was super comfy. The color was absolutely beautiful. I took a picture after the wedding when my heels were off.

I found the dress ran a little large in the hips and I am slightly pear shaped. I sized down and the 2 was perfect. The fabric was thick with good stretch hugging you in all the right places. Tbe darker overlap is a beautiful detail that not only makes the dress interesting but hides any tummy issues. Overall a lovely dress.

This dress is fabulous. Pretty, comfortable, special. I wore the 18 for extra hip room (I'm a pear), but I could have worn the 16. Both dresses looked great on. For reference, I'm 5'3", and the dress came to mid-knee. Im also a 38DD, and was covered and comfortable in a strapless bra. I wore taupe patent sandals and golden pearl drop earrings and necklace as a special - and classy - finish. Perfection!
Dress fit great and was very comfy! Covered my postpartum frump and I was able to use my breast pump easily without having to take the whole thing off. Perfect dress for a wedding!

I wore this to Christmas with my family this year. it's a beautiful dress - great color, flattering style, and very comfortable. the stretchy fabric helps with all that. I loved the dress and was sad I could only wear it once.
I LOVED THIS DRESS!!! I got so many compliments. The color is beautiful and it was so comfortable. The fabric is really nice quality too. I would definitely wear this dress again!

links_reviews_title: This dress was great! The color pops & you will stand out.
links_reviews_text: I ordered two sizes: the smaller was slightly snug in the hip, the larger was slightly larger in the top. I wore the larger because it was more flattering. I wore a one strap bra and it looked fine, didn’t show at all. It was honestly the best I ever looked. Wish I could add photo but size is too large.
Perfect fit - great for dancing and eating all the cake!

links_reviews_title: An okay dress...I ended up not wearing it.
links_reviews_text: As some others mentioned, the hips were baggy as was the dress overall. Color is actually very purple, not pink.
Very flattering, goes to the knees and it very classy.
The dress was great! I got a ton of compliments. It was true to size and fit well.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress and color. Would rent it again!
links_reviews_text: Great dress! I'm normally a 4 and fit into a 2. Loved it and would absolutely recommend it! Loved the color.

This dress was so comfortable to wear. It hit perfectly slightly below my knees. I am 5'3" and the original dress I rented was way too long. The fabric is stretchy and soft making this dress really nice to wear. The one shoulder scared me a little bit it's cut so perfectly that it didn't slip or slide at all. Overall this was the most comfortable I've ever felt at a wedding. I highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, not made for narrow hips.
links_reviews_text: Wanted this dress to work however it was too big in the hips and puckered out after zipping the dress up. Normally wear a 2 and ordered a 4 as a back up instead of a 0 but perhaps that would have worked better. Would recommend to those who have more hips and a booty (not me).

links_reviews_title: This dress was beautiful and fit perfectly!
links_reviews_text: I liked the thicker straps and the soft texture of the dress.
Didn’t actually wear this anywhere. Just wanted to wear it. Nicest dress I’ve ever worn.
This gown is gorgeous. The chest is tight so I needed to wear a 12. I normally wear an 8. The pattern is very beautiful and I received lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a black tie optional wedding!
links_reviews_text: I loved the dress! It was perfect for a black tie optional wedding. The cut was flattering on my 10 weeks post partum body - higher waist, great neckline and flowy silk. Love the dress!!

I absolutely love this dress! The print was gorgeous and the fit was very flattering. Though the top fit well for me without a bra (34B), it was very fitted and may be snug on women with larger chests. Overall, I loved this dress and will be renting again.
I got this to see if I'd want to wear for a future event. It's such a beautiful fabric both in design, cut, and fabric itself. It's very long and you'll need to wear heels. I love this dress!

links_reviews_title: Really amazing dress but the bust area definitely runs small.
links_reviews_text: Had to order 2 sizes up

I am a size 12 but have a small chest - A or B - and the top of a size 12 in this dress was quite big on me, and I had to be very creative with my bra to wear the dress without it falling off of me. I should have sized down to a 10. I imagine all of the "size up!!" reviews have a much larger chest than I do! I am 5'11" and the dress nearly hits the floor when I am wearing 3" heels.
I liked this dress a lot but didn't actually wear it because it was too long (even with heels). Everywhere else it fit perfectly. Would recommend if you're 5'6"+
Size up 5 sizes. I'm a 4 and an 8 wouldn't even zip. Not sure what sizing this designer based their sizing off of but make sure you size up a lot.
LOVED this maxi. The square neckline was very interesting. I loved the print on the dress. I got a lot of compliments all day long. I would rent again
I literally couldn't zip This dress up And didn't wear bc the bodice is teeny tiny! I usually wear a 4 and this couldn't zip up
Gorgeous gown, however too small. I'll have to return and get a larger size.

This dress was beautiful and I got lots of compliments. I had a hard time with the sizing because of the UK vs US sizing and the reviews saying that it ran small. Based on other reviews I initially got a 12R and 14R which were way to big. Thankfully, RTR is amazing and I got the smaller size (my usual) in plenty of time to wear to my event. It was very long and I definitely had to wear heels and be careful walking and dancing, but it was beautiful and comfortable and I got a lot of compliments.

This dress was beautiful on and I LOVED the length for my tall frame. The print is lovely in person. The 12 R fit me ok (typically wear a 6), but the straps were a bit too long and kept falling off my shoulders. I probably could have fit into a 10R, but I was worried about it being too tight in the bust. I wore a strapless with the 12R and would have likely been able to wear the 10R without a bra. Overall, though, I really loved this dress.
Unusual and very pretty pattern with well-fitted bodice. Skirt is lovely, but quite long. Would probably work best for those 5'6" and taller--would still need to wear heels!

links_reviews_title: Not for girls with strong shoulders
links_reviews_text: Super cute and beautiful besides that I couldn't zip the top and it was VERY tight in the arm pits because I have broad shoulders

links_reviews_title: I was not able to wear it.
links_reviews_text: It was about a foot too long, no size heels could have been used with these for me!
Got so many complimentS, made me look very skinny!

links_reviews_title: Too big. Wish I ordered 2 sizes down
links_reviews_text: Overall nice fabric. Would have been cute if it fit

links_reviews_title: Fit Great. Got several compliments. Felt very formal.
links_reviews_text: True to size

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, but way too long. Did not wear.
links_reviews_text: I do not have a photo, because I did not end up wearing this because it is so, so long. If you are under 5'8", do not rent. I thought I would be fine because I had very high heels, but there was just no way I could wear this dress. I have rented from RTR many times before and always had a great experience, but this was my first (and most likely last) full-length gown. At 5'5", I am worried that none of their long gowns will ever fit me. As for size, this dress is very tight on the top and in odd sizes. I normally wear a size 4, but the 10R fit me perfectly in top area. But again, just way too long. Also skirt is very heavy so make the length even harder to deal with.
too long

links_reviews_title: This dress was stunning and also so comfortable to wear. Definitely size up. I Typically wear a 4
links_reviews_text: The drape of this dress moves beautifully. When I first took it out I thought it would feel heavy or be cumbersome to move in, but it felt light once on and was so comfortable. I'm 5' 9" and wore 2in heels with it so it could be challenging for someone more petite. Definitely size up! I almost always wear a 4 and couldn't even zip the 8. I ended up wearing the 10 which was perfect
Really beautiful dress. Received complements all night. I am a little over 5'8 and would imagine it would be too long for most (I was in 3" heels and it hit the floor). Loved it.

links_reviews_title: I ended up returning this dress and did not wear.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress with a luxurious drape. It was very comfortable and looked great on me. I returned it without wearing because it was just too long.
Tight in the bust. Pretty, but dressier than I thought it would be. Would be perfect for a summer wedding or garden party.

links_reviews_title: Stunning but not for short waisted ladies
links_reviews_text: Fabulous dress, love the fabric. Unfortunately, the straps were just too long for me. I needed it for a work event and couldn't risk a wardrobe malfunction. Will be dreaming about it though

links_reviews_title: I felt like the bust was tight and low and the straps were much too long. It just didn't fit well
links_reviews_text: I am short waisted and a true size 10. It was way too long ( I am 5'5') Loved the material though.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Spring Formal Affair
links_reviews_text: Be warned this dress is long. I am 5'11" and had to wear heels and even then had to pull the skirt up to walk. Also go with the size of the upper half of your body since the lower portion is so flowy. I have been in a 12 with some dresses and this one fit really well in a 10 (this is the translated sizing I'm referencing). I loved that I could wear a regular bra too. I wore this to an outdoor black tie wedding and fit right in that window of not looking too overdone but also fancy enough. Would definitely rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress and fabric! Very flattering fit.
links_reviews_text: It is very long!!! The length plus style adds a lot of fabric to the dress so it is heavy to wear but fun to twirl around!

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing this dress. The top part was not flattering.
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing this dress. The top part was not flattering.

This is a gorgeous dress. I had to wear my highest heels so this wouldn't drag. I skipped the bra because it held me in enough. Super flattering. Wore under a leather jacket for date night but could totally wear on its own to something more formal.
This dress is so beautiful but so, so long! The print is wonderful, its so comfortable, just VERY long
At 5’6 with 4.5 inch heels on, this dress just barely still grazed the floor. So, keep that in mind if you are shorter. It is a gorgeous dress that got multiple compliments during the night.

links_reviews_title: Really nice fabric and great fit for lenghty small chested girls
links_reviews_text: There is no give to the fabric, and the top fits fairly snug. The straps sit wide on the shoulders, a little like they might fall down. I would recommend sizing up and I wouldn't recommend this for anybody with a larger chest. At 5'10" I can wear it perfectly with flats but anything more than a kitten heel would make the dress too short.
True to size! This dress was sexy and sophisticated. The designs on the dress are very cool.

Wish I had a better pic because the dress was truly stunning in person. Paired with sheer black hose, red stiletto booties and an oversized green teddy coat - all came together to keep it seasonally appropriate for a winter wedding. It is very floaty and lovely - ALMOST too floaty, as I struggled with static cling GREATLY, but rubbed a dryer sheet over my tights to keep the dress from clinging. The inner slip part of the dress was a little awkward-feeling but overall fit is true to size.

I wore this dress for a campaign to promote Cocoa Beach, Florida on my blog @katrinabellebeauty. The dress fit perfectly and looks so pretty when you twirl! It is light enough for the summer but gives full coverage. Definitely a favorite of mine!

I really loved wearing this dress to my friend's rehearsal dinner (cocktail attire). I was worried initially that it looked a bit frumpy (it's definitely not a dress that shoes off curves) but the minute I put on heels I felt great in this dress. The material hung really nicely on my curves without being form fitting. I would rent this again!
It's a great summer dress light and flowery but I ordered a size too big. Are used it for a photo shoot and returned it I might re-order it in a size 4 instead

love the flowy material, my husband loved it. And i got lots of compliments Id say it's true to size. The only thing, the material is very thin and see-through, so i'd recommend wear it at night or at a beach setting
This dress is super easy to wear and looks great on. It is a little see through so don't wear bright underwear! I still loved wearing it.
Didn't end up wearing this as it was a bit too dressy for my night out but I'll rent it again with the right occasion! The print is really unique but the ruffles and layering is very chic.
I absolutely LOVE this dress! The cut of it is gorgeous, as is the print. It is a bit thin, so I suggest wearing a "body spanx" piece and strapless bra underneath.

Absolutely stunning dress! Fits so well and we very easy to style! Wore to work throughout the day then swapped into higher heeled boots for a date that night! Love love love will definitely rent again
Loved this dress--it's super fun and very flattering! It hugged my waist a little bit but was still comfortable! Would rent again for sure!

links_reviews_title: I received tons of compliments about this dress. It was comfortable, perfect for dancing!
links_reviews_text: This dress has layered pieces! Make sure the slip underneath is down.

Rented this for a Fall wedding - absolutely LOVED it. I wasn't super crazy about the pattern but it looks so much better on. The material was really delicate/great quality and the draping fit my body just right. The off the shoulder sleeve made the fit more interesting, and the slight ruffle in the front covered my slightly problematic tummy area perfectly. Got tons of compliments - will probably rent again!

One of my favorite RTR rentals -- regret I didn't take a better photo. At a time where everyone else is wearing solid-color body con dresses (in fact, I rented this dress as a backup for one of those dresses), this one really stands out. The silk looks and feels high-end (it retails for $2,000+, after all) and the ruffles and hemline are really flattering; there's a bit of a slit for your leg as you walk. I wore it with the sleeve off, personally, with gold sandals and a maroon clutch.

links_reviews_title: Wearing a 2k dollar dress to lunch!
links_reviews_text: This dress is AMAZING ! The silk chiffon is so beautiful and floats. Elegant, sexy and classy. No zippers, can size down if you want a tighter fit. I kept for a week and wore three times, with sandals and heels.

Wore this to a wedding. Received NWT! When I put it on, I liked it but wasn't overly impressed. However, I received a ton of compliments both in person and later when there was a picture of it online. So many wanted to "borrow" it. Wasn't expecting that. I was expecting the cold shoulder sleeve to bug me but it wasn't restrictive. A bit low cut. Didn't use Hollywood tape and it was still fine (though I'm fairly small chested). I'm getting quite the tummy and this hid it nicely. Would definitely recommend for anyone wanting to camo trouble spots and still look on trend.

I loved this look and fit of this dress enough to wear it twice- once to a rehearsal dinner in NC and again a week later at a CA mountain-side wedding. I'm 6months pregnant and the ruffles hid what currently looks like a beer belly and the cut at the top hilighted the newfound tatas (fashion tape recommended). The print on this is more interesting than it originally appears- the flower stems are traces of legs (get it?!) and the one off the shoulder sleeve is super fun (and not annoying). The only thing I noticed was that in bright light there's one side of the dress that doesn't have a second layer/extra ruffles so it's see through (you could see my underwear pretty clearly only on that one hip), so you know, plan around that. Regardless, would rent again if I didn't already wear it twice in a row!
Awesome fit and subtle but cool pattern
I LOVED this dress. It was so comfy and flowy, and showed just the right amount of cleavage. I would highly recommend and I would even rent this again because I liked it so much!!

Great dress. Wore it to a cocktail party and poolside cocktail party in Miami. The lining is very short and you may want to wear more coverage underneath. I am small on top so I ordered a 2 and my typical size is 2-4.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my friends engagement party
links_reviews_text: The dress is cute. The slip underneath is very very short and rides up a lot. It's not too noticeable because the dress does have a lot of layers but I did end up wearing an extra slip under

links_reviews_title: The initial size I ordered for a dress wasn't shipped and this other dress was sent instead.
links_reviews_text: Pretty see-through. Did not feel comfortable wearing it and again, the straps were not adjustable so it hanged lower than my bust.

links_reviews_title: The fabric felt great and got a lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: If you're like me with a smaller bust (34A), you will have to either double stick tape the top or keep adjusting throughout the night. Otherwise everything else fit like a glove!

links_reviews_title: LOVED this dress. Wore it to many events.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fabric, lovely fit. Felt very special every time I wore it.

Pros. Beautiful fabric and great design feels like you are wearing nothing, was perfect during the heat wave keeping me cool and stylish. Con. Shoulder straps are not adjustable which was frustrating. Front neckline is quite deep and kept on showing my strapless bra. Other than that it is a great dress. I would rent it again.
Fits good, comfortable to wear

Absolutely love this dress! Quality is incredible and I felt so glamorous. I got compliments all night! Important thing to take note of though... the dress has no structure and is very delicate. The lightness of the dress was perfect for my event (outdoor wedding on a 90 degree day) but I had been expecting a dress with a little more heft.
I loved this dress because I didn't have to wear a bra but the skirt underneath was too short so you could see my butt in the sun. I had to sneakily wear nude boy shorts.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a hot night as the fabric is very thin. Its fun & different.Be aware you need a slip
links_reviews_text: Hard to wear a bra with, and is slightly see through.
This dress is very cute, and perfect for weddings. I have to return though because the top runs large. I think it was designed for ladies with larger tops #weddingguest
Loved everything about this dress. I wore it to as many things as I could before returning it. And this is my second time renting it!

links_reviews_title: This dress is entirely see through.
links_reviews_text: I would have preferred if the dress provided a slip underneath and the layering at the bottom was not overdone.
This dress is more like an overlay. You definitely need to wear a slip underneath because it is very sheer. I also wore with leggings. I love the cut and it had a very nice flow
beautiful feel to the dress...but very, very sheer..so be prepared! SLip part under dress is very short
not good for pear shaped petite

Fits very well, length is nice, bust fits me a bit tight and I have a small chest, so would size up if you have a larger bra size and normally wear an 8, because the fabric is a silk chiffon and has no give at all. The fabric is a bit itchy, which is why I gave it a 4.
dress is great but under-skirt too short, did not cover my butt. dress is sheer and I had to wear my husband's long boxer shorts under it to feel dressed.
Loved dress, very forgiving midsection. Thought about purchasing

Really liked this dress for the flowy and fun print and the unique silhouette. Loved the draping on the shoulder! Wish that the length was a bit longer, but it was a great dress to wear and super comfortable. As others noted, it's rather sheer on the bottom (I wore a black shapewear skirt underneath).
Didn't wear. The v-neckline of this dress hits in the middle of your chest. It made my chest feel truncated and weird.

Absolutely loved this unique piece from the pattern to the design! Like other reviewers mentioned, the straps were too large for my small bust but with some fashion tape I tried to make it work. Also a heads up there is a fairly high and long slit that would blow up with large winds. But otherwise a fun one time wear, perfect for RTR unlimited members as this is something that I wouldn't likely purchase or have tried for myself otherwise!

I'm between an 8 and 10. The size 10 dress fit comfortable and great silk fabric however the top was too big for my 36b and kept falling down. So I tied the two string loops inside the top together in the back so the top stayed put. Once I did that I felt great in it, danced and moved comfortably and didn't need to wear a bra.

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for busty babes!
links_reviews_text: After reading other reviews, I was a bit worried about how the chest would fit. To my surprise, the fit was absolutely perfect! I received compliments the entire night. I'm even considering renting it for another wedding later in the summer!

This dress is even prettier in person. Like other reviews have said, it's low cut, but with enough fabric to tape the girls in without allowing freedom for the side boob. It runs true to size, except maybe a bit small in the waist, but not so tight you can't eat or breathe - just a nice slimming effect! Definitely a great dress for dancing.

links_reviews_title: If you're big on top and skim through the hips, then this is the dress for you
links_reviews_text: The 4 was too tight in the hips and the 6 too large in the bust. I'm usually a 4, pretty solid. The photo shows me in the 6, boobs flopping out all over the place. I'm busty but not broad. I'm hour-glass-ish. It's a cool dress - neat idea and unique. Made for someone with a broader shoulder / back and smaller hips.
Love the fit!

links_reviews_title: This dress is a spring dream!
links_reviews_text: The 100% silk fabric is gorgeous and the patterns coordinate beautifully. The "band" that encases one's waist has zero give and the top is a bit large and required garment tape, but I have no complaints about this dress. It is stunning. Hope you aren't looking for the size 2 because I'm keeping it for a while!

I absolutely loved this dress. The flowers at the shoulders make it stand out even more so I definitely make sure you show those off! It fit me almost perfectly. The bust area was rather big and I'm a 32D. I used double sided tape and it was fine after that. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, floaty dress perfect for a tropical destination
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a dinner during a trip to Mexico and it fit the bill perfectly. The floral design was really pretty and girly, while the flowing skirt felt very ethereal.

I love this trendy dress by AMUR! Running true to size with no stretch at the midsection, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection, very loose in the arm openings, and flowing at the hips. It works for cup sizes A-D. Yout able to wear a standard bra with this dress if it is low cut, otherwise I recommend no bra and double-sided tape. At 5’4”, the length hit the knee at the highest point and tea length at the lowest on me. The pattern on the dress is amazing in person florals on the shoulders make it unique. Pair with black, nude, or colorful heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous girly statement dress with exceptional quality and style
links_reviews_text: Love this dress, didn't want to give it back. I chose to dress it with a belted blazer over it. Many people thought it was just a gorgeous skirt, until I took off the blazer later that night. Super soft material, this brand makes high quality pieces that are worth every penny. I'll definitely be renting this again (pls don't buy it and take it out of rotation!!)

links_reviews_title: Fun dress but sleeves were too big
links_reviews_text: I loved everything about this dress from the waist down but the straps were very loose. The patterns are fun and the skirt is perfect. I was afraid the straps would fall down so I didn't end up wearing it.

This dress was gorgeous, super flattering, and well constructed! I loved the way it flowed and the perfectly sexy but tasteful slit. I wore it to church on a beautiful sunny Florida day then to downtown St Pete for brunch before doing a sunset photoshoot in it! I can't wait to get the photos back I saw them from off the camera and they are so pretty!!

I wanted to love this dress but unfortunately the fit wasn't right for my body type. I have wide hips so it was a little tight on the hips but the top was super loose, probably better for someone with bigger boobs. The fabric is absolutely stunning and the print is too!
Loved this! The slit in front was pretty high for me as a tall girl. I have gained some winter weight, so I would try again in an 8 when I am smaller.
loose on the top, tight around the waist

links_reviews_title: Material looked like "Granny Curtains"... the photos are misleading
links_reviews_text: Apologies... but the dress does not look like the photos. The material is very flimsy and not flattering. I really had hoped the dress would be great for a casual garden wedding. No luck...

links_reviews_title: It was for a cocktail event and I loved it.
links_reviews_text: The only complaint that I have is the straps are big. They will fall off of you don't have any boobs

I usually wear a size 8 but have maybe had too much fun this summer. I ordered both the 8 and thank goodness I ordered the 10 too, as that is the size that fitted best. I am broad shouldered with a C-cup so the top part of the dress was mostly good. It was a little baggy under the arms so I used double sided 'fashion tape' to tape the dress to my body. It DEFINITELY shows a lot of cleavage. The bodice part on me was VERY tight. Luckily it didn't look tight but it was tighter than I am used to wearing. The skirt part was fun for dancing.

links_reviews_title: Cute cute dress. Great for Mexican vacation!

links_reviews_text: Beautiful, boho, feminine flare. Too tight in the waist. Big in the shoulders. Not a great fit for me....but really pretty. Wish It couldve worked. Sorry for not posting a picture....would've been scandalous:)

links_reviews_title: Good for bust and small hips
links_reviews_text: I should have listened to everyone else's reviews. This is bad if you have wide hips and a small bust. I didn't end up wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Not a great look, in person
links_reviews_text: Too low cut. the poofs on the shoulders looked affected, the floral design and fabric were not helpful.
Cute dress but I could not wear it. I ordered a size 4 and it was a bit small (couldn't zip up fully). Luckily I had another beautiful dress that I rented as a backup!
Great looking dress... just a little long of straps so used tape to keep it from opening in the busy area. Lots of compliments though!
Love the fabric and style but it fits very small in the top. I'm usually a very true 0 and wear a 32D and I couldn't even zip it all the way.

I wish I could say I loved it. It's a beautiful dress but I just didn't feel comfortable in it. I was constantly adjusting the straps ; I felt like the top part just didn't fit right. I did get compliments but I would rather wear something I am not self-conscious in. Bummer.

links_reviews_title: Too tight through the ribs. I'm a 10/12 and this dress in size 12 was too tight through the ribcage
links_reviews_text: Unforgiving through the ribcage. Really weird gaping at the underarms/ sides of breasts.

links_reviews_title: Such a pretty dress but the top part was baggy on me. I'm a 34 C and straps wouldn't stay up.
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress, the top is just unusually big.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a bridal luncheon, and received countless compliments!
links_reviews_text: #bridalluncheon

links_reviews_title: I love this dress however I was not able to wear it because the straps were to big.. I was very sad
links_reviews_text: The fit was fine except for the straps, if I could have made a slight adjustment on the straps I could have worn it. I had to go with something I already had. I’d like to buy this dress and make that correction
I'm a busty gal, but this is cut for someone who is tall with VERY broad shoulders. Unwearable for me, which is a shame because the fabric is so beautiful and romantic.
I loved this dress. It was so comfortable and so pretty! I am usually a 6 but this designer I wear a 4, and it fit perfect!
Overall this was too large in the bust and created a slumping effect. Even going down to size I fear it wouldn't fit me in the right places. Returning to swap out for something else

Very large in the chest. Fit me in the hips and wait but the chest was meant for women with a bit mor on top than I have. I'm very bottom heavy so I have to usually buys dresses up a size to fit so if you are more proportional this dress may work well for you! It was beautiful and I was sad to not wear it.
Fit great! I'm pretty much always an 8 but i read the reviews so I got a 10. Only issue was that the sleeves were a bit big and kept falling off. Good tape would def. of been good to have.
Fit true to size, but was a little big in the top. I wore a plunge bra and that worked to help with the fit.

links_reviews_title: Easy fast first time, great experience
links_reviews_text: This dress is stunning. I'm 5'3" and all legs. Such a shame I didn't get to wear this since the torso of the dress was cut so long. Would have to buy and alter 2-3 inches off the shoulder. Otherwise, perfect.
The straps were very long and kept falling down so I ended up wearing a different dress. But thought the cut was very cute and flattering.

I am usually a 10 in dresses, wider @ the hip/butt region and ordered a 12 thinking this would work as it seemed fitted in other photos and wanted to give myself some room. I couldn't even get it over my hips sadly. It was beautiful and such a fantastic fabric, but do not get if you are even remotely hourglass!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress -- easy to wear and flowy yet work appropriate
links_reviews_text: I wore this to work and then at home. Overall great dress. I'm 5'7.5" and it was not touching the floor but still pretty long. The slit was great -- not too high and not too frumpy. I wore with tights and boots at work.

The fit was really strange on this dress. Like, the waist down fit perfect, but the top half was way too big. I'm a 34DD and was swimming in it, and it kept sliding off my shoulders. I sent it straight back.

I wore this to a black-tie optional wedding in the winter in Dallas. I thought this dress was very easy to wear. I did use a little bit of fashion tape to help keep my cleavage covered. I really liked the slit in the leg and the asymmetric lines. I would wear this again!

Got both the S and the M size and went with the small as the medium was too loose and a bit shapeless. Small worked great though! Slightly tight / clingly at the thigh / butt area but overall a great dress!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments but complicated dress
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my husbands work holiday party. I really loved the color, the fit on the top and the lightweight material (perfect for wearing indoors during cold winter months). I didn't love the slit and how tight the dress was through the middle/thighs, it made it a bit complicated to go to the bathroom, dance, etc. it was fine to wear once and really did get a lot of compliments! Just not easiest dress to throw on and forget about.
Loveddddddd this dress! I thought it was kinda weird at first, but then once you get your heels on all the wonky lines look so perfect. Very slimming. And makes your booty look amazing! Haha
Loved the long sleeved look and semi low cut front. The medium would have for perfect but the large gave some extra movement without looking too big.
This dress was incredible. Rented it for a client's portrait session, and it fit her perfectly. The color was beautiful, the material was great, and we all loved it!!

This dress is super comfortable and would be easy to dance in. The button that holds the chest area closed is a little strange and it kind of shows. Still it's a super comfortable dress. It's definitely classy. I didn't wear it though as I wanted something that had a wow factor.

This is a beautiful dress and I think they wanted it to be a bit baggy, but it was too much. I was swimming in it! If they had an XXS I think this dress would have been perfect so 4 stars seems appropriate.
I rented this for a 70's party but would wear this anywhere. I got so many compliments. Great dress.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear, too small in hips
links_reviews_text: Could've been really cute! Wished it had some stretch.
Fit was a little weird. It fit great in the sleeves, big in the bust, and tight in the waist.
Hugs tightly to back end and hips, overall pretty.

links_reviews_title: Backup style worked for rehearsal dinner
links_reviews_text: I originally ordered this as my backup style but ended up wearing it to the rehearsal dinner the night before the wedding. This dress is probably true to size but not the perfect style for my body. The top fit fine, if not a little large, but the butt area was really tight. You can't really tell from the photos but it has a fitted lower waist and hip. You can wear a normal bra with it which is great. Length is long. I wore regular length and still had to wear 3 inch heels (I am 5'7").
For my size/build the dress was slightly big everywhere. Overall a nice conservative dress to wear. Good for a dressy evening dinner.

links_reviews_title: Fun flowy gown that is still casual enough for a day out.
links_reviews_text: Wore for a fun day out and nice dinner for my BFs birthday. Since this is not stretchy & I have a large chest, you can see the front pulled a little. There is a button at the top opening, but I needed a second pin to hold the middle of the front closed. Everything else was great, felt so fancy walking around on a Friday-day in a gown :) Looked great with black tights and flat booties.
Loved how this fit. Was quite flattering and a bit of sexiness w/the slit. The slit wasn't too high, though, so I didn't have to worry about exposing myself.
Comfortable and chic highly recommended

links_reviews_title: It was just like I thought it would look.
links_reviews_text: Dress was nice but not recommended if you have big waist.
This was my backup dress. Didn’t end up wearing it but it’s a gorgeous dress. Runs true to size. I’m 5’4, 126 lbs and could wear the XS. Little long, but with heels it was fine!

I wore this to a black tie event. It is comfortable and flows. The waist has no stretch so it was a bit tight there. I am typically a size 12 in a dress with a midriff that is more than I would like. I had to pin the neckline as there is a button but it was a bit too low for me and it did not feel secure. I am 5'2" and it did drag a bit with about a 2.5 inch heel. the slit is a nice addition and it is not too high. Overall a beautiful color, conservative dress with some fun. It stood out in a sea of black gowns.
Did not wear this dress as it was a little too loose for the look I wanted. I am 118lbs, slim/athletic and 5'8".

Received many compliments, as the dress fit really well in all the right places. I was a little surprised how long the small was, as I'm 5'7 and it was still slightly long on me. Overall fun dress and very comfortable!
Fits tight around the mid section. I usually wear a 4/6, and it was snug. Hard to figure out how it was supposed to lay, but otherwise very pretty dress, just size up!

It runs a little long over all. I am 5'4'' and even with 3 inch heels it dragged on the floor. Additionally, the torso was very long and the lower back cutout bunched up and made it appear as though there was a hole in the dress. Ultimately I decided not to wear it for these reasons.

links_reviews_title: Wore this out to dinner one night on vacation
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! It definitely runs true to size and the fabric is a bit light. It's also a tad short if you are a tall girl wearing heels but overall great summer dress!
Fit well and was flattering on my pear shape. It has a nice hook at cleavage so I wasn't hanging out!
Fun and flirty floral dress for the springtime. The pink color was bright and covered in small white flowers. Perfect length. Can easily be dressed up or down.
I'm petite and the regular size fit me perfectly! It's a great light summer dress. I got so many compliments on the color and fit!

This dress is super cute! I was looking for a bright dress to wear for my first day of school and knew this was it! I ironed this dress (after the picture was taken) and it looked perfect, however it wrinkled very quickly. I wish it wouldn't wrinkle because then I would rent again or maybe even buy!

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved this dress. It was so girly, comfy, and cute. Would definitely rent again.
links_reviews_text: Quality fabric.
Loved this cute dress. I'm tall and it's long enough. And quite flattering.

I wore this for a baby shower and received many compliments. It was a little shorter than I expected, so not work appropriate for taller women (I'm 5'8'). Perfect for a summer shower or fancy brunch because it has very light, non restrictive fabric. I felt cool and free to move around.
Dress is such a gem! Size down for sure, usually a 0-2 and the 00 fit perfectly. Can't wait to keep wearing!

This is a great dress for a casual date night or a casual Saturday about town. It's super comfy and flattering since it's a wrap dress (ie adjustable and cinched at the waist). The colors and print are great for when you want to feel extra girly.
Great for summer. I wore to baby shower. Easy access for breastfeeding if you need it.
This was a little short for work, and likely needed a slip, but it was so light and comfortable that I really have no complaints!!
I rented this dress for a special event! This floral pink dress fit like a glove, the flirty style kept me confident and I loved the ruffles! I would buy this dress!

I wore this dress for a day of wine tasting at vineyards outside - one warning I have is this dress is very flimsy and flies up without warning because it's so light so do not wear it on a windy day. Other than that the dress was cute and had a modesty clip at the bust (which didn't always help but there was a folded over piece of material that also covered your top).
Lightweight but not sheer. Hook and eye closure helps prevent spillage.
This dress was a cute fabric but just ok.
This dress was cute and really flattering. Just be warned it's not lined and I would not recommend it for a windy day. Waist was a little snug for a 6, but not by much.
This dress is so fun!! It's a little tight across the bust but I am a 38 E so if you're full busted size up!

This was one of my favorite rentals Fits true to size was a little short but I still wore it I wore a cami since it was a little low Such a beautiful color almost a periwinkle pink Light weight felt like wearing a nighty May buy it perfect For summer vacation
Great dress!
Felt so girly and sweet in this dress. Even tho the dress has obviously been worn in, I still felt romantic. Got a lot of smiles in this dress.
Nice color, lightweight material. Wrinkles easily. Traveled on the plane all day, worked well.
Fun floral dress. True to size and clasp at top makes it appropriate for work. My only qualm is that the material is thin which requires nude undergarments, a light jacket, and an iron!
Went up a size based on reviews and still didn't fit. Went back the next day. The hook to keep it closed was hanging on by a thread. Was hoping for a fun weekend dress.
Runs true to size. Slowly and lightweight. Used it for work and dinner after.
Cute dress. Was a little tight right under chest but I just had a baby.

links_reviews_title: Very light fabric, would dare not to wear this on a windy day!!
links_reviews_text: Very light fabric, but cute to wear out on a date or a meeting with friends. Too low cut and thin material for work, but still cute. I'll wear it once during my rental.

links_reviews_title: cute dress. Looks good with heels & flats.
links_reviews_text: pretty

links_reviews_title: ABSOLUTELY PERFECT! Wore to a work conference I was hosting for 100 people. Looked great while I ran
links_reviews_text: ABSOLUTELY PERFECT! Wore to a work conference I was hosting for 100 people. Looked great while I ran around backstage. Comfy, looks pulled together, had no problem with top fit or skirt length. A total winner in my book.

Easy and breezy! Wore this out and about in Nashville. Received lots of compliments. It photographs beautifully. Also, it was 106 heat index the day I wore this dress, and it was perfect for the day, as we did several outdoor activities.
Such a fun summer dress a little brighter in person. A bit tighter than other wrap dresses but perfect for casual going out nights or days.

I rented this to go to dinner with friends and really loved the cut and style. If you have a larger bust (I do) the clasp on the front isn't work, but the fabric folded nicely to hide the clasp and i wore it more open. The stretch on the back was fully stretched in a 16 (largest size) so I wore a jacket over it and got tons of compliments! It's also a good length. I am 5'9 with a long torso and it hit mid thigh, but closer to my knee. Definitely recommend and will most likely rent again!
Note the fabric wrinkles easily
Fit perfectly very flattering.
Cute and girly! True to size.

I'm normally size 8, but wear a 6 at J. Crew. This dress, I could've gone with the 8. It fit, but was a touch too low cut for work. The pattern and color are adorable. If I rent again, I will go up to the size 8.
Very comfortable and light material making it perfect for the summer
cotton, light, good for summer, casual days or dates
just right fit
Might be nice for beach or night out. Too short for work and thin material. Nice dress though

links_reviews_title: This Dress is pretty and fun and stands out at a party!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress and got so many compliments on it. It does run small and it does show any bulges, so plan on wearing spanx type undergarments and even then be careful because the size small even showed the spanx lines on me. I ended up wearing the medium. I am surprised that I would wear a medium, I'm on the smaller side and pretty fit but this is fitted and clings. The medium was a tiny bit wide at the armholes and gaped slightly but not enough to worry about. The metallic threading is nice. I wore this to a 50th birthday dance party in downtown Chicago and paired it with black suede boots so it was more fun for clubs than dressy heels, plus it was single digit temps in January that night which kept my toes warmer! I happened to have a great necklace that was black beads that was a good compliment to the dress...but the dress doesn't need a necklace. The pleats stand up and out a little and I saw the review that said it made the person feel too big. I sort of understand that, but honestly, it's such a fun part of the dress...it actually makes the dress unique, so I didn't worry about that. I'm really glad I tried this dress, it was a little "risky" for me fashion wise, but that is part of the fun of renting something for a special event.
Wore this for a girls night out and got tons of compliments! Fit well and was really comfortable
Love this dress! Super comfortable and flattering!
Loved the fit and look. I couldn't wear a bra with it but it was ok.
Loved everything about this dress! The fabric the cut and the colors. It is very flattering but also shows your belly if you are bloated. Would highly recommend
It was perfect if you have a little stomach you might would like a size larger
This dress was super easy to wear and very flattering. It is form fitting so I wore Spanx underneath it. Got a million compliments and danced the night away.
Used the dress for a brunch party. Got a lot of compliments.
This wasn't my favorite fit. The dress was super tiny and very short. I wore it over leather leggings and a pair of booties. Cute but probably best in sunrise without curves.

links_reviews_title: Don't think twice just rent it!
links_reviews_text: This dress is fun and flirty but still classy. Just the right amount of movement and sparkle. Highly recommend!
Easy to wear. Shows off legs well. Bra will show around armpits so need to wear tinier bra
I was weary they sent a large, normally I wear size 6, but it fit like a glove! So many compliments, so fun, you can't go wrong with this one! It is stretchy too.
This is a cute dress and I like the idea, but I thought the ruffles made me look bigger/hippier and just fell and stuck out in a kind of funny way so weren't flattering on me.
Such a fun dress! Pleats and sparkle make this such a unique dress, perfect to transition to fall in! Great for a party or date night!

I LOVE this dress! Received compliments all night long! Very comfortable, the material is substantial without being heavy. The pleated uneven bottom is simply fantastic and makes the dress unique. It could be styled with a black jacket and some black boots or fun booties for a more casual look, or with some glitzy jewelry and heels for a more dressed up look. I wore black sequined (green, red, silver) and beaded platforms and WOW did that elevate the dress! My husband thought I looked HOT, which is always nice to hear! I would definitely rent this dress again and am searching the internet so I can own it! I'm 5'5" and at the time I wore this dress my measurements were chest 34B (small busted though), waist 27" and hips/butt at biggest area 38.5" and I weighed in at 127 lbs. The dress hem hit me just a tad higher than mid-thigh but I would not consider it too short, it was actually a perfect length for my liking. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

This dress is absolutely lovely! The material is thick - almost scuba, with a subtle silver sparkle. The pleats are flattering and lie slightly below the hip line. I'm pear shaped and the dress definitely flatters my waist and hips without adding bulk.
Kind of sweater dress material. Thin enough to where you don't get hot. Stretchy fabric. Received tons of compliments

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a night out in NYC for my friend's birthday.
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress. I felt so sexy and confident in it and it fit very well. I usually wear a 2 or 4, more often a 2, and the small was the perfect size. The material was tight and form fitting but was very comfortable and hugged in all the right places. Would have bought this dress if it was a little more affordable!

links_reviews_title: The lines of this dress are perfectly elegant and sexy. It was perfect for a high end night in Vegas
links_reviews_text: Fits like a tailored glove and is comfortable. Flatters athletic body types. I am a runner and it showed off my legs nicely, while balancing well with my small bust and strong arms. It fit like it was made for my body type.
This is a really cute and unique dress. It's definitely for fall/winter in my opinion. The material and sparkles would feel weird in warmer weather. You do have to make sure the pleats fall properly
Fit great and was very comfortable. Loved how it was shorter in the front and longer int he back, but subtly.

links_reviews_title: So pretty - great for cocktail attire or fancier rehearsal dinner!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. It was perfect for my best friends rehearsal dinner - it was at a fancier restaurant and I was maid of honor so would have rather been over dressed. I'm 5'8" and usually extra small or small is too short on me. This dress was on the verge of being a little too short, but I went with it because it was perfect otherwise. If the small was in stock I bet that would have been perfect. I was surprised the XS even worked for me. But it was really nice and I got tons of compliments that night and on photos!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and sexy for a business dinner event
links_reviews_text: Would rent again

Wore with white Keds to an older family member's at-home retirement party. Always a little insecure about dresses like this riding up, but it seemed fine! Nice stretchy fabric. Felt like good quality.. expensive.

Just felt so fun, flirty, and sexy in this dress. I thought of buying it! The material is quality and it's great for a vacation night out, birthday party, or even happy hour. I didn't wear a jacket with it.

links_reviews_title: Dress is more sparkly in person
links_reviews_text: Loved the style of the dress but unfortunately the fabric was too sparkly for my liking.

links_reviews_title: The endless compliments definitely made my night unforgettable.
links_reviews_text: I'm a glitz and glam type of girl so I was very pleased when I realized that the dress had just the right amount of shine! I'm 4'11 so I usually like my dresses above the knee (I feel like I look older when I wear longer dresses), this dress hit the knee but with the stretchy fit it didn't make me look "older". I'd stick to my actual size (xs) and wear a high heel to make the length look shorter. The stretch makes it comfortable for women with hips but doesn't make women with no hips look boxy. I'd recommend wearing a tee-shirt bra and seamless underwear with this dress because of the stretch. The high neckline and ruffles compliment each other giving the dress a modern vintage look/feel! Overall this dress is a YES!
The sparkles turned this would-be plain Office dress into a knockout!
Super cute

Very rock n roll but it is a warm dress. This was okay since I wore it on a cold night but the fabric is heavy. It's a cute style but I would not rent it again. In pictures it just looks like a grey dress. It's more fun in person. Also, just beware- this dress will not hide any unsightly rolls. In fact it might introduce them to you so ... proceed with caution. I would not call it formal - this is a casual fun dress.

I love it! Only caution: not too friendly with lines and bulges. The fabric is not forgiving! So had to choose a high waisted thong to wear with it. I love the shimmer! Photographs so well! I was concerned about the ruffles at the hips because I didn't want to look larger than I was, but I loved how it looked!

links_reviews_title: I love wearing different clothes and not repeating them.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect, true to size. I am usually size small so this one fits perfect.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress!! Great fabric , easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: Sparkly fun comfortable dress!
Great dress just the material isnt the greatest if you have a pouch belly lol. Had to suck it in. Its not because the dress was tight. It was loose fitting.
Cutest cheerleader type style but very classy. Has a bit of stretch. I wore it with an undershirt and tights only because the weather was freezing. Gorgeous alone as well!!!

links_reviews_title: Sophisticated dress with a fun hemline!
links_reviews_text: This actually wasn't my first choice, but in the end it was probably a better dress for me. I'm 5"1' so the length was perfect - short enough to be flirty, but long enough to sit down without exposing anything. It's a nice, stretchy fabric, and more sparkly than it looks in the pictures. Overall a lovely rental.

I was so surprised to see how sparkly this dress was. I loved that! Paired it with tights and black boots and got tons of compliments! The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 was that it was a tiny bit scratchy.
Petites
True to size, body con, im only 5'4" and couldnt wear it without tights, but that made it a fun sassy tunic perfect for a nice dinner out

I wore this dress to work during the holiday season. It's hard to tell in the pictures, but it's very sparkly and metallic. Being four months postpartum, I had to wear Spanx underneath (it's a little snug in the stomach) but overall I loved it and found it to be very flattering.

I rented this for my rehearsal dinner and it's perfect. The pictures don't do the material and quality of this dress justice! It's light weight so great for warmer weather. Color is more ivory than white. I'm 5' 4" 125lbs and generally a 0 in dresses but ordered a 2 because the 0 wasn't available- but the 2 fits perfectly!

The shape and fit of this is more like a party dress, but I work in a gallery and figured it could work in a professional setting in hot weather and I was right – I think it’s the peplum and the high-quality and intricate details of the dress fabric. The top has a racerback shape that is also that same shape a bit in the front but I wore a nude crossback bralette and while the strap showed a bit on the side in the front, it didn’t really bother me (it was under my hair mostly). I also would have worn it without a bra for a cocktail or weekend party – although white the top is structured enough for it. The fit is close and it fits true to size – there isn’t stretch so if you have any doubts about the waist or bust where it is fitted (the hips are A-line and more forgiving) I would size up.
I wore this dress for work and then dinner with my dad. The bust is cut a little slim on the sides but overall the fit was perfect. I loved the uneven hem line.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress arrived in two days!
links_reviews_text: Wonderful fit, not scratchy, beautiful fabric.

I rented this dress for a baby shower. Unfortunately the baby shower was canceled but i wanted to review the dress anyway. I love that its fitted at the waist because im pretty narrow up and down. The dress fits TTS. I would suggest those adhesive bras with the dress because the arm hole is big and you could see my strapless bra peeking through. I wish i wore this dress somewhere because its beautiful and well made.
Great fit. Light weight. Lovely fabric.
This dress was so amazing. The fabric was really nice. It is light enough for summer and the cut is second to none. Would rent again.
I wanted to make this dress a bit less sweet, so I added the leather jacket. The fit was great. Material very soft and lightweight
