Got lots of compliments on this dress. It's very flattering and the fabric is cool- no stretch tho. Petite ladies, def be prepared to wear heels with it.
Fit was fine but dress was nothing special.

links_reviews_title: Pretty but not for a petite frame
links_reviews_text: Perfect for a long torso

This was very flattering and super comfortable to wear. I got so many compliments on it at my bridal shower. I'm between a 2 and 4 and this fit well; probably could have gone down to the 2 as it stretched slightly throughout the day. Highly recommend.
The dress is really nice. Just the top part was a little bigger by the armpit/shoulder area
Nice quality but chose to wear another option I ordered.

This dress looked like it was made for my body, fit perfectly! The cut/style was very cool and interesting! The only thing I didn't love about the dress was the fabric, it was very flimsy and almost looked worn.

Loved the dress. Loved, loved, loved this dress. So many subtle details that only the wearer will fully appreciate....like little presents the designers created just for you. The delicate way the straps come together at the top of your shoulders, the cut of the bodice, and the flounce of the skirt. Great for highlighting and slim waist. The fabric has enough texture and weight to it that the usual self-consciousness that comes with wearing a white dress isn't an issue. Try this one out. Trust me.
Super flattering. I usually wear a 4 and rented the 6 and it fit perfect. Slightly loose in the chest but I am small so that's why and it wasn't at all noticeable.

links_reviews_title: Adorable romper, be ready to hear the compliments!
links_reviews_text: I wore this romper to my daughters Cheer Banquet. I ordered the size 2 and 4, but went with the 2 (it showed less cleavage) There is no stretch in the rib cage, so if your rib cage area is wide, you may want to order a backup size. The zipper is hard to zip up and down on your own, so keep that in mind when dressing or using the powder room. Overall the fit is cute and comfy (love the pockets!) I will rent this romper again, it's adorable and I received tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: LOVED this romper!! So many compliments and oddly perfect for sternum tattoos.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, very comfortable to wear. It has pockets which is a wonderful bonus.

Great fit, great quality material. I loved the length of the shorts and the boob peek out. Great if you're a little daring and not afraid to show some skin. I received so many compliments in person and from photos. I will definitely rent again.

I needed a little black dress for a bachelorette but had ACL surgery recently and wanted to go with a slightly different take on an LBD. This outfit was SO MUCH FUN! I ordered a 6 and 8 and wore the 8 with pasties instead of a bra. Would definitely wear it again!

Loved this option! Based on the other reviews, I went with the 6, though I could've probably worn the 4. I think the 4 would've been tight in the top, but the bottom of the 6 was large. Anyways, super comfy and easy to wear for a night out!
Loved the material and fit, size up one size
First off, it has pockets! The cutout in the front is sexy but not inappropriate. Great fabric and quality. Would rent again!

I'm so glad I wore this on my bachelorette party! Sexy and fun outfit for my night out on the town with my girls. I'm typically a 4, so I'm so glad I sized up after reading reviews. Anyone taller than me might find that the bodice is too short. Get ready for lots of compliments is you rent this.

I'm a big Black Halo fan & this was a rental I had been waiting to open up for a while. Wore this for my birthday party and paired with a oversized pink bow to "make it Birthday / extra". I'm a 34D and was surprised to not need a bra w/ just a little adjusting! Great for going out!

links_reviews_title: Super fun romper for a night out!
links_reviews_text: I rented this romper for my best friend's bachelorette party for a night out bar-hopping. I got tons of compliments from the other girls on this romper. The fit was good and I still felt very covered, even with the cutout. The only negative is when you sit it does gape a bit (at least it did for me), but that wasn't too surprising considering the design of the romper. It definitely didn't gape enough to keep me exposed, even without a bra. I still recommend this romper!

Great thick fabric, and super flattering- wore for dinner, and then to a Casino. It is short, so be sure you're ready for that. The design of the romper and the fabric held everything in place nicely- paired with red shoes, and big gold earrings- tons of compliments- This is may be my favorite outfit I've EVER worn! Go for it- you'll love it -
Such a great romper for a Miami bachelorette party! Fit great and I loved that I didn't have to worry about a bra at all.

links_reviews_title: Cute but wayyyy to short for a tall girl
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately I couldn’t wear this romper because it was extremely short for my height (5’9”). I like mini/short outfits but this one was way too revealing. Any movement showed my cheeks 🍑 😅. Thankfully RTR sent me a different outfit and my party was saved.
Wore this to an outdoor concert where the heat index was over 100 degrees. Stayed cool, looked great, and no bra was needed! Would definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Wore this out in Vegas, was perfect for the club.
links_reviews_text: It fit true to size and kept me looking cool in the hot Vegas night. Basically impossible to wear a bra but the romper kept the girls in check.

links_reviews_title: My husband loved how the romper looked on me.
links_reviews_text: The romper fit me perfectly. It was classy with the perfect length for my taste. I loved how the front criss crossed and I felt sexy wearing it. My husband complimented me several times and really liked the romper.
Comfy, has pockets. Fit me like a glove; I am 5'3" and have a short torso. Bottom is forgiving for a large behind

I'm 5'2" and 180. I'm a perfect 12 in basically every major clothing brand from Gap to Lilly Pulitzer. I'm definitely an hour glass with hips for days and a 36DD chest. I was hesitant about this because there was no backup size that would work for me, but it was AMAZING. I didn't wear a bra, but I did tape it in place, which made the bathroom situation tricky (the only drawback). I got compliments all night and attracted plenty of looks :). Perfect for a bachelorette night out! I wish I could keep it!
Comfy and sexy with lots of legs! Great for girls night dancing

links_reviews_title: Perfect black romper for a girl's night out
links_reviews_text: Runs small. I typically wear a size 4 but wore my back up size 6 this time. Fun romper for a girl's night out. Not too short or revealing. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit and cross straps in the front
links_reviews_text: Fun outfit to wear for a night out, sexy with the open front
Fit is a bit small. Great romper for a sexy option.

I needed something formal but fun, and something I could dance around in for a bachelorette party in Vegas. This fit the bill! It was fitted above the waist, and flowy below. And it was just enough cleavage! I used medical tape to keep the girls in place, but could easily be worn without anything for the boobs.
Material is amazing and bottom flows very nicely. Boobs hugged very securely.

I LOVED this! I have never been a fan of rompers as they tend to highlight my mid section, well this one was so flattering and hid everything I wanted to hide! Got so many compliments and will definitely be renting it again, may even end up purchasing!

links_reviews_title: I loved this jumper! Cool and comfortable
links_reviews_text: I rented this jumper for a trip to St. Thomas with my husband. It was perfect for a night out. It was sexy, comfortable, and easy to get on/off. I am athletic, 5' 4" and have broad shoulders.. this fit me like a glove. I loved the length and it was fun to dance in.
Good choice. Outfit for very well. Looks high end. Only con is the zipper is difficulty.
A little tight on the waist and when you sit or dance the hole opens up a little. But I got lots of compliments all night- it was really cute with just enough sexy.

links_reviews_title: LOVED THIS. Fit very well, lots of clevage but good cleavage. Didnt need bra, so many compliments
links_reviews_text: Fit so well, i stretched my wardrobe with this and received sooo many compliments. I always need a bra and didn't need one with this piece. Very good for a party. Shows off body but is very flattering
This romper was so much fun and it had pockets! Didn't need a bra for this. Love!

links_reviews_title: Perfect piece for my film premiere!
links_reviews_text: I love a little sexy alongside my classic and this piece does it ALL! It's short (in a good way) with that perfect keyhole around the chest that gives exactly the right amount of peekaboo effect. I'll add that I'm a 34 C and the keyhole was the perfect amount of sexy. Compliments all night. It was the perfect piece to wear at the Electric Love world premiere.

Really enjoyed wearing this. Sexy but still forgiving. Even at 5'7'' it wasn't too short and was very comfortable. Looks more revealing in this pic because I had my arms spread out but wasn't too much in person.

links_reviews_title: tons of compliments - was comfortable and danced all night!
links_reviews_text: perfect for a friends dressier birthday party. I'm taller and it was definitely shorter but not too bad.

links_reviews_title: this was DARLING!! Can wear with any shoe and is very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: This fit terrifically. IT was soft and comfortable fabric, a bit of a stretch to it, the key hole in the middle was perfect, not too much and man was it flattering! a little big in the waste but loved the pockets!
Wore out for birthday. Didn't wear bra with it and was very supportive. Did show a good amount of cleavage. Would rent again. It was tight in zipper area but I was able to zip still.

Loved this romper. Rented it for a bachelorette party in Nashville in May. It was definitely on the shorter side but was great for a girls night out. Didn't have to wear a bra. Easy to move around in, the straps stayed put and I never felt like I needed to adjust it. I was nervous about the opening in the chest but it was fine. Lots of complements, will definitely rent again!
Loved this! Super flattering and fun. Would definitely rent again for a night out!
LOVE LOVE LOVE. I wanted to keep this it made me feel so curvy and feminine.
Dress held up beautifully in my suitcase, was comfortable, was flattering and hid what I wanted to hide in all the right places.

Wore this to a wedding a month after having a baby. I was feeling self conscious about my body but the dress fit and felt absolutely perfect. The color is beautiful, the fabric is soft and comfortable. I received tons of compliments. Wish I could keep it! The dress did not come with the belt but I tied a small piece fabric through the loops to achieve the scrunchy look in the middle.
Perfect for going out, cocktails, and event or party. Not too dress up. Trendy cute vibe.

This dress was so pretty! It fit well in all the right places. I wore it to wedding and got so many complements. It's very sexy and formal! This was my backup choice and was definitely better. If you're even considering getting this dress, do it! You won't regret it.
This dress was very flattering, hugged in all the right places, while being very forgiving in others! I've rented it twice in 2 colors!

I got this dress to wear to a wedding and I was 1 month post partum and unsure how my abdomen would look so I wanted something with bunching in that area. It was perfect for that but ended up being tighter than I thought in back but still looked great. I got so many compliments! Only problem was I had to order the dress twice because it kept coming without the Sash that makes it Gather in the front. So make sure it comes with it.
Fit me perfectly and I received lots of compliments ! I would definitely rent this again!

The dress was a beautiful blue color and fit great. It was a little difficult to pull enough fabric to tie the knot but I made it work. The fabric is stretchy and kind of thin but fell nicely on my body. Would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Wish it had come with the front tie
links_reviews_text: I loved the fabric of this dress. Super comfortable, flattering, and soft. The color is a wonderful rich blue. I wish it had come with the tie so it would have looked more out together- but it was wearable without.

links_reviews_title: Great dress. Beautiful color and comfortable
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. The only thing is the bottom is a little shear. So try and find a short slip to go under it. Mine also did not come with a front tie but I think it looked great without one.

I'm pretty self-conscious about my mid-section since the kids. This dress was crazy comfortable and super cute on. I got tons of compliments on the style and the color. I'm a 34DD and I went bra-less above my shaper. You will probably want a shaper for the smoothness of the back. I wish I could own this dress now. I've bounced up to around 150 now and assumed I'd need the large. The M was perfect. I highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: So comfortable I could have slept in it
links_reviews_text: Absolutely flattering, comfortable and unique. I wish I could buy it right now!

I wore this to a wedding - I wanted something a little different and fun. This was so comfortable the entire night. The only negative for me was I had to keep checking if my strapless bra was showing because the dress would slip a little in the front. Also right after I put the dress on I sprayed a little hairspray before walking out the door and it left a couple wet marks that didn't go away.
This dress fit great, was super comfortable and I received tons of compliments
Super comfy and flattering! I was a little worried about the drapy front making my stomach look larger, but that wasn't the case at all.

I rented this for a 1920s speakeasy night and it was perfect! The fabric was stretchy and very comfortable. Both the dress I rented and the emergency replacement came without the belt that creates the knot in the front. However, I decided to use a small hair elastic to tie the knot because I love the dress so much!

links_reviews_title: A dress you can dance the night away in!
links_reviews_text: This dress was super comfortable! The fabric is stretchy and lightweight and the color is more of a vibrant blue than it looks the photos. The details in front make the dress flattering as well, as they hide any stomach imperfections. I wore adhesive bra cups and they worked perfectly for the cut of the dress. Would rent this again!
The dress fit perfectly in all of the right places. It also helps hide the belly if you're a little self conscious about that area. I received so many compliments on the dress. Absolutely loved!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments all night long!
links_reviews_text: Fun fact: I haven't voluntarily worn a sleeveless dress in many years. However, this dress has such a nice fit to it that it made me feel comfortable enough to do it. I highly recommend the dress. The draping in the front made it very. Flattering.

Loved this dress. The color is beautiful, it is extremely comfortable and very flattering. It doesn't look exactly like the photo on the website, but it's pretty nonetheless. It's very stretchy material so it fit well!
True to size, super comfortable - so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Designer dresses at an affordable price!!
links_reviews_text: Love the way it hugged my curves
This dress is so comfortable! It was supporting enough to not need a bra and the midsection is figure flattering. Gorgeous blue color

links_reviews_title: Most comfortable and flattering dress! I want to buy it! I got a ton of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Flattering. Stretchy. Amazing.

I loved how this dress fit! It was so flattering for my curvy body shape. I didn’t even need to wear a bra with this dress (and I usually always need a bra....). The color of the dress is beautiful. I wore it to a summer wedding and was perfect for the occasion.
Flattering. Sexy. Light. Color perfection. Loved this dress so much. Wore it to a summer wedding.
This dress is very flattering. It hid a lot of midsection flaws but accentuated my butt, bonus! The color was captivating and silky smooth material made it super comfy.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so comfortable! Easy to wear and looked great all day.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. Used a strapless bra underneath, and simple jewelry.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Comfortable, stretchy material. Flattering and great color.
links_reviews_text: Great dress for the event. Stood out in mostly black dresses. Very comfortable. Plan to wear something underneath because it is very see-through, especially in the light.
Great dress for a date night. Super comfortable!!

links_reviews_title: I felt gorgeous and it was all thanks to this dress!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress from the moment I put it on. It was able to hide and accentuate my curves at the same time. The fabric was stretchy and thick enough to go braless if you wanted to. It was a perfect length for me and I didn't have to worry about coverage up top or down bottom. I received a ton of compliments and would rent this again and again. More colors please!

The dress was a disappointment and I did not wear it. The hemline is simply a cut across the fabric, the drapery that looks like part of the dress on the photos is actually a skinny belt that loops through the dress, and the holes for the loops actually expose skin under the breasts that is not sexy or stylish. I did not feel comfortable wearing this out of the house.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous & stunning royal blue dress - so flattering!
links_reviews_text: The large fit perfectly on me - I am 5'8" and 170 lbs. I felt like a knockout in this dress, super flattering. The straps were the perfect length and didn't slip off my shoulders. The back of the skirt had a super cute little flounce on it. Got so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Chic look while going from seated to standing.
links_reviews_text: Easy to accessorize. Did. It wrinkle on drive or in theatre seat
Dress fit beautifully. Was a little clingy around the midsection, but other then that, it felt great. Beautiful color too.

links_reviews_title: A lovely formal birthday party for my husband's boss.
links_reviews_text: This dress was incredibly comfortable and flattering! The built in bra provided a surprising amount of support, and didn't expose too much cleavage. I'm happy I didn't have to readjust it or worry about it riding up at all. Would recommend a pair of Spanx underneath.

I loved this dress. Went with the XL instead of the large as the large was just a bit tight around the back side for me and the bust area was a bit smaller. It was so cool and comfortable. The blue color is very royal blue, just beautiful. This dress was so awesome I'm going to buy it now!!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a cocktail party
links_reviews_text: Wore this number to a cocktail party and it was a hit! The vibrant blue really popped, and I loved the draping. The length was perfect as I'm on the short side. It ran a little big for me so I wore the size small (my backup size); I'm usually a size medium. When I posted pictures on social media, I got a lot of compliments on the dress. Glad I went with this one!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and easy to dance in
links_reviews_text: I picked this dress because of the beautiful color and the interesting knot in the front. I picked out sparkly silver heels that matched it so well! During the event, I was a bit nervous because the top was slightly loose and I couldn't wear a bra underneath. The material is also very see through in the bottom area, so not sure if there is any type of undergarment that won't show a little bit, and the way it clung to my stomach was kind of unflattering. I should mention that I'm petite, and this was below knee-length. Although I was able to wear it to my event, I wish I had picked another dress for the black tie optional wedding I attended.

links_reviews_title: So flattering!! Love this dress, in fact, I purchased it.
links_reviews_text: Excellent structure and drape.

This dress was gorgeous! I got a 2 and a 6 because the 4 wasn't available. They both fit. The 6 was a tad big. The 4 would have been perfect. I ended up wearing the 2. It was snug but still very comfortable. It has a good amount of stretch. I am 135, 5'1", 34DDD. You won't regret getting this dress!

I wore this to an evening awards banquet and got so many compliments. It's very comfortable, but it is short when you're sitting. I'm 5'4 and I can't imagine it being any shorter. I would rent this dress again especially if I wanted something with sleeves.
So many compliments! The dress is a bit short (and I'm 5'2") but with opaque tights I didn't worry about it. Absolutely loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: This was way out of my comfort zone, but I received many compliments and was so happy with it!
links_reviews_text: I don't think I've ever taken the time to write a review for anything, but I loved my first rental experience and the dress so much that I decided to take the time! My daughter and I both rented dress (pictured) for a NYE party, and we couldn't have been happier! The rental experience was so easy, and our dresses actually arrived several days earlier than requested, which was so nice to ensure we were happy with our choices and allow time to select shoes and undergarments. (I wore a black strapless bra.) My dress fit on the small side, so I was so glad to have the larger, backup dress, which is what I ended up wearing. I was happy with that decision because I was able to comfortably dance all night.
I liked this dress and thought it fit well. I went with the 8 although I felt like it was a little snug in the sleeves and bust. Great drop waist, got tons of compliments.

This is an amazing dress. It fit like a glove. This is a very fun and easy dress to wear. You could dress it up or down- you have a lot of options with this dress. It was my first RTR dress and I am OBSESSED!

Loved the pattern in the dress. Unfortunately, you can tell that it has been rented quite a few times as the zipper was a struggle to pull all the way up since it was worn in a particular section. Did enjoy looking different from everyone else and received so many compliments! Would have bought if the zipper was working perfect!

links_reviews_title: Second time renting this dress. I loved it both times. So many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Flattering fit with some give in the fabric.
I wore this dress for a springtime wedding and it was perfect! It was very comfortable and ad some stretch to it, but it definitely runs small. I would recommend sizing up.

links_reviews_title: 10 year anniversary and felt amazing in this dress
links_reviews_text: #datenight #tenyears #marriedlife #dress The dress has give. When I first put it on I didn't know if it would zip. Totally zipped. Totally comfortable. Made well and felt great!
Beautiful comfortable dress. I'm only 5'1, the length was perfect for me

I LOVED this dress. I wore it to my kids school gala. I received so many compliments on this dress. The fit was perfect and true to size. I wore it with a black strapless bra. I would definitely rent this again!
Easy to wear, very comfortable, not the most exciting dress I've rented but got many compliments!

links_reviews_title: This dress was the talk of the night!
links_reviews_text: VERY fitted and short. I should have ordered up for my 2nd size. I was sucking in all night and constantly pulling it down.
Had to wear the larger size, but the dress is cute! It's super short though, so be aware if you're tall and going to be dancing.

links_reviews_title: So many styles to pick from but this dress was amazing for what I wore it to!
links_reviews_text: I am normally a 2 but I had to wear the 4. The sleeves on the 2 were tight and felt like I'd rip them if I worn it. Other than that the 4 fit great, dress was comfortable! I got a ton of compliments on it :)

links_reviews_title: Such a fun take on an LBD
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a gala at a museum and it was a perfect take to be a little more funky for an PBD. Loved the fit and was able to wear a regular bra with it. Great length; no stretch so order wisely. Normally I wear a 4, but the 6 was perfect for the chest area
Wore it to the opening opening of Hamilton in SF. It fit well, i loved it!

links_reviews_title: I LOVED this dress! It was the perfect fit. I received so many compliments throughout the night.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly and was very comfortable. I danced all night without any issues. I am 5’3, so I would say it may be short for taller women.

links_reviews_title: Alot of people gave me compliments
links_reviews_text: The fit its tight but it fits amazing!!!
Fits true to size.
I love this dress so much I want to buy it! This dress is beautiful, very flattering and super comfortable. Rent this and you won't be disappointed!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for Valentines. I am 5’4 132lbs and wore a size 6. I loved it!
links_reviews_text: I would rent this dress again. What a great price ($30).
I was 19 weeks pregnant wearing this dress; 5'2 and 133 pounds. It was so comfortable, classy and sexy at the same time. Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Fun LBD that could be dressed up or down
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable! Felt gorgeous and got lots of compliments. Would be great for dancing... if I wasn't 5'10" lol it was pretty short . Fits very snug. I'm usually an 8 and get 10 as a backup. The 8 wasn't available so I went with the 10 and it was perfect.

Very form fitting but surprisingly comfortable and super flattering! I wore with tights and boots out to a nice dinner, but would love to rent this to wear with heels to a wedding. I felt that the bottom was a little tight in the 2 but the 4 was too big. I ended up wearing the 2 and felt great and my boyfriend loved it.

links_reviews_title: I did not wear the dress.
links_reviews_text: The dress is very pretty and well made. I was afraid the lace would make it look cheap, but I was wrong. Unfortunately, it does run small. I usually wear a 2 or a 4 but knowing it's a form fitting dress I decided to get a size 6 as well. I barely fit in the size 6...so order up. Way up, esp if you have a booty and boobs. Also, it was kind of short for my liking. So I ended up not wearing it.

Wore it to work, tons of compliments and not too over the top. Changed into heals and wore it out on the town, everyone wanted to know where I got this dress. It is comfortable and has a little stretch to the fabric. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: It was the perfect dress for the occasion. I presented an award for a local music award show.
links_reviews_text: Form fitting and very flattering. Easy to move around in.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect - beautiful and comfortable enough to dance the night away!
links_reviews_text: The fit was figure flattering - I received endless compliments! The only con for me was having to wear a strapless bra.

PROS: I love the detailing on the stress. It fit well. I liked the length. It's a perfect dress to show off your legs! I didn't need to wear a bra with this dress, as it held my boobs in place really well. It was loose enough around the midsection and hips to allow yourself to relax and breathe and not have to suck it in! lol. The lace is sexy and flirty. Very stylish! CONS: It's very hard to zip up the back! Also, I wish the slip underneath was not beige... not a total dealbreaker but it would look a lot better if it was black.

Gorgeous dress. Went with the size 6 because the 4 was a little too snug. Fit like a glove. Got so many compliments all night. Just the right length at 5'2". Really considering buying this dress - it was so comfortable. Wore it to my friends engagement party.

links_reviews_title: Super cute dress.....just not on me.
links_reviews_text: This dress was really cute & had some stretch. I'm currently 5'2", 138lbs. I wear a solid 6 on most everything I rent here. Sometimes a 4. Never an 8, but the 4 wasn't available so I got the 6 & 8. The 8 fit the best, and it wasn't a pretty sight. Haha! The way the fabric & lace was designed, it actually brought attention to my fat roll. I have a short torso. From the side I looked pregnant. I didn't wear this because I looked like a stuffed sausage. Not flattering for my body. I loved it on other women in the photos. It was made well. It was in good condition. I'd love to order it again but not until I lose this extra roll.
Comfortable and great fit. Many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Just as cute as I imagined!
links_reviews_text: Perfect for New Years Eve party and comfortable. I went with the 6 only because it seemed a bit longer and it was short but not too short. I'm 5'4 so it was perfect for my height. I'd definitely rent from here again though the fact that my return date fell on a Holiday (1/1) I'm hoping it gets to them on time and I'm no penalized (I dropped in Drop box that day- but it's a UPS holiday!) Fingers crossed

This dress is beautiful and flattering. I got lots of compliments. However it was shorter than expected. I added a slip underneath it with extra material to make it longer. Without the slip you could see my underwear if I bent over. I do have a longer torso though so if you don't have a long torso I think you will be fine!

The size 4 originally looked too small so I tried on the size 6 first. Something wasn't right with this dress. It didn't lay right and I was disappointed. However, I figured I would at least try on the size 4 and it fit like a glove and was super cute. My husband told me I was bringing sexy back in this dress. It was short but fit perfect! I would have liked to add on a few more inches to the length.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for winter holiday party
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress. It's pretty, comfortable, and good for wearing in the winter. The lace is soft, which is very important to me. It was a bit shorter than I expected (I'm 5'8"), but I did end up wearing it, and I was happy with it all night.
Rented this for my husbands grad school graduation. Such a beautiful, unique dress!! Would definitely rent again. True to size, comfortable, received lots of compliments!!
Very comfortable. Sleeves are more 3/4 length. Normally wear a 10 but probably would have liked to wear the 12 but the zipper was broken when I got it so I wore the 10.

Got so many compliments on this jumpsuit! Our concert for NYE calls for gowns and tuxedo but instead I opted for a jumpsuit (cause why not lol) and omg it was so comfy to perform in, I didn't have to pull it up once, and I will wear this in white at my bachelorette party one day
I absolutely loved this jumpsuit. It was very comfortable and the side paneling prevented the sequins from irritating my arms. It is on the longer side so it may not work with shorter people

I wore this to an annual Chamber Dinner and it was PERFECTION. I've never had so many compliments in my life! The black area under the busy can get a little snug after eating but other than that it fit like a dream. Rent this one. You won't regret it!

links_reviews_title: Strange fit but still a show stopper!
links_reviews_text: What a fun jumpsuit! Good quality, lined nicely so no itchy sequin problems. My only complaint was the fit. Very fitting in the bodice and waist, while quite loose in the hips/legs. The crotch was quite long/roomy. I was initially really bothered by this but wore it anyway and so glad I did. I felt amazing and got stopped by multiple strangers who complimented me. I think this would look amazing on a pear-shaped person.
Super comfortable and great fit. I'm 5'6", 122lb, 34c. Needed a strapless bra to keep it on my chest. Would definitely recommend!

Absolutely fabulous! I chose not to wear it because the other outfit I rented was more flattering, but this jumpsuit is a real show stopper. I would recommend it for someone with more curve, because there's quite a bit of room for hips and booty. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Best dressed at the company holiday party!!
links_reviews_text: Wow. I got so so so many compliments on this jumper. It was the perfect "holiday festive" piece for my company holiday party. I danced all night and was unrestricted. It was iconic. So comfy. Has pockets. The best jumper!

This jumpsuit was INCREDIBLE. I felt amazing in it. It fit like a glove & was perfect for the special occasion. Pant length was just right. Tight around the chest - but went braless and felt supported. Wish I could wear it for every party I go to!
I LOVED this jumpsuit and got so many compliments. I didn't want to wear a dress like everyone else and this was a perfect alternative option for my senior homecoming.
Absolutely obsessed with this. Got so many compliments and felt like a million bucks
This was sooooo fun to wear!! It was comfortable and stood out in a crowd.

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments and felt like a pop star in this jumpsuit!
links_reviews_text: I sized up for this jumpsuit and it fit perfectly in the waist area (a little loose in the chest area but not noticeable). I am 5’2” and with a 3 inch heel this still felt a little too long. I ended up rolling the legs up to expose the black lining, cuffed them and then pinned them on both sides with safety pins. This gave it the look of being a jogger and made the length so much better on me!
The fit is true to size. I loved this jumpsuit and it stayed in place all night as I danced/moved around. Great for a party or even NYE.

this jumpsuit was everythingg!!! I wore it to my senior prom and everyone complimented me! Fit so perfectly. I'm usually a size 6 or even 8 in regular retail dresses but the 2 ( the only size available while renting) fit me amazing. Got the 6R first but it was very loose around the bust. The waist seemed tight at first but that was good because it helped keep the top in place. Didn't slide down at all. Very comfortable and easy to zip and unzip. My measurements are bust:33 waist:28 hips:39 and I also did wear a strapless bra. Length was perfect. Everyone wore similar dresses and some the same but I was the only one with a designer jumpsuit thanks to RTR! Loved my purchase! So glad I rented this cute outfit and Tory Burch bag (in the picture) instead of buying a $200 dress! Would recommend 100%. Looks even more beautiful in person than in pictures.

links_reviews_title: SO many compliments. I wore this for a friend's rehearsal dinner. Perfect for a party or any event.
links_reviews_text: NOTHING- it was perfect and zipper was easy to zip up

I received a ton of compliements!!It fit true to size if not a bit tight around the rib cage but that helped keep everything up-i didn’t need to wear a bar. I was comfortable otherwise and could eat whatever I wanted. The length was fine as well-I wore heels and it bunches up at the bottom for us short girls; didn’t affect the look. It’s great for cooler weather events due to the weight of the jumpsuit. Great rental!
Definitely a head turner. This is well constructed and comfortable. You will stand out in a good way, lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Got separation anxiety after returning this stunner
links_reviews_text: I wanted a fuss-free alternative to a cocktail dress for a semi-formal event. Worried it might be too teeny-bopper but it's very well-made, sleek and playful. Black side panels make for a really nice hourglass illusion. The one big issue was that the bust area was way too big for my A cups. Had to wear the most padded bra I own and was just barely filling it out. Everything else fit comfortably.
I didn't wear it due to how it made my mid section look - it's unflattering... I have a flat stomach but it doesn't look like it wears this

links_reviews_title: I came in like a wrecking ball and got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: This was a perfect fit on the bottom, but pretty tight up top. However, I'm a "busty" gal. I had to have someone come to the bathroom with me every time to help me zip/unzip, but it was totally worth it. I got a ton of compliments and definitely left an impression.
Loved this piece! I didn't realize jumpsuits are so cute. Very sparkly, standout piece. Felt like a celebrity.

I loved this jumpsuit. It was a little baggy below the waist but otherwise I thought it looked great. I'm 5'3" and ended up using elastic bands to crop the legs. It worked better with the look. If I wanted to wear them full length I still probably would have used fabric tape to "hem" it. Tight fit in the waist. Didn't have to wear a bra, but I have no boobs.

links_reviews_title: Ordered this for a concert and I absolutely loved it!!!!
links_reviews_text: I run between 4-6 and this fit snuggly. The waist band was very tight fitting but not uncomfortable for me at all. I love the pockets! Very form fitting up top and loose and comfy from the waist down. Loved it!!!!

Wore this jumper to an industry award show and got a ton of compliments. It fits true to size. The corset keeps the top held up well so no worries about the strapless falling down. I'm 5'4" and wore 4.5 inch heels and chicken cutlets to fill out the top a bit more.
I love this jumpsuit! It fits great and looks even better than pictures. Coworkers and friends all said I look like a rock/movie star! Love it. Very comfortable too!

I wore this for NYE to a friends party. The theme was sparkles. It did its job. The sequins were bright and comfortable. Although, I couldn't cross my legs when I sat because the sequins would get stuck to each other. I'm 5'10 and 130 lbs and pretty narrow in the hips so the jumpsuit did not fit as tight as I would have liked. The bustier kept falling down as well. There is no rubber on the inside to adhere to your chest so it would slip down. I think the right body size would be a curvier girl. Overall I got plenty of compliments but I was a little uncomfortable pulling it up all night.
I felt very glamorous in this bodysuit all night and received so many compliments. It reflects the light so beautifully with every step you take.
This was the perfect NYE outfit!

links_reviews_title: So Fun and So Many Compliments! But Not For Short People
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit was sooooo cute! And comfortable. However, being 5'1 I always have the issue of clothing being big on me. I think this jumpsuit is made for somebody that's the size of a model, not somebody petite like me. The pant legs sagged. The corset fit well, but under the corset was like a poochy area where it just felt like extra fabric. So, when I sat down there was literally just extra fabric making it look like I had a huge gut. This is probably because this jumpsuit is made for somebody taller. My torso is short so this is probably why there was extra fabric. Overall, all the cons wasn't enough to not make me wear the jumpsuit. If you're very picky about fit and you're short like me, I wouldn't go with this jumpsuit. I was fine with the cons as they didn't bother me too terribly much. I'm used to clothing not fitting me all the time.

I ordered a size 8 and it was enormous. I could barely hold it up. The crotch area was so long too that it looked like hammer pants. I had high hopes for this but it was a disaster. I did not wear it. I could have gone with a size 4 but the crotch probably still would have been too long.

I almost didn't wear this bc it kind of has that bagginess around the booty (mine is small anyway) and that sort of long crotch look BUT my wise friend said "if you're going for super sexy and skin tight, this won't be it. But if you want standout chic and trendy with a little sexy then this is IT!" It was my first time in Vegas and I thought, where else could you wear a sequin jumpsuit? So I went for it! So glad I did! I lost count of the amount of MEN who pulled me aside (straight ones!) and told me I was best dressed or complimented it! It had just the right amount of sexy at the top while not being your typical figure hugging dress. I stood out in VEGAS which is not easy to do! I have this Juno suit to thank for my friends and I being invited to party all night at Hyde in the Bellagio with VIP bottle service! I have kind of a larger rib cage so that cinched waist was tight there and it took 2 people to zip me in so if you don't like things that fit snug, size up or you won't like it. I'm used to choosing fashion over comfort so it didn't bother me.

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit is SO FLATTERING. I received so many compliments from random people at the event.
links_reviews_text: It's tight around the bust, but not uncomfortably so for my C cups, just enough where you felt contained and that you weren't going to fall out. The bottom is actually quite loose, I would have preferred it a bit tighter, but it still looked great. The pockets are AWESOME. The waist is high, which is super flattering. It does run long, I am 5'4" and was wearing high heels and the pant legs almost touched the ground in my heels. It's sparkly and amazing. I received so many compliments and would definitely wear this again.

I was on the fence on what size to get based on the other reviews. The waist band is the only thing that fit normally when I wore the six. It was huge around my boobs and chest and huge around my butt and thighs -- none of which are small. I would have preferred the 4, but I can see why others say it would be tight in the waistband area. I still think it would have been fine, because the 6 waistband wasn't too tight. It's an amazing outfit, but it's definitely large everywhere besides that one spot. Had to wear a padded strapless bra to make it stay up! The bottom hits you right around your ankles. Got one million compliments!!

links_reviews_title: It was for a 70's themed gala
links_reviews_text: It fit excellent in the top. A little baggy in the hips / was fun to have pockets. The black details accentuated body shape in proper areas

This jumpsuit has to be the most fun thing I've ever worn! I did find that it ran a little large. I had to keep pulling it up, but being a 34B, I don't have a whole lot to help hold it up. I loved the pockets and would definitely recommend it!!!

I wore this to a wedding where there was a dress code. Ladies were instructed to wear silver sequins and the men - a pop of purple. I was the only one in a jumpsuit and received tons of compliments. It fits true to size and is comfortable. I loved the pockets! Pants were a little hot on the dance floor.

I loved this jumpsuit. It was a fun alternative to a traditional dress and it was super easy to dance in. My only issue was the boning in the rib area. It was fine while standing but made it very difficult to sit down and breathe. Even with that small issue I would rent this again in a heartbeat.
Gorgeous! Felt like a million bucks xD YAS like Rihanna said, "shine bright like a diamond" Literally kept getting stopped to be complimented. Chest area loose for me but overall 'MMAZING outfit(:
It fits a big large, but I was super comfortable all night.

YOU GUYS! I wish I could wear this jumpsuit everywhere. It is stunning. I wore it for my bachelorette party, and EVERYONE stopped me on the street and had flattering things to say. There is plenty of room in the hips - which is usually where clothes are tight on me. May be a good for someone in the first trimester to hide the tummy. I wore it in July on a super hot day and would not necessarily recommend it for a hot day. I was super sweaty - sorry RTR cleaning people!
This shirt was awesome and just as pictured on the model. It fit well and was made from a nice Material. The patterns and details made it unique and fun to wear. Would rent again!

Rented this for vacation, but didn't end up wearing it. Put a blazer over the top so I could wear it in December to work. It is a fun top and got several compliments. The spaghetti strap side is adjustable as well, which it nice.
Not great for very large breast - but fantastic shirt. The mix of the two different patterns with the sleeve designs is very fashionable. Loads of compliments.
Shirt is super cute and unique. I am a usual size 8 but could have worn a 6 because I had room in the waist and under my arms. Looks cute tucked into a high waist pair of jeans/pants/skirts
Loved it. Great top!

links_reviews_title: Cute, flirty, fun, perfect for a concert!
links_reviews_text: Looks great with jeans, comfy top for a summer night and/or concert.
Easy to put on. Stylish without being over the top.
Cute. Fit true to size
I loved this unique top, fit was true to size, looked great with white jeans

links_reviews_title: super fun top! the pattern makes it so you don't really need a bra (if you're on the smaller side).
links_reviews_text: Wore this with white jeans to a party and got so many compliments. The bodice is short but works well if you have a short torso like I do! Wish I could have kept it.

links_reviews_title: Cute top for work and a night out
links_reviews_text: I really enjoyed this top. Wore it to work with a skirt and and sweater and to dinner with a pair of jeans. Fit was right, although a little shorter than I am used to.

I wore this top for a recent trip to my hometown in Mexico. I wore it to go to a fair and a concert. It was super comfortable while being stylish. I styled it with jeans and black ankle booties to give it a "fall look" while still not dying from the heat! It is true to size.

links_reviews_title: Cute, trendy , breezy stylish shirt for spring summer
links_reviews_text: I actually wore a 2 (?) or a small . Great for , flattering , a little loose for the waist yet my waist is 26 and long . I think many diff figures can rock this top
True to size. Stylish
I'm between a size 2-4 and the 2 fit well, not too tight but also not baggy. I wore with jeans out on a Saturday afternoon and with a blazer to work the following week- very versatile

I wore this top to a party, with black pants. I wore a strapless bra (regular bra showed a little). I'd probably skip the bra altogether next time if I rent this again, since there is a black lining layer inside.
Adore this top. It's a crepe type fabric that doesn't wrinkle, fit is great and I could wear a strapless bra underneath.
I loved wearing this top on a great summer day with shorts and flats bopping around with my family on a summer weekend day. I got compliments and I stayed cool and loved the fun look
Cute and comfortable- looked great with white skinnys! No bra needed - great fit!

Versatile and trendy top. I wore to work and dressed it up. Can easily pair with jeans for a more casual look. It has a full zipper in the back and overall felt the fit was true to size. Received lots of compliments and would highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Truly a top that could be dressed up or down !
links_reviews_text: Loved this one. Picked it on a whim and it ended up being one of my favorite choice. It could work for day or night. Comfortable - the skinny strap on the left side is adjustable.
Eye catching style, and still really Comfortable despite the uncommon cut. Perfect for spring and summer as it has light weight and breathable material. Thumbs up!
Loved this! It's so fun and different and fits really well I'm a 36C small shoulders usually a 6 in dresses and the 4 fit well probably could have even went for a 6
I rented this for vacation and could not stop wearing it. It was so simple, matched with everything, and no bra required! Could not have been better.
The top was fun and so easy to wear with jeans or dress up with nice pants. Beyond flattering - would love to purchase!

Suffering through the AZ summer in 105 degree heat and trying to look cute while doing it. This top was lightweight and very comfortable. Originally I had envisioned pairing this blouse with black skinny jeans but changed my mind for two reasons. Firstly it's far too hot for pants and secondly the blouse is pretty short (especially with my long torso) and leggings looked weird.

links_reviews_title: Cute shirt for a dinner out.
links_reviews_text: Cuse shirt. Thought it ran small. Zipper enclosure in the back. Glad the spaghetti strap had a feature where you could tighten it if necessary. Wore with black cropped pants and looked cute for a dinner party in NYC.
Something different yet flirty & fun
Super cute top for work! It took me a little bit to adjust to the asymmetrical, but overall it's a cute top for spring.
i didn't like the zipper in the back, but i loved the details of the top
Lovely color, looked even cuter in person. The fabric was nice, too. Unfortunately, it runs very small. I had to return unworn.
Loved it! Snug around the breast but perfect
Such a cute tank! Unfortunately didn't fit - too tight at the chest so I couldn't wear it
This top was cute but I got a size 8 and it ran small

Wonderfully lightweight fabric. Honestly it fit just perfectly. I'm between a 0-2 and it really just depends on the brand. The strap stayed up and was no problem. Wore with black pants and my hair UP with hoops!! Would def rent again.
Loved the fit. Even with a DD chest, this fit perfectly! I was impressed.
Not my favorite material
Wore with black pants and a white jean skirt. Cute enough.
It's very easy to dress up or down. Great statement too that draws attention. 100% would rent again.
Love the different sleeves on this top! It was really pretty but also a little bit funky. The yellow is really pretty too.
This top!! So cute, the picture says it all. Wore this in the office but I will also be wearing this for date night this weekend!! So cute and versatile! I love a statement sleeve
I loved this top. It's super flattering and unique, and the long sleeves are a plus. Roomy and comfortable, but not baggy. Will definitely rent again!
I loved this top. It fit perfectly and I loved the opening around the collarbone. The material is beautiful. I intend to wear it several more times before sending it back.

The sleeves and print of this blouse made me feel fabulous. Keep in mind that the bolton of the shirt runs small so if planning to wear untucked size up. Only con is that the blouse doesn't really "breathe" but it's to punch up an office look.
Love the neckline and pattern. Shirt was flattering.

links_reviews_title: The collar and sleeves. The neckline was amazing.
links_reviews_text: I received a ton of compliments.
I was surprised that it was a little tight on the arms because normally I'm a size 4 and I rented the size 6, but overall it's a very fun piece. I like the neckline!
Not a good fit for me. The weird shape on top did not work for me. Back to RTR it goes!

links_reviews_title: Snug in shoulders and chest, but beautiful!
links_reviews_text: This was probably my favorite item to rent in recent months. It's a beautiful color and the design is interesting without being too daring for work. I would have thought about buying if I had ordered the 2. It looked a little oversized, but it's actually true to size. The 0 still fit me well, but I had to tug it down occasionally because it was snug at the top of the chest.
Super cool print and cut.
So obsessed with this top. If you're looking for a statement top, here it is!

I adored this gown. The lace back was my favorite feature but I also loves the shape and the lace on sleeves and neck. It would need some starch to get the necklace to stand up like it does in the picture. The long is not super long because I wore flats and it just touched the ground. I considered buying the stress because I got so many compliments and it fit so perfectly. You obviously can't wear a bra with it… But if you're flat chested you'll need a stick on bra to fill out the front.

This dress is absolutely stunning. So many compliments. True to size. I'm 5'4" and the length was perfect with 3 inch heels. I'm 125lbs and the size 2 was snug. I probably would've been more comfortable in a 4 but my order was messed up and I didn't get the 4...

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit! Great for short girls!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like it was made specifically for my body. The fabric was thick and heavy, which felt great. Wore on a cold, December night and was fine with just my coat on, when I was outside. I was able to wear sneakers with this gown, which was great cuz the gown was long enough to cover my shoes, but not too long that I needed to wear heels. My sneakers might've had a 1-1.5" sole. The sneakers had Swarovski crystals all over, so it was fancy enough when my toes peaked out as I walked. I loved this dress so much, I almost bought it. But I don't have too many places where I'd need to wear a gown, so I reluctantly returned it. But it really is an amazing dress. Definitely rent this if you're thinking about it.

I loved the look of this dress, but it was difficult to zip. There's no stretchy material so sitting was sometimes awkward. I kind of wish I sized up, but luckily it just barely fit because I had no time to get a replacement! If you have broad shoulders/chest, consider sizing up. I wore this for a semi-formal family party and people loved it.

The dress fit very well and it looked amazing on. The zipper was not easy to get up and the neck Of the dress was a bit flimsy but photographed well so it didn't mess up my pictures. Overall, I was impressed with the service and quality.

This was even more gorgeous on! It was comfortable too and the perfect length. There was a small tear in the lace, but unnoticeable to the naked eye. Occasionally my 2 inch heel would get stuck in the lace when I stood up. The back is gorgeous, wish it had a built in bra though.

Fit a little snug through the hips but fit great everywhere else. Wore 10L and high heels. I'm 5'7" and would have liked it slightly longer. The back is very nice. Not too revealing for a formal work event.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for black tie optional wedding
links_reviews_text: This was a great dress and my first experience with RTR. The dress fit perfectly and hugged all the right places while not being too constricting for dancing.
Loved this dress, easy to wear, beautiful lace, loved the hemline. Only con... I have no need to wear it again :(

links_reviews_title: Black lace dress, perhaps a little gothic, very nice for our Gala fundraising dinner auction event.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'7", 133 lb, 34DD. The 10L was a bit too long, even with 3-4" heels. I would have probably been better with a 12R, so the waist would be a little longer, the dress shorter, and more room in the bodice for DD; but I ordered late so was very happy this one was available. It fit snug, but super-comfortable nonetheless. I will point-out that my sandals has some pearl & silver embellishments which were constantly catching the lace dress. So be sure your shoe selection is 'smooth'.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect!! Ran a little small but I worked it out!
links_reviews_text: Everything was perfect. I would go up a size! Very comfortable material
The 12 was super snug but the 14 was just right hugging all my curves I got compliments all night long and felt BEAUTIFUL!

links_reviews_title: Most compliments I've ever received on a dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was phenomenal, and I'm so glad I decided to go with it. I was initially hesitant because trumpet dresses normally don't work with my body shape, but this one for like a glove and was fitted in just the right spots. It was almost 100 degrees outside when I wore this dress, but I was never hot or uncomfortable at all, which speaks volumes on the quality. I also didn't need to wear a bra even though I have a larger chest, and I was able to sit down and dance with any issue. I also cannot believe the number of compliments I received, and everyone said the dress was stunning. I'd for sure wear this one again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a fancy library wedding!
links_reviews_text: Loved it. Great fit and well constructed. Beautiful details with the back and lace. Was able to dance all night with no problems. Would rent again for a similar occasion.

links_reviews_title: RTR provides so many options and styles for every occasion which is very helpful.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 12 but ordered a 12 and 14 as a backup. Both fit but the 14 gave me more room in the hip area. It is very snug if you are curvy. But i loved the dress, particularly the lace detail. I wore it for a formal wedding.

Read the reviews and thought this is the dress.... but wondered is it really all that?!?! Everyone wrote about the compliments. I'm 5'10" ... 6' with heels and went with the long instead of regular. Perfect length and the back is beautiful. (Wear your hair up, ladies! Show the back off!) The material is a thicker lace... No body slimmers/bra required, and I didn't feel warm in it. It with pretty fitted through the hips, and loose in waist. And yes! It is all that! I, too received compliments on it.

I loved this dress for black tie wedding... I thought I was going to be burning up in it as it is a thick material but it really wasn't all that bad. I'm usually a 10/12 but I'm glad I went up a size. It was a comfortable fit. Also glad I went with the long!! I'm 5'9" and with a small block heel it was the perfect length!! Perfect rental!!

I'm 5'5 130 lbs. usually a size 6 for dresses. The size 6 fit like a glove but the zipper was stuck at the seem. The 8 still worked. Made me feel so slim and comfortable. My fave rent yet! The back is gorgeous!!! Didn't have to wear a bra.

This was my back up dress, as soon as I put it on I fell in love. The dress is a bit heavy and thick, no spanx or bra required. At 5'2 the 4R was just barely sweeping the floor. But do be careful of your heel catching the lace. Very comfortable for dancing and sitting. Absolutely would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Not long enough. Not for 5'10" or above
links_reviews_text: This is a very beautiful dress. The lace and the detail on the back was very nice BUT this dress is not for anyone over 5'10'" even in the long length. I ordered a 16 and 18. The 16 would not go up past my hips and the 18 was large in the waist area. I had to use fabric tape to take it in and also add lace to the under skirt to add length. Overall I was please with the look. I normally wear a 14-16 dress and I am 6'2". The dress was nice, just not long enough.
This dress fit like a glove. I tend to be full in the middle, but this dress accentuates all the right curves. I got a lot of compliments. It's very classy and dramatic.
Used for a photo session! It is beautiful!! Normally would wear a 6.

links_reviews_title: I felt like the mother of dragons in this frock
links_reviews_text: I couldn't really tell from the photos of this dress online but the back is all lace. It fits really well, if a little snug, the fabric is thick and of good quality. As are the zippers and lace. I felt like gorgeous in this dress and would recommend.
This dress was exactly what I needed, it fit like a glove!

I loved this dress and it was between this and another. I ended up picking the other only because it was a bright blue and I felt like some color after this long winter. I will def rent this again and wear.
Perfect for black tie wedding. Very elegant and true to size. Loved this dress

This dress is a showstopper. I received a ton of compliments and felt glamorous in it. It is lace and a heavy material so I wouldn't recommend it for any warm weather events. One of my favorite rentals!

Dress is very comfortable, beautiful back that gets lots of comments, and material doesn’t show everything so it’s flattering. The 8R fit so I didn’t unpack the 6R but it may have fit as well (I’m between 6/8). I’m 5’6 and wore 3 inch heels and could have used an 8L if that was an option.

I really enjoyed this dress. It's very flattering. It is very generous at the waist as well. I am pregnant and have decent size bump and was able to wear my normal size. It's super comfortable as well! Really enjoyed this dress!

links_reviews_title: Business in the front. Party in the back!
links_reviews_text: This was probably my favorite gown I've rented from RTR. Its beautiful black lace and silhouette are extremely flattering. It's just a style you don't see everywhere-- the cap sleeves with the high neck-- and the back! The back was the best part. Instead of an adhesive bra, I tried gaffers tape made for bodies. Game changer. The girls stayed right where they should. The dress is gorgeous. Rent it if you want to try a classy dress with a fun twist!

links_reviews_title: LOVED this dress for a formal winter wedding!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 14 but sized up bc it fits a little tight around the hips/legs/butt area. It fit like a glove and I felt gorgeous in this dress! I received many compliments throughout the evening!

links_reviews_title: This dress was AMAZING!. Fit so well and I got so many compliments. I wish I owned this dress.
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove and I wore flats and It was a perfect length.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress for my National Sales Meeting
links_reviews_text: This dress is beyond gorgeous! It is so flattering and unique. I got compliments all night! I think it runs small. I'm 5'11 and have a large bust, so usually have to order a size up for length, but i had to go 2 sizes up for this one. It was worth it though! I will definitely rent this again! So pretty!

links_reviews_title: This dress is a show stopper! I received compliments all night.
links_reviews_text: Due to the trumpet style, if you’re bordering on a size, you should size up. The dress is very flattering. The details are amazing (neckline, and sleeves are breathtaking). The material is heavy, so not sure if this would be ideal for a summer event. I highly recommend this dress. It is PERFECTION.

Super comfortable. Elegant. Sexy. Felt incredible in this dress. Normally I cannot wait to change into comfy clothes, and I wore this even at the afterparty. Fabric is thick, but that was expected. Will not wrinkle. No stretch.

links_reviews_title: Great friends and a great speaker (Scott Hamilton) . The Southeast Cancer Gala was amazing.
links_reviews_text: Always do the sit test. I would have worn the smaller size I ordered except it was a tad snug when seated. I also ended up wearing a black camisole with built in bra because I am pretty conservative and didn't want my entire back showing. Very lovely dress though! Great for a formal event!

links_reviews_title: No hassle at all to rent and return
links_reviews_text: Perfect for a black tie function

links_reviews_title: Bridesmaid dress for black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: I am 5'4" and 130 lbs. and wore a size 4. It fit perfectly. It was a little long, but with heels the length was fine. Loved the dress! It was very elegant and made well.
I lied the length and back detail. Could've been a little more fitting but was so pretty! Received lots of compliments and truly enjoyed my night feeling beautiful

links_reviews_title: Perfect gown for a black tie wedding or event! Elegant with a fun back! Got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and easy to move in. I am petite (4'11) and usually have to hem everything but I did not have to hem this dress! Hit perfectly to the floor with a heel height of 3.5 inches. Wore with Go Bare Ultimate Boost Bra from Nordstrom because of open back. Rest of dress fits true to size.

I rented this dress for my 40th Birthday Party. It was simply amazing. I rented the large based on the reviw of another customer who had a similar build. It was a little big in the bust and waist, but it still looked phenomenal. I got tons of compliments. I really felt like the bell of the ball!
Love this dress! Went out to dinner and a party in Houston and received so many compliments. Sexy with some class. Perfect dress. I'm buying it!
Rented this for my birthday and it was amazing! My only complaint is that the short side of the dress makes it nearly impossible to wear shape wear underneath.

While I liked this dress it did not photograph well & felt a little too long / big. It was a fine dress but looked "frumpy" at certain angles (and in a lot of pictures). As someone who rents often this was my least favorite dress (but I'm sure could look great on other body types).

links_reviews_title: I rented for vegas in August
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'9" 150 with Ds. I rented the S and the m. I only wore the M. The s was way too small. I should have rented the L. I might have wore the L if I had it. I rented this for an August trip to vegas. It's light but also heavy. A good combo. The slit was high, which I liked cause I was having a fun weekend. Would rent again. Highly recommend.

In a sea of black dresses, I felt like I stood out in the best way wearing this dress! It was a great length and super comfortable. Unfortunately though, it did run a tad big with the sleeve fitting loose on my arm and the bust leaving a bit of a gap near my underarm on the sleeveless side. Seems like it was made with larger chested girls in mind, but considering it's a size XS, I was disappointed in the fit. Otherwise, it was a fun dress to wear!

links_reviews_title: Such a gorgeous dresses, I bought it! True to size and it's so comfy.
links_reviews_text: #party #weddings #littleblackdress #events #datenight

I wore this dress to ComicCon, and it was comfortable enough to wear all day and then all night to an after party. I have had 3 kids, and it was pretty forgiving of my "momma" pooch. My husband loved it! I didn't have to wear anything under it. I would rent it again, for sure!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress fits true to size. I received many compliments with this dress will rent again
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress
Standout design, comfortable and sexy yet classy, loved it!

I loved how the bottom part had a slit and I was able to show off my legs. I loved how the top had enough exposure to show off a little bit but still be hidden. At first the cut outs are slightly weird but once I got used to them, I felt so sexy. A great dress for a night out.
True to size. Tons of compliments! Felt very fun for the night :)

links_reviews_title: This was the perfect dress for the gala I attended! Not just a simple black dress.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. Very comfortable.
I love the asymmetry of this dress. It is SHORT on one side, so definitely for the faint of heart. Fun rental!
I rented this for a work conference dinner in Las Vegas. This dress was perfect for such an occasion! Professional but yet playful for being in Vegas !

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear this for my birthday dinner.
links_reviews_text: The dress is so cute but the arms hips and chest were so baggy. I'm tight in a size 4 normally, with smaller hips and larger breasts but this dress was baggy in the hips and long sleeve. So much so that I could not wear it. Such a bummer because it's sexy and pretty.

I LOVED everything about this dress. The mesh panels were strategically placed so as to make them alluring, not trashy. I am 5'10" and the slit up the leg was juuust high enough to make me feel sexy, but not a big chance for a wardrobe malfunction either. I highly highly recommend!
This dress was it! Quintessential Vegas dress I loved the edgy ness of it and believe it or not I could still wear my tummy girdle lol
5’6” 120 34c The small was too loose. XS fit well everywhere but was a tad bit tight in the bust. The dress showed leg in a tasteful way with the uneven hemline. Great LBD!

links_reviews_title: Great cut but arm a little wide and skirt needs a little more structure for me
links_reviews_text: Really cool if i was taller with no thighs

links_reviews_title: Beautiful details and cut of dress
links_reviews_text: This dress is sexy, shows some skin but elegant at the same time.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit like a glove. I got so many questions about where I got the dress from!
links_reviews_text: Perfect for a sexy yet sophisticated cocktail outing
A dress that's equally classy and edgy. I love the mesh and split details. Will definitely re-rent!
Fun dress for art gala. Definitely show stopping but needed to make sure I was prepping for the event
Fit perfect, suggest wearing no bra or one of those sticky ones, Loved the dress overall and would rent again but there was a slight ripe in the mesh part by the zipper which was disappointing.

links_reviews_title: Lovely date night dress for our anniversary
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my 2 year anniversary with my boyfriend. I can range from a 0-4 in dresses and wore the XS here. I'm 5'10 and 34C. You can't wear a bra with this dress because the back mesh, so plan to have sticky nipples! It is really gorgeous and fun to wear, but the mesh by the zipper is SO HARD to zip up. Mine already had a hole by the mesh which was a problem too (I photoshopped it out of the pic). My boyfriend had to do it up for me while I held it closed because the hook was also broken and bent. So, it is fun to wear, but make sure you have some help unhand to get it on!!

Rented this dress for a charity ball (cocktail attire). It's such an unique dress. Love the design and personality it will bring you. I'm a XS/0 in most dress and this one is true to size. However, I had fitting issue around chest area. The mesh design in the back won't allow you to wear a bra so you'd either go with not wearing one or wearing nubra. But for small-chest women like me, it leaves a weird, empty space on your chest. It's just not a perfect fit. But overall I liked the dress.

I was self-conscious about wearing a cut-out dress, and I needed all the room the L could give. But it definitely got looks at the event and was comfortable to dance in. All in all a fun change-up to the flowery look I've done for spring and summer weddings.

links_reviews_title: perfect amount of formal & sexy! absolutely loved wearing this dress!
links_reviews_text: true to size & super comfortable too

I really liked this dress! Comfy and long enough for a wedding. Felt sexy in it but the long sleeve made it appropriate for a wedding in a hotel in the city. It was a little hard to get into. Which is why I chose the small to wear. Did not want to give this dress back.

This dress was so unique and fun. I rented it for my friends bachelorette party and got compliments on it all night. Incredibly comfortable fit, the material was much more stretchy than I thought it would be. Wish I owned this piece!

links_reviews_title: Just the right amount of sexy and so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress and would absolutely rent again! Rented a S with M as backup, and the S was a perfect, skin-hugging fit. I'm a performer so my outfits always have to pull double duty -- look awesome on stage and comfortable enough so I can move, shake, groove, and last 5+ hours without making me want to rip it off. The side side slit and bare arm were just enough sexiness that it felt dramatic but left something to the imagination. The bare middle is normally not my thing but the mesh covered enough so that it felt like just a whisper of flesh. Received compliments all night long and, most importantly, the best compliment was from my husband: "DAAAAMMMNNN!" As a side note -- I've rented from RTR 3 times and always felt amazing in every dress. You gotta good thing going here, RTR. :)

links_reviews_title: Dinner date with my husband at Versace's Home in Miami.
links_reviews_text: Funtastic! Flexible material and super comfortable, yet SEXY!

links_reviews_title: Trendy and fun - upgrade your LBD!
links_reviews_text: Great dress to go out in at night! The cut outs and asymmetrical design make it a lot of fun to wear. It bunched up kind of funny around my hips when I walked but it was super comfortable and lightweight. I wore it to dinner and then out to a club afterwards and it fit in at both places.
I wore this to a circus themed cocktail event and it fit the look I was going for perfectly. Love the dress, the fit, and the details!

I absolutely loved the details of this dress! I wore it for a bachelorette night out in Las Vegas, and I thought it was a good change among the other short & tight LBD's! The only challenge I had was around the bust area, since I couldn't wear a bra (or else it would show in the sheer part on the right side). I opted to use padding from my actual bra just to have something there, but ended up taking them out by the middle of the night because they kept coming up to show. (Also because I don't really have much to hold up! lol) So I can imagine this dress being better for those who have around a C cup or bigger, so you can fill it out better! :) I wish there were clearer photos!

I got this dress to wear for New Years Eve to a block party with my husband. It was a fun party dress! Totally loved it. The fit was great; however with broader athletic shoulders the medium was slightly snug in the lats and shoulders. Otherwise, the fit was perfect and comfortable. Would definitely rent again!

This dress highlighted my smaller waist. The top shifted around so my bra strap showed sometimes. I had to wear one just because I'm a larger cup size. I felt sexy and skinny all night. Lots of compliments!
When u need a dress to impress but also very classy.. this is the one!

links_reviews_title: Great dress, work appropriate with party flair
links_reviews_text: Great dress, the mesh side panel does ride up when yo usit down so be wary - thankfully there were long white tablecloths at the event. Zipper is very stiff to pull up so have patience and be careful, once on it is easy to get off! Dress was really comfy to dance all night and walk in. Perfect dress to look professional yet still a lot of fun at my boyfriends work christmas party.

Probably my favorite rental to date. I wore this dress to my engagement party and it was PERFECT! Super comfortable and Went perfect with the jean jacket I got as a gift with my new last name on it. I wore with strappy heels.

I LOVE this very beautiful dress! Best dress I have ever rented! So comfortable & high-quality. FYI: pictures of this dress you see show pure white; in real life, it is apparently white off or ivory white. It would make you feel pretty! I would love to rent this dress again in the future!

Wore this for my bridal shower. It hit just above the knee and looked great. There's a nice amount of stretch up top, so where I was worried that I might need more room in the busy, I really didn't need to be. Same as other reviewers, this is not a bright white, but definitely liked how the look came together.
Wore to my rehearsal dinner. Was so classic and elegant.

I am a size 6 through and through in most of my dresses and this one was a little too tight through the bust. The waist hit perfectly into my natural waist line and the length was just right. The fabric was a little thicker than I expected but worked out great as I wore it in December and made me love the dress more. I wore this to my friends nurse pinning ceremony.
Fit is great . Super comfortable and great fabric. Lots of compliments about the dress. Would definitely recommend. I ordered a 6 and a size up 8 . Wore the 6 didn't even try on the 8 haha

links_reviews_title: Fun, flirty dress for engagement photos
links_reviews_text: Thank god I got a size up! I am six feet tall and the 10 just did not work. 12 fit perfectly, was fun, comfortable and looked great in photos. I could have probably worked well in one size up, as I am a bit thicker around my hips and the under layer of fabric kept creeping up. Overall experience was great.

I rented this dress for my bridal shower. I usually wear between a 0-2 depending on the brand - for this dress I wore the 0, and it was still a little big. It was definitely wearable and I still loved it, but I would order a size down as your backup size. I got tons of compliments on this dress and I was very happy with it.

links_reviews_title: True to size, fun bride dress
links_reviews_text: Fit great, fun pleats, good for all weathers and accessories.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for engagement photos - had to wear a jacket to hide the tightness but overall loved it.
links_reviews_text: COLOR IS OFF-WHITE NOT BRIGHT WHITE. Tight fit on rib cage and arms. I am more athletic build in the upper body and it was a bit uncomfortable. I paired it with a jacket to make it work. Length was perfect, it wasn't see-through at all.
This dress was so so comfortable! It was super flattering and just the right length, perfect for my rehearsal dinner.
I ended up wearing the 8. The 6 fit, but the slip underneath just felt a title too tight. I liked the dress overall, but wish the slip underneath was a bit longer.
Wore this for my wedding rehearsal and rehearsal dinner! Since the wedding was outdoors, I paired suede booties and a leather bomber jacket to finish the look!

Wore this dress for one of my bridal showers. Very comfortable, nice quality, and good length (if you're looking for something more conservative). Although I liked this dress, I wasn't overly impressed.

Great dress! I wore this at my engagement party that turned out to be a little cooler than expected. Added a scarf and booties and it worked out just fine since I was running around anyway. Reviews warned it is really not white and the pleats would not be crisp and they were definitely right. I am usually between a 4 and a 6 depending on the style of dress and reviews said the shoulders could be tight so I ordered a 6 and an 8. Didn't even open the 8. The only issue was that the lining kept peeking out at the neckline. I am small-chested so maybe boobs would have held the lining in place better... I'll never know!

links_reviews_title: This dress is OK. Definitely not a showstopper.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. If you have broad shoulders, it’s not for you. Made me look even more broad. It’s not white! It’s more of a beige white. Off white. Cute dress, but not my first choice
I wore this and one other colorful dress for engagement pictures. This was super cute and classic, a little on the short side.
Fit was perfect! Was a bit shorter than I would usually wear, but other than that it was incredibly flattering. Color was almost ivory and really cute. Perfect for my rehearsal and dinner!

I wore this for my engagement party and it was perfect! Not too dressy, not too casual. It was more beige in person than I thought but I kind of enjoyed that it wasn't stark white or ivory. Definitely wear a necklace to add a little pizazz to this dress! Fit well, felt a little tight on the rib area as the night went on, good length and flowy. Highly recommend this one!
PERFECT dress for rehearsal dinner! I loved loved loved this dress! Highly recommend. It is fun and conservative at the same time. Comfortable and yet form fitting.

I rented this for my son's baptism and it was so comfortable. I loved the dress but it smelled like food or something gross and I didn't realize it was me until I had already left the house. Would rent again though if I had another reason for a white dress!

links_reviews_title: Worked well for my bridal shower
