links_reviews_text: I ordered the 4 and 6 and found the lining on the legs to be a bit tight on the 4 as well as the chest so I wore the six. I think it would have got better if I could have had a petite because my short torso seemed to make it gap under my chest sometimes. Additionally I kind of felt like it made my hips seem even wider than they are. Overall though it was comfy and was the perfect dress for my shower and I got lots of compliments.
So cute!

This dress is nothing like the image. It’s not white, it’s beige. And it’s more frumpy than flirty. I thought the skirt would be more accordion like but it’s really not. I ordered this for my bridal shower but returned it because it’s more like a conservative outfit/day in the office.

links_reviews_title: Slipped on and felt amazing immediately
links_reviews_text: My first RTR. Fit just right and how I hoped it would. Playful, pretty, and classic for my Rehearsal Dinner. Will definitely rent Trina Turk again!
I wore this for my wedding rehearsal and dinner. The fit was very comfortable and I loved the flow of the skirt. It was easy to wear all night and I got many compliments. Would recommend this!

I rented this dress for my sons baptism. I thought the fit was flattering to my post part body. I've had several RTR successes and added this to the list. I wish I had a statement necklace to complete the look

I rented this dress when I graduated with my Masters! It was perfect and extra comfy! It was a great length and wasn't too heavy for the warm day! The fit was great (my top half is smaller than my bottom half so this dress was perfect for my body type)! Would definitely rent again!

This dress was lovely, a very light fabric and a flattering A line. The dress is lined which is nice given the light color. The sleeves were good - not at all tight, and the length fell just above my knee which was perfect.

I rented this as backup dress for family photos. The fabric and pleats keep it from being casual and the size 4 fit like a glove! Fun to twirl in too! I'd pair with a pop of color necklace and shoes if i rented again. Perfect dress for a shower or graduation. Off white/cream color.

It was a cute and comfortable dress! I'm a 32 D bra size and usually wear a 4, but the bust was a little tight so I chose to wear the 6. It fit better in the bust. Overall I was very happy! I added a pink belt to it. I thought the dress would be more white, but it's more of an ivory/cream color which didn't bother me at all. Would love for this dress to come in more colors since I loved it so much!!
I felt classy and comfortable and received many compliments! The zipper looks worn (paint chipping off of the metal) but that happens when it's being rented and worn many times. Good dress!

links_reviews_title: Great pleats, but didn't end up wearing.
links_reviews_text: This dress has beautiful pleating details and is made of great quality material. I didn't love where the waist fell on me, so I didn't end up wearing it. One thing to note, however, is that this dress is not pure white like the pictures online suggest. The two sizes that I got were more of an off-white or cream color that looked a little dingy... The dress had great movement though and I loved the fuller skirt.
The fabric was almost like a thick linen. Not shiny as I imagined and the white was almost an off white. Wore the 12 to be more comfy and for extra length.

I wore this dress for my bridal shower. It was a casual, happy hour type setting, and the dress was perfect for it! I really liked how this dress was more so an off-white color in person, rather than how white it appears in the listing photos. The dress fit perfectly, other than being a little tight in the bust area. Perfect dress for a perfect day!
I loved the fit and swing of the dress. I got so many compliments, and felt like it was perfect for our rehearsal dinner.

links_reviews_title: Looked great paired with a statement necklace. So comfortable!!
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit. I wore this for my rehearsal dinner and was able to sit, stand, eat, hug, and everything else in between. It isn't pure white, but my guests still complimented me all evening!

Wore this for my engagement photos and I really liked it. I didn't love it because it wasn't super fitted on the top, as I thought it might be. It definitely is a little longer for shorter girls, so it definitely ran past my knee even with a little heel. Nonetheless, it's a cute dress, fun to wear, lightweight and super comfortable.

I loved this dress! It perfected my rehearsal dinner with a simple elgance that made me feel like a bride. The skirt moves well for dancing, came to just above my kee, and was a heavier fabric uptop that felt perfect for the January evening. It also paired well with the Kate Spade necklace, featured in the photo.

I rented this for my engagement party! I usually wear a 10, but I ended up going with the 12 due to my bust size. (There was a bit of awkward pulling around my bust in the 10.) For reference, I am 5'5 and a DD. I got tons of compliments all night and was so comfortable! This dress was more of an off-white color and not see through at all!

This top is lovely. It fit a little snug but no one could tell but me and I felt pretty amazing in it. Paired it with some high waisted suspender pants and got compliments all day! ...mostly on the pants... but you gotta agree, they're pretty great pants.

I got so many compliments all day long. I rented this through Unlimited for a regular work day, but my day was made by all of the compliments! Great fit, form fitting and flattering, yet not too tight. Love the lace. I wore the cami that came with it. I am a 34C, 145lbs and I wore the 8. Comfortable.

Loved this. I personally don't like to wear a strapless bra and also don't like bra straps under lace, thus I went bra less .... but due to the lace thickness it was absolutely fine. But something to consider when renting.

If you are like me-your clothing BFF is black. If you are ready to take a leap, this shirt is a great choice. The fit was good, and the lace wasn't uncomfortable. It has nice details and makes an impact when worn. Flattering on, and the sleeves were a good length!

links_reviews_title: Love the blouse will rent again
links_reviews_text: Runs small if you have big boobs. I'm an A cup and didn't wear a bra
Beautiful lace top, can be worn with a bralette but decided to wear with the tank provided. The 8 for well but went with the 10, longer arms and more chest room.
Cami was a bit loose but overall fine. Very pretty top! Wish it was a tad bit longer.

Great fit (sorry for the crappy photo); quality lace, no snags; gave 4 stars b/c it made me feel and look a little busty with the ruffle positioning but that's not the shirts fault! LOL. Would recommend regardless!

links_reviews_title: True to size, very flattering and classic look.
links_reviews_text: I worn this for our holiday family photo shoot. It photographed very well. Was comfortable and completed our holiday theme.
I wore this top on an Alaska cruise. It was perfect because it was long sleeve for the cooler temperatures. It was also fancy enough for a nice dinner.
Suits very well with the event

This top runs true to size and is a beautiful color and a great fit. My top came with a cami, so no concerns about it being see through. I also am pretty busty and have broad shoulders and I had no problems zipping up the 8. This is sometimes an issue for me.
Great color, rented it twice and would wear again
Loved this piece!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color and detailing. Felt like a Glamorous Modern Victorian.
links_reviews_text: I am a true 2 on top and this top fit perfectly with no room to spare. A 4 would have probably been ok too. It's a bit difficult to manage the back zipper because of the lack of stretch but I managed. I paired this with a patterned Asian skirt and got a ton of compliments. The color is even prettier in person. Be aware that the sleeves, upper chest/neck, and a upper back are all sheer lace. The cami provides some modesty, but the sheerness elsewhere limited where I could wear this.

Very sexy shirt!! The top is actually lace (see though). So if you are not trying to show skin, you will need to wear something under it. It fits true t size, but size up for the back up size. The fabric has not stretch and a NuBra would work best! (or maybe a nude color bra).

Very pretty! I receieved many compliments on this top. It is not very forgiving and has no stretch, i recommend sizing up for back up. The red slip that comes with the top makes it appropriate for everyday. The slip is a little longer than the lace top but it's the exact same color so it blends and doesn't really make a difference. Overall a great and different rental!

Rented this for a post-thanksgiving brunch. At first I didn't think the size 6 would zip all be way up but it did. The Top was very comfortable and I didn't feel restricted. I'm a 34G and did not need to wear a bra because it was close fitting.
This top is gorgeous without being over the top. I wore it to work and got endless compliments. The 12 fit great even with a large bust.
Cute top for an evening out. I loved the color! Runs a little small... it was a bit snug in the bust, but couldn't tell with the lace blouse over top.
Wore this to a birthday party. I received a ton of compliments all night. Very versatile as I could have dressed this up with a black pencil skirt. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Nice lace top with tank liner
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. The tank liner is detached so you could opt for a different undergarment. It is a very pretty scarlet red and the lace is a nice quality. It ended up being too cold to wear it, but I would rent again.
Beautiful!!

links_reviews_title: Fit perfectly. (No stretch in fabric so be careful.)
links_reviews_text: This was beautiful and true to size. If I was any bigger in my chest it would not have fit.
Loved this! The color was bold and beautiful and the ruffles set it apart from other lace tops

links_reviews_title: Cute top, but runs SO small!
links_reviews_text: Cute top, but runs SO SMALL!! I am typically a size 6-8 and I couldn't even get the size 8 over my head. Super bummed as I was pumped to wear this.
With body suit and cami or with just the lace and no cami or body suit, very lovely and stands out!

links_reviews_title: It had an odor to it that was then covered by a febreeze like perfume.
links_reviews_text: The fabric was not soft. Though the design is cute it is not for every day wear and not necessarily for nightlife.
Fun lace top. Even wore the undershirt separately with a blazer, as the quality is great. Flattering and form fitting. A good top to rent since it's noticeable.

This top fits like a glove. I was bloated but you could not tell in this top. I'm between a 2-4 (more of a 4 now these days) Be careful with your charmed jewelry, it can snag. I did not however, I was careful. No need for extra necklaces, the top is beautiful without extra bedazzlement. #Go be fierce

links_reviews_title: Too small, I couldn't get it on
links_reviews_text: Adorable top but due to the cut and fabric, I couldn't get it on. I got a 6 and should have sized up a couple sizes.
I'm a 32C, I should have gotten a size 4. It runs a bit small

Everything about this top was beautiful: the color, the fabric and the fit! It is very fitted at the waistline, which made for a flattering fit but note that it doesn't have stretch. Would rent again!
Tight in shoulders. Great color. Perfect for any occasion- just change your footwear

links_reviews_title: Was so excited when this arrived
links_reviews_text: What a beautiful blouse. The photos do not do it justice. And it arrived with it's own camisole. I ordered up a size as I know winter lace doesn't have "give". It fit perfectly, even the torso was long enough, except the arms were too short so I couldn't wear it. But, I am tall, so I am sure it would be perfectly sized for someone under 5'8".

links_reviews_title: Too small- should have listened to reviews
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately, I didn't listen to the reviews and order a size up. There weren't sizes larger available so I should have waited. Beautiful lace!
This shirt looked beautiful! I'm top heavy but the fit was perfect!
very fitted but not bodycon
Looked really pretty but didn't get to wear it because it was too small to zip.
Will fit a petite small chested gal!
Loved this day dress. Lightweight and perfect cutout placement to make it interesting. Wore it in colorado for the weekend. Lightweight material.

I originally rented this in a 1P knowing that I'm short and curvy but I felt like the fit was kind of off-- too much room in the waist. But on a whim I sized down to the 0R and even though it was a bit long the fit was otherwise perfect! I wore a cute lacy bra because you could see it poke through on the sides, and it looked super cute. It's also EXTREMELY versatile. I wore it to a rehearsal dinner but you could dress it up for a wedding or dress it down for everyday.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a wedding in the vineyard!
links_reviews_text: LOVED the material!! Really flattering and flowy. On the larger side.. I am typically a 4R/27, but actually wore the 0R, which was the smallest size (besides petite) that the dress came in. A bit on the longer side too!

This dress was such a treat to wear for a day walking and shopping in Amsterdam. It's cute, comfortable and stylish. I'm a 2 and the 1 fit well, I wore a small 2 inch block heel and the dress only barely swept the floor.

links_reviews_title: Great maxi but a little long
links_reviews_text: For perfect and the cut outs hit in the perfect spot to make you look thin at the waist. I'm 5'7 and if was a bit long. Could only wear with heels, flats were a no go
Comfortable and fun to wear
Fit true to size- very comfortable and flattering

links_reviews_title: The cut outs were perfect on me and I just felt lovely!
links_reviews_text: This was the perfect dress for wine tasting at a place that had horses - I lived out my prairie land dreams! The cut outs gave it a little bit of elevation, and showed of my tattoos! Would totally rent again if I didn't have 24029523 photos in it already!
Numerous people gave me compliments in this dress, random woman walked up to me while I was in Vegas. Was a great day dress!

links_reviews_title: Not the most flattering for tummy pooch
links_reviews_text: The panel on the front of this dress really highlights a problem area for me. I don't recommend renting if you are self conscious about a lower belly pooch.
Super cute and flattering. Just wore out to date night and threw on a leather jacket for warmth and it was perfect. Can't wait to rent again in the summer to show off the cutouts

I fell in love with this dress instantly! I rented it for date night, but we have had nonstop rain and cold so I wasn't able to wear it. I will def rent again, and would buy it if it was within my budget! Runs a tad big, but I would still go with your usual size. This dress is light and breezy, and just sexy enough to be worn anywhere.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for New Years Eve and on a dinner cruise in Australia!!
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress... Super comfortable while being elegant and sexy :)

links_reviews_title: Sexy dress without being too revealing.
links_reviews_text: I wore this on a night out and although there are cutouts on the side, the dress is actually pretty conservative. I am 5'10" but the length was great. I have a small bust and the top was a bit roomy. Loved the comfort of it and I loved wearing it.
Beautiful dress and flattering side cut outs. Runs a little large in the chest. Unfortunately the dress I received had some holes in the back hem otherwise I would have purchased.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful for going out or lounging
links_reviews_text: Sexy without showing too much. The cut outs are in the perfect place and low cut but easily pinned. Wore it with heels and flip flops and looked the part both ways. I will rent it again for sure
This is super slenderizing and amazing for the weekend, a party, or even a casual wedding.
Loved this dress. Cute and sexy.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress. On trend pattern and the side cutouts are flattering
links_reviews_text: I couldn't find a way to wear a bra without the sides showing through the cutout sides so I went braless. Probably wouldn't do that again, but fine for some chests, I'm sure. I'm usually between a size 2 and 4 and the size 1 fit perfectly. I was surprised at how flattering the cutouts are. I normally can't pull off this trend because I'm not An a hourglass shape. Would rent this again this fall.

Such a fun dress and very sexy. The cut outs added a bit of intrigue. It ran long so wore heels and had to hold it up to dance ! Also ran a smidge big so had to constantly pull up to not over expose my busts ! Overall, I loved the fit and would wear to a dinner that doesn't involve dancing. ;)

This dress is beautiful, high quality and comfortable. I wish I had sized down though so that I would have had a better shot at filling the chest and so that the side holes would have been less prominent (maybe??). But I just threw a jean jacket on top for dinner with my parents and it worked.

I love this dress and wore it 5+ times. No stretch but relaxed and breezy cut. Very flattering. I had to use a safety pin with a regular bra, and did a little taping action when I wanted to wear without. Cutouts were great. I was able to wear with flats and 2 inch heels. I might end up buying this one.

links_reviews_title: Worn late Summer for resort dressy occasion in Mexico
links_reviews_text: This dress fit much better than expected. The draping and hanging (technical terms I'm sure) was so flattering. I have very little to boast about up-top, so it was not scandalous. Worn in 95* weather, it was surprisingly breezy. Easy to travel with- fabric has some crepe to it so slight wrinkle looked intentional
I loved this dress even more than I thought I would! The cutouts are perfectly placed and flattering, even on my body. I would highly recommend. The fit was perfect and I got so many compliments!

I love this dress. Wore twice over the weekend - first for a casual birthday party and then to a nice date night dinner. After first wear I realized a little tape would help keep the top in place. It's a little low / wide in the neck and chest. Overall a great length - I'm 5'8" and it was perfect with flat sandals. Love. Buying this one.

I loved this dress. The fabric felt nice and the cut-outs were really cute without being "too much". I definitely needed a 2 but only a 1 was available. It was still wearable, but it felt really tight on my lower waist and didn't quite lay right. I wore this to dinner with my boyfriend on his birthday and he loved it :)

I really should have rented the 1R, but thought I'd take a chance with the 0R. I was able to wear it, but I had to pin it so as not to show too much cleavage & you can see my bra from the side (though no one else seemed to notice). Also it was a little too long, even with 4.5" platforms but I liked it so much that I just picked it up as I walked. The coral & turquoise colors are much more striking in person. I would absolutely rent this again - but in the right size the next time!

links_reviews_title: Made me feel beautiful, I will be buying this!!
links_reviews_text: I bought this dress just to wear to brunch or out with the girls but it was so beautiful I wore it to a wedding instead of the French Connection dress I had bought a month earlier. My boyfriend saw me in and said that it was "the dress." So happy I went for it and got it "just because."

I lived in this dress so I finally just bought it. I love how it is conservative yet has some cheeky cut outs. Very flattering and lovely print. The only issue is that it is very long for my 5"5 frame. I wore it to date night and it is super comfy.
Rented this dress for our Hawaii vacation. It was the perfect dress! Very comfortable, light weight, long, and overall fit. I'm still debating on going back and buying it.

Love this dress. Great length (I wore with a low block heel mule) and cut outs keep you cool. I probably should have gone with the 0 because I don't have a lot going on up top and there was a lot of room but I think it looked ok. The mister really liked it, apparently the cut-outs are very sexy :P and it's comfy at the same time!
So comfortable, very lovely dress, I will rent it again for sure!
Was long for me (5'2) but I didn't mind holding the dress a bit as I walked. It's very low cut so I wore a bandeau

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a Memorial Weekend wedding reception. I loved the style and it's very easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: I have a relatively small waist and chest and it was roomy in the bust and around the side cut outs. Nothing terrible, especially since I wore this for the reception of the wedding and didn't have to worry about my dress being too tight when you want to eat. :)

Fits perfectly. Really cute cut-out detail at waist that is just revealing enough without being uncomfortable or offensive. Hem hits just past the ankle so you can wear flats or sandals without it dragging. Fabric isn't the most breathable but is sturdy enough that it doesn't wrinkle throughout the day with normal wear. Honestly considering purchasing this to own!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress that is easy to wear! Love!
links_reviews_text: I had gotten this dress previously in a 2 and it was much too big so I've been waiting for the right time to get it again and I'm glad I finally did! I wore the 1 in this dress and probably should have gone for the 0, but it was still wearable, just slightly big. I'm also small chested which added to the fit issue, but nothing a piece of fashion tape couldn't solve. As others noted, it does run long. I'm 5'7 and it was very long in flats.
This dress fit true to size. Very Comfortable and flowy. Even with the side cutouts, I wore a standard bra. Its perfect for a day out in the springtime

links_reviews_title: Need to be TALL for this one
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing this because the top was just huge. You would need to be at least 5' 8" to make this work. Disappointing because the cutouts were in just the right spot and the pattern was very pretty.
Perfect for vacation or a wedding! Can be dressed up or down. So flattering and comfortable. Will definitely rent again

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it. Too tight and poofy
links_reviews_text: This runs REALLY small. I didn't wear it because of that... and because it just wasn't flattering. Maybe it's better for someone who is really tall and thin.

links_reviews_title: Got many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: The light weight fabric and cute floral print made this an easy summer dress. Could be worn to a day or night event since it's a little t length. Slightly low cut since I'm busty-er but not too showy. It's very easy to wear got lots of compliments at work and around town!

This dress was definitely too small in a size 14. It's really a pretty dress though and the material is gorgeous! I didn't like it enough to get it in the next size and I don't even know if it's available.
Gorgeous dress! Got lots of compliments and the fit is perfect

Absolutely adored this dress!! Would 100% rent again. However, it did run a full size larger than what I usually wear? (Or I had had too many lobster rolls...idk) Usually, I wear a 2, and this fit snuggly as a 4R. It was a perfect fit though. The fabric is very soft and light weight so you don't even want to take it off! Perfect dress for dinner by the water and a weekend in the Hamptons.

I rented this for a friend's bridal shower. It was super flattering and very comfortable. It could make your stomach look big, but because of the print and ruffles, it really ended up hiding everything. I would rent again.

This dress was so pretty in person but it was so snug across the ribs it would not have been comfortable to wear. I was so sad. I read the reviews and saw it ran small so I went up a size but should have gone up two sizes.
Ran a little small in the chest but otherwise comfortable and received lots of comps!

links_reviews_title: comfortable - wore for a garden party
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress - but would suit a taller woman better
32D 5'4 120 lbs. size 4 fit perfectly
Nice dress, but a bit snug in the armholes.

I am in LOVE with this dress! Gorgeous beyond words. However, it runs SMALL in the bust. I was super disappointed but I'm normally an 8 or 10 and I couldn't close the rib cage zipper of this dress in a size 12. :( If you are smaller or average size chest, rent this!!
I wore it for a work cocktail reception/dinner and my bridal shower- worked perfectly for both events! Would rent again

Flattering silhouette and lovely blue on white pattern makes this dress perfect for a summer party or date night. The gauze material dress is lined to the knee providing good coverage. I ordered a 12 but could have easily fit in a 10. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, but like other notes, runs small through chest
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear because couldn't zip through chest
This dress did fit me but was very difficult to zip. The fabric had no give. It felt very tight on my chest. Would be better for smaller chest people.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, great pattern, difficult to zip
links_reviews_text: This lovely feminine dress was perfect for work and I received so many compliments. I had to wear a cami, which wasn't a problem. I had such a difficult time getting it to zip, I had to swing by a friend's house on the way to work to get help zipping!

links_reviews_title: Great for a casual daytime event
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a bridal shower and then a baby shower, it worked well for both. Very flattering and airy dress.

I got so many compliments on this! The neckline is really feminine, the length is a perfect tea length, the pattern is really pretty, and the shape is super flattering. I'm 5 months pregnant and still was able to make this work great for two different parties I had to go to. If you're pregnant too, I would recommend sizing up because of the side zip!
For is good, except it is VERY small around the boobs....like multiple inches wouldn't get close to zipping as soon as it touched bottom of bra.
I absolutely loved this dress and felt like it was forgiving in all the right spots. The pattern is gorgeous and it's comfortable to wear. I plan on renting it again!
Did not wear.
The top is pretty and fits nice but the skirt and the way the ruffles are placed make the bottom super unflattering.

I ordered my regular size but it was too small around the ribcage and chest, with no stretch, and I wasn't able to get it zipped. If I order again, I'll go 2 sizes up It is a beautiful dress and looks perfect for summer!

This one is a bummer, because it is SO CUTE in person. But the fit across the chest is VERY small. No chance of my DDs fitting in this dress - I would have needed at least two sizes up. The hip and waist size had plenty of room, so really it was all an issue of bust. Frustrating, because will all the ruffles etc, this easily could have had some elastic stretch to the fabric, as opposed to an unforgiving side zip.
Fits TTS, forgiving around the belly. Definitely for daytime, or at least for outdoor wedding. Pretty with heels but could dress down with sandals. Loved it.
Dress was adorable, but couldn't get zipper up. I will rent again in larger size, but then just may look too voluminous in sleeves. But if you are larger in rib cage and waist, may have to size up!

Perfect dress for a casual outdoor rehearsal dinner. The fabric is prone to wrinkling and it was a little big in the chest and throughout shoulders, but the overall shape was super cute. Pattern was fun and light!

links_reviews_title: Not for me. Completely swallowed my petite frame, and did nothing for my figure.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. A bit hard to get over your shoulders when taking off (at least if they are broader like mine). For petite women, I felt the length was good. The sleeves are huge and definitely a statement! I did not end up wearing because I felt it made me look pregnant, which I definitely not.
Snug around the midsection but not too bad. I felt good wearing it.
Love the fit and feel of this dress. The sleeves definitely made a statement. Beautiful colors as well.
Tight around stomach, but such a fun dress.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress is super cute, it's different enough that people noticed it and complimented me a lot. I wish it came in abut more at the waist, but this is a problem I have with a lot of dresses so can't fault this one. Am very happy with it!
This was cute, but on the "meh" side. It was wrinkly and too big in the top but fit well in the hips and waist.

Everything about this dress is adorable! The patter is fun and the cut is very flattering. It was fitted around my middle so if you have a tummy this doesn't hide it unless you size up so it's looser. The longer sleeves are great too. I will rent this again.
I am a huge Kate spade fan and this dress was one of my favorites. The color and print are beautiful and it was so fun to wear.

I wanted to love this dress, but I didn't. It arrived very wrinkled, so I ironed it. However, by the time I got to work it was already wrinkled again - it was just the fabric. The dress was also a wee bit big. There was nothing flattering about the dress. I got a lot of compliments, because it is an eye-catcher, but not necessarily in a good way. The voluminous sleeves was a style for me. The zipper is under the arm, which I like as it is easy to get on and off. Not my favorite Kate Spade.
Top part is a little big but it was very flattering in the tummy area

Got this new with tags which I LOVE. The dress was not what I would have expected from Kate Spade. No under layer. Stiff Cotton material that wrinkled easily. Thought I would have liked this one more.
Great dress! Will show sweat in the light blue parts so make sure to wear primarily inside.

links_reviews_title: I loved it. Fit well and was very Flattering.
links_reviews_text: It fit well, the sleeves were a bit big but overall I felt comfortable.

Rented a 10 - a size up from my normal- as I have worn in other Kate Spade dresses and it was a mistake. The fabric is draped to be a bit voluminous so the extra room from the 10 left me swimming in the sleeves. I think an 8 would've been better.

This dress is very lightweight, perfect for Easter, a shower or party in the spring or summer or fall if it’s still warm. I loved the fit and the length on me was perfect, just above the knee. Will be short on anyone tall/long legs, but not too short. It did gap just a bit at the top. I wore this to church and stuck some fashion tape to hold it closed in the middle of my bra, which I would recommend for church or work, but wouldn’t be needed for a party/night out. Fun dress, loved wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress with an interesting cut. I wanted to wear to work but too casual and lightweight
links_reviews_text: Loved that it was asymmetrical and fun pattern, but fit weird. Very large in chest. Not a fan. Great for very warm weather because very light.

links_reviews_title: Fun, flirty, and still work appropriate!
links_reviews_text: This dress is what dreams are made of! It is beyond flattering (runs small so size up)--it has zero stretch but it holds you in and doesn't pull. It's so comfortable. The length is perfect for work and work events. I wore it during the day in the office and threw on a fun pair of heals for a work event right after. It's a perfect dress!!!

links_reviews_title: Loved it! So cute an comfortable!
links_reviews_text: great fit! great color!

So I got size 14 based on the recommendation from the website. I can fit in the dress but the bust part is way too big for my relatively flat chest. My belly was comfortable when I'm at size 14. I think it may be a little bit too tight if I were in size 12. The cut of the dress would flatter mid-section but it just doesn't works for me when I'm in between sizes. It's a lovely design. Perfect for hot summer. not ideal for layering since the puffy sleeves aren't jacket friendly. I end up not wearing it :( I think it's my problem - not the dress. I think this dress will fit perfectly for ladies with regular height.

links_reviews_title: This ran large and was way too billowy to wear.
links_reviews_text: This ran large and was way too billowy to wear.
Got a lot of compliments the unique sleeves and bottom. Was a little tight but if I went a size up I think fabric would've been too overwhelming

links_reviews_title: Loved this summer dress ! Perfect for everyday and vacation.
links_reviews_text: All Pros, No Cons !
I like this dress but never found the right event to wear it. It may be too "young" for me.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, right fit (with some fashion tape) give it a try!
links_reviews_text: The fabric pattern is adorable and the details on the dress are really cute. Some others have commented that the sleeves are a little large and even though that are larger I found them to not be overbearing. I am glad that I rented a 0 instead of a 2, the 2 would have been way too large, so know your sizing and read the comments based on your body type and measurements. The top of this dress was still gaping a bit and a little too large, but I am short waisted and small shoulders, so fashion tape helped it from popping open too far and looking terrible. I did expect this dress to be lined, for a Kate Spade design, and know that it is not lined, but did not change the design or comfort of the dress, just would have been quality I would expect if purchasing.
Fit perfectly
Loved the fit but the material wrinkles. Wore it to dinner with friends.
Cute dress, Runs very big - did not end up wearing. Definitely size down!!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful colors and fit. A tiny big in the bust area but overall fit great.
links_reviews_text: Loved it!
I had to return this as I could barely get it over my head, let alone fit my boobs in.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress but not for a warm day
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to work and it shows EVERY little wet part of your body and doesn't breathe. By the end of the day, I had sweat stains across my waist which were thankfully hidden by the pattern. Still embarrassing to see sweat marks all over. Not just the underarms.
runs a little large in the waist and hips but not too much, still form fitting
Too bad it didn't fit probably a size 18
I didn't end up wearing this. The sleeves seemed comically large and the overall proportions of the dress were off. It fit, but was weird looking.

links_reviews_title: I used it for a photo shoot.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly and this dress was just so beautiful and the prints on it were very gorgeou. I Would definitely rent it again.
My husband hated the sleeves and they felt weird... the whole top is too big. I had to cover up with a cardigan. Otherwise it's cute and flattering for my tummy area and not too short.

links_reviews_title: SUCH a weird fit. Wrinkly material. Awful.
links_reviews_text: SUCH a weird fit. Wrinkly material. Awful.
I loved everything about this dress except that it's so hard to keep wrinkle free
fit nice, received lots of compliments!
Im 5.3” and the size 4 runs small to me. The size 6 runs small at the hips. But it fit better than the size 4.

I loved this dress! I received several compliments on the color. I was a little sad that the dress came without the sleeves indicated in the picture. It's a pretty snug mermaid fit (not made for the dance floor), but I'd easily rent again!

links_reviews_title: The color was gorgeous. Got compliments all night
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove and is very comfortable. The main downside is that the sleeves make it difficult to move your arms. The bust area runs a bit small so had to pull it up throughout the night.

Rented this gown for black tie optional wedding. Loved everything about this dress. The color is gorgeous and the fit was perfect. I was nervous the dress would slip, and I would be tugging all night to keep it up, however that was not the case. I did take my arms out of the sleeves while dancing. I would highly recommend this dress. I'm 5'5" and weigh 124lbs.

This dress made me feel like a Barbie doll! It turned my small frame into a stunning hour glass figure. My rear looked great and the dress had some give in the stomach area. I wore spanks just to be safe. Tbh moving in this dress was pretty difficult. I wouldn't suggest this dress to someone who may play a large roll at an event like a member of the bride's entourage or event planner. I took the sleeves off when a group of friends wanted to play pool in the game room at the wedding venue lol
It fit nicely. Midsection was slightly loose. I could have used a 0, but that was too tight around the bum! I think it is just my body type. Otherwise, felt beautiful in the dress

links_reviews_title: The color pop and figure flattering style were most popular about this dress.
links_reviews_text: Per 4 weeks post partum and 10 pounds heavier than pre-pregnancy weight, I had to go up 2 sizes. In picture i weighed 128 pounds at 5'4 and curvy. Very flattering dress. Sleeves hung a little lower than expected but still flattering.

I wore a size zero, and it fit great! A couple of notes: the bust was a little large for me, I would recommend boob tape. Also, I loved how form-fitting it was, but it was a little constricting on the dance floor. If you like to dance at weddings maybe look for something looser!

I struggled to get this up my hips. But once it's on, it's on. The dress is a very snug fit and the fabric has a little stretch but not enough for dancing. Overall, I'm really happy with my purchase. I felt great and my date was floored.

It was a beautiful dress and the style/cut is unique. I would size up if you have any type of shape (I.e. hips). I'm pear shaped and could barely move in the 6. However, the 8 was a bit loose on the top but fit in the bottom/thigh area. So I had to go with the 8. The sleeves do hinder dancing but it's easy to get used to.

The fit, color and length was perfect for me. The dress was also very comfortable and held itself up easily even though it's technically strapless. I did not have to keep pulling it up all night. The only negative is that i couldn't raise my hands very high to dance, but all the good outweighed that minor detail. I got SO many compliments and felt very pretty in this gown. I would definitely rent this again!

Loved the style and fit of this dress, however it definitely runs very small! I'd recommend going up one or two sizes. Got a ton of compliments though! Color is a little more purple then pictured but it's really pretty.
I wore this when I was 7 month pregnant for a friend's wedding. Very comfortable. At the time I was a 34C & 150lbs.

This dress is very elegant and the color is beautiful. I didn't end up wearing though because it is super restrictive due to the mermaid shape (not comfortable walking) and sleeves around the arms (not able to lift arms). For a wedding it would've made dancing hard. The dress is also very low cut in nature so would've been having to adjust all evening. Would definitely recommend for an event where you aren't moving around as much (i.e. a gala or awards ceremony).

links_reviews_title: Wish the bridesmaids weren't wearing a similar style!!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely OBSESSED with the fit and color and way it hugged your curves so beautifully! I was so upset to find out the bridesmaids had a very similar dress, otherwise I would have worn it! If I have another black tie wedding I will rent again no questions asked!
Stylish, bright, beautiful dress! The fit was perfect! Length was shorter in the front, great for shorter ladies as most RTR dresses have been too long for me.

The color is Ahhhhhhmazzzzzing! The dress style is so sexy but so classy at the same time. The dress does run small so size up for your back up size. I usually wear a size 4 but wore my back up size 6 which was still a bit snug.

links_reviews_title: Hugs You in all the Right Places!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! It really accentuated my curves, and the color was so vibrant, matching my skin tone perfectly. I chose my regular size because I liked for my dresses to hug me, but I could've use my back up dress if I wanted to. The sleeves were a little restrictive for me. Definitely want to get a pair of statement shoes because they will be doing a little "peek-a-boo"!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! It fits perfectly and I got a ton of compliments.
links_reviews_text: It is very curve hugging with little room to move but I didn't mind it. #wedding

I wish I could've worn the dress. As I began pulling on the dress, I loved the fit of it. As I got around my butt and upper thighs, the dress got very snug. I would've had to been waddling around at my event because there wasn't a whole lot of room for moving my legs. The final nail in the coffin was when I couldn't get it to zip up around my back. Perhaps if I had less boob it would've been able to fit? The color is gorgeous, though the length is a lil awkward.
Fits a little snug and the sleeves make it hard to use your arms, but not bad enough to keep me from dancing for four hours. Love the look!
Great fit that hugged all my curves! I felt so elegant and got a lot of complements.

links_reviews_title: Wore to my non-profit's Masquerade themed gala!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely gorgeous color and dress, slightly big on tummy area (pro: no Spanx needed) and did need to be pulled up a little throughout the night
Perfect color, fit, and different than any other dress at the party! Def a show stopper!! Loved it!!

This was my backup dress & boy did I LOVE it! I'm 5'3 and usually fit between a 2/4. I would consider myself athletic built but I'm a shorty with some curve and the 4 fit beautifully. The weight and quality of the dress was amazing and I kept getting so many compliments. I just can't speak enough about the quality of the material. Definitely would recommend! *note in the photo I'm in 4 inch heels if that helps women taller than me with length!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Felt stunning and made the night great!! Really loved it!
links_reviews_text: Dress was very tight at the hips, Although it is strapless, didn't have much of a problem keeping it up (although wasn't able to move my arms as much as I wanted to) but was able to even dance in it, eventually! Beautiful color!

I wore this dress to an exclusive Mardi Gras ball, and it was a hit - I felt like all eyes were on me while I was in this dress. If you want to make an impact, this is a good choice. However, if you want to be comfortable, this probably isn't the dress for you. I'm 5'7" and about 160 lbs, and I have an athletic and curvy figure; typically I wear a 6 or an 8. This dress really accentuated my curves in the best way. I rated it 3 out of 5 because this dress was so unbelievably uncomfortable. Because of the way the sleeves are designed, I couldn't lift my arms above my head and it made drinking, dancing, and eating almost impossible.
The dress fits like a glove. Extremely flattering. Couldn't raise my hands due to the sleeve design but I was still able to have fun it. I would definitely recommend this gorgeous dress to anyone

links_reviews_title: Super fun and flirty dress that hugs curves perfectly
links_reviews_text: This dress was actually my backup dress, but I fell in love with it! It's super flattering on curves and the color is a pretty purple in person. I'm 5/7" and had a 2 and half inch heel, so I probably should have gone with the 2L not the 2R but other than that the dress was perfect!

links_reviews_title: The earrings were beautiful and the dress fit me like a glove! I received compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit true to size, a little tight in the waist but I'm just not used to wearing form fitting type dresses. Even the off the shoulder sleeves stay put and weren't annoying like I thought they might be.

links_reviews_title: This dress was gorgeous! I got tons of compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: The dress runs small. The color is a lot darker in person but still beautiful! I think I liked it more in person. It make the figure look great since it's pretty tight, I got used to it but it's still hard to lift your arms too. Overall I would definitely rent it again.

This was a last minute order after the first two I got for a black tie gala weren't what I was looking for. I'm typically a size 6/8 and all that was left so last minute was a 6- I definitely could have sized up- but the amazing quality material of this dress allowed me to wear the 6 and it was SO SLIMMING!! I got a ton of compliments on it and the color is even more beautiful in person. Would definitely recommend it!!

This dress was super fun to wear but don't expect good use of your arms. If dancing, you'll want to be careful of the little sleeves. Overall, super fun dress I'd wear again! Regularly a 6 - it was more snug than other size 6 dresses. I would order a second size up just in case.
Beautiful color and really different than most formal dresses. That said, the top had a tendency to slip and was very difficult to readjust. Not the most easy wearing garment I've ever rented.

I was nervous about wearing this dress because I don't usually wear something so skin tight, but my friend convinced me to get it for the off-the-shoulder sleeves. At first I was worried that my hips looked big, but I think the whole hourglass shape thing is in. The thick, stretchy fabric smoothes out any parts of your body that you're worried about. Plus, you can never go wrong with some spanx underneath :) My uncertainty dissipated as soon as we stepped into the event (it was a debutante ball). So. Many. Compliments. The color is gorgeous and unique; it makes you really stick out! I would highly recommend this dress; if you're on the edge, just go for it!! You won't regret it. Just size up for the 2nd free dress, and you should be good.

Received many compliments when I wore this dress! Hugs curves, so if you dont like formfitting dresses this is not the one for you. Runs small- wore a 2 when I am usually a 0 so size up. Like other reviewers the sleeves were somewhat restricting but worth it for how pretty the dress was overall!

I loved this dress and received ton of compliments! I'm short (5'0) and it fit me well with 3' heels. I have a larger chest (34DDD) so I had to constantly pull the dress up. Other than that, it was great!

I was worried because I was 29 weeks pregnant for this formal wedding. I originally rented the 8 and the 10 but they were too small. Fortunately they were able to overnight me the 12 and it fit! You can't really move your arms much in this dress - but it was worth it. Felt so amazing in this dress, which was hard with such an unfamiliar body! Would recommend for both pregnant and not pregnant ladies!

I loved this dress but really wished it had some kind of boning to help it stay up, I had to keep pulling it up throughout the night. The train also kept moving in between my legs when I walked, which was a tad annoying. Since I'm so short, I was worried about the length, but it was perfect w/ 3.5" heels. I would probably rent again.
Wore this to a black tie wedding - made me feel extra fancy but runs tight in the hips and looser at the top if you are smaller busted with bigger hips.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for a formal charity affair, true fit
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit, lots of compliments, very classy and comfortable definitely recommend

The dress fit great in the size 8, which is my normal pant size. I received endless compliments from others attending the event. As others have reviewed, this dress isn't great for dancing because you can't put your arms up all the way. However, it makes you look sleek and sexy, and you'll hear as much! I am busty (36DDD), so being able to wear a normal bra is a big plus. I really loved this rental! I felt absolutely stunning.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a semi-formal affair!
links_reviews_text: Glamorous update to the LBD! Lots of complements! Everyone loved the cape!

This dress was sexy yet classy. So fun to wear a unique dress ... I received compliments all night. In addition it was perfect for a winter wedding. Only problem was if I lifted my hands above my head it came up and exposed my butt!
Fits like a glove.
Fits perfectly. Very classy. Thick material.

This is probably my favorite RTR so far, so many compliments, so comfortable, so...caped. I could have worn the 12, but 14 was a little looser and the cape felt bigger so I went with that haha. I wore it for an October Salem wedding but would definitely rent again for any formal event! I loved it.
Love this dress. Nice weight to the fabric, yet very forgiving. The dress runs true to size. I'd rent again.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for a work event
links_reviews_text: Loved it so much I bought it! I got one million compliments. Too formal for everyday workwear, but definitely appropriate for a cocktail hour reception/networking
Fit perfectly. Could def snuck some pockets under those wings
Fits nicely, forgiving fabric.

Fabulously comfortable dress that I wore to a black tie work event. It was cold in Colorado so it was perfect for looking good but staying warm. Paired with a gorgeous RTR necklace- easy peasy! Loved this.

It was a bit loose but I'm more petite than I think I am I suppose! Nice quality fabric as others mentioned. Tried to figure out how to pose best with the cape but I'm sure others will have more success. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Fun dress. Tons of compliments all night.
links_reviews_text: Dress fits well. May be large for some as I have a large chest, but still has extra room in my shoulders. I stood out from the crowd with the cape, it is a great feature. Would definitely rent this dress again.

Wore this dress to a black-tie optional event and it looked amazing! Got so many compliments on it. I love that the cape part hides your arms but it is still tight and fits really great. Would rent this again!

links_reviews_title: It was the perfect dress to wear to The Magic Castle in Hollywood! One word: Cape!
links_reviews_text: The material of this dress is thick and rich. Though my legs were exposed, I didn't feel cold at all which was nice. The cut doesn't do much in terms of showing off your figure but that's not what this particular dress is for. It's about drama and starting conversations. I recommend this dress!

LOVED this dress!!! Wore it for Bloom "Air" party- with a glam-60's air-travel theme, it was perfect!! This dress is so comfortable, easy to wear, fun, flirty and warm! It does run a little big-but I think all Trina Turk runs large-size down for backup. This dress can be styled so many great ways-I would definitely consider renting again!!

links_reviews_title: This dress was an AMAZING cape dress!!
links_reviews_text: It did run a little large, I ordered the size 2 and it was roomy. I am 5 ft. 4" and I think the 0 would have fit perfect. Great dress overall and I would rent again!
I wore this to Sleep No More and I fit right in. Loved the unique cut. The shoulders could be restricting at times but wasn't too bad. See more of my style adventures on instagram, @doremidom!

links_reviews_title: It's a gorgeous dress and is flattering!
links_reviews_text: The material and fit of the dress were very flattering. It's a beautiful statement dress without trying too hard to be flashy or sexy. It definitely needs a necklace so help yourself out and start looking for one as soon as you rent this. The only two minor cons: It's snug in the arm hole so you can't lift your arms too high (an issue while dancing). It's a heavier material so it gets hot and you can't remove the cape. Overall, I loved it and would recommend.

As noted by others, you couldn't raise your arms too much because of the attached cape. The wedding took place on a late afternoon by the water, but was unnoticed because of the MAGNIFICENT cape. Overall, the dress was a fantastic selection for both wedding and weather! I would definitely rent again.
I can't recommend this dress enough - it's comfy, classy and the cape is just so much fun. Thank you RtR!

I range from 4 to 6 in dress size. Glad I rented the 6 and 8, the 6 fit perfect! The dress was very comfortable and I had so many compliments! This was my time to rent and was very pleased at how easy it was! I will definitely be renting for future events.
The fit was perfect. It's a heavier material with some stretch to it.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect! I felt amazing!
links_reviews_text: This dress was actually my 2nd option. So glad I didn't pass it up. It was perfect for a masquerade party. I didn't feel under or over dressed. The cape sleeves kept me warm on a cool southern March night. I'm 5'1" with a large chest 36dd. The 8 was too tight and almost too short so I went with the 10. I love rent the runway!! This wasn't my first rental and definitely won't be the last!!

This cape dress was the perfect choice to wear to an evening work function with my husband. It fit perfectly and hid my "problem" areas beautifully. I will rent this one again! The necklace is also from RTR! Another huge hit!!!

I rented this for a formal New Years Eve event and couldn't have been happier with my choice! I tried both the 6 and 8 and while both fit well I found the size 8 more comfortable for my curvy hips. The attached cape makes for a stunning look but be aware you can't lift your arms very high or the whole dress goes with it! Got lots of compliments on this one!

links_reviews_title: Great dress, stood out, fun to wear!
links_reviews_text: Really liked this dress, was fun to wear and different. Received many compliments. Was tight in the chest so had to size up. Overall liked and I will rent again.

This dress is very comfortable. It has some space around the stomach area so great if you want a little room there! It looked classy and I felt great! The material was thick and I did feel a little warm in it on the dance floor. I wore this to a work formal holiday party.

links_reviews_title: This dress is not made for dancing. If you lift your arms, the entire dress goes with you.
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to my husband's company holiday party. Got lots of compliments and very comfortable. I I loved that the dress was loose and very forgiving around the tummy section. I did wear spanx, but didn't need it.. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my company holiday party and received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: If you’re more on the curvy side, the dress ends up a little shorter than expected but otherwise great fit overall. I really loved the cape feature and am definitely on the search to add this dress style to my wardrobe!!

I wore this dress to a wedding in Sonoma County(wine country) in chilly November. So happy I chose this for the cape as it gave me extra warmth without having to bring outerwear or a clumsy wrap. I received lots of compliments and felt so chic the whole night. The material is heavier weight and lined so I don't recommend this for a summer wedding but otherwise it comfortable, you can dance the night away! You can cover arms and tummy and still be confident and sophisticated.

The fit was flattering. Skimmed the body in all the right places and showed off legs. The cape added a fun and modern flair to this dress. Pairing with a fancier necklace really dressed it up for a more formal look.

Loved the fit of this cape dress. It was functional even with the cape attached. I wore for a wedding in New Orleans and the evening was a little cooler than I expected and the cape/covered shoulders was great for that!! I highly recommend...the cape is fun feature and the dress didn't feel too trendy, still a classy fit and look!

links_reviews_title: This dress was fabulous. It was very unique and I felt like a million bucks in it!! Another winner.
links_reviews_text: I think this dress runs small because all my other rentals have been size 8 but I went with 6 due to the reviews and got the 8 as my back up size. I didn’t even try the 8 on. The size 6 fit like a glove. It was a very classy dress. The length was perfect . Tastefully above the knee. This dress is great for concealing the mid section and shoulders and arms. The cape part didn’t go all the way around the dress. It was just around the shoulders which was great because it made it feel less like a costume. The back of the dress looked like a regular dress. You can wear a regular bra with this dress. The dress does go up when you raise your arms so don’t wear if you plan on dancing a lot. I just wore a wrap around this to get to and from the car because putting on a coat would have been difficult. The material was heavy and perfect for a fall or winter event. The dress was very well made. The zipper was on the side and it zipped all the way up to underneath the armpit so I needed help. Hair and makeup must be done after getting the dress on.

I rented this dress for the broadway musical Wicked! It was absolutely perfect! I loved the cape it was such a unique dress perfect for Wicked! The fit was true to size I'm in between a 6-8 and it was a little loose around my stomach making it super comfy and the length was just right! Sexy and comfy! Definitely going to consider buying this one!
Wore to Breeder Cup at Churchill Downs and was so easy to wear. The cape kept me warm on a chilly day and made me feel super.
I'm obsessed with this dress. The material is thick with a slip built in. It fits like a true size 4. I wore this for a Halloween party but will rent it again! It's flattering, fits a busty chest.

I am so sad I have to return this dress. The material is heavy weight and high quality. Perfect for a fall/winter wedding. Fits true to size. I'm 5'1" and it was the perfect length. I received so many complements. Accompanied it with bold gold jewelry and it was a classy yet edgy look. Highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: So easy to wear! Flirty and fun
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. I wore it at least 3 times on vacation. Cute with sneakers and dresses up with heels. It's short but not too short (I'm about 5'6).
This dress is super cute, but surprisingly larger on top than expected. I'm 5'7 about 165 36D and wore a large. It I was less curvy on bottom could have probably sized down. Very comfy.

I think that this dress fits well but I had to wear a brami (Free People bra/cami thing - go buy yourself one you're welcome!) underneath so that you couldn't see my bra. Lots of shifting of the neckline throughout the day so I know I made the right decision. I might wear it with a belt next time too.
It's a true wrap dress. True to size. Very light fabric but not see through.
Super cute and flirty!! Fits perfectly and is just fantastic for my body type. So very flattering!

Because of the wrap part of this dress you can make it as tight or loose as needed which really saved me here. I have worn it to a date night and plan to wear it to work for an training event. Very versatile!

links_reviews_title: Sweet dress, comfortable, perfect length for a person of 5'4" in a wedge heel.
links_reviews_text: Material is slippery, so the shoulders slipped forward a bit, but other than that, I would rent this cute dress again.
This wrap is perfect for everyday, date night and even to dress up for a casual wedding.
I am tall and this was way too short to wear as a dress.
room for adjusting with the tie

links_reviews_title: It was super cute wore it to the Florida/Georgia pregame party!
links_reviews_text: It fit well. It was super comfortable and I will definitely rent it again!
Light fit but not see through. Wore it twice - loved the fit!
Got a lot of compliments!

links_reviews_title: This was a great dress to wear for a casual Friday at work! Cute and simple!
links_reviews_text: Tight in the shoulders, overall very flattering.
Love this dress. Perfect for any occasion and very flirty feminine and fun

links_reviews_title: Perfect summer dress for a nice dinner or party.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size, and flattering everywhere. Wrap tie was forgiving. Loved it!

Very cute and I got lots of compliments. The wrap at the neckline was nice and modest -- which doesn't always happen with wrap dresses. I wore it casual with flat shoes. My only complaint was that it was a bit short so next time I may rent a Medium (for length only).
This fit a bit tight around the arm holes, and I have pretty small arms, but the rest was great. Pretty pattern, got lots of compliments. Good for work or a dinner out.

Need a dress that's not too much, and not too little? A dress that could take you from a casual afternoon to a date night? Look no further ladies! This is your dress! The fit is comfortable, and flattering, and the fabric is cool and comfortable and has a nice flow to it. Love love love everything about this dress! Will rent again, and again and again!
Absolutely will be renting this dress again! It was extremely flattering and fit true to size. The fabric did crease easily when sitting but even so did not wrinkle badly.

links_reviews_title: Great from work to dinner dress
links_reviews_text: This was a nice dress. I got so many compliments at work. I actually think other people liked it more than I did. It's low cut, but worked great with a white cami. I also wore it out to dinner and it worked great for both occasions. The material is a nice quality.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but too big for me
links_reviews_text: Bust was too big

I adore this dress and was bummed that it didn't work for me. If you're 6'0" like me, this dress will be too short for you. It's the perfect everyday summer wrap dress. The print is beautiful and the material is great - just wish it came in a slightly longer length!

links_reviews_title: Nothing really - nice dress for work
links_reviews_text: Got the medium for extra length and it was perfect for everyday - nothing special though.

links_reviews_title: Cute, classic every day wrap dress
links_reviews_text: Great dress, loved the material and fit. Like others have noted, you might want a camisole for underneath it if you don't want a lot of cleavage showing.

This is a great little dress for a date, running errands, walking the dog, throwing over a swimsuit, etc... A summer MVP. A true wrap dress that ties to one side, it is made from a lightweight, Ref-style fabric that swishes when you walk. It did tend to gape a little at the chest but nothing a pin couldn't fix. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: Cute summer dress but weird fit.
links_reviews_text: This is cute and summery. However even the small had super small arm holes. I don't have particularly large arms so it was odd. The tight arms holes also caused the shoulder area to bunch a bit. And the wrap was really low cut. I was going to send it back but wore it to a neighborhood cookout where I knew people wouldn't care about the fit:). Wouldn't rent again.

i'm typically a small and this fit very well. i didn't even have to wear a cami under, but ended up doing it anyway for work. the cami didn't take away from the look. not lined, but wrapped around in a way that didn't have me worried i wld be exposed w a gust of wind. hit above the knee and might be a touch short for work if you're taller. also packs into a tiny square and doesn't wrinkle.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear, flattering wrap style and pretty colors.
links_reviews_text: Overall fit was perfect, not too short and the wrap dress is very flattering. Wore this to a bridal shower with low heeled sandals and it was perfect. Color is perfect for summer too!

links_reviews_title: Amazing fit. I was able to wear without a bra. It was supportive. I danced the entire night.
links_reviews_text: I will rent again. So much fun to wear.

Rented for a December wedding rehearsal dinner and after party! Very true to size. I am 5'5" and 115lbs. The compliments were rolling in all evening! So comfortable and snug! I tried with open toed black shoes & open toed cream shoes - however, they were too "dainty" for the look and feel of the outfit for me so I ended up with a pair of pointy toes booties! Felt amazing in this outfit ALL evening. While others were ready to change into comfies for the after party- i was already in mine!
Beautiful material! The shoulders a bit tight but very classy and lovely!

links_reviews_title: This romper is gorgeous!! Could replace a gown.
links_reviews_text: This lace romper is gorgeous - with a pair of heels, you can wear it to a black tie wedding. The fit is amazing and can be worn without a bra. Super recommend this!!
We loved this! Used it for a photo session. It is snug in the chest and shoulders but loose in the bottoms. Made for someone with a long torso. The details are beautiful! We loved it!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments and pockets too!
links_reviews_text: Great jumpsuit for apple shapes. I felt like a million bucks in this. I'm 5"5 and low heels kept it off the ground. I would have kept it but the zipper was incredibly hard to get up (not too tight, more like a faulty zipper).
This jumpsuit was so comfortable and fit perfectly! I couldn't keep track of the amount of compliments people were giving me all night!

I fell in love with this classic yet feminine Monique Lhuillier Bicolor Lace Jumpsuit! This style ran smaller than I expected with little room for stretch, so I recommend sizing up! This item it also pretty fitted at the midsection and fitted at the hips with plenty of leg room! It works best with A-C Cups as I am a C cup and was wearing a strapless bra. You could get away with not wearing a bra if that is something that you are comfortable with as well. I typically wear a Long size, but I ordered a 10R and the leg length was perfect even with wearing 3 inch heels. I am 5'7" and the leg length fell just below my ankle as desired. I loved that this jumpsuit had a thicker material making it feel more formal for a formal event, but the style is so versatile pretty much making it perfect for a date, a night out, vacation or even to a wedding! I would definitely pair this outfit with a heel and a statement necklace, but even without, the dress itself is a statement! I am 5'7" , weigh 160 lbs and wear a 36C bra size. I am typically a 6-8 in women dresses/clothing.

links_reviews_title: I REALLLLLY wanted this to work for me!
links_reviews_text: I love love love this piece! But it was entirely too tight across the shoulders for me in the 6. I'd love to try it in the next size up for another event in the future. Gorgeous cut and quality!
Very flattering and not too long! Holds you in and gives you a waistline.

links_reviews_title: Loved the pockets. Very comfortable. I’d love to own it.
links_reviews_text: Not much give so size up if you are in between sizes
Did not like how it fit in the crouch area. Not sure if my butt was the problem, maybe needed a bigger size. So I wore with a long see thru black mesh jacket

links_reviews_title: Posh material, warm lining, TRex arms.
links_reviews_text: You really really have limited range of motion in your arms. Like I needed help to get my coat on. Couldn't tip my glass fully to drink the last of my beverage, etc. A little bit of sausage boob with a 32D. Fit was pretty perfect though the pockets gapped weird (pin them maybe). Material is thick and posh and quality. Lining is robust, you'll be cozy warm in cold climates, I wore December 1. Overall I loved it, just be aware you'll be T Rex arms all night :) Would grab size up for backup for sure.

Worn for anniversary date night and totally loved it! It was very comfortable - I wore it on a chilly night which worked out great because it kept me warm. It's not a garment you'd want to wear on a warm night as it traps heat. I received many compliments!
Sized up as suggested by the other reviews and it fit and looked great.

links_reviews_title: My ability to dance all night, comfortably!
links_reviews_text: Loved this Romper- ultra comfortable. No bra needed as boning in top bodice supports the girls and gives shape. I'm a 34DD and had 0 issues without a bra. The arm movement is a bit restricting with the sleeves being attached, however unless you are dancing the 'YMCA' all night, you should get along great in this. Pockets were useful and gave my narrow hips a bit of an illusion of some curve (which was nice). The black 'lace' overlay is a cotton like material and is a flat black color. The satin underlay offers a nice pop of shine through the lace detail while adding a silky inside to the romper. It is a durable, not see-through, heavier weight satin lining. I wore this in June in Lake Tahoe, CA(75 degrees) for a wedding and was very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Felt amazing! Really good quality. Felt like second skin.
links_reviews_text: I m usually size 10 and this one was size 12. I'm glad I tried st the store prior to renting it.

links_reviews_title: Received so many compliments, I wore it for the instagram prom! Its a very chic jumpsuit!
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable, perfect fit, easy to wear . The quality was top!

Cutest Jumpsuit ever! Such an easy outfit to wear for a party or even a dinner . The off the shoulder sleeves were comfortable and allowed plenty of arm movement. it was true to size. I would recommend sizing up for a backup because it does have limited stretch. Good for any bust size. Jumpsuit does have comfortable room in the waist and hip area. The lace is beautiful, very detailed, I would recommend to be careful when choosing accessories because the lace can easily snag on certain jewelry and bags. Floor length, could be worn with heels. Also, a strapless bra is needed.

Loved this jumpsuit. Wore it for formal night on a cruise and felt great. The jumpsuit has some boning in the bodice and fit like a glove. I'm about 5'4 and it was the exact right length, though if it were any shorter it would have been a problem. Still considering purchasing this one!
Great material and flattering

links_reviews_title: Received lots of compliments from my coworkers
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit was perfect for a winter party because it is heavily lined inside. It is absolutely gorgeous. The only downside is that the top half runs a bit bigger than the bottom half. The lace panels squeezed my butt too much in both the 0 and the 2, even though I️ normally wear a 0. The 0 was loose in the torso, but so tight in the butt that I️ ended up wearing the 2.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to brunch in Miami, and it was perfectly fashionable!
links_reviews_text: The fabric was gorgeous but a little heavy and not for 80 degree weather. It fit my large, 32 G bust well, and was perfect for my short torso and long legs.

We were in Paris for 10th anniversary. I wore this to dinner at Guy Savoy. Heads turned wherever we were! I would have preferred this in 6L but the 6R looked great with heels. Fit well in the bust, hips, legs. Not much give in the material but I was comfortable sitting through a long meal with lots of wine! I am usually a 4-6, and tge 6 was perfect. Don't miss out on thus rental!! I would buy this in a heartbeat!

This romper is absolutely stunning! The fabric is wonderful and very heavy. It tucks you in whether you want it or not! Lol it runs EXTRA small, no strech at all. I'm a 8/10 and I had to order the 14 to be remotly comfortable and to be able to breath. I ended up wearing something else however I'm gettimg this piece again for my next event. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Unlike any other jumpsuit! Received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Heavy fabric, would probably look better if I was a bigger breast size. Still very unique and flattering!

fits true to size. i'm normally a 2 and the 4 was just a little too loose. no stretch whatsoever so don't get a too small size. also, there are pockets. but the lining of the pocket kind of throws the look off a bit. try to tack down pockets with safety pin for flawless look.

This jumpsuit is a amazing! The lace is beautiful and it has pockets. I don't think photos do it justice, when I shared it with friends on text they didn't like it. But in person I received tons of compliments.
Too Short!

links_reviews_title: Elegant but with a design flaw
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is very elegant at first glance. It fits well and is easy and comfortable to wear; however, the nude lining that accentuates the black lace fabric so well is also the lining for the pockets and is very noticeable. In my opinion, the pockets give the illusion that the seam has split on either side of the hips and the lining is peaking through. As nice as it is to have pockets, this jumpsuit is just not well-suited for them.

links_reviews_title: Not worth it unless it's just a photo shoot. Impossible to get in and out of
links_reviews_text: Beautifully constructed jumpsuit. The fabric is so thick, plus the lace overlay, makes it literally impossible to zip yourself. Unless you have someone with you at the bathroom every time, don't bother. The mental anguish...and potential muscle sprains (lol) to get in and out are not with it.

links_reviews_title: Fir was perfect. Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit was great and the length. I'd definitely rent it again!

I wore this to an unseasonably cold November wedding in CT. The jumpsuit was warm and comfortable and made like a formal gown -- many layers of fabric, silk etc. I would not recommend wearing this in warm weather because of that. I received a lot of compliments on my pocketed jumpsuit as it was perfectly wedding appropriate but comfortable and chic. You do have t rex arms as someone else point out, but due to having some stretch, you're able to move through that. I got the 8 and 10 and ultimately went with the 10 (5'4, 145 lbs, 34D) due to comfort. The 8 puckered in the mid section and caused the pockets to expose the inner lining. Great rental!

links_reviews_title: What a great jumper. It was comfortable and I got a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Pros - I loved this. It was a great fit and easy to wear. Cons - Might be a little warm for summer so suggest wearing in the color temps.

links_reviews_title: I rented for by b-day. Too tights
links_reviews_text: I rented for by b-day. Too tights
Didn't wear this. It ran small and was too tight. It was also too short. Looked like floods on me. I am 5' 7"

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit was fab! I felt really good in it.
links_reviews_text: Loved the look and fit of this jumpsuit. Unfortunately I didn’t end up wearing it because it was too dressy for the function I was going to.

links_reviews_title: Cute jumpsuit but too short for my long legs
links_reviews_text: Beautiful jumpsuit but didn't wear it because my 5 foot 9 inch long legged body made the pants too short. Wish it would've worked out for me.
Very pretty. Good thick fabric. Only complaint is it runs small.
Gorgeous on! One con: the wires in the garment have come out a bit and poke you. Very painful. But I put tissue in and that helped a bit. Got so many compliments. Highly recommend!

Probably got more compliments in this dress than any other rental. Crazy! Kinda wasn't expecting that, then I took a picture and was like, yeah, that is a pretty nice dress! Fit perfectly. RTR suggested I do a small, even though I normally do a medium, and the small fit perfectly. I didn't have any issues in the chest area, but a larger size might have been too much for work.
Loved this dress. 25 weeks pregnant and fit snug but stretched! Fabric was nice and felt very comfortable.
A little tighter than I would've liked. Comfortable dress. Thick fabric made it a great dress on a cooler evening at an outside function. Would definitely wear it again!
Love this dress and color ! Received many compliments today . Stretchy, thick fabric and perfect for that important outing .

Awesome dress for work. It is a little low cut but is stitched in place so you don't have to worry about showing TOO much. I was able to squeeze into a size small 20w pregnant, but don't think it would fit again past this stage without sizing up! The stomach area had some nice ruching to make room for a baby bump. My only con was it seems the lining made the back of the dress ride up a little bit, so I kept tugging on the lining throughout the day.
#royalblue

This dress was gorgeous. It's lines and is made of nice and hefty, quality material, but still ain't too heavy. I rented it for a week to wear on two separate days for my two graduation ceremonies, both of which landed on beautiful, sunny 70+ degree weather. Both ceremonies were outside and this dress was great for both. I have a larger chest, so, although the fit was great overall, the neckline, although not plunging, felt kinda like that. Personally, the wrap around the chest revealed more of my chest than I usually like to, but I battled through it, especially since I was wearing a graduation gown over it most of the time. If you have curves this dress is perfect. If you're pear shaped with curves and a smaller chest, this dress is even more perfect. Highly recommend and would wear it again. Also, the little puff gathering on the shoulder of the sleeves was a cute little subtle, but noticeable detail.
I loved how comfortable, beautiful and sexy this dress is.

I rented this dress for a derby charity event. I was pleasantly surprised that it fit very nicely and was extremely comfortable. The material is nice and sturdy while still looking chic. It's very figure flattering. My only complaint would be that it made my shoulders look a little odd in pictures. I would rent again if I needed something similar.
perfect fit!

links_reviews_title: This dress is a gorgeous color, perfect cut.
links_reviews_text: Worn with spandex underneath to smooth everything. Everyone loved this dress and I bought it while renting. Totally in love. Knee length, enough chest coverage, all of it.

links_reviews_title: Great work to dinner after work dress!
links_reviews_text: Great fabric and fit. Hugged my hips well. Just had to be careful since the under fabric kept moving the dress making the back of the dress go up.

I rented this dress for a work event and did have to safety pin the top together as it was a little too low cut. The rest of the dress was very flattering and it was snug in all of the right places without being too tight to breathe. The shoulders didn't scratch me and they added a nice fun detail. I got so many compliments on this dress and would definitely rent it again!

This dress is a solid work staple. Figure flattering and comfortable. I am bigger chested and noticed the fabric folding out there a bit but nothing really noticeable. Lots of compliments on this silhouette.
Wish this dress came in more colors. Might buy

I rented this for a work event. It was a striking color, and a classy and conservative style and length. The small and extra small both fit, but the small bunched a little more.
