On both sizes the shoulders were a scratchy which was the only downside. My husband thought the shoulders were a little too 80's but especially on the smaller size, they didn't seem as puffy. Plus - it's part of the style that makes it different and i liked that.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color, nice fabric, runs small.
links_reviews_text: I'm short and curvy with a huge chest (32H) so should have paid attention to the reviews saying to size up. The fabric was substantial and forgiving to cellulite but it was just a tad tight to be comfortable. I also had to add a tank underneath because it was too low for my chest/cleavage.
Liked this dress, probably wouldn't order again but the color was definitely a standout!
This dress fit fabulously! I'm normally a small and I wore an extra small and it fit perfectly. Great color on-air. Was a little low cut but not crazy.

links_reviews_title: Didn’t expect such a pretty dress to be so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a work event. It’s very pretty and I really liked the details on the shoulders, but I ended up feeling a little self-conscious about how much cleavage it revealed in a work environment, so I wore a leather jacket over it all day. Regardless, it is very pretty and forgiving!
The color of this dress is stunning in person. I liked this dress but it bunched awkwardly in the middle and was a bit too much cleavage for work.

I rec'vd this dress with tags so I wanted to review it for anyone interested in getting it! This is a GORGEOUS dress - it is more of a royal blue (looks purplish on the model in her photo). It hugs all your curves and the ruching in the front kind of sort of hides any tummy issues. I got alot of compliments on this dress throughout the day - mostly on how beautiful the color is. The fabric is stretchy but tight so it def helps sucking things in. I felt super sexy and confident in it - it is appropriate for work BUT I did safety pin it at the neckline just so I wouldn't be exposing too much cleavage. Def recommend!!
The dress fit great and it is a beautiful blue color that really pops. The v-neck shows some cleavage. Shoulders are itchy.
Should have sized up and not down as I am normally in between a size 4 and a 6.

I really liked this dress but as a busty girl who doesn't mind showing it off, there was too much cleavage / adjusting I'd need to do to be comfortable. I felt the XXL was a little right too, so I'd say it ran a little small.

I really wanted to love this dress, but it ran small. Also found that if you have any bit of a stomach (I've had two kids and my stomach isn't completely flat), there really isn't anywhere to hide in this dress. Definitely would be more flattering for women on the smaller side.

links_reviews_title: The dress is flattering and sexy!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color and form-fitting.
Love the color and sleeves. Much more low-cut than it would appear from the photos.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much. Got so many complements!
links_reviews_text: Hugs everything every nicely.

The color and cut of this dress are really beautiful. The ruching around the waist/belly are quite flattering (and forgiving of the mom-bod!). I wore the XL for a little more room in the hips and butt but it was a bit big around the bust. Nothing a well-placed safety pin or some fashion tape couldn't fix. I received tons of compliments, especially on the color. It was a perfect dress for a work-to-after-work function.

links_reviews_title: This was my backup dress and it was too small. Fortunately, the other one fit!
links_reviews_text: There is no stretch in this fabric making the large too small. The hips are slim and overall, it just didn't fit. I'm glad it was my backup and the original choice fit fine! I should have ordered a larger size with the lack of stretch and slim profile if I'd wanted this to fit.

links_reviews_title: Loved the material, hugs all your curves, and shows off cleavage!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color and material!

I wore this for a bridal shower. It was a nice dress and the color was great! It is pretty skimpy in the bust area. I was kind of falling out of the dress by the end of the day. It is also tight in the hip area which is why i had to wear a large instead of a medium like I thought I would fit into. Overall, it's a beautiful dress but you might want to order a size up.

links_reviews_title: Work is work but I might as well look good dong it!
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress. The material was thicker which helps to hide my natural curve behind. The only issue that I had was that the wrap top would gape open. I tried to pin it and that helped a little but at one point I just had to own my boobs. Would definitely rent this again.
The color and style of this dress are beautiful but it didn't work for me. I looked like an overstuffed sausage. The fabric is not stretchy, there is lining, and the color is not forgiving.
True to size, loved the color, lots of compliments
Great fit and color
Highly recommended, fit very well and super flattering.
Just fabulous color (bright so pick it for the right event) and surprisingly flattering
It’s a beautiful dress but order at least a size larger(maybe 2). I was unable to use it but it sure is nice dress.

links_reviews_title: Chic, head turning jumper! You will steal the show and win the fashion award!
links_reviews_text: Great for curves & pear shape; It was roomy on me & I have wide hips and a slight belly; Size 4 might have fit but the 6 looked good and was comfortable.; Covers imperfections; thick quality material that felt great on my skin; I wore spanx to contain the jiggle; recommend padded bra if small chested because it seemed larger above the waistline...but the adjustable side knot solves that; if you are large chested, it is roomy on top in my opinion; it's bright orange-red; I highly recommend!

Loved this jumpsuit. The color, the fit, the fabric was spot on. I rented a size up and shouldn't have because it was little big in chest area although it gave ample room in the hip area. The color popped and the fabric fell perfectly to give a very classy grown up look. Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous Jumpsuit- More Red-Orange than red
links_reviews_text: Loved this jumpsuit! Photographs extremely well and really comfortable. That said it looks more red orange in person so beware if you're looking for a deep red or crimson red (some of the filters are deceiving) that this isn't it

I was hesitant to wear a jumpsuit, but I absolutely loved this!! Wore to a 70s themed fundraising dinner and received many compliments throughout the night. Super comfortable. I had to use fashion tape to keep the sides up high enough to cover my bra.

links_reviews_title: Show stopper, but it stretched out!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for an event and then to a wedding! It was a mega hit, the color is more orange-y red in person. The material is thick and rich, but not too stuffy. I do feel that it stretched out throughout the second time I wore it, so I might size down next time! Paired it with the most gorgeous Zac Posen crossbody!

links_reviews_title: It was the perfect for the formality of my sisters rehearsal dinner!
links_reviews_text: I would have given this jumpsuit 5 stars, but they send me a 2 short instead of a 2 regular. Thankfully, the 4 regular fit me perfectly! I am 5'6, 130 lbs and a 32C. It was the perfect length with a 2.5 inch heel. Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: What an amazing wedding guest outfit, compliments all night!!
links_reviews_text: Slightly loose but perfectly sung where it needed to be, also very comfortable to dance and move all night long.

links_reviews_title: SO! Comfy This jumper fit great! It was loose but still fitted in all the right places.
links_reviews_text: Fit was amazing! Super comfortable
Great color and style overall. Was a bit big on me so the 4 probably would've been a better fit, but the 6 still worked

I rented this for a Gala/evening event. It fit well, the color was more orange than red, but a vibrant--neon sort of orange. It was beautiful and the compliments kept coming all night! Everyone loved the jumpsuit and color! It was the perfect start of summer outfit and I'd definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: It was such a great outfit, I loved the color and it was super comfy! Tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Great outfit, my torso is short so it's a little saggy in the front. Fit amazing on my bust and hips and thighs!

links_reviews_title: Amaze, more flaming orange than red
links_reviews_text: I was not super thrilled about this piece bc I thought the 8 might be too small (I usually wear a 10) and I thought it would be way too long (I'm 5'2) BUT IT WAS AWESOME! I wore some high heels and it was like a little bit too long, but totally wearable. I LOVED this, so unusual, just perfect for a little museum event!!
Super comfortable! Lots of compliments and beautiful color

This jumpsuit is beautiful! The color is gorgeous and even better in person! I wore this to a black tie wedding and it was perfect. This fit in all the right places. Overall, the fit was great... I do wish the larger size would have been available to try. I am already thinking of another event I can rent this for!
Rented for an outdoor wedding reception in The Valley, Cali! Perfecto. Glad the shoulder is adjustable to pull the top not secure. It was a hit!

I'm 5'6 with a long torso and this fit fantastically! Worn to a formal baby shower and it was a hit! Everyone loved the style of the jumper and the color. Will be absolutely renting this again - possibly in a 6L, as I do like my shoes more covered than they were, but I still think it looked spectacular!

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit will make you feel fierce!
links_reviews_text: Amazing fit! It did run long but we didn't have to go far for dinner.

This jumpsuit fit extremely well, didn't get too wrinkly traveling and was a showstopper color. I'm 5'10" 145 and wore the 4L. I have long legs but not a super long torso and I thought the torso was a little long but the overall length was perfect.
Beautiful thicker material. Pockets. Side zip. Wore with flats. Tons of compliments. Felt like a million bucks!

The color is pretty, though it does look a bit more coral rather than red. It's very comfortable, probably because it runs large. I needed to belt mine to make it fit a bit better, but would definitely recommend.
I am 5'9 with long legs and this jumpsuit fit the length! I should have probably done a 4L but nonetheless it worked and I felt great!

I'm very tall (5'11") and I wore the 4 long and it fit perfectly! I wore this to a concert and got a ton of compliments. It was very comfortable. The only downside is that you have to untie the shoulder tie every time you go to the restroom, but that's pretty standard with any jumpsuit. I loved this outfit and would rent it again for sure!

links_reviews_title: Great color, great fit, very comfortable & so many compliments
links_reviews_text: Wore with 3.5 inch heels and hit perfectly! Went with bigger size Bc I didn’t like that you could see the outline of the pockets on the smaller. Wore sticky bra to be safe but could’ve gotten away with strapless bra. Definitely recommend. Danced all night and it was perfect! Definitely rent !

links_reviews_title: Felt stylish but appropriate for a family wedding, really fun to dance in, got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The 2 also fit - in fact fit a little better through the busy - but the inseam was much much shorter and it looked a little awkward with heels. The 4 also fit well and was able to accommodate a heel. Loved that the side-tie allows for a little adjustment, but I had a hard time getting it knotted just right by myself, so I had to tote along my sister to the ladies' room with me to help! A great and fun jumpsuit.

This was used for a Christmas party in which we took professional photos for our website. I rented the 2R and 4R sizes. The 4R was a little big and the pant legs were very long (on the floor) and the 2R fit just right. I am 5'4" and the 2R showed a lot of my shoes which I liked. I would highly recommend this dress. The strap is a tie one so you can adjust it. I was also able to wear a strapless bra without any of it showing. WIN WIN!

links_reviews_title: Perfect jumpsuit for a night on the town!
links_reviews_text: Wore this jumpsuit for a friend's bachelorette party. Bride wanted everyone in bright colors ... my entire closet is black ... enter this jumpsuit. It was perfect for this occasion and I received compliments on it all night. The fit was decent ... I have no hips so it was too big in the hips but the cut of the jumpsuit made it hard to tell it was too big since it is already a wide leg. Fit was still very flattering. I went with the Long length - I'm pretty tall at 5'9" and was wearing 4 inch heels so it was the perfect length once I had my shoes on. I'd buy this jumpsuit in a 2L in a heartbeat if I could find it and would definitely rent again, just go a size smaller this time.
Perfect color, perfect fit, perfect choice.

The jumpsuit fit perfectly, and was comfortable the entire night. I wore it to an outdoor, autumn wedding, and it kept me warm without being too bulky. The zipper can be a little bit difficult, but it's perfect otherwise!

Loved the color and the fit - felt the tie/knot gave me flexibility with how the jumpsuit fit. No issues with length for my height (5'2") - it was perfect with 4 inch heels. The 8 was too long but glad I had the 6. Wore a strapless bra. POCKETS! Paired with gold tassel earrings, gold shawl, and nude pumps.

links_reviews_title: An amazing color for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: This was my first, but certainly not my last rental from RTR! I was very impressed with how true to size this jumpsuit fit. I have very long legs, and I usually have issues with clothing not being long enough. Because of all the helpful reviews (my favorite part of this website), I was easily able to decipher which size would be right for me! I can't tell you the number of compliments I received on this jumpsuit! Amazing and I will DEFINITELY be renting again! XO

links_reviews_title: Loved wearing this bright red thang! It's really gorgeous and has pockets.
links_reviews_text: Adjustable tie is amazing. Definitely works for bustier babes. Material is pretty thin so it's best to get thin material undergarments ie spanx.
Pros: COLOR (definitely more orange than red), comfort, pockets, length, adjustability, fabric quality Cons: Kinda plain

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color, the 4L was perfect for long legs. Total show-stopper!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful!!
Wore this to a wedding. Danced all night, was comfortable all night, received numerous compliments! RTR did not disappoint!
Very comfortable. Received a lot of compliments

This jumpsuit is fun!! I rented this to go see a musical with my boyfriend for an anniversary. It's fitted but not tight. The leg length was a bit long- at 5'2" I wore my highest heels and tied the strap up as high as I could (without camel toe) and it was still about 2" too long. I still wore it, however next time I know to keep some temporary hem tape on hand. As I rented this in August, i was worried it would look like a Christmas party outfit, however it's definitely a red-orange summer hue. I got lots of compliments on this, and my boyfriend loved it! I will try to rent again.

links_reviews_title: More like coral color, so sexy and comfortable
links_reviews_text: Loved this look! Sexy jumpsuit, beautiful color, comfortable. A bit short since I'm 5'10", had to wear a kitten heel.

links_reviews_title: Got tons of compliments and felt fabulous!
links_reviews_text: OK...I would call this jumpsuit orange, not red. I still really liked it though. It was really comfortable, and I got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: This is a standout color be ready for people to look
links_reviews_text: Cute but not forgiving at all. Have your undergarments in order before renting this one.
I loved this jumpsuit! I wore it to a wedding and it was very fun and comfortable. I would say the color is a perfect match to the "Cajun Shrimp" OPI nail polish.
Loved this piece and it's pockets were deep! Was too short for me to wear with heels but otherwise perfect (ps: I'm tall).

We had a wedding to go to when I was 7 weeks post partum, so was looking for something to have easy access for nursing and also still play with my baby belly. I really love the color and the length of this jumpsuit however the bust area swas way too big and my cup size is quite large (F cup) because I am nursing. Thank goodness the bridal party had double stick tape because I definitely used that! I normally wear a 4 so was hard to gauge my new size post baby and think I should have gone with a 6. All in all, got a ton of compliments but beware if you have to get your dance on : )

This was a showstopper jumpsuit and I loved it! I rented it for a cousin's rehearsal dinner and used a scarf to wrap around the chest region for her event. Afterwards I went out for my birthday without the scarf! It is rather daring in the chest area so be aware of this. The reason why I gave this outfit a 4 out of 5 is because the pockets were weird and made this odd bunching look in an unflattering region.
I love it so much!!!
Loved this number but it was a tad too big for me to consider it perfect. Super long for those short people! Wished it wasnt so baggy. Gorgeous color and style!

I am short waisted so jumpsuits and I dont always get along, not to mention my husband doesnt really like them so to fine one that met both those requirements was fantastic! It's low cut but I'm a b cup so it wasnt a big deal at all. The length was good for a 3 in pair of heels. I only wish i wouldve worn it when it was warmer so i didnt have to cover up the beautiful back with a jacket. Oh and you cannot wear a bra with this.

links_reviews_title: This was absolutely perfect for a Vegas bachelorette, you'll definitely standout!
links_reviews_text: I'm petite so I was a bit worried about the legs on this, but it fit perfectly after I belted it. I didn't wear a bra with it, but you definitely could without show. I will definitely be renting this outfit again, I was so sad when I had to return it!

links_reviews_title: A definite showstopper. Comfy and classy. Beautiful color.
links_reviews_text: The 4 was looser than the 6 I also received, so I'm not sure if they were mislabeled or what, but it worked. I'm 5'6" and wore relative flats. Could not have worn heels because the jumpsuit was pretty short. Overall, I received so many compliments on this jumpsuit. Also, chasing around two little ones was so much easier with pants on. Like other reviewers have said, you will definitely need some boob tape or excellent posture the entire time.

Fiery & Fierce! Love it! This jumpsuit fits true to size, though I recommend sizing up for back up. It's great for any cup size with plenty of room, possibly a little much. You may need fashion tape to hold in place. I would recommend wearing a NuBra or no bra for best results. It is fitted in the waist and hips. Curvier women should size up for fuller hips. This jumpsuit is floor length, but does run on the shorter side. Overall has no stretch, but runs super true to size.

This received so many compliments it was insane. It really stands out in a room full of dresses up people. It for really well too. The only issue is that it opens too much in the front. I had to use a safety pin to pin it closed.
I loved the color, the beautiful design and the style! Everybody were telling compliments about the jumpsuit!!!

links_reviews_title: I wore this outfit for my husband and I's first anniversary. I got compliments all night :)
links_reviews_text: I am 5'3 and knew I didn't want to wear huge heels. I knew the pants would be too long. I bought Hollywood temporary hem tape to make the pants shorter for the night. It worked great! I also had a feeling the v would be too low ( it was) the tape did not work to hold the neck closed. I ended up safety pinning the neck area. It was all worth it! I felt great :)

Great jumpsuit for a night out in Naples. Fit well - especially as someone with a booty, I was happy with how it all laid. It is low cut so you'll likely want some fashion tape to keep the girls from making too much of an appearance, but otherwise a great little number.

When I rented this, it suggested to size up always but I am happy that I chose not to at the last minute. Based on other reviews of women my size I decided to go with a 2 and size down to a 0 just in case. The 2 did fit but not as well as I would have liked. It was a bit baggy so I tried on the zero and it was perfect! I pinned it so I wouldn't show my boobs all night. Paired the dress with a gold belt and gold jewelry. I was comfortable all night long! This outfit is like wearing PJs. The material is thick but not so much it makes you hot. It looks like the designer jumpsuit it is! I received compliment after compliment. I danced the night away in this and never paid any mind to what I was wearing it was so comfortable. I highly highly recommend this! I do think it runs just a tiny bit big, so use your best judgement when renting.

links_reviews_title: This bright-red jumpsuit will make you stand out!
links_reviews_text: At 5'4" I felt like this jumpsuit's length was perfect for me -- usually they're way too long for my height. If you're busty (I'm a 34DD), expect a ton of cleavage from the plunging neckline. It's hard to wear a bra with this one, and it's pretty open in the front and has loose straps. I got tons of compliments on the color!

Absolutely loved this jumpsuit. It was fun, sexy and stylish. I got a ton of compliments. True to my actual size. The only issue I had was the length of the pant legs were shorter then I hoped but not terrible. Definitely recommend this.

links_reviews_title: Perfect, versatile jumpsuit! Need a belt.
links_reviews_text: Tory Burch just knows clothes. Fabric and cut of this jumpsuit are great. The back and low, open front make it hard to wear a normal bra. I'm small chested, so went without one, and it worked fine, even without fashion tape. Length was perfect for me with 4" heels. I felt like it definitely needed a belt.
This ran a bit big but I have lost weigh. It was great to be out and feel great!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful red jumpsuit gets a lot of compliments and makes you stand out!
links_reviews_text: I got sent this jumpsuit when the item I ordered wasn't available to send. I absolutely loved the color. The length was too short but with heels on it looked fine. Also the top draped a little too much so I had it pinned in the back. I ended up wearing a bralette with it since I have a bigger chest and can't go without a bra and it still looked really cute!

I ordered this as a back up when my original jumpsuit was damaged. I am 5'5" 155lbs a 34DD, the 10r was slightly to big and would have loved to try the 8 if I had more time. I am Very in between sizes right now. But I received endless compliments on this jumpsuit all night. My only complaint was the top kept Coming one and I had to use dress tape to keep it closed! This jumpsuit will not disappoint!

I received this piece as a replacement after my initial order never arrived. It was such a fun piece! And the majority of my compliments were from men. If i were to order again id definitely get a 2. The top was very loose and I needed to safety pin it together in the front. There was also more fabric in the larger size, so it rubbed against my armpits. Overall a good option when you have the right size!

This jumper was perfect. I wore it to a concert and got complimented all night. Beautiful color, texture and it fit perfectly. I'm a 32D so it was a little revealing which made tape mandatory. I suggest renting a size up if you are fuller in the hips because of the true pockets. I got away with it but had to adjusted the pockets often. Overall a good choice.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my cousins wedding reception and it was a hit!
links_reviews_text: It was comfortable and not a problem at all to take off when I had to go to the rest room (which is usually a problem with jumpers) The color was perfect for a summer wedding and I accessorized with gold jewelry and heels. I am 5'2 and had on 3inch heels and the length was perfect. I didn't realize the back was a bit open but it worked made the jumper even sexier. I did need a safety pin for the front so there was no boob exposure but other wise I loved and would def. rent again.

Loved the color and fit. I wore it to an engagement party, and I would absolutely rent it again. I had to pin the middle just so it wouldn't be as low, but it wasn't a big deal. I am 5' 6" and wore flats with it. Loved the jumper!
True to size. Lots of cleavage!!

I'm 5'1" with a short torso so the top was a bit long so I had to safety pin it a bit. I would say the length is petite which was perfect for me! Usually jumpsuits are too long in the leg. I received so many compliments!

Everyone loved it!!! I passed over a few times after reading the reviews but I really loved it! I wore with a sticky plunge bra and two pieces of fashion tape. Back come up to the waist so you can wear a little bit of shapers and I would recommend it if you have a booty! I am 5'8 and the pant hit me at the ankle. Would have been a great hem for flats or shows off some rocking pumps! I usually have trouble with jumpers based on the length from shoulder to inseam but there was no issue. It's a cool crepe material but a tad tricky to iron. I would recommend probably no bigger than a C cup just for how plunging the neck line is. But if you got it, flaunt it!!! I absolutely loved and would rent again! Paired with black and white snake skin stilettos and a white tuxedo Jacket.

links_reviews_title: Everyone loves it. It was comfy but I still felt sexy.
links_reviews_text: Fashion tape is a must with such a deep neckline. Also, I didn't need to use the restroom while wearing it but I'd imagine it would be difficult if you had to.
Hard to get into Short inseam

links_reviews_title: Did not wear - fit on the bottom but huge on top. I could not wear, unfortunately.
links_reviews_text: Nice thick material

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but too long for me
links_reviews_text: This looked amazing on, but not made for a 5'3 person. I never wore it but would have loved to if I had another 6 inches.

This is a lovely color, but the fit was off for me. Pretty tight in the thight for a pear-shaped girl, but if I had sized up it would have been too loose in the bust, plus it was just a tiny bit to short in the crotch (I'm 5' 8". Also, even with a blazer I wouldn't say that it is appropriate for work....
Perfect for anything and super flattering
Very short if you're tall--ended up returning.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear. Too low cut but maybe because of size.
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear. Not bad but too low cut for me.

links_reviews_title: Super cute style but ran a bit small.
links_reviews_text: A little short and I'm only 5'5

links_reviews_title: I think I would have loved it if it fit.
links_reviews_text: I am a 6/8 right now and this was just too small. I think I would have really liked it if I had enough tome to size up
Do not order if you are tall!!

links_reviews_title: Fit was off and pockets are very weird
links_reviews_text: I rented a 2R. I am typically between 0 and 2. The top was a little on the large side (but I am a 32 B) and the bottom was tight around the butt and hips, and also short, could only wear flat shoes or a very small heel with this. I'm 5'5 for reference. My main concern was the pockets! Just like the other reviews, I should have listened-- the pockets are so weird and thick and you can see the fabric through the pants and it just looks sloppy. I returned the next day without wearing. Only gave 2 stars because the color is beautiful and the fabric is great.
very good quality. Unfortunately I'm a petite girl and this was too long on the torso for me.
Love the flowly, feminine look of this top. It's lightweight and fits TTS. I actually wore this on Christmas Day and the weekend after. It's unique and looks perfect on!
Hides unwanted pants lines/bulges, and looks clean and classy. Sleeves got a little wrinkly but they were beautiful.
It was different top, nice fabric,elastic on the sleeves can be tight & leave marks after 8hr work day, but it was fashionable top & like it
Beautiful blouse, but runs small and the elastic on the sleeves was tight. Did not end up wearing

I got this is a replacement item on a bit of a whim and LOVE IT. It's even more gorgeous in person. The print is so beautiful. I typically wear black, so this was a fun way to wear a print without being too out of my comfort zone. Only negative is there is elastic on the sleeves near the cuff which is a bit annoying. Also, you might need a hand with the back button closure!
Wore it twice - once for a work party with a skirt and tights and once with black jeans for dinner. Super comfortable, beautiful top!

links_reviews_title: Lovely top for a night out!
links_reviews_text: I paired this top with skinny black denim and nude heels for a concert (along with the Kate Spade Sara Satchel, which coordinated perfectly)! It was comfortable yet chic! The fit was a bit large, and I removed a star for a *slight* maternity feel to the empire cut. Recommend sizing down to minimize excess material ;)

links_reviews_title: Really cute for a night out!
links_reviews_text: I really liked this top! I'm early in my second trimester and liked how it had a little bit of peplum at the bottom. Shirt was comfortable yet looked dressy, perfect for work, date night or a more casual look with jeans. Would buy!

links_reviews_title: Worked for me with a blazer.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'5 and the small fit everywhere but was a little short for my taste. It worked fine with a blazer and jeans.

links_reviews_title: Love so much, want to keep!
links_reviews_text: I love this shirt so much and have gotten so many compliments. I decided I must own it so I logged in to buy it but ahhh $230!! I guess I'll just have to rent it again... and again... and again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect party top- wore to three parties this month!
links_reviews_text: This blouse has been my favorite rental so far. I wore it to three parties/dinners this month and received tons of compliments each time I wore it. It runs true to size, has beautiful colors and a flattering fit. It was a bit sheer so I wore a camisole underneath. It was a perfect party blouse!
Nice shirt. Wore with black pants, nothing fantastic about it.
I like the loose fit, the material is great. The color is hard to figure out - navy or black so what to wear with it was tough. But overall I really like the top!
Fun take on a black blouse. Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Lovely top for work and play!
links_reviews_text: I adored this top and wore it several times. My co-worker said it was her favorite of my rentals so far. Great fit and great sleeves! Top is gooey and forgiving but also flattering.
Shorter length than most but does not ride up - really cute sleeves

This shirt feels soooo luxurious- the material is spot on for a $300+ top. The print is sooo pretty as well. It would work as a maternity top as well I loved the top from the front but not the side profile.
Absolutely amazing fit! It also was very flattering. I got many compliments on this top it was perfect for a corporate office, but I would also wear this to a nice dinner outing. Will order again!
Cute top. I usually wear mediums. This was big on me in that size. So swapped out for a small.
Easy to wear and versatile. I wore this with black dress pants and heels at work. For the weekend, I paired it with jeans and sneakers.

links_reviews_title: Loved the quality and look of this blouse.
links_reviews_text: love the fit, color and cut of this blouse.

This is a fun top. Nice flower print so it does not feel too dark. Lots of room in the torso. It has bell sleeves so careful when eating it. Slightly sheer but not enough to require a camisole underneath.
If you have past a B cup, size up at least one size. Sleeves are short too as is the overall length. If you are past 5'4" pass on this . I returned this without wearing.

I absolutely loved this shirt. On the hanger, I wasn't sure I would love it because it appears short and wide. However, once I put it on, it was gorgeous. It is a bit flowly around the middle, but it worked for me. I received a bunch of compliments. The sleeves add a nice twist, and the colors are beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful top for a dinner out!
links_reviews_text: This top is so soft and the pattern is beautiful. Very comfortable. I wore with black jeans and boots to a dinner.

Runs much smaller than other Joie items. I am normally a small/ medium in their items but I couldn't even move in the medium. Not sure if it had been accidentally put in a washer/ dryer but something was off with the sizing in this item
I wore it with black silk pants and heels to a dinner party and with black jeans to lunch. I received lots of compliments.

Rented this to go out with my friends. I am a 0/2 and ordered the XS but it was very big in the shoulders. There's a small puff sleeve and it was just hanging off the side. I ended up giving this to my daughter who is much more busty than I am and normally wears a small - and it worked great for you. I would say go down a size but if you are an XS this may not work.

This blouse was great but frumpy. If I had the right belting pieces I might have been able to do a small front tuck, but I didn't have that. I ended up not wearing the blouse. I will say it's really comfortable and true to size.
Fit true to size

I absolutely love love loved this blouse I wore it 8 or 9 times in the few weeks I had it, and alway got compliments. I wore it to parties, to a lunch date, on New Years Eve, and to an interview. It killed every time and I felt like a million bucks. Incredibly flattering cut nipped in at the waist without being tight, and fluttered around my hips, breaking in exactly the perfect spot. Seriously, I wish I could have kept this forever.
Love this top and this brand. Beautiful vibrant colors and a great style!
Wore this for two Christmas parties and was just perfect. Comfortable. Flowy. Beautiful print. Great with a skinny pant.

links_reviews_title: This shirt had a beautiful flow to it. I received comments all night! Wore it for Xmas party.
links_reviews_text: Fit was great - the sleeves are gorgeous. It was very comfortable. I wore it with black pants just like the photo with an open toe shoe. Everyone told me to purchase it so I may just have to do that.

Draped nicely, beautiful print, did a good job camouflaging all my extra Christmas cookies! I am between an XS & S in Joie usually, this was only available in XS and it was a tiny bit too small on me.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my work holiday party!
links_reviews_text: Very cute top, looks great with jeans or dress it up with black pants or a shirt.
flowy and flattering, with a high-ish neck! Loved this with black leather skinnies!
Great material, great fit and very fun prints!

links_reviews_title: Love this shirt. Hope Joie will make this design in the future in other fabric options.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. Love the cut of the shirt and the way it hangs longer in the back. Wish it had been available in Medium for me.
Wore it with black velvet skinny "jeans" and black booties..loved it! I pulled the sleeves up th 3/4 length and I liked the way the colors on the sleeves lined up that way

links_reviews_title: Chic feel and very classy. I purchased for the Chris Stapleton/Willie Nelson concert-cancelled
links_reviews_text: Chic and classy. Fits big but looks good belted.

(I'm all the way on the right) Cute dress, easy to wear. I was invited to a winter white party so I rented this. The top was a teensy bit sheer, but I just rolled with it. The sleeves are super dramatic, but fun. It was a comfortable length for me, just above the knee (I'm about 5'4").

links_reviews_title: Large but comfortable, got TONS of compliments
links_reviews_text: The other reviews are true, this dress is LARGE. Especially the sleeves. But if you take some time to figure out what might work for your body, this dress is a dream. I ended up wearing the size 38 to my bridal shower. I am usually a 6 (and 38 translates to a US size 2, I think). It still felt roomy and I probably could've sized down further, but honestly that's just the style of the dress. Despite its size, I didn't feel frumpy at all and I got dozens of compliments. Overall, I was really happy with this rental and would rent again!

Yes, I sized down and it was still a large fit, but not overwhelming. It is meant to be very very flowy. Overall, I liked this dress a lot and got many compliments. It's high quality and not at all see through, which is always a concern for white pieces.

I wore this dress to run errands on a Saturday afternoon in beautiful spring weather, and it was so easy and elegant. The sleeves are super oversized and the lace yoke adds a really nice femininity while still maintaining the easy drape-y shape. I will say the dress itself is quite transparent, so denim or pants on the bottom/ something underneath might be preferable! I also styled this with a little microfiber cap a la Giamba's runway images from the collection. Super fun!

I LOVED this. A coworker called me a "hippy angel", and that feels appropriate. Warning - it's very large so order a least one size down. I had to belt it in order to not be swallowed by the fabric. I loved this so much!
Listen to the reviews, this dress is huge. I'd size down 1-2 sizes next time, if I ever decided to rent again. Also, it's not lined so it's pretty see-through.
It's cute definitely go smaller but do wear something under its see through

links_reviews_title: I didnt wear this to the event - decided the style wasnt what I was looking for...but its lovely!
links_reviews_text: I love the flow of the body and the long sleeves. Fit runs a little on the large end, but I could've worn the suggested size.
The sizing on this dress is off. I tried three different sizes, two fit great in the body but the sleeves were enormous and comically long.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so cute. I wore to work with bright pink heels, and out for dinner after work.
links_reviews_text: The sleeves are awesome. May need to roll them back to wash hands. This dress has a swing to it. It's not fitted at all.
Seriously, I would look insane wafting around in this thing. The sleeves are absurdly long. Might try sizing down though bc it is kind of cute.

links_reviews_title: Way too big, couldn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: Way too big, couldn't wear it for the intended white party.
I actually liked this item but it seems like it runs 4 sizes too big.

links_reviews_title: BF compared it to a dinner table napkin
links_reviews_text: Not flattering, fits huge. I thought it looked like a table cover.
Beautiful quality; runs huge, so I belted. Usually wear 6-8 & even the size 2 equivalent was roomy.

links_reviews_title: MAN this is thing is huge. If you want to look like you wrapped a sheet around your body.
links_reviews_text: Its huge.
Beautiful dress but runs very large. Size down at least two sizes.
I LOVE this. Another repeater in my list of rentals. One minor thing. The back button is HARD to close. It takes a LOT to get it through the hold.

links_reviews_title: This dress was a contender for one of several bridal events for my wedding week.
links_reviews_text: The dress is HUGE, I am a true size 6 and I think I could have worn a 0 or 2. I know the style is supposed to be flow-y but this was next level.
Wanted a more fitted look.
I loved everything about this dress from the fabric to the detail of the lace but was super disappointed when I put it on to find out it was 2-3 sizes too big.

I expected this top to feel a bit more special, but I still liked it. The peplum hem was less noticeable than I expected--which is why I took my picture looking from the side somewhat. It is TTS and the sleeves are a sweet tulip design. The eyelash lace was very pretty, but it sat a bit inconsistent at the neckline, but that was likely due to how it has been cared for. Overall, the fit was flattering and I'd recommend, but it was definitely more simple than I was expecting. Wore it for a girls wine tasting night out.

links_reviews_title: Size up if you are busty
links_reviews_text: I fell in love with this top the moment I saw it. It was a bit of a let down because I absolutely could not fit my bust into it with out flattening it out. I'm typically a small or medium (due to 34I Bust) but this top likely wouldn't have fit me right in a larger size. It fit well everywhere except the bust. My only other complaint is that the lace collar kept rolling over. I recommend it but not for me.

This was the perfect top to wear to an event. I paired it with black jeans and booties to dress it down and it was so comfortable. Plus the eyelash lace it beautiful. I also appreciated that the peplum portion of the top was not overly pronounced m. Great top, very well made and the fabric was great quality. Loved it!
couldn't even get it over my shoulders it was so small!
Fit good just too small as I should have gotten a medium

links_reviews_title: very flattering fit. would rent again
links_reviews_text: fits beautifully, looks good w jeans or a skirt.. great shirt

links_reviews_title: Very flattering top!! So cute for work.

links_reviews_text: Very sad that this shirt runs super small. Couldn't wear
Fit great. Glad the peplum wasn't pronounced. Had a nice tailored look. Goes with everything.

The peplum is very minimal. It fits kind of tight in the shoulders. Overall it was not a very comfortable fit. The lace around the neckline was also uneven. I did not end up wearing the item due to issues with the fit/ cut.

links_reviews_title: I loved this & it fit great everywhere but super tight on my chest. Have to go up one size for 36D
links_reviews_text: I am usually a medium in tops. This top fit great on the arms, waist and all but the chest section was super tight. I have to admit, I am a bit busty up there (36D) so I will be exchanging the Medium to get a Large and hope for the best :)
Beautiful Top!! Gorgeous top with lace detail!! Very versatile. Will definitely rent again!!
If I could have afforded to buy this, I would. Super flattering.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful shirt but couldn't wear. Was very small
links_reviews_text: Beautiful shirt but couldn't wear. Was very small
Ordered the small because most blouses size small are a good fit. Not this time. It's beautiful so I was disappointed to not be able to wear it.
slightly tight in the bust
Flattering but size up
Pretty top you can dress up or down. I thought it was going to be short but it was a good length.
Very cute. I am 5'0

What a great top! I'm going to buy it. Totally flattering and perfect to go from work to play. Arm design, the way it's cut make your arms look skinnier too. Love love love this black shirt and adding it to my staple clothing items!

Wonderful quality and craftsmanship. The sleeve details were great and provided good proportions too offset curvy hips without sticking out TOO much. Runs very small and was tight around the neck. Size up.
Didn't wear it was too small

links_reviews_title: Runs small and tight around neck
links_reviews_text: I am petite and don't usually have an issue with an item in my size being so tight in the ribs but loose in the bust. The rib cage and neck were uncomfortable. Looks cute but not a long wear item.
Great classic top. Great fit. Not too tight. Got tons of compliments at work but this could easily be worn out on the town.

I rented this for a concert and night out and paired it with skinny black pants, black booties and colorful statement earrings. It was perfect! I'm a pear shape -- usually wear a small on top but larger on the bottom -- and tried the small, but it was still too snug around my waist. The medium fit perfectly. The peplum doesn't flare very much -- just enough to accentuate the waist but offer some room in the hip. The neck was fitted but not too tight. Would definitely rent again!
fits perfect
slimming in the waist! also liked the neckline
Fit perfectly - wore at work under a blazer and then out afterwards to dinner. I thought it was flattering, not too tight around the middle.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a night out or date
links_reviews_text: Neck is a bit tight. Peplum waist is tight so size up
This shirt is small but super cute. The neck is tight but you get used to it.
Great fit, but slightly too short (and I have a small torso)
Loved it

links_reviews_title: Love this top. Looks great with black pants for work.
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly. Structured at the waist.

The peplum is oddly cut and not flattering. I tried the large and the medium. The large was huge in the waist. The medium fit except for the peplum - the waist into the peplum was ok but the bottom of the top didn't flare out like it should.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful top to pair with jeans and high boots or skirt
links_reviews_text: I ordered an xs because a small wasn't available but it was definitely pretty tight for me ordering a size down. I would say it's very true to size as the small would have been perfect. It's a flattering top, pretty material.

This XS fit me extremely closely, and I am at my most painfully thin right now, so I have almost no breasts. Runs super small. But the details are lovely and perfect to dress up a plain skirt or pants for a party.
Day to night top. Flattering line.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments from my husband about this top!
links_reviews_text: The fit was a little snug. The collar was even a little tight around my neck. I would try a medium instead of small next time.
This was beautiful lace and great quality. Unfortunately I thought I could get away with being in my second trimester wearing this but it would have fit great before baby bump. Beautiful piece!
Very cute, sexy and tasteful!

This was absolutely perfect for a wedding on the beach in Key West. It was long in the back with 3.25" heels, but since it was short in the front, it worked fine. Was so comfortable in it. Very flattering and got lots of compliments.

Wore this on a recent cruise for the white night party, because my original choice had a broken zipper. I got many compliments but I probably would've been more comfortable going up one size. There was zero give or stretch so sitting felt slightly annoying in the bust and rib cage with a larger bust. No bra needed.
Absolutely beautiful flowing dress! True to size. Received so many compliments. My friends and husband said you must own this dress. So done deal.
Loved this Parker dress, it is very flattering and not too long of a maxi for us short girls! Will definitely rent again, and maybe even purchase. Great find!

links_reviews_title: Didn't wind up wearing it but thought it was very cute for weddings and other events!
links_reviews_text: Loved the ruffles, is slightly fitted through the waist and the hips but the hi Lo hem is very flattering flattering. It's a very light weight fabric no stretch, but still is comfortable. Would rent again just loved another dress more
Super light weight, fit true to size, and made my tush look great! Was able to wear a strapless bra easily. Highly recommend- wore this for my bridal shower!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a summer wedding! Danced all night, comfortable, beautiful, fun dress!
links_reviews_text: Normally wear a 6, decided 8 was more comfortable! Very feminine and light! No bra needed!

links_reviews_title: Feminine and fun! Perfect for outdoor wedding!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Felt pretty and comfortable in it. Perfect for an outdoor wedding in wine country. Received so many compliments! It was a departure from the typical style I wear and glad I took a chance! The top fit secure enough I could have gone without a bra but strapless worked great. Definitely a long dress in the back I'm 5'9 and wore 2.5" heels and it still hit the ground. Would rent again.
Wore this to a spring wedding it was PERFECT! I felt like a million bucks and was able to dance and have fun all night! Love this dress!!!

This dress was absolutely perfect for the May wedding that we attended. It fit like a glove and was extremely comfortable even when dancing or sitting down. I received so many compliments, and I would definitely rent it again. I will say that if I had not worn heels (~3in heels) it would have been a little long in the back.
Fit true to size!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress, so many compliments
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size and very flattering! Would recommend!
Loved this dress. The cut and fit are beautiful. Fabric is very light weight- perfect for a warm evening of dressy day maxi. Very soft and feminine with great neckline.
This dress is beautiful and flowing. I'm 5'7" and wore it with flip flops for a poolside dinner on vacation. The length was perfect.
I loved this dress and tons of compliments. I’m 5’8 and needed heels to keep the back off the floor. Mid part is fitted- flows great when dancing!
The dress fit great. I received compliments throughout throughout the evening. With the right heels the dress did not drag. It was comfortable and flowy.

No bra needed. Dress holds nicely if properly fitted. Rented it (and eventually bought it bc I loved it so much) for an engagement photo shoot. It is very lightweight, so it worked perfectly for the 80 degree weather we endured for the photos. Print photographs really well. Despite wearing heels, I did have to hold the back off the ground when the pathway transitioned to dirt (I'm 5'7" and was wearing 2.5 inch heels), as the back of the dress brushes the ground when you walk. I also have wide shoulders, but the dress did a good job of not emphasizing them.
Great delivery service, dress in perfect conditions, fitted perfectly.
I wore this dress for my bridal shower. It was beautiful and perfect.
This dress was perfect for my brunch shower! It was a great fit and so comfortable.

links_reviews_title: This dress is so comfortable and hugs in all the right places.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. It was pretty and dainty. I wore it for my rehearsal dinner. It had just the right mix of fun and flirty. The high low hem makes it ideal for multiple heights.

links_reviews_title: Cocktail party the night before our wedding
links_reviews_text: Fun and flirty dress, received many compliments.
Absolutely loved this dress! I wore it for our wedding rehearsal. Very flattering, light weight and fun for summer. True to size. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit for my bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my brunch bridal shower and got so many compliments. I am typically between a size 2 and 4 and got the 4. I sometimes have trouble with things fitting my large rib cage correctly but this dress fit me so perfectly! It flowed beautifully and was great for a daytime event.

links_reviews_title: Attended a beautiful rustic wedding and got compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: Where to begin? I fell in love with pictures of this dress and thought it would be a perfect floral to wear to a rustic barn wedding. I was right! I felt beautiful in this silk 'light as air' dress....I took a pic of the pattern up close so you can see how beautiful the flowers look. I wore it with 3 inch wedge heels and the back trailed a little bit, but I walked and danced all night without tripping. The dress does run small and being silk, there is no give, so go one size up, especially if you are full figured like me. I normally wear a 10 and am a 36C and the 12 fit comfortably. Everyone loved the dress, I loved the dress, even the bride commented on how beautiful and flattering it was. I would wear it again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an outdoor summer colorado wedding!
links_reviews_text: This Parker dress was so fun and different! I am 5ft 7inches. I usually wear a size 6. I have a 34 C small D cup size. I ordered a size 6 and 8. Both sizes fit, but I went with the 8 because it was more comfortable! Great dress. Will rent again!

I had back to back showers and wore this to both. Received many compliments on it from all my relatives. It was a comfortable, flattering fit, and I didn't have to wear a bra. My only issue is that the back of the dress (hi-low hem) scraped the ground, and one of the days it was raining, so the dress was absorbing all the water from the ground like a sponge, so I had to hike it with my hand. I'm 5'5 and had on 3"heels.

I recently rented this dress for our engagement photos and couldn't be happier with how the dress fit. It's lightweight fabric was perfect for summer and so easy to move around in. The dress fit true to size. I have rented several dresses but none quite like this!
Summery, feminine, flattering, sweet - this dress was the whole package. Could be dressed up or down.
I am so sad I have to return this dress. So pretty and comfortable.

I didn't see too much difference between the 0 and 2 So I sized up from my usual 0 because it's pretty form fitting. I'm 5'3" and I had to wear 3" heels so the back wouldn't drag on the ground. But oh sooo pretty especially with a little breeze the layers would flutter. This dress received the most complements of any RTR dress I've rented so far.

links_reviews_title: Fantastic fit and my husband loved it
links_reviews_text: So gorgeous, the silk fabric billowed in the breeze and I got compliments all night. The 4 fit just right with heels. Danced all night, it was the perfect summer party dress.
Fit perfectly for a rehearsal dinner in the mountains. I'm 5"8 so with heels would have been maybe a little short. But complimented so many times

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Very slightly see-through, but barely noticeable.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a vineyard wedding!
links_reviews_text: At 5'2 and 125 lbs, long and somewhat fitted dresses are hard for me but this high-low was wonderful! It skimmed my hips perfectly and just grazed the floor with my 3.5 inch heels. Most importantly, it was lightweight and so easy to dance in all night. I received so many compliments on it, definitely a recommend!

links_reviews_title: Wasn't expecting this as it was a replacement but ended up SO cute and didn't want to return it!
links_reviews_text: Ended up picking this not expecting anything of it bc it was a replacement but LOVED IT and received so many compliments. Wore it to get our marriage license and spend our first day with family and friends in Savannah GA to start our wedding weekend so it was a fun Pre wedding "bridal" look. (I wanted to wear white all weekend and had a dress I already owned I was gonna wear for this-nothing fancy but it made my day to receive such a pretty dress on accident without having to buy another or wear one I already had worn to events) The back side was a little long as I didn't wear more than an 1-1.5 inch heel and I'm 5'4"-5'5". Other wise fit PERFECT. as I am usually a 4. Didn't wear a bra but I have barely b cups would definitely rent again
Floaty, floral dress was perfect to wear to birthday dinner

links_reviews_title: Chest runs small but wore anyways
links_reviews_text: I am fuller busted at 36DD- couldn't I'll zip the top portion but wore with a jean jacket and it worked. Love the feminine print and fun asymmetrical hemline!
Perfect dress for a Garden Party themed event. Comfortable & pretty! True to size. Would rent again.
Loved it! Flowy but tight at the waist so was flattering.

links_reviews_title: Loved this shirt, perfect for Valentine's Day
links_reviews_text: Nice material, fit well but was slightly small in the chest area, may want to be careful if you have a bigger chest because the shirt will be tighter in that area and the material is not very stretchy

I loved this shirt for my birthday girls night out. Requires a strapless or specialty bra. Silky satiny sheen. Expensive material. Neck fit comfortable with three snaps and wrap around was comfortable but occasionally got in the way. Plenty long. Loved the red color Cute with leather pants.
Fit perfectly!

The silk is heavy and luxurious. I got annoyed with the "tail" and wrapped it around my neck. Used no bra, just the cover ups from the drugstore. A million compliments! The fabric is gorgeous and the fit was great.

Wore this on multiple date nights...it's a head turner. The red is so fiery, and the silk is stunning. It will make your date say wow, and also all the ladies around you at dinner. Compliments for days! Fits perfectly.

This was a beautiful top! Yes, it's a little hard to get into, but it was worth it. I am a size 4, 32D and the 38 fit perfectly. I thought I could pair this with a really dressy jean, but the dress pant really looked so much better.

Rented this beauty for my bday dinner and night out in Atlantic City. Received many compliments! It was very comfortable. It was a little snug around the neck. Not enough to bother me but it is noticeable since it's an unusual design. I have nothing that wraps The neck at home. Highly recommend it! I have a small chest, I wore a strapless bra no problem with it. If you're really busty I would size up. Wish I could own this!
Beautiful color & material, this top was also comfortable and stayed put in all the right ways!
It fit well- it was a little Awkward to have the tie hang so long
Love this top! Great statement piece
Loved this dramatic top!
Beautiful top! Fit perfectly, but is hard to take off solo since there is no zipper on the side. Wore with strapless bra, could have used a little fashion tape, but worked without it.
This top makes you want to touch the material. It is cut perfectly and hits all the right spots. Love!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments! This was the perfect look for my event!
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly and was so comfortable!

What a show stopper! Fabric is deeper red then rtr photo, nice stretch, not silk but looks great! It was as sophisticated & elegant & flirty with that 2 long ties at the back. & it look different with white pants compared to black, i would re rent it again, i felt like keeping it( i wore it without bra, was ok for me)
Wore this several times to different celebration dinners - with black pants, skirt, heels and flats. Really versatile and adds a touch of glamour without being over the top.

This sultry scarlet top by Galvan is stunning! Running true to size with very little stretch, I recommend ordering your regular size but sizing up if you would like extra room in the chest or around the neck. This style has a relaxed fit which lays close to your body without being skin tight. I recommend wearing a strapless bra or a NuBra because of the way the neckline is, you definitely can't wear a standard bra. This is such a sophisticated and chic look. Looks amazing with black pants and black heels for a high-class date night!
This blouse was gorgeous! The fabric was luxurious and the back tie was a define attention grabber. Many compliments!
I got so many compliments with this top. Beautiful cut and fit
Fit perfectly, lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Good for a girls night out.
links_reviews_text: I'm pretty petite, the fit was a bit too big for me.
It fits perfectly! It was perfect for a date night!

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear it because it was too small. Fabulous color
links_reviews_text: Too small

links_reviews_title: It did not fit me well.
links_reviews_text: I'm broad shouldered, and have a triangular torso. This top did not do me any favors. At one point, I considered try to drop a few pounds over the next few weeks to carry this better, but woke up from that nightmare. I returned it without wearing it out of the house. For a size 8, it seemed to pucker in my mid-back area because I have a shorter torso than their fit model. It's really a beautiful top and would have been easy to wear if I fit it. I think someone who has a straight and narrow body type would look terrific in this. Something to note: the listing says this top is made of 100% silk. It isn't. The tag inside said it was 81% triacetate and 19% polyester. They should correct this listing accordingly.
Luxurious material that doesn't wrinkle easily. Great top for an elegant cocktail party. If you like to show off your shoulders this is a great top.

This top is so silky and well made. The ribbon on the back is striking. You have to pair it with black jeans and you have to wear a longer coat because of the ripping. But overall nice. Especially if you like the halter neck look
Tight across chest.
Wore this for valentines date night with my husband. Loved!!
Loved this top. The fit and color are so stunning. Very tempted to purchase!
Cute details!
True to size. Pretty color.
True to size

links_reviews_title: Wore it for New Year's Eve. Love the collar and the drape in the back. A little flair and drama.
links_reviews_text: It just fit me perfectly....maybe a bit snug across my chest but wasn't too noticeable. If you'e between a 6 and 8, I would go up a size. It is a slim fitting top.
The color is fabulous. Great for a party, wore with leather pants. Forgot to take a photo. It is a little tight around your neck but I got used to it.

links_reviews_title: The color - the fabric - the style!
links_reviews_text: The beautiful top was a party hit. Would rent again!
Material was thick and soft. Think enough to not have to wear a bra. Neck did not tug as much as I expected after reading the reviews. Would definitely rent it again.
Loved this shirt. It fit perfectly. The neck was a little confusing, but figured it out very quickly.
was a little too tight

links_reviews_title: great signature piece with a black pencil skirt
links_reviews_text: fit perfect
This top fit perfectly. I'm a 6/8 across the board, and it fit like a glove. Wore it to a concert and it was excellent. If they had it in black, I'd buy it in a heart beat.

links_reviews_title: My man got a work award and I was able to look great on his arm!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'11, 215lbs, 36DDD, have wide shoulders and large rib cage, and this dress worked! If you've got big biceps, you might have a problem. There was plenty of room in the chest, it wasn't squeezing the girls. There are pockets! (Which is always a plus), the side flaps help hide the front pooch. The back is longer so you don't have to worry about if it's too short.

links_reviews_title: Fabulous cause with a fun dress!
links_reviews_text: I weigh 177lbs and 5'7" I have been trying to lose weight still from babies. This dress made me feel pretty! The fabric is heavy and has some spandex so it runs nicely against your body. The long sleeves were comfy and perfect for a January event. The bottom was fitted which makes it feel sexy and the skirt that overlays it just makes it feel perfectly appropriate. I'm at a point in my weight loss journey where I don't love my legs yet, but this dress cut and shape is very flattering.

links_reviews_title: The neckline is too wide for me and the sleeves were too snug. I didn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear it because the neckline is to wide and the sleeves were too snug. The dress is also heavy, I guess because of the extra skirt fabric. It's nicely made and the fabric feels nice, though.

What a lovely dress. The neckline seemed somewhat old-fashioned (like Renaissance old-fashioned) and is just beautiful. The skirt was long enough to be appropriate in a conservative crowd and the overlay has pockets and flares flatteringly. Its got some stretch, and the 12 fit well. (I'm usually between 12 and 14 in dresses depending on the cut around the hips/thighs). Would rent again.
Material is nice and thick and feels great. You have to wear strapless bra IMO. The event I ordered for got postponed so sad I don't have anything to wear it to. Love the pockets too!
Classic style, comfortable and fit true to size.

links_reviews_title: Audrey Hepburn meets Grace Kelley Elegance !
links_reviews_text: I just loved this dress on line and was not disappointed when it arrived right on time for a holiday party. It is truly stunning on. It is very form fitting and well made of a heavy fabric, however the material has some stretch so is comfortable to wear all night. The neckline is simply beautiful and the dress stays in place with no worrying about it falling off your shoulders and having to constantly make adjustments. I wore a wide set strap bra which worked just fine however a strapless bra would be best with the exposed décolleté. The two tiered skirt is very stylish and even at 6' tall was long enough. The dress runs true to size. I typically wear a 14-16 and went with the 16 which hugged me all over but very comfortable. Was I overdressed for the event, maybe. Did I feel like a runway model, yes. Would I rent it again, absolutely ! Thank you RTR !

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a dressed up work dinner
links_reviews_text: This dress fits true to size and helped to give my body proportion as the skirt has volume that makes up for narrower hips. It was comfortable for a work event, has pockets, and I felt work appropriate and fashionable at the same time. This fabric is also great for occasions that require a wrinkle free dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, cut small, stretchy fabric, form fitting
links_reviews_text: The dress is beautiful but made from a very stretchy fabric. The 14 would not close. The 16 closed but showed all my lumps and bumps. I wore my alternate dress. I recommend this dress for anyone who has no lumps and bumps since it is form fitting. It’s very well made. I was disappointed that I could not wear it.
Snug, sexy, amazing!

links_reviews_title: Very pretty dress with interesting neckline. This was much more formal than I thought from the desc
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear it because it was more formal than I expected from pic and desc. Great for a formal affair.

I rented this right away bc I thought the cut would be super flattering for my pear shape with the wide neckline and the 2-piece skirt to camouflage my hips. But the underskirt is VERY FITTED and VERY VISIBLE, so it was very unflattering--noticeable bumps for my belly and the top of my thighs. The top looked great, and the fabric was thick and very stretchy, so it didn't feel terrible, but there was no way it would have worked on me.
I rented this dress for my bridal shower and loved it! I ended up having to size up because the dress that was my actual size had a stain BUT it still fit and felt great. I loved it!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my December rehearsal dinner! Very flattering, loved the fit.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size, the waist is very fitted which makes it very flattering. The silhouette/length is fun and festive for any event. Got tons of compliments on this dress, it was a hit! Would definitely order again.

links_reviews_title: This dress is very chic in person. It’s perfect for a semi formal event.
links_reviews_text: The material is much lighter than I expected but it’s comfortable. It’s short, although I’m tall - it reached about six inches above my knees. It also runs a little snug - usually I fit in a 4 or 6 RTR but this 6 was very snug - moreso because you need spanx or something underneath to keep it smooth. All in all a great bargain for a great look though.
This dress was very nice! A little awkward at the top but once you get used to it, it was fine! Loved the sleeves!!

Loved this dress! Fit perfectly and got so many compliments. I have a small waist but broader shoulders so I was worried I'd have to size up to a 6, but I was able to stick with the 4. Made me feel like a bride and was perfect for the chilly spring weather.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, perfect for wedding events!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, fits in just the right places without being too form fitting. Wore it to my bridal shower and it was perfect and received many compliments!
It was a great dress and perfect for the occasion . The only thing is it was a little loose for me in the bust as I am small on top.

links_reviews_title: Super cute flirty formal bridal shower dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress ran kind of small in my opinion. I wore an 8 but it was kind of tight at the shoulders (not sure if mine are kind of broad?) the sleeves were a perfect length for me and I felt good in the dress! It was slightly tight on my ribs and kind of hard to lift my arms anything more than 90° haha but overall it was a flirty yet formal/appropriate dress!

I knew I would stand out at my bridal shower being the bride, but I really wanted to pop. I am really happy that I chose this dress! I kept it in my folder of potential outfits to rent for a while. I'm normally between a 0/2. I rented the 2 & 4 based on previous reviews. The material was nice, i didn't experience wrinkling. I will say it isn't a dress that you can raise your arms up with ease, but that was a minor detail for me.

links_reviews_title: Love that I can wear special occasion pieces without the commitment of purchasing them.
links_reviews_text: The fit was very comfortable and flattering. Worked perfect for our simple elopement ceremony.
I wore this for my wedding shower and had many compliments. It was true to size as I usually wear a size 4, however, it was a bit tight through the arms. Overall, I would wear it again.

I order this dress for my bridal shower and I was very scared because I never did Rent the runway before. When I received the dress And tried it on I noticed that the size I wanted to wear had a stain on it. I called the company and they overnighted me another dress. When I tried on my back up size it actually fit so I went with my original dress. It's Definitely true to size and not much difference between the 10-12. I went with the 12 which I was actually happier with because of the length. It's not white white, but it's still nice shade of white. Really any jewelry and shoes can go which i loved. I got so many compliments and all my pictures turned out amazing. I truly felt like the bell of the ball. Highly recommend this dress! I was sad to return it!

links_reviews_title: I actually got married in this dress. We just had a small backyard ceremony
links_reviews_text: Sleeves were almost snug, but still fit well.

Fit true to size, but I saw a few girls had sized up and didn't have a problem in the reviews. I had no problems with the two but some photos it looked a little bunchy so maybe the 4 would've eliminated that. It's a good winter white dress and I got a ton of compliments on it. Fabric does wrinkle in transport so prepare to steam before you wear and you'll need a strapless bra for off the shoulder. Didn't find it to be see through, it had a lined skirt. All around would recommend renting!

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for our engagement photos. It's a very classy and elegant dress.
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress. I wore it for my engagement photos. It's a thicker material and not see-through at all. It has good length. It fits true to size so I would recommend ordering your normal size. You can't really lift your arms in it, but that didn't bother me since I only wore it for a short amount of time. I'd say if you have a larger chest to order a size up. It was pretty tight and I don't have a large chest. It's a very flattering dress though and I've received many compliments on it from our engagement photos. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
True to size and great fit. I wore this for a winter wedding shower
It was perfect for our winter engagement party and I got compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: This dress what crisp white and stood out at the gala being with all the other black dresses.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, it was a little tight across the arm that has the open shoulder but all in all I would 100% rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Love the dress, I received tons of compliments. It was perfect for my bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: It is tight around the chest area. I ordered a 4 and 6 and wore the 6 and it was snug. I am 5'6 and 145 lbs. I have a small D breast size and barley got them in this dress. I did however love the look for a winter bridal shower and would rent again.

I wore this dress at my engagement party and received compliments all night long! It was in December and partly outside so wanted something with sleeves and thicker fabric so it was perfect for what I was looking for. It fit like a glove, people were asking if I had it custom sized and couldn't believe it was from RTR. Would definitely recommend renting it!
This dress was stunning in my engagement photos. The asymmetrical neckline was tough to pull off from some angles but I loved the movement of the dress in side-profile shots.

This dress is so pretty and fun. I wore it to my bridal shower. I have VERY broad shoulders so it was a tad tight around the shoulders. Was not too short even with me being very tall. Recommend getting a spray tan before wearing this though!

links_reviews_title: Love the style of the dress
links_reviews_text: The arms were very tight and couldn't really move my arms but that's just the style of the dress and how it was cut across. Overall it's been one of my favorite rentals.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my low-key rehearsal dinner.
links_reviews_text: I wanted a white dress for my casual rehearsal dinner, and overall I really liked it. As you can see in the photos, it was a bit snug, so I would recommend going up a size as a backup ( I didn't have one available). Also, because I am busty, it was tight on the arms but nothing that was too uncomfortable. If you have a smaller chest, I think it would fit more true to size. Overall, I think it was perfect my occasion despite the snugness and would recommend it.

links_reviews_title: Fancy work party that was a 60's theme
links_reviews_text: I received sooo many compliments! It was a touch of 60's glam and I felt gorgeous in it. Except, it was really tight in my arms so I couldn't put my hands above my head. If you have occasional problems with tightness in the arms with shirts, you'll struggle with how tight the arms are and there is no give. It was okay though, I modified my dance moves and made the best out of it.
Love the fit! Great shade of white. Wore this to my bridal shower and got lots of compliments. I'm 5'10" and it was a little short, but not uncomfortable at all. Got tons of compliments!
I wore this dress to my maternity shoot and absolutely loved it. It was simple but the one shoulder cut out gave it an extra kick. I would definitely rent it again.

I wore this to a cocktail party. Dress fit true to size and I didn't have any problems with the straps or anything. I wore a strapless bra. I didn't notice until after I took pic but I could have pulled down dress because looks like it gathered a bit under my bra. I never noticed. Lol Probably because I was dancing all night. I love this dress.
#blackandwhiteparty #whitedress #holidays

I cannot express enough how gorgeous and glamorous I felt wearing this dress! I don't have a curvy body but this dress made me look all JLo meets Sofia Vergara. I didn't even have to wear a bra even though my ladies are a little big. Absolutely in love with this dress!

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect! I got so many compliments throughout the night.
links_reviews_text: My only complaint was that it was hard to raise hands while dancing. Overall 10/10.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my wedding rehearsal!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my wedding rehearsal, and I received tons of compliments. It was tight in the arms, but the next size up was loose and unflattering at my waist. I definitely recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress was simply elegant. A perfect compliment to my wild hair.
links_reviews_text: Pro's - It fit true to size. The arms were long enough and the bust was perfect. The nylon-like materials made the dress snug but still breathable and forgiving. Con's - was not the whitest white. I am sure simply due to the popularity that the dress has been worn plenty and it is starting to show. There were also some loose seams. Had to fix it in the bust and the half shoulder.

I received many compliments and stood out in a sea of lack dresses. A little tricky with the undergarment situation. I don't have much of a belly but needed to wear compression in this dress, not forgiving. It's more cream than white and needed to be ironed and pinned. Still very pretty.

I'm 5'10", 148lbs and the size 6 was perfect fit and length. It's not see through which is always a concern with white. I didn't wear a bra since it was well lined and off the one shoulder. I wore it to an all white dinner and felt comfortable and elegant. I would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a white party and still felt like I stood out!
links_reviews_text: This is a really cute fit and flare dress that is flattering to all figures. My only caution is that I have super long arms and the sleeves were still a little long on me.
I did not receive the dress the day it was intended to deliver and didn't get to wear it to the intended event. But, I did get to wear it afterwards! If fit amazing and true to size.
Comfy fit, just remember a strapless bra!

links_reviews_title: The one shoulder changes it from pretty to unforgettable.
links_reviews_text: A bit tight around the waist and chest. I got a size 2 and could have done a size 4 but was happy I didn't - it looked more fitted. The dress is high quality and stunning.
I loved the fit and of course breaking the rules of wearing white after Labor Day :)

links_reviews_title: Very comply. Paired with Jean's and flats.
links_reviews_text: While the top was missing the scarf it didn't need it. Wore a strapless bra. Stayed off the shoulder. Later in the night paired well with a green leather jacket.

Wore this twice to dinner. It's a different top and was comfortable and fun. It seems to run a bit big and I could have sized down since there was plenty of room in the bust, which is usually the area of issue. You either need to wear a strapless bra or, wear a regular bra and run the tie under the one strap and just let it go down your arm.

Loved the color and the fit. It was missing the side shoulder tie detail, but I rolled with it anyway. It was great a little dinner out and with the color being such a saturated green, I may keep and get one more wear out of it for the upcoming holiday season. Love it! Great basic that feels and looks good on.
Pretty casual, true sizing. It was missing the tie which I was super bummed about. I feel like it's pretty plane without it.

Fit was great, very unique and fun top. I was so relieved to get the sash delivered. Was nervous based on other reviews. The small (that I didn't wear) looked very worn and was a completely different color than the beautiful rich green of the Medium.
Light weight, great color, good fit
