I truly loved this top. From the decadent deep green to the soft as silk, it was incredible. Originally made fashion forward fresh statement top. Super easy and fun to wear. I highly recommend

links_reviews_title: Cute but not as pictured in stock pic
links_reviews_text: Rented for a concert. Looked better than my picture shows but the top is not like the stock photo. No "tie" component. I actually liked it better without but something to be aware of.

links_reviews_title: RTR did a great job of getting a new one top to me whbe the first top didn't have the sash attached
links_reviews_text: Great top! I have rented it several times. This last time I wore it for St Patrick's day. I find that the brand Tibi usually nakes very quality, teue to size clothing.

links_reviews_title: Cute top great with jeans or leggings for a date night
links_reviews_text: super cute and yet still fairly conservative. color is great for anyone like me, who tends to have an all black uniform.

Loved the fit and color of this top. True to size and a unique fit. Wore for family pictures. It was not very easy to wear a jacket with due to the cut. Rented Tibi blue pleated skirt to pair it with and loved the look! Then wore later with jeans and booties.

links_reviews_title: Fun top, but I tied it wrong.
links_reviews_text: I am usually a small or medium in shirts and I got a small based on some other reviews. I thought it fit OK, but had trouble with it shifting around and I had to keep tugging at it. It turned out I tied it wrong. I just tied the two hanging pieces to make a knot...turns out you need to have one go over the sleeve and one under (between the top of your shoulder and the shirt), THEN tie them together. I did that after I got home and it fit much more like it does on the model.

I did. It end up wearing. It was a beautiful color, and fabric but did not come with the tie so it became a off (one) shoulder top. Which, for me, sat funny but had I gone a size smaller could have looked nicely.
I never got a chance to wear this unfortunately because it shipped without the shoulder tie, making it just a plain, boring green tee. Too bad, it looked so cute in the photo.
Pretty color, but sort of shapeless on.

links_reviews_title: Great look, rich color, no shoulder tie
links_reviews_text: Overall I liked this top a lot - wore it tucked into a tighter leather skirt. It did not come with the tie as pictured so was less interesting, but overall has a very sleek look that can be made elegant or edgy

Loved the fit. The color was gorgeous but the only thing is that it didn't have the tie/sash with it. It was a bit wrinkled when I received it, but it was a great fit and can be dressed up with a skirt or dressed down with jeans.
Did not come with the tie for the sleeve
Scarf for sleeve was missing so it was pretty, but, not unforgettable.
Fabric is terrible, doesn't drape well. Very disappointed.

links_reviews_title: Didn't come with the sash but looked cute anyway.
links_reviews_text: I rented this initially for a date night but it didn't come with the sash for the arm therefore it was a little too casual for my evening. Luckily I had rented a back up that worked and so I went with that. The customer service at RTR was great when I let them know it didn't come with the sash and offered to send me something else for free but it wasn't needed. I still wore the shirt without the sash the next day just around town and really liked it. The color is rich and the fabric is nice. I would maybe rent again but for a casual event since I doubt the sash would be included again.
Wish this came in other colors, the drape was perfect, it just washed me out.

links_reviews_title: Cute green off the shoulder top
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a medium but wasn't sure how it would fit so I went with a large. It was a little big but I added a belt and it looked cute for a night out.
Was very poor fitting and did not have the sash to tie. Fit was not good.

This shirt will only work if you have very narrow shoulders. It does not lay like in the picture (and no sash) plus if you can get it to lay right for a second, there is a gaping hole through arm holes showing everything.
Did not come with the tie, a little too short.
Pretty color. Nice alternative from black. Subtle sexy.
way too big, couldnt wear

links_reviews_title: This top was beautiful. The material draped very nicely. The ribbon was missing though.
links_reviews_text: It was a gorgeous top. However it wasn't sent with the ribbon. I still wore it and got compliments, but I would've liked to get the ribbon so I could tie it.
Sexy without trying too hard. Very comfortable, I didn't have to adjust the shoulder - sometimes one shoulder tops feel like they need constant adjustment throughout the night.
Fits very easily and so easy to wear. Very flattering. Mine came with the sash so no issue there. Love it - debating whether to keep! Got lots of compliments.

Easy fit. It wasn't quite as naturally drapey as I expected it to be from the pics-- I think it was the lack of stretch-- and on that note, I'd recommend going up a size if you're busty! I'm on the smaller side in the bust, and while it hung loosely at the waist, it definitely had more cling near the top. Overall though, it was comfortable, cute, and I didn't have to spend the whole evening adjusting it, which is a win in my book!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Shade of Green and Fun Design
links_reviews_text: This really is a lovely colour and design. However, it wrinkles very easily and makes it unrealistic to wear longer than a couple of hours.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful top but listen to other reviews-50/50'shot you don't get the sash
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful shirt and would have looked great with a pair of jeans and black booties but just like many other reviews mentioned RTR didn't include the sash, and without it it's just a green shirt. If I wanted to be blah I'd wear my own clothes. Sadly it went back the same day.
Beautiful top wire with jeans and dressed up the out fit .. they didn't send sash wit it but looked great still

I wanted to get this because I love the aesthetic of a deep green off the shoulder. I saw the blouse as something somehow substantial. In fact, it weighs about as much as a Kleenex. The fabric looked to retain every wrinkled bump it had ever seen. I did not wear it. I returned it the same day.
Top is pretty very but did not look like the image.... I think it was missing a bow tie or something on the side. Fit was great.

links_reviews_title: Lovely. Really modern cut and beautiful color.
links_reviews_text: No downside to this beautiful shirt.
Would rent agin, this time hope the strap comes along with it.
I loved it - I did not receive the tie - or bow with my shipment. It still looked cute. The neckline is nice.
Little restrictive in the arms but other than that the dress was perfect.
Unique dress, great fit. Wore to winter wedding in Georgia. Somewhat restrictive to arm motion (dancing) but otherwise fabulous.

I found this dress to be perfect for a winter wedding. The fit was true to size, as I usually wear a 2 and that was the size that fit the best. The only drawbacks were that the sleeves were a bit long (so I tucked them in-unnoticeable) and the top was a little baggy on me due to having a super small chest. It was great not having to wear a bra though! The colors in this dress are way prettier than the website photos show...see my close up for more details. I felt sexy and classy in this little cocktail dress. The length was short without being too revealing and the style of the dress hugged my frame in the right ways. I paired this one with some small earrings, sheer black hosiery, and some super cute deep purple, open middle heels. I wish my phone camera worked properly...only my selfie one takes photos these days. Believe me when I say that this dress gets noticed and I received multiple compliments on the design.

I liked this dress a lot! It was comfortable, fit well and was perfect for the winter time and the party I went to. I will say I probably should've gone with a 0 but the 2 fit me just fine as well. I got many compliments throughout the evening. It's easy to wear and cute and flirty at the same time.

I rented this for my boyfriends holiday and while it fit the occasion, I felt it a teeny bit dated in style , yet gorgeous, the fit was great and I received compliments from people which I wouldn't expect from which is definitely a great sign. When I sat for dinner, it did ride up some, but otherwise a great look with booties and a leather jacket.
Loved the lace! The color and cut was great for a formal, winter event. I would rent again.

This dress is pretty short but I think the sleeves and neckline make it more modest. Got tons of compliments, but my only complaint is feeling restricted in the arms, but I tend to carry more weight there anyway!
The length and fit was great. Not a very stretchy material. Fit was true to size.

I rented the 4 and the 6 and ended up wearing the 4 because the sleeve length and waist were too big/long in the 6. I'm 5'2" and the length was perfect. Was a little tight across the chest. I'm a 34c. The lace doesn't give much. Received so many compliments on this dress! Perfect mix of stylish and sexy, yet classy.

This dress was a bit of a risk for me but I ended up loving it! Usually mini dresses are too short on me but this one felt super comfortable especially with the long sleeves. Got so many compliments! Perfect for early spring or fall
fit was good, dress is short so hard time bending over without mooning anyone. But got so many compliments and I Loved it! Usually wear size 6-8 but this runs smaller and tight around the waist.

I wore this dress out on a date to the theater with my husband and a baby shower. I love when I get to wear a rental to more than one event! I rented this dress for these events specifically, but it was not my number one choice. Most of the dresses I wanted were not available. This dress was very appropriate for the events and for the weather. It is also a great work dress that can easily go from day to night. The dress is definitely more purple than it looks in pictures. I received some compliments, but definitely not the amount I usually get for a rental. It was fine.
I loved this dress! It's beautiful, comfortable, and perfect for a fall or winter formal event!

I wore this to the Breeder's Cup and it was the perfect dress for a formal daytime activity - I even accidentally matched the event colors so it really was almost too perfect. No fit issues at all. Loved this dress!

I found this to fit true to size. I am smaller up top with wider hips and thighs. This dress had no stretch so I decided to go with a size 6 (my pants size). The 6 fit perfectly! I got a lot of compliments. Loved it!!

I'm so excited to wear this dress for NYE. The 2 fit perfectly and I can't get over how beautiful this dress is in person. I love the sleeves and the length makes it not as conservative since it's a bit short.

I ended up buying this because I love the design, color combo and fit. I am 5'7", 140-145lbs, 36B bust, 28" waist, 36" hips. It was fitted all around but had a little more room below the waist than above. Sitting down, the skirt moves up quite a bit. I wore hosiery so not revealing. I will wear this year-round with/without hosiery, with knee or ankle boots, and can wear with heels. Will get use out of this dress!

Very unique with the lace embroidery and the color combination was perfect for a fall/winter event. I read the reviews and sized up to be safe. The 6 fit me perfectly, but there is not a lot of give so someone with a larger chest may need to go 2 sizes up.
Was a great fall dress. Beautiful colors and fit!!!

I'm a pretty solid 6 & this dress fit me perfectly. As others have described the shoulders / top of the sleeves were a little awkward but nothing that bothered me throughout the evening. I wore this out to a nice dinner & drinks for Friendsgiving & received a ton of compliments! The colors in the dress are really pretty & perfect for late fall.
It was cuter than I expected

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress for a fall wedding
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I'm usually between a 0 or 2, in both petites and regular, though I usually aim for petites because of my height (5'3"). This dress fit like a glove. I loved the sheer arms parts. The slip is sewn into the dress, so no issues with either that or the skirt riding up. I wore this with the nu bra. The dress was comfortable, even after eating. The shoulders and underarms are on the tighter side, so I wasn't able to get my arms up as high as I normally do when dancing, but it did not hinder me from having a great time. I was sad to send this dress back.

So I got the 8 and the 10 and the smaller size still fit and definitely was a little shorter and made my waist look smaller. The fabric was a little stiff in the sleeves and chest so I almost wore the 10 just for a more comfortable fit. Loved the dress though and the colors are amazing for a fall wedding!

links_reviews_title: Loved the style of this dress
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a true 4 but had to wear the 6. The length was fine but I could hardly lift my arms up - the sleeves were restricting. But I received a ton of compliments and it was great for a fall wedding!

Loved this dress. I found myself going with my larger backup size due to the dress being pretty tight and unforgiving in the chest area. I usually run anywhere from an 8-12 depending on make. All in all, it was a great rental and I got so many compliments by complete strangers. It was perfect for this gorgeous fall wedding.

links_reviews_title: I've had my eye on this dress and it didn't disappoint!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 4 and 6 and ended up wearing the 6. I'm petite/short so the sleeves were a bit long but I tucked them under and it was perfect. The detail was gorgeous and it was a comfortable dress. Really pretty fall colors.

links_reviews_title: Excellent dress for a fall wedding! Not to hot or cold.
links_reviews_text: It's a little stiff if you are an active dancer.

links_reviews_title: My date took this photo because he appreciated the fit of this dress ! ;) That says it all.
links_reviews_text: Fit is like a dream. I honestly could have lived in this dress. The flowers a whimsical and girly but the cut and fit of the dress and colors scream all woman to me. Wore it to an annual fundraiser in a generally drafty venue but I felt comfortable temperature-wise in this dress while not sacrificing a single iota of style. Would buy this dress to keep in a heart beat. True to size and no one else out of hundreds in the room was wearing anything like it.
Loved this dress! The fit was adorable. Wished it was a tiny bit longer but it was still long enough to be office party appropriate.

I loved this dress. I am a size 6 and rented the 4 and 6. The 4 fit good in the body but the sleeves were too tight. The 6 was just right. I was able to move around and shower the bride to be! The color was also really pretty like an eggplant color. It was great overall.

Dress was lovely. The lace is beautiful and elegant, and with long sleaves and a shorter hemline, this dress is elegant and classy. I rented an 8 and a 10. I wore the 10 because it gave me more room in the arms - it was New Years Eve and I knew I would want to dance unreatricted. The 8 fit me like a glove in the body and looked beautiful, but the sleves were too restrictive. I was cery comfy in the 10. The material is well crafted, does not have much stretch to it, but runs true to size. I wore it with tights and over the knee flat boots. I think it was a big hit!
Loved the fit. Very forgiving too! I was super bloated this day. Fabric has no stretch and it pretty true to size.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! It was perfect for my work Christmas party and I received a ton of compliments.
links_reviews_text: The fit was good in my waist and hips. I have broad shoulders which made it tight across my chest and arms. I stuck with my normal size and you couldn’t tell it was tight.

links_reviews_title: Perfext fit... loved the cutout arms.
links_reviews_text: Unique and great fit!
The fabric doesn't stretch so I needed to go a size up to ensure I had a full range of motion. It was a great dress for a cocktail party and I got a ton of compliments!

Wore this to a cocktail attire company holiday party and it was perfect. It is fitted and has almost no give, so be cautious when picking your size. I rented the four, with my backup size being a six. Either would have worked, but I went with the four for a more fitted look. Sorry the picture does not really do the dress justice, we got carried away and forgot to take pictures!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Thanksgiving at a Winery Dress
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 4 but listened to other reviewers who said this ran small and was happy I did because the 6 fit perfectly. Love the details and unique colors of this dress.
I wore this for my engagement dinner. Fit like a glove! Slightly hovered around my hips to create an even more flattering fit. Not too short. Just perfect in every way. Contemplated keeping it!

links_reviews_title: This was the most beautiful wedding rehearsal dinner for two of my best friends :)
links_reviews_text: This dress was a success! This was my first experience with Rent the Runway, and I'm so glad I did it. I'm usually a size 2 petite, but depending on the brand, could be a 0 or 4 petite as well. I read the reviews from other women, and so I chose the 0 and the 2. I tried on the 0 first, and it was perfect! It's a little tough to raise your arms all the way up once it's on, so I recommend doing your hair before you get dressed. I was pleasantly surprised that the lining was built into the dress, so I didn't have to worry about bunching or static.

Loved the dress! The compliments just kept coming & I gave all the credit to RTR! Colors are true to the pictures. I would definitely say this dress runs true to size. I ordered both the 2 & 4. I wore the 2 and it fit like a glove. The ams were a little big/long, however not terrible. Overall the dress was perfect!

links_reviews_title: Why can't this dress have adjustable straps!?
links_reviews_text: This dress was sent to me as a backup for my anniversary party. I went with another dress but definitely wanted to wear this before it went back. I would say it definitely looks more casual, appropriate for everyday wear. The material is a heavy cotton feel and hangs beautifully. Love the splits and extra rounds along the bottom of the dress and it was very flattering through the hips. And pockets! My big big complaint is that the straps are not adjustable. I am short waisted and had to wear a lightweight bra top thing to avoid flashing. The two times I wore this I spent at least half the time putting the straps back up on my shoulder. Very sexy back was a little less sexy since I had the bra top underneath.

I had some struggles with this dress at first. I didn't realize or remember that the strings that cross in the back actually are supposed to wrap around and tie in the front, which left me tying them in to a bow in the back and getting an awkward fit. Once I figured out what I needed to do, I rocked this dress hard. I skipped undergarments and went with simple sandals to dress it down. Pockets were clutch. So. Many. Compliments. Loved it - wore it 3x in a week!
The dress has pockets and the fabric is rather rigid and heavy so the pockets stick out away from the sides. Awkward fit around the bust. Doesn't move flowy like it seems in the picture
What a gorgeous dress. You can adapt the fit with the straps. The fabric was more sturdy ensuring that the shape was maintained.

This got some bad reviews but I loved it. The poplin makes it more casual so that you can wear a black dress like this for a summer wedding, I would have been overdressed if it were a flowy or shiny fabric like silk or crepe. I found it to fit well, maybe a tiny bit loose, but you're better off erring on the large side because you can adjust with the tie back. Flattering and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress so much!
links_reviews_text: The pockets made it even better:)
I should have read more reviews about the material. But the fit is more mermaid than I anticipated. Lovely but not for our P town vacation.
The cut of the dress was perfect. It was very long and touched the floor. I am tall. The material is very heavy for a summer dress. I felt a bit like a Witch on summer vacation.

I wanted to love this dress. The material is gorgeous - a thick structured cotton that is perfect for a hot summer evening. Definitely made well. The top and low cut back are great but the trumpeted bottom of the dress doesn't make sense. The top of the dress says sundress but the bottom says cotton ball gown. Also, was about two inches too short and weirdly I'm 5'7.

I didn't realize the material of this dress wasn't a flowy lighweight material like it looks in the photos. It's a lot stiffer and was too big in the chest without a way to adjust. Too tight through the hips as well.
Well, I should have sized up for my hips. Oh well. Nice poplin, would have been great for summer evening party.

links_reviews_title: very long dress for a petite woman, it will loo9k beautiful on a taller woman
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful and elegant dress but it is way too long for someone like me. I am 5'1. It was too much work to have it taped, as I usually do with other long dresses. It will look great on a taller woman.

I loved everything about this dress! Really wish it would have fit! It looks great in photo for an hourglass but it's actually quite "straight" in shape. I'm usually a solid 10 in dresses with a classic hourglass shape. This dress was huge in the waist and super tight in the hips. The picture I think doesn't demonstrate this well. I probably could have made the waist work with tie but the cotton fabric just didn't allow for any give in the hips...was a beautiful dress but for someone with a straighter figure.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, just was too big!
links_reviews_text: Very cute dress, but it ran big & fit me a bit awkward. Maybe will try a sized smaller & see if the fit is improved.

Ordered a 6 in this dress, but didn't wear as it didn't fit right. This dress was fitted almost like a mermaid gown, it hit to my ankles, had slits in the lower portion. As it was fitted, the pockets looked weird. The tope was also big. If I had sized up to an 8, the top would have been too big. There is stretch to the dress. The back is super cute

My own fault I didn't love this dress as I clearly didn't read the details well. I thought this would be a more silky sexy vibe but the material was very stiff. I liked the back but the pockets fell in a weird spot for me and was not flattering.

I cannot day enough good things about this dress! The material is thick but has stretch so holds you in but shapes and smoothes your curves. I am normally a size small and it fit me like a glove and so comfortably. This is a must rent! So flattering, feminine and sassy.
Liked the fit just not the length!

I was worried about the potential condition because it's been on the site for awhile but it's 2/2020 and it was in perfect condition! It's a thicker material and so flattering. I'm 5'9" and all leg and it was not too short. I will say I'm a true 0 and the XS was perfect - size up to a small if you're a 2! This dress was a dream. And you don't have to wear a bra!
I wore this to a semi-formal event! The medium fit perfectly and was a great dress. I would definitely rent again!

I enjoyed wearing this dress to a work awards reception! It was pretty snug and, like other reviews said, the short side is pretty short. But overall I felt like this was a great pick and was fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: This dress is the perfect LBD. Fits & looks devine! I got many compliments & my husband loved it.
links_reviews_text: The material was excellent quality. Hugs in all the right places. Perfect length too!

I originally got a small and it would have fit except the chest area so I returned and got a medium. It is so flattering and didn't need to wear a bra. The sleeve was the perfect length for me. I received so many compliments! Would rent again for sure
This dress was super comfortable and cute! Perfect dress for my work party downtown. Very classy! I got a lot of compliments.
I received so many compliments on this dress! It was classy and comfortable. I typically wear a S but ordered a M since many reviews said it ran on the small side. The M was perfect.

Wore to a rehearsal dinner and it was perfect. Loved it so much. It's a tad short on the side before it cascades down, but nothing too crazy. Wore a large and thought it was true to size and it's a bit stretchy.
Wore for a company party- fits like a glove, material gives a bit, so flattering and you don't have to mess with it at all. Rent this. Could've gone TTS but ordered up. Kindof wish I got a S
Glamours party
This dress looked sexy and demure! I got a ton of compliments. Held me in, in all the right places! Thick high end material and easy to move. Loved loved loved.
I'm all about being comfortable and this dress nailed it!

links_reviews_title: My most favorite dress I've ever worn!!
links_reviews_text: SO comfy and flattering!! I will definitely be ordering this dress again!!

I LOVED this dress and got so many compliments all night. It's a tight fitted dress so I ended up wearing my larger size so I could dance & eat comfortably all night. One thing to note - the bottom does angle up higher on one leg and with the ruffle overlay can feel a little short but I thought it was still totally doable and I felt great all night.

This dress was amazing in every way. I am 5'11" so I did have to pull it down after walking a bit, but overall it stays put and is a very thick, luxurious scuba material. Just enough stretch to stay put as needed. The ruffle at the bottom makes it feel more modest that the length would allow otherwise.

This is a stylish, well made, thick and stretchy dress. Fits great and feels great on. Frills make is feminine, yet not too feminine. Just enough amount of detail to make it party- ready, yet not over the top.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for a fundraiser event.
links_reviews_text: Overall I really liked this dress. The event was in November in Chicago weather so I really liked the thick fabric. The sleeve was a little tight but still made for a fun and comfortable dress.
The fabric is so flattering! It's short on one side but very classy
Heavy material good for inside events. Fit well and true to size.
I’m short, only 5ft so the length may be really short on taller girls but it was perfect on me! Definitely runs small so order a size up

links_reviews_title: Compliments from the moment I walked in... danced the night away.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, but I was humbled by wearing a size large when I usually purchase size 4, but once I was over that - it was a super party dress!!
Got tons of compliments on the dress. It did for small so I needed to wear a large instead of the medium. It can be quite short for those that are curvier in the hip/butt area.
Wore this for a Texas themed party. It was a fun dress to wear and comfortable and still warm enough for a winter evening. Form fitting but not skin tight.
Feminine, cute, hot, comfortable and fun

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress!!!! I got so many compliments and felt amazing in it!
links_reviews_text: I just had a baby 5 months ago so I didn’t want to buy anything since my body is still changing and wanted to feel confident and really good about myself! This dress was perfect, loved the fit of it! I am 5’8” and the medium fit me perfectly not to short!
This was such a fun and flirty dress. My girlfriend and I dressed up for a Michael Buble concert and I felt like a star! It has stretch so don't get stressed about sizing - just know it's SHORT !

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a Friday night "Casino Night" event.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 0 or 0P. The "XS" or "P" in this dress fit way more like a 00P. It was VERY short on me, and I am not a tall person. Going up a size to the S made a world of difference. There was so much more fabric at the bottom, the proportion felt differently and more appropriate for this event. I got many compliments on this dress. It is sexy without being too revealing. There is a seam at the waistline, and since the dress is very form-fitting, I found myself having to pull the dress down if I had been sitting - in order to avoid an unfortunate "riding up". Overall, great dress, well-made, would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun sexy dress. Loved it!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so fun. I got so many compliments. I usually wear a medium, but wore the large and it was just a tad tight, but pretty stretchy so it was comfortable. I would definitely rent again.
A little short, but I'm tall so this is not an unusual problem for me. Tight, but in a good way that sucks you in...still very comfortable & easy to pair with fun accessories

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a cocktail party
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a cowboy-themed gala where boots are required. It was the perfect mix of formal and fun. it is short- so be prepared for that! I'm only 5'2" and if I were any taller, it wouldn't have worked!

Loved the dress! The fabric is nice and thick. Am in between size M and L, wore the L for the length, am 5'7 and with 4 inch heels it was a little short, and it did ride up. Got compliments all night, would def rent again :)

I rented this dress for my annual work recognition dinner in January. It was SO cute on, I received compliments all night! The long sleeve fit perfect- not too tight, not too loose. The material of the dress was a very nice thick high quality fabric. This is one of my favorite little black dresses I’ve ever rented!

I wore this dress for an annual formal holiday party. I initially ordered this dress as a second style of dress, just in case the first one I ordered (in two sizes) did not work. I am SO GLAD that I ordered it, because the other dress was itchy, small, and uncomfortable and this dress fit perfectly! The fabric is thick, non-see through, and very easy to move and dance in. The one sleeve and across-the-chest ruffle gave the dress effortless, huge style. This dress is so much more stylish and quality than it appears in the picture. As soon as I tried this dress on I knew it was the one. I received compliments all night on it, and felt amazing. I definitely recommend it!
SO comfortable, I sized up and usually am a M but it wasnt available so I am so happy I did!

LOVED this dress! The perfect little black dress with fun ruffles- the perfect combo of sophisticated and playful. I would definitely rent this dress again. I might have sized up if there was a bigger dress available, but the XS was snug (in a good way) and still comfortable. There's not too much stretch with this material so I wouldn't count on that.

links_reviews_title: Adorable dress, perfect for office holiday party
links_reviews_text: This dress runs SMALL! I'm so glad I ordered a medium and a large. It's somewhat form fitting, which is why you want to order a size up for your additional size.

links_reviews_title: Sexy and comfortable to dance the night away
links_reviews_text: At 1st it fit perfect and very flattering and super sexy but 2 hrs later it started to get loose from the midsection which was not too pretty. Still got tons of compliments and showed off my legs which I loved. Danced all night very comfortably!

The detail on this dress is absolutely gorgeous! I sized up one size from my usual size and wore an 8. It fit perfectly. Seems to run a little slim in the waist, but one size it fit perfect! I wear a 34DDD and the tip fit perfectly too. I got so many compliments on this dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress -- but it's navy not black!
links_reviews_text: Loved wearing this for a wedding in florida. Fit week and fabric looked and felt great and comfortable for night of dancing. Chest was a little big but overall fit a bit small (and it's short).

Beautiful fabric, gorgeous cut, loved the one shoulder detail. I rented this for a formal affair and it was perfect. It runs small, had to size up one size and it fit great. I am 5'3" and this was on the short side. I added black hose to tone it down a bit. Also, I would consider this a standing dress. While sitting for dinner it got uncomfortable, there is no give plus it rode up a bit in length and it was already so short I felt self conscious. Standing and dancing perfect :)

LOVE this dress. I sized up per other reviews, which was a good choice. It is great material which is very supportive and structured. I didn't even need to wear a bra and was comfortable dancing all night. Very flattering and fun.

links_reviews_title: It was a nice dress. Slightly small
links_reviews_text: Dress was beautiful. For being chesty and post baby it fit nice the zipper was a little difficult but Was comfortable when up. I wished i had gone one size up but it wasn’t bad.
Pro : It's a beautiful dress and it fits me perfectly. It is well made and the fabric is just pretty. Con: I can't think of anything
Perfect fit.

It fit well. I am typically a 4/6 and I wore an 8. I am also 5 weeks post partum but Im back to pre birth weight, but my top half (bust) is larger. It fit perfectly and I received so many compliments throughout the evening!
I wore for a winter wedding! Great quality. Rich fabric. On the short side for me (5'10") but still wore it. Definitely would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Runs slightly small in hip are but overall GORGEOUS dress
links_reviews_text: This dress was absolutely stunning in person. Unfortunately I'm a pear shape and it just didn't fit me right. I needed the 12 to fit my hips (without being super tight) but then the bust and chest area were too big since I am a B cup. It's perfect for a fall or winter indoor wedding! I rated it 5 stars because if it fits you, then it's perfect. I don't think I should deduct a star just because it didn't fit my shape.

perfect length, fit nicely around my waste and chest, loved the ruffled sleeve. It had a thin lining of a gel-like material around the top of the dress to help it stay put. And it is a little tough to see, but this dress is rly a deep navy; it looks kind of charcoal-like on the site. I'd rent again!
Amazing dress! I wore it to a fall wedding and fell in love. Unique design and style. Highly recommend!

I'm usually between a 4/6 - the 6 was a bit snug in the hips and a bit big on top, but I was definitely able to wear and comfortable. It was a really fun and different dress to wear to a wedding, and I felt great!
Tight in waist chest
Everyone loved this piece. A show stopper!
Could have maybe sized down to keep the fabric from riding up
This was so cute! I felt very chic and elegant. Wore it with a black leather crop top and toned down the formality with slides instead of heels.

The skirt itself is pretty, but is is nearly ankle length even on me at 5'8". This wouldn't be bad except the fabric is rather heavy and the cut is narrow. There is a side slit which allows you to walk but the heavy fabric flaps around your legs which is annoying and noisy unless you move with tiny bound feet sized steps.

links_reviews_title: I love the front, the length and the fit of the skirt. I really didn't love the back.
links_reviews_text: Strange cut on the back of the skirt made it a big no for me. The front looks nice. It's comfortable too.
Cinches waist and fits well, but order one size down as it runs big.
It was running too long for me, and the tied knot part was adding a bit of weight to skirt. After a try, didn't end up wearing it.

links_reviews_title: A little too much material for my liking, but comfortable nonetheless.
links_reviews_text: Size down
Unfortunately the fabric and the way the fabric lays made it look very cheap :( didn't wear
Elegant, classy and sexy. Didn't end up wearing to event and will rent again.
I love this skirt. And get compliments whenever I wear it. Runs true to size and is chic as hell. I wear it for meetings and it's perfect.

I maybe could have sized down to a 0, but the 2 worked. It was the perfect work skirt. I would rent again. It's hard to tell from the photos, but half the skirt is mat navy fabric and the other half is a shiny navy fabric- such a nice style touch. The knot on the skirt is made by the fabric folding, so there is potential for skin exposure! Eek
Very sexy fun shirt
It took me a little bit to feel comfortable but eventually loved it. It goes higher than the model photo.
Cute for a night out. Very cropped but arms run large.
True to size. Midriff baring and ultra sexy.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments! Very stylish and great fit!
links_reviews_text: Loved it!
I thought this was high quality fabric. Very soft and comfy. Looks so cute with a high waisted skirt. In love with this top!
Wish the size 2 had been available, go a size down if you are between sizes, but such a fun/unique shirt to wear for a night out.
This top is so comfortable and fits perfectly to size! Pairs well with a skirt or high waisted pants and received compliments all night!
Finally RTR is bringing some clothing that makes u feel young & fun. Great top, love it with high waisted pants. Will rent again:)

links_reviews_title: The long sleeve was too big.
links_reviews_text: This would've been a cute top if it fit right. Order a 1 or 2 sizes smaller.
H
I like the concept, but it was super cropped and the sleeve was a little long, didn't end up wearing it out.
Asymmetric sleeve is a little hard to style with a coat, but adorable.
Fun top. Thin material but drapes nicely. Would wear again

This cute off the shoulder shirt paired with a high bun and showcased my back of neck tattoo and clavicle. My boyfriend couldn't keep his eyes off of me & asked if he could buy the shirt for me the next morning. Highly recommend
This shirt looks great in the photos but it is a stretchy t shirt fabric that looks very cheap. The edges are gathered with elastic making it look even more cheap.

links_reviews_title: Great but different cuts within same size
links_reviews_text: So cute and fun. I wore this twice on vacation and loved it. When I rented it again a month later in the same size it was crazy tight and seemed almost like it had been washed/dried. It's gorgeous though.

links_reviews_title: Felt super cute! Lots of compliments on how my waist looked :)
links_reviews_text: Really short torso, not great if you have a long body and REALLY tight across the rib cage. I had to take shallow breaths all night. The specific dress I received was quite worn, the cotton material was a bit faded. Would be great for someone 5'5", with a slim body.

links_reviews_title: Not too bad i liked it
links_reviews_text: It's tight under the dress area but it made me form a shape for my inverted triangle silhouette

Like this is a great fitting romper for a short full sized woman... but it's not my most faaaav color combo. Navy with black overlay. Thick, well made. Zipper up the back so like no drinks... unless you got one of those travel John thingys. Then, go you girl!
A little big but the style was great!

I loved the fit and the structure of this romper. The legs were cut in a way that was flattering even for women who dont have skinny thighs. I got so many compliments and felt great in this. Considered buying!

links_reviews_title: Husband called this a knockout look
links_reviews_text: Fun and sexy with the plunging neckline and short shorts. The texture and dramatic ruffles made this much more than a typical romper. Zero give/stretch/forgiveness. If in doubt order up.
I'm normally a 12 in rebecca taylor and this wasn't even close to zipping. Almost seemed like it had shrunk
I love the fit overall but be warned you can see a little butt cheek from the side.

This was such a fun romper for a night out on vacation. The frilly edges are a little flirty and the navy/black combo really works on this. This romper is pretty short and made my legs look super long! I would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Too small, but oh so cute
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 0 but couldn't zip this up past my hips, so it went unworn. It did look super cute on. The shorts part could be a little short, even if I had gotten a size up, thr back of the shorts hang just slightly past my buttcheecks. The material of this romper is a nice heavy cotton, so it feels like it would breathe even in hot weather. The front is low cute, so be aware of that piece. Otherwise, super cute and I might try a size up and see.

links_reviews_title: Was unable to wear. Runs very small in mid section so it did not zip.
links_reviews_text: Too tight in midsection and this romper is cut extremely short. But, if it had fit it would have been super cute. Very good quality material and beautiful.
Couldn't wear it....I returned it! I need to size up

I selected this romper to take on vacation. I'm a normal small/medium in tops and 4/6 in pants. The structure of the fabric is super flattering and the deep V in the front is great! There was not a lot of give in the material and it was a bit snug so I didn't end up wearing the 6 but will order an 8 next time. Really hoping that one fits!
Adorable but I could not wear this. It was very small in the chest area. Will order again, 2 sizes bigger.
Gorgeous but ran small. Was very short and I am only 5'4. Could not wear.

links_reviews_title: This was fun to wear and a great easy upscale outfit
links_reviews_text: It was a little short but overall worked great for a day of travel while looking styled.

links_reviews_title: adorable- cute and sexy at the same time
links_reviews_text: a little short for tall girls- size up if you are tall, wont take away from the rest

links_reviews_title: Zipper was too tight and barely moved.
links_reviews_text: Legs were way too tight and too short in the torso for me.
neckline was low and romper was very short

links_reviews_title: N/A - I was unable to wear it as it didn't fit.
links_reviews_text: This outfit is "short" in regards to the torso. I have a bit longer of a torso and this doesn't have any give so it works for ladies with normal to short torsos. Absolutely adorable, but just didn't fit me. :)
Very cute and fit well.

links_reviews_title: I didn't get to wear it because it was WAY too short waisted.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect and so cute but I couldn't wear it because it was so short waisted. Such a bummer!
Loved this romper. It's a little on the short side but still very flattering.

This romper is really adorable. Lots of compliments. It was a bit tight though the rib cage, though. If I rent it again, I will size up. I'm usually a 6-8 , but the 8 was still snug. Also, I don't recommend this unless you have a BFF or SO to help you with the zipper.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering, loved the fabric, but a little too small in the waist.
links_reviews_text: It is a very flattering cut for curvy women....but the waist where the zipper meets was too small. Other than the waist the arms, chest, and thigh had plenty of room.

i thought this would be a good option for a hot day, but it's actually very thick! i have a large waist and even though rebecca taylor runs large, i'm glad i went with my usual size 4. the shorts are VERY short so warning to anyone that's tall. i also had to wear a cami under because i found the chest area to be a bit too open, it needs a button or something so one of my boobs isn't hanging out. fun pattern

This romper was very cute and easy to wear. It fit perfectly. I ended up safety pinning the front closed to keep it a little more modest for the daytime party I was at, but it didn't necessarily need to be pinned. I'd definitely rent this again.
This dress was a showstopper. It was a perfect fit for our date at the beach. I received so many compliments :)

This is such a fun dress that can easily be dressed up with a pair of heels or kept more casual with a pair of sandals. The material is very light and flowy and this was very comfortable to wear. The asymmetrical hem added some fun dimension to the dress as well!

links_reviews_title: perfect dress for my bridal shower
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my bridal shower at a winery. The dress was very comfortable but I would say it does run a tad small, so I would rent a size up as a backup. I took 1 star off just because of the dreaded side zipper, I felt like it was digging into my side throughout the day but it wasn't anything noticeable. The pattern is fun for any occasion and this can definitely be dressed up or down. I felt it was a tad see through so I'd also recommend nude undergarments to be safe. I would definitely rent this again!
I got so many folks saying how cute the dress was. I kind of want to buy it now. Comfortable and worked great with the theme.

links_reviews_title: This is a beautiful dress I rented for a garden themed bridal shower.
links_reviews_text: I received so many compliments on this dress. It does fit tight in the ribcage and waist so if you are larger in those areas I would size up. I loved the beautiful yet simple print on this dress and the way the fabric flowed. It was the perfect dress for the occasion!

links_reviews_title: Fun, Summery and a bit Snug.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for an outdoor party and it was a great hit. A lot of people complimented it and it was pretty comfortable. I normally wear a size 10 but I had to go for the 12 on this one because the 10 was a bit snug in the ribs. I tend to be "big boned" in the ribs so there wasn't much "squeezing" into the design of the dress . Besides the slight fit issue it was a fun and flirty dress and perfect for an outdoor party. Have fun with this one!
A little snug but true for a 4. Fun print. Mine was definitely well worn but that didn't really matter.
Love this dress and it fit perfectly to hug all the right curves. Received so many compliments I'm tempted to purchase.

The asymetrical cut is so flattering, it was my favorite part of the dress! The material is very comfortable -- light and flowy and good quality. I barely fit into the 0 from the waist up... a 2 would have been perfect but it wasn't in stock at the time. But because it was so tight up top I didn't have to wear a bra and you couldn't tell (the ruffles hide the nips). Loved it so much I wore it twice in one week :).

links_reviews_title: Love it. Very Light fabric. Great for summer days or nights.
links_reviews_text: Adjustable straps. Fits true to size. Unfortunately has the dreaded side zipper, but once it's zipped it's super comfortable.
This dress made for the perfect spring dress for the south Florida weather. Thanks RTR!
The PERFECT dress! Wore this for a radio brunch on Cinco De Mayo, and I felt so confident and got complements nonstop! It was flowy, get fitted, fun and I will DEF rent again!!
Rented for my trip to Portugal, cute print and easily paired With jacket!
Typically, I wear an 8 or med. in this dress the breast area was really small. I had to size up but all worked out. Loved it

Super easy and versatile. Loved the cut of the hem - made it look polished and stylish in flat sandals. I was worried about the neckline based on pictures as I have a small chest but it was fine as straps were adjustable. Definitely room for more busty ladies as well though!

Rented this for a Spring brunch and it was AMAZING. Ended up being a chilly and rainy day so I threw on a chambray shirt with it, but it was so cute and comfortable and flattering. Seriously considering purchasing. It is more of a sun dress and light weight. It does wrinkle easily, but it's the wrinkles from wearing that will easily come out with a steamer and not deep set. If you're considering this dress DO IT! I wore it a few month post partum and didn't quite feel like myself again, but I felt beautiful in this dress.

I wore this for a bachelorette brunch in Charleston. I got the size 6 and it was a perfect fit. The dress is just super cute and bright. The adjustable straps are also awesome - I was able to go without a bra, but did find myself adjusting the girls a bit. If you have a large bust I would probably recommend a strapless bra just for the added support. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Perfect summer dress for vacation for any party!
links_reviews_text: I like how this dress fits and flatters my body, love the flowy and asymmetrical design.
The material was perfect -it fit in all the right spots, especially in my stomach! I received so many compliments. Beautiful vacation dress!
The dress is stunning. In every video and Live Photo it flows beautifully. So many compliments.

I wore this to my bridal shower brunch, and it was the perfect dress! Got tons of compliments on it all day. I'm in between sizes 10-12, so I wore the 12, and it was slightly loose around the waist. But overall, I'd say this definitely runs true to size!
Wore this to a nice brunch, got lots of compliments on it! Good for hourglass body type.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress with a light jacket on a brisk day doing a Tuscany wine tour on our honeymoon!
links_reviews_text: The overall fit was small, but it worked! I loved wearing this on our Tuscany wine tour!
Loved this so much I kept it! Got tons of compliments wherever I went. The high/low hemline is great and I feel amazing in the dress.

This dress was a little too wrinkled to wear right out of the bag, but it has a fun cut with the asymmetrical hemline. I love that I can wear it with no bra. The material is nice and flows but the dress was a bit snug in the waist for me, as I have a large rib cage. Overall I'd recommend this dress for a fun summer occasion or vacation.

I wore this dress to brunch the morning after my wedding (: it was the perfect white dress for the occasion! It flattered my hourglass body and was not too long for my 5'4 frame. I love this dress and am seriously considering purchasing for an Amalfi Coast honeymoon !

links_reviews_title: Great light dress for summer event.
links_reviews_text: The 6 fit perfectly - it was form-fitting but still allowed for room to eat and dance. I ordered a size 4 and 6, luckily the size 6 fit because the 4 showed up completely stained and definitely not-wearable. I have a relatively big rib cage, but the 6 had no trouble zipping up and letting me move without issue. The bottom is so fun for dancing, and moves really well. I had to steam upon arrival, and you can see that it got wrinkly pretty quick (this picture was taken after a 20 min bus ride and ~40 min ceremony sitting).
I wore this for a party for my son. The lemon print was super cute and the fabric flow was sweet. Slit didn't run too high but the fabric wasn't to complimentary right below my bust.
Super cute dress for the summer! Felt so flirty in this dress perfect for a day time get together with friends! Super cute and lots of compliments!!!
Dress was so fun and gorgeous. I felt amazing. To me the dress fit was perfect. Right band in waist, but I sized up so it fit perfect. Compliments from everyone.

This dress rocked. I got it as a back-up to wear to a summer wedding, and ended up loving it so much that I wore it to the rehearsal dinner the night before. I'm usually a 6-8, but tugged the 8 on and got away without a bra. Citrus/lemons are obviously so in, and the asymmetry added a perfect flair. It would make a great dress for dancing. The material is cotton, so can be dressed down, but it's stylistic enough that it can also be dressed up a bit more.
Loved this dress so much!! It fit well and was a comfortable yet forgiving fabric! Lots of compliments on this one. I wore a size 8 and it was a little snug but I usually wear a 10!
Got so many compliments! This dress is so light and airy, which makes it so comfortable. Also the pattern is just perfect for summer. Definitely recommend!

This dress is basically a no brainer. Very easy, flattering fit. Fits very true to size. I love the asymmetrical him line. Gives a somewhat conservative dress a little sexy flare. The print is adorable and so on trend right now.

I got this just to wear on a vacation. SO super cute, if I could have gotten it zipped up all the way, but it wasn't even close. Women's sizing is so off that it's hard to know whether something is going to fit. I can wear a 12 in most things, a 10 in others, and I need a 14 in still other sizes... it's crazy! I would say that judging by how this was not even CLOSE to zipping all the way up.... that you might want to size up in this one. I could have worn a 14 in this.
Super cute dress but was a bit tight in the bust for me. I think a size up would have fit better. Looked great with a jean jacket for those cooler temperatures.
Beautiful and flows, does run slightly tight in the busy area, I am a 34C though. Otherwise simply adorable

links_reviews_title: Adorable, on the casual side, buy nude spanks
links_reviews_text: I got this for a wedding and ended up going with other options. The dress is ADORABLE... And flattering -- if I stand really still. I might have worn it if I had some appropriate shapewear to go underneath. It also seemed possible to wear without a bra, which is nice. Ultimately I wasn't super comfortable (I have kind of a short boxy torso) and was already having reservations about wearing something with so much white to a wedding. Also note that the fabric is a sort of woven feel, so it's on the casual side (also, lemons).

links_reviews_title: To right around ribs. I could barely get it zipped. Couldn't wear.
links_reviews_text: Too tight up top. I'm normally a comfortable 8 and this was too tight to wear.

This was my first rent the runway and I rented it for my bridal shower. It was perfect!! It was 100 degrees and it was flown and thin without being see through (although I would recommend nude colored under garments). I wore it without a bra and had the support I needed. I got both a 4 and a 2 and ended up wearing the 4.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress! It fits perfect in all the right places. I loved it so much I bought it. 🥰

I read reviews that it ran right and I'm SO glad I listened! I usually wear a size 2, but I ordered a 4 and it fit perfect! Snug for sure. It hugs your curves and is super flattering. I also saw that another girl on RTR crossed the back straps since a main complaint was the straps being too long. This worked like a charm! The straps have 3 different adjustable buttons and it easy to change and make the dress fit me well. I'm seriously considering buying it.

Rented this for work & was nervous it might be too long for my 5'2 self, but ended up working well. A bit tight around the hips, so would work for someone who is less curvey. Rouche-Ing is very flattering and hugs the right area.

I have wider hips and it fit perfectly from the bottom down but the top was a bit loose. I had to crisscross the straps to make it a bit tighter. Loved that I was able to wear it for work with a blazer but also out to brunch with the girls. Would definitely rent again and possibly purchase.
One of my favorite rentals EVER. The way the buttons were aligned was so unique and the fit was figure flattering, even on a small frame.
I cross-crossed the back straps so the straps wouldn't fall down. I typically wear a size 10, but have a large bust so sized up to 12
Unique fun maxi. Great length for petites!
Had to repin the straps and the waist was weird but got lots of compliments

I loved this dress the moment I put it on. I'm a slim hourglass shape, and it fit well in the chest but pulled the tiniest bit around the largest part of my hip. I think the dress would be 100% perfect if I were a couple inches shorter.
I rent this dress for my 15 year old daughter and she LOVE IT!!! it was very fresh and beautiful! Will rent it again. She is 5'6 and 115 pounds 34A bust

Wore this dress for an outdoor rehearsal dinner. It was fun and flattering. The straps were very long so I had to pin them so they did not fall off the shoulders. The fit runs a bit small so I sized up so I didn't have to squeeze into it.
Perfect for my friends birthday party. Light weight material. Thinking about buying!

This dress was a bit awkward of a fit...it was slightly tight across the chest and odd to get on, I think just due to the assymetrical fit, but once it was on it was really really cute. The buffalo plaid was almost more of a denim-grayish blue and white and the skirt was really pretty. I almost considered buying it but didn't because it gapped a bit across my chest. Overall I loved it and felt good wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Bodice hugs the curves and flowy skirt
links_reviews_text: Nice flowyness to the skirt part of the dress. The fabric gathers around the torso and softened the area around my belly I'm most self-conscious about. The top part is a little awkward as it’s bubbly in front but especially in the back, you can see it on the model and on my pic. The straps have 3 buttons to manage length, even on the shortest setting they were still long, I tried to manage by pulling the dress down but straps fell from time to time.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! Much better is person!
links_reviews_text: I wasn't sure about the cut of this dress when I saw it online, but I love the gingham trend and decided to go for it. I wore it on my birthday to a party and my besties graduation. It was perfect, the cut is different, but very flattering. I loved wearing this dress and would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect party dress! But runs small!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a roof top baby shower and received so many complements and it worked perfect with the "country chic" theme. I did have to return and size up though. I'm usually between a 0-2 and had to get a size 4, especially in the bust.

links_reviews_title: The gingham was perfect for my son's happy camper party!
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this! One of my favorite rentals yet. Flattering and unique.
It's a cute dress but it runs very small and the cut is a little strange

links_reviews_title: I'm usually a size 4 and this was too tight in the chest, stomach, and hips. Go up one size.
links_reviews_text: There's a lot going on with the front of this dress. The tie waist is not flattering.
Such a cute dress, but definitely need to size up 1-2 sizes if you have bigger hips. The buttons will gap and be unwearable otherwise. Such a cute dress, just size up!

links_reviews_title: Cute summer dress with unique details
links_reviews_text: Cute dress the luckily fit pretty well. Wish the straps were adjustable as they slipped throughout the evening.

I'm usually a standard size 4 and after reading reviews I rented the size 6. I couldn't even get it buttoned across my chest. The buttons at the chest area also go on a slant which I believe is part of the design, but I think it looks odd and cheap (almost like they messed it up)

links_reviews_title: A bit big in the top, but love this dress
links_reviews_text: The size 6 was a bit big in the top, but it's so cute I made it work. Love it.
This dress made me look like I was 5 months pregnant (I am, in fact, zero weeks pregnant), and wrapped tightly in a table cloth. Felt well made but just didn't offer the look I was hoping for.

links_reviews_title: Interesting shape but not for curvy builds
links_reviews_text: I really liked to look if this dress but didn't like how it fit my chest and hips so I didn't wear it.

Nice and fitted. The asymmetry of the dress is a little weird. The buttons twist and it doesn't look like it's supposed to do that but it is. Not a perfect look but the fabric is nice and the idea is cute.
Dress is not lined, and therefore see-through. It also took me ten minutes to unbutton and button dress because buttons barely fit through the holes.
It was true to size and hugged my curves well. I found it flattering but my husband said it looked like I wrapped a table cloth around myself so I didn't wear it.

I chose not to wear this dress as it was not as flattering as I hoped. I am typically a 4 but always a 6 in this brand and found the 6 to be the right fit. There is no zipper and no stretch whatsoever - I think the easiest way to get in and out of this dress is to unbutton all the front buttons. The straps were a little too long but if you're crafty enough you could adjust it with a safety pin to make it work! If I owned this dress I would get several alterations to make it perfect, but for a rental it just didn't quite work out for me. Even though I didn't wear it I think it's worth a try!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, elegant, perfect for the occasion
links_reviews_text: This was my first rental from Rent the Runway, and it was perfect. The reviews helped me choose my regular and backup size. My regular size fit perfectly. It's true that the bodice is tight enough not to need a bra. I did use stickers instead. This dress was beautiful and elegant. I wore it to a work party, and it was a hit.
Busty ladies, size up!! The 14 ended up being a little big around the waist since I had to size up. But I received many compliments and felt beautiful!
Not forgiving at all in the mid section. It was a little uncomfortable but doable. Would rent again but size up

Dress was easy in and out, flattering fit. It was lightweight and flowed well with movement. Worked perfectly for some engagement photos. Wish I could have kept the dress, but the price was a bit higher than I would have liked. None-the-less, I felt like the dress was fit for a princess and felt very cute in it. (photo credit: eGolden Moments Photography. Used with permission.)

This dress was super cute. It ran pretty much true to size (maybe a bit large) - I typically have to size up because I'm busty - I usually wear a size 8 and got a 10R and it fit well. It was a tad bit low cut but I ditched the bra and that helped to not make it look like my boobs were up to my neck! It did the trick for a pre-wedding party in late summer.
Very cute and sweet, wore to church. The sleeves fall down a little bit, but runs true to size.

links_reviews_title: A fun, frilly, girly dress that can be easily dressed up or down!
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful. The fabric was light and airy, which was perfect for being outside at a vineyard in the summer. I felt like the chest area of the dress was a little smaller than some of the others I have rented, so I was happy I had followed the reviews/recommendations and sized up. Also, you cant tell from the pictures but the slight embroidery on the overlay of this dress really makes it special. I wore this dress twice and found it easy to dress up or down.
Cute dress. The top was very blousy and too big even though the bottom fit perfectly.

Fit is tight around the bust if you are large chested. I could not wear a bra with it but it was so tight my breasts held up well. It fits perfectly everywhere else though. Not sure I would have sized up given the chance. Beautiful, flowy and feminine. The material feels so light. I wore it to work but it would be perfect for a summer wedding or other event.

Wore this to brunch and Kleinfeld's and got so many compliments. I had to pin the shoulders as it was pretty big up top and would have hung past my bra in the front and back. Loose flirty fit and good for a hot day!

links_reviews_title: 5.8 million dollar open house. The dress was stunning.
links_reviews_text: Fit was flattering, and classy.
Fabric and pattern are beautiful. Flattering silhouette and very comfy. Top is a little low cut but it was ok. Would absolutely rent again.
I ended up wearing this for July 4th fireworks. It was so hot outside but the dress was perfect for it and I felt pretty. I loved the fit and the length as well as the neckline.

links_reviews_title: Special dress for a special day!
links_reviews_text: After a disappointing start when I arrived for my 'try-on' at the RTR store, I ended up with this dress. My first choice ran quite small and the backup choice was not correct (they sent a short sun dress instead of the maxi I chose). At home, with the proper undergarments, I really liked this dress. It was a little lower in the bust area than is my normal, but it flowed beautifully and fit very well. Love it when there are attachments for the bra so the shoulders don't fall down. I would wear this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful midi dress! Light for summer!
links_reviews_text: This was a perfect summer day dress. No need for a bra. Falls mid calf (I'm 5'10"). The cut is great for hourglass or pear. Can wear with straps heels or regular flats for a more casual daytime look. Very comfortable for hot days. Love this one!
Beautiful dress for sure but ran way too small so couldn't even wear
Wore this to a winter classical music concert; paired it with a black leather jacket and black flats. It was stylish and sexy, and at the same time looked at home in a formal setting.

I really liked the style of the dress, super comfortable to wear too and good length for someone tall (I'm 5'10). My only complaint was the top and waist were a littleee big for me, I'm normally between an 8 or 6. I went with the 8 but the 6 definitely would have fit better.

links_reviews_title: I love the colors of the dress and the flowiness to the fabric.
links_reviews_text: A bit small around the chest.
Runs slightly small. Went size up for comfort. A flattering, feminine look. Prettiest dress I've ever worn!

links_reviews_title: This dress is beautiful, but I did not wear this dress size, and I am ordering the size down.
links_reviews_text: This dress was too large in the boobs and I am ordering a size down.

links_reviews_title: Comfort and style all in one!
links_reviews_text: It fit in all of the right places, was fancy enough, but also didn't make it seem like I should have been in the bridal party. A++ For my first time using RTR, it was a great experience!
Usually wear a size 14 and the 16 was way too small Beautiful fabric

links_reviews_title: High quality fabric and dress flowed nicely.
links_reviews_text: I ordered an 8 and wore the back-up size 10. The dress is low cut so a little more bare than I expected. The snap to hold the bra strap in place was missing on one shoulder so I had to use a safety pin. Not too much difference between the 8 and 10 but chose the 10 to have a little more space around the ribs.

Something about the cut off this dress just didn't fit me. The chest was too big (I'm a D cup) and the center ruffle just didn't work for me. I rented it in two sizes and neither fit well enough to be worn.

I think this dress is just gorgeous, but couldn't make it work. 18 wouldn't zip, so I ordered a 20 and still couldn't zip. Fabric is very nice but has no give or stretch. Sad I couldn't wear it and wasted time shipping back and forth.
The ruffles are in just the right places. Gorgeous dress with beautiful detail. This one is conservative, but will make you feel pretty.
Tight in rib cage. Size up!

The colors of this dress really pop in person. Flowers have a bit of a shimmer to them. Lots of cleavage with this one. I am a 36G so almost everything I wear has cleavage but this dress really puts them on display. The rest of the dress is pretty conservative. This dress is fancier in person than I gave it credit for online.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but runs small through hips and was less formal than expected
links_reviews_text: I thought this was beautiful in person, but I didn't end up wearing it because it was too small and fitted in the abdomen/hips. The ruffle around the stomach gave the distinct impression of a baby bump oof. Couldn't have worn it anyway because the material was too casual for a semi-formal wedding. This would work nicely for a shower, work, cocktail party, or casual wedding.

This fit true to size and was a great ladylike piece for summer in the office. It's a little lower cut, so I added a cami underneath, but without it, it'd be a great dress for a wedding or a party. So pretty and the ribbon at the waist was a perfect detail.
If you're busty forget it . Won't zip couldn't even wear it
Loved this dress, got tons of complements. Sleeves are there but very cool for hot summer events. There isn't much stretch in the bodice.

Lovely fabric and flattering shape with great attention to details like the ribbon at the waist and hidden bra-strap attachments. For me it was a little too low cut and maybe more girly than I wanted to be, but I think it would be a wonderfully romantic choice for the right occasion.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear to party - not fun enough-but wore to work with a blazer
links_reviews_text: The fit was great and fabric beautiful. Just a bit more conservative than my usual style. Gorgeous quality and felt amazing on.
The fabric on this dress is soft and it flows nicely. I wasn't thrilled with the ribbon. I didn't wear the dress because of it. Thought it looked a little too "girlish" for a 58 year old.

I love the details of this skirt. Its not too short and is perfect for a daytime event however, even after steaming it as soon as I rode in the car and got to my destination it was completely wrinkled again.

I would give this 5 stars but it came SUPER wrinkled...I don't think RTR even ironed it. And the zipper in the back was ripped from the lining. I definitely made it work and got a lot of compliments on it. I would rent again just know you have to spend time steaming the ruffles.
I like the full coverage of the skirt yet it is still super cute great for daytime! I like how it really accentuates the waist
The cute front just couldn't outweigh the fit for me...also, the wrinkles were pronounced and it wasn't the most flattering

links_reviews_title: Adorable skirt that is a great day look
links_reviews_text: Very cute, a bit too young for me but fun nonetheless and I wore it twice. You really need good knees to pull this off and they're not my strong suit. The tie belt looked a little fussy bowed in the front (with all the ruffles) so I wrapped it twice around and knotted it in the back, for a perfect look. It's such a cute skirt and for someone with good legs is a keeper. The skirt can be a little busy so a simple top is best imho.
Arrived wrinkled but I steamed it easily, cute if a tad on the fussy side for work- like it but not on my list to purchase

I loved this skirt I wore it to work and a charity brunch event. I received so many compliments on this skirt. I wore the skirt all day and it was very comfortable. I am a size 6 in almost everything and I found the skirt fit true to size. The length make it very work appropriate but still fun with all the ruffle. I did need to steam the ruffle out since they got a little crushed during shipping. I would rent this again.
Fit was true to size. Not a lot of stretch in the fabric. Super easy to dress up or down. I wore with rainboots and a cardigan. Compliments all day.

I love this skirt, super feminine, I ordered it one size more than the one I use because I know my body and my butt is bigger than the standards, so it was perfect. the only bad thing is that it wrinkles a lot and in fact I got very wrinkled, I had to iron it before using it.

links_reviews_title: Cute skirt but may come off a little juvenile
links_reviews_text: This girl is the light and perfect for a hot day. It was cute, but the ruffles and Bow may be a little young. It also wrinkles easily, but a steamer helped to fix that
Cute! The ruffles took some time to steam out before wearing but was worth the time. Paired with a white collared shirt. The 4 fit snug for my body type. Would recommend !
I loved this fun wrap skirt! Wore it twice, once with a light blue top (pictured) and another time with a white shirt and sneakers. Several people commented how cute it was.

I rented this for first week of school (teacher). I paired with black which I think tones down the ruffles a little. The 6 fit me perfectly in the waist but I'm usually more between and 4/6 so it runs a tad small in my opinion. I have decent hips and butt and there was plenty of space. Great rental.

links_reviews_title: Love the ruffles on the skirt!
links_reviews_text: The skirt fits true to size and is really cute! The ruffles are a little sad, as they are not as pronounced as in the picture. But I bet if you ironed the skirt you could get the same effect - I was just too lazy to do that. At first I thought the skirt would not look good on a curvy bottom half, but I felt like it was really flattering. I got a lot of compliments on the skirt. However, my boyfriend did say that it looks like an apron. Regardless, I would definitely rent it again.
Great fit and cut to this skirt!

This skirt is absolutely adorable and every person that you will walk by will tell you so. It was surprisingly comfortable and I couldn't stop looking at it because it was so cute! I would recommend pairing it with a white top and nude or white shoes. This skirt runs pretty true to size, but if anything a bit small. I'm typically a size 8 or 6 in pants, but the 10 was just a little loose.
Wore this to brunch with friends. Very comfortable and cute. :)

Love this skirt for the weekend or the office. Would suggest sizing down as the four was a bit loose on my at the waist - which has no elastic. Also a bit longer so great for a taller girl, but may be a lot of volume on someone with a smaller frame. Wore it this way on Sunday and switched to a white tank and sneakers for the office on Monday.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but snug in the butt
links_reviews_text: Super cute. Runs true to size. However, it isn't very forgiving.
I love the fit and the ruffles aren't too overwhelming. It came pretty wrinkly though so I'm going to have to majorly iron it.

links_reviews_title: It was hard to send this back!
links_reviews_text: I wore this skirt everywhere in NY. It was very chic, comfortable and the fit was perfect. Paired it with a white blouse. This can be dressed up or down and the ruffles are pretty! Will rent again

links_reviews_title: Love the details and the material. Easy Bree for spring/summer
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect, it gets wrinkle easily but that was. It an issue since the skirt it's full of details, ruffles etc. The fabric was breathable, perfect for everyday.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, a little feminine, a little preppy
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'11" and this skirt was appropriate for work (my environment is a bit casual) and it fit my hips pretty close. I've got a booty and child bearing hips so I was thrilled. Most straight skirts are too tight.
Fit nicely cute skirt
Just a tad too much fabric on the ruffles but besides that very flattering for curvy girls!
Cute for summer. Fit great. Did need extra ironing!

I steamed this before I wore it and immediately it went back to just being slightly disheveled. Still loved and it, and it was super cute, just be prepared. Also, I went the upper size of my two, and it was pretty tight. I fastened it and wore it all day but it wasn't a true fit for sure.
Wore this skirt with a white tank for a baptism party and it was the perfect skirt to be comfortable in the heat while still looking cute.
Too small
Super cute and unique skirt for work but runs super small! I would size up one, maybe two sizes. Material is kind of like an oxford shirt, so not stretch. I will rent this again in a size up.
This skirt fits true to size. I wore it with a white crop top that was slightly longer than where the skirt sat so I didn't have to deal with excess fabric. I would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: I couldn't wear this as it was too small.
links_reviews_text: I couldn't wear this as it was too small.

links_reviews_title: It was very pretty and great for the summer.
links_reviews_text: It was snug around the hips and stomach, but I managed. The ties around the waist came all folded up & wrinkled, so I had to try to flatten it while tying it. I don't have an iron, so the bow didn't look as nice as the photo. I also thought it was weird how one is longer than the other.

links_reviews_title: Very cute skirt - for work or play!
links_reviews_text: I wear a size 0 usually but I was unable to zip to top part - need a flat stomach
Super Cute! Too small for me and wasn't able to wear. I'd rent again when I'm a bit slimmer
This skirt is amazing but I need a larger size. Have returned and will get the next size up as I'm really looking forward to wearing it.
It was too long on my 5'2" frame and it was very wrinkled.
this skirt was so much fun to wear. great fit!

links_reviews_title: A little long for my frame
links_reviews_text: I ended up not wearing it as it hit me in an unflattering spot at the knee. I think it might be better on a taller frame, but it's a cute skirt!
This skirt is really cute. As others mentioned it is very fitted and runs on the small size but is still flattering. Lots of compliments
So the bottom fit perfectly around my waist. Comfortable fit. The top was a little small around my rib cage so I just didn't button the bottom buttons. It still looked super cute!
Absolutely loved this top - runs super small. Rented with the matching shorts (which run true to size or even a little big). Perfect for a sunrise dinner on vacation with my hubby in the Keys.

I rented the top and bottoms here...I got the large because I am busty and I saw it ran small, but this was perfect on me (full 36C). The bottoms I got in medium but could have gone for a small (I usually a 4-6 or size 27/28 on bottom). It was still adorable!
So flattering and adorable. True to size, fits great.
Wore this to gov ball this year. Fits true to size and such a comfy set!
It's cute but way too small so did not wear
Slightly tight in bust, not a lot of give. If my chest was even slightly bigger i would have had to size up.

links_reviews_title: Runs very small. Couldn't get it to button over my chest and I am only a 34C
links_reviews_text: Very cute top but runs small. If you are large chested size up for sure. For reference the size small matching shorts fit perfectly but I couldn't wear them because the top didn't fit.

Runs SO teeny tiny. I'm typically a size 2-4, and pretty small on top. I could barely button the XS, and even the S was almost pushing it, especially after eating dinner. I adore the top, though, and I will definitely rent it again sometime, just probably in a M!
Fit was great, the colors were amazing. So great for vacay
Loosens as you wear so don't be worried if it's a little tight at first. Adjustable straps are a must on jumpsuits.
I lounged in this jumpsuit for an entire Saturday. It's perfect for everything from an outdoor picnic to dinner. It's roomy, but still oddly flattering.

This was a lovely, fun jumpsuit. The colors popped and the cut was on point. I'm pretty tall (5'7") so I appreciated the little bit of extra length. The only downside is that the fabric is fairly thin and the jumpsuit itself runs small (low-rise spanx recommended). Keep in mind though that it loosens up considerably the longer you wear it.

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit made me feel fat.
