links_reviews_text: I love the idea of this jumpsuit - a thinner cut leg and bright summer pattern. Unfortunately it made me look huge in the thighs and belly. It was so unflattering I returned it without wearing it out. I would say it runs a little small but I think even the next size up would not be a good fit for me.

links_reviews_title: It was great, but not appropriate for a bridal shower
links_reviews_text: Rented for a bridal shower, ended up going with a different option as this was way too tight for the event/venue, wasn't the right vibe. Although I ended up not wearing it, it was still super cute. May rent again in the future for a more like party type of vibe

links_reviews_title: Liked how it looked but nowhere to wear.
links_reviews_text: Didn't end up wearing bc I didn't have the appropriate occasion. The wedding was outdoors and super casual, the pants were really loose. I really liked design and wanted to try a jumpsuit but they didn't have a medium available, people said to size up which wasn't entirely true for me-top was good bc could adjust, bottom not so much.
Loved this jumpsuit and the way to top was cut. Didn't wear a bra with it cause it wouldn't have fit but I felt it looked better that way. Super comfy and light. Great for the summer.
Was comfortable and got lots of compliments. Tie in the back can be a hinderance for the bathroom

links_reviews_title: So bright and colorful- it was perfect for a bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size

I felt sexy in this jumpsuit! It was brighter than what I normally wear so it took me out of my comfort zone. I am tall with a more full bottom/hips and smaller chest and this hugged my body perfectly. I do wish the material was more stretchy and forgiving. When I first put it on, it was tight/snug on my body but after sitting for several hours at dinner, stretched out. For that reason I'm giving this jumpsuit 4 stars.

links_reviews_title: Unflattering if you have thick thighs
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is adorable but sadly unwearable if you don't wanna emphasize your thighs or show off your saddlebags. I'm a size 4-6 and the MR fit well everywhere but there so I couldn't wear it even though I sized up like other helpful reviewers recommended. Please note that was my pink bra hanging out, not the jumper. Strapless bra would've totally worked too as it can be covered by the back tie knot.

links_reviews_title: I LOVE this jumpsuit! It’s such a standout piece.
links_reviews_text: I wore this jumpsuit to a welcome party for a wedding in Nashville. It is such a colorful standout piece - people stopped me on the street to compliment it. I see that other reviewers found the material thin- I didn’t notice that at all. I would say it’s best for small chested people, as the medium didn’t have much extra room in the top for me. I seriously considered buying this after I wore it- definitely worth ordering to see how it fits you because you won’t regret wearing it!

I will definitely rent this again. It was so comfortable and such an easy outfit. The legs were a little long and I'm 5'7" so the ankle straps on my shoes looked funny. The colors are so vibrant and the back is open and ties closed to fit better. Loved this!

links_reviews_title: Beware if you have a short torso
links_reviews_text: I loved this jumpsuit, but unfortunately it bunched up on the torso area. My torso is shorter than average, but I think it will work for most! I didnt end up wearing it. Bright colors and unique!
Loved this! Wore to a baby shower with a jean jacket. Flattering but not too tight. Fun to wear!
It fit over all very well although slightly tight at the waist. I think if I got the small though it would have been too loose.
This was perfect for vacation! Easy transition from day to night. I tied it around my waist then shimmied the back tie up so that it was tight around my chest because I went bra-less. Fun piece!
The fabric is pretty and the style is very cute. The proportions are a bit odd-- the crotch is kind of low. But it looked cute on and I liked it
Great jumpsuit. Easy to wear and bright blue color - received lots of compliments. The fabric does wrinkle really easily when you sit down.

This jumpsuit is UN-LINED with 0 bra support. The fabric is not forgiving, so i did wear spanx. My strapless bra was unfortunately visible from behind. Every time I sat down, this fabric would immediately wrinkle. It isn't overly noticeable, but it did make me self-conscious. I love the pattern of it and paired it with statement earrings and some cute 2 inch heels. Overall: would not re-rent. Really cannot stress enough how unfortunate it is that this jumpsuit isn't lined.

loved the colors but was otherwise underwhlemed by this one..maybe it was because it did not fit right? The XS was a tad too small for me but the straps kept falling off my shoulder. Material is kind of flimsy. BUT all that being said, the colors are beautiful, the cut has potential...I think I would be happier with the small.
The back can be a little hard to tie by yourself, but I found it to fit super well and just wish I had more places to wear it to.
I wore this jumpsuit on vacation and I absolutely loved it. It was my favorite outfit the whole trip. I considered buying but feel like I won't wear it enough to make it worth it.
This jumpsuit was wry comfortable and fit well. My one complaint it wrinkled almost immediately. I also wore a strapless bra which showed so I wore a sweater open over it.

links_reviews_title: Look like a flower-covered sausage casing!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit runs extremely small and skin tight. So tight in fact, I looked like a sausage in a casing. As you can imagine, not the look I had in mind to attend an engagement party. Size up, size up, size up.
Omg terrible . Cute pattern tho
Literally every single person I encountered told me the loved my jumpsuit. The tie back was my favorite part and cheers to adjustable straps! Such a fun print- Flynne Skye FTW

links_reviews_title: So thin it might as well be sheer
links_reviews_text: I love the patterns and look of this jumpsuit. Honestly, it would have been perfect if the material was any more forgiving. The material is so thin it might as well be sheer. I was wearing no see through underwear and you could see every line of my underwear all the way around, including in the front.
Tight around the hips
fit too snug for a jumper.

links_reviews_title: Happy to be an ambassador for this amazing brand!
links_reviews_text: Cute romper for a photo shoot! Great color.

Loose and big on top with slit back and tie front makes this romper a tangerine dream. It is so roomy and comfortable yet somehow hugs the curves keeping a beautiful shape. Lightweight and perfect for vacation or summer date night. #Playsuit #romper #vacation #summer
Effortless style! Loved throwing this on during my vacation and feeling like a star!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a Yacht Rock party and felt so festive and bright!
links_reviews_text: It a great jumper...easy to get on and off. You will need fashion tape and break lift tape as you can't wear a bra. Absolutely loved it!

Wore for a photoshoot. Everyone loved the color!!! I'm 5'9, 135 and wear a size 34B. The small fit well, but the top part ran a little large. This romper May be a better fit for the ladies who can fill out the bust area!

The color of this romper is so vibrant; I loved it! The open back gives it a sexy pop. The arms, space, and length make this perfect for the dance floor. I had no problems showing off my embarrassing moves. The one con is that the front is a little large and you can't tighten it, so I was constantly pulling the shoulders back to make it more fitted around the chest. I recommend sticky boobs or a clear bra because the back is open. Overall this was a great rental, just wish the chest fit better.
Perfect fit! So simple and easy. Exactly the pop of color you need in your summer wardrobe. The fabric is soft and light weight. Not too short. I highly recommend!!

LOVED the color of this and wish it fit better. I sized down to a small (usually a medium), and the legs/butt were good but no matter how tight I tied the top I felt like I was constantly checking to make sure I wasn't falling out (even with a backless bra on).
The fit was easy breezy. I probably could have used a large. the top especially was big.

Wore to an outdoor event on hot summer day. Comfortable and confident. Medium fit perfectly for 5'3", and down a size this summer to 140#, size 4/6. The small showed cheek and was short in the torso (and I'm short-waisted) so tall slim girls beware! Did wear with sticky backless bra. Husband thought I looked like a 60's pinup with my wedges :) That's a win! Wish I'd gotten a pic. Great color!

The lining of the shorts came out under the outfit and it wasn't cute at all...couldn't even wear it. I'm not sure if it was dryed but thats how it seemed when put on. I am 5'10 and it was extremely short up my crack short. I do not recommend this for tall people at all.

I'm always nervous about rompers because the bottom half tends to be too big for me, but it's like this romper was made for me. The bottom half was just about the perfect size, and the top had plenty of room for me in the bust area. Super flattering overall, and a gorgeous bright color.

Wore this for a poolside 70s theme photoshoot and loved the vibrant color. The front was a bit baggy and may have been better for someone with a larger chest. Really liked it overall though and wore it 2 more times.
The romper was super short. The lining fabric was also coming out. I didn't wear it shame because if it fit well and the fabric wasnt ruined it might have been cute
Fit was great, a bit short but I didn't mind. Color was beautiful-perfect for summer

links_reviews_title: Way to short!!! Did not even cover my back side!!
links_reviews_text: Too short!
Bold tangerine color love the color, but beware, very very short! Couldn't wear it for my event, too short.
Runs large and flowy. Color was amazing, really cute style. Will rent again!
Very short and the top is very loose. Odd fit
Can get wrinkly might need to iron
I really wanted to like this. The color and fabric were great but the top was just way too big, even with the adjustable tie in the front.

My favorite RTR dress EVER! I rented this for a special date night out with my husband. I've never felt sexier. I love the plunging neckline and short hem - it was out of my comfort zone, but I felt amazing ALL NIGHT LONG! I will DEFINITELY rent again. Beware...will turn heads and attract a lot of attention. ;)

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a burlesque show
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress that showed off all the curves and still let me move. My only issue was that I couldn't zip it up all the way without help. Also, beware, it's short. I'm 5'7" and on me it was short enough that made sitting down a little tricky. I didn't mind it but I can see how someone might.
Wore this to a semi-formal and had a blast! Lots of compliments but it did get hot quickly, keep in mind when renting.
Loved this dress! I have a larger chest so if your not comfortable showing them off I would not rent. But I absolutely loved this dress and for being sequin it was not itchy at all!
Sparkly, super sexy LBD. Very short and tight....too snug in the chest for me.

This dress is amazing! It does run small, so I'm happy I ordered a medium. It was tiny! I wore it with a deep plunge bra, and it still peeked through. It's really short too, and I'm only 5'. I debated wearing tights underneath, but opted for a more risqué look. I got tons of compliments! Loved it!

I wore this dress on NYE in Las Vegas, it was very beautiful, attractive, sparkly, and eye catching! However, I felt it ran a little small. It was very very short and tight at the chest but I think it's because I'm a double D cup size. Other than that it was a great NYE dress! I would wear it again but in a bigger size.
this is a very cute dress and looks great on, but beware it is very low cut and shows off your cleavage in a great way

links_reviews_title: I wore this as my birthday dress and the fit was amazing !!!
links_reviews_text: #birthday
Super sexy but very short. The deep v is hard to pair a bra with & I needed to periodically make sure everything was contained ha.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous sexy dress for a fun night out
links_reviews_text: This dress fits true to size and comfortable. The dress is on the shorter side, the neckline is very low. Many compliments.

Comfortable and flattering. I used KT tape near the front of my shoulders to help keep in place. I am between a 6 and 8 and the M was perfect. Hit at my upper thigh but not too short (I'm 5'6"). Looks great under lights on the dance floor. Sleeves felt a touch short but not a big deal. Not scratchy at all. I would rent again!

Loved this dress, perfect for a bachelorette party. It does run a bit small but I was able to make the size S work. Neck line is quite low as well but makes for a show stopper! I recommend for a fun night out, you'll get tons of compliments!!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a college formal in late November and loved it!! Got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a Medium in tight-fitting dresses because I have a bigger lower half, but the Small actually fit perfect. There was some extra fabric on the medium that made it look a little bulky but that's also because I have a much smaller top half & bust in comparison to my bottom half. The neckline is revealing but perfect for girls like me with a small chest. It was a good length on me but might be a tad short on taller girls. Overall great dress!!!!

Rented this for a bachelorette party in Vegas. Loved it! It's actually my second time renting this for a bach party because I felt so sexy in it the first time. Total show stopper. I received so many compliments on this dress. Perfect for that person who wants to strut their sexiness without it being too in your face!

Love the sequins. Very sparkly dress. The big problem is that the dress is super low-cut!!! And I'm not talking about lots of cleavage showing, I'm talking about full-on bra exposure. Kind of crazy And definitely not for the faint of heart. I don't know how the dress is meant to be worn but it felt like the fit was off. Because there is no way the dress would be that low cut. That's not how it is in the picture online. I had to wear a sexy black lace bra and pretend that that was my intended look when in reality I was very self conscious of it and kept pulling it up.
Great sexy dress. Easy to wear and catches a lot of attention

links_reviews_title: Super sexy dress, great for Vegas
links_reviews_text: It's a tighter fit if you're curvy, and definitely be comfortable showing some skin as it's short too. It was surprisingly comfortable and not scratchy and it had a tad bit of stretch in the fabric. If you're busty at all I would definitely get some gaffer tape and double stick tape.

Loved the sequin fabric, but it was a pretty uncomfortable dress. The xs was really snug and I couldn't raise my arms or dance. Expect a lot of cleavage and a short hem - perfect for a bachelorette party in Vegas or New Year's Eve.

I wore this for my 32 birthday party at The Greenbrier in WV. I rented a medium and large and went with the large. It was a little snug and I needed help to zip it. VERY short and shows a lot of cleavage! I did not wear a bra with it. At first I was a little self conscious in it but then decided I just needed to own that dress! It's definitely a head turner! ;)

links_reviews_title: Too short and low cut to wear :(
links_reviews_text: I am 5'4", 125 pounds, with a C cup and while I loved this dress I felt it was too low cut and too short to wear. I would have worn it if only of those were the case, but it felt too skimpy with the deep V and length combination. Definitely wouldn't recommend for anyone taller than 5'4". Fit was slightly snug. Probably wouldn't work for someone with thicker arms as the sleeves were tight. My friends told me it looked hot haha but if you are on the more modest side you might feel uncomfortable in it.
The dress is adorable. It's very short and fitted. The arms are snug but overall great!

I wore this dress for NYE in NYC. I don't have any good pictures because I was too busy having a great time. But the plunge on this dress is serious. I was, however, able to wear a bra and didn't need fashion tape. I am very tall, so this dress was short, but it looked great. Very classy!
Pretty dress. Runs small. Should of ordered a size up.

I wore this out to a show and club in Vegas and it was perfect! Dress fit really well and was super flattering. If you want to wear a bra, I recommend a racer back with front closure as anything else will show in the middle. I am 5'6 a size 4 or 6 and waist size 27 could have worn either the small or the medium but opted for the medium because it was a little more comfortable. The dress is extremely low cut so you have to be comfortable taking a risk to wear it, but totally worth it I got a ton of complements and truly felt like a rock star. I really wanted to keep this dress and will probably rent again.
Fits true to size! Very cute and blingy!

Rented for NYE 2019 and felt amazing in the dress all night! Lots of compliments. (I even made it on the local news! Lol.) Be forewarned, ladies - this dress requires a lot of flash tape. I taped the entire front v-neck of the dress, up to the top of my shoulders and it stayed perfectly in place all night. I also wore one of those stick-on bras with the drawstring in the middle. I'm not very big up top, so the lift the bra gave was helpful and flattering. Not sure how well this dress would work for well-endowed girls. Even though I'm fairly petite, my hips and thighs are bigger than average, but the size Small still fit and stretched far enough for me. I tried on the XS I received as a backup size, and that was definitely snugger across the hips, but the biggest issue with the XS was that it really pulled tight and gaped across the front. I don't think tape would have held it in place and it was uncomfortably tight across the upper arms and back. But the Small was perfect!

The v cut was obviously low. So much so that I chose the small over medium so it wasn't loose in the chest at all. Although I wore the smaller size, it was still a VERY comfortable dress, the inside lining was smooth and the length was perfect for me! Overall I do recommend it!

First of all. I did not end up wearing this dress. It was way too low cut and and wide open in the chest. It sat right on the edge of my nipples. I tried the boob tape but it still wasn't going to work. So if you don't want to go to your work party with you boobs hanging out dont rent this dress.

I originally ordered the size small (4) because that's usually what I wear in dresses due to my very small chested. Of course the site offered to send me a medium (6) free of charge and thank God they did. I tried the small on and I think it would have for better except I couldn't get the sleeves past my biceps. I don't think my biceps are abnormally large for my size but I do powerlift so they may be slightly bigger than average. This dress also doesn't have a lot of stretch to it and honestly the size medium was still relatively right around the arms to the point if I bent my elbows circulation was cut off to my forearms a d hands. This dress did great as far as staying in place though!!! I used bra tape on the inside to ensure there were no nip slips during the event and I didn't have one occurance!!! I would definitely rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Don't rent if you aren't okay with your chest out
links_reviews_text: I got the medium & the small but ended up wearing the small. My chest isn't that large & everything was out. My nipple pads definitely showed at times. However, I was in Vegas & received a wild amount of compliments about the dress. I wouldn't rent it for a work party but for a night out or a bachelorette 100%. The medium was a little loose. The small a smidge tight. I felt more comfortable in the small because it did hold my breasts in place. It sparkles like no other! We got free drinks & got to skip the line at several places & I definitely give the props to this dress.

I'm a true size 10 and it fit like a glove. It doesn't cling around the midsection so it's very forgiving. Cleavage is not for the faint of heart. I'm a D cup and I was careful about it all night. No bra needed--just pasties.
Very fun, sexy, knock out, what have you. The girls looked great, a little stretched out here & there as to be expected from something that's body con.
Sooo flattering and sparkled under the lights! Def short on bigger butts. But I just wore lower heels

Perfect for a Vegas Party! Or a Night out if you want to feel sexy, the dress is short and there's a lot of cleavage, Not the kind of dress you would wear to meet your boyfriends parents lol. Very flattering but uncomfortable I couldn't raise my arms high.
I usually wear I medium I had to get a large. It doesn't provide shape for curvy ppl. The breast is very very low soo be careful. It was sexy though and with some class!

links_reviews_title: I loved this glamorous dress by Saylor!
links_reviews_text: Running true to size with room for movement, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up a size for your back up. This style is stretchy throughout the midsection and at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this dress. At 5’4”, the length hit just mid-thigh on me. The pattern on the dress is dazzling in person and the stretchy fit makes it very comfortable to wear. Pair with black or metallic heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!

links_reviews_title: the perfect dress for a flamenco show
links_reviews_text: sexy but classy. definitely recommend this dress for a night out.
This was a last-minute substitution by RTR since my intended dress was not available to ship to me in time. I opted not to wear this because it was too low cut AND too short for the occasion.
Dress was a bit tighter in the hips than anticipated, but still looked great! Everyone said how sexy I looked in the dress

links_reviews_title: Not Right for My Body Type
links_reviews_text: I have a larger bust and waist and this dress was not flattering at all on my body type. I typically wear dresses that sit on my true waist, and this higher waist did just not work for me. It fit well in the bust, arms and length, but overall just doesn't look great in the tummy area. Great quality, though. The color is more orange than coral. If you have more of a flat tummy this would be beautiful! I wish I could have worn :(

Great dress true to size except the button sleeve part was TIGHT cut off your circulation tight I had to undo them and stick them in the sleeves for a quick fix. Other than that great dress so maybe size up if you have more muscular arms
This dress is gorgeous!! It's light weight for the summer and has a great fit.

I rented this dress for a summer wedding, and it was perfect. Light and airy and kept me cool in the outdoor ceremony. My only complaint was that the sleeves were a little tight on my upper arms, but they loosened up over the night. Also, I had to use dress tape to keep the chest area from poofing out so everyone wouldn't see my bra. Overall, I loved it and would recommend!
Wore this to work and received so many compliments. I love the color and defiantly a different dress! Sleeves weren't tight on me as everyone were saying.

This dress runs a little small if you've got thicker arms and a broader chest like I do. Sizing up definitely helped, as did leaving a button undone on the arms. I endured the minor discomfort for the major win in the shape department. This dress cinches in at the waist and gave me an hourglass shape where really I'm more of an upside down triangle. Wore it to my boyfriend's graduation and he loved it!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, hard to get out of!
links_reviews_text: It's cute, can definitely be dressed up or down. The bust area was a little saggy on me as I am flat chested. Also was very hard to get off, I had to have assistance pulling it up over my shoulders because the zipper is on the side, not up the back. Other than that I got a lot of compliments!
The chest area was a little weird but still a very cute dress for a baby shower.

This dress does run small but sizing up made all the difference. It is lower cut than I expected and the arms are a little tight but I think overall it was a great dress and slimmed me down a little even being as light as it is. I would maybe rent again.
This dress really made me fall in love- it is gorgeous. It was a little lower cut than what I am comfortable wearing to a wedding, so I opted for date night instead.
Too small
Read the other reviews as they were accurate. The arms are very small but the dress itself is beautiful. If you can get into it you'll look great
Was way too loose in the chest/fit awkwardly. The sleeves were also very tight. Very cute dress with a beautiful pattern/color, but unfortunately fit too awkwardly to wear.
The dress fit perfectly. It's simple, but flattering. Great for bridal shower/baby shower.

links_reviews_title: Truly a beautiful dress! Light and feminine. BUT arms too small ! I was not able to wear it.
links_reviews_text: True to size, however the arms are way too small. It's truly unfortunate because it is a stunning dress. Huge bummer that I could not wear it. Nice fir for a curvier petite figure in exception of the arms! Love the color too!

links_reviews_title: I couldn’t wear it! I was very disappointed
links_reviews_text: The fit is not an true size
Adorable dress and color sleeves are tight around the arm.

links_reviews_title: The dress is beautiful, but it runs very small!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this for a wedding and was very excited to receive the dress. For reference, I ordered both a 3x and 4x which is larger than anything I ever own and previously rented from RTR. I am a solid size 20 and the 4x didn't come close to fitting me. It's a great dress but you would need to size waaaay up. It appears that the 4x would fit someone who is a curvy size 16.

links_reviews_title: Renters beware: This dress runs SMALL.
links_reviews_text: I sized up in this dress because I saw other reviewers said it ran small, and even the next size up wouldn't make it over my body. I have fairly average proportions, so I'm pretty sure it's the dress and not me. The dress is lovely and seems to be good quality, so I'm bummed I can't wear it. If you're going to take the risk on this dress, go at least one size up (if not two).

links_reviews_title: Pretty but too small. Also it's orange.
links_reviews_text: The arm band was way too small though I managed to barely squeeze into it elsewhere. I'm 5'4" and the lining of the skirt below the sheer part hit only mid thigh. So it runs very small. Color is a pretty orange and it's very classic chic vintage.

links_reviews_title: Whoa Nelly, major plunging neckline made for more cleavage than appropriate for a church wedding.
links_reviews_text: Too much cleavage.

This dress is amazing. Fit really well (a little baggy in the best area because my boobs are small). Wore to work and then happy hour after, received so many compliments! The dress is a great color and flows well and is fun!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, did not fit correctly.
links_reviews_text: Was a very tight fighting waist and hip area that didn't work for me. Arms were snug but for okay. Beautiful color, design and I would have loved to wear it if it fit.
So disappointed. The sizing on this dress is completely off. Size up at least two sizes.
XL my rear end. I'm a size 14 and couldn't get my forearm through the sleeve.
I confidently know I can fit into larges but this one would not zip up on top. It runs small in the busy area

This dress was not made for apple shape girls!! It is gorgeous in real life but arms were tight (which lots of folks mentioned) but the dress had extra room in the hips but when I zipped up was too tight on my tummy / hips. Great idea for a dress but not my favorite.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for Easter and it was perfect. It fit great and was very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: It fit really well although it was a tad too big in the boob area for me.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear. Too tight around the bust area.
links_reviews_text: The dress is beautiful but unfortunately didn't wear due to fit areas in the bust.
The sleeves of the dress are very tight. I had to unbutton to wear.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress. Plunges a bit in the front if you are chesty (D) like me but otherwise very nice!
links_reviews_text: Cute dress, nice fit
The fabric, color and print are adorable and I wish I could have worn this dress. My arms were too chunky to wear and XL in this dress.
The arms of this dress run very small. Other than that it was gorgeous

links_reviews_title: A classy and stylish dress for a formal Mardi Gras ball!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size and like a glove. Was not overly tight on my butt or stomach. One issue I ran into was that on the side without the strap, I had to keep pulling it up to avoid being overly scandalous.

Nothing about this dress worked. I am D cup but it was down right baggy in the chest. I am apple shaped with slim legs and could barely get it over my hips. It slowly twisted around my body as the night wore on. The material was rough. It was my first RTR miss. I couldn't wait to take it off.

I'm 5'3" 125lbs and I wore the 6R to a black tie wedding. It was a little long paired with 2.5/3" heels but I made it work. It was super flattering and fit well throughout, slightly big in the chest area. It's a thick material so doesn't show any small body imperfections. I highly recommend this gown for a formal occasion.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for Fall/Winter Black Tie wedding
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a black tie wedding in November in Chicago. Material is quite heavy so it's great for chilly temps and also for disguising imperfections. There is no stretch in the material so it was a bit difficult to walk/dance in but overall great dress.

I had originally ordered the dress in size 2L but did not receive it on time and got a size 4L instead. The dress still fit perfectly and hugged every curve. The only disadvantage is that the bust area is quite loose so, unless you have a full bust that can fill the area up, you're better off adding some sort of elastic to the area or pining it in order to avoid any unwanted wardrobe malfunction.

This dress fit like a glove, there was some slight bunching of the outer layer around the midsection but unnoticeable. The only issue I had was that it did not stretch at all in the legs to allow for me to have a normal stride. If you don't need to cover ground quickly, or plan on being seated for the majority of the night, by all means get this dress. If you plan on busting a move on a dance floor in this, consider a more flowy skirt option! The material is thick so it hides bra and panty lines

links_reviews_title: Slimming fit that hugged every curve
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a Realtor Fundraiser. I like that it's formal enough for an event such as this, but can also be dressed down. My favorite part about the dress was the ruffled sleeve! It did fit well and hugged all of my curves but since the dress was a little heavier, it was also pretty hot. The top part kept slipping down a little too. Nothing that couldn't have been fixed with a little double sided tape!

links_reviews_title: I was required to wear a black floor-length dress as a bridesmaid in a wedding.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! I've recently gained some weight and was feeling self-conscious about finding a dress to wear as a bridesmaid in a wedding and this one didn't make me feel self-conscious at all. The material is super comfortable and I loved that the ruffles fell in the right places. It was comfortable, easy to move around and dance in, and made me feel really great! I also got a lot of compliments by others about the dress. Overall 5/5!! Would definitely rent again.
Great dress, perfect for a black tie wedding. Only negative was it was a bit hard to walk in but overall awesome dress!

links_reviews_title: Pretty but the ruffles cut off my waist
links_reviews_text: Cute dress but it made my petite frame look boxy

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to a formal event
links_reviews_text: I ordered both a 6R and 8R. Ended up wearing the 8 because the 6 was very tight across my hips. Both sizes were big in the chest, but was able to pad the top to look okay. Dress was not as long as I thought it would be so heels probably not needed! Overall the dress and experience was great! Would recommend again!

What a perfect dress! Felt very comfortable in it. The ruffles are the best part. I received a lot of compliments on this dress. I had to safety pin the bust a bit because it was too big and I didn't want a dress malfunction. Other than that the dress was a great choice for the ball I went to.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Perfect for black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: Amazing fit. Material is stretchy which is helpful for all sizes. Loved this dress and received many compliments.

Although a little large along the chest especially on the R side, it was an easy fix with a strapless bra or sticky bra. Great material that hangs well and is super comfy. I am 5'4 and wore about 3.5 inch wedges and it was the perfect length.

links_reviews_title: This dress was PERFECT! I wore it for a Mardi Gras ball and got many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit great and was true to size. The length was also perfect. I’m 5’3” and I wore a 3 inch heel and the dress brushed the floor. The only con I had was that the bust area without the strap was a bit loose, but garment tape worked great. This dress was super comfortable and I would definitely rent this one again!

I loved the dress but it was bigger in the mid section and the long fit was extremely long! However, it was a nice black dress that worked great for a last minute Mardi Gras ball! Will use RTR again soon!

links_reviews_title: I really loved this dress!! It was a little hard to walk in at times though.
links_reviews_text: Overall, I absolutely loved this dress and so did my date. The cut was flattering, and I had never worn a dress like it before. It hugged all my curves and made me feel really confident. My only real issue with it was that the chest part was too big on the side that didn't have the strap. I pinned it and it was just fine, but if I hadn't the whole world would've seen my bra/half my boob. Maybe the one I got was just a bit stretched out. I ordered the size 6, but then ordered the size 4 as my back-up size. Turns out, I only received the smaller size. It was very tight, but it fit just fine. It was the right length, but I had to wear slightly shorter heels (2.5-3 inch heels) than I may have otherwise. The cut of the skirt made it a little tricky to walk in, so I was grateful for the shorter heels actually. I did get used to walking in it throughout the night, but at first it was tough. Because it was tight, I found myself having to pull it down around my hips a bit as I switched between sitting and standing. Going to the bathroom was a real event because it was so tight. I also needed help getting out of it because it was so tight.
Fit was great.

links_reviews_title: I needed a dress for a photo shoot
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress after the one I originally ordered didn't fit me. I sized up to a 10. I'm usually a 6 or 8. I'm 5'4 145lb with athletic build. My waist is my problem area. The dress was pretty tight with no stretch through my butt & waist but it was enormous up top.
Loved it and fit ... snug with proper under garments was gorgeous.. left side was loose and bra would show o occasion but not enough to take away a star

Overall good fit. I am 5'8 and the regular was extremely short- recommend long version. I did not wear a bra, which is very rare for me. The strapped side was extremely comfortable, but my unstrapped side was pretty uncomfortable. The top line is was pretty low for my liking. But to not wear a bra and to still look normal is a pretty big deal for me. I would have bought this dress after wearing

I ended up wearing my back up size which was a little too big, but the 12R was a little tight in the bottom for me. The 14R was very large in the bust though- which I had read in other reviews also. Used double sided tape!
Make sure you have double sided tape though

links_reviews_title: Too big in the chest area
links_reviews_text: The fabric and fit from the bust down was great. Luxurious fabric, very comfortable. I ended up wearing with a Cape blazer.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, but runs big in the chest
links_reviews_text: Didn’t end up wearing this. It really is a beautiful dress and the material is think and very flattering. However, I’m only a 34 A and the chest was huge. No way I could wear it. Fit everywhere else was perfect. At 5’8 thrnlong length was perfect with 2-3” heel.

links_reviews_title: Basic black dress. Top gaps creating possible wardrobe malfunction.
links_reviews_text: RTR sent me this dress last minute when the size I ordered for another dress suddenly wasn't available. It's a pretty standard black dress, nothing really amazing. It was comfortable and the fit was good except the top is oddly large. And I don't normally have a problem filling things out. That, combined with the fact that the fabric is too heavy for fashion tape, meant I was constantly pulling it up to avoid falling out. Really annoying when dancing.
Beautiful and fit great. Only thing was I needed it looser around my feet so I could dance.

This dress didn't work for my pear shape. It was far too tight in the hips and thighs and a little big in the chest. I'm normally an 8-10 in shirts/dresses, but a 12 in pants and the 10 in this dress didn't work. Also, I ordered a 10L but received a 10R. I'm 5'8" and would definitely have needed the longer dress.

I had to send this one back, the chest by all accounts should have been fine. However, the zipper runs up and down the left side and there was excess fabric on the right side, but it wouldn't zip. If it had, it would have been tight on the left side and lots of fabric on the right which would have been just as bad. If the bust area of the dress would have worked, this would have been the perfect dress.

links_reviews_title: This gown was not worn. It was way too big.
links_reviews_text: The size 12R I requested wasn't available to ship after all. So I tried on the back up size 14R and was way too big. My educated guess would be that this dress runs a bit large for your usual gown size. I am pear-shaped.

I am 5'10" and 180 pounds. The 12L fit like a glove besides in the bust area. I had to pin the bust and use tape to keep it from falling down on the opposite side of the shoulder strap. Other than that the dress was perfect and I received many compliments on it!
The top was a bit big but i just wore a padded strapless bra and it worked.

The dress was very long even with heels. It was a bit tight on the hips but loose through the chest. I was worried I may be uncomfortable and adjusting myself all evening so I decided against wearing the dress.

Unfortunately, neither of the sizes ordered fit - they were 8L and 10, and they weren't long at all. I am 5'9, 155lbs, and I read very many reviews saying that those sizes would work for my body type. Unfortunately, wasn't the case. I had to scramble last minute to find a floor length dress for the event.
I didn't end up wearing this one, but tried it on and it ran pretty small. It was very fitted around the hips (and I'm not a very curvy person) and I couldn't zip it up. Plus it was too short.
Absolutely loved this dress! It does run a little short.
Top is very loose gaps under arm. The body is tight and hard to walk in. I'm 5'5 130 and the 6R was very tight I am usually a 4 or 6 in dresses. The dress is very elegant just not for me.

I am not adding a picture because we forgot to take one... at least one of the whole dress. I am 6+ months pregnant and I normally wear a size 6R. I ordered a size 10R and 12R not knowing which size would work the best. Right now I am 5'6", 168lbs. I really would have loved a size larger.... The 12 fit, but it wasn't very comfortable. The dress came up in the front making it shorter due to my large belly. If I had it to do over I would have ordered a 14 long.

Dress was gorgeous but didn't fit my curvy hips :( It was very large in the bust and super slim cut in the hips. I needed the opposite. Luckily it was one of two dresses I rented just incase one didn't fit. It was a beautiful dress and I wished it fit me!

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a Junior Auxiliary Gala...I ended up not wearing it.
links_reviews_text: Even with a long size, it was still very high-watered on me!
Just love this dress. The fit is very forgiving. It's a fun pattern which has been perfect for the holidays. The length is perfect and it's very light weight fabric is great for warmer weather

I wore this dress for an outdoor wedding and it was amazing! Fit just right and got a lot of compliments. Only con is that the zipper gets stuck on the thick seam halfway up the zip, and it's really hard to get it passed that seam getting it on. Make sure you've got someone to help you!
Beautiful color. Love the cut.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! I felt sexy.
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful for a Christmas wedding. It was a little tight on my tummy (although the event was right after the holidays and all the holidays cookies).
This dress is really sweet. The flutter sleeves make it very feminine. The fabric moves nicely, and it is super comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Voted best dressed in my living room on thanksgiving day! Lol
links_reviews_text: Love this dress! The zipper was a little tough to zip (it is used after all). The band around the rib cage got tighter after thanksgiving dinner but overall, I felt glamorous and chic in my living room with my family!

links_reviews_title: Loved the color--a bit tight fitting
links_reviews_text: Loved the color of this dress but I recommend sizing up a size. The 6 was a bit tight for my liking & Im normally a 6.
Super comfortable and flattering and a great color. Loved it.

I loved this dress! The 2 fit perfectly - true to size for almost all my dresses. The color is a beautiful green standout for a holiday party, and the fluttery sleeves and skirt just made me want to spin around! I'm 5'3", 115lbs, 32AA, and the 2 fit perfectly. There is not much give on the dress so it needs to be a perfect fit. Overall would recommend!

I didn't care for this dress. It's really an A-line dress, as the waist line of the dress is right under the breasts. It also runs small in the bust (though not elsewhere) making this a poor choice for the busty. It made my breasts sit like a shelf above my waist. Just not flattering so didn't wear it. The color, however, was very nice. And, I can see how it would be nice on someone with a more willowey frame.
Wore this to my son's First Communion. Felt very appropriate while being feminine. I am 5'2" but with about a 40" hip and it fit perfectly. Would definitely wear again.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering! Great sleeves, not too low cut.
links_reviews_text: I love how the bottom seam is asymmetrical. The flounce factor of the bottom ruffle hem is just right. The color is gorgeous. Definitely shows off flat abs. Back zipper can be a bit tough at the waist but definitely not a dealbreaker! Will for sure re-rent.

This dress was gorgeous! I got a ton of compliments. I'm on the curvier side (hourglass shape) and this fit like a glove, while accentuating in all the right places. The top was slightly revealing and tight (I'm a 38D), so if you're much bustier I might think otherwise. The color is also more green/teal in person. Was very comfortable for an outdoor wedding.

Rented this for my cousins confirmation and loved it! True to size. I'm tall and the height was perfect with a little extra length in the back. Fit Iike a glove and got so many compliments on the color!
Love this dress. Really didn't want to return it. Will definitely rent again. It's a tiny bit snug through the middle but fit was perfect everywhere else.
Great color on air, not too many ruffles, and fits perfectly
I ordered 10 and 12 and they both fit. Wore the larger one just because it was extra comfy! Very flattering. Received lots of compliments. Wore to afternoon bar mitzvah party.
Great dress, dressy without being too formal! Despite getting compliments I'm not sure if it was the most flattering dress for me personally. Still would highly recommend though!
The fit was perfect, felt like it was made for me. Nice quality fabric, didn't wrinkle too easy. Will definitely rent again. I wore this to church and didn't have an issue with length. I'm 5'10".

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my boyfriend's company holiday party.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly! I loved how it was classy, yet casual enough to wear to a cocktail event. Great material with a super rich color. The only issue with this dress is the sticky zipper. It is possible to pull up, but only with some help. I would recommend renting this dress, but only if you'll have someone to help you fight with the zipper nearby.
I typically wear a 00 or Petite XS. This 0 fit me super well. The dress is comfortable, super flattering, and fun. The skirt has a little twirl to it, and I didn't find it too low cut.
Formal but sexy. Perfect for dinner after work
Great dress with flattering cut. Fabric is thin but with some stretch. Very pretty color.

I loved this dress! I wore it to an evening wedding and it was perfect for the occasion! Pros: It was comfortable and flattering. Cons: The zipper was hard to zip up (which is why I didn't wear the size 2). The top of the dress was a bit loose.

This dress is AMAZING!! It's simple, sophisticated with a little bit of flirty!! I felt like a million bucks all day. Put me in a great mood at work. Nothing could bring me down while wearing this dress. Oh, and the COMPLIMENTS kept coming!! I even had one of my colleagues tell me she was obsessed with my dress, and asked me to let her check the tag in the back to find out who the designer is. Pictures do not do it justice. The color is fabulous too!!! (Teal green) Love it!! (May end up owning this beauty)!! I just can't imagine letting it go!!
The structure and material is nice. Enhanced my upper body. It was tight in waist and difficult to zip. I wish I could buy this one! Will rent again!
Love love love this dress! It was so flattering and a lovely color. I received so many compliments and felt comfortable all day. I'll definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Really pretty, unique color and flattering fit.
links_reviews_text: Pros: Shorter in front but longer in back. I was able to wear to work because it wasn't "too short." Great fabric. Cons: My pieces was brand new with tags, but there were some hanging threads around the hem and trim of bodice. Fit: it was snug through the chest (though I'm busty for my size) - fit comfortably through my waste, but had to wear an unlined bra to get my chest to fit. If you're bustier than me, I would size up.

This dress was great. I wore it to work and it was very comfortable and flattering. The material is light but does not stretch so I would not recommend getting a smaller size than you usually get. It hugs in the right places but it flows around the tummy which is nice. I loved this dress and will definitely rent again!

This dress was so much fun to wear and absolutely gorgeous! The color is rich and very appropriate for fall. I loved the fit and style. It's an absolute classic! I'm small chested, so this may be a bit low cut for those with a bigger chest. It's also very fitted in the waist. Lastly, the zipper does stick in some places, but I believe it will get a bit more loose and easy to pull in time.
Fits like a glove. Loved it for work!
A little tight around the waist but other than that I loved the dress! I received compliments all night and the emerald green was beautiful. Classy yet fun dress.
This dress for perfect! I received so many compliments on the dress. I loved the style and fit for my build.

This dress was perfect for a work holiday party. I'm so bummed I didn't take a pic in it but for reference I'm 5'7" 130 lbs and the 4 was perfect with enough room to be comfortable all night sitting and eating dinner. Highly recommend!
Very flattering shape, a great dress!

I rented this for work knowing it was a little on the more formal side. But, I dressed it down with a pair of cowgirl boots, and it worked fine. I liked the color of this dress, but the cut on me just wasn't the most flattering. I have a bit of a baby bump left over and the way the midsection is cut and detailed it accentuated that. I would have worn it more had it been cut just a little differently.

links_reviews_title: A classy choice for a rehearsal dinner- loved the deep green color, quality fabric, and detailing.
links_reviews_text: I had to size up from 0 to 2 because the waist has NO stretch. As a result the top was a bit loose on me and I had to check to be sure everything was contained throughout the night. The length was great on me and the asymmetrical hemline adds a fun touch.
Favorite dress from my order but it runs too small. Need to size up.
This dress is very pretty, comfortable and flattering! Could be work to the office, a wedding, lots of place. The detailed stitching is not as visible as I hope it was but still a gorgeous dress

links_reviews_title: Great dress, fit was spot on
links_reviews_text: No cons. Great for work and dinner

I found this so fun to wear that I wore it to drop the kids at school, walk the dog, grocery shop, and out on the town. When I worried out loud that it might be "a little extra for everyday," my kids responded that *I* was a little extra for everyday. 😂 Would totally rent again.

I rented this jacket for my vampire look for Halloween and it absolutely exceeded all of my expectations. So warm, so convenient with pockets and closures in the front. Endless compliments all night. Read the size chart, it's pretty true to size but a big and bulky look. Perfect for a winter night.

I love this sexy, faux fur coat by Sosken! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size, for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is comfortable throughout the midsection and, loose at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this dress. The burgundy color will compliment any skin tone. Perfect for date night or a girls night out.

I could not get enough of this fun and funky coat by Sosken. Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size as your primary size and going up for your backup. This style has comfortable room throughout the midsection. At 4’8”, this coat fit perfectly overall and did not overwhelm my petite frame. The hint of red add some edginess and the fact that no animals were harmed in the production of this jacket makes me love it even more. Pair with black boots to complete your look!

links_reviews_title: Warm and created a fun glam look
links_reviews_text: I am tall, 5'11" with long arms. I always worry about jacket sleeves covering my arms but this jacket easily went to my wrists. The elastic cuffs would make it work on someone with much shorter arms too, though. It was warm, the "fur" was really pretty with depth of coloration that is hard to see in photos, and it was absolutely the star of my outfit. I wore it to a gala auction fundraising event where some bar/social areas were outside (cold February in Northern California) and some rooms were not well heated. I was so glad I rented it! LOVE this piece! Tons of compliments on how glamorous I looked and I know it wasn't for my old plain polyester gown I wore underneath the jacket :) Would absolutely rent again.

links_reviews_title: This coat makes you feel like a rock star.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous color! So warm and lux! So many compliments! A man in a bookstore stopped me and said it was the best coat he's seen in his life. Not kidding!
Loved the fit. Loved the style. It was so comfy and I had compliments all night! Will rent again!

I love this. So much. It looks like a vest but it is a full (short) coat. My favorite thing is wearing this to just any old place (like Whole Foods) and getting compliments from other ladies. The only tough thing is the closures. It's impossibly difficult to close. But I dealt with it in the name of fashion. I even wore this for the Super Bowl!
Faux fur jacket has darker arms making a softer statement. Excellent hue of deep red. Versatel wear light enough for in the low 70s and warm enough for high 30s.

I wanted to like this one so badly, but it just wasn't working for me. I ordered a medium. I am usually a small or a medium, but I wanted room to layer. The medium was way too wide in the body and in the sleeves. I felt like it swallowed me whole and added 20 pounds. The "fur" on the middle part is soft and looks pricey. Near the collar though it looked more worn and the sleeve "fur" is a different texture that was shorter and looks less like fur. Also, it smelled very strongly of perfume/fragrance I guess from dry cleaning? I felt like a giant harry beast. Therefore, I didn't wear it, and it went straight back. It wasn't meant for me, but hopefully you'll have better luck. I might have been feeling more in a much smaller size. Be sure to size down!
This coat kept me warm and cozy on Christmas Eve! It also has pockets on it, which is a plus!

links_reviews_title: Show stopper! I got so many comments and compliments!
links_reviews_text: It is soft and warm. I wore it with a simple black top, black jeans and boots.
Wore this for my birthday outing and for several holiday events. So many compliments. Beautiful color. Originally had it in a M and loved it so much that I exchanged for a S. Runs a little large

links_reviews_title: Favorite rental yet - made unlimited even better!
links_reviews_text: Wore this jacket for a few weeks and loved it - wore it casual or dressy and it was so warm! Fit was perfect. A little oversized, but I think that's the cut. Highly recommend.
Wanted to buy this jacket i loved it so much!! Super soft and lush! The color was amazing :)
Fun to wear. Lots of compliments! This is not that warm of a coat so rent for fashion over function!

This maroon/ruby faux fur coat is so extra — extra warm, chic and stylish. Absolutely have loved wearing this coat, which hits right at the hip (I am 5'4), making it great to wear with jeans and dresses. The coat hooks are a bit annoying TBH (they're hidden in the faux fur) but doesn't matter because it's such a statement piece.
I'm petite and it fitted perfectly! It was great to wear on a girls night out. I got many compliments and it stood out in a great way. Very warm jacket as well! I'm seriously considering buying it:)

links_reviews_title: Love this jacket, two different faux furs!
links_reviews_text: This one is definitely a winner and is actually warm and practical not just chic and visually attractive! The fur on the arm is smooth and super soft while the fur on the body is a bit more wild. They work together great. The only negative have is that the closures are a little tricky. It's this new closure I'm seeing in a few jackets sort of like s hook and eye but different. Still haven't mastered it but luckily it's not freezing to the point I need it closed.
A little too bulky and not as stylish as I was hoping for - just didn't work for me. True to size
was hoping this was more fitted it's a little overpowering on a PETITE
Received lots of compliments. Keeps you very warm. Nice color. Boxy fit. A lot of people thought it was a vest.
The color and cut are cute, but the jacket is really heavy. I rented for a month with the intention to wear it looking at Christmas lights at some point but temps never dropped that low in Texas.
The best coat ever. All pros, no cons!

links_reviews_title: Extremely boxy and bulky, not for me.
links_reviews_text: Very warm and the color is vibrant, but the fit was not for me. It swallowed me whole!

links_reviews_title: My daughter said I looked like big foot
links_reviews_text: Short, heavy, not flattering
Oversized, faux-fur perfection. I wore it with all black for the holidays and did not stop hearing how amazing it was. Rent it for your holiday or winter getaway, you won't regret it.

links_reviews_title: Every lady at the event stopped to comment and touch the coat bc it was so cozy and fabulous/
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly with a tighter dress underneath.
Really nice, looks expensive.

links_reviews_title: Loves this and didn't want to give it back. Matches with so much, comfy and easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: Loves this. Fit well and went with everything.

links_reviews_title: This is a really great coat! warm, fun and cozy
links_reviews_text: I thought it ran a little bit small
clasps were impossible to close so I wore it open
I had a bit of trouble with the clasp, but overall this is a great jacket. Super warm. I got a ton of compliments.
I wanted to love this piece but my shoulders are a little on the broad side so it just didn't look amazing!
This jacket is so fun and funky. Colors are really vibrant. It feels very warm and nice. Can't wait to wear it out. Will prob become my coat for at least a few days.
Great super flattering fit. A bit oversized but very chic. Will absolutely rent again
Super fun, cozy jacket. Was loose which was nice as I got to wear layers under it. Will definitely rent again.
This jacket definitely makes an entrance but it is fabulous
Such a fun and fab coat, got a million compliments, and i felt so glam. Also super warm. It def made my outfit and I plan to purchase! Runs a little big.

links_reviews_title: I loved the color and overall statement that it made.
links_reviews_text: Fit was great and kept me warm. Will definitely rent again for another vacation up north. So many compliments.
the top was a bit big, I had to safety pin it to make sure it didn't fall of on stage. Sizing on top isn't usually the issue for me
Worn to my company holiday party. It was perfect for the 70s look I was going for and I got a ton of compliments. Super comfy as well!
Super fun, sassy outfit...loved the salsa flair! Fits well and a total show stopper!

Loved this piece! I wore it to chaperone our homecoming dance ("Blast from the Past"), and it was perfect. Fun, but still totally appropriate for school. I often have trouble in the hips with smalls, but the medium was a little big - it just looked like it didn't fit. And the elastic arms in the medium were SUPER stretched out. So thankfully, the small was great!
Fit well. I should've ordered a short but the regular worked well. The amount of compliments I got was insane. Loved it. I was even 2 months pregnant and it still worked well.
So this runs big for sure. I wore the Small petite but I wish I had the XSP. It was a tad big and long but it still looked awesome!!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color, striking and elegant but looked awkward on me
links_reviews_text: Great jumpsuit for women who have a larger bust. The top couldn't stay up properly for me, and the torso looked awkward on my body. But I think this would look great on a taller woman.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, a little too long for my torso
links_reviews_text: Heavy fabric, too long for my torso, but definitely a show stopping style
Loved the outfit just a tad too big kept falling down from the bust with too much crotch room, that being said it still looked amazing, it was figure flattering and comfortable overall

This jumpsuit was so easy to throw on and go. You automatically look out together without even trying. It is true to size. The legs are a little long but the perfect length with a heel or wedge. The red is very vibrant and fun. Can't wait to rent again!
Such a flattering fit. I would recommend spanx because it can show cellulite. I didn't wear a bra- 36DDD so I usually always have to wear a bra. Will rent again!

I wore this jumpsuit to a corporate party. I felt comfortable, yet sexy. It does fun small. Im usually a size 6 and a Medium and I ended up wearing a Small bc all reviews said to order down. I got the medium as a second option but it was way too baggy. Great jumpsuit, beautiful color - highly Recommend!
Received so many compliments and super comfy! Definitely size down- the material is very forgiving and has quite a bit of stretch
Absolutely loved this!! So many compliments!! Wore it to my brothers rehearsal dinner

links_reviews_title: Bold and Beautiful, but smaller chested beware!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'8 and 130lb and a 34B. The S definitely fit me better, but the top would slide right down. The XS was tighter but the top stayed up with no effort. So, XS and tucking in my belly all evening it was! Other than that, this piece is very comfy and definitely makes a bold statement. I felt like a celebrity. The quality is also wonderful; it's super soft! I would definitely recommend, but if you are smaller chested, be prepared to have some tape or something to help the chest stay up.
Lots of complements. Felt very glamorous and my husband loved it. Wore it with kitten heel black pumps.
I renting this lovely jumpsuit for a wedding. It was so comfortable! I'm 5'8" and 165 lbs thinking a medium would be too tight. Nope it fit perfectly! I would buy this in every color!! Loved it !

links_reviews_title: This was for a Havana Nights theme party. I got a ton of compliments.
links_reviews_text: It fit a little loose but was very comfortable the entire night with dancing.

links_reviews_title: Obsessed with this sexy one piece
links_reviews_text: Wore this on New Years and felt very sexy in it.

links_reviews_title: It was the perfect outfit for the occasion and fit like a glove
links_reviews_text: The jumpsuit length was great. I'm 5'10 and weigh 125lbs. I ordered xs regular. I wore very short heels with outfit. I would not have been able to have worn high heels in this jumpsuit due to the length. However, most woman aren't 5'10. Great experience with the outfit. Love RTR

I LOVED this jumpsuit and wish I could've bought it ! The color was amazing! The legs were a bit long and the shoulders dropped a bit on me (very small chested). You would need wear a high heel with this one!

This jumpsuit is so fun and comforts me ! My only complaint is how large it is, I'm pretty average height and it was way to long for my torso, and I had to wear large heels to keep it off the floor! That being said, it stayed up just fine and I received many compliments!
It runs a little large - normal is 4 or small - I'm 5'7" and 125. It could work for a normal event or a 70s costume event. Top is heavy but I'm glad to report it never fell all the way down.

links_reviews_title: Super cute but way too big!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this for a beach-side rehearsal dinner but it was far too large so I was not able to wear it. I am usually a solid medium but the top part sagged down my chest and the crotch hung a little low. I would recommend sizing down at least 1-2 sizes.

links_reviews_title: Comfort and Color were spot on!
links_reviews_text: Numerous compliments that night and on social media. I love Amanda Uprichard and own many pieces. Highly suggest! Many times I am too long for jumpsuits and this one was perfect.

I got so many compliments on this. It was also super comfortable! But definitely runs big. It's also very long. I'm 5'7" and also wore 4" heels and it was still near the ground. Overall amazing though!

links_reviews_title: Too young for me but definitely a showstopper
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is a showstopper. I thought I could handle it but I couldn't. If I was younger, I'd rock it which is why I gave it a good rating.

If you're looking to make a statement, look no further. I am a 4-6 and the small was plenty big. The "sleeves" just hang off your shoulders so can be a bit low cut / not much support. I'm 5'4'' - 5'5'' and length was perfect with heels.

I'm only giving this four stars because it was very slightly big on me. I should've sized down but smalls usually fit perfectly. I wore a thin belt which helped a little bit, but I was still pulling it up all night. It felt like the elastic was giving way somewhat around the bust. The pant length was fine with heels and it was pretty comfortable in general. I was getting compliments on it all night at a cocktail party where everyone wore black!
Runs large, but i have a small chest. Fit great. I am 5'8 and wore heels!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! Definitely an attention getter.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my husband's surprise 40th birthday. It's a stand out! Everyone commented on it and I felt great. I am curvy so I was worried it wouldn't fit right but it fit like a glove. I did wear spanx underneath to smooth out the bumps. Loved this look!

I LOVED this jumpsuit! I wore to my birthday party and out dancing. It was super comfortable and looked so good. It definitely runs large - the small basically fell off of me and the XS still needed some fashion tape on top. It's also very long so you'll need heels! Super fun outfit and perfect for a night out.

links_reviews_title: Rented for an October rehearsal dinner at the beach - so many compliments on the style and fit!
links_reviews_text: Runs large, I’m busty so usually have to wear a medium or large but I sized down to the small and it was perfect. Only issue was the off the shoulder elastic - it began rubbing on my arms where I’d gotten a spray tan so I ended up wearing it strapless without any issues. Loved the length and the waist, the color was perfect!
Legit, LOVED this jumpsuit! I felt amazing in it and got SOOOO many compliments. Wore it to an Annual Fashion Show for a non profit! Highly recommend!

I received so many compliments on this jumpsuit! The only negative thing I have to say is it wasn't giving in the stomach area. I wore spanx and made sure to keep my shoulders up and back so my stomach wouldn't pop out. I'm 5,4 and 165 pounds. I wore a smaller cheetah print heel because a taller one made the pants too short. Overall I was very pleased with the outfit!
I am a 36DD and with a strapless bra this fit perfect. At 5'3 and some heels the length was just right. Loved wearing this and received compliments all day.

Gorgeous outfit. But it is definitely a head turner- everyone I passed looked my way and I could feel people staring at the outfit bc it is just so different. That took some getting used to but if you are cool with that then go for it. Crotch is a little awkward bc it hangs kind of low like it's made for a really long torso. I have long legs so it was a little short but still looked great with pumps. Absolutely fabulous outfit.

This jumpsuit is adorable and so flattering -- I was truly sad to return it! After reading the reviews, I honestly thought I was going to be an XS but it looked a little too tight for the wedding I was attending so I ended up wearing the small. The color is absolutely gorgeous! It really pops and I received so many compliments throughout the night! I barely tugged at the top of the jumpsuit, and I ended up wearing it with a strapless bra, but if you're comfortable with your boobs I suggest you go without one. I noticed when I sat down or moved in certain positions, my bra became exposed. Overall, I was totally comfortable in this jumpsuit and would definitely recommend it!

This fit like a glove and made me feel so fabulous! Im usually a large, which fit comfortably, but the medium gave an extra yaaaas factor hugging in all the right spots. Highly recommend especially for my curvy sisters out there! You'll be shimmying all day and night!

links_reviews_title: Felt great in this bold jumpsuit for dear friend's wedding!
links_reviews_text: I had to wear spanx to smooth everything out, as It did hug my tummy a little. Didn't wear a bra (always a plus to me). I went with this jumpsuit (my backup) instead of a similar strapless one, as this covered my arms. Was extremely comfortable and easy to put on. Felt awesome in a bold jumpsuit. Return was simple and easy!
It was a little longer than I thought it would be (I.e. it went past my hips), but I thought the look was really cute. I wore it on Valentine's Day and my friends could not stop complimenting me.

I love this shirt. It's perfect for spring. The fabric is slightly heavy for warm weather unless you're going to be in A/C all day. It hugs my curves but not too tightly. It was longer in me than i expected but i wore it with fitted pants. My only complaint was that the front hem kept falling out.

Great fit. Comfortable. Thick material- could be dressed up or down which I loved. The ribbons can get caught up in things and can get s little annoying when using a public restroom! But otherwise, really fun!

The fit of this shirt is snug, I would have sized up to a medium to give more room in the bust area. The sleeves were the best feature! Loved the fun cold shoulder with ribbon ties. The length of the shirt is also longer than expected, so you have to pull it down after sitting to make it look its best.

links_reviews_title: Would be five stars if not for the bows
links_reviews_text: I loved just about everything with this shirt. The color, the length, the detail, the fit - it should be a strong five stars. However, the sleeves would come untied no matter how I tied them which was frustrating. I received a lot of compliments on this top from strangers which was flattering. I wore this once with jeans for a casual look and once with black skinny dress pants and found that I liked the look better with the black pants. All in all worth the rent if you pin the sleeves.
This is cute. Got several compliments.
There was a lot going on with this top but it wasn't too much.

Love the material and color. Looks and feels expensive. Cold shoulder bows are a cute touch and make the shirt more polished and office appropriate. I have a long torso so the portions worked for me. However, the shirt may look a little too long if you are on the petite side.
Wouldn't own this, but that is why I do RTR! It was a hard shirt to wear (or rather does it wear you!?) Either way, loved wearing it for a single day, certainly a statement top!

links_reviews_title: Lots of shoulder detail and delicate color
links_reviews_text: The level of shoulder detail is not for the feint of heart. It makes a bold statement! The bodice is pretty fitted, with a zipper down the back and non-stretch material, so be sure to order your true size or a size up.
This top fits like a glove specially if you have a long torso

I def could have gone a size or 2 smaller, I rented the 10 bc that is what was available. My regular top is 6/8. The COMPLIMENTS!! In fact, a friend signed up for RTR on the spot bc she loved this so much. Will rent again in my size.

I love the detailing on this shirt, however, it ran too long and triangular for me. I'm only 5'2" and it wasn't very flattering. It was just too long and flared out too much. I would not rent again (but if I were taller I would).
So many compliments! A waitress even came over to ask the designer.
Such a sweet top! The color is beautiful IRL. High quality fabric and excellent fit. Very flattering on my long torso.
Cute shirt and good for a lot of occasions. I wore it on date night with a black skirt, and for work with jeans.

links_reviews_title: Great top to wear to work that's unique
links_reviews_text: LOVED this for work a work look that could transition to night. Would purchase if we're not so expensive.

I wore this top for the first day of school for our son and a breakfast date. Wore with high waisted white jeans and nude slides and it was so cute! I got at least 3 compliments on it. The sleeves are so fun and require very little of any jewelry, because they are the jewelry!
It gets challenging to find office appropriate and ride NYC subways. This one was commuter & office friendly for Summer. Paired with Vince navy chinos.
Runs large and is unflattering if you have a busy top and slimmer waist.
This top is so cute and perfect for work. you can tie the strings at the shoulder so it is more work appropriate. I got a ton of compliments on this top.
I felt like I should be Sailor Moon from the anime cartoons. Also, I would say this shirt is WAY to Engineered. Double layers, zippers, the ribbons... etc, etc..... too much
I'm busty (a DD/DDD) and this top fit without being uncomfortable. The shade of pink is beautiful too. I received many compliments. I dressed it down with distressed jeans and flats - it was a hit!
Not a flattering fit.
Bc you have to wear a strapless bra with this shirt, I'd size up. Size 2 was a good fit but you could see the indentations of my strapless bra on the chest. Should have gotten a 4.

The top fits very nicely and the fabric is very high quality. Nice and thick which allows it to keep its form well. I wish it didn't have the bows (they are a bit too much) , but it's still cute. Will be cute with jeans or dressy pants for a more formal occasion. I will rent again!
Loved this top. Very pretty!

I loves the detail on this shirt. I received a lot of compliments. It was kind of hard to wear since the back needs to be zipped up. it is somewhat forgiving in the tummy area. The material is nice but the shirt i received had snags. Overall this was a good piece.
I loved this tops details but it is much more form fitting than expected. There is a zip and fabric that doesn't allow for much leeway

This top is really cute. It's much longer than anticipated and is more fitted than the picture, which I prefer. It is really cute on but the ties, OMG. They are so annoying. They keep coming untied and the strings are SO long. While it is cute and different I would never want to wear it again!
Love the fabric and fit
Fit great and was very cute! Don't want to return!
I got tons of compliments. This was great for brunch, church and a family party.
Gorgeous color but it wasn't a great fit for me. It's also quite heavy. I'd suggest this for anytime but summer

This shirt is beautifully tailored with a nice high-quality fabric. It runs long - which works for me as I have a very long torso. The detailing on the shoulders is not something I would normally pick but I received tons of compliments and really enjoyed wearing this top. The color is a beautiful pale pink and works well with most skin tones.
I would rent it again!
Beautiful piece many compliments

This top fit perfectly. The straps on the shoulders are easy to tie and the fabric is a little heavy which makes it look amazing. I received several compliments when wearing this top even when I had a blazer over it. Rent it ladies!
Very cute and feminine but definitely someone to help zip up and tie the bows on the sleeves. In good condition and a very pretty color.
I loved this top but didn't get to wear it bc it fits waaay too long! But with a nice pair of white pants or blue jeans will go perfect!

links_reviews_title: Haven't worn this but love it
links_reviews_text: Tight around hips!!! I am hourglass with small waist and bust 34B S-M top and bigger hips (size 10-12) and it is super super flattering with rouching around hips so u can't tell that it pulls around hips but it does. Id do a 10 if I had to order again and if it was big around top I'd wear belt. Also on shorter side. Straps don't fall down and super fun cute, flattering dress!! Love it for date night
I think I could have done a 6 but they didn't have it in stock for rental. So did the 8 and it was fine. But I would've liked More form fitting around waist. 5'3 140lbs. 34C-D
I sized up for length. This made it very loose in the ruched area of the dress. It was fine though. I like my clothes a little loose fitting. This dress was perfect for vacation.
Super cute to dress up or down. The color and pattern are great. The ruching made it really flattering.

links_reviews_title: Too Tight in hips. Gorgeous Dress. Get a size up if you have hips and butt.

links_reviews_text: Tight fit but forgiving. I felt like it was abit busty and young for me. But flattering.
I loved how this dress looked and accentuates my body. However, it ran big in the chest so I did clip it in the back for photos. I could size down though or it'd be too tight in the hips.
This dress grew on me. A little wrinkly but the blue really pops.

links_reviews_title: The color and the fabric and the print. So summery! And fit to perfection.
links_reviews_text: If you are a size 6 without a fabric that has give, you will be a size 6 in this dress. Beware there is zero stretch so be true to your real size. Not your stretchy dress size or your aline dress size. I LOVE the color of this dress. And the print. Everyone commented on how cute it was. Sadly the red shoes that I was wearing with it completely broke the night I wore this, and I needed to toss them in the trash. So now I don't have cute matching shoes so I am probably just getting one wear out of this dress and sending it back. Or maybe I'll buy new red shoes. I think the dress deserves new shoes. Don't you?
The material doesn't have much give but the 4 fit perfectly. The straps were a bit long and didn't allow for adjustment but still cute.

The thick straps were perfect because I did not even come close to filling out the top so I was able to wear a push-up bra. Sucha fun southern summer dress. Very short on me but the ruffles gave the length some volume so it didn't look as short as it felt.

Dress hides a multitude of sins OR shows off your hard work at the gym. My bra peeked out a little on the sides. A bit shorter than I normally wear, but didn't ride up when I sat down, like some dresses.

I sized up to an 8 although it was a little loose in the waist, I wouldn't have wanted a smaller size for the hips. If you're boyish shaped then I would order your normal size, but ladies with curves size up! Vibrant blue dress and the ruffle adds a touch of femininity!

Absolutely love this dress! Runs a little small- I'm usually a 6, sized up to an 8 and it fit perfectly. It's tight fitted though, I think it would have fit too tight if I were any bigger in the hips/bottom, I would suggest especially curvy ladies to size up 2 sizes from usual. Very curve hugging/figure flattering and the ruching in the front makes it more forgiving. Colors are beautiful, fun floral for spring/summer. And you can wear a regular bra with it. I don't want to send it back! Will definitely rent again.
Very tight/formfitting on me, but it’s well made so it looks good. I wore this to a bbq and then a birthday party and got lots of compliments!
Too small
So fun I rented this twice! Material has no stretch. It's a little snug around the booty which makes it more sexy, flirty. Slightly short but not obscene. It's even cute with sneakers.

links_reviews_title: Odd fit, but pretty print and vibrant color!
