links_reviews_text: This dress would have been perfect if the straps were shorter (or could be adjusted somehow). The fit below the bust was fine, but the straps kept sliding off. I think someone more top heavy would love it, though!

links_reviews_title: Great print and design, but the fit was off.
links_reviews_text: I read several of the reviews and went with the size 6. I'm usually between sizes, and for this particular dress the 6 was a little larger in the bust and waist, but fit around the hips. I think this dress would suit a straight figure better than my athletic one.

links_reviews_title: Love it, so flattering in the chest area especially. Not too revealing.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly with my body, true to size
Fit well, ruching on the front helped with any belly issues. Didn't wear a bra, but that worked out just fine!

Fit was good - I'm between a 4 and 6 so the straps were a little loose on the 6. I found it very flattering. The fabric is a simple cotton so great for daytime events. You could easily dress this up or down. I wore it to a patio champagne tasting event and it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfortable. Received a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Went with the larger size. Wrinkles easy. But cute!
Love the blue floral colors in this dress. Its well fitting and a tad sexy. It was easy to transitio from day to night. Would rent again!
Cute, but didn't actually wear it.

links_reviews_title: Great for just about any event in the summer.
links_reviews_text: I love this dress. It was very flattering and fit just right. It wasn't too loose or tight. Perfect for a summer concert or bbq.
Fit true to size. The top was a little large for me/ straps slid down often, but I have a relatively small chest (34c). Fun, bright color and pattern. Appropriate length, not too short (I'm 5'7")

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a Birthday brunch. Perfect for the occasion.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. Love the color against my skin tone, wore it with strappy wedge black heels.
Great blue color. Love the length and ruffle detail. Can wear a regular bra. Easy dress to wear. I ordered one size up due to availability and I'm glad I did, it fit great.

links_reviews_title: Too loose and not great material
links_reviews_text: Runs large, wrinkly, just not flattering
So cute but runs small
I don't wear a 16 but had a hunch to size up and it was still too tight.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear, was much too small.
links_reviews_text: The ruffles are much more "mermaid" than lay flat. This dress was much too small, I was not able to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Loved the bright color and hemline
links_reviews_text: Fit was TTS - rode up a tiny bit due to ruching but was very comfy otherwise
Lightweight, feminine shorts, perfect for a summer day. The top is a little large, but looks great with a tight shirt. Comfortable, easy pockets and great length.
Cute and comfortable. Rented for vacation in Mexico. Would rent again.
Absolutely loved these shorts. Rented with the matching top (which runs super small). Perfect for a sunset dinner on vacation.
Cute looks for vacation!

I reviewed this for the top as well but this picture shows how the bottoms fit better. I wish I would have gotten the small. I usually wear a 4 to 6 on the bottom and an eight on top with a full bust, so I definitely could've gone for the small shorts rather than medium. However, it ended up fitting like a really cute jumper and I was obsessed with it!! Also if you have a bigger bootie, you won't hang out the bottom in this one ;)
This was a perfect rental bc it's something I would never buy for the price. Great for hourglass shape and hot weather. Just make sure to wear nude color underwear.
Wore on a hot day to Central Park Zoo. The. Back to lunch at the Plaza. Love
There's are so cute lots of compliments!
Really disappointed in the quality of these shorts. I couldn't wear them because of the lack of lining in the back!! It was totally see through
Shorts fit amazing. Warning, they are pretty see-through. Just have to wear nude underwear.
Very thin

links_reviews_title: Really cute shorts with an easy fit due to the elastic waist band
links_reviews_text: Shorts are as sheer as other reviewers have said, but are fine if you wear a nude boyshort underwear.

links_reviews_title: Very very small in the waist! Thin see-through material
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear this since even a size bigger couldn't be zipped up! Very narrow in the waist, loose in the legs, flowing thin material.

See through! Beware, these are totally see through! And the pockets hang too low - you can see them through the embroidery. Only get these if you've got some kind of white or nude boy shorts for underneath.
Sleeves are right as others have mentioned. So note that and plan your activities/size accordingly
Clothes can empower and that's what this dress did when I had to present for work. It was comfortable, moveable, and powerful. I received a lot of compliments and would recommend 100%.

This dress was a success! Perfect for a black tie spring wedding when the weather was still a little chilly. There is NO stretch to this dress so it was a tad tight around the shoulders for me so if you want it to be a little more roomy size up.
This dress is everything. Great color, fabulous movement. I got so many compliments it almost was too much! Love this designer!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, very thick and high end material and fun sleeves!
links_reviews_text: Enjoyed this dress, took to Paris for a work event and received tons of compliments. Especially on the color. Felt expensive, as it should, since it is!!
A little but loose but beautiful and flowed really well. Lots of compliments

Absolutely beautiful dress. Does run small as I ordinarily wear an eight and wore a 12 in this. The sleeves are extremely unique and remarkable. Received many compliments wearing this dress. It would be fantastic for a formal day event. Looks great paired with cream colored shoes.

Loved the bright color and sleeves! Easy to wear. Wore it solo for work with heels and dressed it down with leopard booties and a jean jacket for weekend. Got a ton of compliments from strangers. Felt happy and free in it.

I really loved this dress! It was however a bit tight in the bodice and upper arm. I would get a size bigger in this designer next time. The fabric is good quality, a good weight for cooler weather, and the color is beautiful! The sleeves weren't too overwhelming and they did not bother me or get in the way at all, I wore it all day for work.

I am a medium up top (8-10) and more like a 14 on bottom. The flair skirt was fine, sat nicely. The arms were the right part (which is never my problem). I was able to wear it but it was restrictive. The bias cut lends it nice movement and the silk lining makes it comfy. Easy to accessorize. Go up one or more sizes.

links_reviews_title: Nice color but you have to not need to use your arms.
links_reviews_text: Pretty dress and a flattering cut but you can't raise your arms past your waist so forget about dancing or reaching for anything off a shelf (and also those sleeves look good, but if you pass anything across a table you're sure to knock over something or end up with a sleeve in someone else's soup, or on fire!)

Gorgeous dress made with substantial fabric-- unfortunately I couldn't wear it because it arrived with a stain dead center near the neckline that was about the size of a quarter. The sleeve has a unique shape at the bottom and is a little snug on the inside if you have muscular arms.
Such a cute romper for my bday party! <3
This is so comfy! The fabric is nice and thick and lays nicely. It is low cut for a sexier look!

links_reviews_title: Awesome color! Runs a little small.
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a 6 and got this two sizes up. It was still slightly big, but that was the only option, so I would recommend sizing up just one size for the perfect fit. Overall, an awesome color and super comfortable!

The only reason I did not give it five stars was that I wish it had a little stretch to it but other than that it's the perfect amount of sexy and snug enough you're not worried about your boobs falling out. The shorts are not too short to wear as I am 38 years old and it is such a gorgeous red color. Definitely turns heads and got compliments from perfect strangers all night. I would buy this if it were a little less expensive for sure.

links_reviews_title: Great color, a lot of cleavage
links_reviews_text: Did not wear because so revealing, not too fond of the front crotch area.

links_reviews_title: Poolside to Drag Brunch it was Perfect
links_reviews_text: I loved everything about this piece! Comfy quality material. It was a great length and showed just enough cleavage to be flirty without showing to much.
I rented this and wore it in Vegas to dinner, concert and then the club. For many compliments on it and the pockets are great for storing small things!

Very thick stretchy material. I should of sized down because the chest was too loose so the girls were not supported well. Difficult to wear with a bra because of how low and loose it was in the chest.

links_reviews_title: The very feminine romper showcased my legs and hourglass figure in a classy way!
links_reviews_text: Fits well for my measurements. There is a challenge in taking it off to use the restroom, though. Overall its favorite and fits well for petite 5' 3" ladies with an hourglass.

links_reviews_title: Awesome, but not for long torsos
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this piece. I wore it out to dinner with my husband and it was perfect. It can be dressed up with heels or made a bit casual with sandals. I've always thought I have a regular/petite torso, but the romper was a bit uncomfortable whenever I bent at the waist because the inseam rode up. Not too big deal for me, though. I'm 5'3", 125lbs, 36C-27-36.

Pros: Great color. Love the ruffles. Pockets! Not too short like most rompers. Cons: Zips all the way up the back, so a little difficult to use the bathroom. Very low cut, so difficult to wear a bra. Probably best for someone with a smaller chest.
Will rent again! Perfect romper loved the red!!
Got many compliments, need double sided boob tape! Lovely sexy dress
This romper made my boobs look ah-mazing and was super slimming. I would have worn again if the opportunity had presented itself, but unfortunately seasons change (literally).
Did not like the pocket in the front.

links_reviews_title: Was super comfortable to move around and dance in
links_reviews_text: No concern for a nip slip, very well fitted around bust.

I'm petite, 5"4' 190lbs and curvy with a short torso. I debated this one but the weather would not let me be great! I decided not to wear this one as it was too cold, but baby, I would in a heartbeat!
I never thought that I could wear a garment without a bra, but this one fit perfectly and I was able to dance no problem. Love love love.
added bonus...It has pockets!!!

links_reviews_title: need a deep plunge bra but very flattering cut, great color
links_reviews_text: pockets are a little bulgy but lay flat when standing, just bunch when sitting.

It was a great fit for my frame and size. Has a nice stretch. I can see that if it was too be too tight the pockets would open and be a problem, but if you get the right size the pockets look great. Low cleavage. I'm size D, didn't need tape or a bra.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a night out in Vegas!
links_reviews_text: Looked great with my curves.

links_reviews_title: It was cute but way too open for my Dcups.

links_reviews_text: I am top heavy and this fit really awkward.

links_reviews_title: I wore this 3 times instead of the one I planned on.
links_reviews_text: Fit beautifully. Great color. Received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: All dressed up and no place to go
links_reviews_text: Sigh, it was hot - sexy - flirty and never right for any occasion. Parties, vacation - it was always too sexy to wear or too costume to wear even with a camisole underneath. Fit like a glove and held the girls high without a bra. Lots of boobage.

I am between a 10 and 12 and the 12 fit perfectly and comfortably. My event ended up cancelling so I wore it anyway to dinner. Other than having to wear a bandeau because it's cut low for me, it was perfect and so flattering!

links_reviews_title: If it wasn't for the weird pockets on the front this would have been adorable. The pockets gap
links_reviews_text: The pocket on the front makes this very weird and it puckers out. Everything else for great. Quite sad that I wasn't able to wear this.

links_reviews_title: Great color and style: Runs slightly small
links_reviews_text: Runs a bit small for rompers, as I own and have rented a few. I rented the 8, and it fit like a glove (very little wiggle room). However, got a TON of compliments on the style and color. Would order again for sure.

links_reviews_title: So cute I wish it fit!
links_reviews_text: This is super cute and a nice bright pink color. I wish it fit, but I have a very short torso and it was bunching in the shoulders, crotch and back. Would be great for someone with a longer torso!
Wore this to a performance art event in LA. Beautiful color, comfortable to wear, got a ton of compliments!

I loved this dress! The color is so gorgeous and the material is really nice. It's not super breathable so that was tough for humid summer weather. It's not super fitted, it's definitely meant to hang loose. If you're between sizes, I would size down.
The dress by itself is a stand out color and the tiered skirt is so lovely. I added an oversized blazer and tab booties to add a little edge to the wholesome look of the dress. I absolutely loved it!

links_reviews_title: I felt prepared for work as well as for a transition to dinner. I stood out and felt radiant.
links_reviews_text: The dress was loose, comfortable and just what I wanted. I chose a smaller size as reviews said this sizes large. Definitely has a old school vibe. I learned to love the ruffles. I would so rent again!

I've never been sadder to send a garment back to RTR. I wore it so many times - to the theater, to a party, to a work event, and even to host a small gathering at my house. The compliments rolled in every time. As the weather got cooler, I layered up with an undershirt, leggings and boots and no one was the wiser. Pros: the color, the pattern, how the material drapes, the elegant sleeves. Cons: NONE, although I think this dress is best for straight and narrow body types, which it emphasizes the way a 1920's dress would.
the sleeves were really weird and not flattering at all
Beautiful color! Comfortable dress to wear on the weekend.
Unless you're tall and skinny this dress will not fit you well

links_reviews_title: I love the brand and yellow. I was happy to come across it.
links_reviews_text: It's not super breathable but the dress is a dream. I received lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress (but didn’t work on me)
links_reviews_text: This dress was more flattering from the side profile than the front, as it pulled too much across my chest and shoulders. It did fit in the waist and hips, so it seems this dress just wasn’t made for my body type. I’m giving it 5 stars because the fabric is gorgeous and it's clearly of high quality, and it would have been fun to wear had the fit been better!
Might not be for everyone as the style is definitely kind of artistic and extra but the color is so rich, beautiful fabric, really flattering on.
Flattering with a perfect fit
LOVED this and hugged me in all the right places. Highly recommend if you're true to size. If you're between sizes, I'd suggest sizing up.
Fit like a glove and the bottom is gorgeous. I got compliments all night.
This dress was perfect for a holiday party. The fit was tight, so size up. Took some work to get into the dress and zip it up but once on it was a perfect fit and was comfortable all night.
I wanted to keep this! I'd definitely order again. It's super flattering and sophisticated!

links_reviews_title: Received so many compliments, beautiful classic black dress!
links_reviews_text: I really liked wearing this for a November wedding since it was freezing out. Everyone loves the dress as did I. However I'm a petite person so the dress wasn't as snug as I would've liked but you would've never been able to tell!

links_reviews_title: Fit perfectly! And made me look curvy
links_reviews_text: Wore it to a formal gala event and it was perfect! Fit snug, but just snug enough to look good and be comfortable. The material is thick and nice for a fall evening event. Lots of compliments all night. I would definitely recommend!

Rented this dress for the style but then was extra impressed by the comfort + function. Thick material with hold & stretch. Wore this to a family wedding where we'd spent prior three days feasting on Chinese food and this dress still fit with comfort & flatter! Before packing for the trip, I'd already decided to size up from 0R to the 2R. I'd say if you want this fitting bodycon tight, go with your usual size but if you want form hugging with ability to eat / move comfortably, size up one notch!
So many compliments! 4 stars because it was a bit long. A short length would have been perfect

links_reviews_title: Simple, elegant black dress for any formal affair
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit for my body type and the diagonal oblong hemline makes it easy to fit all heights!

I absolutely loved this dress, more than I thought I would! Ordered the 4R and 6R as backup, but the 4R fit perfectly. Super comfortable!!! It was worn on a super hot day in September, but the material was not too thick. I hated to return it and would love to wear again for future events.

Such a classic dress and I got so many compliments! It was really comfortable but does run small if you are bustier. I ordered the 8R and it fit well but I'm a 34DD so the 10R was perfect. Honestly wasn't a dress I'd typically pick on RTR but so so worth it!!
I loved this dress! I usually try to steer away from wearing black but this was a statement black dress. It was simple yet elegant. I would absolutely rent again!
Highly recommend. Am 5'3, size 0, and 32D bra size. Length is very forgiving and it fit perfectly.

This was my back up dress, I am so glad that I picked this dress. The quality is amazing, it was snug but I was able to move around all night as there was some "give" in the fabric. The dress was so comfortable and well made! I felt like a million bucks!
The dress is fitted and fabulous. It's very well made with strong material that doesn't wrinkle even after you've been seated for awhile. The asymmetrical cut is flattering on just about anyone!

Arrived early and pleasantly surprised since this was my first RTR. Ordered 2 and 4, end up wearing the 2. Nicely lined, no issues with a strapless bra. The only step back is that it was a bit heavy for an August wedding, but once inside with air-conditioning super comfortable.
fit is perfect, Look formal, but so comfortable!!
The dress is incredible flattering and comfortable. It's true to size but gave my body such a nice figure I felt like a size 2 all night. Beautiful beautiful.
Beautiful, form-fitting, comfortable. Made me feel curvy and beautifying. Danced comfortably

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments, very flattering dress, and just a fun dress to wear to a rustic evening wedding
links_reviews_text: Dress fit true to size and was overall very flattering. I received many compliments about the dress. The dress was described by others as paralleling that of a flamenco dancer given the shape of the dress.
Comfortable and somewhat stretchy! It runs a little small, but was very comfortable with the correct size. Great for hourglass figures and just enough room in the bust for a D cup

Loved this dress but ultimately went with something floral for a summer night wedding. Would love to rent this for another event. The fabric is thick with a little stretch and really flattering. I'm normally a sz 6 but the 8 fit perfect.

links_reviews_title: Elegant dress, many compliments but runs small
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a wedding, it has a very elegant and slimming look and I received so many compliments! This was my first wedding since having a baby 9 months ago and while I'm back into size 10 dresses, this one I wore the 12 to, so I felt the dress did run a little smaller but was really happy that I went a size up for the backup size!

This dress fit like a glove, no bra or undies for me. I even had to have my husband follow me to the bathroom to zip it back up because I had to take it completely off to pee. I wore it to a formal wedding and received many compliments. Definitely order a size up!
This dress is gorgeous! The cut is very flattering and the interesting bottom details/shape take this dress from a typical LBD to a knockout. Highly recommend!
This dress was so flattering, so chic, so easy to wear. I got so many compliments all night. Loved every second of wearing it.
Absolutely loved this dress!! True to size
Absolutely loved this dress. I was really tempted to buy it. I am usually 0-2 in dresses and glad I sized up. Little snug in the hips/booty, but shapes beautifully.

As other reviewers have said, this dress does run small especially if you are bustier/have wider shoulders. I am typically a size 10, but the 12 fit perfectly. There is not really any stretch to the fabric, however the dress is very forgiving and flattering. Overall I loved this dress and I would recommend!

links_reviews_title: It was a flattering dress over all although it was a bit big around the hips.
links_reviews_text: I'm 6' tall and 36' around the hips and I got a size 2. It was a great length I thought my my height.
The dress was great on, the bust was a little small, but other than that it was great! Had a little stretch to it too which was great.

Rented this for a gala. I usually wear either a 4 or a 6. In this, I squeezed into a 6, but that is my fault as I was not at my thinnest going into this event. Still, the dress was more comfortable than I imagined it would be, and it was not difficult to sit in or to deal with in the bathroom. Being a bit on the shorter side, it was a little longer on me than it is on the the model photo, but it didn't touch the ground at all with 3"heels. This dress is definitely a head turner. Would rent it again.

This dress was wonderful! I wore it to a black tie ball in D.C. and felt absolutely amazing in it. I was a little worried it would be too "revealing" just because of how tightly it hugged everything but it wasn't a problem at all (in fact, it helped hide my food pouch without even needing spanx!). The fabric isn't clingy and the dress overall was very comfortable. I'm typically a 6/M or 8/M but went for the 6, which fit better up top. There wasn't too much of a difference across the middle. That being said, the 8 was much longer. I'm 5'4 and it touched the ground where the 6 didn't. Granted, I'm just coming back from a broken ankle (hence the death grip on the handrail) so the heels I was wearing were probably lower than most. Either way, I highly recommend this dress!

Dress was sophisticated and classic. The one shoulder and asymmetrical hemline made it more than just a boring black dress. Nice thick fabric. Hugs every curve! The size 6 was more comfy around the hips but was too large in the bust so I wore the 4. Even though it was snug it was very comfortable for a night of dancing. Probably not good for pear shapes since the top fits much larger than the hips. I am 5'7", 129 lbs and 32d for reference.

links_reviews_title: Wish I would have ordered a 10 to have a little more movement but nonetheless it was gorgeous.
links_reviews_text: Photographed beautifully.
Loved how it hugged my curves and still had give. Great material, my husband loved my dress.

Loved this dress! Wore it to an all black event. Some folks gave compliments and others looked at all the angles as I passed by giving me the checking me out OK. The fabric had just enough stretch to form fit my curves even with the lining . Very comfortable to dance all night.
Gorgeous dress, perfect fit, so fun and elegant! I'm having a hard time returning! Will rent again for sure!
Wore this to attend my husband's promotion dinner and it was very comfortable and sexy at the same time. It also Defined my curves

links_reviews_title: Nice dress for a night out
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this dress, but I just liked it. It kept riding up and was pretty short to begin with so that was a little frustrating - the sleeves were also very loose compared to the rest of the dress which I found a little strange. I ended up wearing it and got compliments but didn't feel it was as great as it could have been.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for dinner and out with friends.
links_reviews_text: I love this dress. Wanted to purchase it. The only flaw is it's a bit restricting in the shoulder area. The 2 fit me very snug. A 4 might have been better if I needed a good range of motion with my arms. Beautiful dress! Will definitely rent again in fall/winter.

I love this dress because it was sexy without showing too much skin. It was a little tight around my neck so I left it unzipped at the top about an inch and my hair covered it well. I couldn't lift my arms up over my head but did it really need to either
Nice fit and very hot!

I love this edgy dress by Black Halo. Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back-up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and at the hips. Curvier women should consider sizing up for fuller hips. It works great for any cup size and can be worn with a standard bra. At 4’8”, the length hit mid thigh on me and wasn’t too short. The cut out at the shoulders add some edginess to this otherwise simple LBD. Pair with black heels to complete your outfit.
Super cute and is flattering

This this was perfect for a cold weather sexy look. It fits like a glove. I would say that it's basically impossible to zip up by yourself as it does restrict some arm movement. Overall the length is short but I never felt like anything was about to be exposed.
I usually wear a 0 or 2, the size 2 was so small I couldnt even attempt to zip it. Nice fabric, super thick. Cute dress too. I was sad I couldn't make it work!
I am tall, so the dress was a little short on me. However, it didn't ride up at all, so it worked.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love this dress. Didn't get to wear
links_reviews_text: I really wanted to see this on, but I couldn't get it past my hips! There's no give in this dress and runs small.
The dress was incredibly flattering and sexy. It wasn't as short as other people said it was, but the only thing that bothered me was the lining fell a bit longer than the dress so it was visible.
The fabric is pretty thick and hugs curves well. Looks sexy but classy. The arms are a little too tight, you need help zipping up

links_reviews_title: Didn't get to wear, too small
links_reviews_text: Ran really small

I LOVED this dress- I'm not curvy at all but the cut and the way the material hugs made me look like an hourglass! I wore this for a Valentine's Day date with my boyfriend and it was the perfect combination of flirty and cute without trying too hard

Loved the cut out arm details, really elevated the look. The neck opening was extremely tight (had to literally wear it partially unzipped). Wore it without a bra and the bust fit great. Overall was perfect for date night, I would purchase if it weren't for the tight neck area.
Seems like a cool dress, but it was so tight that I couldn't even get the zipper to zip all the way up
Beautiful dress, too small.

The dress is very short and very tight. I wore it once with leggings and felt like a hooker. Also very uncomfortable to sit since it was so tight. I do like the detail on the arms but the bottom of the dress just doesn't do it for me
This dress WAY too short. There was no way I could possibly wear it and sit down comfortably.

Loved this dress. Took this to London with me for a Halloween dinner theater event. Paired it with low heeled black ankle booties. Dress came out of the luggage completely unwrinkled. It is multiple layers of fine mesh and very lightweight and super comfortable. I was able to go braless, always a win in my book! Got compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: Easy, Breezy Beautiful Sundress for Wine Country Summer
links_reviews_text: This light and airy sundress was perfect for a wine country getaway. The LL size was very flattering on my curvy size 10/12 frame and there was just enough coverage for my ample bust. The material is stretchy and lightweight with a built-in slip that hit above the knees. It was a great dress to twirl in. But watch your step as you twirl, it runs a little long and even though I'm 5'9 and wore 2 inch platform sandals, I had to be careful not to trip. Tempted to buy it but I resisted this time. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Replacement dress arrived right on time!!!
links_reviews_text: The original dress I ordered wasn't right for me. RTR offered 2 replacement dress options. Stated it would be here by 8pm day of event which was scheduled at 11a. Doorbell dinged at 9a...I knew it was my dress!! It fit perfect, true to size. Material felt luxurious unlike the first dress I ordered.

seriously wanted to buy this dress, but it was a little bit too expensive! it's stretchy and extremely comfortable. i'm only 5'3" but this dress just touched the floor so I could wear flat sandals with it to work! definitely recommend!!

links_reviews_title: Love love love esp while pregnant
links_reviews_text: Love these FUZZI dresses, so great for pregnancy because they are all stretch. Might have been too light for a 45 degree NYC day but I'm trying to summon spring. Would also be very cute for non maternity, M is the right size for my size 6 build. Will rent again!
This fit very well and made me feel great at 33 weeks pregnant. Great stretchy bottom layer.

I wanted to keep this dress so badly. It fit perfectly. It has the right amount of give while still having a nicely structured waistband that accentuates curves in all the right places. You can wear a normal bra with it! The bottom can be tied up to make it more casual and show off killer shoes or leave it long for a more formal occasion. I'm 5'4 and wore 4.5" heels with it which I wouldn't have had to do if I'd gotten the regular length. The sleeves are light and floaty and are perfect for a hot day/evening.

links_reviews_title: Maybe my favorite rental to date
links_reviews_text: I fell in love with this dress. I rented it through Unlimited for a friend's birthday dinner but wasn't sure I was going to wear it. Once I tried it on, I was sold. It was incredibly comfortable and I felt great in it. It's more boob than I typically show and it definitely turned heads. I considered buying it I loved it so much. It's effortless.
This fit very well and was flattering. It was a little low cut but not too revealing. Would definitely rent again.

I'm in love with this dress. It stretched over my boobs and hugged my curves well but not in a way that felt revealing. The pattern is gorgeous. It was breezy enough for a Los Angeles wedding in August. I love the fluttering sleeves and the length. I did have to wear 2" heels to keep it from dragging. I'm usually a size 12-14 but this dress fit me in a Medium. Oh! It was also great for dancing - never worried it was going to pull or rip because it's so stretchy and comfortable.

I grabbed this dress from the RTR store when I was shopping for items that would fit over my 39wk bump. The overlay is very lightweight and the lining is very elastic and forgiving... hence, can comfortably be worn even if you're pregnant. The lining only goes to about the knees and makes for a super lightweight dress overall. I will definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Sent as a backup - I didn't wear, but it fits really well!
links_reviews_text: Fits really well and the fabric is super comfortable. It was an emergency backup when one of my rented options didn't show, so I didn't wear it to the wedding, but it's a great option.

Dress runs a bit long on me (5'3") so needed to wear heels, but the dress was lovely, flattering and versatile. Wore it to a nice dinner on my honeymoon and then just kept wearing it because it was both comfortable and beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Lovely, comfortable dress but not dressy enough for my event
links_reviews_text: This is a lovely dress. I love the giving material and the fit. It would have been super comfortable to wear for a long evening of eating, dancing and celebrating. The only problem is that we are attending a super dressy black tie event and, while my husband really liked it on me, my sister and I decided it doesn't have that WOW factor that we want. A few sparkles here, a sequin or two there would have made it the perfect dress. I think it might be a great choice if you are pregnant bc it is very forgiving and has ample room in the bust. I would upload a photo if I could figure out how!!! Sheesh. I need a teenager in my home.

links_reviews_title: Sadly has 2 inch rip in the hem and smells really bad. Someone had a good time on the dance floor.
links_reviews_text: Cute, despite the smell. Was a bit too long for me, would have tried the regular. It is made of a stretch mesh-like material and was very comfy. Could maybe have gone down a size.
Fits live a glove. Stretchy material so fits amazing. Is cute with my 3 month bump.
Very pretty stretchy material low cut in front so lots of cleavage
I loved the fit, a pullover dress with some stretch. Very comfortable with a great fit. The only challenge was it's a bit long & not ideal to wear with flats.
I loved this dress so much but sadly it was way too long on me. Even with heels which make me about 5'4" it was still too long. If you're tall rent this! Super flattering material and cut.

links_reviews_title: stretchy and super comfortable for baby bump
links_reviews_text: inner lining can ride up a little but not a big deal

When I would move the neckline would also and my bra would peek out. This was somewhat hidden by the color scheme, but not a look I like to have. This dress would be amazing otherwise. I wore with a bandeau underneath also but I thought it ruined the look. Oh well. Love fuzzi though.

Easy to wear dress! Perfect for multiple seasons. Light fabric. It is a little low in the front but overall it's a perfect dress for dinner or going out. I wore it to an afternoon matinee. I'd buy it if it wasn't out of my usual price range.
Don't usually wear something so low cut but the rest was so flowy and classy that I could pull it off. Super comfy and still flattering.
This dress is stunning and so comfortable!
Great stretchy fabric which makes this super comfortable. Perfect maternity dress!
The dress is long enough for leggy tall girls and is very flattering. A head turner!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Comfortable but Very Long Summer Dress
links_reviews_text: Rented this to wear to synagogue in the summer. It arrived new with tags (always a nice bonus) and was super comfortable and lightweight, did not wrinkle and i loved the lining, which was stretchy and stayed put. The neckline is very low but I wore a bralette underneath and it was completely fine. The one issue is that it is ridiculously long. I am petite (5'2") and wore this with 5 inch heels and it was still trailing behind me. Anyone under 5'9" will need heels. Also, on me the lining came down to at least mid-calf. That said I got tons of compliments so I'm glad I rented it.
Beautiful pattern and material
This shirt was super cute and flattering! There is a button for the chest area but even with that it was still a little low cut for work. Very fun pattern for summer!

Size up! This blouse was absolutely lovely, but I did have to size up twice. The print makes this blouse standout immediately so be ready for EXTRA looks. Found this super easy to dress up (with a skirt) and down (jeans and kicks).

Definitely needed something under it with DDD's. It could have been worn without but I don't like to show that much cleavage. It is quite short but looks good with high waisted pants. I found the bottom of the sleeves to be abnormally tight. I had to unbutton the last button in order to raise my arms.
I wore this for a fiesta bridal shower and loved it. It does run a little small so I was happy that I ordered the medium. Super flattering and tons of compliments.
Gorgeous top for work and beyond. True wrap top. Put it on like a button down, tie the inside then the outside that you see. Snap closure helps too.
Cute shirt. Easy to wear and great fabric. Didn't seem like anything super special but a solid easy wear. This is a true wrap top and don't be afraid to size up to be safe.

links_reviews_title: Lovely bright print-just didn't fit for me
links_reviews_text: Love Parker prints! Usually great with a M but this wrap top was snug in the chest and too short in the torso.

links_reviews_title: Ok but fits a bit strange
links_reviews_text: I'm glad I got a size up because it would have been too small otherwise. It is quite short so you need high waist pants. I wore a cami underneath otherwise I would have exposed everything but I also have a large chest. The sleeves were strange though, I don't think I have fat arms but the buttons on the sleeve were a bit tight and prevented me from moving comfortably. It was ok, not my favorite thing I've rented but not the worst either.

links_reviews_title: It was sooo small and super short! I’m only 5’4”, but it fit like a crop top.
links_reviews_text: Small, short, tight
Wore out to dinner. Cute and got compliments but it's much more cropped than I'd like. Wore with high waisted jeans and it was fine. Does run small like others said. I got an XL and it worked great.

links_reviews_title: Too small if you have any boobs...
too low cut for my taste.

links_reviews_text: Shirt is a bit short on torso but the flower print is beautiful.
I usually wear an XL but couldn't begin to wear this blouse. It wouldn't even close all the way! Beautiful blouse but very disappointing.

Ordered a size up and the top still didn't fit! Love the color and print but the wrists are small, the bust is small, the cut is short, and the fabric is sheer. I don't recommend this top at all. Also if you're big-busted, BEWARE!
I love this top.

I'm petite and this shirt was too short for my liking. I typically like for a top to fall an inch plus over the top of my jeans, but this would have almost shown my tummy. If you don't mind a short top, go for it!

links_reviews_title: Really loved this! Bright and beautiful.
links_reviews_text: Thought it was appropriate for work if you aren't super busty.
Pretty colors and lots of compliments
I liked this, it's beautiful fabric but it doesn't have any give so sometimes felt tight in the sleeves when reaching.

Fit is snug, but true to size. Loved the flowy sleeves and bright, bold floral print. The only issue I found was that I needed to invest in high waisted pants. I have a long torso, so it was really difficult to find something to pair this top with (it fell too short for me and would have been inappropriate for work without a super high-waisted pant/skirt).
This dress is not goodf or long torsos, and the snap in the front kepy popping open.
fits well, a bit shorter on me than it appears in photo. Great color and nice material.
A bit tight

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on this blouse!
links_reviews_text: Typically a size 8, and the XL was the right size for me. It had a very flattering fit and I felt relaxed and confident.
Cute pattern, but cut was weird. Worst shirt for the girls ever. Made the mistake of not wearing a camisol under and the snap button popped over 100 times that day. Nightmare.

links_reviews_title: Made for short people or people who want to show their midriff
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'9" and it showed my stomach which isn't appropriate at 42, so it's better on shorter people or people who want to show their stomach

links_reviews_title: worn it for dinner and work
links_reviews_text: Comfy fit, looks great with a skirt, or jeans

links_reviews_title: Beautiful blouse but cut super small
links_reviews_text: I am a size 10 and rented the large. It fit like an extra small. Be sure to size up
Kind of short.
Love this top, the colors pop and fit is flattering . Loved this
The waist of this shirt hits very high. It looked a little off with a tank underneath and regular work pants.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful print and great springtime blouse
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. The sleeves fit me great. Received several compliments.

links_reviews_title: Loved the colors and wore it with a pair of jeans
links_reviews_text: Fits very true to size
Small and short
Didn't wear as it didn't fit over my bust. :(

links_reviews_title: Unfortunately it was too large. Beautiful color and pattern though, very light material.
links_reviews_text: This shirt seems to be made for someone that is taller or has broader shoulders. Even with an xs, and tying it a little tighter, it just didn't work. The sleeves are also very long.
Loved the colors of this top. So Feminine! Would definitely recommend.

I absolutely cannot get over this fabric: the richness of the colors and textures is beyond anything! And this baby has pockets, which is magical! Things to beware of: putting this dress on by yourself is a project that requires shoulder flexibility. You gotta be able to connect the top zipper behind your back. And the top was a little gaping over my 32B-sized chest.

beautiful shimmery violet gown with poof in the skirt and pockets! I'm 5'2" and wore 4 " wedges and it was a great length- sweeping the floor and sometimes I lifted up the skirt to walk faster which made it look that much prettier anyway! Tons of compliments at my "Once upon a time " gala. I do feel it runs slightly large , the top is a deep v- it is quite chesty, and shows beautiful décolletage but I wore a necklace bib as part of the costume. I went as aForest Queen with a black tiara crown.

links_reviews_title: You will receive so many compliments and feel like a Purple Princess!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a recital and it was GORGEOUS. It met all my expectations! After reading extensive reviews, I was relieved it fit. I would have ordered the 12R had it been available, but I ordered the 8R and 10R, and the 10R still fit great!! As many other people have noted, it is VERY busty. I have a full bust so it looked very scandalous until I added a panel of fabric to cover up some of my cleavage. If this is a concern of yours, my advice would be to size up. If you size up, you should have enough fabric in the chest area to work with and pin for modesty. If you size down it will be a tighter fit in the bust, which is fine as long as you’re comfortable with a full display of cleavage. I included pictures of the dress with and without the panel for reference. As for the bra situation, depending on the way the dress sits on your back/type of bra you have, you may or may not be able to wear a bra. There are two issues you might have: 1, the strap showing in the open back, or 2, the cups showing in the front. I was lucky that dress covered my back in a way that allowed me to wear a bra without it being noticeable. You may have to explore some options between going no bra, using tape, finding a specific bra, etc. If you are self conscious about your tummy or anything below the upper body, this dress will hide these insecurities and give you a flowy hourglass appearance. As far as length, front of the dress is a bit shorter than the back, which has a bit of a train, so I wore flats. I’d say get Long option if you are planning on wearing heels and over 5ft6in. Overall, my first experience with RTR was a pleasure. Customer service was so helpful. I was even able to switch delivery addresses without a hitch last minute. Rent this dress!! You will get non-stop compliments!!

links_reviews_title: Wore to work gala...was comfortable enough to dance in and sit through formal dinner.
links_reviews_text: Dress was a little big on top but was workable. Very comfortable, pockets are great!

links_reviews_title: Stunning for family photos in a lilac field!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED wearing this gorgeous gown for family photos in a lilac field! The color popped and I felt like a queen. In love!

links_reviews_title: You will stand out in a crowd!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to our New Year’s Eve dance/dinner party. I chose it, in part, because I have a cylindrical figure and look best with a high waistline. I received loads of complements and felt lovely. I was pleasantly surprised at the high-quality of the material and the colors are gorgeous. The V-neck needed lots of adjusting during the evening to keep me modest, but was worth it. I am 5’ 9.5” and wore 3.5” heels; the “long” length was good, with one caveat. Because about ¼” of my black bra showed in the back, I tried the dress without it. Without the bra, however, the dress was just a bit longer and not safe for dancing. I put the bra back on and I expect (hope) that, because of the low lighting in the venue, this fashion breech was observed by few or none. I was a bit uncomfortable with the bare back—seemed a bit much for a 61-year-old, but I have no regrets choosing this dress. Husband gave it a big thumbs up, too.
Fit perfect, I'm 5'2 and the length was perfect. I was even able to wear flats with it. Does show a lot of cleavage. Beautiful dress great for the Margarita Ball.
Didn't end up wearing this because my boobs were falling out of it and it showed back fat.

links_reviews_title: I felt amazing in this dress!!!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for professional pictures. I have a large tummy and somewhat unproportionate body so it can be hard for me to find a dress that fits my breast, my tummy, and my hips. Not to mention I'm also short. This dress fit everything beautifully! It was figure flattering. The length was perfect for my short stature. I felt like a total bombshell. I highly recommend it!

Very flattering fit. I had to wear flats or the dress would have been too short. It's difficult to zip, but ended up getting it on my own. I needed a backless bra. I had so many compliments and it photographs really well.
This dress was perfect for a gala I attended. It was comfortable and received compliments and head-turners all night long! The color is really pretty! And...pockets, ladies!
I LOVED the dress and felt so great wearing it! And I got soooo many compliments for it too! You have to get it, its GREAT!

links_reviews_title: Princess with a lot of cleavage
links_reviews_text: My husband told me to show off my investment so I rented this dress and man was I the talk of the night. This dress showed so much cleavage. I filled it out to a T so there as no falling out or gaps (34DD) with a low cut push up bra from Amazon. Rent it if you feel like turning some heads. I enjoyed it very much
Super flattering, hid my mom bod, fashion tape was very helpful to keep my boobs in the top

links_reviews_title: Want to feel like a princess? Wear this gown...
links_reviews_text: The color and shape of this dress are perfection. I wore it to my sister's wedding at a French Chateau and I truly felt like a princess all night. The gown is easy to move in and dance in. There are two small reasons that I am rating this 4 stars: 1. I had to use tape to hold up the girls because I am very narrow in the rib cage. I tried several styles of bra and none worked. 2. The skirt is a bit flat and I had to purchase a crinoline to give it the volume that it needed.

I loved this dress! It was lots of fun to dance with and very comfortable. Pros: BIG POCKETS!! You can wear a regular bra with it (have inserts and fashion tape handy if you need more umph). Comfortable. Cons: a little long for short people.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, flattering cut and TULLE!
links_reviews_text: This dress is made of a beautiful fabric and has layers of tulle underneath to make it flow out beautifully. the purple is incredibly vibrant. The cut is very flattering BUT it was fine when standing however when I sat down it really was revealing in the front so I ended up pinning it shut. Highly highly recommend. However be aware that there is a cut out in the back so it can make wearing a bra kind of tricky. PERFECT for a pear shaped girl! Love this dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress was stunning! I received complements all night!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a masquerade ball. I usually wear a 4, but the 2 fit slightly better (less gapy in the chest). It was too long, the petite was not available, so I used a lot of hem tap. I also used fashion tape to make sure the low neck line stayed in place, which worked well. Overall, the most gorgeous dress I have ever worn!
Dress is true to size. Compliments all night long

This dress is beautiful and I got tons of compliments all night! And it has pockets 💗 I definitely could have sized down but unfortunately the size down wasn't available and because I fell in love with this dress I pinned it. Definitely wish I had another event to wear this dress to. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Loved twirling dress on dance floor.
links_reviews_text: Perfect length with 3 inch heels. I was MOB and received so many complements about the fabric and design. Cut out back so comfortable on a hot Virginia Wedding on June 29th for my daughter Frances Claire.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: My first dress choice was too small, so I picked this as a replacement and sized up. I’m 5’4” but wanted to wear heels, so I ordered the long and it was perfect. It was a bit big in the waist (I wear 12-14 in bottoms), but I’d rather it be too big and still be able to wear it since we were at an out of town wedding. I wear a 38 D bra and the chest fit perfectly.

I rented this dress for a black tie wedding in France. The color of the dress is gorgeous and really pops in photos. The skirt is quite full and drapes beautifully. Overall I felt very regal in it. The one downside is that the dress is very low cut and could have really benefited from a small hook in front, even dress tape didn't help with it, so it gaped, especially when I sat down but a great dress nonetheless.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a gala! Definitely recommend for colder months.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! My work gala was in May in the Pacific NW, so I thought the heavier/darker fabric would work, but it ended up being 90 degrees out that day. Still, the dress was incredibly comfortable and only ended up feeling too hot on the dance floor (despite a couple of layers of tulle in the skirt). I'm only 5'9" but the Long barely got to the floor, even in flats. I was happy to be able to wear flats, though! I normally wear a size 16 (occasionally a 14), but the 18 was perfect for my larger bust and relatively straight waistline. I ordered it in both a 16 and an 18, but the waist has no stretch at all and I would have felt like my back was spilling out in the 16. Many reviewers said the top ran large, but it was perfect for me--a 38G. I did pin it for modesty, but it was an easy fix and not too difficult to make the pin look nice.

I had to tape my 34F boobs to keep them from falling out and safety pinned the bottom to give me a little more coverage but I was pretty self conscious the entire time. Felt beautiful and got so many complements. Loved the pockets.
This dress was a dream! I got so many compliments and felt wonderful. I would highly recommend purchasing the double side tape to make sure you stay in place

links_reviews_title: First time renting and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Loved the way I felt wearing this dress, it was so fun! Wore to a conservation gala, back detail was nice on a warm evening, length was fine even though I’m petite. Color was stunning, was glad for the 2 sizes since most department store size 4 are too big on me, but the 4 felt more comfortable than the 2 in the torso.

I love the color of the dress and it had pockets. I had a size 18 and I should have had a size 16. It was a bit low cut in the front and it was difficult to find a bra but I did. I also had to pin the front of the dress closed. I received several compliments on the dress.
Amazing fit. Was shorter then I was expecting. Back cut out wasn't in a very flattering location. Dress was gorgeous though.

links_reviews_title: The fit, cut, and general profile were incredible. This is a classic high quality brocade gown!
links_reviews_text: So the website was giving me trouble on updating size info. Here are my relevant measurements: 5'5", 200lbs, 40D, short torso, large bust, broad shoulders. Because of the large bust and broader shoulders for my size, I should have gone up to a 16WR. I wore the 14WR and the torso zipper in the back would come undone occasionally. I would put a little black kimono over the dress when this happened. IN SPITE OF THIS... I was absolutely in love with this dress and my whole outfit. I looked stellar and felt incredible. I wore the dress with the RJ Graziano Crystal Statement Necklace. I was originally drawn to a longer necklace that would drape down the deep v, but the loose choker style of the Graziano necklace actually highlighted the deep v even more. It's been two days since I wore this dress and I can't stop thinking about how I can't wait for it to go on sale so I can buy it and wear it forever. I hope everyone gets a chance to feel this pretty. Thanks for the hit night, RTR!!!

links_reviews_title: Several compliments on this gorgeous gown!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress! Based on previous reviews I went with the size I usually am and a size smaller. I am 5'2" and weigh around 135 pounds. Postpartum from two kids and haven't been able to eliminate that baby gut but this dress hit at just the right spots to make that not noticeable! I received several compliments! Both the size 8 and 6 fit me well around the waist but I have a small chest so I went with the size 6R to have less gap around the chest area. Height wise, I wore 3" heels and the dress just flowed around the ground. Could've been an inch shorter but honestly wasn't unmanageable at all! Loved this dress! Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Covering Up My Chest the Entire Night
links_reviews_text: It was a little more revealing than I was comfortable with. I have a large chest and fashion tape was no match for my bust. It did fit fine everywhere else however. This dress is forgiving everywhere but the bust

This dress is beyond words! I got so many compliments it was crazy! I wore it to a black tie wedding in Florida in early March. Which wasn't the best idea given the crinoline in the skirt. I was sweating to death! But once I started dancing it didn't matter too much because it was so fun to dance in! It was a little big, but that just made it more comfortable really! (I think I'm in between sizes in this designer, I rented 2 other dresses by her in a size 16 and they were too tight) It did pull at the chest when I sat down, but I was able to wear my regular bra and with some double sided tape it stayed put through dinner and dancing. I'm 5'6ish and I wore flats, I did have to lift the dress when taking the stairs. Word of warning the skit is puffy, like so much so I had to sit at the end of the isle at church because it didn't exactly fit in the pew, but honestly that was one of the things I LOVED about it. It made what could have just been a low key pretty dress feel amazingly elegant! The color is a stunning purple and a dark navy(almost looks a little more black in person) I wore a sleek low pony, big gold and crystal earrings, gold shoes and shawl and I felt like royalty!!!! 12/10 would rent again!
true to size, although it was a little big up top. Need to size down for small chested women!

links_reviews_title: perfect for a Mardi Gras ball!
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful and very flattering! I loved wearing it. I am about 5'4'' and got a 6L, but with heels, the dress hit the floor just where I wanted it to as if it had been tailored for me. The train in the back is slight, but it adds a lot to the look. The fabric is beautifully crafted and moves gracefully. It was fun to wear and made me feel beautiful.

Loved this dress! It was a last minute choice, as my initial two choices did not fit. I normally wear a size 14-16 depending on the dress. The only choice available for this was an 18L. It ran a little big in the waist area, but I was still able to wear because the flowy gown hides it. It may run a little big in the chest area for some people but it worked out well for me because I'm a 38DD. It showed a little too much cleavage so I was able to pull one side of the bust area over the other and use a safety pin that was hidden just to make it a little less revealing since it was for my husband's work event that was black tie. You'll have to wear a backless and strapless bra because of the open portion in the back. The long was perfect length for my height. I'm 5'7" and I was able to wear heels. Such a comfortable dress and the color and pattern of the dress are perfect. I had so many women stopping me throughout the night to compliment me on the dress. Would definitely recommend if you have a black tie event.
I loved this dress and got so many compliments! It was super comfortable, had pockets, and I danced all night!
This dress was AMAZING. The fit was perfect. Purple is not a color I normally wear but I'm so glad that I did. I received so many compliments and my daughter called me a princess.

links_reviews_title: Show stopper for a formal affair!
links_reviews_text: I felt great in this dress- it is truly a show stopper and I got so many compliments on it. Not the most flattering as it isn't fitted and has a big skirt- but it will make an impression! I would definitely recommend ordering down a size. I'm usually a 4L and the 2L fit, but wasn't tight. I also had to pin the top to make it sit better on my shoulders. But one pin was perfect and kept the top on right! My only complaint is that it stunk of BO but I didn't have any other options so I just sprayed so extra perfume. Also, there was a small rip near the left pocket. No one else could see it, but my finger would get stuck in in when I was using the pocket. Overall its a great dress and I am so happy I rented it.

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved the dress, got so many complements! Was perfect for the intimate wedding we were at.
links_reviews_text: The material was perfect. Easy to get on and had just enough pop of gold. Dress was comfortable to wear and did not require any special undergarments. Next time, I would order just the 14, the 14W was a tiny bit big on me, but you couldn't tell. Would totally rent this again!

LOVED this dress. Wore this to a friend's wedding. I'm normally a size 4 but the 4 was a tiny bit snug for me so I opted to size up and go with the 6 for a more comfortable experience. The fabric feels nice and thick. I love the fit and length.

Loved this dress. Can be dressed up with the kind of jewelry. Like other reviews stated, this dress runs a bit large. It wasn't super noticeable but I was able to grab a large amount of fabric at the back of the dress. I think a size 14, rather than a 14W would have fit a little better. Overall I felt great in the dress and would rent it again!

This dress would have been perfect for the charity event I was supposed to wear it to (cancelled due to coronavirus). But I liked the look and feel of it so much I put it on, poured myself a glass of wine and wore it around the apartment for a few hours anyway. I will definitely be ordering it for another event in the future.
I wore this dress to my work holiday party. It is classy and conservative. The dress is flattering and comfortable.
Fit perfectly, hid all the problem areas and was super comfortable. Received so many compliments

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my oldest daughter’s sorority formal.
links_reviews_text: Cute dress but a little long in my opinion.
This dress is adorable and very comfortable. I'm only 5' 1" so it could have been an inch shorter, but it still looked great. Got a ton of compliments. I would wear this dress again.
Obsessed with this easy to wear dress! Ran a tad big, could have sized down! Gold foil peak a boo was super unique! So many compliments!
It was a good length and was really cute. It was a little tight in the chest area but it wasn't bad enough to where I couldn't breathe. I would rent again!

The shape of this dress is great! Not too short, fun skirt, and the gold underlay was a perfect surprise for an otherwise classic LBD. I chose the size 2 over the 4 as the top fit just a bit better but FYI this dress has zero stretch to it! I was comfortable all night eating drinking and dancing but definitely felt that big relief when I unzipped it at the end it the night! I got lots of compliments, and pairing it with black stockings and black heels made it perfect for a winter wedding!
This dress was so comfortable and the perfect amount of formal for a semi-formal rehearsal dinner.

Loved this dress! I'm 5'4 and the size 8 was perfect! The 6 fit too but was a little tighter in the bust. I got compliments all night and it flattered all the right places. The gold trim was perfect to stand out a little. Would also make a great New Years dress!!

I wore this dress to my work holiday party. It was perfect for the event. It was a good length but I ended up wearing a size 6 instead of the size 4 because it was a little tight around my chest. Overall I would wear it again.
I'm 5'9", 135 lbs and the size 4 fit perfectly
I wore this dress for my friend's rehearsal dinner. Unfortunately I didn't get a full length shot of the dress. It was very comfortable and I definitely got compliments.

links_reviews_title: Classy LBD with a flare of gold!
links_reviews_text: Super cute LBD with a touch of gold. I got complements all night at my husbands work Christmas party. Very classy.
Perfect dress for a wedding, the gold detail is perfect, and gives you plenty of options for accessorizing.

This dress fit me like a glove without being too tight! It was perfect for a fall wedding with tights and booties. Initially I was afraid it would be too short, but it was a very tasteful length without being at my knees.

links_reviews_title: It was a perfect fit and I received a lot of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Wore it to a gala event where the attire was "gold preferred." This dress had the perfect pop of gold! If you're in between sizes I would size up but I wore my regular size and it fit like a glove!
This dress is gorgeous!!!! It fit perfectly & showed off my curves. It can be worn with or without a bra. Perfect length!!!

So, the dress was definitely to size which means that I should have worn the 20. But, I am 6' 1" which means it also was verrryyy short on me which is the only reason I went with the 22, so that I could get that little extra length. Overall the dress was amazing, comfortable, fit perfectly in for the 80s themed masquerade I attended. I use RTR often and love the convenience. It was definitely a perfect night!
Wore this to an outdoor fall wedding and loved it! The dress is super comfortable, great to dance in, and the gold lining adds a fun twist to the classic LBD. Would definitely rent again.
This dress fits amazing not stretchy though so order your size I'm 5'4 and it's not too long which I love looks very trendy . Beautiful gold color easy on and off
I got a lot of compliments on this dress! It’s a tad short, but not so much so that I felt like it was inappropriate. It had plenty of room in the waist. Very flattering. Lightweight materials.
Fit was perfect, got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Black Swan themed Glow up
links_reviews_text: Both the 2 and the 4 fit snuggly, but the 4 had more space for food. This dress got so many compliments and it was great for my body type. I naturally have a short torso and this helped elongate it; I love dresses with this style and flare out. It was excellent on the dance floor and I really played into the black and gold theme of the dress. Highly recommend!!!
This dress fit well. It was quality fabric and a nice length.

This dress was perfect for my formal wedding that included a TON of dancing. It is comfortable, can be dressed up or down, very flattering and perfect for a night on the dance floor. Someone else had the dress as well which I got a kick out of.

This dress was absolutely perfect for my friends Wedding this past weekend. I wore the size 4 and it fit perfectly. It does fit a little snug around the ribs, but nothing uncomfortable. Will definitely rent again!

I absolutely loved this dress. It's was super comfortable and easy to wear. I received lots of compliments and felt beautiful wearing this dress. I highly recommend renting it. The dress was true to size.
The dress fit great and was not too short but a good length for the Texas summer

links_reviews_title: Everyone at the reception LOVED this dress. It was beautiful, perfect. I loved the gold accent.
links_reviews_text: It was comfortable, breathable, form fitting, and easy to move in.

links_reviews_title: This was my backup dress. I got so many compliments! The perfect dress for the Gold-themed gala.
links_reviews_text: It fit nicely around the bust, as I'm a bit broad. The waist was a little big. I would like to have seen what a smaller size would've looked like. The length was perfect. I really liked this dress. So comfortable too!

The fit was very flattering on my body - waist nipped in and the 4 fit me on top really well (I’m usually a 2). The skirt was longer than I would have liked but I’m only 5’ so pretty expected. The quality of the textile was unfortunately really cheap and the gold layer didn’t go all the way up to the seam at the waist, and was instead a very cheap almost transparent black polyester, like what a graduation robe is made of.

links_reviews_title: Little black dress with some flair
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress for a summer wedding on a 85 degree day. The length hit perfectly. Typically a size 14 but definitely could have sized down. I am very busty and this dress left plenty of room to fit the girls in! Overall lovely dress!

This dress is very easy to wear. I could wear a regular bra and didn't need any shape wear (as the fabric is very forgiving). It was much shorter than I expected, not indecent.... just shorter than I felt appropriate for the wedding I was attending. It doesn't look like it in picture, but it was about three inches above the knee. I'm 5'4. But, since it was also my anniversary I wore it out to dinner the next day and it was perfect.
This was a very comfortable dress to wear and also looked beautiful. Full coverage on top meant a normal bra but the beautiful gold detail on the bottom gave it a little flair. Would wear again!
so I typically wear a 6, however in this case I wore the 8 and it was still very tight fitting up top. Beautiful dress, though and I got tons of compliments.

Sadly, I rented this dress for the WRONG weekend so I never got to wear it out other than to try it on and it wasn't available for the weekend I actually needed it for. But I would like to rent it again because it really is stunning and you don't have to wear a bra, it really lifts them up.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress but short and weird material
links_reviews_text: I love the back of this dress but I don't have the busy for the front. I am tall, but this dress was EXTRA short. The material is strange it feels similar to a decorative shower curtain. It flows kind-of and is comfortable enough to wear but just wasn't for me.

This dress is perfect! The material is lightweight and very flattering around the midsection. The chest fit me perfectly, didn't need to wear anything underneath; however, I am a 34D so I can see how some with a smaller chest may need to use double sided tape to keep their girls in check. I received endless amounts of compliments on this, and felt absolutely stunning. Sexy and elegant all in one dress, would love to wear this again!
Wore this dress to a black-tie Christmas party and it was perfect! A little long, but with heels it was no problem!

links_reviews_title: Classic meets Edgy in this dramatic gown!
links_reviews_text: This dress is surprisingly comfortable. The cutouts are daring and sexy - but strategically placed to show off only the sleekest parts of your body. The fabric is nice and thick, and covers the midsection well. I love the rich cobalt color. The dress was beautiful and extremely comfortable - I swear I could have slept in it! My only complaint is that it runs short - I wore the 8L (as in long) and it was still a little short. Overall I LOVED this dress though - would rent again in a heartbeat.

links_reviews_title: It is a stunning and sexy dress.
links_reviews_text: I felt like it was a little too much cleavage for a wedding so I wore a shall for ceremony and took it off to dance. Even with 32 DDD the girls stayed in place without a bra (and that's not normal as I'm 42 and they are all over the place) it's a really flattering dress I'm athletic and could eat and dance in it no problem I would rent it for another occasion.
The dress fit perfect! Felt beautiful and danced all night!

This is an unforgettable dress. The color is stunning, as is the fit. No need for a bra, but the plunging neckline shows a decent amount of cleavage. It felt slightly revealing for a wedding, but it was summertime, so I just owned it. My only complaint is that this dress is not long! I am 5'8" and wore a 6L. I wore 1" platforms and there is no way I could have worn heels. I wouldn't recommend this dress for anyone taller than me. The color and interesting cut make this dress a 5/5.

links_reviews_title: Perfect combo of classy and sexy
links_reviews_text: I didn't have enough in the bust to fill it out, so I had to get cups. The criss-cross location was initially awkward, but I got used to it after a few minutes. It was very comfortable, and I wore it for 10 hours. Color was great, and I felt beautiful.

links_reviews_title: I was a seat filler at the Tony Awards but this beautiful dress made me feel like a Broadway star!
links_reviews_text: I run a 8-12 depending on the dress, I got a 10L but could have easily gotten a 8L, it's so flowy. I felt confident, fabulous and sexy in this dress! It took to boob tape quite well, I'd definitely recommend using it to feel a bit more secure! It went great with the Luca Lariat Necklace I also got. The color is brilliant! The only issue I had was that even the "Long" size was much too short, and I'm only 5' 11", it stopped an inch or two above my ankle in flats. I've had this issue before with RTR, so tall ladies be aware!

links_reviews_title: I felt amazing in this dress.
links_reviews_text: I could have done a size lower, I was worried about the back being tight so I ordered a 8. I loved the material and just everything about the dress.
Rented this for back up For formal. Wore it to brunch the next day instead .

Incredibly flattering (even for 5+ months pregnancy)! Wore 4L, I'm 5'7" and pre-pregnancy wore a size 2. Definitely need a large B or C cup to fill the top. Back zip is short (approximately 4") and doesn't gap even if it doesn't fit super close (though probably hangs too low for Spanx, which you won't need because the fabric is super thick and drapey). Highly recommend!

The fit was good. The nice size lower would have been probably better but it wasn't available at the time. The overall fit was loose/flowy which made dancing nice, but the top was too big and finding the right bra insert was extremely hard. Definitely used a lot of tape to keep everything in place. Regardless I loved the dress, felt extremely sexy and beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Amazing fit and perfect for a formal event!
links_reviews_text: This dress was Perfect for a gala we attended. Sexy yet sophisticated. I received tons of compliments and loved that I had something other than black!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress for a Beach Wedding!
links_reviews_text: This was for my best friend's wedding on the beach in the Keys. The dress fit perfectly and I go back and forth between a 4-6 so I was nervous! Classy and sleek. The back of the dress is to die for!

links_reviews_title: Great dress, very secure and photographs well!
links_reviews_text: Very small on top... wasn't a problem for me, but something to be wary of! I'm 5'7" and wore 3" heels and the longer length was perfect.
Fits perfect, good if you are bustier and want to show it off a little!

links_reviews_title: It fit so perfectly and I got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Try to side fit. I was a little worried that I would fall out of it but the dress is secure and snug around the chest.

Loved this dress! Even though I'm 5'5", I went with the petite so I could wear flats to dance the night away and it was the perfect length. If you want to wear heels at that height, definitely need the Regular length. It was so comfortable and surprising light for being a long dress. The color of the dress in my picture does not do this true cobalt blue justice. I got so many compliments, that I can't believe I had to give it back. Definitely a must rent!

links_reviews_title: Perfect combo of sexy and classy
links_reviews_text: Perfect length with a 3" heel. Compliments all night long. I ended up taping in some cups that are used in bikini tops (yay fashion tape) and felt completely comfortable all night.
I am usually a 6 but the 4 worked better for me which made me feel amazing I think this runs a little large though great for my ego :)

Loved this dress. I didn't feel like I was too exposed and it was really snug so everything stayed in place! Lots of compliments and easy to dance in! I wore it with flats since it was an outdoor wedding. It was the perfect length
STUNNING DRESS!!!!! Wore for prom, 130 and 5'4" and the 4P was the perfect size for me!!

links_reviews_title: A bright blue beacon amongst a sea of black
links_reviews_text: I loved the bright royal blue color of this dress. The criss-cross detail of the back is to die for. I felt secure in the bust area with just sticky bra pads. Definitely a comfortable, elegant choice for a wedding!
Wore 4P could have probably ordered one or two sizes down.

links_reviews_title: Dress was beautiful and fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: Elegant and comfortable!
I'm 5'9", 150 lbs, and a 34B. Fit perfectly with 3 inch heels! Loved this dress! Didn't need to wear a bra

links_reviews_title: Beautiful blue color - great for larger-chested gals!
links_reviews_text: This was a backup and I didn't end up wearing it. Great quality, beautiful royal color, gorgeous style. I just couldn't come close to filling out the top. I'm a 36A and even with a bit of padding, I still had a ton of room in the bust. Super-comfortable though!

links_reviews_title: this dress was so comfy!! the color was vibrant and I had no issues with the top part slipping.
links_reviews_text: na

links_reviews_title: Great over my 6 month old pregnant belly!
links_reviews_text: I really wanted the 2L because of my pregnant belly and that I am 5'10. But they only had the R in stock and it fit but you could see my shoes a bit. But I got so many compliments and it was so pretty! I love that it is a backless dress and color was beautiful!!

links_reviews_title: I was a Queen in this dress
links_reviews_text: I've rented plenty of RTR dresses, but this has been the best. The dress fits like a glove, hugged my waist, and held my boobs as snuggly as my boyfriend does. I would recommend this gown to women with curves and a little waist/hourglass figure. The dress holds your waist without feeling suffocating, and curves up around your belly so you can eat food without looking pregnant. If you're serious about renting this dress PLEASE READ THIS TIP: the straps are dependent on the tension in the cups!! The more you fill the cup space, the more securely this dress will hold your boobs. Please look at the model and how the straps criss cross and wrap around to form the bodice! I ended up wearing the 0 when I normally wear a 2 BECAUSE the dress is fitted in the torso, not your hips! I felt safer and less likely to spill my goodies in the 0. This dress is a 10/10 show stopper and I wish I took more pictures in it!!

I wore this for a beach wedding, and it was perfect. It fit well, was light and comfortable, and easy to dance in. I had many many compliments from other guests. My only complaint is that it was a little long, but I mean.. I was barefoot on the beach. I think it's probably fine with some shoes on a flat surface.
I'm 5'10 and wore a 4L. I wish it was an inch or two longer but overall fit very well. Even though it has a plunging neckline, I never felt as if I was going to fall out of it. Even while dancing!

links_reviews_title: Cobalt literally looks great on everyone
links_reviews_text: This dress was absolutely gorgeous. It traveled well to a wedding out-of-state and was great for tearing up the dance floor. With a little dress tape to keep the top in place, it is perfect. The open back was definitely my favorite detail and I received lots of compliments.

I wore this dress for a friend's wedding at a museum. It was a little more revealing than what I'm personally used to, but I received a lot of compliments from other females at the wedding. It was super comfortable as well, which is always a plus!

links_reviews_title: True to size, comfortable, sexy and gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: Rented for the Navy ball. Loved this dress! Would definitely rent it again or even buy it. Definitely needed to stuff the chest a little bit and used garment tape but didn't have any issue with it slipping or shifting. Very comfortable and easy to move in. It's well made and a beautiful bold blue. I got tons of compliments.

It's a gorgeous color that will certainly make you stand out, ESPECIALLY because off the very open back. The back opening goes very low, so keep that in mind (you can see in the pics.) I had to use sticky boobs, which were a little hard to position since there are cuts and openings everywhere on the dress. Overall, I got a lot of compliments but I wasn't in love with the way the top fit. The color is beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Super fun and easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a reunion. It was a hot day and the open back was perfect. I'm pretty small on top and the size 2 fit snuggly. I also have a booty so this dress really showed off my smallest features and hid the hips. And I could eat! I wore the 2L bc they were sold out of 2R. I had 3+ inches heels and I had to use hem tape to hem it about 2". I think the 2R would have been perfect for my 5'5" frame.

After reading reviews, I was pretty sure I needed a 0R, but it wasn't available so I went with the 2R and 0P. The 2R was a little loose in the bust - it could have worked but the seams made me look too pointy.
