The 0P was a little short but the right fit everywhere else, and no one besides me seemed to notice or care about the length. I ended up taking off my shoes to dance anyway which made it perfect! The top of this dress is tight enough to keep everything in place while the bottom is flowy and beautiful and extremely forgiving. It's comfortable and unique while still being classy. I felt beautiful in this dress and my husband loved it too!

Rented this for a charity gala - it fit perfectly. The 6 was great - I'm a 27.5 waist and 36 busy, 5'3. The shoulders were tricky, but I used the built in hooks to keep it attached to the cami I wore under it (no bra) and they stayed up all night. Even while dancing! There isn't a lot of movement in the arms, but you can still manage. The color is amazing, exactly as pictured. There's a slight pull in the front bottom, but it's hardly noticeable. Would def recommend!!

It's difficult to see in the photo but it's the only one we took. I wore this dress for a Valentine's dinner date and my boyfriend loved the super low neckline. I wore a U-shaped backless bra just to keep everything in place and to avoid anything slipping out. I have put on a few extra pounds lately but my usual size 4 still fit, and I was able to zip up the 2 as well, so I would recommend sizing down for a back up. I also have a short torso and the fit was a little weird around the waist.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress. Sexy, fun, different, and busty!
links_reviews_text: It fit really well, the only negative was that the sleeves to begin to slide down almost off the shoulders, so I was constantly readjusting because it is impossible to wear a bra with this dress. The length was nice too because since it is so revealing up top, I was hoping it wouldn't ALSO be super short (I am 5'8 and often times short dresses are too short on me). The sleeves were pretty loose and a little short on me but I didn't mind it. Loved the dress, got tons of compliments on my 30th Birthday.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel beautiful and sexy without being too much.
links_reviews_text: I have broad shoulders and muscular arms so dresses with fitted with sleeves can be a challenge. I could have used a smidge more room in the arms but going up in size would have made the rest of the dress too big. I loved the color and comfort and would wear this again.

links_reviews_title: Out of my comfort zone, but a showstopper!
links_reviews_text: This is such a jaw dropping dress! I use fashion tape to keep the shoulders in place and petals to cover my chest. There is no stretch at all to this, so dance moves were a little limited. Overall, I felt amazing wearing it and got SO many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Sexy but not too sexy for a formal event
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'2" about 120 ish lbs and wore a size 0. I'm normally a 2 in clothes but opted to get both a 2 and 0 in the dress. The size 2 was a little loose and baggy. The 0 fit really well, and throughout the night loosened up just a little bit. I used body tape at the shoulders and cleavage area to keep the dress from falling or gaping and didn't have any issues. It fit really well for a fall wedding theme and I got some compliments on it as well. Overall a really great dress to wear.

I had been waiting to wear this dress. Omg the plunge in the front is low; I had to run out and grab a bandeau. Loved it. It did slightly slip off my shoulder but not annoying enough to takeaway from my love for this one.

Very deep cut but actually fit my chest very well without a bra. Unfortunately, too booby for a family wedding. The length is a little long/conservative for how chesty it is - odd combo. But it is beautiful and fits well otherwise!

This dress fit perfect, only very minor con was the chest area was a little, tiny bit loose (I'm a D size and wore a 0) so I had to adjust myself every so often and the sleeves would fall when I danced, but other than that (I'm sure it could be avoided with boob tape, which I didn't have) the dress is beautiful, the v in front is very low but it's a very flattering dress and great quality.
Extremely low-cut. Bra was completely out.

links_reviews_title: This DVF dress was unforgettable! Such a fan of this lacy, green number.
links_reviews_text: First off, you will need to invest in some dress tape to use with it. But not a problem as long as you use right on the edges of where it is up against your chest. This dress will definitely make you stand up taller and make sure you have good posture throughout the night, but it's worth it. I loved this dark, olivey, green color. It's a perfect length for a 5'4" person too.
The dress was pretty but there was no way it was going to stay on my shoulders without tape. I didn’t wear this dress but picked another
Tight, sexy and beautiful
This dress is great for a party. The color is different and the lace is great for many occasions. Just be warned that it is extremely low cut, so you probably can't wear a bra.

links_reviews_title: The dress was beautiful and looked just like the pictures. I received multiple compliments.
links_reviews_text: The lace sleeves did not have much give, so I had to size up to the 14 since I have bigger arms. I had to wear a bralette underneath the dress because the bust area did not cover much. If you have a larger chest, be careful. The shoulders slipped a little but the bra clasps really helped the dress stay up. I had to adjust a little bit throughout the night, but it wasn't too bad. Overall this was a great dress!
Very sexy! Only downside is that on me the sleeves didn't stay up as much as I would have liked.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a formal Christmas party
links_reviews_text: I wore this at a formal work Christmas party. The dress fits well and I received compliments on it. I chose to wear a lace bandeau underneath because it's very low cut. I also used the little hooks on the top of the sleeves by the shoulders to hook it onto my bandeau so the sleeves didn't fall off my shoulders. I noticed without doing this, the sleeves kept falling down.

I loved this dress but had to be very attentive to the neckline all night. The fit of the dress actually made it supportive in the bust (along with fashion tape). If you have narrow shoulders, this dress might not work for you. I have broad shoulders & still needed tape to keep the shoulders from sliding off.

links_reviews_title: Definitely an attention getter dress! Gor compliments all night wearing this to a wedding. Loved it!
links_reviews_text: Tape was my best friend. Can't wear a bra with this dress had to use KT tape for the girls and fashion tape to keep the shoulders up. Couldn't lift my arms due to the sleeves but wasn't an issue. Otherwise fit great! Room to breathe and move everywhere else. Loved the color and felt great in it!
It is a very beautiful dress. I would maybe size up just because I was unable to raise my hands above my head.
Very tight fitting and sexy dress! Loved the lace sleeves. Would def recommend even for a curvy girl with hips like me.

links_reviews_title: Elegant and classy for a Fall wedding
links_reviews_text: I wore a size 4 and it fit perfectly. Didn't need a bra since the dress held the girls in place which I was super happy about. I read reviews saying that the shoulders/sleeves were tight but I didn't have that experience - I did have to adjust the shoulders at times, but overall I didn't have any major issues and I thought this dress was very comfortable. Would definitely rent again!

I wore this dress for a wedding and received so many compliments on it! I rented a size 10 and 12 and the 10 fit perfectly! I'm 165lbs and 5'4" so I'm happy the 12 was too big! The only thing I had to do was use fashion tape on my shoulders to keep the sleeves from falling down. I also used tape along my breast area just incase (seeing as how it's a deep v neck line). I would absolutely rent this dress again and would recommend it!!

I wore this dress to a wedding- absolutely loved this dress & got so many compliments! I was worried about the top being so low cut as I'm a 34c/32d but as long as you have double sided fashion tape you're all good! The dress was absolutely stunning, wished I could have kept it! The only thing I will say is as someone who is on the shorter side (5'4") with a shorter torso and hourglass my waist is small so the 2 fit almost perfect and because it was a smaller size the torso of the dress was shorter which would have helped to hold in my chest better than the size 4 which was a bit longer & definitely required tape to hold in place but because I have larger arms the 2 didn't work very well as the sleeves felt too snug so I ended up wearing the 4. If you're someone who has larger arms & a small waist/ average hips & a hard time with sleeves fitting, this dress will be no different so if 2 sizes generally fit you may need to go the larger size but rest assured they waist/hip measurement difference between the 2 sizes generally isn't too much so it shouldn't be a big deal! Best dress yet!

links_reviews_title: Heads turned when I walked through the door..
links_reviews_text: I went to an awards ceremony. The dress ran a tad small. The middle area has no give at all so I needed reinforcement to get the zipper up. I usually wear a 12 but wore a 14. I had to use a clothing hack to the front busy area as I was afraid one wrong move and my girls would have joined the ceremony. Overall the dress was beautiful. I received compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: Great color and enough wiggle room to be comfortable.
links_reviews_text: This dress definitely has a deep V that was not acceptable for the event I was going to, so I wore a camisole underneath. I found that the sleeves were a little hard to stay on my shoulders even though I felt like I filled out the chest area. Overall it worked out well, but beware of the deep neckline on this dress.

The dress is very beautiful and comfortable. I received a lot of compliments. I did have to tape my shoulders and chest to prevent the top half from slipping down. It would be great if the shoulders had some silicone or something to keep them in place

links_reviews_title: I have literally never received so many compliments on a dress as I did this night.
links_reviews_text: Fits very well but I was happy I took two sizes and went with the smaller one (size 2.) Only con is that it wears a little strange in the chest, so don't expect to be raising your arms in the air much the night you wear it. Feels gorgeous, looks gorgeous, and is super elegant.

links_reviews_title: LOVE THIS DRESS! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I was worried this was too much for an almost 40 year old but this dress looks fantastic! I got so many compliments. It is tight fitting so if you wear a 2, maybe get a 4 for backup. I would have had more room in a 4 but I think the shoulders would have been way too loose. I kept tugging at the shoulders (no bra) but other than that, great dress! I didn't want to take it off!

links_reviews_title: I wasn't able to wear it
links_reviews_text: The dress arrived ripped. I immediately returned the dress.

Wasnt sure if i would wear this because it was so low cut but i added a black lace bralette under which helped some. The 6 or the 4 would have worked but the 6 was a bit looser in the top. Overall it is a great dress, but its too low cut even for a small chested girl to be considered conservative. The material also doesnt have much stretch to it.
Wore to a holiday party! Love it, felt amazing in it! Double sided tape on the shoulders prevented them from slipping off. And fit my bust great! They stayed in place!

Talk about feeling like a supermodel all night! I received so many compliments on this dress! Definitely not for the shy or reserved. Very low cut so I wore a lace bralette underneath that helped "tone down" the boob action. Zipper was super hard to get up, ended up being a 2 person job. Definitely recommend sizing up for those with a full chest like mine. Otherwise, I loved this dress and didn't want to take it off!

This dress was a showstopper for sure! I ended up renting it from the store after the original dress I ordered didn't fit right. It is definitely more cleavage-baring than anything I'm generally comfortable wearing but it photographed beautifully and was very flattering. I think if I had broader shoulders I would have been a lot more comfortable dancing. I didn't wear fashion tape or any kind of bra when I wore this dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a fall wedding at a vineyard!
links_reviews_text: The dress was pretty low cut so I wore a black bralette with it. Which worked perfect! It was very flattering and I didn't want to return it!

I probably could have sized down for this dress. It was truly comfortable and looked amazing. I did use a boat load of fashion tape to keep the top in place. Definitely a show stopper dress! Was so happy I got over my reservations and wore it!
Fit very true to size and a great length. Is low cut in front so could do without a bra. Great color combo.

I LOVED this dress and had my eye on it for a while - finally rented it for a recent wedding and loved it. However, the only downfall was how low the front was. I had read some previous reviews though and someone else had worn a lace cami under the dress and so did I - simple solution to be able to wear such a beautiful dress.
This dress was beautiful. I wore it to my husband's bday dinner at an upscale restaurant. I kept my shawl on all night though because my breasts were very exposed.
I loved the dress! If you plan to dance beware, it's low! But beautiful and comfortable material

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous Dress for a Gala event
links_reviews_text: Got compliments from women and men...really nice dress although not long enough as I wished for. Paired it with nice sandals and solved the issued. I'm 5'10. Delivery was super fast!
Perfect dress for Mardi Gras ball. Received a ton of complements and was surprisingly comfortable. Gave me curves I didn't know I had!
This dress is truly amazing! It looks even more beautiful in person! I received tons of compliments. I will use RTR for my next event!

What a great experience! Loved that 2 sizes were sent , I tend to order big so it was nice to have the option to try on the other size. Got my order 2 days earlier, that took the fear of the unknown away. And love that I put it back in the bag it came in the day after the event and dropped it off at the shipping place.

Got this for a black-tie gala. Initially was not too thrilled by it (most particularly b/c the hem is slightly high-lo (little higher in the front and puddles in the back) but the pic suggested an even hem, but once on and I had to navigate in it, it looked fine. Got many compliments on the dress. The curve-hugging nature and the full back made it sexy and alluring w/out looking/feeling cheap. Things to note...w/ a complete back out, wearing a bra was not possible--that was okay for this 34A, but those w/ greater bosom will want to be aware. A strapless, corset bra is possible w/ this dress, but would have to ensure that the corset has a sufficiently deep "V" in the back. A 2nd consequence of the back out/low back is that foundation garment options are limited--if the waist is too high, it will show in the back. The dress pairs nicely with silver accessories. I almost went w/ a silver glitter shoe, but opted instead for a navy blue suede block heel. I"m 5'8", 148 lbs and normally wear a 6 or 8, Misses. I ordered a 4L and an 8L (6L was umavail) and the fit seemed identical between the two. For my evening, I went w/ the 4L (vanity), but paired it w/a low-medium confined foundation garment to keep things smooth looking.

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect for the event!
links_reviews_text: The dress was perfect for the event however it was very short on me. I ordered the long and even flat footed it was too short.

I am a sucker for backless dresses and this one did not disappoint. The material has give to it which is good for eating and dancing! I wear between a 4 and 6 and the 4 fit perfectly. I'm 5'6" and with two and a half inch heels the dress was about a half inch above the ground which was perfect for me. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: I attended a NYE party and I wanted a nice formal sparkly gown...this was the perfect dress!!!
links_reviews_text: I rented the 8R and it fit perfectly. It wasn't too tight or too loose for my frame. Perfect dress to have fun in and dance!

First time renting and was amazed at the dresses when they came in! Also go them 3 days early so i could try on and figure out perfect accessories. This dress is a show stopper! Especially from the back with the low plunge. Had so many comments all night! Dress fits true to size and I wore 4"heels. The train is a tad longer in back but with my heels it did not touch floor. Great for dancing!
This is a great, stretchy and forgiving gown. It shows off your back and has wide straps that allow for lots of assistance from tape on the boobs.
Very beautiful! Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Fast delivery, both dresses were ready to wear and easy return
links_reviews_text: This dress was like wearing pajamas it was so comfortable! As far as sizing, I could've worn the 2L but it was a little too long and this way i got to wear a lower, more comfortable shoe. I didn't wear a bra but it wasn't necessary. The color was a little more blue than i was expecting but it was gorgeous! I go So many compliments all night, i highly recommend!
Gorgeous dress, reasonably comfortable considering all the sequins. Received a ton of compliments on this dress and would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Go-to dress if you want to straight SLAY!
links_reviews_text: This dress does NOT disappoint! The 4 for perfect - except that I was only able to order it in Long due to a processing issue with my first order. If it weren't so long, I would've worn it. This dress is an absolute stunner without being "too extra."
Fabulous dress. Too many compliments, if that is possible.
Beautiful color, shimmer and sparkle.

links_reviews_title: Glamorous look for a fundraiser event
links_reviews_text: I have never felt so glamorous! This event is referred to as the annual adult prom. Standing, sitting and dancing were all very comfortable in this amazing gown. The sequins sparkled and the silk trim was elegant. Of course, the low back was very sexy in an understated way. I (5' 7") got the long and taped it up in front which created a lovely small train. It was my favorite of many RTR dresses!!

links_reviews_title: I wore the dress for a black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: The dress was a bit loose on me but I made it work. I got lots of complements on it - it's a lovely color and stunning.

Wore this dress to a gala and it was a hit! I received so many compliments. I ended up going with the 8R due to the length of the dress. The 6R fit better but it seemed short. Dress is very sexy yet classy and photographs well. Would definitely rent again

links_reviews_title: I always wear jeans to work. This stunning dress made a huge impression on my coworkers and friends.
links_reviews_text: The only con in this dress was the inside slip. With every movement the slip would twist further and further. I had to go the restroom a lot to untwist the slip so that I could breath.
I had a hairdresser create a sixties updo with all kinds of braiding in the back and tucked into a bun made splash. Everyone thought I looked like a movie star.
The dress is pure quality and glamour. It fit like a glove. #NYE #iLoveRTR

This dress fit beautifully, was easy to dance in and looked great all day and evening long--this is the great thing about sequins no wrinkles and the dress looked the same as it did when I received it. I was so happy that I chose this dress when white wine was spilled on me and it did not leave spot; the closest contender would have shown the spillage :)

Loved this so much. Fit true to size. Fabric has a bit of stretch. I was concerned it wouldn't fit my lower body (I'm very pear shaped) but it hugged my curves amazingly. I felt like a movie star! Got tons of compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: This dress was stunning. It has the right amount of simmer I was looking for.
links_reviews_text: I rented sizes 10R and 12R. Although both fit, I ultimately wore the 12R because the area around the waist was more comfortable once the dress was zipped. I was also pleased that the sequins didn’t feel itchy.
Dress fit well and was comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I went to a very nice Gala and felt very elegant.
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly. I wore 2" heels. I had to wear a sticky strapless bra. I didn't see a way to wear a bra with this dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress definitely made me feel Red Carpet WORTHY!!! Thanks RTR!!!
links_reviews_text: This dress is true to size. I normally wear a size 4 and it fit me really good. I decided to get both the regular and the long because I wasn’t sure which shoe I would wear. The long worked out perfectly with my5’6 height and 3-inch heels!!!

links_reviews_title: This dress is so much prettier on and in person! Love love love it
links_reviews_text: Runs pretty true to size. Are usually wear a six or an eight in dresses and the eight just seemed a little bit too big so I wore a six with some spanks and I think it fit just about perfect

This dress is an eye-catcher. The full sequins captures attention up front, the backless feature captures attention from behind. Snug fit that highlights all the lumps and bumps, for better and for worse. I am 5'1" and the regular length with three inch heels was perfect, which is awesome because I always struggle with floor length. Having said that, I also filled out the dress everywhere else which helps with the length. Bonus: I was able to wear waste-high Spanx, as the backless part of the dress doesn't go down too far. Received tons of compliments. Would order/wear again. Tip: get a stick on bra that truly fits you. (Might need to go bigger than you think) It took me a couple tries to get the right size and place it in just the right spot.

links_reviews_title: Didn't know what to do with the neck
links_reviews_text: The top of the arm opening hit me in an awkward spot. The draped neck was hard to style and was silky, so wouldn't have stayed in place. I also tried the neck up like the picture of the model on the website, but that didn't look right either.

This dress was EVERYTHING. I wore it to a gala benefit and received so many compliments. The sequins were not scratchy in the least, and the dress had quite a bit more stretch than I had anticipated. It fit like a glove and stayed put all night. Even on the dance floor. The only downside is that there is no built in bra or any type of chest support. For reference, I am a very athletic build, 129 LBS, and 5’5” with a big booty.

links_reviews_title: I was nominated for an animation award and this dress made me feel like a star.
links_reviews_text: Dress runs true to size - I'm between a 2 and a 4 so the 4R was a little roomy in the waist, but it wasn't terribly noticeable - the fabric has some stretch to it. The NuBra that RTR had on hand was incredibly helpful in seamlessly filling out the bust (I don't have a whole lot going on there and the back is too low for a traditional bra). But the back cowl is really what makes the dress unique - I wore it with black gloves and went full Golden Age of Hollywood and I got a ton of compliments. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a late December wedding!
links_reviews_text: The color and fit of this dress were amazing. Though it is a sequined gown, it was lightweight and comfortable to wear. I didn't have any issues with the back sash, as noted by some other reviewers. Since the back is open, I wore sticky cups for my bra and they worked perfectly. I received many compliments on the color of the dress and was happy to wear something other than the usual black you typically see at a formal event. The length in the front as pictured is definitely shorter than the back so if you're looking for a longer fit or plan to wear high heels, I'd recommend getting the Long. I am 5'5 and wore 3-inch heels and couldn't have gone much higher without the dress looking too short. Overall, another RTR success!

links_reviews_title: Wore a lulu bra so my back wasn’t as exposed. Very flattering dress. Show stopper!
links_reviews_text: Body con but still hid my small Xmas food belly. I’m closer to 145 these days and not as slim as usual but the gown was still beautiful. Highly recommend!

I'm tall and curvy and usually wear a 12-14 depending on designer and if it sits loose on my curves. I wished it was longer for me but the 14L worked for me. I loved how the back drapes and I was able to pull off an elegant look comfortably.

links_reviews_title: Always a perfect fit with Badgley Mishka
links_reviews_text: I'm always a big fan of pairing navy blue and black together. This dress did not disappoint! The back is stunning.

links_reviews_title: This dress is amazing! I received compliments all night long.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect and the length was perfect. I'm 5'5" and it did not drag the floor all night.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a classy mermaid
links_reviews_text: This dress wasn't my first choice, but both of the people who rented my original choice in the 2 different sizes turned them in too dirty/damaged and I had to select new options (kinda bummed about that, TBH, but I know it's not exactly RTR's fault). I have no complaints, however, about the dress itself. It fit beautifully, draped nicely, and had a very unique neck/back piece that made me feel just a little more sophisticated. As for underwear, I opted for some spanx and the chicken cutlet stick on bra (the dress is basically backless). Everything looked fab. It's nice and heavy because of the sequins and is a tiny bit lower in the back than in the front, so even through it dragged a tiny bit (I'm 5'5" and my heels weren't very high) it wasn't hard to walk or dance in. It felt almost regal. I am happy to have worn it and also happy to not have to store it in my closet. Thank you, next!

Everyone loved this dress! That dress is FIRE is what everyone kept saying to me. I have a large chest and it showed a little too much skin for my taste, so I pinned the V just a little with a safety pin. Simple and easy fix. I am a true size 4 and wore the size 4. It fit like a glove.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for New Years. I got lots of compliments and it’s one of a kind!
links_reviews_text: It’s a wrap dress so don’t expect it to cover the bust perfectly. Secure it with a safety pin from the inside of you don’t want to fall out of it! If I owned it, I’d take it to a seamstress to a snap or button in the bodice. The weight is perfect and it fits a thin or curvy shape, of which I’m the latter right now. It’s easy to wear and if you’re concerned about showing anything accidentally then wear a bustier-type undergarment. I did not. I enjoyed this dress at a party and it never came undone, was easy to sit in. It fits your shape without being tight. This was a last minute replacement over the original jumpsuit I ordered from RTR. I couldn’t be more pleased with this dress!

This dress was great but as a standing only dress. As soon as you sit one or both girls try to pop out! :0 Would totally wear again. 0p is still a bit long, even with heels, but I love when a dress drags a bit.

Beware the SMALL slit to feed the wrap string through is very hard to find. Once you get it through though, the dress is gorgeous. I pinned the deep v cause if I bent over my boobs would definitely show. I usually wear a 4/6 in dresses & this 6 fit perfectly
A beautiful dress. I recommend a few safety pins to keep it in place and in the bust area.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, but bring a shawl/scarf
links_reviews_text: I received a ton of compliments! It was perfect for the event I attended. However, no amount of dress tape or safety pins could keep it from flying open when I sat down. I highly recommend bringing a shawl/scarf to drape over your bosom when you sit down. Other than that, it was great!

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments/ a lot of work to wear!
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous and I got tons of compliments all night. However, I had to tighten straps all the way up to try and keep the girls in when sitting (gapes terribly) which resulted in sequins rubbing in my armpit. I used fashion tape and it pulled within minutes of being on. Gorgeous dress just spent all night trying to secure it

This is a truly beautiful dress - I got compliments from several people just in the dressing room at RTR. Unfortunately I was fighting with it all night. You are well covered when standing, but as soon as you sit, the wrap skirt splits up to your thigh and the top gaps out and shows waaaay too much (it's not just cleavage). Fashion tape helped a little, but the fabric is pretty resistant because of the sequins. It was a fun dress, but by the end of the night it was a joke how much I was flashing

The fabric of this dress was amazing! I didn't end up wearing it because the top opened up too much. I thought some sticky boobs would work, but the whole dress just kept opening up everywhere and I knew I wouldn't be able to dance all night if I was tugging at it before I even left the house.

I wore this for a NYE wedding and loved it! It fit well-I have a small bust so it didn't feel too sexy (like boobs falling out) but the print made it a show stopper. Great detail and forgiving for pear shaped figure.

As previously described in past reviews, the dress is very revealing and a constant worry to make sure that the good s are intact and in place. The dress is beautiful and fit perfectly, but sitting down and bending over was a constant worry. I ended up wearing another dress for the occasion.

Unlike the other reviews, I had no problem sitting with this dress (although I never wore it out) and it wrapped around perfectly fine and mostly stayed tied. My issue was that even though it fit in the waist, ensuring proper coverage of my bottom half, I could not get the top around my chest. I do have a large bust but the fit of this was very awkward compared to the bottom. I considered wearing it with a slip underneath to cover my chest somewhat but ended up getting another dress in time instead. This dress is pretty but 2 things: most of the sequins are matte (I ended up renting a dress with VERY shiny sequins which I loved but the leopard pattern was not apparent) and it's pretty short. I'm 5'10 and this dress was the right length for me in flats.
I sized up but should have stayed at my normal size The petite was still at the floor length, but probably would be better if I stuck to the 0P.
This dress is beautiful and I received so many compliments. It was a little shorter than I would have liked but other than that it fit very well. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments! I was the best dressed person all night!
links_reviews_text: Lovely gown. True to size and it was long in length, I'm 5'9, and a regular 12-14. The top layers were kinda odd, so if your chesty, order up!
I originally ordered the 6 and it did not fit around my ribs/chest. The 8 fit perfectly. I received a ton of compliments at the event.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress!! Wore for a formal event.
links_reviews_text: I couldn’t zip the 10L all the way up in the back. The 12L was PERFECT. The dress looked like it was made for me! So many complements — highly recommend. Wore 3 inch heels and the length was great.
Glad I went with the larger size. I would not have been able to fit the 8. The length was great and the shoulder straps were a bit burdensome but I got through it.

links_reviews_title: Great for a photo but that's it. I'm 5'5 and had to tape up 5 in (literally) to be able to walk.
links_reviews_text: Besides being extremely too long it was so uncomfortable. I thought I might have accidentally gotten a tall, but no. Hard to walk in. I had to ask my date to slow down while I shuffled behind. I couldn't lift my arms. No dancing. No problems with it being too tight or falling down. It was beautiful!
The dress fit perfectly and was so flattering! The only issue: the zipper got stuck putting on and taking off at the part where the fabric is sewn. Gorgeous dress! So many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Most compliments I have ever received
links_reviews_text: I ordered five dresses for a diplomatic gala, and this one was my absolute favorite. It fit like a glove, I wore it without a bra, and it looked great. I did get the long because regular was not available, but with some double-sided tape, it worked out just fine. I love this dress. It made me feel elegant and beautiful, and even strangers would compliment me on the look.

8R fits very true to size. The texture in the front was great and made the dress more unique. It also helps cover any tummy pooches. Received great compliments and worth wearing to Galas, Weddings or any event with a great excuse to dress up!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a black-tie wedding
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a winter wedding and it was amazing. I'm tall (a little over 5'11") and slim, so finding dresses that work can be difficult. The length was perfect, as was the fit. The only drawback was the fabric over the arms. It's a little tight to dance in, but not enough for me to give it anything but 5 stars.

links_reviews_title: "Reminiscent of Pretty Woman" is how my sister described it
links_reviews_text: Mostly true to size, maybe a tad larger (but smaller size just a bit too snug). "Long" length makes it a very long dress ... at 5'9" with super high heels, it was very long. Good structure. Lots of compliments. Very pleased

links_reviews_title: Great dress, great fit - hides problem areas
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress- got lots of compliments on it. Flattering fit for curvy/hourglass. Had to get long since regular was unavailable, was able to make it with tall heels but for anyone under 5’8 I’d recommend regular
This looked and felt great!

links_reviews_title: Symphony gala. Perfect dress for the event.
links_reviews_text: My favorite rental to-date. I received so many compliments on this dress. I love the structured cut. Very flattering.

links_reviews_title: I was able to secure an evening gown without paying the gown prices.
links_reviews_text: I am glad I read the reviews. The dress had a snug fit. No much give for movement. Lots of compliments on color and style.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a black tie wedding in Laguna Beach
links_reviews_text: This dress was a great pop of color and I received compliments on it all evening. I'm tall, so the long was the right move for me in heels. The off-the-shoulder detail was really flattering. I was frustrated that the clothing straps keep creeping up the front and back- you can see it in the picture. I'm not sure what the policy is on removing them because if I owned that dress, they would have been cut off immediately. There's a little more material than I would have preferred in the midsection, but it was super comfortable for a whole night of dancing.

links_reviews_title: It’s absolutely stunning on! Received a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The fit is pretty true to size and there is a bit of give, but not much. Awesome pick for a statement dress!

This dress was great for a black tie event! The fabric is thick and comfortable. The cinched waist is very flattering. I did have some trouble with the zipper on the 6R, and it was a little tight on the rear. I ended up wearing the 8R. The 8 was a little big in the chest but wearing a nice bra helped. I thoroughly enjoyed the dress!

Thank God for RTR! I needed a bridesmaid dress for my friend's wedding. Yes I waited to the last minute. Found this gem and loved it. It fit like a glove and I received so many complaints. Would def rent this dress again. Thank you RTR.

This dress is lovely! Great material and so comfortable. I usually wear an 8 and it did fit like a glove, but I ended up wearing the 10 just because I knew I would be eating and drinking and wanted the wiggle room. I would say this is absolutely true to size though. So pretty.
It will surprise you with how well made, structured, and forgiving it is.

I am 5'8", and wore 3.5" heels. I rented the 4L and the 4R. The 4L completely covered my shoes and dragged on the floor a little bit, so I wore the 4R. I had to pin the front "flap" as it was unattached when I received it. I was able to wear a strapless bra. It does not have a lot of movement, so dancing would not be easy. I also had to walk with a shorter stride. Even though there were a couple negatives, I loved the look of the dress!

This dress is a perfect dress for a gala/formal affair. Very form fitting and thick material. It is true to size. I wore 4in heels and the L was perfect as I am 5'8. I would totally recommend this dress

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Felt glam, classy and sexy
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress. The slight boning creates a really nice hourglass shape. A little hard to dance (hard to raise arms or get down low without a slit). But still loved the true red color

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments about this dress. A lady in red is always a show stopper.
links_reviews_text: This dress does not stretch, so make sure you order your specific size.

Wore this to a black tie preferred wedding and i received SO many compliments. Pretty tight but fit well. Minimal leg movement but the dress was so stunning I did not care. Slit up the back was very tasteful. Obsessed with this gown! Highly recommended!

My favorite among a lot of great RTR dresses.....this dress is COMFORTABLE, extremely figure flattering, and just gorgeous. No Spanx required. The worst thing I can say about it is that it's so memorable that it will be tough for me to ever re-wear it.
I received so many compliments throughout the gala. This dress really hid my problem areas and gave me such movement to dance.
This dress hit the spot for a "Hollywood glam" awards event. It is definitely long but fit well everywhere else. Super comfortable for a formal dress.

This dress is so comfortable and so flattering. I usually wear a 10L, but it wasn't available so I had to wear a 12L. It was a little loose around my waist but I think it's better to be loose than too tight, because the details in the front fabric pull apart if it's stretched too tight. I got a million complements and felt so wonderful all night. I'm 5'10" and could only wear a 2" heel, even with the long size - so tall girls DEFINITELY order a long size, even if you're wearing a flat.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress and very flattering for covering a tummy! Very flattering for a straight body type!
links_reviews_text: Perfect for the formal heart gala I went to! True to size! For reference, I'm 5'4", 125 lbs and wore size 4R.

This was a last minute shipment because my original order wasn't available. This dress was PERFECT. Size 6 was great (I usually tend to wear a 4) and no spanx were needed because of the layers on front - very flattering on my stomach area. Length was great with fairly short heels (2in) and I'm 5'5". It was a black tie wedding and EVERYONE kept complimenting me and more than once I was told I look like a movie star! This is probably the 10th time I've used RTR and this was by far the best look.

My husband and sister both thought this was flattering on me, but I'm on the large size of 12 and even with shapewear I felt like it would be uncomfortable after awhile. A few lbs/ 1/2" slimmer and it would have been great.

links_reviews_title: I felt like I was at the oscars!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for an awards show for Advertising. I was so different with the detail on the front! The fabric was giving! I have curves and a bigger booty. The dress was very fitted in that area - so if you have curves size up! I at first had a bra on but the ribbing if the front became so tight that in the car ride to the place I had a friend unhook my bra instant comfort. I slid that bra right out and went braless. It was a great dress and served me well. I felt like a Star. I just wish I wore my hair down and more loose with it. Haha.

I could not love this dress more. It's dynamite. It's stunning. It's comfortable, crazily enough! The red is a deep red with blue undertones (as opposed to orange). It runs small, IMO. I'm usually an 8 and I wore a 10 long. Caution about length: if you're 5'10 and under, I'd say go with regular. The long was very long. I cannot tell you how many compliments I received, and I'm even contemplating buying it (although I've never paid that much for a dress!) This one is a keeper!
Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress with unique details. Curvy girls, size up!
links_reviews_text: Pros: This dress is a gorgeous color and very unique. I received compliments on it all night long! I wore this to a black tie gala, where I danced the night away in it, despite it being pretty tight. The details around the midsection are very forgiving and, while I wore a NuBra, you really don't need to wear one. Cons: The reviews said this runs large, so I ordered a size lower as my backup dress. I could barely squeeze into my normal size! It fit my top well (I'm 36B), but my large booty about ripped the seams. Luckily, I didn't bust anything, but big booty girls should SIZE UP.
For like a glove, form flattering and made a girl feel confident for charity gala

links_reviews_title: Felt like royalty in this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress had a nice stretchy material so that it hugged every curve. The cut of the dress in the front was very forgiving, so that I was able to eat well without developing a "pooch" lol. I was complimented allll night long and I felt gorgeous. I would rent this dress again! #royalty #glamorous #nubianqueen
This red dress fit a bit big but was so comfortable and perfect! The color is truly outstanding and fits so flattering. I'm normally an 8L & the 10L was a tad big but length was perfect.
Loved this dress! It was so comfortable! And very flattering! Wore it for a roaring 20s themed event.
The fit was perfect, very flattering. I got a lot of compliments not only on the dress but how it made me look. Would definitely recommend!

Needed a dress for an event where black-tie dress was encouraged. Fit was great. I am 5' 6" 155lbs and usually wear a size 6. Small was tight but the stretch made it fit well. My backup size was a med and this was just a tad too big through the waist. Overall the dress was very comfortable and flattering. The adjustable straps made it easy to ensure a perfect fit.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a speakeasy charity event.
links_reviews_text: I’m typically a size 10/12 and the large fit great. The straps are also adjustable.
Comfortable fit, easy to move in.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for our Valentines Day evening. Fit was great and the dress was very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size.

links_reviews_title: This dress exceeded my expectations.. it beautiful in person.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. Super comfortable and has a little stretch to it. Fully lined.. I would definitely rent this dress again.
I am 5'6 size 12, curvy build and this fit so great and was so flattering. I will say that the sequins were a little scratchy under my arms but otherwise it was a pretty comfortable dress.

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on this dress! Very happy with it.
links_reviews_text: Overall was very comfortable and giving. Had some stretch but not too much. The sides of the dress were a little uncomfortable because it cut into my armpits a little bit and I had to readjust it every once in a while.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a 20s themed NYE party!
links_reviews_text: I danced the night away in this dress. It was comfortable and beautiful. Would definitely rent again!

This sparkly dress is a dream!!! It's beautiful, you don't need a bra, and it photographs really well! I think it runs a tiny bit small. I often wear a 2/XS in a rental but I couldn't even zip it up. The small fit perfect.

Perfect dress for a holiday date night. No less than a dozen compliments on the dress. The straps kept the dress in place and their wide nature kept the dress from feeling skimpy on top. While the length is more mid than my usual, it didn't look or feel frumpy. I was even able to wear stockings. The sequins didn't bother at all.
The dress fit a bit large with good stretch, the sequins were not very scratchy. The length felt long but gave it a sophisticated feeling.

Wore this dress for my cousin's birthday party. Very comfortable, runs true to size. I am 6ft tall and the dress was right at my knees. I'm also very busty 34I and I wore a strapless bra that worked out pretty well. Got numerous compliments!!! This dress is simple, but still has the ability to stand out!

I LOVED this dress. It was thick and stretchy, perfect to hide bumps and glide over curves! The sparkles are subtle but fun and I got tons of compliments! So comfortable. And I was able to without a bra!
Love this dress! I am wearing a S and it fits like a glove!

I didn't wear this because I liked another dress better but I plan to rent it another time. It's soft on the inside and stretchy.. Definitely a good one to rent at the last minute if you are worried about choosing the wrong size and having something not fit. I tried the XS and I've worn an S in other dresses of this brand so it runs large.

It fit like a glove and I felt super beautiful and sexy wearing it !!! I got a lot of compliments through out the night ! The only MINOR downfall was the sequins rubbing on my under arms and irritating my skin other than that, LOVE LOVE LOVE !
Dress has some stretch, was incredibly comfortable and the sequins didn't rub under your arms. This dress is super flattering and I want another occasion to rent it!

This dress was amazing! Wore it for a day wedding, in very warm weather. So comfortable and very true to size. Didn't need to wear a bra because material was fairly thick and held its shape very nicely. The dress itself is very glamorous and I felt so great and confident in it. Got compliments all night long! The adjustable straps are amazing.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and well made! Perfect for dressing up for a 20s themed event!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect. I ordered up just incase and I was glad that I did. The straps are adjustable, so I could get the neckline exactly where I wanted it to be. I did choose to wear a black bra, which I would recommend.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful sequin dress! Not irritating to wear and can wear a bra!
links_reviews_text: Went past my knees! I’m 5’8”

links_reviews_title: Such a comfortable dress!! And a phenomenal stylist experience
links_reviews_text: This dress was a back up to a back up! I am 15 weeks pregnant and finding the right size and style was a challenge. The RTR stylists were great, so helpful and patient! The dress was perfect! It has just the right amount of stretch in the fabric to be forgiving, flattering, and comfortable! My bust size increased a lot being pregnant, I am about a 36 DDD and didn't need a bra at all! The straps are adjustable which is a great win! This dress was a savior!
Loved this dress. Wore to a black tie optional wedding. Has stretch and the straps are adjustable. Hits mid calf! Love

links_reviews_title: Joint 50th birthday party with Elvis Costello as guest musician
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect. Figure fitting but not too tight and gives when you sit down. The look worked really well for me.

links_reviews_title: The dress looked great! Fun Sequins! I got a ton of compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit great. I wore spanx as I felt that gave it a smoother look, although I felt like I could have gotten away without it. I could have worn the smaller size I ordered if I had someone to help zip the dress. The straps are adjustable which is super helpful. It is also fairly forgiving for an event where you are sitting and standing quite a bit.

links_reviews_title: I got this dress as a back up.
links_reviews_text: This was a back up dress. For a different event, I would have worn it but for the type of event I was going to, it was a little to revealing. It is a heavier fabric so consider that. The sequins are gorgeous and the pattern different. I was not happy with the way it fit from the side view, and if I tugged on the length, the bulking smoothed out. I'm not sure if it was the size or the material, but it would ride up about 2 inches at the waist. A larger size would have been too big. It is a great dress. I'm 5'4" and 143 lbs and 60.

I loved the fit. I am 5'2", size 16 in dresses. I loved that you could adjust the shoulder straps to secure a good fit up top. My hips are about "44, the dress fit perfectly around my thighs. The sequins were a little rash where my arms came in contact with the side of the dress but I wore a little sweater over it and it was fine. I received many compliments.
Fits close to body and super comfy! I wanted to keep it!

I loved the form fit and ease of wearing this dress. It had just enough sparkle! I felt so sexy and amazing wearing it. My husband could hardly keep his eyes off. With the simple black wrap I already had, and a lovely short pearl choker my outfit was lovely.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress. It was perfect for my red carpet event.
links_reviews_text: The straps are adjustable, the dress has stretch and it is so comfortable. I got so many compliments. I fit in the Large, but the XL just had a bit more give.
Wore to a Texas wedding for a formal affair. Received many compliments. Runs true to size and has a nice stretch. Bonus you can wear a regular bra!!
The dress fit me perfectly. I got XS as an extra one but it was a bit tight for me. The material is very high quality. No headache for shipping or returning as well. I were so happy with my decision.
The dress has a stretch so it was nice and comfy.
Very comfortable & stretchy! I received lots of compliments, even from strangers. The only criticism is that it's a bit too long, a few inches below the knee. Really shows off curves!

links_reviews_title: This is a sexy dress with enough sparkle to stand out, even though it's black.
links_reviews_text: The medium fit a little too big, while the small was a little too tight. It's about mid-calf length, and suitable for formal, or semi-formal.

Wore this for an awards ceremony at work. It was a "red carpet affair". I loved how glamorous it was and the fit being just at my knees. I'm 5'4 and usually an 8 and the medium was perfect. I wore spanx to give me more of an hourglass feel. Very stretchy with room in the hips. The post says you can wear a regular bra-- really that's a regular strapless bra as the straps are quite thin. They are also adjustable which was great for me! I got so many compliments on this dress! If you haven't worn all sequins before it is something to adapt to, but it's worth the WOW!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. It was so comfortable. Would definitely rent again!
links_reviews_text: This dress has a lot of stretch, so it didn't feel tight. I loved the tea length. The sequins were not itchy/scratchy at all. There is a soft lining under the sequins. Size G/H breasts so I wore this with a strapless bra and felt comfortable all night. I like that the straps on this dress are adjustable for extra support. I normally wear a size 12 in everyday clothing and a 14 in dressy dresses. The extra large was perfect.
Perfect flattering fit stretchy and comfy
This dress was comfortable, beautiful, and classy. My favorite dress I have worn.
The shirt is short and the tie situation didn't stay put. Fun colors and pattern.
I liked the idea of this top and it was fun to wear, but it wasn't flattering, especially the side view.
quality is like one would expect from a high end designer. It one of those exactly as it appears. It's supper cute. Wore 4 times. May hang onto a while to wear with white jeans. No complaints.

I wanted to love this, but no matter how tight or loose, high or low, that I tied the sash, I always looked like I have a bulky midsection. It overwhelmed my frame, and the inner lining makes the garment less fluid and flowy than you'd assume based on the outer satin fabric.
It is a little short- but I think it needs to be for the fit to be correct. I just have a long torso
Just meh. Nice color combo, and fun/funky design with the tie waist, just not wowed. I'm usually a 0-2, but the only size avail was a S (2-4 in this top) and it felt big overall when trying on.
Fun to wear. True to size.

I wore this shirt for a fun date night with my husband! I love RTR because I can indulge my 'something new' habit..even for more normal events. I normally don't like many prints or stripes but this was unique enough to give it a try. The sash is not as long as pictured on the model. I tried it tied in a knot and then opted for a sinple tie/drape and secured with a few safety pins to secure. It does have a habit of riding up a bit but it was not too bad! The interior black t-shirt fabric makes it feel warmer. Plus, the other comments are true...the color are more fall toned. (the "white" stripes are more cream colored). Overall, I really liked it and woudl rent it again!

It lends itself towards autumn colors but as far as fabric and fit can be worn any time of year. I really loved this top. I just used two safety pins to hold the ties where I wanted them to stay and it worked out great. If I hadn't read other reviews and chose to pin them immediately, I'm sure it would have been annoying and come undone all night, but I avoided that frustration from the get go. I wore it to a family birthday party one night, then to work.
Loved the colors and style, fabric is gorgeous and very comfortable. My only complaint would be that the sash had a tendency to come untied as I moved so was a bit annoying to keep adjusting.

This great blouse has a very nice fabric and print, but I found myself constantly tying and re-tying the sash. It looks great from the back, and it looks great from the front, as long as you don't move. Ended up pinning the sash together in the best spot and that helped. That's why the 4 stars. Paired with high waist black jeans one night and black wide leg pants another

This blouse feels great on and it looks nice. The tie is too small for my hips so I couldn't wear it as shown in the photo of the model and had it as a waist tie instead. If you look closely at that photo you will see a tab hanging under the tie; I tucked that bit into the waist of my pants, which looked much nicer.

links_reviews_title: Fabulous top for work or weekend!
links_reviews_text: I wore this top for work and loved it. The fit was just right and it has the right amount of coverage for an office environment. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Nice top, a few points I didn't care for.
links_reviews_text: Fit well. Comfortable. I particularly liked how it reached to my elbows, I don't like tops that show my upper arms. Kept me cool. It was a nice top to wear in an office environment in the summer. Downsides: The color of the "white" stripes was very gray, made the top look like it was old. Also the way the bottom wrapped and the asymmetrical section didn't really stay put, so I had to keep tucking it in place.
I love the sash on this shirt. There is a tshirt liner on the inside that makes this very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Love this shirt. I received a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: It took a while to learn how to tie the shirt. Great material. It's not a brite red like the picture, but still loved it.
The flap didn't lay well. It didn't look bad just didn't quite sit correctly.
This top looked great on my figure. A nice way to switch it up at work--not another button down. The colors are not quite as vibrant as shown in the photo.
fit was great, no complaints. quality top.
Can be worn dressy or casual. Fits well and is nice material. Fully lined. Wore on date night and to work
I'm long waisted and found the top in XS to be a bit short.
Ok top.

links_reviews_title: Just wearing it to work today!
links_reviews_text: Fun, comfy shirt. Looks great with cream colored jeans. Sash not a problem for me, as I double knotted it, and it stayed in place.
I loved this shirt and received compliments from colleagues at work as well as strangers I came into contact with!
This top fits well. The top thru the shoulders is my least favorite part. Not that flattering but the tie makes up for it.

Definitely very generous sizing, could've ordered down one size to a small, although not unflattering at the larger size. Colors are something different. Interesting tie detail at the bottom makes the top.
This did not fit me well. It runs quite big and the colors were not at all bright as they seem in the picture.
This blouse was a great fit but I did not wear it because the colors I did not have the right color ivory pants to wear with it. But loved the quality
great top!Works great for work with black pants or for going out with white jeans.

links_reviews_title: Color off. Distracting tie. MASSIVE fit.
links_reviews_text: The black undershirt that's sewn it makes the shirt look dirty. Color is not at all what my computer screen shows.
The "flap" would have been awkward if left out - HOWEVER- it was great tucked it! It gave the illusion of a snug, clean look.

Wore this to work but could have definitely sized down to an XS. The shoulder/sleeve kept slipping due to the larger scoop neckline. The asymmetrical hemline was cool and the long tie added some visual interest. I was a little disappointed with the color vibrancy though - it came in a more muted color tone.
Shirt fit great. I got a medium (I am a 36DDD). Love the design and the print. Great for everyday or for work.

Rented this for a work event. It was different and very fun. The tie had to be fully knitted to stay tied. The one side longer than the other didn't bother me, I wore it out. Got compliments because it was so colorful and stood out in a sea of black.
This is a stylish and comfortable top. I wore it with black pants and got many compliments.
This is a nice top. I ordered it in the fall so it was already a bit to summery for a cold climate. However, I wore it once and liked it.
stylish, beautiful color palette, great fit. I unfortunately could not match hue with any of my skirts or trousers but will definitely consider re-rentingas it is a special piece
I like the pattern, but overall did not fit well because it was too big for me on the shoulder area. Kept moving from one shoulder to the next.

This top is so cute with jeans and sandals. I wore it for a week day date night but it could be worn almost anywhere. Very versatile. Love the side tie. Very flattering. I love that it is lined so it gives it some weight.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an evening work event!
links_reviews_text: I wore this blouse under a black jacket for the formal part of the event and then took the jacket off. The colors are definitely more muted than they appear online but the cut of the blouse and the belt are so great.. and really flattering. It was really fun to wear, looked chic, and I got a ton of compliments. Definitely stands out!

links_reviews_title: I wore this skirt for my bridal shower and received many compliments. It made me feel so special!
links_reviews_text: The skirt was a little long but wearing heels helped with that. Overall fit true to size.

links_reviews_title: Perfect skirt for a wedding when recovering from ACL surgery!
links_reviews_text: Got so many compliments felt pretty despite huge brace would wear even if I didn't have crutches and surgery!

links_reviews_title: This was a perfect combination of simple and elegant. I was getting compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: The skirt hangs/falls very nicely though the waist was a little on the tight side. I normally wear a 26 waist for pants. I'm 5'4" and with 3-inch heels, this hit right at the ground, which is what I wanted. I highly recommend this skirt. I'm thinking of getting it again for another event.
Very pretty and great for pictures, but I'm 5'5" wearing 3" heels and the skirt was a little short.

This skirt is a really fun and cool could be dressed up or dressed down it fits great in the waste very true to size unfortunately it was way too long for me. I was not able to wear it. I'm only 5'2 and even with 5 inch heels the skirt was still dragging on the floor.

Great skirt, but runs VERY SMALL. I typically wear a size 4 or 6, am 5'10" and 135lbs. I got a medium and small (as a back-up) and the medium was very tight at the waist. I got lucky that it did fit bit it was very tight. Skirt is high quality and long (great for tall ladies). Highly recommend but definitely size up.

links_reviews_title: The skirt was so much fun to wear and I received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Couldn't love this skirt enough! I'm 5'4" and the length was perfect with 2 inch heals. It was comfortable and not heavy at all. Couple issues I had were that the beads kept catching onto each other and I couldn't zip the back fully (left zipper open about an inch). If I went up a size it would've been too big. Waist line was WAY smaller than a 4 but I made it work.
Definitely runs true to size; at 5'6", I wore 2.5 inch heels and the skirt brushed the ground. Incredibly comfortable and a fun statement skirt to wear for engagement photos. Highly recommended.

links_reviews_title: This skirt was perfect for our family photos! So glam and very photogenic.
links_reviews_text: Both L and XL fit well. But it does not stretch, so I thought I would be more comfortable in the XL. You can see the shadow of the shirt through the sequence, so make sure to wear a shorter top. This way, you can wear it tucked in, but looser around the top and you will not see the shirt outline.
The perfect skirt for engagement pictures. I've had so many people ask me wear I got this skirt. It worked great for my gold sequin addiction lol.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a black tie wedding!
links_reviews_text: Felt so fancy in this skirt!! The length was perfect with 4" heels, and the fit was super flattering. I would rent this again in a heartbeat!

I wore this skirt for my engagement photos here in Alaska. I wore a small (I could still fit my Nike tights underneath!) and it fit amazing. I wore a black body suit as my top to keep the top smooth. I wish I could own this skirt, it is EVERYTHING! I'm not sure who loved it more, myself or the photographer!
I loved this skirt for a birthday bash in France! Comfortable, chic and sexy! It was a hit!

links_reviews_title: Great skirt for a special occasion!
links_reviews_text: The skirt was so perfect for a nice date night with my husband. Can be dressed up even more for an even nicer occasion. It was very comfortable. Slightly less flattering over the stomach, but I still felt confident and sexy.

links_reviews_title: So easy to wear. A belt was added as I wore it a little higher with my big hips ;)
links_reviews_text: Forgiving fit. Received so many compliments and made the best dressed list!
Sits well on the waist, is not itchy, beautiful sequins, definitely get the tall if you want to wear heels. This made my birthday super special.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my rehearsal dinner... it's gorgeous and super sparkly.
links_reviews_text: I would definitely order this skirt again... it's gorgeous... I paired it with a white silk tank from Express. I'm usually a small in bottoms but I could barely breath in the small thank god I had the medium because it fit perfectly. I'm 5'4 and ordered regular length in both skirts. If I had worn the small I would need to wear flats, with the medium I definitely needed heels, which was perfect. Great rent!

Rented for my engagement photos. this skirt was just the right amount of dressy flair. It popped against the snow. The skirt tends to run small, size up just in case. Im 5'5" and wore low heel booties, and the skirt hit the ground perfectly. If you're on the taller side, opt for the longer length. You won't be disappointed, this skirt is well made and comfortable!
Fit TTS. Very long and the perfect weight so it hung beautifully

links_reviews_title: Mardi Gras Metallic with Saints colors
links_reviews_text: Excellent last minute stand-in. The skirt is entirely too long. I wore three inch heels and still had to wear it all the way up to my bra line. Then I couldn't zip it all the way up. No give in the waist band. I wore it with a black sequined tube top and wrap. Very classic look.

links_reviews_title: I got to sparkle at my rehearsal dinner
links_reviews_text: My husband and I got married on NYE and our bridesmaids wore gold sequins. I had fun wearing gold sequins to our rehearsal. Felt super glamorous in this skirt and got a ton of compliments. Does run a bit small.

Rented for an XV party. Full gold sequins will keep anyone young and festive. In the end, I wore the Large so that I could wear heels to the event. The medium fit also, just sat higher on my waist and was therefore shorter in length. I ended up wearing the medium to church the next morning...because, why not!? I would buy this skirt in a heartbeat.

I rented this skirt for our Junior League preview party. I loved it so much that I contacted her to see if she could squeeze us in for some family photos during the rental time. She was able to, and I am in love with the pictures, all for this skirt. The compliments throughout the night at the formal affair are endless and I'm still getting messages asking where I rented it from. I wore a MP only for the length. The small fit better but was too long for me. I'm 5'0" and 115 pounds. I wish there was a SP, but I made do. Rent this skirt, you won't regret it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my New Years Eve Wedding!
links_reviews_text: Skirt was perfect for the wedding. It sits high on the waist and seems to be a tad tight. I usually can be loose in mediums but this ran tight and I can usually fit in my back up small- no way on this one. I'm 5'10" and this brushed the ground with my converse shoes on. Perfect length! Overall if I could buy this I would!!!

links_reviews_title: The skirt was perfect for the Oscar themed event. I received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, just the right length with heels. No cons
I wore this for our family Christmas pictures, it was something fun & different from what I would normally wear. I wore it with 4” heels & the length was perfect.

This skirt is stunning. I rented it for family Christmas pictures and it did not disappoint. The sequins photograph beautifully and it adds a wow factor without being too over the top. It definitely runs small and a little long, but I ordered accordingly after reading reviews. I will definitely be renting this again.

I LOVED this skirt. I felt so glamorous! It was perfect for a holiday card photo, but I thought that the skirt was super comfy and could have worn it for a lot longer. It was a tad long with flats, but since I'm on the taller side it worked for me. It did sit higher on my waist, and Spanx were definitely helpful to keep everything smooth. I would note that if you're intending to wear this with a shirt tucked in, unless the shirt is thin and lies flat, it will show. I think it would look best with a crop or some kind of leotard. I didn't find that this ran small like other reviewers were saying, the XL was too big for me.
This dress was so easy to wear (just paired w a tank and black boots) and it was so fun and festive to wear to a holiday party.

The skirt does run small. I ordered a medium and large and I wore the large. I got many complements. Wore this to my husbands company Christmas party. Paired it with a simple black long sleeve tee and it worked great! Soft on the inside, length was great for me once I put on my heels.

links_reviews_title: Glam and gorgeous for family photos!
links_reviews_text: Rented this skirt for our family photos this year and so happy I did! It was glam, gorgeous and the perfect pop to our family photo shoot with the kids. Just like the reviews say, it does run small. I ended up wearing the medium which was also incredibly long. I am 5'4 and even in heels there was a ton of length, but for the photos it was quite lovely. I highly recommend this one and would rent it again! Oh and yes, finding the right top can be tricky. I went with this one from Nordstrom: http://bit.ly/2RvR30U it was soft and pretty and I tucked it in!

links_reviews_title: Perfect elegant skirt for holiday family pictures
links_reviews_text: I love this skirt. I should have sized up, but small was all that was available when I needed it. I felt elegant, received tons of compliments, and (other than tight in the waist) it was very comfortable.
Great weight and length. Would totally rent again for a formal affair.

links_reviews_title: Not what I was hoping for
links_reviews_text: I was looking for a sequin maxi for my engagement photos after reading reviews I opted for a medium and a large. The medium was snug in the waist and then hung like a bag and the large was just a bag. Instead of looking like a sexy soon to be bride I looked I belonged in a Christmas choir. Not cute! I'm 5'3 150lb curvy/athletic build and typically wear a size 6.
Absolutely loved this skirt. It was extremely comfortable, and even though there's a lot of material, it wasn't too heavy. I received so many compliments. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: I rented this skirt for Christmas card photos
links_reviews_text: This skirt is beautiful, but not necessarily the most flattering on the body. It’s fairly high-waisted. I tried on MANY tops with it, mostly tucked in or tied in a knot like a crop top. But the way the light hit the sequins seemed to excentuate my stomach. I finally tried on an off-the-shoulder too that covered the top waistband area, and it was PERFECT! It was the exact glam/ boho-cool look I was going for. The sequins can cinch up on themselves, but that is the nature of sequins. The skirt is also a bit long but I was still able to wear it with sandals and not trip over myself.

links_reviews_title: Made for Fun Family Christmas Photos
links_reviews_text: I enjoyed wearing this skirt to make our family photos a little extra this year. The fit was a little small, but it laid nicely across my waist. The sequins had a tendency to stick to each other and make weird spots, but once unhooked it didn't leave a lasting mark. The material didn't breathe well - but it's a skirt covered in sequins, I didn't expect it to be particularly comfortable. The look is exactly what I was going for, though! Super fun!
I am 5'2 and this skirt was perfect for someone my height. This was true to size and a perfect choice for anniversary pictures!

links_reviews_title: This skirt was just perfect for my non traditional wedding!!!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect! Only thing, it was a tad bit longer than I wanted. I am a petite size and had a regular length.
Pros- Nice weight to it, nice length for long legs, and shiny Cons- Catches on certain material

links_reviews_title: Would be great for a date night, but beware if you are busty!
links_reviews_text: I really wanted this dress to work, but it was just too tight in the bust. I'm a 38DD and the top doesn't have any stretch. I typically wear a size 12 in dresses. However, it would've been perfect for my 4'11" frame. I can see someone wearing it for date night or a wedding!
I loved this dress, I wore it to work with ankle boots and it was the perfect, easy-outfit! Material is soft and this is definitely one I would consider buying!
Very flattering and fits true to size. It's also very comfortable

Found the cut to be extremely flattering. The dress was brand new with tags. Some may find that it runs a little small - I found it to be really short (even on my 5'1" frame) so I paired it with tights. Considered buying it, but decided I didn't need another black dress it the closet. Wore it multiple times over the course of the month I had it, which doesn't always happen.

I knew I would love this dress, and I do. BUT, it is SHORT. I'm 5'4, so I thought it would be closer to knee length than it is on the model, but that photo is accurate. It covers my butt in the back, but I would NOT bend over. It's also tight in the waist/ribs. I've worn other size L Greylin items without any problem, but I barely got this zipped. Can't decide if I'm going to risk it for a Christmas party (with tights over spanx) or send it back. If it came in XL, I would probably buy it.
I am only 5' tall and about 135 pounds. The Medium wouldnt even consider zipping.
Very flattering and comfortable, could dress up or down. Would love to buy this one!
Beautiful material and cut, but way way too short.
Great loose but sexy fit. A bit short so I wore tights and booties. Excellent for a night out

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress, but it ran very small.
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear it.

This item is so much better in person than in photos. I had it rented for about a month and maybe wore it 10 times. The cut of the waist is so so so flattering- you can eat like an entire pizza and still look great in this. I wore to work with flats and out to dinners with chunky booties.

I absolutely loved this one. I felt so confident and beautiful in this one, and it really flattered my body - tight in some places (in a good way) with ruching in others which helped hide the right things. I received so many compliments, which made me love it even more!! Seriously considering buying this one. Really loved it!!!
Wore this for a big meeting at work. Probably could have gone down to an XS but the S still fit nicely
This dress is cute but fit mid thigh. I didn't feel comfortable wearing it without leggings.
True to size, flattering and super easy to wear. Wore to work and also for a dinner with friends. Great LBD with fun details. Almost bought!

links_reviews_title: Great fit, very flattering with nice details
links_reviews_text: Rented this for weekend in Vegas

links_reviews_title: Great fit, liked the long sleeves.
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a baby shower. Fit true to size. Paired with opaque black leggings because 1) it was cold and 2) it was kind of short. Not so short on me that I wouldn't wear it without tights, but only in a club/party situation.
Loved this dress! It was so flattering and easy to wear. It's perfect for work, happy hour, a date, anything. Looking forward to renting it again
Fit beautifully and the fabric was incredibly soft and comfortable. The sleeves are a great detail.
Short, but classy black dress. Didn't end up wearing as I just didn't feel comfortable in it.
It had no give, very boring and I couldn't get it on over my boobs

links_reviews_title: The dress came in on time and was easy to return when I was done. I would rent again in the future.
links_reviews_text: The dress was true to size and flattering.
Loved this dress. Perfect for work (with tights) or going out. So comfortable. So many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Super great fit on my 5'7" high-waisted frame.
links_reviews_text: Super sexy but without being over the top. If you have long legs, this is your dress.

This is a perfect little black dress. I got so many compliments on it! The cut is really flattering/slimming, and the material adds some extra elegance to what could easily be a boring dress. The hemline is a little short, but it's perfect if you plan on wearing leggings or tights with it anyway. Would definitely rent again.
I really liked this dress. I wore it to work and thought it was true to size and flattering: I'm 5'2" and thought it was a good length
Runs quite small

I loved this dress- it was simple, lightweight, and comfortable. I would 100% buy it if it weren't tight around the arms and shoulders (I couldn't really lift my arms) but maybe that's because I have a larger bust. I wore it to work, but if your workplace is conservative, it might be too short. I have the unlimited subscription so will actually try the medium too to see if the fit is better- if it is, I'm buying it!

I wore this dress to a family Christmas party and was was just sexy enough not to horrify the older relatives. Not fussy at all, the right length, and good coverage in the cleavage area. 10/10 would rent again.
fit well

links_reviews_title: Super cute and flattering, but short
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! A little too short for work if you're as y'all as me, but great for a date or dinner. Really flattering.

Hard to get on, small fit. It looks cute on but the style makes it very hard to get on and take off. I recommend sizing up. I'm usually a 0/2 or XS and even the small just fits in this dress. No stretch.
Size up
Dress was new with tags. It was too small in my bust area and wouldn't even zip over my bust.

Classy but still sexy dress. Wore it for a birthday celebration and night out. The perfect amount of stretch. Waist tie is a bit longer than I would have liked, but can be wrapped twice or tied into a stylish knot

Fits true to size and is super cute. If you are busty, there will be a lot of cleavage. Rented for a date night but due to social distancing didn't actually get to wear it out. Would definitely rent again post quarantine!

links_reviews_title: The cut on this dress is amazing. Sexy front but longer length make it classy.
links_reviews_text: Low cut and fitted.
This dress turns heads. It's stunning and easy to wear. I used a sticky bra. It creates gorgeous lines! Unforgettable dress!

I got so many compliments on this dress! The silhouette was very flattering. The long sleeves and length balanced out the plunge neckline. The dress is a heavier material so it was perfect for the 60° weather without a jacket. Classic black dress but with a little something extra!

LOVED this dress! Rented it for a winter wedding and it was perfect. I would say it runs fairly true to size but for me it was a little loose in the waist, however, it didn't look sloppy. It was comfortable, stretched the right amount, and the cleavage was just enough. I did not need to wear a bra with this. I would highly recommend and almost wish I bought it!
Dress fit in all the right spots. Very low plunge, but with my bust size it still felt classy. Length was great with the slit up the side. Was at a formal event and got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Loved the material, Hid all the icky parts!
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments! Plunging neck line and the slit went further up than expected! I've been wearing a 10 recently, but was huge on me, the 8 was perfect!
Loved the dress, it fit true to size. It was a little low cut and a little long for me, but it was so very comfortable and easy to wear. Loved the dress and would rent it again.

I absolutely loved this dress. It was super comfortable and very flattering. I am a 32DD/34C and the dress worked better with a non padded bra. When I tried on a padded bra the dress would gap at the chest.
