This dress was perfect for a November wedding we attended! I got tons of compliments all night. The thick fabric is both flattering and comfortable. While the neckline is quite low, a lace bralet worn beneath did the trick. Definitely a great winter rental!

Great dress! The length is just right, and there’s an appropriate slit on the left leg. It’s definitely a deep V, but with the length + sleeves, it’s just the right amount of sexy. As others noted, the material is just thick enough to be forgiving, and the tie on the front allows for some eating/drinking ;) A great LBD, recurved lots of compliments. (Random note: The zipper on the back is silver.)

links_reviews_title: Fit nicely and covered up all of my worry spots.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! It will show a lot of the ladies and if you don't mind that then I say go for it! I felt comfortable in the dress all night and didn't have to worry about adjusting the top, it stayed where it needed to be.

I wore this dress for my husbands work event. The dress runs a tad big, however, Im only 5'2 and wish they had this in a petite size. I purchased a body suit to wear underneath because I'm quit busty, the deep v-neck was a bit too much. I was constantly checking all night to make sure nothing popped out! the slit on the side was nice and not too extreme. if you're petite, the sleeves may be too long, but overall this dress was nice.
This dress is perfection. It's very fitted and shows off any curves and so is thick enough to be forgiving. I adored it!! Would love to own.

I normally wear a size 14 so the fact that I wore this size 10 should tell you that it runs big. However, it fit like a glove and I absolutely loved it. The fabric is super stretchy so it definitely works the curves and it is very low cut in the front with not a lot of support, I just bought a low cut bra to wear under. Excellent for dancing. The fabric is also pretty thick so if you are going to be out in hot weather I would maybe rethink. All that said I would wear this dress repeatedly.
This dress was perfect for my night out. It was sexy and classy. I felt beautiful and confident. I would so rent this dress again!
Perfect fit

links_reviews_title: Fierce Dress! I felt like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: This was a backup dress for me (one of several unfortunately). The weight of this dress makes the dress perfect for any body shape. I wore to out outside wedding in May in Maine and it was 50 by sundown and I couldn't tell at all. The dress was warm and fitted so it showed all my curves. I did struggle with the low cut top section and used fashion tape, changed my bra a million times and ultimately just gave up and would pull the dress up occasionally to give myself some additional coverage. I could have sized-down in this dress for a more fitted look but it was not necessary. You'll love this dress, if you are worried about the low cut a, a lace cami would fix that easily.

Rented this for our wedding anniversary dinner date and felt sexy as hell! Was able to wear a black "very sexy" bra and didn't even need sticky tape. Perfect for the occasion and my hubby LOVED it! Thick fabric and high quality.
I felt very comfortable in this dress. Would recommend!

This dress was perfect for my work event. I was a little self conscious about the deep plunge but as the night went on I was rocking it! If you need a bra for support, a plunge bra will work, However be sure to get one in advance. I was scrambling the day before my event and I couldn't find one anywhere. I ended up using breast tape and it was perfect

The dress held everything in, all on its own. I thought it might be too long since I'm only 5'3", but the slit up the slide made everything work flawlessly. The dress is so much more than it appears to be!
It fits perfectly.
Attended a very chilly wedding. Long sleeves and sleek long cut form-fitting was the way to go. The deep V was all the sexy a girl could want! Practical & classy. I highly recommend

links_reviews_title: I was told I looked stunning. I don't think the picture shows how gorgeous the dress is.
links_reviews_text: The dress was very comfortable. You definitely need special undergarments for the plunging neckline.

links_reviews_title: It was the perfect combo of sexy and comfy
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I got so many compliments on the shape and look of it. It was so stretchy and fun to wear. The deep v neck was just enough show and the way the sash brings in the waist is perfect. It was easy to dance in, too. The fabric is thick and I didn't even wear a coat to go to the wedding. It my be a little to warm for some women, I did get a little sweaty towards the end, but it's long sleeve so no one would know. This was my first RTR dress and I will definitly be doing it again.
Seriously so flattering! Fit amazing and did not need any dress tape. Deep V was not outrageous for an upscale dinner. Might rent it again! Loved.
Dress was beautiful! Fits amazing I have three kids and my stomach is so flat anymore. This dress hides it. Very comfortable and cute on. Loved the v neck and fit. I got many compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: It's a show stopper yet very simple. Heavy fabric but comfortable. No need for a coat in low 50's.
links_reviews_text: Fit well but not a dress for a bra

links_reviews_title: Classy and sexy dress all in one!!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was absolutely perfect for the engagement party I attended! The material was nice and thick and felt slimming. This was perfect for a winter event as it also kept me warm. You can't wear a normal bra with it though since it is lower in the front, but I had a bra that is meant for plunge tops so that's what i wore. I would highly recommend this dress! I wish I could purchase it!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a date night
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well. I have a short torso so it'd fit perfect on someone who is a little taller/longer. I'm 5ft 4in 148lbs. The dress looked great, sexy but I wasn't freezing in the winter weather. I felt like a boss lady. The fabric has some stretch and the sleeves are long. I went braless but am a smaller bust, b cup. Not sure if any sort of bra would work with this given the plunge if you need to wear one. Very comfortable, wore it for 5 hours.

links_reviews_title: I'm in love with this dress!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress so much, I didn't want to send it back and even have tried to buy it online (black version no where to be found). This was in my heart list and a last minute rental which meant the size 4 wasn't available to compare. The 2 was definitely fitted, but felt good. It was snug and the material thick enough to not require a bra or tape for me. Only complaints; it rode up a little, and by the end of the night the back zipper started to rub my spine a little. But, that would not stop me from renting or wanting to own this dress. Loved it!

I rented this for a surprise bday party for my husband. Initially I was torn between this and another dress I had rented because they were both fantastic. I walked out in this and said, "option 1" and my husband said, "that's it, I don't need to see the other." Case closed! Compliments all night. The plunging neckline paired with midi length made this feel sexy without being too obvious. I don't know if it actually needed it but I did put a bit of fashion tape on the bust just to feel more secure. The fabric has strong stretch which smooths everything out and the slit on the left leg is super sexy.

Love this dress. Wore this to a Christmas party and was comfortable and warm all night. I hate being cold, so I went for the long sleeves and I'm so glad I did. This dress felt secure and comfortable. The slit was just the right height. Received many compliments. Super classy and perfect for any event!
This dress was amazing. I had a hard time sending it back. I received so many compliments and it fit like a glove

I wore this dress to my husbands Holiday party for his work. Very comfortable and I felt very pretty in it. It is cut low in the front. So I wore a black camisole to feel little more comfortable. Lots of compliments all. I will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for a black tie optional holiday party.
links_reviews_text: I am a 55 year old, 5'7" , 130 pound +/- in-shape woman. I rented this dress because at my age, I love the midi style. This dress is body conscious, but has thicker material, so you feel confident that any bulges are not that evident. The material is also a little flexible to hug you around the torso. I felt the belt was unnecessary. I normally fluctuate between a 4 and 6 and was pleased that the 4 fit me nicely. Shapewear is a must, but the slit is fairly high and my mid-thigh shapewear peaked out a bit. The neckline is plunging, but I have good cleavage and was covered up in sleeves and length , so I felt it was appropriate. I wore no jewelry other than very colorful and long earrings from Target no less! Simple and elegant and a bargain.
Definitely form fitting and low cut. The tie could be worn in different ways. Loved this dress for a winter event

links_reviews_title: Very pretty and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: The reviews said to size up do I got a medium and it fit perfectly. Comfy and beautiful dress.
I enjoyed wearing this! I am very busty so I needed a L to zip, but it fit great!

This dress has several details that made it super trendy and quickly out of style - but there is one place it will always belong: a country music concert! Ruffles, eyelets, pink, diagonal cut skirt, one shoulder. There was a lot going on and I loved it all! Someone told me I looked like Carrie Bradshaw. Such a fun dress.

I love a dress that you can get more than one use out of and this Love Shack Fancy dress was just that. I threw on with sneakers for day and nude heels for night. So much versatility!!runs on the smaller side. Ok sized up!! You can still wear a strapless bra. For more RTR inspiration follow we @blondehallelujah on Instagram!
My chest is so flat I prefer to wear no bra usually. Was too big so I wore with a padded strapless and it was good. Very comfy

I wore this to a rehearsal dinner for an amalfi coast wedding. Was super flowy and would suggest this for any body type as it was very flattering. I'm normally a 4-6 and tried on both the medium and large, I ended up wearing the medium but could have very easily worn the large, I would recommend sizing up if you're between sizes. Would recommend this dress! Lots of compliments :)

links_reviews_title: Wore to a rehearsal dinner low country boil, then went out to bars afterward.
links_reviews_text: Middle is snug but necessary. Wore with strapless bra, nude heels and Kendra Scott earrings. It is a fun dress!

links_reviews_title: felt fun, flirty, but forgiving as well. Perfect for the warmer fall season with some open booties
links_reviews_text: gorgeous color, felt very designer even during the day, and perfect for the occasion: a wedding rehearsal followed by a party bus and winery tour with a group of 20
It fit great! However I was hoping it was a little bit more colorful. In person and in pictures the dress was a very somber rosy color. However, it was a pretty dress.
Easy to dress up or down. Paired with Jean jacket and boots at outdoor rehearsal later in day. Only issue fabric wrinkles a lot. Use downy wrinkle release spray

This dress is AMAZING. AMAZING. Comfortable, flattering, beautifully cut, fun, beautiful color. I didn't want to send it back. Got so many compliments I lost track. It was true to size but a tad large in the waist, so I added a narrow gold belt and it was perfect. Highly recommend, I think this would be flattering on all body types. LOVED IT!
Excellent fitting dress. Moderate weight, but loose enough for warm weather. Length was good for petites.
Love the off the shoulder. Plan for a strapless bra,
Can wear this dress in the day, or dress it up for the evening. I got a lot of compliments and it fit in a flattering way.
This is the kind of dress unlimited is great for. Wouldn't wear it more than once but was a fun change of pace for a girls night out. Cute and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for date night or bridal shower
links_reviews_text: The eyelet details and color were so feminine! I felt so girly in this dress. Sad to see it go
Ladies don't hesitate! This dress looks great on! Added bonus-comfortable also!

links_reviews_title: loved it so much i rented it 3x
links_reviews_text: perfect flattering fit and color light weight eyelet fitted at waist worn w convertible bra
This dress was so cute but I couldn't zip the L over my 36 DD's so that was annoying. Other than that it would've been a great dress. Had to return and still bummed about it.
Runs small.
Wore this to a party and graduation. Pretty neutral (may not work on all skin tones). Lovely eyelet.

links_reviews_title: I loved this but didn't end up wearing it.
links_reviews_text: The higher side of the hem was a little too short for me but it was SO cute overall.

links_reviews_title: super pretty dress, got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: comfortable, fun dress!

links_reviews_title: I wish I was a little bit smaller I wish I was a baller I wish th this dress fit a little bit larger
links_reviews_text: Cute just a little too tight in the bust

links_reviews_title: This dress is so cute but definitely do not recommend it if you're pale.
links_reviews_text: Ended up not wearing it because I was too pale. Make sure you're tan!

links_reviews_title: Cute, but a washed out color
links_reviews_text: This was an overall cute dress, but I didn't love the color.
The zipper won't close if you have a larger sized rib cage. I recommend driving up for straighter / boxy body types

links_reviews_title: Seemed to run a bit small. The dress didn't feel fresh when I unzipped the package.
links_reviews_text: This dress was a bit small. I'm usually a medium, occasionally large and I wish I would've gone with a large. It's a muted pink...more of a dusty rose in my opinion. Lots of fabric so I think it'd be better suited for someone taller than myself at 5'2".
Wore this to wedding rehearsal dinner for my friend's wedding in Colombia. Dress is comfortable and super pretty. True to size.

Super cute dress, fit true to size and looked adorable on! Wore it during the day to vineyard wine tastings and also to dinners in the evenings... cute dress that you can dress up a bit in wedges but also looks adorable during the day with flats. Would buy it if it goes on sale but def planning on renting again!

links_reviews_title: The dress is cute but I don't love the color. It runs small.
links_reviews_text: The dress is very cute, but not the best for my skin color (Medium tan asian) It also runs small. Better to order one size up.
Pretty dress. Could use a slim belt in a contrasting color to pull the look together.
This was one of several dresses I tried for an upcoming wedding, and although I normally wear an 8 or a 10, the large in this dress wouldn't even zip up. :(
Didn't wear it because the large was too small.
comfy

For some reason this dress did not flatter me. It accentuated my short torso and thick waist, which I did not want to do. The one shoulder off thing also did not work for my small chest and narrow shoulders. I loved the color and really hoped it would work for me though. I had to size up.

This dress was so sweet and was a perfect blend between a casual and dressy look for my bridal shower. The blush color was perfect and I loved the ruffles. The only thing is that the material is not very forgiving and there is not stretch in it.
Very feminine, very sweet. I got a lot of compliments.
Very cute and TTS, but quite casual in person so I went with another dress for a wedding. Would be great for a night out, party, concert, etc.

links_reviews_title: This dress is a very desaturated pink. Beware that it may wash you out....
links_reviews_text: I am Asian and am slightly tan. The desaturated pink of this dress really blended into my skin tone and didn't pop at all. Unfortunately this color is not a universally cute pink :( not suited for those whose skin has yellow undertones or whose skin might be similar in tone to dress. Hard to anticipate this through the digital photos of the dress.

I host a talk series at Soho House and wore this dress. My waist is in proportion to my chest and hips so I had to limit carbs for a week to make it comfortable that evening. If you have a teeny tiny waist, this dress is ideal.

Felt so elegant in this beautiful dress. There is no stretch, so I recommend sizing up if you're between sizes. The waist is very small; it was hard for me to zip at first, and I'm usually a comfortable size 0. I was able to go braless with the sexy open back, and it was fitted enough that I had no concerns about the dress slipping down - larger chests may want to size up. It was a little long on my short torso, so the back gaped a bit and didn't quite lay flat - it's so well constructed that it actually looked like a natural draping effect.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty, not exactly what I was looking for.

links_reviews_text: This dress is phenomenal. It is well made and the fabric is luxurious. It was heartbreaking to send it back without being worn. It fit PERFECTLY every but the very tiny waist. I zipped it up with a little bit of elbow grease and a lot of sucking in but going to my husband's birthday dinner in it would have been impossible. Eating would not be an option. I got the 4 and though tempted to try the 6, I am concerned that it would then be too large everywhere else. I loved the ruching in the back! It gave a little volume and interest and was a lovely juxtaposition to the completely open back. If you are blessed with a wasp waist, rent this beauty and take it out for a nice dinner.
Could still wear it but runs a little small in the waist...
Size runs smaller than actual. Because it has a side zipper, opt for 2 sizes up.

links_reviews_title: Be sure to check out the back. NSFW
links_reviews_text: Loved the fabric of this dress but for me, wasn't able to wear because of the back. I thought I could just wear a jacket with it to cover the exposed area (and wear an actual bra)......but there is a bizarre gathering/poof of fabric right on the hip. (The last place I want extra bulk). Not sure where one would wear it -- it's really like a mullet dress - business in the front and party in the back.
Despite my husband calling me "batman" I was very into this cape. Spices up an otherwise basic (but flattering!) black jumpsuit.

links_reviews_title: awesome jumpsuit- and it has pockets :)
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly! Not too tight in the waist- you can eat a full meal and be totally fine :) perfect for a date night or fun night out with friends.
I felt like such a badass in this outfit. I'm usually a 6 in most clothing but sized down to a 4 and glad I did!! Fit like a glove.
I'm petite and the legs were a little long on me, but this outfit was killer and the cape made me feel so so awesome

links_reviews_title: I felt like a rockstar in this. Definitely a way to make a statement.
links_reviews_text: I have a long torso and the waist hit me just right. The jumpsuit is well structured and flattering.
#didnotwanttoreturnit

I wish I could own this outfit and more by Trina Turk. The size 4 hugged me in all the right places while being completely comfortable and easy to wear. The cape was an added bonus making this jumpsuit fancy enough for a wedding but trendy enough for a more casual party/event.

links_reviews_title: I was the officiant for my best friends wedding and this jumpsuit made me feel so cute & confident!
links_reviews_text: I have a very slim frame so I was worried about the fit but it just had a little wiggle room to it that wasn't too noticeable. I added a white belt to hint at my officiant responsibility and got so many compliments all day on my choice of outfit. It made me wish I could afford to buy it! Trust, you will slay the day in this look!

links_reviews_title: Welcome Reception at San Francisco's Exploratorium
links_reviews_text: I wore this to welcome drinks kicking off a wedding weekend in San Francisco. It was the perfect weight for the slightly chilly weather - northern California in January isn't exactly warm. I found that it was just heavy enough to keep me warm without a jacket while the sun was out but no too much to where I felt too warm when inside. I wore the 2R and had to hem the legs just a little bit, as my legs are on the shorter side. I also have a longer torso and there was never a point where I was uncomfortable or felt trapped, the length was just right (I could even comfortably raise my arms above my head!). This is a great sophisticated look for a cocktail hour and I imagine it would be well suited for a work event or gala depending on how you accessorize. And most importantly it has pockets!
The 4 was a little larger than I expected it to be, and the leg width was slightly wider than I'd anticipated, but the look overall was great.

links_reviews_title: Pants make dancing even more fun.
links_reviews_text: I have been looking forward to this caped jumpsuit for months, and it did not disappoint. It was my best friend's wedding, and even SHE was telling people about this outfit leading up to the event. My photo doesn't do it justice... the lighting is terrible and I forgot to get a head-on photo of it! The material is heavy but not hot - more like really rich and sturdy - but breathable. There was a tiny hook on one side of the cape but I have no idea where it was supposed to link up to, so when it got warm from dancing, I just pushed the cape off my shoulders. The jumpsuit has pockets, a huge plus. The fit is extremely flattering. I'm 5'2, 110 pounds, 32B, so it was a little big but I didn't look frumpy. Because it's black and the chest and waist fit perfectly, you couldn't really tell the upper legs and hips were a little big. The legs were a little long, but I just cuffed them once and they were perfect (you couldn't even tell that the seams were showing... people were too into the cape!). And I got so many compliments. I highly highly recommend.

I love this! I ordered a size 6 and 8 because I'm pretty busty. And I was surprised the 6 fit as well as it did. The jumper is very comfy and was so easy to sit and dance in. It was a little longer than I like (but I am only 5'2") so I fashion taped a hem to show off some ankle for the night. Overall very happy with this and I received alot of compliments! Will order again!
It was a little baggy and the pants were very long (I'm short). Overall it did fit and I got many compliments. The front V was a bit deeper than I was comfortable with.

I wore this cape jumpsuit to a fashion show in Chicago, it was supposed to be outside but the weather ended up being rainy. So I wanted something that was versatile for the cold weather yet looked sharp. This was perfect. I got so many compliments on it!

I'm 5'6 and 160 lbs. After reading reviews, I ordered the 6R and 8R. I'm typically an 8 and wore the 8, based on how I like my clothes to look and feel. I received compliments all night on this outfit. Seamless experience with order, receiving, and return. May not wear this outfit again, but will definitely order with RTR for my next event!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for the type of event I had. Classy, stylish, and fun. I received many compliments
links_reviews_text: A little longer than expected, compared to the photo. Neck line a bit lower compared to photo. Great fabric and overall fit, very flattering

Runs big in the crotch area. I wear a 4 but the 0 fit better. No bra required. Very classy, professional looking outfit yet super cool & trendy. The fabric is really thick, so not such a good pick for Houston weathers. Over all I was pleased with my selection!
I love this ! I would keep this forever and wear it everyday if I could. Trying to find this to buy it even though it's $400 because I truest felt like a million bucks! Also it's sooooo comfortable!

This jumpsuit was a hit! The fit. The cape. The pockets. Truly a look. I wore this for my engagement party and felt amazing. Its warm so can be worn through the winter spring transition. It's fitted in the right places but I was able to move comfortably and dance the night away. I would definitely rent this piece again!
Na
Great fit for my athletic frame. Accentuated all the right areas. Super fun to wear and confortable too! Would def rent again!

I wore this NYE 2018 and it was the perfect choice! The fabric is great - it was stretchy and comfortable but also the capelet was super warm, which was great in single digit weather. It is a very flattering cut. Only con: you definitely need to bring a bathroom buddy, it's impossible to zip up on your own.

links_reviews_title: Kick off shopping party to support our museum
links_reviews_text: The bottom was a touch loose and the torso was juuuust long enough for my longer torso. I had to cuff the legs 3 times to make it ankle length, but my inseam is short (I’m 5’3). Overall, I felt and looked awesome and wish I could buy it.
Wore this for a formal dinner I️ hosted for clients. I️ felt professional while also bringing my own style and personality. I️ wore my hair up to simplify the look a bit.

links_reviews_title: Came through in a pinch and made it right!!!
links_reviews_text: I had initially an unfortunate shipment in that both of my items had a tear! RTR made it right however, by over-nighting a perfect piece just in time for the wedding!!! I got a ton of compliments and felt very pretty all night!! Necklace was rented too! Thank you!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a modern, on-trend Elvis costume. Easy to dress up.
links_reviews_text: This worked as the base of an outfit I accessorized heavily for an elvis outfit. The fit in the crotch area was not great. Arm mobility was limited, so not a good dancing outfit.
This was one of my best rentals yet. Fit true to size, very flattering and comfy too! Loved this one! I'll rent it again.
I wore this to the reception of a book release. The one piece was very flattering and it was an eye catcher. I'd rent this again!
The fit was perfect! Very comfortable and flattering. I added a belt to the waist just to give it a little extra something but it looked good without any accessories.

I loved this outfit. Very chic. Very comfortable. Nice, heavy material so it was great for cooler weather too. This was my first time using Rent the Runway. Will definitely do it again! Great experience.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a cold-weather outdoor wedding!
links_reviews_text: Loved this option. It came as a replacement for what I originally selected, but I found out we were getting unseasonably cold weather at an outdoor summer camp wedding (try dressing for that option!) I had the stylist throw in a pant suit option with a cape as a long shot, but it was perfect. Not only was I plenty warm for the Maine night time temps, I got SO many compliments. I'm a believer in capes now.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a superhero, thanks to that cape!
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Well made. Good fabric. Comfortable! The only issue I had was zipping and unzipping, but I'm not flexible enough to reach my back!

links_reviews_title: This outfit made me feel confident and sexy while not showing a ton of skin
links_reviews_text: Love love love his one. I want to buy it. I received so many compliments and felt amazing wearing it. It made me feel sexy and confident! I am 5' 3" and 112 and usually west a size 4 or 6. But the 4 was perfect. Not overly tight. I could actually sit down, dance and do anything else!!
Absolutely stunning! This jumpsuit is really a must.

links_reviews_title: I was on a panel for a ESPN event - definitely felt like Superwoman in this amazing jumpsuit!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great! My favorite RTR to date. I received SO many compliments.

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit fit incredibly chic and was very comfortable. I usually wear a 10 but needed a 12.
links_reviews_text: It is wool therefore is very hot. I was inside but still found myself sweating. I was volunteering at a star studded event (with Patti LaBelle, Teddy Riley, Eddie George, Kirk Franklin, Kelly Price & more....) and I got ALOT of compliments as a volunteer required to wear black. I would definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: It was my niece Bridal Shower and it was a high tea affair. The jumper was perfect.
links_reviews_text: It fit perfect just the smell when they arrived I had to taken them both to be cleaned. In the end the jumper was comfy and worked well with the High Tea Bridal Shower theme
For perfect. Loved this outfit! So easy to wear. Perfect amount of edge.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a fashion show/girls night out. It was show stopping and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I ended up with the 6R and fit perfectly. I'm 5' 8" and the girth couldn't have been any shorter to wear it comfortably, but it worked, sitting and standing. The legs are a little wider/looser than I expected. It has pockets which is a plus and looks great with pumps and fun jewelry!

links_reviews_title: Paired the jumpsuit with some feminine jewels and a cute braid.
links_reviews_text: I have an annoying long torso so I was nervous that the jumpsuit wouldn't fit. However, the 8R worked! The top was a little tight in the chest but made the somewhat masculine look more feminine with some cleavage. I got a ton of compliments all night long and it was a perfect outfit for a night wedding!
Very cute dress. I wore this Salsa dancing. It was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress. Definitely not my normal look. But loved!
links_reviews_text: This dress has a killer slit and gorgeous colors. It was perfect for dinner on vacation. I am normally a little black dress gal- It was an attention grabbing dress! Almost more than I'd want. But it was beautiful. I thought about buying it! :)

This dress was such a standout! I wore it for Christmas in Hawaii and it was perfect. The fabric draped so nicely and the fit was perfect (the slit is high though so be careful especially when sitting). It's a great choice for a spring/summer formal event!

links_reviews_title: Didn't want to take it off!
links_reviews_text: This dress was sexy and so comfortable to wear! I got a ton of compliments and would definitely rent again!
This dress is beautiful. The material high quality and just drapes nicely. It has adjustable straps so you can adjust to your fit. The side slit makes it more of an occasion dress. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an outdoor party in South Florida
links_reviews_text: The slit is high -- not great for sitting -- but was perfect for South Florida and dancing all night
Love this dress. With a leg slit and the open back it looked so classy but equally sexy.

links_reviews_title: Loved but too tight in the hips
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear this dress because the 4 was too tight in the hips. I would have rented again in a 6 but it wasn't available in time for me event. Beautiful dress and quality material, just too tight.
Gorgeous print, fabric and fit! Tons of compliments

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! I felt sexy and elegant at my brother's wedding!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fabric and it had a very light liner which was really nice. Fit beautifully!

This dress was SO comfortable, fit like a glove ( I'm curvy/athletic and it was perfect on my frame. So many people complimented me on it and it was perfect for a garden outdoor wedding. Would wear again.

I'm 5'4 130 lbs & decided to go with the 4 instead of the 2, as the 2's leg slit was quite high. Almost butt cheek high! The 4 for great, has adjustable straps, & my boyfriend absolutely loved it. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: This dress was the perfect fit for a summer wedding held at an Art Museum.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. The slit was a little higher than what I would normally do but I loved it!

I wore this to an event at the Indianapolis Symphony Orchestra, where they showed The Little Mermaid with the symphony playing all the music live. This dress reminded me of Ariel - vibrant, colorful and so beautiful! The colors are very bright and the pattern is very unique - definitely not your average floral dress! I am Usually a 4 or 6, and the 4 fit perfectly. Wore with nude ankle strap heels and no accessories (none needed in my opinion)...except for a bright, vibrant lip to match!

links_reviews_title: The dress was very light and beautiful -- had a number of compliments throughout the night.
links_reviews_text: Straps tighten which is a huge win -- only issue I found is when I sat down the slit went up a little higher than I would have liked. Nothing a purse or napkin can't cover up!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and airy silk ... very unique dress
links_reviews_text: My friend told me that this dress looked like "a 90s prom dress in the BEST way" haha. The cowl neck and spaghetti straps are definitely a throwback but the dress is gorgeous and flattering. I'd order your regular size. Straps are adjustable.

I wore this dress for a rehearsal dinner and it was absolutely stunning. The material feels gorgeous. This fit is true to size. The slit on the side does come up pretty high, especially when you sit down, but I loved that sexy feature of the dress. I stalked this dress on here until it became available and it certainly did not disappoint!!
It was a little big around the waist - the straps are adjustable which was nice so I was able to make the top a little more secure. Great dancing dress - and the high slit adds to the allure.
Smooth fit, perfect for summer wedding or party
I wore this to a summer wedding and it was perfect! It was made of a light weight silk material and had a great pop of color! I would highly recommend!

This dress is even more beautiful in person. I rented it for vacation in Italy and received so many compliments. The slit makes it unique and it's true to size. Wearing it with no bra would work for any cup size in my opinion.

This is a beautiful dress. I am petite though, and even with small hips this dress accentuates them. Maybe it's the white? I didn't think it was the most flattering but it was so gorgeous I didn't care. No stretch though, and fits better if you have a chest to fill it out.
I loved this dress! I felt amazing and received so many compliments. There's no stretch but it fits great for a woman with hips!
Silky and sexy. Such a beautiful dress. Sad to send it back. No bra possible; low in the front

The quality of this brand never disappoints. On the hanger it doesn't look much different than any other cowl neck slip dress, but when you put it on, you quickly understand why it's such an expensive brand. Fit like a glove and flattered all the right places.

Great dress that can be easily paired with heels or flats. Has a side slit. I am a 32D so have to wear my bra underneath. If you adjust the straps on the back, your bra won't show which was my initial concern about this dress. I will be wearing it for my bachelorette weekend!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for vacation or a fancy party. It is a slip dress beautifully made.
links_reviews_text: I got compliments everywhere I went. The strap was adjustable, and it fit like a glove. if you are sitting down the slit will come up really really high. If you are dancing is perfect
This was so flattering. It compliments all the right places. I would definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: I got loads of compliments and it was ver comfortable to wear this dress.
links_reviews_text: It's nearly impossible to wear a bra or any sort of undergarments with this. It's cut on the bias, so it clings to curves and shows EVERYTHING. I had trouble getting the cowl neck to stay in a spot that looked normal - every time you bend over even a little, it needs to be rearranged. I did love the print, and as others have said, the slit comes up pretty high when you sit down - but it didn't bother me.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Fit was great! Sexy!
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress but felt it showed too much skin for the event I was going. But still loved the style and dress, would rent again for a different party. Also make sure you have a sticky bra or go bra less
Too tight across the bust and the reviews are absolutely correct-the slit is almost up to your hip.
Gorgeous materials, comfortable, simple, and very good fit. No adjusting all night.

links_reviews_title: Honestly mad I didn't get to wear it out
links_reviews_text: I wanted to keep this dress for a looooong time to have an excuse to wear it but I didn't know when that would happen :( overall sexy and elegant loved it the back cut just right to hide unwanted lines or rolls and I felt truly breathtaking just trying it on around the house
I loved the style of this dress, however my postpartum body did not. It was very tight in my hips which did not allow me to zip the side zipper.

links_reviews_title: LOVED this dress! I got endless comments all night.
links_reviews_text: When you sit down, the slight is high on your upper leg.

links_reviews_title: nice fit, comfortable, easy to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Slit on the higher side but loves this dress

links_reviews_title: It was really cute and I got a lot of compliments. I felt it did pucker weird in the hip area.
links_reviews_text: Great colors.
This blouse was great. The 6 didn't show up so I had to wear the 8 and it worked fine. I wore this to a concert with black jeans and boots and it was perfect!
The off the shoulder stayed put and It was the perfect mix of fashionable yet sexy. Breathable fabric for the summer!
I wore this for a day out on my birthday and it's gorgeous! I paired it with black shorts and heels. The length is short but I didn't mind.

I wore this for a date and it was amazing! I felt so confident and sexy in it. I ended up getting a bigger size than I normally am bc I have big boobs but it was kind of big in that section - will order a size down next time

I am a pretty busy gal and somehow I didn't fill out this top... it was weirdly loose in the chest. It may have actually laid better if I was totally flat chested, not sure. Other than that it was overall a pretty good pick.
Wore this to a bachelorette party dinner night. Loved the top. arms were slightly tight in the 0, however the chest area of the size 2 was too large for my chest. Full 32C

I loved this top. People loved this top. It was comfortable and chic. I wish I owned it. I could go braless or just a sticky bra. I wore it for a class reunion then I wore it for a party on vacation. I highly recommend this top.

This top was super cute and I got a lot of compliments however the fit was off. It was falling off my shoulders and took a lot of fixing to get the wrap tie done correctly. I ended up wearing a tank underneath and it worked.
I think this fit really well (took me a while to figure out how I wanted to tie it). It was not super tight on top so I wore a bralette under. Colors look amazing

I was in love with this top. I wore it for engagement photos and fell In love. The fit was perfect for me as I am curvier on the bottom with a smaller top. It definitely fits true to size. I loved the ribbons. It is a little hard to figure out because there are a lot of crossing pieces but once it was on I didn't want to take it off. It does run short so If that's an issue maybe avoid but with a tank under it was perfect

The top perfectly cups the outside of your shoulder making it a partially off the shoulder top. In combination with the bow, blue and white stripes, and black lace detail, this top is both beautiful and unique. I even received a compliment from a hostess at a restaurant!
Fit perfect!

I absolutely loved this top and seriously considered buying it. It fit amazingly but was a little short. (Should really have worn it with high waisted jeans or skirt) I work in fashion and literally everyone who passed me in the hall commented on how much they loved my top.
Ran a little small after tied at waist but the top was larger, harder to keep closed with off he shoulder fit. Wouldn't recommend if you need to be able to do things but was perfect for a dinner!

After reading all the reviews I wanted so much to love this top. Loved the slightly off the shoulder look but felt it wasn't very flattering on my hourglass figure. Rented this for vacation and it packed very well. The fabric was great and did not wrinkle. Kind of disappointed in the look thou.

I love this top! I sized up and although I wore a cami underneath for work, one small black safety pin has held it closed fine! Going to wear it with long black shorts or white jeans for a date tonight! I did have to iron the bow as it came tied and was wrinkled when undone. Been playing with bow tied in front and on the side. Not sure which way I like better!! Seriously considering purchasing...
Such a unique shirt, took a few tries to get the ties correct but overall great. Sexy but still comfortable. Wore to a party/bar on vacation.

Perfect for Easter brunch! Adjustable and flattering. I would have gone up another size, since I'm a DDD and it didn't cover to my comfort level, but it was still super cute over a strappy black dress I had.
Sits on shoulder side Very low cut, i had to pin it shut A little more midriff than i prefer Overall i did like it, felt feminine, and sexy
Youll love this one! Want to rent it again- it falls just slightly off the shoulders
Gorgeous unique top!! Got so many compliment. It was comfortable to wear and not too tight. True to size. Would definitely wear again.

This adorable top was a hit for my engagement photos. So far from your average and basic top. Total stunner! Sexy, yet classy and modest. It fits true to size. The bow was tricky because there weren't any instructions, but just FYI there's a hole in the left side of the top where you must string the bow through. I wore a strapless bra with it and I felt comfortable. I wore high waisted jeans and it was perfect. I would recommend this top to any and everyone. So flattering!

links_reviews_title: Unique and Special! More Versatile than you think
links_reviews_text: The model photo does not do this top justice. I wish I would have rented this sooner in my final month. So many ways to wear it. With skinny black pants, with jeans, with a black skirt, with leather pants/skirt, over a simple black dress. TONS of compliments. I chose to wrap it and tie it in a square knot in the back vs the front bow. Otherwise the tail of the bow would have been down at my ankles. Subtle stripe, flattering neckline. Definitely take a chance!

links_reviews_title: LoveShackFancy Makes Simple Pieces Like Chambray Fancy!!!
links_reviews_text: This is everyday fashion at its best!!! This is the cutest little piece that is perfect for casual weekend wear. I wore it multiple times, the other on Memorial Day paired with my white Shoreline Converse and a red crossbody bag. If you are tall, I wouldn't even attempt to rent this, because it is SUPER short! I am only 5'2" and this was like wearing my HS cheerleading uniform! LOL. It was a tad tight in the chest and made the buttons gape, but I wore a black lace bralette instead of a bra with padding and that helped. If you are petite rent this...it is absolutely presh!!!! www.crockpotempire.com

links_reviews_title: Fun and flirty for day to night
links_reviews_text: I wore this to work and then out to happy hour with the girls. It got a second look from my man (in a good way) as I was leaving in the morning and several compliments at work. The material is quality and the shape is on point. I gave it 4 stars only because it tended to bunch throughout the day and wasn't the most comfortable. Great for girls with big boobs, I'm a 34D and had trouble keeping it in place. It would be perfect for a night out.
Big on my narrow shoulders.
This is more crop to then it looks

links_reviews_title: Loved having this on vacation with me.
links_reviews_text: This shirt was adorable. i wore it to work with a nice pair of slacks. I also wore it out on a date with some shorts. I traveled with it and it packed very well, no wrinkles. I got lots of compliments and loved the fit.

links_reviews_title: A Unique Top That Balances Sexy & Classy
links_reviews_text: I loved this top! I rented it with my Unlimited subscription for a date night. I loved its uniqueness and balance of sexy and classy. Since I was on a date, I wore it with one side a bit off-the-shoulder for more sex appeal; my husband loved it! It's a bit tricky to wrap around at first, and if I had wanted it to be tighter, I might have been able to size down and get away with that, because there was some bunching around my bust and waist. I liked the fit, though, as it was really comfortable and still stayed in place. It felt well made like a high-end top should. I wore a nude sticky bra with it. Definitely would recommend! If you're able to get two sizes, get your regular size and one side down to see which fit you prefer.

Wore this out to a nice dinner. Such a statement. Received many compliments. Worn with higher wasted black jeans and heels. Was able to wear a strapless bra underneath. I would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Rented this pretty top for Engagement Photos
links_reviews_text: Rented the 6 because it was the only size available but definitely would have rented the 4 as this was too loose in my chest. However, with that being said, since it is a wrap top, you can pull it as tight as need be! I loved this top and it photographed beautifully for my engagement photos! I did wear it to work the next day too, and I will say, it is not very comfortable to wear all day in an office. And the top is very short so you'll definitely want to pair with high-waisted pants or skirt! If you have photos or an event that you will not be wearing this all day for, absolutely go for it! It's beautiful!
Top is flattering cut and adds extra shape to an hourglass figure. Great quality and detail

So glad I decided to rent this with my unlimited subscription. Since there's a lot going on with this top I was a little iffy about it, so glad I decided to wear it. Didn't slide off the shoulders, no matter how I tied it, it looked great!

links_reviews_title: Fun well made date night top
links_reviews_text: I got tons of compliments on this beautiful top. The fabric is wonderful the shape is great and I was able to wear a regular bra with no fashion tape. The only thing that I would say is that you have to keep the the cinched quite tight so that the top doesn't come open which makes it vaguely uncomfortable. I have a small waist, but could be more challenging otherwise. Wore once since the comfort level was low.
Very fun shirt!
Really cute and flattering top! Wore to brunch. Can tie the bow different ways

links_reviews_title: I loved this fun little top!
links_reviews_text: The fit is flattering around the waist - the only aspect that may cause issues for some is the plunging neckline. I am a DDD and was able to keep it looking respectable though - so it is manageable - but I went up a size so I could have a bit more fabric to play with around the neckline.

This was definitely a statement piece and I enjoyed wearing it. I didn't think it was the most flattering for my shape, but I loved the rich embroidery and contrast of the black/menswear stripe. I love little details like that. I halfway hoped it would be appropriate for work with a camisole, but that really takes away from the beauty of the garment. A one and done for me, but a gorgeous piece nonetheless.
An absolutely beautiful top. Would suggest sizing up if you have a larger chest. Bow was a bit difficult but stayed in place all evening.

I can not say enough good things about this top. It a must rent for everyone. The fit was perfect. I've had trouble with other wrap tops gaping open in the bust area, and this one does not. The embroidered detail at the top is gorgeous. Great option for a brunch outfit.

I rented this for a vacation/party in Arizona in late summer. The color is beautiful, but the fabric is VERY heavy! Probably too heavy to be worn in summer in the desert, so I would suggest this for spring. I'm not generally drawn to lace, but love that RTR gives me the chance to try fabrics and styles that I wouldn't normally buy!

Beautiful dress! Absolutely loved the color and received so many compliments. I had trouble figuring out my dress size, but this dress fit my body well except for the chest. My chest is on the smaller side so the straps kept falling and the dress was a little loose in that area.
It was a perfect fit and it was comfortable. I loved the style and received lots of compliments.

I adored this dress. It fit true to size and was easy to move around in and dance the night away! The length was a perfect midi length and the colors are just so fab in person! I had many people tell me I needed to buy this dress! This is perfect for a cocktail wedding!

Loved the versatility of this dress that could work for a fancy birthday dinner, a chic picnic or a girls night out. I got tons of compliments when I wore it out in Nashville for drinks and dancing. It has a unique blend of being both sexy and conservative with a well-fitting bust but longer cut with delicate lace. I wanted to keep this one!
Loved this dress. It was comfortable and unique:.
Fit great and was very flattering. If you have a smaller chest it's pretty roomy, but I also didn't need to wear a bra with it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for an early summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and style of this dress! The straps were a bit long which made the chest a little more plunging than I would have liked. Overall a comfortable and fun dress perfect for a spring or summer wedding!
Loved the color and details! Definitely low cut on me but I was able to wear a nude strapless bra for some support. The dress feels super heavy on the hanger but it felt fine on. So pretty!

links_reviews_title: So comfortable and fit in all the right places.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a banquet and it was was so flattering and comfortable. Not a true fit and flare so there were no issues with sitting or walking. I wasn't worried about how my stomach or rear looked because it was just enough room to not be skin tight from rib cage down. The cut was high enough that I wasn't falling out of it, but low enough to still have a little flare while still feeling modest. I would highly suggest this piece. I will definitely be renting again (and still thinking of buying)!

links_reviews_title: Fun, midi that was perfect for an evening wedding
links_reviews_text: Material has no stretch! Loved the color and cut. I am pear shaped and surprisingly fit me very well!
Loved the style!

links_reviews_title: Perfectly unique for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: The dress was exactly what I was looking for. It was an early fall wedding in Maine, so I wasn't sure what the temperature would be like. The length made it so I could be warm it was cold, which it was. I added a black wrap and it was perfect. The only down side to the dress is that I am small-chested, so I didn't quite fill out the top.
Love the run fit and flare of this dress. The color is stunning. It was a little big, so consider sizing down!

links_reviews_title: Perfectly appropriate for a wedding in Italy
links_reviews_text: Fire true to size

Loved this choice! At first I wasn't sure because I didn't realize the front middle seam is see through and Im not comfortable braless. I also had to pin the straps because they were too big. I got so many compliments and felt really confident all night.

links_reviews_title: This dress was incredibly gorgeous! I loved it so much!
links_reviews_text: This dress was incredibly gorgeous! I loved it so much! You don't have to wear a strapless bra. It fit perfectly. Only think is that you should be ready to show a hint of belly if your like me and like to eat at weddings lol.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a singing gig. It was perfect! I felt comfortable and elegant all night!
links_reviews_text: It fit great. I have smallish boobs though and would have loved to go bra-less with this one, but alas, I had to wear a black strapless bra. It looked fine, but the center lace is see through, and I would have preferred to keep it that way. Oh well, I still felt awesome in this dress

Cons: straps do not want to stay up! Wish it hid my belly a little better Pro: I don't have boobs but it still works. The quality of the lace is so nice. The color is pretty was nervous it would wash me out but it was alright :)

I absolutely adored this dress. It was perfect for a Vineyard Wedding. The skirt allowed for plenty of dance room. I felt secure in the top, which is important with a larger chest. The only negative is I have a slightly short torso so the midriff would fold over often and the straps were a little loose. This is a common problem I face so it didn't bother me very much. I am short, so the skirt almost went to my ankles, but I thought it looked great!

Loved the silk slip and flowered lace overlay of this dress! Definitely great quality. The top section hits at the natural waste before skating the rest of the body. Not a wide flare, but not too form fitting. My belly is my problem area, and this was just a-line enough to not make me self conscious. True to size. The only down side is that the small spaghetti straps are not adjustable, so they were slipping all night.

links_reviews_title: Unique and beautiful but huge in the chest
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a summer wedding and I felt great in it. I just wish i had a bigger chest to fill out the disproportionately large chest area. Or that the straps were adjustable. I made it work though and just brought a pashmina to cover up when I was sitting down and the chest area gapped the most. Length was perfect, color was beautiful and it generally fit fine everywhere else.

I had tried the size 2 and it was very tight on the top. The size 4 was perfect on the top but a little loose on my waist. It's ok, it gave me room to eat and dance. The fabric is heavy and the lace details are magnificent. #royalty

I wore this dress to a summer wedding and was really happy with it. I am just about 5'11 and the dress hit me at my mid calves. I do not recommend this dress for someone with a large chest. My only con was the straps were slightly big and would fall down, plus the zipper was extremely difficult to zip.
Got lots of compliments as it looks like an expensive well made dress. True to size and more comfortable than I would have thought. I'm 5'7.

I loved this dress and received many compliments on it! I thought it ran a little in the larger side and looser in the bust, which is usually the opposite for me. I'm 5'5" and the hem hit me a little above the ankle, but the length seemed fine and it worked for me. The color is a very pretty blue!
Great dress for hot weather during summer wedding season! It was the perfect outfit for a wedding and no one else had anything else like it.

I wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner and will definitely be renting again. So many compliments, such a beautifully made dress. I'm only moderately busty and thought the top was a bit tight. The dress has very little give, so I'd size up for your backup. I'm 5'9" exactly and this dress hit my shins right where the model shot shows. I can't imagine it's as flattering for shorter ladies, but for us tall girls, it's a showstopper. RENT NOW!

I liked this dress, but I loved the pictures on rtr. It wasn't as impressive in person. I had a couple of fit issues. The bodice was a little too long for my frame and a little loose. The bottom fit well. Overall, it didn't have the wow factor I look for in an event dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but not for me
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress but not for me. On me the chest was big and the waist is tight. I could have gotten away with it but overall wasn't very flattering on my body type. Also long.
Perfect for a wedding. I was comfortable all night and wasn't pulling at my dress. Would definitely recommend!

I love this dress! The lace is stunning! I received many compliments. The only negative I would have is that the top fits kind of boxy. I just feel like it could have been a tad sexier. It would definitely work perfectly for a larger bust. Otherwise this dress is a win!

Loved the color and details of this dress! I received many compliments. Beware that the dress is a bit heavy. The dress ran on the bigger side- would have been more flattering with a more fitted bodice. Wear this with a strapless bra.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely gorgeous fabric, doesn't wrinkle in transit
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a wedding and received many compliments. It's a little different than the typical wedding guest dress, very spring, comfortable post maternity as well.

links_reviews_title: Did not end up wearing for event.
links_reviews_text: Love the style and color of this dress. I didn't end up wearing because I liked another dress better for the occasion I rented it for, but it's gorgeous. Probably better suited for woman taller than me as the midi length hit a little longer than I'd like but I would love to try to make this dress work for me.
Beautiful I loved it! Zipper is hard to do up and down.... even off the hanger. But wow what a beautiful dress. I liked that I didn't need to wear a bra with it.

links_reviews_title: I appreciate this dress, but didn't like it for me.
links_reviews_text: So the design is really gorgeous as a fashion drawing/ theory. But in execution, the bodice didn't have enough "hug" or structure, and the non-stretchy pale blue fabric puckered between the black bands, so I didn't like it. It was also a little to full-coverage bra (frumpasaurus) merts little bo peep. Not me!
Loved the dress. I felt it ran a little large but not enough for me not to wear the dress. Received lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress for a spring bridal shower
links_reviews_text: Wore to a bridal shower. Fitted on top and looser at hips and below. A bit heavy. Fell to my ankles (I'm 5'2"). I did not need to wear a bra. I loved this dress and felt amazing. Both the size 4 and size 6 did have a smell to them, they arrived in sealed bags and one had the tag still on, so I assumed this was due to being new.

I wore this to a school dinner and received many compliments, it is a beautiful dress with lots of detail. I definitely had to size up to be comfortable, but length was perfect on me. As I've come to find out, most designer dress zippers are a nightmare (this one is no different) so make sure you have one (or two) people zip you up.

Fabric is thick and stretchy - very flattering cut. I was surprised this retails for only $100! I wore this out to dinner and a concert for a date and it was perfect. Definitely short but I'm 5'8" and it hit me at the right spot. Definitely recommend
Don't rent if you're afraid of shoulder pads! Lovely dress, color, and material. A bit long for my 5'2 frame, and the shoulder were a smidge overpowering.

One of my favorite RTR dresses!!!!! This hot number is sure to please. I wore this to my husbands Christmas party and he couldn't keep his eyes off me. This dress fit perfectly. I'm typically a size 6 and I rented the small and medium, the small fit the best. The material is very thick so I wouldn't rent for a summer outside event. The sleeves are trendy and the length is short.

The dress definitely shows off your cleavage. I ended up pinning it just a little bit because I didn't want people to talk to my chest all night. Lol but it fit good & actually was nice & warm for a cold day! Stretchy material too.

Was a bit nervous about the material looking cheap but it's a nice thick material perfect for colder weather occasions. The color is gorgeous! Yes it is quite low cut with an open neck- but if you have a small chest like me you can 100% pull it off without looking trashy. Dress stayed in place, no tape needed. Comfortable and fit perfectly. Got compliments all night.

Fit true to size and extremely flattering. If you are large busted and don't like showing cleavage, this dress is not for you. I got a ton of compliments on this dress! I have broad shoulders so I was nervous about the poofy shoulders but this didn't make them look anymore broad. The texture in the dress was very forgiving so spanx weren't necessary. I would own this dress!!

I rented this dress for the long sleeves and to hide my problem area (stomach). Overall, I was pretty happy with it. With the help of Spanx, my tummy wasn't a worry area for me that night. I did feel a little exposed with the cut of the top, but it was fine. Keeping in mind I have a short torso, I had to safety pin the dress tighter at the base of my neck and use fashion tape to make sure my chest was covered. I definitely could not wear a bra. It's pretty short in length, so you have to feel comfortable with a mini skirt. I would only rent again if I lost some weight - so skinny girls, rent away!

links_reviews_title: Oh man y'all, I looked SO good in this.
links_reviews_text: Threw the Holiday Party for my office so I needed the perfect Hostess Dress and let me tell you I felt fucking INCREDIBLE in this. This dress was the talk of the party - classy sleeve + shoulder with just enough sex appeal in the low cut, color is a phenomenal oxblood that screams "CHRISSMUSS", fabric was comfy as hell and thick enough for the gross weather happening outside to barely bother me (Dec. 14th in NYC was disgusting). Fit perfectly for me - I'm thin but hourglassed so I'm used to taking up more skirt space but I still had a bit of flare at the bottom!! You're a fucking idiot if you don't rent this dress for your holiday party - you'll be the hottest lil' cranberry at the ball.

links_reviews_title: Perfectly low cut for a date night
links_reviews_text: Took my husband out for his birthday and he always loves me in low cut dresses. This one does not disappoint! Very comfortable to wear, definitely very tailored dress but I wore spandex and felt great. The material is apparently flammable but perfectly warm for Texas winters.

This dress was perfect for my event! I love that the puff sleeves add personality. There were a couple of things that one definitely needs to pay attention to, though: it's very low cut and very warm material. You will probably need fashion tape and/or a safety pin. I used both just to be safe. Also I didn't have an issue with the warm material, however I think that if you tend to get hot this material might be a no-go in some settings. It is very thick and very warm for dancing. At 5'2" this dress was a good length for me for a company party.

I wore this dress to a fall wedding, 6 weeks after giving birth and this dress made me feel pretty and comfortable in my own skin. I do have to warn that it is a bit low cut but perfect dress to pump/breastfeed in :)

I wore a size small and I'm between sizes 2 and 4. It fit well. And it has a tie around the waist to make it more adjustable. It is quite short and verrrry low cut. The material felt/looked kind of inexpensive. All in all, I felt like I looked good in the dress but wouldn't rent it again.

Loved this dress, but as a 36DD and someone with a short torso, had to wear a camisole underneath it - the front opening came to just above my belly button. Got tons of compliments on the color and sleeves though!!
The color was more maroon than red in shade. The v-neck was quite low cut. The material was not my favorite.

links_reviews_title: Was supposed to be for Valentine's Day but we both got sick that week
links_reviews_text: Tight and short! but stretchy thick material. very low cut.

links_reviews_title: Felt like I could wear it to work. Not sexy,
links_reviews_text: I wanted a long sleeved dress to wear to my birthday dinner in February, and to go out in afterwards. This just wasn't it. Nice dress, but not sexy enough to go out in.

I was sent this dress as a back up when the original dress I ordered wasn't available. It did not flatter me in any way. Too low cut, tight in the tummy, shoulder detail was odd and the dress was way too short (I'm only 5'2"). There was no way I could have made this dress work. I didn't wear it.
This dress was comically low cut! I rented this for Christmas dinner, I had to return

links_reviews_title: Broad shouldered ladies should avoid unless you like to show them off
links_reviews_text: The shoulders are a lot puffier than I realized and really emphasized my broad shoulders. I ended up returning without wearing. The positive is that it is very Pretty material and thick so very forgiving!! My only negative is that it simply was not great for my body type.
I needed a pin to fasten the front but otherwise a great dress!

Neckline was wayyyyy too low! Sleeves were ENORMOUS! I wanted to love this dress but it just did not work for me. Fabric was of good quality, dress was in great condition, but it was not wearable. What a bummer. Not good for tiny chested, petite ladies!

links_reviews_title: Too short and sleeves too big
links_reviews_text: For perfect but the dress was too short with it without tights and sleeves were way too puffy

The small was a little short especially with the slit and I'm 5'2". It was very low cut, half way down my chest. So I put a simple lace bra on underneath which was really cute. Very warm. The sleeves were a little long so I just tucked them under. Overall I really liked the dress. It was very comfortable. Probably could not have danced much in it secondary to the length.

links_reviews_title: Wrong size but beautiful form fitting design
links_reviews_text: Size was too big, but great material and form .
low and wide cut in chest.
They were a bit too large for me and you could see them move as I moved.

I wanted to like this dress, but the cut is just too low to make it wearable. I usually find RTR clothes are too modestly cut for my taste, but this was just unwearable. The cut came down below the base of my bra. I tried to make it work with fashion tape, but ended up having to wear a tank top underneath. Wouldn't recommend.

links_reviews_title: Loved it. The material was soft and comfy. Not too short, but very sexy. Great holiday night out.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. Pretty low cut. So get a low cut bra or pasties.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and I got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Very low cut - especially for big boobs. I had to wear a tank underneath, but it was still super cute.

links_reviews_title: It’s a no for me dawg.
links_reviews_text: It wasn’t flattering, too big and just a no with the puff sleeves.

Runs short - I'm 5'8 and wore a small, hemline barely grazed my finger tips. The cut hit me well and i got a ton of compliments. The shoulders are fun and trendy. Perfect for a party and when you're going for a more sexy vibe.
The neckline is very low cut and wide.

links_reviews_title: Couldn’t get it zipped and it was way too short anyway to wear to a work party.
links_reviews_text: Ran very small and was way too short.

Loved the dress - good quality and style. Heavy fabric. I normally wear a size S and ordered this in size S, but it was a little too big on top and quite snug on the bottom. I didn't bother to try a size up because I knew the top would just be too loose around the bust. This might work better on someone with a larger chest and/or shorter waist. It's a super cute dress so I hope it will look fabulous on someone!

links_reviews_title: I took a hard pass on wearing it
links_reviews_text: The material is thick but it feels relatively cheap. You need to be on the flatter side with regard to your chest to wear this without a shirt under it. I ended up not wearing it. The front exposed my breasts and the bottom made me look chunky.
Super fun short and very comfortable! Boxy fit and slightly cropped.
This top is awesome. So COMFY!!!! Great for casual or formal.

links_reviews_title: Didn't expect to be so obsessed!
links_reviews_text: Pleasantly surprised by how much I loved this top. It was so easy to easy but also great design. Paired it with light denim ankle pants and then later more dressed up with rust colored gauchos. Perfect crop length for a high waisted pant. I would definitely purchase this top!

Generous fit with half shirt length. I don't normally show off my tummy (some things should remain private) so I put on high waisted pants and lived my best life. Everything about this blouse is comfy and stylish. Medium weight material holds shape well.
Really boxy cut, so go with something fitted on the bottom. Comfortable and interesting, but not so cool that I wanna buy it.
I loved this top! I paired it with high waisted blacked jeans and booties and I was perfect for work and then out to drinks/dinner afterwards.

links_reviews_title: Fun and Futuristic looking top-great for a casually festive occasion.
links_reviews_text: I wore this several times and felt great in it. I usually wear an XS, but the Small was very comfortable. It's cropped but I'm short-waisted so it worked great. The shape of the sleeves makes it difficult to wear a jacket over this, but it's fleece lined and quite warm, at least for a mild So Cal winter.
Turned a black guess jeans into a stylish outfit
Can be worn with jeans or something more formal. Lots of compliments.
Very chic, festive and comfortable. I wore this top with some high waisted black pants and some over the knee boots.

links_reviews_title: More of a crop top than the photo shows.
links_reviews_text: This is a crop top. I could not find any pants - even high-waisted ones, that did not make this a bare midriff shirt. The photo is inaccurate.
I thought this top would be cool for a night out, but the boxy cropped cut was just ok. The fabric is pretty and is lined in a scuba material making it cozy for a chilly night.
Slightly cropped, incredibly well-made, and so much fun. I wish I could keep it.

links_reviews_title: RTR size guide correct - runs large
links_reviews_text: I rented Small based on user reviews. RTR said it ran large; they were correct. I needed an XS. Too much fabric to wear. BEAUTIFUL top.

links_reviews_title: Crop top - wouldn't rent if you're short.
links_reviews_text: Crop top with super thick material, I was hoping to be able to 'french tuck' it but it wouldn't fit and somewhat fell boxy. However, fun holiday bronze color.
This is a CROPPED top. Very short.

links_reviews_title: Wearing a fantastic dress with fun accessories!
links_reviews_text: This dress is a must! I’m 5’6 140 and the large fit literally perfect. Very flattering. Very classy. The pockets are fantastic touch. The reviews were right on for sizing. The rib cage area definitely runs very snug. With that it helps the dress fit so well that you don’t have to pull it up much.
So many compliments. The pockets were so functional, it was comfortable and it flowed so nicely on the dance floor

links_reviews_title: Fun dress, great pockets, perfect length, large bust
links_reviews_text: Let me say that I was happy with this dress at the event I attended. It was a fun, formal, comfortable dress and I got complemented on it several time. The dress fit my waist, but I had to get a little creative to make the bust fit. I wore two bras to fill in the dress, then safety pinned the dress to one of the bras to keep it up. I'm not really flat chested so I was surprised to have that issue. Aside from that, it was the perfect dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful classic black dress, and it has pockets!!
links_reviews_text: Got this one as a backup because my first one was too long. Turned out to be so beautiful, and I received so many compliments!! Very form-fitting in bodice but stayed up well. Comfortable dress with pockets!! The length was mid-calf on the model but floor length on me. Perfect for our Mardi Gras ball!
I got so many compliments on this dress!! I rented it for NYE and loved it. Fit well, loved the pockets, and you could tell it was well made with good quality material. I wish I owned this dress!
Pockets were so cute, dress fit well. Had to pull it up from time to time, but that could have been my choice in undergarment
Small chested girls beware though, the XSR was a bit loose on the chest and I had to keep pulling it up while dancing. Otherwise looked great!

"Screw the work party take me out on the town!" This is what I told my significant other the second I put the dress on! I am no night owl but this dress gave me life! This dress screams "please show me off!". It does fit a bit snug under the bust line (but that could have been a result of my dinner 😏🙄.)

I had rented both the medium and the small for a black tie optional wedding in NYC. I ended up going with the medium, and while it was longer than probably intended, it was perfect with a pair of heels. Thick, durable fabric that kept me warm, and POCKETS!
Great for small chested ladies - didn't have to worry about dress falling down at all!

I am a 32A chest and I could not get this XS zipped! The issue was mostly around my rib cage which is not that much wider. I almost wondered if a S would fit had I ordered that This is a beautiful dress but another warning for short women (I'm 5 feet tall) is that it's a LOT of fabric - may be a bit overwhelming on smaller frames.
Loved! This dress was comfortable and gorgeous. Compliments all night. Didn't have to hike it up once and I am not built for strapless dresses but this one was great

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress and felt so good in it. The hem is great and makes you feel like you're floating!
The dress was perfect for the outdoor formal event.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear an 8R (MR) in standards dresses and jumpsuits...luckily my backup size (LR) worked. For this designer order a size up and the next size up for your backup.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress! Really enjoyed the pockets! Received many compliments throughout the evening.
links_reviews_text: Initially, I was unable to get into the dress but with some help from my sister and daughter, I was able to get it on! Although I had trouble with the back zipper, once the dress was on, I was able to bend, dance, breath with complete ease!

It was chosen as a replacement for my original item. Very good choice. Material was high quality but also a bit heavy. Pockets were a plus. I normally do not wear strapless but felt very secure in this dress. I loved it!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a summer black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a black tie wedding. It was a great simple dress for the summer months. Although it feels heavy in weight, I didn't feel weighed down by it. I'm 125 lbs 5'2" and the small fit perfectly. It is a good choice for shorter girls as most long gowns will be too long.

this dress was a hit at a gala I attended! It was so comfortable, the way it fit wasn't too tight or too loose. the top has support in it so I didn't even have to wear a bra - which is a huge plus! + it has pockets :)

The dress is beautiful, I received many compliments! I only wish I had gone with the petite sizing because the fabric is very heavy and needed to be pulled up throughout the night. The pockets were an added bonus.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for a ballroom dance-focused black tie event and it was perfect. Easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: The drape of this dress is beautiful, thanks to the heavier (but still summer-appropriate) fabric. I wore it to a black tie formal event for work and received a lot of compliments. I was grateful for the backup size, since I ended up sizing up from small to medium (I typically wear a size 4 pants/skirt).
This dress was my favorite so far- fit snug in the ribcage but otherwise great. For the girls who love pockets- it has them!

I got the small and the xs as a backup size but ended up wearing the xs. S would have been fine but xs fit snugger and felt like it would stay up better. If you're short like me this dress will be floor length. (I'm 5'1", 108lbs) The fabric is a little heavy but hangs nice and the pockets are amazing.

I wore this to a black tie optional wedding. With the right accessories: statement earrings (I also rented the Ocean Palisades Tassle Earrings) and a lime green clutch, this was gorgeous. I’m 5’2” and the length was perfect with heels. It was snug around the rib cage (32A) but was very large in the cups/chest. When I first put this on I immediately packed it back up because I could fit my hand sideways between myself and the fabric. But then my first choice arrived and it was a hot mess so I put this one back on. I had to sew extra pads onto my padded bra (sad, I know) AND use fashion tape to keep it from gaping off my chest. It wasn’t sliding down at all and I never had to tug it back up, I just needed a lot of help filling it out up top. In the end it was a success. The dress is heavy and beautiful and has pockets!! I would definitely recommend but if you have a smaller chest be prepared to make some accommodations.

It fit perfectly. It really felt as though I was floating throughout the entire night. I didn't know the dress had pockets but that made the dress 20x better. I rented it for a scholarship gala dinner and I was able to eat in it (which is very important to me lol) I'm definitely going to rent it again. It is a beautiful elegant dress.

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove and was super comfortable.
links_reviews_text: This dress is a great material. It is just heavy enough that it lays perfect but not too heavy. It fits through the bodice perfectly. The pockets made it even more special. I would rent this dress again. I received compliments all night and happily shared that I got it from rent the runway!

links_reviews_title: Great for ANY body type, well made
links_reviews_text: I wear btw a 6 and 8, and the medium fit like a glove. The material was heavy and expensive feeling, and it flowed beautifully. I got so many compliments on this dress and felt like I was going to an award show. I'm short and dresses never look good on me. I think this one did. It was slimming, too.

The XLR was by back up size, I am a size 10, 5'6, 155 pounds and a FF bra size. The Large did fit, but was a tighter fit across by bust and was not nearly as comfortable. I did wear a bra with this just because the XL being a little larger did not give me quite the support as the L but the dress was amazing. All I can say is POCKETS!!! lip gloss in one and my phone in the other, no need for a clutch! Totally recommend this dress!

The dress is classic yet very stylish and flattering. Fits a little tight around the rib cage but comfortable to dance in all night once you're snug on there. I'm anywhere between a 6-10 and the MD fit well. Length was great (I'm 5' 9") and the pockets are a game changer. At one point during the gala a sweet girl stopped me and told me my dress was the best in the room. This dress is a winner!

I wore this to a black tie gala. It was so comfortable The fabric is quite thick but really nice. I wore my back up size medium. The small was too tight in my chest and I couldn't zip It all the way up. I'm a size 4, 130lbs, but have a large chest. I would size up if you have a larger chest. I would rent again!
