Great fit. Well constructed. I'm a 36D, and was able to wear it without a bra. The fabric was beautiful with wonderful weight to it. Accessories made all the difference. Even in tea-length, I did not feel under-dressed in a room full of full-length, sequined, bedazzled, young, beautiful women. At 56, it's always a challenge to walk the age appropriate line when shopping strapless dresses but this piece was an instant classic! The pockets were EVERYTHING!

As an event producer and emcee this dress was perfect and made my job so easy at the Gala auction & Dinner I produced. Pockets we're a dream and allowed me to be functional, sophisticated, and elegant.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments and felt super classy the whole time!
links_reviews_text: It fit really well when on, however it was really hard to zip! I ended up having to put it on already zipped and then it worked great! Got so many compliments and didn't want to take it off at the end of the night!

I wasn't impressed with this dress. It didn't fit well in either size I ordered, and was so heavy. It just added weight to my lower section. The top wasn't super flattering and it hit kind of low on the back. I would recommend this for very skinny tall girls, but not curvy girls.

I usually avoid strapless dresses because I don't want to tug it up all night, but this one fit perfectly. The material is a bit thicker, but it was perfect for Florida winter and didn't wrinkle a bit. Plus, it has pockets!

Loved this dress! I am small chested and pear shaped and this dress flattered that perfectly. Even being small chested the body was still tight and tough to zip up, so keep that in mind if you are larger up top. Dress was good quality, and I loved the the tea length. And...it has pockets! Considering renting again for another gala next month, just wish I would have got better quality pictures in it last weekend! :)

links_reviews_title: Easy fit, looked great, easy delivery and return
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect, even w small busy

links_reviews_title: I felt totally glamorous and POCKETS!
links_reviews_text: I was really unsure about this dress when I rented it, but once it was on I was obsessed. I chose this as my backup dress in my order so I only had one size. I'm generally a 6/8 and I'm curious how the LR would have fit. The MR zipped up fine but it was definitely snug, not that you could tell but the boning was definitely felt when I sat down for a while. I had to wear it without a bra, but I never found myself pulling it up or anything. I was locked and loaded. The fabric is interesting and it wrinkles easily. The hem needs some work to lay correctly so make sure you have a steamer! I will definitely rent this dress again.
Fit was perfect, I'm not the average height so it was longer than it probably should have been it still made me feel beautiful!

I really loved this dress. The strapless detail with the long skirt was great for a formal wedding. I loved the flow and the fabric was heavy enough to keep me warm for a winter wedding. The skirt was nearly floor length with 3" heels on me. The bodice was tight, but I still had to pull up the dress a few too many times. Pockets were obviously a winning feature. Not sure I would rent again, but I would recommend it as a wonderful, simple and classic black dress.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress. Received compliments all night long.
links_reviews_text: I'm a street size 8 but ordered the large because of my large rib cage and 34DD bust. The dress was still a little snug so take this into account for those of you with large chests. The material was heavy which allowed the dress the fall beautifully. I was concerned wearing strapless, but had no issues. I will definitely rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: This shirt is sexy and flirty and a real head turner!
links_reviews_text: Wore a satin bralette under and it was still super sexy but no nip shows!
I loved this shirt definitely a little revealing but so perfect for a night out with the boyfriend! It fit great!

Like others say, it runs a tad small with not much give and it's darn near impossible to get off, BUT, it's sexy and fun! I did have to pin the middle opening...it just gaped way too much. But it was flattering and different. Perfect for a holiday party!

Absolutely loved this. I have a larger bust so this was the absolute smallest I probably could have ordered but super flattering. Arms feel tight at first but after hour wearing it loosens up a bit. Will definitely order again!
Such a feminine & very flattering blouse-It is sheer -but didn't show too much because the front had layered fabric --The sleeves are lightweight & hang so beautifully:)

links_reviews_title: Fun piece but runs very small
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a birthday party and received a lot of compliments. I ordered a 4 which is my usual size - I wish I had ordered a 6, because it was a little snug. There is NO give in the material whatsoever.

I loved this top. I planned to wear with some black pants until I saw it's clearly navy just FYI. I just wore a low cut bra underneath which is unlike anything I ever wear but felt great in this. You definitely need a larger chest to fill out the top otherwise it's way too low. There's no stretch to it and the mid section seems small compared to the chest but it worked for me.

I love this top! However, it is sheer all over, so if you do not want to show skin you will need to wear something under it. The detail on the sleeves are so nice. The top runs true to size but I would size up for the back up. The fabric has no stretch. This can be dressed up or down!
So many people admired this top! The fabric is not forgiving, so dont wear it if youre going out for a wild night. Overall loved!

Ok girls...buy yourself an elastic wide belt with designwork on the front (I did a bejeweled belt from amazon). It hangs a bit so needs brought in at the waist. Need a very low cut push up bra. This is see through. Worn with leggings, tall heeled boots, and belt as above. If you want to get around your middle showing through grab a black snap front corset. Combined with a bra looks uniform. Also, this shirt is NAVY not black.
Loose fit, sheer, lots of cleavage perfect for fall dinner date. Wore twice

Great feminine top for jeans or skinny black pants. Runs a bit small with No stretch in fabric. Wore with a black regular lace bra. With Unlimited I don't spend all my clothing $ on clothes I have a more extensive lingerie, shoe, jean collection to augment the faboulous rentals! Love RTR.
The overall concept is great. Love the sheer fabric and ruffle. However it was big and small in the wrong places.
I doubt I was sent a size 4, seemed more like a size 0. I but couldn't check because the tags were cut off. I doubt they even knew what size it was when they shipped it.

links_reviews_title: there is absolutely no give to this shirt. it is very cute and chic
links_reviews_text: runs small shirt was faded

Even though I didn't wear this top, I thought it was beautiful. Unfortunately it was too tight in the chest (I'm a size 34C) and I wasn't able to zip it up all the way. The fit was too tight for an appropriate work top.
Is a little lower cut than the photo represents. Not sure I will wear this. It is cute though. A little tight.
Runs small, the sleeve detail was too much but could have worked if I sized up
great
Runs a little small. But love the look! Wore a black fitted tank under. Also can't tell if it was navy blue or black.
Definitely fit a full size smaller and is a short length shirt. Didn’t end up wearing it

links_reviews_title: Very cute but too tight to wear!
links_reviews_text: Quality garment but material has no stretch at all. I usually wear a medium but would need a much larger size for this to be comfortable

I'm larger breasted but with the chest to neck ratio on this piece I could not have sized up any more without it gaping around the breast area. Still a beautiful top but a little more difficult for women like me with a larger chest.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it. Fit is very strange
links_reviews_text: Not a good fit

I rented this blouse for everyday, but after trying it on, I chose to pair it with jeans for a night out with friends. This top brings all the sexy out because of the deep-V, how sheer it is, and the cut-outs. Underneath, I paired it with a black plunge bra and no jewelery.

One of those blouses that is easy to wear but lands you a million compliments. The keyhole front is quite dramatic so if you don't like showing your bust you may not like. But if you like a little drama this looks great with jeans or even for going out with a more elevated black bottom.
Beautiful blouse, great quality great fit.

links_reviews_title: Great silhouette, a little too snug in the chest
links_reviews_text: Great silhouette, a little too snug in the chest

This jumpsuit was a show stopper. I am a 43 year old married mom of two boys. I was stopped all night by women complimenting me and asking about my outfit. I felt like a Star. The kicker was when a 25 year old attendee called me a vision and then insisted that I attend his upcoming Halloween party.. this is before he realized my husband is his boss. It gave me quite the ego boost!! Note: it was WORTH the sacrifice, but it is NOT restroom friendly. I "held" it bc the alternative was no good.

My best friend got me Cher tickets for my birthday because we've both been obsessed with her. And I knew I wanted to wear a jumpsuit with a mod flair without being tacky. This couldn't have been a better pick. I was nervous about it fitting since I'm 5'2" but with some platform wedges, it was absolutely perfect. I felt amazing in it all night, even after eating and drinking. This was one of the first pieces I've seriously debated keeping.
Fabric was on the thicker side which made it perfect for wearing out in 40 degree weather. Loved the color and fit. So fun to wear!

Rented this for Christmas Eve Dinner. Tons of compliments all night. Material was great and length was perfect with for my 5'3 frame and 3 1/2 inch heels. Cons were I am quite busty and I really had to stuff the girls in and hope they stayed put! Wore a cami bra underneath that you could see along the sides but I didn't remove the cape so it wasn't a problem.
Orange is the new black! Great material, but the cape button was missing- you can wear it with or w/o the cape which was a fun change up. Lots of double sided tape required!

Great for event - loved the length - two inch heels would have been enough for my height Great fit and love the large legs Low cut and sexy- it was perfect - the cape just lies on your shoulders so it kept slipping off - I went most of the night without it but it's a great piece
The pant is a little short but that's the style. Personally, I like a longer pant. I didn't have to wear a bra with it either! The waist was tight enough to hold them up pretty well.

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit with cape is stunning!
links_reviews_text: It fit perfect and flattered in all the right places. It was perfect for a 70s themed party in a ski lodge on the top of the mountain in Lake Tahoe!
You may think and orange jumpsuit can't be hot, but this is a head turner! Only con is I am 5'1 and it was way too long so you will need double stick tape

links_reviews_title: It fit fairly well, and looked really polished. It was a total hit!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a Dance through the Decades event. It really looks good, with or without the cape. Cape is not attached, so I did fear losing it. It is low cut, but kept me held in. There was an issue with camel toe when I stood up with my feet close together, but since this is a common jumpsuit issue, I just would take pictures striking a wide-leg stance pose. Overall, very happy!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a themed party. Amazing fit!!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a 70s party and it was a hit! Very high quality material.
This outfit was amazing! All eyes were on me the whole night. I wore it for an Anniversary dinner. Very comfortable and the color makes you pop. I would rent this again! I loved loved loved it!

The jumpsuit is a definite attention-getter but this is NOT for TALL women. I am 5'7" and the front wedgie situation was not enjoyable. As it was a costume I went on with it but if it had been for a formal occasion it would have been unacceptable. I would say overall it runs quite small. I normally wear a 6 and the M was uncomfortably tight in the bodice. In any case I went with the L to try to squeeze every inch of length out.
I rented this for a photoshoot, it's a unique garment, really fun to wear. It does run a bit small/short -I'm 5'8''and I rented the large and it barely fit it both the length on legs and torso.

links_reviews_title: The cape turned heads all night
links_reviews_text: It created a bit of a cameltoe that I struggled with all night and you need help putting the cape back on if you go to the bathroom

I loved everything about this look. It's a total head-turner, and I felt like a million bucks. I was most concerned about the length, but the XSR was spot on - I'm 5'4" and wore it with heels. The overall fit and quality were also excellent. Thanks for making me feel like a star, RTR!
I rented this piece for my birthday. I received so many compliments! I felt and looked fabulous!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for small busted and larger hipped ladies - great date night look!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a date and for my blog - www.bellemeetsworld.com - and it was perfect! This is extremely flattering, especially to women with a smaller bust and larger hips like me. The cape is broken and doesn't connect to the outfit but that was okay because with the cape it looked a little too costume-y. Without it, it was a classy date night outfit! I wore it without a bra because I'm small-busted. The coverage on the sides, front and back is great - no extra skin popping out or worries about other things (breasts) popping out! I'm a size 6 and the medium fit like a glove - with SPANX, of course. I say it runs small only because there was no extra room in the jumpsuit and after dinner I was sucking in. I would definitely recommend this look!

links_reviews_title: I wore this jumpsuit to emcee an entrepreneurship event for women and girls. I was so FLY!
links_reviews_text: Be ready to turn heads ... this outfit is STUNNING!

links_reviews_title: I love this!! I wore it to a charity event and I got so many complements.
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size. I am 5'3" approx. 130 lbs. with a smaller bust and bigger behind. The top fit perfect, it actually enhanced my small bust. I had to wear spanx as my tummy isn't as fit I would like it but with the spanx it looked great. Please note that this jumpsuit is not very forgiving. But If you want to be the "chic" one at the party, go with this look.

links_reviews_title: I LOVE THIS JUMPSUIT. I rented it a second time, but someone forgot the cape, so I didn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: The small was tight, but perfect that I didn't have to wear a bra. Definitely could have though.
This jumpsuit is amazing! Wore it to horse racing event and received so many compliments! Great quality, fit and comfortable in cold spring weather!

links_reviews_title: First time renting and I definitely will again!!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a pageant orientation and it was truly amazing!! I ordered a two and a four.. The two was slightly small so I went with my typical size which is 4. It was a little long but with 5.5" inch tippy top heels from Chinese laundry it was perfect! You also don't need to wear a bra so that's another plus.. For some reason the size 4 didn't come with a cape but that's okay... I will be mailing it back today (wish I could keep it) will be renting this again!

I rented this jumpsuit for my birthday dinner and couldn't have picked a better outfit! It went so well with the ambience of the restaurant. I'm a blogger so I was also able to take some pictures in it as well which was really fun! I found the fit to be true to size and very comfortable. I'm not tall, but found the length to be perfect once I put on my heels.
This was a show stopper! I was the center of attention on ny 41st bday! Coral colors bright. Zipper was a bit difficult, but fit was comfortable! Will be wearing this again.

links_reviews_title: Fit & color were gorgeous!!! I want to buy this!
links_reviews_text: This was perfect for a rehearsal dinner. So comfortable and fun.

links_reviews_title: Sexy, fun worn for 70's theme party.
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a 70's theme party and it was perfect. Length and fit were great and I usually look heavy in rompers/pants. I would have worn this out to a regular party (minus the cape which is removable). The color was bright and fun and the cut showed the right amount of cleavage.

links_reviews_title: "You look like a model!" Adulting the best I could for a holiday dinner and party at my university.
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this jumpsuit. At first I was nervous because the description said that it was red, but the color online looked more orange-y. I also was unsure of the sizing because I have a smaller bust compared to my hips. I ordered a SR and an XSR as my backup. The XSR was the winner. I didn't even try on the SR because the way the XSR fit was as perfect as it would get. Because I have a small bust, there was a bit of space on the sides, so I used cutlets. It has very long legs so heels are a must. The torso area is a bit awkward in fitting as it bunches up because of the fit in the legs (maybe I should've worn the SR), but I loved it. I received so many compliments, and of course, no one had on my identical outfit thanks to RTR! Definitely a show stopping outfit!

I rented this for a 70s party and it was fantastic for that purpose. I do think it runs slightly small. I'm normally a 4 and ordered a small in this. It was slightly tight in the stomach. I'm 5'7", and while there weren't any issues with the length, the torso length was slightly short so I wouldn't recommend that size to anyone taller than me. Note that the cape is not actually detachable. It is fully attached on one side and only detaches from the other side so that you have access to the back zipper to take it on and off. It's an orangey red, like it appears in the picture. It's a thinner material that can show lumps and bumps and you need smooth panties under it. And as you can see in the photo, you would need a special bra or to go braless to not have one showing. The bra I was wearing is fairly low cut in the front and normal on the sides and you could see my bra in the front and on the sides.

links_reviews_title: Love being able to look fab for a great price!
links_reviews_text: Wish it came in more colors! Definitely recommend. I have a small waist and thicker legs and butt and this jumpsuit fit like a glove! I'm usually a size 2 and was in between XS and S. I went with XS!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a 70s themed birthday party - it was awesome! Material/tailoring are high quality.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size; v-neckline was sexy but not too revealing; outfit was comfortable; design was unique. Only issue/complain is that the cape is not fully removable as advertised - one side is stitched on and the other side as a hook/eye clasp (that didn't always stay in place).

links_reviews_title: Loved this pantsuit! Would order again!
links_reviews_text: The website said for 5'2"-5'6". I am 5'8" and the length was perfect for flats but the stride was a little short. I should have order the XL but I loved wearing it and the L worked for me! The cape is an added bonus as was chilly at party and covered my arms, but it is attached to one side of pantsuit so you can not take it off. I had a ton of compliments and felt very special, I would order it again!
Wore this for Halloween, it looked amazing. Tight in the chest, so size up for larger cup sizes. Loved the cape!

links_reviews_title: Beyond beautiful jumpsuit! Soooo many compliments
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'2ish and very petite, this jumpsuit fit perfectly. I had to wear my tallest heels but it looked great. It's hard to find jumpsuits that can fit small figures. Felt amazing in this outfit!
Extremely comfortable. Fabric was a little bit thick in a flattering way, was able to wear without a bra. I am 5'4" and wore this with heels, the length was perfect.

Loved the fit! The cape was perfect. The only con was that there was something wrong with the zipper which made it hard to go up and down and needed someone to help me with it all night which was a pain. Another con was that I ordered it to arrive on Thursday, but did not get it until Friday night.
Great fit, a bit short (need to wear low heels) and crotch area a bit short as well, might ot be for very *long torso

Size up if you are busty; this jumpsuit is a little low cut, and will squeeze you up top. The cape is detachable, and attaches with hooks. The one I rented was missing a hook on one side, so it would fall off that shoulder if not secured with a safety pin.
This has a beautiful fit and the color is gorgeous. Got lots of compliments

Got this for an after hours work party. The color was great. The front was a tad low cut for a work event, but because I don't have huge boobs I barely got away with it. The torso area does pull a little tight in the crotch region so i would not recommend if you have a long torso. I did not wear the cape either. also wish it had a lining as the material was not very thick. Overall it was nice though. Unfortunately i forgot to take a photo in it :(

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous and fun rental for night out!
links_reviews_text: Wore this in Vegas for a night out with my husband and it was fantastic! Perfect fit and, surprisingly, not itchy at all. The high neckline compliments the open back. Highly recommend!

I rented this for my senior homecoming and I loved it! It was really cute and slimming. The only issues were that I couldn't bend over at all or it would be an extremely uncomfortable situation, and I couldn't raise my arms past my shoulders. Besides those things it was still really cute and I don't dance too much so for me I could still move in it pretty well

Beautiful romper! The lace was soft and comfortable; not like the cheap lace on some. The fit was larger because I had to size up. I was worried about the length as reported on other reviews. The length was perfect but the shoulders and waist were too big. I made it work. This romper is a great way to combine style and comfort for a night time wedding. So many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for showing off a lot of leg
links_reviews_text: I wore this out to a burlesque show date it fit beautiful, did not tug anywhere (I'm very straight so often pieces are tight on my waist) and the material was quality. Be aware, this piece is verrrrry short. I like to highlight my legs so I thought the high neck and sleeves were a great balance for that but I know for some it would still be too short. I paired with drop earrings that I also got from RTR and a pop of color in the shoe.

If you're not a romper fan, be prepared to be converted! This lace beauty will be your date night go-to for the rest of time. Tall ladies be warned, your ass will hang out. But it's worth it! On my 5'9" frame, the shorts hit mid-thigh. However the way the shorts are cut, they actually elongate your legs, even with heavier thighs. I chose a 12 instead of a 10 in the hopes for a looser fit with a bit more length. It was definitely a bit roomy in the waist. Loved this so much I bought it!

I'm not usually one to wear rompers or jumpsuits - my torso is too long for them, but this one was so cute! The open back was a cute feature. It was a little snug in the neck, so I sized up and it worked great. Also, since I have a long torso, it was a little too short on me, but with tights it mellowed it down quite a bit. Perfect for a night out!
Super cute! But very short. I am not a tall person, and I have a short torso. I sized up two sizes based on reviews, so glad I did!
This romper was perfect - details and lacing were great! For tall girls (I'm 5' 9" and 140 and wore a size 8) beware that the back / butt area runs short so you have have a mini situation happening
EVERYONE loved this outfit. From guests to staff & even strangers in passing, the compliments did not cease. Highly recommend but be weary it is shorter than expected, not bad, but shorter.

links_reviews_title: LOVED This and so did the fellas lol
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a party at a conference and it made me feel like a badass. The high neck and lace makes it classy, but the open back and short shorts definitely spiced things up. I might actually end up buying this because I loved it so much. I was worried the long sleeves and lace would make this too hot for summer, but this breathes well and I didn't feel too stuffy. Can't say enough about this!

links_reviews_title: Sexy, yet classy-- runs small, but correct size is FABULOUS!
links_reviews_text: What a beautiful romper! I got so many compliments! The fit ran small, but the right size just made me feel and look so fabulous!! I am 5'2", 158lbs, 34/36 C: size 10 was the best fit! Snug enough to be sexy, but loose enough to feel good! Very short in the behind- so if you're tall- it may be too short. I would say size up one! Overall, it's gorgeous and i wish i owned it!
Runs small but it was so flattering and cute. Thick fabric.
#night out

links_reviews_title: Who wears short shorts?! She wears short shorts! Party in the back!!
links_reviews_text: Amazing. Loose fitting legs. Open back. No bra. High neck. Fully lace. Slowly sleeves. Genius piece.
Let me tell you, if I could have a forever outfit, this would be it. I felt so sexy in it and received compliments all night. I will likely rent it again.

This piece did receive a lot of compliments and I was VERY surprised (pleasantly) how well it fit! It has an open back so I went braless and it was very comfortable. Best part - lace doesn't wrinkle when traveling :) highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Sexy, comfy, pockets for days, but be ready to show some booty.
links_reviews_text: Runs true to size, if not a touch small. I'm regularly a 10, and the 8 fit me, but I went with the 10 to get as much length as possible. This thing is SUPER short. Definitely can't even slightly bend over without showing some cheek. The high neck and long sleeves are the perfect contrast to the short length, and open back. Beautiful blend of sexy and conservative. Surprisingly comfortable. I went bra-less with this, and there's enough fabric in the bodice that you can get away with that.

links_reviews_title: Great details but a little short
links_reviews_text: The romper lace and detail was very pretty, but runs a bit short. I paired it with opaque tights and boots otherwise it would have been way too short and I would have been uncomfortable all night with the length. The size itself was true to size but the length was the only thing you need to keep an eye out for.
Received lots of compliments on this one. Warning - it's short! I'm 5'5" and it was almost showing my entire behind. Very cute and sexy. Size up!

This romper is so cute! It fit perfectly on me. The open back is really pretty, not conducive to wearing a bra, but! it has good coverage and I didn't feel exposed. Also, it has pockets! All around a great outfit and was comfortable to wear all night.

I loved this romper! Super sexy and fun for a night out in Vegas. It is super short, like barely covered my butt and I’m only 5’2”. You definitely need to be confident to rock it :) I loved all the lace details on the sleeves and neck. Will definitely rent this one again!

links_reviews_title: Love this romper!! Size 10 ran big. I'm 5"2 130 LBS. Also rented the jacket and I love it!!!
links_reviews_text: Compliments all night long!! Definitely will rent again

I really enjoyed this rental. After trying both the 4 and 6 on, I went with the 6. The 4 was a bit short, but the lace on the 6 provided enough coverage. (I'm a 27/28 for context.) The only downside with sizing up was I lost some of my waistline, and it wasn't quite as flattering as it could have been. The open back was a nice touch. No bra needed with the fabric thickness and texture.
Wore this out for a night in Vegas. It was perfect and will rent again for sure! Fit great, looked great and felt so sexy

links_reviews_title: NYE Legs legs legs and BACK!
links_reviews_text: Rides short and may have some cheeks! I wore this for NYE 2019 this year paired with YSL shoes and small purse and a black motorcycle jacket. Definitely felt many eyes on me and gorgeous without having to wear sparkles on NYE. Back is absolutely stunning and received compliments all night and after on my photos. Would wear again to another fun event but DEF shows almost too much leg and Booty.

Awesome romper, super comfy, the pockets were a huge plus! Was able to button and zip this up with no assistance which was also nice. This was my backup outfit and I ended up loving it so much I chose this one! Wore it to a NYE bar event. Neck collar was not itchy whatsoever for me, though I know some other reviewers said it was. The back is completely open so beware if you’re not into that but I found it very flattering. Wish I didn’t have to send it back!
I'm barely 5'2" ;-) with a booty so it's hard to find a good fit. Loved this romper. Very comfy. Tons of compliments. Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Sexy but Solid black back makes up for the front.. you need accessories (ratings/bracelets/necklace.
links_reviews_text: Fit nicely

links_reviews_title: Very flattering and a bit sexy
links_reviews_text: Very short, open back, high neck and long lace sleeves counterbalance the short length

Fun night out in NOLA. Loved the high neck but open back. It was pretty short but loose so felt comfortable. Paired with tights and black booties for a chilly night. Wore with a cute black belt bag. I'm usually a 10 but didn't want this to fit too snug and probably could have gone with the 10 but the 12 was fine, not tight at all, a little gapey in the back
Loved the romper! It was difficult to take on and off for bathroom purposes
Sexy, polished, great fit! I'm 5'1 and it was pretty short, so taller ladies should probably be wary. Loved this rental so much!

I ordered the size 8 but ended up wearing the backup size 10 because the 8 was a bit too tight and very short. I wore this with tights, keep in mind its very short, good pick for tall ladies. I got tons of compliments, it really is a super cute romper!! Would rent again for a girls night out....

Super cute for a night out with the girls where a little booty cheek slip won't bother you! I'm 5'3" and about 115-120 pounds, with a healthy butt. Definitely size either true or up, since this romper is very short. The back is adorable though and the lace is great! Doesn't photograph the details, so if you're looking for picture memories I would go a different route. If you just want to be sexy, this is perfect!

links_reviews_title: Loved but tough for tall girls
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved the romper and received tons of complements. Typical romper/jumper warning for taller girls though- it rides high up. Needed to wear black tights to keep my bum covered when I bent over (only reason I knocked a star). Pockets also rocked.

links_reviews_title: Ideal for Bachelorrette for Night Out!
links_reviews_text: I needed a black dress to go out for a bachelorrette party. This romper is an alternate to a little black dress! Many compliments! I loved the backless feature; however, it is a struggle to find a bra with backless. Be sure to wear a backless bra/sticky boobs. Also have a roll of duct tape ready in case you need to tape up too. Bottom line: would I rent again? yes! And next time be more prepared undergarment-wise.

Wore it on our Vegas vacation for a night out. Quite short - although I am also quite tall. But totally Vegas appropriate. The collar part doesn't stand up like I wanted it to, the lace is a little "floppy." Overall a nice, comfortable romper.

I'm so sad to return this romper. It fit like a glove and I got compliments all night long! The open back added just the right amount of sexiness w the lace detail. The neck is a little itchy but not terrible. Seriously. I'm obsessed w this romper.

1. It is short - no bending over your cheeks will show 2 the romper is worn so the collar was not laying flat 3. Very chic and I got a lot of compliments - shows your body nicely 4. Did I mention your booty cheeks may show 5 sleeves are a little loose but I think that's the design

links_reviews_title: New rule: always wear rompers to weddings
links_reviews_text: I love dancing. I love dancing at weddings. My usual dilemma is: what should I wear that looks amazing but does not restricts movement? A ROMPER of course! I wore this to a spring wedding in Miami. I was a little concerned that I would be too hot with the thickness of the lace and the Miami heat/humidity, but this timber was perfect! -The arms allowed for lots of movement -The shorts were secure (don't bend all the way over too much b/c butt cheeks will show). -The front is lined with thick black fabric so there is no transparency if you choose to go bra-less * there is no support for breasts in this so a sticky bra/ cup only bra is needed if you choose to wear one. * I have a very small butt and narrow hips. If you have trouble finding jeans that fit your butt and hips, I would not recommend this romper

I rented this jumper because I loved the back detail and apron front. I was planning to wear it to a theater event but when I tried it on I was perplexed! The top is a good fit but straps are a bit long, the waist was extremely tight (at natural waist) and then it was giant through the thigh and hip. Major sad face. Since I clearly could not pull it off a la Carter I decided to wear it to work instead with a blazer that covered the largeness in the hip/thigh. It was cute but no one even saw the back. Fabric has some stretch, wrinkles pretty easily, and is a little dramatic in the bathroom. That said it was cute and comfortable- and maybe the fit would work better on an hourglass shape!
I adore this jumpsuit! It's flattering and comfortable. Prepare for nonstop compliments!

links_reviews_title: Second time I've rented - huge hit
links_reviews_text: I've rented this jumpsuit TWICE and love it. It's chic (got compliments from friends, guys and even a few of the older women at the party) and super comfy. Wasn't feeling cute at all and super bloated but the front panel hides everything. The back is awesome and adds a layer of great design detail. I'm 5'2 and wore (I think) 3/4 in heels and it fit great with just a tiny bit of bagging around the ankles. I've done RTR unlimited for a few months now and this has been my favorite piece. BF wants me to buy it (and he's kind of a fashion snob).
Loved it! I wore it to work and out to dinner, received tons of compliments! You have to slip it on and off to use the bathroom (which is a pain but expected).

Very unique and flattering fit. Definitely stands out in the crowd. Side zipper is a bit difficult, not sure if it was just the one I got or if this is inherent to the jumpsuit but it would be very difficult to take multiple restroom breaks in this. That being said, who cares??? This is fabulous:)
The jumpsuit was comfy and not too tight. Could sit down no problem. Loved the color and the back. The material is nice and flowy but not see-through.

links_reviews_title: Picture doesn't justify the gorgeous color and flattering cut
links_reviews_text: The color is great! Very eye catching. It was comfortable, and easy. Loved the pockets and the back detail. Hard to wear a conventional bra so I wore a tape bra. I like that the front looks like it could be separates. The zipper wound stick easily so I had to be very careful

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color, great details on the back
links_reviews_text: I loved the jumpsuit even though the fit was not the greatest for me. My torso is a bit too short so it bunched in the back, and my chest was a bit too big at 32DD with a very minimal sticky bra for the 2R. If I rented again I would try the 4R and hope that it resolved these issues without being too long. If you've got curves, I'd size up! The fabric wrinkles a bit, but the wow factor on this jumpsuit well compensates for any negatives. I received so many compliments! This is a show stopper and I'd high recommend it!

The fit overall was large. I ordered a 4R and a 6R. The 4 was too large at the top. I had to clip the back to make sure I would not expose myself. Also there is no way to wear a bra without it showing in the back. I ended up wearing petals and it worked perfectly. Beautiful jumpsuit. I received lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Perfect combination of sexy and sophisticated
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a night out in Vegas, and it was absolutely perfect. I'm 5'7", 150 pounds, 34DD and most of my weight is in the hips and thighs. I usually wear a size 6, but I was a little nervous about going with the 6R. It was difficult to zip, but not because of the fit. The location of the zipper and thick material in some spots just made it a challenge. Eventually I got it and was able to go to the restroom alone, which is always a good thing. Overall, I LOVE this outfit. If I weren't dieting and expecting to drop a few inches in the next few months, I absolutely would have bought it!
Got so many compliments! I tucked it in with a belt.
The BACK is see through and my bra showed, so I paired with a leather jacket.

This jumpsuit was AMAZING! it was cute in the pictures but it fit like it was made for me, was so comfortable to move in and got more compliments than I have ever received in one night! I will order this again for sure. The only glitch was figuring out how to get into it initially and then having to completely disrobe every time you use the restroom. Doesn't matter, it was worth it!

links_reviews_title: I wore a size 6 I'm 5'2 140 and it fit perfectly. Hit of the PARTY!!
links_reviews_text: Love it the color was great wore with Blue pumps to pop the color very comfortable

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable... got a lot of complements
links_reviews_text: Overall very comfortable but tricky to when you want to go to the restroom.it was flattering and it was a hit!

links_reviews_title: Prepare to get compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: Y'all, this jumpsuit is everything! I don't even think my photo does it justice! I wore it to a work convention cocktail party in Palm Beach and I cannot tell you how many women AND men complimented this outfit! It's so flattering and forgiving in the front and really is a standout color. I will say it is VERY difficult to get on and off and I was seriously afraid I was going to rip it but the material gave just enough stretch to get it over my head. All in all, this is one I wish I had permanently in my closet.

Overall I loved this jumpsuit and would definitely recommend it! I got tons of compliments and loved the bright color. The fit was a little funny, even on the larger size the waistband was kind of tight, but wearing spanx fixed that. The fabric is a little thin on the top so you need some sort of bra and the zipper was difficult.

links_reviews_title: Love the color, much lot vibrant than the clots, super comfortable and flattering
links_reviews_text: Amazing

All eyes were on me when I wore this jumpsuit to a pinning ceremony! The color is so eye catching! The fit is perfect! Very easy for me to put on and off. The back detailing is very beautiful as well!

This dress fit great with the exception that it was slightly tight around the shoulders. The zipper in my dress was difficult and actually busted because it wasn't lined up properly. I would guess that the person before me had larger shoulders/bust area and this caused the zipper to pinch.

links_reviews_title: Who doesn't love a good jumpsuit?
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is awesome. The back has such cute detail. Totally could be work friends with a blazer, and then ready to go out.
Fits nicely. Looks great-lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments, comfortable and sexy.
links_reviews_text: I actually ended up wearing is backwards, which was fabulous.

links_reviews_title: I love the fit of this jumper! Very stylish
links_reviews_text: This jumper is really nice. The color is vibrant in a good way. You can dress it up or down. The straps are a little long and the zipper is a little tricky. I zip the jumper almost to its entirety then I put my arms through. I would definitely rent again

I have an athletic/hour glass build, I'm also only 5'3 so the straps were a tad long and the pants were a little tight on my booty but overall I loved it. The fit in the waist was perfect and the length was great with 3" heels. Received tons of compliments. Wore it to an engagement party.

Absolutely loved wearing this jumpsuit. I rented it for a weekend trip to Nashville. The 2R fit perfectly (a little tighter after all of the BBQ ;) but overall perfect. I wore 2.5" heels and could have worn flats or sandals with a little hemming tape. I'm 5'2 and wouldn't recommend the regular length for taller ladies. Wore with a nubra as the material was too clingy / see through to go bra less. The zipper was a little difficult as others have mentioned, but definitely worth a little struggle! Looks more red in the picture but is a hot hot hot orange in person!

links_reviews_title: Great for bridal shower tea party!
links_reviews_text: The overall fit was amazing! The top was a tad loose but I loved the separated top and bottom feature- you don't feel trapped or suffocated. I am 5' 7" and mostly legs, but the 6R was perfect. The fitted style would be awesome on any body type and the back edges it up a bit. I got so many compliments on this jumpsuit, I wish I could buy it!!!

links_reviews_title: I was the only one wearing something amazing.
links_reviews_text: it fit comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Sexy, fun and comfortable. What more can you ask for in an outfit?!
links_reviews_text: I wore this outfit for an evening out with friends. We met up for dinner and cocktails and then went out to a club to see a show. I got so many compliments on this amazing color and fun detail on the back. I loved the front because I didn't feel like I had to suck in my stomach all night. It was super comfortable and fun to wear.

Color-amaze! Comfort-even better! I would buy this for sure. Kinda tricky to go to the bathroom in alone bc you need help with the zipper where the fabric meets and is thick. I was able to wear a bra with it too. The fabric is too sheer for nipple covers.

A bright red/orange color and mesh back make this jumpsuit unique. Running true to size we recommend sizing up for backup if you're curvier and down if you're smaller framed. With stretch in the fabric and room in the bust this style is great for all cup sizes. With the sheer mesh back it is important to note that it requires you to go bra-less or wear a nubra. At 5'7", the regular length was perfect and easy to show off heels. Pair the effortlessly chic look with pumps and bracelets.

links_reviews_title: Super nice but a little long!
links_reviews_text: It was super nice, I received a lot of compliments! I wore it different, I tucked it. Ordered 2 sizes 6 and 4, the 4 was perfect but zipper was kind of stuck... so I wore the 6 because zipper was better... Color is awesome!!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, sexy, and a fabulous color!!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for New Year's Eve and it was amazing. I chose the 8 as my backup since I wear between a 6 and 8 normally but went with the 6. I'm short (5'4") so it was a tad long but my heels solved that and the straps were a tad long but I appreciated them when I had to use the restroom as it made it easier to get in and out of. I have a bigger butt and the pants really accentuated that well and the top hid my tummy, from the front it looks like separates but from behind it's definitely a jumpsuit. The color is fantastic and the fabric is very nice, I couldn't wear a bra due to the back but pasties worked fine. Rent it, you'll love it!!!

links_reviews_title: Business in the front, party in the back
links_reviews_text: I was frustrated with this jumpsuit. The front was blah; the back was fun. I couldn't zip up the size 4 because the zipper was sticking, so I had to wear the 6 and it was much too big in the shoulders. It didn't sit right from the bust up. Also, the crepe fabric was pretty unforgiving. Fortunately it was a beautiful, vibrant color -- a bright orange-red -- and it was so easy to wear and still looked polished. If I had a chance to try it on beforehand, I wouldn't have chosen it, but it was fun to wear for a day.

links_reviews_title: It's a beautiful piece that unfortunately I did not get to wear.
links_reviews_text: I was most excited for this item to arrive but the zipper would not work properly so I never got to wear it. Pretty disappointed.

links_reviews_title: Great color- fit is a bit loose
links_reviews_text: I rented this for an effortless vacation look. The top was a bit snug and the pants were really loose. I am a true size 2 and ended up sizing up based on reviews

Such a cute jumpsuit! Was excited to take on vacation with me! The side zipper was so hard to get up and down, it wasn't worth the battle!!! My husband couldn't even get it!! This has happened way to often! Had to send it back! No vacation outfit!!!

links_reviews_title: Comfy - and the color is amazing!
links_reviews_text: Top on 8 was was wayyyy to long for my short torso, but the bottom fit well. Top on 6 was too small for my bust - bottom was a bit tight. Overall, a great outfit with some slight fit issues.

links_reviews_title: really well made and super cute....just didn't look great on me. I'm short and short waisted.
links_reviews_text: Wish I could have worn this....it's beautiful. I'm short waisted so it just wasn't flattering on me.
Orange red, cool detailing in the back
I wore this to a galentine's day dinner I planned. As I've read in at least 1 other review, the crotch area is a little baggy. Still, I loved it and got tons of compliments.
I almost wanted to keep this jumpsuit! I love the color! I love the lace! I love how it fits! I have no problems with the zipper but I had issues with the back hook..
Rented for a work party. Super comfortable, could move around messy, not hard to get in and out of, and received many compliments! Thought about buying but will definitely rent again!

Loved everything about this piece. The lace detail was gorgeous and the pants had a satin feel without being to constricting. The 4 fit like a glove - I wish I bought it! Got so many compliments by coworkers as I rented it for my office holiday party. Only trouble when getting it on and off if the restroom is needed - the clips in the back are difficult without help.
Enjoyed wearing this jumpsuit. Great party outfit but jacket can be added to dress it down.

this was a greatttttt jumpsuit. if the temperature didn't drop 15 degrees the day of the event, i would have worn this. hugged in all the right places and was very flattering for my pear shape. would definitely rent again

links_reviews_title: This was a red carpet event in LA and this outfit looked amazing on me. Fit my body perfectly.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect. Was clean and looked great. Only issue was I had to have some unclasp all the clasps in the back to go to the bathroom and then help me clasp them back. Other than that it’s perfect.
This jumper fit well. It initially felt snug but loosened as I sat and danced at the wedding. I got so many complements and am definitely considering buying this!

I am large busted and the 4-6 barely fit, but it looked really nice on. I usually wear a 6 in a dress and a 4 in pants. It is difficult to get in and out of the outfit without help due to 2 eyelet closures at the top and middle back.

links_reviews_title: Stepped outside the box with this burgundy jumpsuit
links_reviews_text: So glad I did!
So many compliments! Definitely a piece that stands out. Very fitted on top and a little more room in the pants portion, which I'm a huge fan of. Wearing heels was the best option for someone 5'2".

The selling point for me with any jumpsuit or romper is if it has adjustable straps, due to my long torso...and this one does!! They are well hidden underneath the lace. Major brownie points. It's also extremely comfortable, doesn't wrinkle or stretch out throughout the day, and is an awesome office-to-happy hour piece. Wish i owned this one!

This jump suit is well made, super flattering, and smooth on your curves! I felt sexy, classy, and confident the entire night!! :) I ordered a 4/6, and a 2/4 as a backup, and glad I did--I ended up wearing the 2/4! Just an awesome fit :) I will definitely rent it again!!!

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved my jumpsuit - especially b/c it kept me warm while others wore dresses!
links_reviews_text: Fit my waist great. A bit long but I'm 5'2"

I rented this as a back up and ended up wearing it out for drinks and dancing with friends. The material is thicker than I expected but I didn't mind. Loved the clean lines and it didn't need to be steamed at all prior to wearing. The hook at the neck was a bit challenging to secure on my own. Would rent again!
This jumpsuit fit comfortably. I wore the Large, and I wear a size 10. I received many compliments.
A tad short but otherwise perfect fit.

Fit just perfectly, but not a bit of wiggle room—that said very flattering in cut of waist through the leg (but if I gained 5 lbs would be too tight). Wore it to dinner out and got a lot of great feedback!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for Mother-Daughter Brunch AND an Evening Event!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this jumpsuit! I was able to dress it up with earrings and heels for a fancy brunch, and then, I easily dressed it down with slip on sneakers for a casual dinner. It fit super nicely (although it is a bit looser in the crotch. Super flattering and the adjustable straps prevent the need for a bra.

links_reviews_title: Jumpsuit fit perfectly and made me feel slim and young!
links_reviews_text: I am 5’8” and weigh 130 lbs. I’ve also had 3 kids in the last 6 years so I’m rocking a Mom bod. The pants hit just above my ankles and fit tight but didn’t hug my body. It was just perfect in showing off my shape but not all of the details that I want to hide. The lace top enabled me to wear a regular nude colored bra. The only con are the two hooks on the neck strap; you have to be careful undoing them and may need help fastening back up.
The fit was essentially true to size, the leg area was a little looser than I like, and I wish it was a little more fitted at the waist. But those are just personal preferences

links_reviews_title: Loved this jumpsuit with and without my blazer!
links_reviews_text: Made me feel good in it!

links_reviews_title: Rejoice!! A romper for a a tall girl!
links_reviews_text: I loved this bc it is one of the (maybe the only ) time I've ever successfully worn a romper because I have a long body. It was so comfortable and I received a million compliments. As with all rompers using the restroom is a pain but it is what it is. I'm kind of kicking myself for not buying it.
This jumpsuit was sleek and beautiful. The neck was a little tight and scratchy, but it didn't bother me too much. I loved this outfit... this one's hard to say goodbye to.

I really enjoyed wearing this jumpsuit and got a lot of compliments during my sister's birthday. I am 5'1'' so wearing this was a bit of a risk for me. But with heels this worked. It runs a little small. I am a medium in most things, but I had to wear the large here. I wish there was a way to go to the bathroom without zipping it down, but that's jumpsuits for you. Would definitely rent again. :)

I received numerous "wows" from my husband, got many compliments from friends, & stares from strangers. These has been one of my favorite items from RTR. I especially recommend this jumpsuit for petite women. I'am 5'1 & the length was just right...I only folded the bottom once & I was good to go. I'm a 34C & the top fit perfectly. Everything about this jumpsuit was beautiful. PETITE ladies, don't hesitate to rent this outfit. You will love it!
Top has no give but the MR for me perfectly and I'm very broad-shouldered with a very full bust.
The top half fit perfectly, bottom was a little big and baggy but still cute
so comfortable and sleek. pockets are great. got so many compliments!

I wore this to my birthday party and got a million compliments!! I cuffed it at the ankles because it was a liiiittle long but proportions were great for my petite self. Zipper easy to get up and down for bathroom but the double clasp top is a little trickier so you might need to enlist a friend.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and unique - love this piece!
links_reviews_text: Received so many complaints. Comfortable romper and easy to maneuver when going to the bathroom. I'm a 4-6 and wore the medium which fit perfectly.
Great and comfortable jumpsuit!
More stretch in the pants than in the top- Shortens look of torso - pants are high waist - Beautiful burgundy color- fits really nice and I love it... comfortable and compliments
Fit really well! The second hook on top was a little bent so it was hard to hook! Other than that it was great!

Loved the color and style of this. Rented for my birthday, which is also NYE. I'm 97% of the time a true 6, but this wouldn't zip up past mid back. Since it was around the holidays I had to make a separate order for a larger replacement. The larger size didn't fit like I hoped, but still looked good and allowed me comfort to eat a ton of sushi that night.

Probably would have gotten it one size smaller. Pants aren't tightly fitted, so the the upper thigh area is a bit droopy as well as the overall fit on the bottom half. For photos, crossing my legs made it look better. Good for a one-time wear! Wouldn't rent it again though.

I wore this for my college graduation and after party. Thankful I ordered the medium as a back up bc I didn't realize how much junk I've put in my trunk! I am only 5'0 and the length was almost perfect with my heels. The color was vibrant and made me stand out. The fit was great although there were some difficulties with the zipper. The fabric wasn't what I expected but it made for a more professional look so I am pleased. This jumpsuit is incredibly comfortable! Made for a great choice through a long ceremony. The top of the jumpsuit is just incredible; the details! I would order again.

Loved this jumper!! Tailored well to where it was comfortable and shaped me well. Pockets were handy but did not bulge out, leg length was slightly cropped which showed off the strap on my heels! Tons of compliments at my holiday party!

links_reviews_title: This outfit is perfect for "business casual" events!
links_reviews_text: Being 5'3" it's tough to find outfits that aren't dragging on the floor. This outfit was the perfect length! I went with a larger size to leave some room since we were at a tasting for our wedding. I needed some room to grow lol. I think it runs a bit on the small side, so I'd recommend sizing up if you have some hips and/or booty. Other than that, it's a great option for semi-casual event or date night.

links_reviews_title: Quality material, nice color, a little big for me.
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing this because it was a little big in the hips and butt area.
Very cute and versatile

Was nervous about the fit since I have a small waist but have hips and a booty but they fit perfectly and perfect length for me with heels on. Tall girls beware! I'm 5 foot and wore 3 inch heels with these so if you're over 5'4 these may be short on you.
Loved. Wore with a heel and I'm 5'5". No stretch. Fabric is very high quality.
These pants are AMAZING! Perfect fit, classy, great material! So many compliments.

Wore these for two separate holiday parties and got lots of compliments at both. They are very comfortable. I dressed them down one night with a white tee and wore with a tuxedo blouse the second time I wore them. They were a bit long on me...I'm 5'4" but have proportionally short legs. I "hemmed" them about 3 inches with some Hollywood tape (length shown in pic) which didn't hold up all night, but they still looked good at full length. With 4 inch heels they grazed the floor and the toes of my shoes just peaked out.

links_reviews_title: Lovely material, but not too forgiving
links_reviews_text: Pant material has a slight sheen and looks dressy but playful with the bow. I didn't like the pants because they were not too forgiving for underwear lines and cellulite. The long sizes are also not particularly long.

links_reviews_title: Great length for a tall girl!
links_reviews_text: I loved these pants. They were a bit outside of my normal style--I mostly own fitted pants. These were form fitting at the hips and then wide legged throughout. The length was AMAZING. They came all the way to the floor, which for an almost 6' chick is a miracle. I wore them with black flats and a black t-shirt. The sash was cool, but I found that it was too long because it kept getting stuck under my chair at work and in my car door. If these pants were more affordable I would have bought them. Definitely recommend them!

links_reviews_title: I couldn't figure out how to tie the sash - it was a hot mess
links_reviews_text: I had to send them back unworn

links_reviews_title: Wore it with a Derie Lam sequined shirt and received a lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: I am 5'9". I think it looked best with flats. Fit was good. Great material. Sash is good for shirts tucked into pants

links_reviews_title: Fun pants, waist a little small
links_reviews_text: These were really cool pants and I think they would have fit well if I'd ordered one size up. The cut and the fabric are so stylish. Versatile.
Gorg but too short if you're 5'8 or taller

I wore these pants for disco Friday at the office and got lots of compliments! I would wear them any day though, super comfortable and true to size. Only thing I found slightly awkward was that the sash had to be tied for the waist band to stand up and it's so thick that the giant knot looked awkward under the long flowy top I wore with it.
No complaints at all! Super comfy

I rented these in an 8 equivalent (40R) and my usual size is 6 or 8 depending on the designer. The 8 was definitely the right size for me, so I'd say size up for your back up. They were fun, and definitely need a fitted top as shown on the model. I liked these, but the pair I received was showing a bit of wear with some of the fringes on the sash either cut short or fraying.
Great fit, flattering waist and posterior. Sash is sexy and sophisticated.

links_reviews_title: Too long for my petite self
links_reviews_text: These are definitely not for someone that's short. I'm 5'2 and they were just way too long. I wasn't able to wear them.
fit good except too short.
Really cute pants but just too short to wear with 3 inch heels. I'm 5' 5" and a half. Had I worn flats, these may have worked.
I felt like a boss lady in these pants!
A little tight in the hips but lots of compliments.
long enough for tall women
I LOVED these trousers. So different and luxurious!

These are cute! Unfortunately I didn't get a photo. I wore them to dinner and got lots of compliments. I was worried they would look baggy, but they were fitted on my bottom and were actually very flattering! The fabric is soft and comfortable. Not something I would typically wear or buy so it was definitely a fun rental.

very wide leg and flowy detail tie on side may annoy some but I thought it was a nice addition to the pants. The longs were perfect for my height 5'9" but the size was a little large in waist. The only thing that can hold them up is the short side zipper and the tie which isn't super secure. Overall great pair of pants that can dress up a simple top.
Classy, perfect length, and elegant.

These were okay...the material was nice and thick and I liked the belt/tie thingy, but they fit weird. They were super tight in the butt/groin area, so I decided they definitely weren't appropriate for work. The flair on the bottom plus the super tight butt made me feel like I was wearing overly fancy yoga pants and I just didn't know where I could wear these. Sad because they're super high quality pants. Maybe a looser size would be cuter!

links_reviews_title: Very long, made for someone who is taller.
links_reviews_text: This dress is made of thick material. It hit me in a weird place on my body. It is made for a taller person. I would also say that zipping it up was an issue. Once the zipper gets to the black band it is near impossible without help and persistence. Overall, it wasn’t my style and I’m not tall enough to pull it off. I wore it to a wedding rehearsal dinner.

links_reviews_title: Classy & fun at the same time.
links_reviews_text: The waist is small on this dress & I am 5'9 & it was still tea length on me. I got a lot of compliments from all. It was conservative but still fun & great for a work awards dinner.
I loved this dress, but if you have a larger ribcage like me, it will be super uncomfortable! I may try it in the next size, but it will likely be too large in the chest.

I forgot to take a formal photo, but I uploaded this one so that length is visible. This picture does not do this dress justice. It's a beautiful cut and color. The black and deep blue are a perfect combination.

The dark colors and lace made this dress perfect for a winter wedding. The waist is slim and doesn't have much give. I wanted tights for the weather, but given the length I thought sheet black looked better than opaque black. I'll definitely look for this brand for future weddings!

Very nice fabric, great fit! Looks and feels very high quality. Beware. It does wrinkle very easily. It's a little bit on the bigger end but this is nice because then your arms don't feel like they're strapped down.

links_reviews_title: A beautiful dress for any occasion!
links_reviews_text: Very beautiful details. An upscale LBD!

links_reviews_title: I really enjoyed this dress. Beautiful, clastic, well made and easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: It fit well...true to size for my narrower upper body and waist and pear hips and thighs. No cons with this one for me.

links_reviews_title: I'm just happy if ended up coming in time...
links_reviews_text: This dress fit nicely! I don't have any normal pictures of me in it, but it was very high quality and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments. Fit like a glove. Very classy
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove. Very classy

links_reviews_title: The perfect semi conservative cocktail dress!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress by Jonathan Simkhai! Running true to size with no stretch but a bit of room for movement, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and has little movement at the hips at the hips. It works for cup sizes A-D. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress due to the sheer lace on the shoulders, so you should wear a strapless bra. At 5’4”, the length hit tea length on me. The lace pattern and color of the dress is amazing in person. Pair with black heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!

links_reviews_title: Great work dress! Longer than expected!
links_reviews_text: The lace on this hit below the knee (I'm 5'10"). Also the neckline lace is sheer so wear black bra straps to avoid it showing through. Otherwise very cute dress.
I love this dress and I will definitely rent it again. I wore it to the Christmas Eve service at my church and felt like a million dollars in it! The 8 fit me perfectly
Needed something conservative but still pretty. This dress was perfect. Great fit. Great length. Beautiful lace. So graceful and ladylike.

Loved this dress! Many compliments at Christmas party. Rented with RTR Unlimited. The Fit was great everywhere except the bust. You should size up if larger than a DD. I'm an H cup and I wish I had ordered a 6 because I couldn't even wear a bra with this dress. Fit like a glove everywhere else.
Just stunning. I did have a hard time with the zipper on the one I got, but otherwise this dress was phenomenal.

I rented this dress for my daughter's class cocktail party. I ordered an 8 based on reviews and it seemed to fit perfect. My hubby & mom really like it, however on the waist small lace sequence in the back the zipper wouldn't go up. Even when I took it off it was very difficult to zip. There was plenty of space & I think a 10 would have looked to big. I decided to send it back due to the zipper issue. Unfortunately, they did not have another one, I ended up renting a different dress.

links_reviews_title: The bust fit me well. I felt like I had a figure in this dress
links_reviews_text: Given my height, it fell below my knees. The navy material will not stretch so average or large-busted ladies may need to consider sizing up. It fit me well and I received loads of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Too cutsie for my style. Didn't love the crew neck. But on you? Probably PERF
links_reviews_text: Lil too holly hobby on me.

The dress fit well, was appropriate for the evening I was planning to wear it, and the item was in great condition. I just didn't love it. After polling my boyfriend and learning he didn't love it either ("It's kind of old time-y"...I believe he meant the lace at the bottom was a bit more classic and conservative than what I usually go for) I decided that I would wear something else.

Very fitted at the waist. I'm a 27-28 inch waist and size 4 was Probably a 27.5 inch waist. I decided to stick with the 4 instead of trying a 6 because the rest fit so well. It is perfect for an hour glass figure. I loved the unexpected see-through neckline and bottom lace. Still elegant and appropriate for a work party or formal affair.
Loved this dress for work and a bridal shower
Absolutely love the fit and classy feel. Will defining get this again

I wore this dress to work and was able to transition to a date night at a musical. The dress fit perfectly and I loved the lace at the bottom because it made the dress appropriate for a conservative environment, but added interest for an evening out.

links_reviews_title: High quality dress, cute but tight!
links_reviews_text: Dress was tight especially in the shoulders and chest. But it was very high quality and pretty!
Never wore it. Much longer and def not springtime look.

links_reviews_title: Wore for work and i look very professional
links_reviews_text: Fits well a little tight below the chest

links_reviews_title: Beautiful details perfect for formal work event during the week.
links_reviews_text: Fitted at the waste, sleeves had enough room to lift arms up.

links_reviews_title: Didn't keep - a little too fitted.
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear. Cute, but a little too fitted in the bodice. Didn't think it would be comfortable for a long event.
Beautiful dress. Would rent again and again.
great deep blue fabric and sexy black lace detail

Dress was exceptionally small. I would size up though it might make the rest of the dress too large. If you are tall and slender, this is your dress. Doesn't work for curvier frames as the waist and rib cage area are very small.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but zipper is broken!
links_reviews_text: I actually loved everything about this dress. It would have been perfect for the party I planned on wearing it to but the zipper would not go up over the waist detail. Big disappointment! It is a sophisticated, classy, modest dress that seemed like it would be flattering on any figure type.

links_reviews_title: Gorg but super tight esp on b**bs
links_reviews_text: Great colors & shape

I'm 5'2 and this was very long. Not long enough to hit the ankle but long enough it looked like it was supposed to and then shrunk. Runs large everywhere except at the waist. Zipper extremenly difficult to zip up - would get stuck at the waist. Not very flattering for a petitie figure. The material for the main part of dress (not the lace) appears to be inexpensive.

I actually rented this for a funeral and a funny thing happened. Nobody goes to a funeral for compliments but I got lots of compliments on this dress. Seriously!! Was not looking for compliments. I just didn't want to wear all black and thought this was the perfect dress. Anyway on to the fit. This dress fits TRUE TO SIZE. In fact, the waist was a little tight. The waist has ZERO GIVE and I have a super duper flat tummy. I am not exaggerating when I tell you that we had lunch afterwards and I felt like the waist was cutting my circulation. Look, if you manage to find your perfect fit in this dress, just don't drink water because the waist won't fit after you drink water. The dress is very flattering. A-line styles are flattering on all body types in my experience. So once again the dress fits true to size....the top is nice and roomy and the skirt is A-line but the waist is small and has zero give. Otherwise a beautiful dress. I loved it.
Lovely details, flattering. Wonderful- would rent again

links_reviews_title: This is very pretty. I thought it was beautiful although I ended up choosing a different dress
links_reviews_text: beautiful.
This dress has interesting detail but was also conservative. If you like the look of it you will not be disappointed with this rental.
I ordered this dress for a party. It did not fit well so I did not wear it. Unflattering.

Loved the sequins aspect of these shorts as a way to dress it up a notch, but the fit was weird as others said. I'd say it was true to size (I'm a size 6 with just a bit of mommy pooch) but with a little space in the waist. The hips and thighs were slimmer and longer than typical shorts, but they weren't too tight for my more athletic quads and booty. They weren't the most comfortable while seated, but if you're going to be standing most of the night it'll do. From the side view, it doesn't do anything to highlight the booty.

links_reviews_title: Meh. Kinda fun but not flattering.
links_reviews_text: These were large in the waist, though not loose enough in the legs that sizing down would like improve things much. The sequin is fun, and I did like them as part of this particular ensemble as a fun alternative to a skirt in summer for a trendy dinner. That said, I pretty much hated the shorts with the blazer off - made my waist look bigger, and the proportions weren't flattering even on longer legs.
This had a weird fit for me. The legs seemed to fit, but the waist was too big.
They fit ok but the style was not for me. They looked way cuter online. My husband said they made me look like I was going out to play bingo or something.

I rented these to wear with a white crop top, summer going-out fun. I'm between sizes, so ordered up, and they turned out to be too big. That being said, these are quality, heavy true denim, deep color. The sequins are in a swath across the hips at a great and flattering angle. Worth trying again in the right size. If you're looking for a cocktail-event option, though, these are straight denim, so they won't be dressy enough.
I got the suggested 44" for me and I'm a usual size 8. They were too big in the waist. I probably have a slightly bigger butt than some but these were unwearable for me because of the sag in the top.

Paired with a tight black tank and sneakers for a trip to Top Golf. The shorts are really cute, but they fit a little weird - they are a bit high in the waist and I found that they gapped pretty badly in the back. They were also slightly tight around the hips. Overall, super fun to wear, but they were a one and done rental.
The waist fit perfectly but the butt and thigh area were too large.
This top is so beautiful. The sparkle makes it perfect for the holidays! I wore it with leather coated jeans and I was obsessed!! Regret not buying it haha

links_reviews_title: It was a fun sweater to wear in Napa
links_reviews_text: The sweater is very soft and comfortable. The zipper in the back makes it easy to put on and take off.
Form Fitting, ultra sparkly, great for the holidays, lots of drama. A total show stopper. I normally wear a size 6, this was a size 10 per RTR recommendation, I would definitely size down
Stylish Stylish!!!! Got a huge compliment from my fashion designer friend which explains all! I should have had 4 but I think it was out so I had to get size 6.
It was definitely a form fitting shirt but got tons of compliments on it! It is great for the winter months :)

So many compliments in this sweater, perfect! Wore it to my holiday lunch at work and later on that night to my birthday dinner. Gorgeous fabric that holds its structure very well made, would definitely rent again.
Love the sleeves! Definitely runs a bit small so go one size up. I'm glad I did. The neck is very fitted so if that bugs you you may not love this one. Inside is soft and not itchy.

This top was really fun to wear to my art opening! I'm typically a size 6, but the UK 14 / US 10 was the only size that happened to be in the store. I couldn't resist because it's so unique. Was a little unflattering on me, but I'm sure the right size would've been much more flattering. I thought the sleeves might get annoying but you get used to it really quickly and it's fun to stand out in this top!
Loved this top! Adds a fun bit of sparkle and whimsy for a night out

This Silver Dexel Top by Solace London had such forgiving fabric! Running a little on the larger side with a lot of stretch, I recommend wearing your true size and going down for your back-up. It works best for all cup sizes. I am normally between Sizes 8 & 10 and the UK 6/US 2 surprisingly fit without any issue. All in all, pair this with your favorite pair of open toe heels or formal bottoms and it's perfect for your upcoming event or work day!

Super cute, the shirt was perfect for a fun night out with the girls. It has more of a structured fit, which I really liked. The only bummer about this shirt is that the high collar irritated my neck, easy fix was to unzip it a little at the top.

VERY sparkly almost to a fault, great for holidays but a little much for any more casual occasion. Sleeves are super long and dramatic, stylish but also impossible to eat dinner in because they'll drag into your plate or anything on the table. Sized up from normally a 4 to a size 8 based on reveiws

links_reviews_title: VERY sparkly in person. I originally got it for a work event but it ended up being too flashy.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'7"; 130 lbs and I ordered a size 10...it was a comfortable fit---very similar to how it looks in the photo.

This is just like the picture. Lined so not itchy. Super sparkly so really only appropriate for a night out or special event. Sleeves are so fun. Long so probably don't wear while cooking. It fits really well. Thick material. Very very flattering. I plan to wear to holiday parties with black pants. I absolutely adore it.

I didn't realize that it was more of a metallic and shimmery material and it was a beautiful surprise. The material was warm and fitted and didn't itch. It fit like a glove and the sleeves are everything! Tons of compliments. Perfect my night at the art gallery.

links_reviews_title: High quality top with perfect fit.
links_reviews_text: Very beautiful top that fit perfectly. It's extremely sparkly which I didn't fully appreciate from the photos.
I sized up too much and so I did not war it. cute top for a party. I thought it was grey it is more like partytime silver

links_reviews_title: Insanely cute and smoothes out curves
links_reviews_text: Great for everyday or parties

links_reviews_title: A fun piece for a fun day
links_reviews_text: This top is stunning! Definitely a quality piece! It does run a bit small - the back zips all the way to the neck and was very constricting, unfortunately.
Fit great
Thought it was a flat gray but it's metallic :(
Fits smalls, and it is a bit short, but it looks good.
Got a ton of compliments - was a bit tight around the neck and more sparkly than i anticipated....but loved it!

I wore this sweater with black pants and heels. It was a great way to dress up casual jeans. The material is a little scratchy, but other than that - very comfortable. The fabric is much more sparkly than I expected from the images, but it was nice for a birthday outfit. The sleeves were also too long for me, but I do have pretty short arms.
Really wanted to lov this but the shoulders were abnormally large giving me a strange Dr Evil type look.

links_reviews_title: Prepare for compliments! It looks as good as the photo!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit for me. The material even smoothed over my belly bumps and curves and gave me a more hourglass like figure. I wore it out to holiday parties and dates and got compliments every single time. It shimmers, it's elegant, and it's warm and comfortable. (Exception: After wearing it all day, 8+ hours, my neck felt a little tender from the turtle neck collar grazing against it). You must be confident and willing to stand out though. No wallflowers for this top.
This blouse would have been perfect for a holiday party but its material wasn't comfortable. It's thick and almost rigid. Didn't wear it once unfortunately.
Great piece!! Very special

This shirt is pretty, but it's WAY more sparkly than it looked in the photo. I rented this for work, and couldn't wear because it's definitely more of a going-out shirt. Would be perfect for a calmer NYE event.

This top was a show stopper. Received tons of compliments. Only downside was the length of the body - I'm 6' tall so it hit just at my natural waist. Would have given it 5 stars if it were just slightly longer.

links_reviews_title: Awesome look. It is sparkly-- not plain grey as it looks in the pics
links_reviews_text: Itchy
Fits great

Originally was considering this for some daytime sightseeing or even work. However, it's much more sparkly than I anticipated from the picture and I don't think it would be suitable for either. However, I do think this would be perfect for holiday or birthday parties, night time concerts, or anything where you want to dress up and be a little more flashy than usual. It would be perfectly gorgeous, which is form fitting body and statement sleeves.
Wow it to the Elton John concert

links_reviews_title: Loved this. Wore to an art museum and also to dinner
links_reviews_text: sleeves are not practical for work

One of my best RTR Unlimited rentals ever. This sweater is fabulous. Based on the pictures and details, I ordered a size 6 (normally a US 0/2) as I did not want it to be skin tight. Fit perfectly. I got tons of compliments and felt amazing in it all day long. The turtleneck is quite fitted - not tight but you have to be comfortable with that kind of design. And it is very sparkly - I wore it to a luncheon with a black flared skirt, tights and low boots but this would work great for New Year's Eve or another part. Would definitely rent this one again.
