links_reviews_title: So pretty and girly, sexy casual with jeans
links_reviews_text: Looooooved it!!! Expensive fabric, soooo flattering, no bra needed
Comfy - perfect for a summer/beach event

links_reviews_title: This Sachin and Babi top even makes denim high class.
links_reviews_text: This top is everyday easy! Wear with denim, or a denim skirt, or a dressy black skirt, or dress pa to. Wear it with overalls. This top is easy. I've overlooked it a lot. Finally decided to try it on a whim. I wore a strapless bra. I have big boobs. It stayed up. I never readjusted. I think if you are comfortable going without a bra, you definitely can in this. But I wore one. I never had to fuss with my bra or the straps. Undecided if I will buy or not. It's really versatile.

The shirt was perfect for the event I attended! It was a casual Denim & Diamonds reception. I wore it with dark jeans. Per other reviewers my size I went with the medium and yes it was a little bigger in the waist but it worked just fine! I'm 5'4, 130, 32DD.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear, just a tad short
links_reviews_text: Other designers take note! Don't know what makes this top so fantastic, but it is! Wish it was an inch longer, a bit too short...but I still wore it and loved it.
Wore with a simple black skirt and nude pumps. So many compliments!
I love how this is so slimming and the material is fantastic!

I loved this top. I wore it at the beach with family but also to a friend's graduation lunch. The thick fabric smooths and I didn't even really need a bra. It is a great piece and I'd definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: I bought this shirt it's amazing!!
links_reviews_text: This shirt is so well-made and I wore it so many times that I ended up buying it. :-) fits amazingly well and will forever be in style.

Wore this for a JT concert in Dallas in the middle of summer. Hot AF. But this top was awesome. Didn't need to wear a bra, got big ole yabbos too! It didn't move, fall, slide, nothing. Wore with high wasted black shredded jeans shorts, black belt & my free bird boots. It's tight at the bottom so rock the high wasted stuff! It makes you feel supes sexy.

Looks and fits beautifully. Like other mentioned in their reviews, it's kinda short and the shoulders are a little tight. You can feel that it's made with very high quality materials. Zipper is thick, didn't even worry about it breaking or opening. I received sooo many compliments, even a lady at the mall came to me to tell how pretty I looked. You could wear it showing a bit of belly if you're comfortable with it, a skirt or jeans (mine were a bit high but not to much as I don't like High rose jeans). I'm 5'4, 143-145 lbs, 32-34 bra line and C cup.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful top! Quality and colors are great.
links_reviews_text: Just runs a little small
I don't typically like off the shoulder stuff but I got this top on impulse. Tall girls beware, it is very short. I'm a shorty so it worked fine for me with high waisted pants.

This top fits really well (not too tight around the arms) and definitely could transition from day to night. It is rather short, so pair with high waisted jeans or be prepared to show off some stomach.
Great top for higher waisted jeans, it's a bit short, but super fun and romantic. TBT with my new Paige bootcuts!
Fits like a glove. Nice quality material.

I received tons of compliments on this one. The white is so pure. It looks and feels expensive. It stays up without having to readjust it. The material is a little thick and it's a little short. There's no way I could pull it off if I ate a big dinner.
The top was beautiful and was perfect for a birthday lunch. Fit snug, but looked great with dress pants and jeans.

Wore this to an outdoor summer party and loved it! This top ran fairly true to size. I have a smaller waist and could have gone with an XS as the material was a tad bit looser on me in the stomach (but then again, more room for dessert!). The top is structured and stayed in place very well, which is hard to find with an off the shoulder top. I would also note that I have a small torso, so this might be too short (in length) to cover someone's whole stomach if they have a longer torso. I did not wear a bra since the top loose portion completely covered my chest. Lastly, the top zips open completely in the back, so putting this on was super easy. Really enjoyed this top!

I wore this out to dinner with the family - but could have worn it anywhere! You can dress it up or down. Some people say this ran small but I think it fit perfectly (probably better for those with a smaller bust) I did not need a bra and it zippered up in the back with no stretch in the waist. The top around the arms/shoulders did have stretch and felt very comfortable all night. Will definitely rent again

This top is one of my favorites! The material was so soft and was great for a hot summer day on a roof top. Complements all day, even from strangers. This is recommend to wear with a strapless bra. I am a 34C, and the top felt just right, however if you are a little more blessed on the top, I would recommend going a size up. There is a zipper on the back with a top clasp. Also note if you have a longer torso, the top will look like a crop top, I added a skirt to keep from riding up at work to a night out with friends.

links_reviews_title: This was the cutest top! I wore it for my engagment pictures. Loved it!
links_reviews_text: It was a bit small and I usually wear a small, If I was to rent it again I would go up one size.

I would have bought this top (and still might) but it runs very small in the chest area and was a little uncomfortable around my shoulders (it actually left marks on my arms by the end of the day). Definitely worth re-renting the next size up! I had multiple meetings today and received compliments on this top everywhere I went!

This is gorgeous and classy. I love the off the shoulder trend. It is a little short - I wore it with jeans and it showed off a little skin, so for work I paired it with a high waisted skirt and it looked amazing and professional. No stretch, for reference my waist is 28" and it fit perfectly.

I wore this shirt to a birthday party, great fit and material. It's shorter- pair with high waisted jeans if you don't want it to be a crop top. The sleeves stayed up well the entire night! Very fitted, glad I didn't get the small.
Light, flirty, easy to wear...loved this

links_reviews_title: Fabulous top! Has a great fit - I didn’t need to wear it with a bra! Paired it with a red blazer.
links_reviews_text: Loved this top.

links_reviews_title: can't comment; I didn't wear it
links_reviews_text: Nothing wrong with the shirt; I just didn't get around to wearing it, but the software kept bugging me to give a review and rate it even though I didn't wear it
Very cute top. Easy to wear without a bra even if you are busty. Received many compliments. Goes great with high waisted jeans.

links_reviews_title: great fit and great fabric, its really comfortable and stays in place
links_reviews_text: fits true to size
Everything about this top is beautiful! The straps don't move and it is so well made! Loved it! Wish I could have kept it!!
Stretchy (so u can zip and then turn around and pull up sleeves), cute, flattering. Form hugging, lots of compliments and comfortable.
Fit great and cute style

links_reviews_title: Wasn't able to wear this. Too big :(
links_reviews_text: Was a little too big to wear.
Didn't wear it - I am 5'3 with a short torso. This was way more cropped than the photo shows. Between that and the rigid arm sleeves, I didn't feel comfortable.
Nice top but does run extremely short! Must wear high waisted pants.
Love this top! It was a little too tight on me so I am returning and trying a L instead of the M.
Fit perfectly and it was really fun to wear
Could wear it because it was too that, but it looks beautiful! Will size up
Beautiful shirt, but I found it too short for my comfort level.
Colors are gorgeous but this is a zip up dress and runs true to size. Definitely not for busty women I have a small C cup and this just works. I ended up buying it.

I got this dress for spring photos with my kids, it's perfect for adding a statement pattern and mixing colors. Past that it wasn't my favorite. I think it ran pretty big, I wore a 0 and it wasn't super flattering on me. The length was a bit awkward, and the side ruffles were a nuisance for outdoor pictures. I wouldn't rent again but for a one time thing it wasn't awful - this is why I love rent the runway!!
If you are petite note that this dress is long and runs large!
This dress is beautifully made and fun to wear. Make sure to pack a strapless bra!

links_reviews_title: Great fitting dress for both dinner and night out with friends.
links_reviews_text: This dress was worn for dinner out with friends during a bachelorette weekend in New Orleans and later worn during a formal night on a honeymoon cruise. Must be worn with a strapless bra as you can't hide your bra straps because the back is a racer type back. The bust area was tight on me and I'm not big busted but it wasn't uncomfortable. I liked the length and the material was really flattering.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a bridal shower, brunch, day party
links_reviews_text: Cute fit (top is fitted with racerback and ruffle, but very modest hemline). Gorgeous pattern with bright colors perfect for a brunch, bridal/baby shower, etc. fits true to size. Loved the pockets!

links_reviews_title: Flattering and confidence boosting for this postpartum body!
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous - truly a show-stopper. I'm 3 months postpartum and still 2 sizes larger than my pre-baby size, so I'm very insecure about my belly, breasts, and arms. This dress was incredibly flattering in all the right places - the waistline trimmed my waist, the flowy skirt hid my belly, and the top minimized my boobs. Somehow this sleeveless dress also made me less self conscious about my arms. Bonus - it has pockets!! Winning dress and great experience!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Cape Cod Wedding
links_reviews_text: The size 8 fit perfectly. In terms of fit, it was tightest around the rib cage, and I did need help zippering into it. If you have a larger rib cage/bust it may be good to size up on your back up size just in case. Due to how tightly it fit in the chest area, I chose to not wear a bra. This dress paired well with a pair of wedges. I got many compliments on the pattern. Would definitely rent again.
This Lilly Pulitzer dress is so beautiful! It has racerback details and ruffles also! And oh it has pockets!! 😍💙🌹
Wore 2 months postpartum. Was very forgiving in the stomach area. Received lots of compliments. Very beautiful coloring and love the back and shoulder ruffles.
Another beautiful Lilly dress! My only complaint is that the fabric wrinkles incredibly easily.
This dress was great. Rented as a free back up and used for my (daytime) bachelorette party. It fit perfectly and was very comfortable.
Fit great, super comfortable, has pockets! Extra room in the boobs if you have a bit more than myself!
About 2-3 inches too big in the waist, but a 4 wasn't available. May have needed a 2. I would definitely size down on this dress.
Loved this dress. It was nice and flowy especially for a hot July wedding! Very comfortable dress.

links_reviews_title: Can never go wrong with Lilly!
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress - I wish I owned it!

I rented this for an opera matinee this coming weekend, but I threw a navy blazer over it and it works at work too! I am seriously contemplating purchasing this adorable dress. Fits tts and is a very unique and beautiful cut and pattern.

I liked this dress a lot! The colors were fantastic and the pictures don't do it justice. The fit was really tight across my chest, but was perfect everywhere else. Would definitely rent again for a similar event.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, pockets, great print and cut!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress for the stretch of the fabric, cool style of the back, pockets, and lovely summer pattern. Comfortable and confident all night long!

links_reviews_title: Felt so pretty at a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: The fabric is soft and drapes perfectly. This pretty and feminine dress was just the right level of fancy for an afternoon outdoor wedding. Fit was perfect and flattering.
Love love love this dress!!!!! I wanted to keep it. Gorgeous color and beautiful cut.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for an outdoor Lexington wedding.
links_reviews_text: I am between a size 10-12 and the 12 fit just right. Loved the pockets and how comfortable I felt all night. Fabric was lightweight and breathable. I wouldn’t say it’s a “Wow” but it was great for the occasion.
It fit me like a glove! So comfortable, flattering to my figure, and had pockets!

links_reviews_title: RTR continues to be convenient and fun. I always appreciate how simple their process is!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, I'm very busty and the top was snug but still fit. Dress was pretty but not a lot of "wow" factor. Lovely option for a warm summer wedding.

I got this dress to wear to a bridal shower. The fabric was really soft and light, the dress was very comfortable, and who doesn't love pockets! I wore a size 14, the top was a little large but nothing bothersome. I'm also larger in the hip area and the dress was nice a flowy, even still. Overall the dress is bright, fun and loved the ruffles up top.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a summer wedding. Dress is light, airy and has pockets!!
links_reviews_text: Thought the fit was very flattering. It's fitted at the bust and waist then flares out. Fun to dance in!
Wore to a gender reveal party. Fit perfectly, comfortable in 70 degree weather. Great inside and outdoors. Tons of compliments.
Runs large in the shoulders, had to tape it to keep it from being to large but overall beautiful dress that was very comfortable and has pockets!

This dress was incredibly comfortable and just the right amount of flowy. It's lined, has pockets, and fits true to size around the rib cage and upper body. The only downside is no stretch, but it fits well enough that it's not needed for comfort. I am already looking for a reason to rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit and distracts from fat arms!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a spring baptism. It can be dressed up for a more casual wedding too, as the material is dressy. It fits true to size and hides any small tummy or extra leg weight! It is a perfect length (most Lily dresses are too short for me!). My favorite part was the ruffles at the arms to distract the eye from my not-so-ripped arms!! I'm a HUGE fan of this dress! Enjoy!
It was comfortable and easy to move in, and I felt great! Could dress up or down. #cute #dressup #dressdown #wedding #maywedding

links_reviews_title: Such a pretty spring wedding dress
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my cousins wedding. The colors are perfect for spring outdoor wedding. I love the back and the length.
I wore this to my bridal shower and got so many compliments! The material was really comfortable and the colors were beautiful.

LOVED this dress. I wore it to a few different graduation ceremonies. It runs true to size (I ordered a size larger than I typically wear and it was too large). Colors were stunning. I'm about 5'8 and the dress hit right below the knees. I wore heels with it, but flats would work. 10/10 would recommend again.
It was a good rental for Easter Sunday. Comfortable to wear with a strapless bra. Light. Seems to wrinkle super easy. Pretty dress but not a showstopper.
This was cute and s good summer dress. I didn't like the arm ruffles, they just draped in an odd way
I wore this dress for Easter. Love the pockets, color, ruffled fabric on the neck line and length. I received many compliments on it. Fit perfect and very flattering.
Rented this for my son's baptism party. It was so pretty and comfortable and just a perfect fit. I love the detail in the back!

links_reviews_title: Silky luxe fabric, fun pattern and works with racer back bra
links_reviews_text: Liked this dress a lot. One funky part of the dress was the ruffles along the armpit. Not sure if it was weird in s good or bad way.

I rented this to wear for my birthday weekend. It was a great transitional piece for early spring - I wore with tights and booties one day and with strappy sandals a few days later when it was 20 degrees warmer. Colors are beautiful! The only downside for me was it was a bit big in the torso, but I'm petite. Even so, I got so many compliments I may just buy it!

I love this outfit!! I wish i owned it but i let it go. It is true that you should wear it braless. The entire time i was wearing it, my hand was on my chest just so that i could hide the strapless bra showing. But, the outfit is silky, elegant, and sexy. It is cute too!
I could have possibly gone down a size because I am small busted. However, this romper was a hit!
Real flatter and true to size!

The texture is super lightweight & airy - perfect to wear along on a hot day or pair with a long sleeve on cooler days. The upper body is a bit too long for me (5'4") and the straps are not adjustable :( worked a little better when I tied the strap around as a belt to holster the top portion up. Otherwise, love the silk texture and the color/pattern.
The 0 fit perfectly! The silk material was so comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Looks good in picture, not comfortable when wearing it
links_reviews_text: Fabric feels very cheap. The V neck cut is deep need safety pin.Pant leg too short for my height

links_reviews_title: Took on vacation to wear for a couple of evenings- love, love, love! Definitely a special jumpsuit.
links_reviews_text: Fit well, I have a long torso so jumpsuits often don't fit correctly. Be prepared to show some cleavage- I pinned at chest just for safety and comfort. Perfect length for my 5'5" height with low heels. Beautiful silk like material.

links_reviews_title: Could not wear. My boobs would have been totally exposed.
links_reviews_text: I actually got this as a replacement for some pants that were too big. In theory it was a really cute jumpsuit. There was just no way to cover my boobs in this. I could have worn a shirt underneath but I thought that looked silly. Good luck with this one.

I don't typically wear items like this so I took a chance and I'm so happy that I did! I got so many compliments and I felt like a bohemian rockstar. The fit is very flattering and the ties around the waist/chest makes it easy to make the garment look great on your body type. Wait until you feel like material! Like a pure silk sheet wrapped around you for the evening. Rent it. You won't regret it.

links_reviews_title: cute in theory, but odd fit
links_reviews_text: I should've taken a photo in this because I know that's how most of us read the reviews but maybe this will still help someone! I am usually a US 6 or 8 and rented both sizes for a rehearsal dinner. Overall the fit was okay. The difference between sizes was mostly in the thighs, I had a little bit more room in them, but the top and the length remained basically the same. I am a 36C and the top fit okay, a bit loose, nothing like how it appears to fit the model. The tie on the side had a grommet you could feed one of the ties through but it prevented the wrap top from being tied tightly regardless if you used the grommet or not. The length is so weird. I am not that tall (5'6" if I round up the half inch) and this hit me at the ankles. If it were an inch or two longer so it skimmed the top of my foot/the floor or even a couple inches shorter so it appeared more cropped it would've been fine, but it looked like I was gearing up for a flood or had an unexpected growth spurt. The length of the jumpsuit made every single pair of shoes I own look stupid. The jumpsuit is sort of boot cut so it appears skinny from the front but from the side it flares out in the back, sort of like weird dress pants. In theory this jumpsuit is really cute, and I'm sure it'll look good on petite, waif-like girls, but for me it was lackluster and I didn't end up wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Cute but not long enough if you're y'all
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'9 and it was a tad short and a little short waisted. Otherwise, it was super cute!
Too small

links_reviews_title: So comfortable and flattering/ hard to go to the bathroom
links_reviews_text: I'm going to reorder the size up because this fit but it was just tight enough to be uncomfortable for all day wear. I layered a black t shirt under for work and planned to wear it normal to a concert but I was uncomfortable so I bailed and returned right away. Great material but no stretch. Getting it down to go to the bathroom would have been impossible if I had my hair up- I had to shimmy in and out of it due to strap length. Short pant length. Would look weird with heels.
didn't love this one. Awkward fit and the shape of the legs is strange. Also the silver ring at the waist for the belt makes it super retro looking.

I loved this jumpsuit so much! It runs long, so you would need to wear a good heel or tuck under. Got so many compliments on it, wore to dinner and cocktails. The fabric was divine, fun colors, very flattering.
Looks like pajamas.

links_reviews_title: I didn't get to wear it out.
links_reviews_text: Super cute, but I am six feet tall and it was too short for me and gave me a wedgie.

links_reviews_title: RTR Campus Insider: Didn't wear but loved - Runs large in the top but fits great everywhere else
links_reviews_text: This silk jumpsuit was so cute, colorful and comfortable, but it was impossible to a) wear a bra with it and b) have the straps loose enough to get out of the jumpsuit when needed and c) cover the girls. I wanted to wear it out to the bars, but there wasn't a way to wear it while also being "secure." Great for curvy gals but hail caution if you're bigger than a C-cup.
Too big
The top was a little voluminous, but it was sooooo nice feeling on the skin, and a funky fresh pattern. Pyjamas? Clown outfit? High fashion? The world may never know. Loved it.

This was really cute and fit completely fine in the legs and waist however, the top is huge my bra was completely showing and there is no way to tighten the straps. I am not sure who could actually wear this

links_reviews_title: It's a nice fabric and good pattern design
links_reviews_text: Not a great fit. Too long through the crotch and straps

links_reviews_title: Did not fit in the chest area.
links_reviews_text: Did not fit
Just didn't work with my inseam
Flattering fit. Only issue for me was top, as it was baggy so needed to use a pin to clip the bra straps together
I felt like I was 8ft talk with this on. Amazing. I am pretty flat chested though and had to use Hollywood tape since it was so low cut though. I received many compliments.
my boobs were about to hang out. terrible fit
A little big on the chest

links_reviews_title: Got this for a vacation trip and it was perfect.
links_reviews_text: This was such a unique and lightweight piece. Perfect for vacation.
A little too summery for what I needed it for. But will likely rent again another time!

links_reviews_title: Cute but impossible to get on
links_reviews_text: Beautiful in concept but almost impossible to get in and out of

links_reviews_title: TTS, Workable for Petite Frames Though (almost)
links_reviews_text: Weird photo, but it's the only one I had. Rented for a party for my puppy's bday lol. I'm very petite - many, MANY pieces just don't fit. I'm 5'2", ~100lbs, 30B, narrow frame. The straps are adjustable. Waist hit a little low, which usually happens, but paired with the right slim crops I could make it work. I'd recommend for all, but if you're a bit taller or have a bigger chest - great! Beautiful color and material. The cut and semi train add a wonderful panache. Chest area is very feminine.
This is a great top for happy hour, girls night, dinner, or vacation. Definitely recommend!
Perfect top to wear with white pants. Lots of fun to rent.

links_reviews_title: This wasn't my favorite item I've rented...
links_reviews_text: Fit really well, was very comfortable, but I felt really short in it.
Wore this out to a showing of Hamilton and date night later. It fit well and the color is fantastic. It was fun and different. Good adjustable straps!

links_reviews_title: Cute top. Was a little long on me but I am short
links_reviews_text: Cute color, nice top

Beautiful fun and sexy top. Runs a bit narrow across the back and through the waist and hips. If you are broad across the back and thick in the waist and hips, I recommend sizing up for a sleeker fit.
Fabric was a bit heavy, but otherwise beautiful top.

I checked true to size because I'm not sure if I ordered it too big. I've lost a good bit of weight this past month. But, I'll give you a run down with my measurements. It's a gorgeous top. The material is stretchy and heavy so it is forgiving and it lays well on the body. They balanced the cut very well. I am pear shaped currently. (38/36/48) I ordered the XXL thinking it would fit but it's a bit too big through the bust, perfect in the waist and good through the hips. That's where the stretch came in very handy. The waist is very flattering. The color is true to the pictures and very saturated. You will stand out just the right amount. I am a 38B or 38C depending on the fabric, but even with it being a little too big it almost hit the mark. If the material wasn't stretchy & thick, I'd have been able to wear it. It's not too revealing but the top is easily positioned for a deeper V for a classy yet racy look. This top is perfect for a curvy girl with larger cup sizes. The only reason I'm returning it is due to the top being too large (for me). I'd have worn this with a pair of white or black jeggings and a strappy shoe. I'd have done gold jewelry a delicate pendant necklace and bracelet. Or for a bigger girl, a pendant with a thicker chain. I hope this helps someone. Much love!
It was very thick and heavy. The pictures look like a lightweight summery top and it was not that. It fit well and looked good, but I'd rather wear it in the fall with a jacket.

Fit true to size, but due to my short stature, the top was a little too long. Paired with a great leather skirt and heels, it looked almost like a co-ord/dress. Unfortunately, I didn't feel comfortable enough to wear with jeans, etc.
Loved the color and fit Great for moms who need to cover up the baby pooch Received many compliments Sexy but classy at the same time
Too much fabric below the waist for me - interesting concept though. Almost a winner
I loved this so much I bought it. Sometimes the front would slip down and my bra would show, so I wish I used tape. It was very slimming and comfortable for a casual night at a nice place.
Puckered at the zipper and looked poorly made

I wore it to a baby shower with flats and a different necklace then dress it up at night for a birthday dinner. I probably could have used an 8 but it was unavailable so the 10 worked. Loved loved this!
I didn't love this piece. Had so many hopes for it and had been trying to rent it for a while. It fit ok on top but large on bottom. Top felt like it was choking me.

links_reviews_title: It was comfortable, and classy for a graduation from a master's program.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, and it was not too short (which I was worried about). I loved the look, I paired it with a pair go Migonne Gavigan earrings. Absolutely perfect!
Wore this for my graduation & loved it!!

Loved this romper for a bachelorette party in Vegas! Super comfortable and flattering, very forgiving in your stomach area! I got a 6 and an 8 and wore the 6, it fits true to size/maybe a little large! Would Love to rent this again, a little more magenta than pictured, very pretty color
Received a lot of compliments on this outfit.

I loved the color of this romper but it was A LOT. It took a little convincing from friends to wear it out but I did and was comfortable all day long. I'm typically between an 8 and a 10, ordered this in a 10 because it was the only size available for my update but the 8 would have been a much better fit for me. I wore it with a belt to help get some shape back. From the front, I felt like this made me look bigger (so only side pose photos take this day) but my friends swore that it didn't. As always with rompers... using the bathroom was awkward. I had a lot of trouble with the zipper and buttons in the back by myself, so someone always came to the bathroom with me to help. Not a problem if you're with your girl-squad, but if you'll be solo definitely something to consider!

links_reviews_title: Pop of color for work offsite
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and professional. Transitioned easily fro presentations to meeting to dinner with colleagues. Comments "You always look so pulled together!"

links_reviews_title: Not for my body type (exaggerated hour glass), but a nice piece.
links_reviews_text: I wanted to review because didn't see any similar to my frame. I ordered a 10 because the 8 wasn't available and didn't wear because it was too loose. I have a large butt and fairly large chest and it was a bit loose but ok in both of those areas, but the midsection area was too loose and a pouchy. I have a small waist in comparison to the rest of my body, so an 8 may have fit better. If you have a little to hide in the waist this is probably good for you. If your body is like mine and you need to accentuate your waist a bit, this isn't too flattering. Buttons were hard AF to do even while it was on the hanger! Fabric was nice, high quality but still loose.
This fits like a glove - really flattering and looks expensive . It was chilly so I paired with tall boots and leather jacket. I will rent again for summertime.

I absolutely loved this romper! It was so comfortable and super classy. It did run a little large (I wore the 4) but it still worked. I wore it for my husband's 40th birthday party which was perfect because I was able to dance in it all night!

First time wearing a short romper. At first I felt it didn't look as good but decided to wear it anyway. The looks and compliments I received were amazing and changed my mind. Fits true to size and it's easy to get it in and out. Even for a pear like me.

links_reviews_title: Perfect, elegant fit for a romper!
links_reviews_text: I always hesitate with rompers because I am somewhat tall and have a long torso, so they end up riding up on me and being extremely short and unflattering. This is the exception!!!! So comfortable and looks classy; can dress up or down easily. Pictures do not do justice to how flattering it is and how beautiful the color is. Must rent!

links_reviews_title: Fun piece for girls night out!
links_reviews_text: I loved this piece! I wore it for a girls night out and my friends thought it great too! No issues for me with it riding up (I'm almost 5'7"). Only complaint, as others have stated, is that going to the ladies room was a bit challenging given the button and zipper in the back. However, it was worth the trouble for the great compliments I got.
Of course as a romper, it was kinda hard to get in and out of but overall I loved it. It wasn't too short or too long, the fit was perfect! I had so many compliments and I'll rent again.
Perfect for my birthday dinner. Fits true to size. Comfortable and not too tight

links_reviews_title: So classy and tons of compliments!!!
links_reviews_text: Loved this romper!!! I wore it for a bridal shower and received several compliments. The color is so beautiful and perfect for summer. The only downfall is I wished it was like a 1/2 inch shorter in length. But I would most certainly rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear - felt it was unflattering
links_reviews_text: Wanted to love this as it looked cute and was a great color, but I thought the cut was super unflattering. The flaps highlight your lower stomach and inner thighs and I felt like the cut gave me a pooch. Having the flaps in the back too highlight the middle of your butt - a weird thing to highlight.

links_reviews_title: Great for a casual summer event!
links_reviews_text: I attended an outdoor wedding held midday in June. The invitation said “wear shorts”. (What?) This was the perfect solution for a very confusing dress code! I forgot my spanx (since we traveled for the wedding) and the pleats in front covered the fact that I’ve had three 10-pound babies! I ordered the size 6 and the size 4, and similar to what others said in the reviews, the size 4 fit perfectly. The bodice is fully lined with satin. I felt cool and looked great! Highly recommend this one!
The fabric was soft and such a cute style for a day party. Showed off my long legs!

Ive had this marked a a favorite for awhile!! And I finally was able to wear it and it is exactly what I thought it would be. Beautiful color. I would have liked to have worn the 2 for it fit my waist a bit better, but was too tight around my chest. So I stayed with my usual 4. The only down fall to this outfit was any sitting or bending over resulted in a bit of a wedgie. But I was surprised at the ease of being able to unzip (and unbutton) myself in order to use the restroom. I highly recommend this sexy little number!

links_reviews_title: Fun outfit and something different for a night out!
links_reviews_text: Runs true to size. Accentuates the middle, so good to be mindful of that. Fun romper and beautiful color. It was the perfect length for me but if you are tall this probably isn't for you.

I wore this to an engagement party in the heat of summer. It was so comfortable, and I got compliments all night long. Highly recommend for women with bigger boobs because you can wear a regular bra underneath. I loved that it showed off my legs and loved that it was a romper which made it extra comfy.

links_reviews_title: The color and the fit were perfect!
links_reviews_text: I loved love this romper! Got plenty of compliments, the color is fab!! I ordered the 6 and a size up but the 6 ended up working perfectly! It was comfy and had a little give in the stomach which was nice. Would absolutely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color and fitting for baby shower
links_reviews_text: This romper fit great. It was just a little tight around the arms/chest area but it didn't bother me for the event. I have a hard time finding things that fit great post baby but I was pleasantly surprised with this! The color is so pretty and it's a unique outfit so it stands out!

I loved this pink romper! Went back and forth about buying it! It is incredibly comfortable with a perfect fit to my body type. I got SO many compliments on the color, the fit, and the overall look. The pleats in the front and back add another layer of texture and fun to the romper.

Comfort fit. Bright Color. Fun play suit. Only con, this piece doesn't have pockets. Would have liked more with pockets. ( runs true to size , with a little give ). Normally a 12 , rented a 12, a 10 would have fit better ( if looking for a tight fit )
This was an amazing outfit!! I got compliments all night and it was a super flattering fit. Extremely comfortable too. Can dress it up or go more casual. Will definitely be renting again!!

I sized up for my back up size but I should have sized down. It's hard to say if I would have gone with the smaller size, as my regular size fit fine, but I didn't even try on the bigger romper. I wore the romper with black textured tights for a little extra warmth. This was a pretty easy outfit to wear (aside from the tight buttons in the back) and I felt comfortable in it all night.
Great vibrant color and comfortable to wear
I would definitely rent again! The color is beautiful and fit was great. The one thing that I will say is that the top was a little big in the bust area.

The only con is you'll need a bathroom buddy to help with the buttons. But i wish I could have kept this, I would never take it off. The color is amazing and I got compliments all night. And it was so easy and fun to dance in-- the most important part!

Fit true to size. I wasn't as impressed at first because it's not super form fitting. But I got more compliments on this outfit than almost any I've ever worn! I wore it to a conference in Vegas and had many people say it was the cutest outfit they saw while in Vegas! Very comfortable, easy to wear!

I rented this in black before and I knew I had to try this color! It's much less hot pink than in the pictures. Fit is great. I felt beautiful. I'm 5'4 170lbs and 12 was perfect. I got lots of compliments. I wish I could own this piece! Only drawback was that you definitely need a buddy to use the restroom. That is why I give this 4 out of 5 stars.

links_reviews_title: Got compliments on romper all night. Romper did a good job at covering my trouble area (stomach).
links_reviews_text: The romper fit well. The compliments were flowing all night. The color was awesome and popped. It did a good job at covering up my poochy stomach. I was comfortable and confident all night in this outfit!

Absolutely loved this, but due to my long torso, I couldn't make the outfit work - it was too high in the crotch, so uncomfortable. Tried size 4 and 6, but had the same issue. Otherwise the fit was nice.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a more casual wedding
links_reviews_text: True to size, great weight of material and perfect for an elopement reception. Also great for a mom who is running after a toddler at an affair. Received tons of compliments and could not have been in more comfortable attire! Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Ringin' in my 40s with sexy sophistication!
links_reviews_text: Great pop of color & flattering cut! Perfect outfit for a warm summer night at an outdoor patio area!
Everything was great. RTR is fabulous!

The torso was perfect length for someone who is taller like me! I can never wear rompers because of how they ride up, but I can honestly say I was so comfortable all night and had plenty of room to spare. It did run a little big but I was comfortable to I opted to just wear the size up. It got so many compliments and was such a great choice! Highly recommend

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. Unique neckline to show off a little skin.

links_reviews_text: I loved this so much I am considering purchasing it. It fits amazing and the style was so unique. Definitely will rent again.

I wore this to a friend's birthday party at a cocktail bar. I think the cutout is what makes it standout from every other form-fitting, knit dress. I may have preferred it to be a touch longer, but overall I think the style was flattering

links_reviews_title: Good dress...just not flattering on me
links_reviews_text: I don't have a waist so this dress did me no favors. But good color, thickness, and cutout. Comfortable. Good for winter.
This dress is so comfortable and the color and material make it the perfect fall/winter dress.
Comfortable not too heavy. Ribbed ..Moderately sexy. Perfect transition from office to evening out. Would rent again.
Warm, flirty comfortable and true to size
Beautiful color and fabric. The cutout and fit makes this dress too sexy for work. Cute for a date night. I'm short and it hit mid thigh.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fall color with bit of an edge...
links_reviews_text: This dress fit beautifully and was the perfect weight for a cool night in NYC for a Broadway show. Actually wore another night out for dinner. Keep in mind it pulls tight over your head when getting on so you may want to do your hair after.

This knit has a small rib to it which makes the fabric bunch in places, such as the sleeves which were way too long, and the top which I didn't fill out. Nice color and interesting cutout but I'd never wear it out, it made my 102 lb 5'2" frame look lumpy, even with a shaper underneath. There are more flattering ways to go.

Loved this dress so much. It is super comfortable, and true to size. It is form fitting but a stretchy material so it's very forgiving. Love the cutout, and great length. It's a unique dress and you look very put together in it.
Wore this for a Valentine date and loved the fit! It has stretch but is still fitting in all the right places
Uniq design for cut out- easy to wear work or dinner, color dark brown raisen

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a winter work party!
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress & it's edgy cut out. Turtleneck makes it conservative enough for a work party & you can dress it up or down. I typically wear a 6 & the M fit me perfectly. I was worried because some sweater dresses can be very unflattering, but this material was forgiving. Throw on some spanx & you're good go! The only con for me was that it got a little hot, but it was cold outside so not having to wear a coat was worth being a bit hot inside.

This dress was an unexpected suprise... i absolutely loved it and my only issue is that i dont have anywhere else to wear it again. The material is very comfortable... it hugs your curves in all the right ways. So very Sexy and i will definitly rent again.
Stretchy sweater material makes this a comfortable dress for the fall to winter seasons. Fit is true to size / it's form fitting and does not hide much around the waist.

Loved this! My favorite is a knit dress! This fit me so nice and was even my favorite color! Gave it a little something with the slit by the neck too! This dress runs true to size and is super stretchy, recommend sizing up. Have to wear with a strapless bra other wise the strap will show by the slit.
Fit amazing, hugs your body in all the right places. I wore this to my in laws wine and pair harvest party. It was a hit!

links_reviews_title: Neck "slash" gives a unique yet safe for work show of skin!
links_reviews_text: This dress is fitted and made of a ribbed sweater material. The dress is not too heavy but would be warm enough for fall/winter. I would have liked this dress a bit more if there were some detail that mitigated my lack of waist. Great for an hourglass figure!

Absolutely loved this rental and was seriously thinking about keeping. Wore it all day, then to a birthday party and also to an outdoor BBQ. Perfect fall dress. The fabric is stretchy and comfortable. Looks amazing with boots. Love the cutout detail.

I was not wowed, but I was not disappointed. The dress is a typical sweater dress. It is ribbed and has a lot of stretch. the open shoulder is edgy, and if paired with some stocking, it can be worn during any occasion. Dressed up or down. The XS fit me, so anyone smaller may have a lot of extra room

Wore out in Vegas on a girls trip. Ran big - I should have rented the small (wore the medium/ rented M and L) - the sleeves were long and had extra fabric bunch up in the back. But super comfortable for being a body con dress. Material is like a stretchy knit sweater. The turtleneck got really hot, and I had to roll it down later in the night. So would be good for something cooler weather or for dinner - but got toasty in the nightclub.

links_reviews_title: It was fine (didn't make me feel that fine)
links_reviews_text: This dress hugged my curves just right, but the cutout felt more awkward than sexy while dancing.

links_reviews_title: Dress has a tight fit but runs true to size. The perfect length.

links_reviews_text: Fits exactly like it looks like it will...cute fun dress but it's really short so you have to own it!

links_reviews_title: A night out to a jazz club and a comedy club
links_reviews_text: Warm material. Nice deep burgundy color. Small sexy cutout.
Very cute dress I just felt like it could've been a little longer considering I'm short
This dress fits perfectly. It is tight but in the most perfect way where it sucks you in but doesn't show everything. I will absolutely be renting this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Form-fitting fun dress for a holiday party
links_reviews_text: This dress is form-fitting and gorgeous. Definitely accentuates the curves, I received lots of compliments even though I felt like it was a little too tight. Love the cut-out and the color. Wore it with brown booties and brown tights for a holiday party. Would rent again!
Very comfortable. Was great to wear even in the Summer. Turtle neck fit well.
Great fit!

links_reviews_title: I got this to wear to work.
links_reviews_text: Dress looks as pictured, nice quality.. however it was a bit short for work. I still wore it but was pulling it down all day.

links_reviews_title: unique look for the every day.
links_reviews_text: Neck part was kind of itchy.

This dress was SO sexy and SO comfortable. The detailing on the neck was so subtle, yet MADE the dress. Wearing earrings and a ring, made the perfect compliment. I would own this if I could! The color was so beautiful, material was perfect. LOVED it.
Fits great! Wore twice and didnt want to give back! Will rent again
Loved this form fitting dress and the beautiful color! It was warm enough for a cold fall evening, but the opening was SO COOL. I got compliments all night!

Fit like a dream! I am so in love with this dress. I am a US 4/6, the size 10R was perfect, like it was made just for me. The fabric was a surprise - thick and structured, almost like neoprene but lighter weight. It loved it! Was perfect to keep me warmer on a cool night even though it was s/s. Looked cute with denim jacket over it. My favorite features were the asymmetric hem and the cute off shoulder "sleeve" with elastic scrunch strap over shoulders which were comfy and adjusted themselves due to the elastic - brilliant. One of the "sleeves" kept creeping up, but I think that might be due to my posture. Got a ton of compliments on this one and I did not want to send it back! Sorry photo so grainy, file was too big, I resized it but am not tech-y so not even sure what I did to it. Have fun wearing this one. =)

This was such a fun dress to wear! Very flattering and sexy in a fun, flirty way. Worn to Christmas Symphony. High quality lined dress with vibrant pattern. Would rent again! I'm a true 4 and was thankful I ordered the 6.

links_reviews_title: Very flatttering dress! But go one size up!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a Hamilton charity event and felt great in it! The fit was flattering around the waist and chest. The dress fit perfectly everywhere except around the rib cage. It is difficult to take a deep breath as a result. If you plan on wearing this for a long time or to a more active event, consider going one size up.
I rented this dress for the 2019 Veuve Clicquot Polo Classic in LA, and it was absolutely perfect. I received so many compliments, and it was incredibly comfortable to wear. 10/10
Sturdy fabric sucks you in and keeps you looking amazing all night! The details are showstoppers. Small in the bust (I'm a 32B/34A and didn't wear a bra) so keep that in mind if you're bigger on top.
Summer formal and fit right in! Definitely runs small as I'm a solid 6 and was very tight on my chest. Many compliments, so fun!

This dress fit like a dream and I received so many compliments to the wedding I wore it to. The color is closer to an orange than red. Its such a flattering dress with a really unique style. It is perfect for a spring or fall outdoor event and of course suitable indoors during hot/humid summer months. I wouldn't recommend wearing this dress outdoors if its above 85 degrees as the fabric would be a tad too heavy. Absolutely loved this dress and would rent again. Thanks so much, RTR~

I rented this dress for a wedding and was so glad that I wore it. The color was fun and the off the shoulder detail was flirty but still conservative. I got so many compliments. I also loved the hemline. It had had a bit of a flamenco feel. It did run a little large but I feel like the size down would've been too tight. All in all it was a fantastic dress that I would totally rent again.

Loved stepping out of my comfort zone and wearing this dress! I would have never bought this dress but thanks to RtR can try it out for the weekend. Runs small, is usually a US0/2 and went with the UK8. Slightly tight around the arms so be aware if you are broad. The skirt is full so can probably accomodate many hip sizes. I wore a plunge bra with a racer back. Normal strapless was visible at the front. Definitely recommend for a run wedding guest dress.

This dress was waaaay out of my comfort zone. Even when it arrived, I still was not sure about it on the hanger. HOWEVER, when you put it on - the dress is Amazing! Great color, fun fit, ruffle at bottom is flirty and the off the should cap sleeves/sweetheart bodice make it a sexy silhouette. Rented it for a Kentucky Derby themed wedding and this is the winner (after trying on many RTR dresses). Make sure you read a lot of the reviews to understand the difference in the sizing. I am typically a true size 4 but the 10R fit great. Plus, the dress material is a bit heavy - therefore it does not wrinkle but it would be hot for an outdoor summer wedding. Color is more orange-red than red. Love it and would rent it again! All the woman voted it the best Kentucky Derby outfit for the event.

links_reviews_title: Looooved this dress! Was so sad to mail it back!
links_reviews_text: Fit beautifully! Flattering, comfortable and such a fun print. So many compliments all night :)

This is a very fitted dress with no stretch. I liked it but I'd say it's not exactly casual because of the fabric. It's very thick so unless it's cold out or where you'll be you might want to consider something else if you plan to dance or do anything like that. That said good construction and design. I would not recommend this for anyone with anything above a B cup though as it is very tight.
Loved this dress, would rent (or buy) again. Ran very very small, so glad I read reviews and got a larger size. I'm typically a 4-6 and ordered a 10.

links_reviews_title: Stunning for my 20yr High School Reunion!
links_reviews_text: This dress is spectacular! Much heavier fabric than expected which made for a flattering fit. I had two events for my HS reunion and this was perfect for the Formal Party. I am a typical Size 2 in dresses and I wore the 8R, if the 6R had been avail I would have definitely tried it as well as it may have fit a bit more snug around my waist. But as it was the 8R was still form fitting and beautiful! Wish I owned this dress!
I had so much fun wearing this dress to an outdoor wedding in California. I felt like an old fashioned movie star. And it was great for dancing, too!

This dress was a HIT! Was able to wear it to work for client meetings, then a work party and then to the Rosé Mansion where I blended in perfectly. Got SO many compliments and you truly feel like the tango emoji! At 5'0", I'm normally a 0-2 but after reading the reviews I got a 6R and it fit perfectly everywhere!
@nooutfittwice

links_reviews_title: Had a stay vacation in my own city
links_reviews_text: Overall true to size and thick fabric. Incredibly flattering!

links_reviews_title: UNLIMITED compliments! Never felt sexy, sophisticated and comfy all in one dress before this one!
links_reviews_text: Fitted around midsection but not too tight, bust area perfect for flat chested or bigger bust, limited arm movement, but bright color and heavier material made for a fun and flowy ensemble!
Loved the fit of the dress- it was a little tight in my arms / shoulders but the fabric was really Lovely and super High quality.

links_reviews_title: this dress is straight up *ing dynamite
links_reviews_text: Fit is TTS. I'm usually a US 4/6 and was pleased with how the 8R/US 4 looked. The material feels quite nice, almost thick. I wasn't sure about the pattern and colour when I first saw this on the website but decided to get it anyway, and I'm really glad I did -- this dress is incredibly flattering and makes you feel amazing (what more do you want from your clothes?)

I did not wear this because it was too bright for my event but I wish I had someplace to wear it! Will rent again when I have the right place! Incredibly well made, thick material. I usually wear a 10 and was sent the 14 which was slightly large but I never would've fit into a 10!
Gathered at waist. I should have sized down not up as others suggested

links_reviews_title: My favorite.... but I didn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: This dress is nothing short of amazing. The fit, quality, color... perfect. It was just too much for the party I was attending. Will rent again.

I rented this for a summer wedding. I did not end up wearing it because it was just a little too thick. Great stretch, fun print. I am usually between a 6/8 and went with the US 6 (10R). I have a small chest and this was perfect. Will rent for a different event!

links_reviews_title: Did not wear. Not flattering shape from front.
links_reviews_text: Not flattering from the front. Flattering from side view but even then it still squished my chest.

links_reviews_title: A little too small in the chest
links_reviews_text: Should have gone with the 10R as I'm more of a 6 these days.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous but too small. Didn't wear
links_reviews_text: The colors and fabric are high quality and gorgeous cut. Fit was too small in chest.
Love this dress. Looks great in photos. Very thick material and should strap very cute. Right in waist which looks great
This dress fit great. The fabric was on the heavy side so not a great choice for a hot summer day. I ended up going with something else but would try this one again.
Fits perfectly, the zipper is a bit tight but such a lovely dress

I really wanted to wear this dress but as a 34B it wasn't flattering. If I had cleavage I would have loved to wear it. While it looks like a summer dress it is more of a early spring or fall type dress because it is very thick material. It hides any body imperfections (except small breasts).
Fun and flirty. Was slightly loose on me, so a little less curve hugging. I wore the 8 normally size 4.

links_reviews_title: Weirdly heavy fabric and strange top fit
links_reviews_text: This one wasn't for me. For starters the fabric felt too heavy for such a bright, summer color. The bust was also not flattering. Ended up sending it back without wearing.

links_reviews_title: Really fun dress. Perfect for a party.
links_reviews_text: The dress made me look thin and long. Loved the fit. I am 5'10" and the length was perfect on me.
I thought this would be a bright red in reviewing the other reviews.... it is almost orange! Be sure you look good in orange before you rent.
It fit wonderfully! I have a small waist and a big hip and it made me look slim and I felt beautiful.

The fabric is fantastic - thick, so it really holds you in, and a really fun print. It was on the verge of being too tight in the chest, so I didn't wear a bra and was totally secure (impossible for me in most other dresses). Felt great to wear and would rent again!

Feels like quality. Lined thick. The shoulder straps add a lovely touch. I didn't need a bra, the top practially holds you up like a bustier. Flowy where it should be and tight where it should be. A perfect dress really.
Very slimming, looks gorgeous on

I found the fit on this top a bit weird. The neckline was very tight and I found myself regularly trying to pull the blouse away from my neck. With all the adjustments, the detailing on the top started to fan outward instead of upward and had a weird look. The rest of the shirt was a bit loose, so I think it was just a sizing issue for me. The shirt was still cute but I wouldn't rent again.
I loved this top SO MUCH and I really wanted to buy it after renting it but it's sold out everywhere. So cute and great quality.
This top is easy to throw on and dresses up jeans. You do need a skinny black camisole to wear underneath.
I wore this for a work party and it was great. I'm 5'3 but I have wide shoulders (size 8 button downs) and this top fit perfectly. The material was very nice too.
Pretty basic top. The lace is thin but not bad quality. More like tulle. True to size, easy to throw on with very little effort and still look cute!
The fit was great, pretty true to size and I have 36D's. Totally recommend, so many ways to wear it! I rocked it with blood orange skinny jeans & the standard black on black look. Loved this top.

links_reviews_title: Cute lace top with a sexy look
links_reviews_text: Pretty lace detail, did not come with a cami, but I had a black one I wore with it
Not super special, but cute for everyday. Fit true to size and not too tight in arms or anything. Wore a plain black tank underneath and was able to wear no bra, as ruffle covers bust area.

I loved this blouse! It had just the right amount of interest with the ruffles, bell sleeves and lace. It was structured and fitted, but I did not feel constricted. I have broad shoulders and it was not cutting me. There wasn't any stretch, so I would highly recommend sizing up for a backup. This blouse does not come with a slip. It is incredibly sheer with the lace, so I would recommend a black or nude cami to layer the look.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a pre-wedding party & loved it - I received tons of compliments, will rent this again!
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful blouse, I paired it with emerald green chandelier earrings and high waisted black jeans. The sleeves were a little tight getting it on but once everything was buttoned and adjusted it was great. Will rent this again. Perfect for a night out or a dinner party.
Wore this to meet up with some friends, was so cute and perfect for a nice restaurant and drinks after. Would rent again for sure!
Fits great and great for dressy night out.
the neck is very tight. and the lack does not stand up straight
Loved the fit wore with a bralette underneath
Great for date night!
This top is very cute. It is a lacy sheer overlay so a camisole under is a must. Very comfortable and I got many compliments on it.

I didn't end up wearing this but would def rent again. The lace is really pretty and looks really good paired simply with jeans. I actually don't think you need a cami under, I would totally rock just a black bra. The lace around the chest is doubled up and not as sheer as you think.
Terrible - couldn't wear. Super tight in the arms and super short in the back. It was like halfway up my back. Do not recommend. I couldn't wear.
this was fun to wear. i wore it out on a Saturday night with a bralette underneath and then wore a camisole underneath for work!

I wore the medium out for date night with some jeans to dress it down a bit. You have to wear a camisole under it because it doesn't come with one but we all have a black tank on hand. The portion around the body is very loose and the top is a bit on the shorter side which I like since I am only 5' 4". I would rent this top again.
Cute, lightweight, nice detail, not thick lace, and doesnt have any shap. Completely sheer so be prepared to pair somethunv with it.
This top I wore a black tank top underneath, but it's so cute! I had gotten so many compliments, absolutely loved it! I bought it! :)

The shirt is a beautiful lace and I got a size large but it was very wide from the torso and super narrow on the shoulders for me. The armpit area was unfitted and gapping. And then it's short from the bottom trim. So it was not comfortable to wear and I skipped it. Also, you would need to wear your own camisole.
This was too tight in the arms and around my neck so I sent it back without wearing.
Loved the look of the shirt. I work it to a party and to work. I got lots of compliments.
This top is actually more beautiful in person - it looks feminine and classy at the same time. The issue, however, is that the fit can be awkward around the chest/arms area for bustier ladies.

This top fit pretty true to size-- though the sleeves were a tad tight (nothing unbearable). Above all, this top is gorgeous and can easily be dressed up or down. I am so sad that I didn't get a picture in it to show you all!
Simple top but cute. I wore to work with black pants. A little narrow through the shoulders and the neck was a little tight.
simple and pretty
Pretty lace shirt - wore this from work to dinner. It's see through and doesn't come with a cami but you definitely need to wear one.
Ordered the 16 & 14. The 16 was very baggy, the 14 was a perfect fit. So cute for a wedding

I'm 6'1" and I was specifically looking for a midi length dress, this dress was perfect. Fit a little big. Cinched waist may highlight the wrong areas if you dont want that. Good color for fall or spring.
Sized down in this dress. Definitely long (I'm short) but loved it. The sleeves are super cute too. Could not wear a regular bra because the back was too low, but wasn't an issue for me.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my sister in laws bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size and flows! Comfortable and flattering! Great high neck that was comfortable!

I received so many compliments on this dress! It was so pretty and a dusty rose color. I added a violet belt (circa 1980s - thanks mom!) to emphasize my waist a bit since the dress was a bit roomy in the waist. Length was great and coupled with a cute pair of white heels I didn't look too short (I'm 5'4"). Comfortable all nice gut while feeling classy.

links_reviews_title: Pleats give you an imaginary pooch
links_reviews_text: Pleating at the waist give you an imaginary pooch because the fabric flares up when you move. Could definitely have worn this while I was very pregnant so maybe a good maternity party dress!
Runs large especially for petite women, I'm 5'3 and there was too much fabric, but I made it work

links_reviews_title: Cute but might be more flattering on taller ladies!
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress but the length was kind of funky and not super flattering for someone who is my height. It ran a little large too - the waist is elastic!
What a comfortable dress to wear! Can be worn in warmth or chilly conditions. The lace, color, and length allowed me to dress it up for a formal college affair. Would rent it again!

I had the privilege of trying this on at RTR Chicago before I rented so I knew what size I needed. It felt very elegant, a great wedding guest dress! Maybe a touch too long, but a beautiful dress nonetheless.
I felt girly and cute in this sweet dress. The elasticize waist made it comfy, and I got around bra straps and band showing by wearing a nubra. Pretty pretty.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and easy to wear dress.
links_reviews_text: I loved how easy this dress was to wear, I thought the length would be odd and make me look short but it was flattering (I'm 5'6). The top portion is mesh so adds a little bit to the dress. Fit slightly large but not enough I would want to change sizes. Very classy, pretty dress. Recommend.

links_reviews_title: Fun work to night out dress.
links_reviews_text: Ran slightly large. But still very pretty.

links_reviews_title: Wore to my son's First Communion and received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Flowey and comfortable. Very pretty.
Wore this for my daughters baptism, 5 months postpartum; the dress is flattering and I felt very comfortable. Received many compliments.
Pretty and different!
Love it!
Very pretty and "mother-in-law" approved :) Not a sexy dress .. but super cute. Girly, light pink, modest, I love it.
I'm 5'8 and the waist was a bit short on this but it didn't look terrible. It's a very elegant fabric and look!
Loved this one! Wore to a meeting and got many compliments
Fit was great minus the waist. Nothing a cute belt can't fix
Has a fairly open back; so I had to wear it with a blazer to be work appropriate

links_reviews_title: Very flattering and pretty , odd fit
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress. It is very flattering. The back is very open, so was not appropriate for my work environment. It may be great in a more casual environment. This dress runs a little big . The chest and waist was large, but the neck was very tight, going down a size would not work.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous pattern but not right for my body type
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved the color and lace on this dress. The ruffle sleeves were feminine and just the right length to make my arms feel good in a sleeveless dress. I ended up not wearing it because I'm very short and it was practically a floor length dress on me. It looked matronly on me but it's really a pretty dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and beautiful dress, received lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: The zipper was difficult.

Absolutely loved the dress but unfortunately couldn't wear it because of zipper issues. It wouldn't zipper past the waist line, plenty of room but would go up. Dress runs true to size, fabric and lining was great.
Very cute but way too heavy for a summer event
Lots of compliments. Fits true to size but slightly big in waist/hips.
This was perfect. I wore it for my brother in law's wedding and got so many complements on it
I didn't get to wear it. The zipper was broken.
Hated it, terrible fit for my shape. Frumpy, floppy, the collar was floppy..
Good fit
I added a small belt to complete the look.

links_reviews_title: Cute but too big. Definitely needs a belt. Cuter in person
links_reviews_text: Fit was off so I looked larger than life. A belt helped. Definitely get a size smaller.

links_reviews_title: It is a very faltering dress
links_reviews_text: its a bit tight in the chest but it fits wonderfully

I wore this dress for Easter and I loved it. It was a perfect Spring dress. I loved the fit and found it to be true to size. I'd highly recommend it. I would have loved to have worn it again but I didn't really have an occasion to. I'd definitely rent again though perhaps for a wedding.

Absolutely loved this dress. Super pretty, flattering and a stylish yet conservative dress. Very comfy and easy to move in. It does run large, I'm usually a 4/6 (have big butt and hips) and I easily fit the 4, could have worn a 2. I would size down.
The color and details of this dress are gorgeous. I didn't wear it because it was too big and too long on me.
Did not wear did not get in time for party.
Really liked this one! Needed to wear my hair up to make the back work. Was longer than I expected but looked very classy. Would recommend with a belt to define the waistline.

My husband picked this dress out for me to wear to our anniversary dinner. It's my first RtR rental, and I wasn't impressed when I first pulled it out of the bag, it doesn't look like much, and the elastic looks like it's losing it's shape. Also, for the retail price of this dress I really expected it to have lining -- it does not, it's a standard bandage dress. That said, as soon as I put it on I loved it! My measurements are 33-26-35, and the XS fit me like a glove, hitting in all the right places. There is short boning on the sides in the bust, and a nifty elastic strap that you hook before zipping it up (see picture). I wore it without a bra, but it did slouch a bit, even just sitting at dinner. If I were to wear it in front of anyone other than my husband I probably would've worn a strapless bra to give it a nicer shape. The first pair of underwear I tried did show some lines through it, so watch out for that, but the fabric is pretty thick so in general it's forgiving. Overall, super cute dress that can be dressed up or down, and my husband wanted me to wear it again so I call it a win!

links_reviews_title: Very cute, shoes what it needs to show, hides what it needs to hide
links_reviews_text: Very flattering dress, true to size. Fits beautiful highlighting your shape while hiding the belly pouch. It is short, but not too short. I wore it to my husband’s high school reunion and it was a great success.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress but chose not to wear
links_reviews_text: Lovely, high quality dress, but ultimately I went with another option for a wedding. I didn't love how this looked on my chest, but the ombré effect was nice. Would rent this designer again!
It does slip down a bit, like all strapless dresses, but it has an amazingly flattering fit around the waist.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful flattering dress, lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a nye party and got lots of good feedback. It was big in the chest area but I'm small in that area. I didn't even mind cause I loved the dress so much. The small was a little big despite me usually being a small with this designer.

While strapless dresses do have a tendency to fall down while dancing (including this one), I was so happy with it. I had had this dress picked out for months and needed somewhere to wear it. Ended up wearing to a school dance and I got so many compliments! It was so different and the material was very cool. Loved wearing this dress, would highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: This was rented for a bachlorette party
links_reviews_text: Very flattering and comfy it stays up you dont have to worry about it falling down all night. I am a 34 c though so if someone is heavy chested I'm unsure of how it would hold up but probably fine. I loved it

links_reviews_title: I want to wear this everyday!
links_reviews_text: Love this dress and was a total show stopper at the events I went to. Rented for a work trip to Vegas and it was perfect for a night out. Fit perfectly and showed all of the right curves. Work with a strapless bra and did require fashion tape to keep in place. Wish I could afford to buy it because I felt hot wearing it and it was a total head turner. Will rent again

links_reviews_title: I always forget how much I hate strapless
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a charity gala through unlimited a week in advance, so I'd have time to change. I have two black Herve dresses of my own, and when I showed my sister the picture of me in this one, she said I should wear one of them instead. Maybe this would look better with someone with thinner shoulders than I have.
This dress fit true to size, w heavy fabric that hugged all the right places. Didn't have any issues w the top slipping off. The ombré makes the dress even more flattering.

links_reviews_title: Cute and classy second birthday dress
links_reviews_text: Super snug just the way we like it. You may even want to wear a little spanx because since it flares instead of completely hugging, thangs will show. Over all it was a hit for my evening change and I loved it.

So cute for a casual day in west Hampton- or you can dress it up for evening wear with heels - my torso is so short so it'll fit better with a longer torso but it still looked so cute on my petite frame and I never needed to pull it up because the bust was slipping - dress is worn a little and the wear can be seen at the zipper seams in the back of size XS but it can still be worn without anyone else noticing

This dress was hot hot hot!! My man definitely did a double take when he saw me in it. Very tight, hugs all the right places, perfect for a night out. Bonus: super comfortable, and breastfeeding friendly! ;) — @sufeychen

links_reviews_title: Great dress but top wouldn't stay up even though I am a full C. Tried tape but no luck
links_reviews_text: Not for small busts
Fit perfect!!!
The dress was just snug enough to stay in place. The quality was awesome! I was worried about it being too short, but even with 4 inch heels it hit at mid thigh.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, great weight, high quality dress
links_reviews_text: This was a perfect choice for a night out in Vegas. Tons of compliments on this dress. It didn't hold in my post-kids tummy as much as I expected, but it looked amazing regardless. I usually wear a small, but went with my backup size medium on this one. As a result it wasn't as snug and the weight of the dress pulled it down a little. It was very comfortable and I was really glad I treated myself to this one!

I'm a huge fan of Herve Leger for my body type but sometimes the fit is hit and miss. I'd been eyeing this dress for a while and finally had the chance to wear it out in Vegas. I didn't love it as much as I expected. The XS was too tight to wear a strapless bra with and the S was too big overall, especially the bottom half made my legs look like too tiny. The main issue is probably my bust is 32DDD plus my back and shoulders are broad so I'm probably not proportional but if you have regular boobs it should work. I think that it was pretty and classy and I pulled it off anyway, but wasn't my most flattering or comfy Herve dress I've tried on. The strapless designs can be fickle. It was cute and glad I tried it, but for the price and fit on me I would probably pass on renting it again.

links_reviews_title: Would not recommend if you have larger hips/butt
links_reviews_text: I picked this dress as a backup since the backup for my original dress was no longer available. Glad I picked it especially, since I wouldn't normally spend this much on a rental, and also glad that my original dress worked out well; this dress was just okay to me. If I sized up, I think it would've been too large, but as is, I wouldn't have felt comfortable wearing this to a wedding for fear that one wrong bend forward would expose all of my lady parts. If I were to wear this, I'd either do more sit-ups prior and/or wear spanx (I did neither in this picture) to keep everything together and smooth.

links_reviews_title: My first RTR, and I never thought I'd get SO many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This was a backup order when my first Herve Leger dress ended up being unavailable... and I'm so grateful! The length and bust probably would have been perfect had I been able to rent the small, but the medium was likely going to be the best fit. I wore spanx to keep everything together, but in hindsight I probably didn't need it as the dress kept everything in fairly tight.

The quality of this dress was very soft and nice. The medium fit perfectly on me. I wore spanks with it and that helped me feel skinny. The only issue was I was pulling the top of my dress up throughout the night. My chest size shrunk a lot now that I stopped nursing and I think that could have been the reason I was pulling it up. Aside from that great dress!!

As with most Herve's this dress was snug. The cut in the bust was true to size and I didn't feel like the girls were squished. The hombre colors really are fun to dress around and great for any event. The waistline is narrower than others due to some boning, so probably works best if you have a curvier or pronounced hourglass shape. Overall amazing dress, so many compliments!!

I received so many compliments that it was insane. The downfall is that since it is made out of very heavy fabric and being strapless, it kept slipping down all night :( But it was worth every minute of pulling it up, for that runway look. Just make sure you go a size down.
The dress was beautiful. It fit perfectly except for around the bust. It was a bit loss and stretched out from previous use.
Dress was form fitting but not tight or uncomfortable. I was worried about it being strapless and slipping down but it did not despite a lot of dancing:)

This dress was very comfortable. It has so much stretch. It also has an extra hook in the back so you don't need to wear a bra. I would recommend this dress to anyone looking for something trendy and unique.

links_reviews_title: Never gotten so many compliments in my life!
links_reviews_text: Honestly, I never realized why anyone would pay thousands of dollars for a dress before I put this on. This was a free upgrade from RTR and I've always wanted to try Herve Leger. First, it's much heavier than you think it will be, not like those cheap bandage dresses you get. It's a thick dress and really sucks you in. The ombre is beautiful and flattering. I almost gave it 4 stars though, because when I was walking and ESPECIALLY when I was dancing, the back rode up and created this unflattering lump/fold on my lower back, and it didn't look good that I had to keep pulling it down. But those who don't have a ridiculously big butt may not have this problem! Beautiful dress. Definitely want to rent this designer again.

What an amazing dress. The material, the cut and the color of this dress is so sexy and flattering. I am usually a size 8 and got a large. Should have gone with the medium. It should be a tight fitting dress that will suck you in giving an hourglass shape. Wished I could keep it. I will definitely rent this dress again.

I wore this to a brunch about image and personal branding for women. Every time I wear a Herve Leger dress my confidence level goes up. The dresses literally hold everything in and no spanx are needed. I wish I could keep the dress...but I'll just have to find another reason to rent it again.
Not flattering
too small in the rib cage. I couldn't zipper the small. And was much shorter than I expected.

links_reviews_title: This was the my favorite dress so far. I got complements for adults and teenagers!!!
links_reviews_text: It fit like a glove. It was a flattering cut. The color was great too.
Many compliments - material stretches so fits perfectly
Great dress. Holds you in and up. You feel very secure even though it's a strapless.

links_reviews_title: great cloth, didnt hold on my chest as well as i wished it did tho
links_reviews_text: fit well, the color was really nice
fit like a glove with bra inside
beautiful dress
Fit too small & very form fitting

links_reviews_title: Great fit - really makes your curves and figure stand out love it!
links_reviews_text: Feel of the fabric is great the colors were fun and sexy

links_reviews_title: Great tight dress, small bust section
links_reviews_text: This dress fits tight and flares at the waist. Great date night dress and the top stays in place relatively well, for a strapless dress. There are built-in interior straps to help keep the top in place.

This was supposed to be my wedding rehearsal dress but because of the Pandemic the only place I got to wear it was my house. It fit like a glove and was exactly how I pictured it. I played dress up and showed all of my friends and family via Zoom and FaceTime. I would love to rent this again once we get the okay to resume life like normal. It is a heavy material and felt very lux. It was my ideal gown for the occasion.
Rented for Dia de los Muertos. Kept me warm on slightly cold evening. Got so many components - particularly from older Mexican women. Felt lovely.

This dress was amazing for my bridal shower! Everyone was obsessed with it, including myself. The ruffle sleeves were exaggerated and perfect. The fabric in person was thick and heavy. It looked as if someone had piped icing onto fabric. So delicate & beautiful! I wore spanx underneath to pull everything in. I could mostly move in it. I couldn't raise my arms above my shoulders which was fine, once someone zipped the back of the dress for me.

It is a beautiful dress, pretty heavy. The day I wore it, it rained and when damn it felt like it weighted 20 pounds. The material was comfortable, didn't irritate my skin. The lining feels incomplete because there's none on the sleeve or in the middle of the dress which is a bit strange.

links_reviews_title: Didn't want to take it off
