links_reviews_text: I adored this dress and got so many compliments. The dress is very heavy though. We did pictures in them and it was about 78° F out and I wasn't dying but it was pretty hot . I'm about 129-131 pounds depending on the day, 5'4 with an athletic build (borderline pear shaped) and the medium was a little loose on me. I'm always right in between a S and a M. I think the small would've been too small, but the medium wasn't as fitted as I hoped. All that said I still loved this dress.

This dress was so much fun! I had endless compliments on the sleeves and overall look from other women. The nude part underneath the dress is shorter than I realized, so I couldn't wear it to my son's baptism like I'd planned. Instead I wore it to a themed fundraiser and it was perfect. Really high quality - really fun - love it!

links_reviews_title: the sleeves honestly were a little much.. I felt like Shakespeare met someone out of thriller
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my wedding shower and didn't end up wearing it. The sleeves were a bit much.. I felt like Shakespeare meets someone out of the thriller music video and not in a good way.. the dress kind of swallowed me and it wasn't the look I was going for. I sent the photo to a few friends and they agreed it wasn't a great choice for the shower.
Ugh, I want to own this piece. I hate wearing things twice though. It was so unique and beautiful and intricate. Not one person walked by without complimenting it.

links_reviews_title: Bridal showstopper! Definitely a head turner!
links_reviews_text: Get ready to turn heads in this dress! I wore this for my rehearsal dinner held at a really nice restaurant. Definitely stunned my bridal party because nothing screams more BRIDE like this dress! Upon arrival at the restaurant, strangers sitting at the outdoor patio literally all turned and oohed and ahhed at me (not exaggerating). I was showered with compliments from strangers and wait staff as I continued to mosey inside with my bridal party. And as soon as I walked into our private party room, I was met with more oooohs and ahhs by our rehearsal dinner guests who also were amazed by my dress. I was showered with compliments all night long. So if you aren't ready to be the center of attention- because this dress definitely demands it- don't go for this dress, otherwise I can't recommend it enough! I truly felt like a bride to be in this and felt all eyes were on me (and these gorgeously massive sleeves) all night! I'm really short with an athletic build (4'11 and 130 lbs) and the sleeves on the small were impossible for my arms to fit through, so I opted for the medium back up size. It was a very form fitting and flattering fit on me that accentuated my curves and the hem stopped right above my ankles. I figured the length would be very long on me, and I still found it very flattering even given how short I am. So I fell in love with this dress and had the most difficult time returning it!

I wore this for my engagement photos and it photographs beautio. Fit a little snug in the arms but I still had plenty of room in the waist. Heavy quality lace, stunning detail. I wish I could have bought it!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my jr prom and the compliments rolled in! This dress is very Coachella!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress with flowers and gold accessories which I think look best, and it had a very flowy, beachy and bohemian feel. The material is heavy and will make you feel hot but not that bad, there is also a bit of limited movement in the arms but not too bad either! The sleeves are gorgeous and are the show stopper, make sure not to get them caught in anything! Its very versatile and perfect for any occasion due to the amount of ways to style it! I would recommend to everyone! This site has never let me down! I will be posting more pictures of the dress on my music youtube channel, it is Bethy Styles! 10/10!

Wow this dress!! Pretty much everyone's reaction at the winter wonderland fundraiser I attended. I felt bad for my poor sis (her dress also RTR) but this dress stole the show. I have never received so many compliments! Mostly from other women, but a few men stopped me as well. As for the dress details - at first I was unsure about it HAHA. It is A LOT of dress. It is heavy first of all. Broke the RTR hanger it came on. And I thought it possibly was swallowing me up, but in reality it actually was almost perfect. I am a small 34C and I did not wear a bra. There was definitely room for a larger chest but it was still ok on me. I am about 128 pounds, 28 inch waist 36 inch hips. I usually am between a small and medium for this designer and only got the medium. The second band of fabric hits at a very strange spot just below your hips and depending on how I stood, the fabric bulged out. I made sure to keep the dress pulled down to flatten that out. It was a great length with heels, I'm 5'4". The sleeves were fabulous but you have to be careful eating. The dress was comfortable, but again heavy, and warm. I got a little hot inside the party room but it wasn't bad. Outside was about 30 degrees, so the dress was perfect for a short walk from valet into the casino. I'm wearing this again to Disney on Ice with my family this weekend - kind of fancy but I need another excuse to wear it before sending it ha k because it's that fabulous. Husband loved it.

I absolutely loved this dress, and apparently everyone else did too. It was perfect for a cold January engagement party because the lace is thick and heavy. It fit like a glove and was not uncomfortable. The only cons are the sleeves will get in your way while you try to eat and the zipper has a tough time getting over the thick waist band. Other than that, I felt beautiful in this dress.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments. Dress was beautiful and looked and felt expensive. High quality!!
links_reviews_text: It really is a show stopper. First time renting from RTR and I will be renting more soon. Such a stunning dress. Very happy.

I received so many compliments on this dress the day of my bridal shower!!! Stunning fitted bodice, fit my body perfectly. If I had to pick 1 qualm, I'd say the bell sleeves were a tad oversized for my personal liking but that's getting nit picky.

links_reviews_title: Obsessed with this dress! It was so fantastic. I felt amazing in it and it was such a hit!
links_reviews_text: As others had mentioned, the zipper was difficult so you'll need someone to help with that. The weight of the fabric is just divine. Definitely keeps you warm. I originally ordered a Large thinking my bust wouldn't fit in the medium, but the Medium actually won out! It hugged curves perfectly! Loved this piece so very much!

links_reviews_title: THE BEST DRESS OF ALL TIME
links_reviews_text: I think this is the most beautiful dress I have ever worn. It fit me like a glove and the lace is so intricate and beautiful. The material is very heavy and warm. The sleeves are so fun. I want to keep this dress forever!

When I saw this dress I knew I needed to wear it for something related to my upcoming wedding. If you are going to be photographed and want to wear white - this is THE dress for you. It is so figure flattering- minimizing in the chest, plenty room in the sleeves, very heavy fabrics that made my belly look flatter than it is. I am a huge fan. As others commented, the dress is heavy to wear but I felt like this really made the details pop and the structure of the dress amazing. The sleeves are statement, and this dress is a showstopper.

LOVED this dress. It is gorgeous. I have never received so many compliments in my life. Am tempted to buy it but I don't have enough fancy occasions to justify it. I sized up so that it wouldn't be uncomfortable to eat and drink all night, and it fit great.
The zipper was really tough to get up, as if it was getting caught on something. It was very lovely otherwise!

I LOVE this dress! I wore it for my engagement party and received compliments all night long. The material was heavy which made it perfect for a November party. I wore the size small, which was a little big, but I wanted to be comfortable. I definitely recommend renting this dress!
Runs small, and the large fit perfectly snug. Such a well made dress.

This dress is absolutely PHENOMENAL. I rented it for the formal photos for our engagement shoot and could not be happier with the outcome. It is heavy and incredibly well constructed which was great since it was mid-October in NJ & in the 50s when we took our photos & the dress kept me warm the entire time. It fit like a glove, and although the zipper can be a bit tricky as other said, with one good confident pull you can get it up no problem. I'm having such a hard time at the thought of returning this dress because I just love it so much.

This dress is gorgeous! I received compliments from strangers all night long. The vibe is formal boho. Very romantic and the sleeves are so fun! I'd say this runs a tad large and it is a warm dress. Would definitely rent again!

This gown is STUNNING in person. The only issue I had with this dress was that it was a little stiff and the fabric was extremely heavy, making it a tad difficult to move around in. Overall though, I really enjoyed this dress.

Loved this dress! I got it for my bridal shower and it was a hit! I felt beautiful in it, the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the zipper was a little difficult, took a lot of tries to get it past the middle of the dress because it kept getting stuck but if someone is helping you you will be good... it took 3 of us to get it done lol but overall I loved this dress and it made me feel so pretty!

I wore this for my boho bridal shower and LOVED IT. My friends complimented it the entire time during the party and I felt amazing in it. Be warned though, it is HEAVY. I wore this in the middle of summer in Los Angeles and I definitely suffered for fashion a bit in the sense that I was pretty toasty in it. So just be aware of that. Also, it runs a little on the small side, but I was still able to make my normal size of medium work. Rent this dress! But size up for your backup size. Such a gorgeous piece!
The dress is true to its size and fit perfectly! The detailing on the dress looks even better in person.

This dress made the night! Incredibly gorgeous. Photographs extremely well. Nonstop compliments! Material is heavy and thick. Not good for hot humid weather. Tight fitting. Fabric is not stretchy/forgiving.

I loved this dress! Very feminine and perfect for our family easter pictures!! Runs true to size...but only thing that was surprising was it was Very heavy...but I can't say enough about how much I loved it!!
Absolutely stunning! A perfect fit, amazing detailing, and thick ornate lace fabric. Favorite rental from RTR and I've been renting since 2011!
Loved!!!! Sooo many compliment. Wore to meet and greet the Thursday of my wedding weekend. Felt gorgeous. Not too fancy so perfect for occasion. Thick material. Dream dress!!!
Love Love Love. It's a lot of dress, but worth it! Be bold and mighty forces will come to your aid. :)
I rented this dress for my bridal shower and I couldn't be happier!!!! I received so many compliments and I loved how it fit! The dress is simply beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Makes a statement, high-quality, good fit. Wore for engagement photos and was very satisfied.
links_reviews_text: Fit is true to size, however the under arm area fit was slightly odd and tight, though this didn't bother me a great deal. Perfect for an hourglass figure, hugs curves in just the right way. Everything about this dress makes a statement, and it really has a romantic feel. The lace is not delicate, it's very high-quality and a bit heavy. Would not suggest for very warm weather. Zipper was a little hard to close, but the dress can handle using some force. The lining does not continue over the shoulders, so wear a nude bra. I felt fantastic in this dress, it was the perfect choice for my engagement photos.

links_reviews_title: Got many compliments during the night; you don’t know how you look in something until you hear it!!
links_reviews_text: Ordered size M and L as backup. M was truer in size and hugged my waist in place. This dress is rare and elegant, has a very dreamy flow.

This dress made me feel so elegant and whimsical at the same time I loved it ! Only downside would be it's very hard to zip because of the lace so you def would need a second person to help you. Other than that this dress was perfect

This dress was absolutely stunning! I received many compliments throughout the night. The overall fit ran a little small. I had to go with the large. The dress is also pretty heavy but nothing that you couldn’t dance in. I also ended up not wearing a bra due to the fact that you could see the straps. Only real con I had was with the zipper. It was extremely small and hard to pull up. I wore it for a formal women’s day party and it was just perfect! Would highly recommend this dress.

Received compliments from strangers all night long! Would rent time and time again. Heavy material but very nice fit. I am 5 ft 1" 115 lbs. Nobstretch to material but overall comfortable to wear. Would rent all year round!

This dress is as amazing as you think it is. I rented it months in advance for my bridal shower and it was even more beautiful in person! The fabric is thick and gorgeous, the silhouette is flattering, and the sleeves are the most fun ever and make you feel like you've got high fashion angel wings! Everyone loved it and could not stop telling me how beautiful it was. This dress truly made my day! Can't recommend it enough. Note that it does run a little bit small - I'm usually a 4/6 and the medium was slightly tight on me. It did stretch out a bit throughout the day though.
Very comfortable. We were able to dance all night. I felt confident and flattered in this dress

I wore this to a wedding in New Orleans with a "black tie festive" dress code. This is one of my favorite dresses from RTR, I felt amazing in it and got compliments all night long. I love how the "train" billows out behind when you walk. It was so different from anything else. The 0 fit, but not sure I could have eaten, so opted for the 2 and so glad I did because it felt tight by the end of the night! I almost cried when I put it in the mail.

links_reviews_title: EVERYONE commented about how stunning the dress was!
links_reviews_text: I'm a big size 2, so the waist was a little snug, but everything else fit perfectly. It was perfect and unforgettable for my birthday. I highly recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: Customer service overnighting me the right size !! THIS COMPANY ROCKS !
links_reviews_text: Customer service overnighting me the right size !! THIS COMPANY ROCKS ! #CMAs #thankyouRTR
Loved this dress. It's a bit busty but fit well and got a lot of compliments!

I had so many people stop me at a large formal function and complement my outfit. It has a really nice shine to it that doesn't really show you in the pictures. I may wear it again for family photos now

links_reviews_title: I needed a 12, but the 14 was all available. It was still perfect. You can't replace good quality.
links_reviews_text: Just love
Perfect for the gala theme we had!

Light material with great movement. The material has stood up with time and wear. I had to size up and Long length was the only length available. It was too long but created a nice train, was still able to dance in it though. Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Did not end up wearing to the event
links_reviews_text: I loved the dress but it didn't zip all the way up my back (directly behind my bust area), so large breasted women might want to use caution. In other dresses I can usually get the girls out of the way enough to zip, but in this gown, with the way the fabric is, the chest also effects the arm holes A LOT. It almost zipped, but even if it had I would not have been able to comfortably wear it for an evening as it was cutting off my armpit circulation. Also I do have wide hips, but the way the extra train fabric sits makes the hips look even wider than they are. It was beautiful though, nice colors and nice material. I would just think hard before renting if you are curvy/busty and size up probably 2 sizes if you are curvy. For info I have been described as an inverted triangle/top heavy. I call myself apple shape, my friends say inverted triangle. So use that info how you will!

links_reviews_title: The train of the dress was very flowing.
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress for an annual sneaker ball. The dress was perfect for the event and matched my sneakers perfectly. Loved the fit and flow of the train

I had been eyeballing this dress forEver and finally had the perfect event for it. It did not disappoint! I actually wore the 4 regular not long don't know why it gave me that option but I do think I would have preferred the long because the regular did not touch the ground with my 4 inch heels and I kind of wanted that for the extra drama but I still think it looked great! The 6 fit and gave me a little more wiggle room but the bust was a little looser so went with the 4 so I didn't wear a bra. The 6 was also longer with the tight underskirt and I liked the shorter feel better with the 4. I felt so fabulous and would love to have an excuse to wear this again. I'm 5'4" about 128 pounds 34b/c 28 inch waist 36 inch hips hope that helps.

links_reviews_title: Stunning, but too tight in the booty
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a trip to Vegas for an event, but the fitted short skirt didn't give at all and I have a curvy, muscular lower body. It's also very low cut, but Hoping to size up and try it again bc the dress is beautiful
Absolutely stunning dress. Skirt is very snug without much give (my hips are fairly wide though). Very low cut but could wear a bra if needed. One of my favorites that I've rented!

This was an amazing dress. It does run both small and short. I'm 5'2" 135 with a post baby pouch and this dress was perfect for hiding my not so perfect areas. It runs small in the rib cage/ chest area I'm not top heavy but we barely got it to zip up. However, once zipped it was amazing. Out side of the bride I received so many compliments. I was looking for something in the gown category but for the day time and this was a great option for a day wedding. Would rent again in a larger size.
I'm in love with this dress. Hugged my body perfectly. I loved the way the train moved when I walked. It was like going down the catwalk. If you want to stand out in a crowd wear this dress.

Wore this dress for my engagement photos. It looked amazing!! Perfect to catch the wind on the helicopter pad. It has beautiful colors and the style is so unique. Received tons of compliments with the photos, of course our photographer also made us look good! (Shout out to Craig o'brist in Atlanta GA). The only thing is that my hips and bottom are on the larger end, so the skirt was super tight. My butt cheeks were actually hanging out some but you couldn't see it because of the long back on it. Since it was just for the photo shoot it was no problem, but if I were to have worn this at a wedding, it would of been a problem. I wouldn't have been able to dance, sit or move honestly. If I sized up, then the top would of been too big. I constantly had to try to pull down the mini skirt part.

links_reviews_title: I would wear this dress 100 more times if I could afford to buy it.
links_reviews_text: Honestly probably my favorite dress of all time; and I have worn a LOT of dresses, y'all. If I had the money for it right now, I would TOTALLY buy it. You will not regret renting this puppy, and get sooooo many compliments!

I loved this dress. It was absolutely gorgeous. I got so many compliments from people at the wedding to complete strangers in the elevator. And the way the train flows when you're walking makes it even better. It is snug in the waist, but so flattering. And It shows lots of great leg!
Fit was TTS and the high low was beautiful! The colors in the dress were wonderful also! Absolutely loved wearing this dress and would rent again.

I LOVED this dress. There is a shimmer to it that doesn't come through in the photos. The 6 was a little snug but if I wore the 8 it sagged a little bit in the chest area. The cut of the dress made it so that I felt extremely comfortable all night, even sizing down. I have never received so many compliments. Rent the Runway does it again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a formal event, with a fun flair!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a retirement party, and I got compliments all night, even from strangers. As others have said, the dress has silver threading that makes the dress shiny. The length was perfect with my 3-3.5in heels. I didn't wear a bra. The 0R fit me perfectly, even slightly tight. Maybe the 2R would've fit as well, but I figured why mess with perfection! I was completely comfortable in it all night. Total perfect dress. If you're thinking about renting this dress, do yourself a favor and rent it.

I loved this dress because of the color and cut. The fabric around the waist allowed for great movement and to hide hips. Okay, now the bad part: this fabric has little to no stretch. The fitted part around my hips and thighs barely fit and wasn't long enough to cover my butt- grateful for the additional fabric around the waist and lucky I only stood still for my event or else I could not have worn this dress. Wish I had the next size up.

links_reviews_title: Steal the show in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Endless compliments! The way it moves when you walk is mesmerizing. A little right on the hips but just so gorgeous.

I love love love this dress! The material is so nice and the cut is so flattering. Tons of compliments. I feel like a princess in this. My only complaint is that the straps are a bit too long -- they didn't have my size, and so I went with the next best option. The straps fall down quite a lot but this dress is sooo gorgeous. Definitely worth.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fabric and design! Made to be walked in.
links_reviews_text: This dress was soooooo beautiful. It's incredible how it flows when you walk in it. It's also gorgeous when just standing there. The bust area runs small, but I prefer that. The zipper was a little tough to get up at the waist hem, but I could turn the dress around and do it and then turn it back. I added a gold metal belt. Loved this dress and highly recommend it!

This dress was to die for! I got so many compliments on it all night long. The skirt of it flowed so gracefully. I sized up and while it was a little right in the midsection, the mini skirt was the perfect length. The sleeves of it were a bit long for my petite torso, but I wore a VS bra with it and pulled it off.

This fit me true to size but seems to run a little bit on the smaller side. I found it a little bit short in front and I am 5'5" but it worked. I got tons of compliments the whole night. Could wear a regular bra but it's a thick material which good structure so I opted not to. The most beautiful ever!! It looks like a water water painting.

This has to be the most beautiful dress I've ever worn! I rented for a wedding and received endless compliments all night. I accidentally upstaged the bride! The dress fits true to size. I am a size 2 and rented a 4. Fashion tape definitely helped. If you are large chested you may want to size up but if you are C cup or smaller, stick with your normal size. The material glistens and shines! The train opens up as you walk. It's seriously the most beautiful dress to walk around in.
Beautiful and stunning!! Everyone loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: Exactly as everyone said- true showstopper!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was everything. My work group was the major sponsor for a charity gala and I wanted to represent my practice well. I had been to the event previously and knew it was a mix between cocktail and semi-formal. I looked for a dress that would be work-appropriate but still stun. THIS DRESS DID NOT DISAPPOINT. As everyone has mentioned before, the shiny/sparkling threading looks fantastic in person, and the way the back/"train" flows out behind you when you walk is fabulous. It literally parts the crowd and turns heads! It made me feel like a celebrity. If you don't want all the attention on you, don't rent this dress! I seriously could not believe how many people complimented me throughout the night (it was almost surreal; I'm a sweatshirt/sweatpants kind of girl). The fit was true-to-size, but the skirt IS short. Sitting is a little risqué, but I just used the train to wrap around and cover my legs when I needed to sit. Also, the top is a little low-cut and tight, so if you have large breasts you may want to size up. I tried on the 6R and the 8P and while the 8P was a little more modest in the skirt, it gapped up top. So I just rocked the mini and went with the 6R. TLDR: RENT THIS DRESS.

Cons- I had to use sticky boobs to fill out the dress as I am a 32B. Pro- this dress is AMAZING! You are going to standout and feel like a rockstar. The dress is so unique and memorable. Great for a wedding in South Beach Miami!

It was the perfect length. It was a little tight in the hips but I didn't mind, it just can ride up when you sit so I would wear it to something thats primarily standing. The straps didn't give me much support as they were kind of loose so I wore a weird sticky bra with it with a bit of fashion tape. But other than that, it was stunningly perfect.

I am 5'-0" and the dress was a little long, but not too long with extra high heels. The dress fit absolutely perfect around the mid section, but shoulders were a little loose. It would have been nice to have double sided tape to keep them in place. Overall I loved the dress, but would try a 4P next time!

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments, show stopper, head turner! Loved the way the train flowed behind when walking.
links_reviews_text: Length was perfect when worn with heels. Felt a bit tight in a few areas and the zipper on my particular dress was a bit off. Smidge short for my preference, but long flowing sides helped when sitting. First time I've ever not had to wear some sort of bra or covering. Felt a bit self-conscious, but the girls stayed securely in place.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, especially when you walk. Runs small.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a formal holiday party. I'm usually a 2 or a 4, depending on the brand and material. I'm glad I got the 4R because the 2R didn't fit over my hips or ribcage at all. I wore a small 2-inch heel, and the gown didn't touch the ground. The print is even more gorgeous in person, and I loved the drama of the skirt when I walked. I would rent again for sure!

This dress made me so happy and was perfect for our engagement shoot. I'm 5'4" and had to wear 3+" heels and there were times when the top would shift, but the photos turned out amazing. I had to wear a backless sticky bra with a low plunge - a regular bra didn't work for me. Highly recommend this dress though!!

You'll get many compliments in this dress! The dress is tight in the chest but fits true to size elsewhere. So size up if you're a busty person and wear tape! There are so many colors in this dress that it goes with anything. There are two layers in the skirt to hide the belly but it can be hot. Wore this to a July wedding and survived the short outdoor ceremony. It is fun to walk in because the back of the dress flows nicely. I would rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Shimmery and fun for a Miami wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so unique and stunning! Like many reviews, it's hard to see the shimmer of the fabric through pictures, but this dress definitely makes a statement! The under dress runs a little tight so if you have curves, you might want to get a size up as the backup just in case. Really fun, would rent again!

The dress sent to me was degraded to purchase but I considered it. Neckline is low so wear a cami. Will be flattering to most figures as there's room for hips and busts. I wore this for various occasions as it's easy to dress up or down.

links_reviews_title: So comfortable, yet classy. Lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. This is the first wrap dress that has ever flattered my body. The cut of the dress wasn't too revealing, and there was even a snap on the inside of the dress to keep it together. No safety pins or fashion tape necessary!
Wore this to my nieces baptism. Very flattering and got a ton of compliments. Was a little tight in the chest area but other than that very comfortable!

Wore this dress to a Bridal Lunch & it was great. True to size. The clip at the top & inside hip helped with keeping the wrap dress closed and not feel too low. Comfortable material. Received a lot of compliments. Easy to dress up or keep more casual.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful colors, light airy wrap dress
links_reviews_text: Fit was very forgiving, as wrap dresses are. Light and airy for hot wine tasting in Napa. Loved the pattern and length was a little longer so good if it's windy

links_reviews_title: Nice Medium Casual Dress for Bridal Shower
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a bridal shower and it was a nice medium casual dress for the occasion. The print and cut makes it dressy, but the material takes it down a bit, so if you don't know the attire of an event, this may work well for you. I am a pear shape and this fit around my hips well. I didn't feel like it was ever flopping around like some reviews have stated due to it being a wrap dress, however, I did wear some slip shorts underneath so that made me feel more comfortable. Definitely plan on steaming it before wearing. It was quite wrinkled when I took it out of the bag. Overall good dress for its purpose!
I rented for a friend's bridal shower and received many compliments! I liked how fork fitting it was with the wrap.

Super cute dress; perfect for an outdoor May wedding. I got the M and L and wore the medium. The fit was great. When I was dancing, the top button did keep popping open. Nothing serious, but if I rent this one again, I would pin it, just to be safe.

links_reviews_title: It was a pretty dress for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: It was very pretty, comfortable and easy to get into and out of. It took me a min to figure out how to do the wrap part (there's a little loop the string has to go through on the left side). I used boob tape bc I'm not that busty. Also be careful for wind! My dress almost blew open a few times lol.

I was tired of wearing white for wedding events, so rented this for my rehearsal dinner at a brewery. I absolutely loved it and got tons of compliments! The wrap worked well, the length was right for me, and it was flattering and comfortable. I wanted to buy it afterward!
It's was cute when standing but as I moved in it the string would loosen and the button would pop open at the chest

links_reviews_title: Floral Dress Worn to a Bridal Shower
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing the Medium because the Small was too tight in the chest. If you have a larger bust, I would recommend sizing up. I also had to pin it a little higher up to conceal some cleavage. I liked this dress, but it wasn't my favorite. It does not travel well as you can see in the picture... it wrinkles very easily. I actually brought my travel steamer and steamed it prior to the shower, but it wrinkled just on the car ride to the event.

Soft light material and great spring print. I rented it for Spring family photos. There is only a tiny little button holding the chest part together and it unsnapped on me twice while wearing it. This is a wrap dress so when you are sitting you have to make sure your legs are covered or you put on a show lol. The shoulder straps are adjustable which is great. Very light so I would only recommend for warm weather.

I actually really liked this dress and it was flattering but way too much cleavage for my taste. I tried it on with a tank top under it...I would have bought a black tube top if I had gone out in public. I'll probably rent again for vacation this summer.

This dress was great! I wore it to a more casual summer wedding and it was perfect for the occasion. At first, the dress looked a little TOO casual bc of the fabric(it's more cotton-like than I thought from the website pics) but after ironing it looked really crisp. I would recommend! Runs true to size. Easy to travel with and perfect for dancing.

The dress fit comfortably and there's a button to cut down on the cleavage if you need it. I am normally an 8-10 and was able to wear a large to accommodate my pregnant belly. The dress shows signs of age which is my only complaint and reason for 4 stars.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a special occasion or wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was very comfortable and looked great on me! You can control how tight you want the waist with the wrap. I loved that the dress has a snap closure near the bust to avoid having my bra peek out. Highly recommend and I totally would rent again!

I absolutely loved this dress. There was a button inside to help hold it together in addition to the tie and there was a snap at the cleavage to help. It didn't really help me because I have large breasts so I just improvised with safety pins. It's very comfortable and I got a lot of compliments. I would absolutely rent this again!
Obsessed with this dress! The fit was surprisingly perfect. I'm small chested and did not have any issues with gaps- something I was concerned about! Would totally buy this dress!

I love this dress. It's so comfortable and the fabric is really beautiful. Very flattering cut. Perfect for a baptism. I would have preferred to wear the XS but as I was ironing it right before my event I noticed a rip on the back of the dress that I hadn't noticed before. Luckily the S size fit fairly well, just a little big through the chest.

First of all, the RTR staff is amazing. This dress got lost in the mail and they contacted UPS and had someone meet the driver and deliver the dress right to my door with 30 minutes to spare before I had to leave. The dress itself is great and very comfortable. The only flaw is that it's a bit low cut so you may have to use a safety pin to cover up a bit depending on your style. I'm 5'9"-5'10" and this fell just below my knees. I got so many compliments on this dress!! Highly recommend.

I absolutely loved this dress! The wedding took place on a yacht, the dress was perfect for it. I received so many compliments all evening long. It was light and airy, do not hesitate when it comes to renting this dress.

Worn for a backyard wedding in late July and it was a great light weight material. I went with the xl because the front snap would not have held me in with the large. I pulled the tie strings around as tight as i could to make sure the dress flattered me.

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful and comfortable in this flattering dress.
links_reviews_text: The dress was subtle with a sexy neckline but a falling just below my knees (at 5'2). Loved the design and got lots of compliments. There's a clip at the neckline that I was a little dubious of but it stayed clipped all night. I suspect those with larger breasts might have more trouble with that though!
True to size. Loved the wrap. A little tight around the chest and had to wear sticky boobs but great for a summer wedding.

Comfortable, flattering, cute dress for summer. The length is a bit odd, I wished it was a bit shorter. I'm 5'6" and it fell just below my knee. The straps are tightened almost all of the way, so you can decide how much cleavage.

Loved the fabric of this dress - gorgeous pattern (got some compliments) and lightweight. The top runs big, even the small was large on top with the straps tightened all the way, and I'm average sized on top. The wrap skirt blew a bit in the wind but was fine for dancing. Really liked this comfortable, flattering dress.
I loved the wrap dress. I have a smaller waist but not a large top so that felt a bit loose. Length was great for a date with lots of family around. Can be dressed up or dressed down.

Loved the look of this dress. Comfortable for the most part. I received the dress and it had an odor to it. It is also very much a wrap dress, so be cautious walking in the wind. Plus, the strap broke while I was at the wedding. I would recommend it, I think I just had a faulty dress.

Linen-like materials means it won't expand much, but it gives this summer dress a twist from most cotton and thin dresses. Actually surprised that this wrap fit my breasts-most don't fully cover them, but if I breath too deep the chest snap does pop, not ideal but not a deal breaker. It's a true wrap so It does open up a bit when waking. Overall please with the quality and fit. It would likely hit above the knee for ladies taller than 5'4''.

links_reviews_title: I got lots of compliments and felt comfortable and sexy in this dress.
links_reviews_text: The fit was great and it was great for the warm day outside. I had no idea what the fabric would be... silk. Really nice one I got the wrinkles out. This was my first rental and I'd love to rent or buy it again. It totally grew on me! It did arrive with a broken hangar, small hole from previous user and wrinkled which was surprising. I wore with 2" wedges and it was a good length and easy to move in.
Wore this to a wedding, and received 1 compliment on it. I wasn't as impressed with it nor did I think it was as cute as it looked online.

links_reviews_title: This dress was comfortable and flattering
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly and complimented my figure. The button near my bust popped open a few times, but it was not as annoying as the reviews made it seem. I got a lot of compliments on my outfit and felt comfortable the whole day. Perfect for a summer day wedding.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much, I hunted it down and purchased it!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely LOVED this dress; it was perfect for an outdoor wedding in the summer. I'm 5'0", and it was definitely a "midi" on me, but it still looked great with a pair of 4" heels. I had to close the chest a little with some dress tape, but otherwise, it fit like a dream! Would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Comfy and worked for bridal shower
links_reviews_text: I wore this as a bridal shower dress. It was a nice dress and fit fine, I just didn't love it for me. It did need ironing when it came in. The hook and eye in the front did pull some, but there's a great button closure on the inside to keep the wrap closed as well. And you can tighten or loosen the straps as needed.
Major "it girl" dress and it made me feel amazing! I rated it 4 stars because when the wind caught the dress, it blew open. Wish there was a snap that kept the bottom closed.
This dress goes everywhere! I wore it for site seeing in Europe & I was cool & comfortable and looked great every where. Definitely will wear again!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable but be careful if busty
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a derby themed fundraiser. It was incredibly comfortable and best of all I didn't have to wear spanx with it! My one complaint was that the snap at the bust kept coming undone. I ended up wearing a cami underneath so I wouldn't end up flashing anyone; it still looked cute but not what I was expecting in that regard.

Overall loved the dress print and silhouette. Only negative feedback is that the snap at the bust had come unsewn so I had to put a couple of stitches in to hold it...it was back apart by the end of the night :(

This dress is so pretty, and I love the print! I tend to lean toward darker prints, so this is perfect for Summer and Spring! I do have a full bust, so it ended up being a little lower cut than I expected. But the Medium, which is my typical size, fit perfectly and was really comfortable!

links_reviews_title: 2020 Baltimore Ravens Cheerleader Alumni banquet. Fun memories w/former teammates.
links_reviews_text: This dress is not only flattering but also so comfortable to wear. Form fitting without being uncomfortable or unflattering after sitting/standing. Received many compliments. A now staple for future formal events. You can dress up or down. With heels, the length of the regular was perfect. Such an easy dress to wear.

links_reviews_title: Great black tie event dress, especially for sitting
links_reviews_text: Fits like a glove, makes undergarments impossible but is super comfortable and elegant.

links_reviews_title: It fit just like the reviews said it would!!
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress!! It was a little long, but because of the thicker stretchy material, I was able to wing it!
Great thick material! Hides it all and arms such a plus if have any insecurities! True to size and will be renting again if I ever need a black gown! I got compliments all night long! Thanks RTR!

links_reviews_title: Curvy girls this is for you
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'9 so longer would have been better but perfect over all flattering fit! I wear a 38DDD and it was comfy in the busy and the vneck made it flattering for bustier girls!

I was 6 months pregnant when I wore this dress. I got so many compliments and felt great all night. The material is super stretchy with no zipper to fuss with. I was worried that the 40 would be too small but I was able to pull it off. I wear a 4 normally for reference.

This dress is great, felt comfortable to dance in, but also pulls everything in. I also could sit comfortably too. So happy to find it in person at the RTR store. It's a size 4 and I usually wear an 8, sometimes a 6. So it's got a lot of stretch. It's kind of a Uba material but not as thick.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Perfect for a curvy body type.
links_reviews_text: This dress runs true to size, however, it does run short. I'm 5'7 and I had to wear the long as the regular was short even without shoes. I recieved compliments all night on the dress. Highly recommend!

This dress is sexy. I rented for a family wedding and did not end up wearing because the cleavage situation was a bit much for the event. It also was a tad short - did not want to deal with pulling it down all night. Great fabric hides imperfections, and love the sleeves covering the arms - just a bit sexy for the event.

This dress was so flattering and comfy. I'm a short, curvy girl. 5' 2" and 210lbs. This dress hugged all my curves the right way and camouflaged my large arms. I felt beautiful, confident, and sexy. When the wedding was over, I headed to another event just so I could get more wear out of the dress! Had to make the most of the evening and the dress.

I wore this dress to a black tie gala and absolutely loved it! I preferred the long-I thought the regular was a little short for my liking. Great material and fit like a glove! I received compliments all night long and felt like a million bucks. Also-super confortable!

I don't always write reviews but am 23 weeks pregnant and spent hours looking at other reviews trying to find a dress that would fit over my bump. This dress did the trick! So comfortable and flattering, and stretchy enough to wear with a big baby bump. Highly recommend! Would be stunning not pregnant as well

The dress is beautiful and very flattering! I don't love my arms at the moment and it's a nice way to disguise them without looking too out of style! I am 5'7" and the regular was too short with any sort of heel, but the long wasn't available. Pull the dress on from feet up, not over your head as there is no zipper. Great stretchy material and easy to dance in! Chiara Boni is one of my very favorite RTR brands. I want all their clothes!

links_reviews_title: This dress was comfortable and flattering!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Very flattering and hides flaws!
Perfect fit! Love that it can be worn 2 ways. It's such a luxe and eye catching gown, perfect for every formal occasion!

links_reviews_title: The most comfortable dress ever! Perfect for pregnancy
links_reviews_text: I used this dress when I was in my second trimester (about 5 months) and it was THE MOST COMFORTABLE dress ever. The fabric was so soft and stretchy I wanted to keep it! Perfect for my belly to not be pushed. It looked so cute and round. The ruffles on the shoulders and straps down really helped my arm to look slimmer especially which I LOVED. I would rent this dress again if I had to now that I'm 3 months PP and I'm sure it would be as comfortable as the first time I wore it!

links_reviews_title: Great dress and love this brand
links_reviews_text: Very flattering long black dress. Great for fall or winter because of the dramatic sleeves.

I absolutely love this dress. Wore it for a black tie wedding and got so many compliments. I wore it with the sleeves tucked up and added a pin to dress it up. I wore two sizes smaller than usual and it fit me like a glove and was figure flattering. Would highly recommend!
There's no zipper. Wondered how was I going to get into this dress!? Luckily, the dress stretches and once on, it hugged all your curves! Great fit and elegant!
It was a little tight but overall great fit. It was a great length with the small heel. You step into the dress. No zipper. Also I didn't wear a bra but I am small busted.

links_reviews_title: This high end gown made me feel beautiful all night.
links_reviews_text: I received tons of enthusiastic compliments at the Mardi Gras Ball I attended. This dress was elegant, modern, sexy and the sleeves were a fun, artistic twist. The scuba material was very slimming. I did put the dress on before I did any hair and make up as there was no zipper. I am 5'6", I wore low block heels and the dress came just past my ankles. I wish I had ordered the long. Statement earrings & a fun clutch were all I needed to enhance the ensemble as the dress was the star of the show.
This dress fit me perfectly, since it's a heavy stretch material, it seems to hug in all the right places.
The dress had the perfect amount of stretch and was very flattering to my growing twin "bump." So glad I went with this dress! I received numerous compliments which felt really great!
I wore this dress to a military ball. I received tons of compliments and felt great in it all night. I am 5'7" so I ordered it in long, it hit the ground without heels.

This dress was a dream to wear. The ruffles added that little something extra so it wasn't just another black dress. Ordered the long version and at 5'6" I wasn't able to wear my 5 in heels, so settled for 3 inch heels and then the length was perfect. Was actually happy later because I was able to keep my shoes on while others kicked them off after an hour on the dance floor. Another RTR success!

The fit was great, however, the "Long" size was still too short. I am 5'9" and wore 3" heels and in the photo I have my knees bent to try and make it appear longer. Still wore it to my event, but wouldn't rent again.

Great dress! Cool sleeves can be worn 2 ways. I opted for under. This dress fits true to size. I am 5'4" and it hit at the ankle so it really is a waltz length not full length. Nice to show off pretty shoes! The material is a light light scuba-like fabric. Tip: Put your deodorant on after you put the dress on! Luckily I did but mine was all over it when I took it off. No zipper so a little tricky. So do your hair first as well! Very comfortable and no need to wear a strapless bra which is a plus!

I usually wear an 8 and I ordered the 42 L (which is a 6) by mistake. But, this dress stretches so it worked. Very form fitting - hugs your curves in the right way. Covers your arms, which is a plus in the winter when they are pale. I absolutely loved the dress and so did my husband 😀.
Fit was great. Material was really nice. You could also wear a regular bra with it which is a big plus.

links_reviews_title: Fit well for someone looking to flatter curves - elegant but comfortable
links_reviews_text: I'm insecure about my tummy and this really helped hide it without ruching. Very flattering. Loved the material. The sleeve detail also helped with my insecurity with my arms. Hot tip* No zippers, so you have to put it in before you do hair/makeup. Only thing I would've changed* I would have opted for the long option. I'm 5'5" and it didn't hit the floor, which I would've preferred (to hide my flats!)
It was so nice being able to wear a regular bra with such a formal dress. It hugged all my curves in the right places.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel amazing
links_reviews_text: This dress fit so well and was long enough for my 5'9 with heels.
The fabric of this dress holds you in like a scuba suit. No need for Spanx. Shows off your curves in all the very best ways. I felt sexy all night and received tons of compliments.

Long was still extremely short for someone 5'9. Otherwise amazing material and fit. I usually wear a size 38 in this designer and only had to size up one size at 9 months pregnant. This fabric will work with you!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for baby bump, but too short
links_reviews_text: This dress fit over my 38 1/2 week baby bump perfectly. There is no zipper, but I was able to pull the dress up and over the bump with no trouble. The fabric is super flattering. The only downside is the length. I'm 5'5 and the dress was 2-3 inches off the floor. I wore black flats and it didn't look horrible, but I definitely would have liked the dress better if it touched the floor and covered my feet. I normally wear a size 6 but rented a size 10 to accommodate the bump.
The thick material and color and flaps on arms makes this dress very flattering and easy to order and wear online. Loved wearing it to an "Old Hollywood " Christmas Party.

links_reviews_title: A Great Night in a Beautiful Dress
links_reviews_text: The arrival and packaging were great! The dress was a dream. It fit well and accentuated my curves. I’m 4’11, so I was worried about the length. This worry was all for nothing; it hit just right. I received several compliments and had a wonderful evening.

Dress fits like a glove. I did wear spanx to make everything smoother. Fabric is high quality. It was a little short for me but I still got a lot of compliments and I felt 100%. I would highly recommend.

This is a phenomenal dress, it fits incredibly well , but size up because the dresses run small. Also, there is no zipper, so be strategic about getting the dress on. The sleeves are really what make this dress special and I received tons of compliments. It also holds its own on the dance floor!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but not made for busty women!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress for a New Years party and it was absolutely beautiful! You can tell it is high quality and the sequins are very comfortable and do not itch! I am 5'11 and it was long enough for me. Only problem was that it was very tight around my breasts. I am a 38 triple D for reference.

links_reviews_title: Unfortunately, this event was canceled due to the COVID-19 outbreak.
links_reviews_text: This dress was so fun! Didn’t get to wear it to the original event but would definitely rent it again. I am typically a 10 but needed to size up to a 12 to have a little more room in the chest and arms (not normally areas that are snug for me). The 12 was perfect though!

links_reviews_title: Got some many compliments on this beauty! Perfect for a formal affair!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 4 and the 2 fit better so I would order your normal size and a size down. The sequins did start to irritate my armpit area by the end of the night. This dress was just gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: Dress fit amazing and was perfect for my Roaring Twenties work gala
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size and was extremely comfortable. Plus who wouldn’t love those sparkles! Perfect for my work gala!
I rented this beauty for a themed Gala. It was so comfy and so flattering! Will definitely rent again.

Generally a size 6, I ordered the 4 and 6 because of the shape of the dress. I actually ended up wearing the 4 and loved it. It wasn't too boxy but was still flowy and fit a bit more flattering. I loved how sparkly this dress was, perfect for a 20s themed party. I got loads of compliments on - would totally recommend!!

I wore this dress for a 1920's theme party and got so many compliments! What you can't tell in the photo is just how sparkly this dress is, the shine factor is awesome! It's a bit short but I have very long legs. It wasn't too short that I felt uncomfortable sitting down in it so that's ok. I would totally rent this again for another Gatsby party.
I received countless compliments on the dress. The photo does not do this dress justice.

This was a perfect dress- so sparkly and worked well with accessories I already had. Fit great for an in between 8-10 size. RTR overnighted this dress to me as a replacement. It arrived before 10am the day of the event- thank you! Loved wearing this dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress was a hit! Major compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: This dress was: 1) so comfortable! 2) so adorable! 3) so sparkly! 4) so affordable to rent. I rented this for my company's holiday party (1920's themed) and it was so comfortable. Fit perfectly and is something I would totally rent again. Or buy. I loved it that much. The cut was flattering, it was well made and easy to zip, which can be tricky for an all-sequined dress. I'm a 12 and this was true to size. If you are thinking about this one, do it. It's better in person!
I belted this to give it some shape, but I LOVED IT. Got so much attention all night.

I wore this to my company holiday party (I added a sweater over it to dress it down a bit), but it was my Serena van der Woodsen moment I've always longed for! It looks fancy, but is so versatile and fun! Buying this one!!
Very comfortable dress. Not to snug in the mod section which I am always concerned about. Was able to move around and not feel stuffed.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress from Christmas or NYE parties!
links_reviews_text: I didn't get a good picture of this dress at my event, but I absolutely loved it! It fit perfectly and was the perfect length even though I'm on the taller side. It was very comfortable and great for a night of fun at my office holiday party!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a Halloween Party
links_reviews_text: This dress was very well made and made my costume shine!! I got a lot of compliments on it and could have worn this for several different occasions. It is a tad short but I went a size up and it was longer!

I wore this for our family Xmas photos and loved the glam gold sparkle. It is super sparkly (literally reflects light on everything around you when you're in the sun) so get ready to shine! Love this dress! I think you can make it a bit more casual too with flats (or even cute sneakers) and a jean jacket. I paired it with a blush pink fuzzy coat for our pics.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a fashion show in Chicago
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 4 and 6 thinking I would wear the 4, but ended up wearing the 6. The 4 was a little tight on my shoulders and made it look like I just didn't fill out the rest of the dress. The 6 looked more boxy which fit the style of the dress and made the who ensemble look intentional. I was fine with the length of the dress, though I would not have been able to bend over if needed (wouldn't recommend for tall people with kids in tow). Overall I loved the dress, even got a few compliments from strangers as the event. Would wear again!

links_reviews_title: It was very cute. A little too short to bend over and sit (Color was chosen by the bride)
links_reviews_text: I loved the look of the dress. I'm so glad that I got two sizes because I ended up going with the larger size (12). But I wish that I had gotten the next size up. It looked great on and didn't feel too short while standing. The only issues I had were that the arms were tight so I felt very restricted, and I couldn't bend over due to the back of the dress being very short. Sitting was also a challenge because the dress wouldn't cover my butt. The dress was cute, but I'd recommend sizing up
This dress was SO sparkly and pretty! Got compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: Shipped early so I had plenty of time to find something else if it didn't work.
links_reviews_text: I was between sizes but wore the 12 because it gave me a little more shape. Such a fun dress!!
Just fun all around. Great fit! The sequins are very small and not as sharp as some larger sequins can be, which I liked. Rented for a costume party, was a total hit!

This was the perfect dress for our 1920's murder mystery party. It was so comfortable, and I got compliments on it all night! The arms were snug on me, but the length was perfect. I would say to get your usual size, but get the next size up as a backup just in case. I wish I could own this dress!

links_reviews_title: Got many compliments on the dress
links_reviews_text: When I first put it on, the sleeves felt a little tight on my upper arms, but after a little while I didn't notice anymore. Dress has nice lining and the sequins did not bother me. Dress has nice weight and hangs nicely.
I rented this as a back up to another dress and loved the fit. The dress is stretchy and flattering. It seemed to accentuate my curves in the right places.

links_reviews_title: Hard to not be happy when you sparkle like this!
links_reviews_text: Was a bit tight in the arms, a 14 probably would have worked better, and maybe been a tad longer. Still, this was so cute for a 20s themed gala. Got lots of compliments!
This dress looks beautiful on the hanger but was not particularly flattering on my body. It was the wrong amount of loose just so enough that I did not love it so did not end up wearing it

I rented this for a 20s themed gala & it was beautiful! I got lots of compliments & would highly recommend. I am 5'8" & usually wear between a 4 & 6. I wore the 4. I also ordered a 6 but it was a little too baggy.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! Such a beautiful dress!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect!
This is a cute little dress. I'm 6' tall so it was a bit short when sitting. I sized down and was glad I did. Lots of compliments! Would rent again.
I got compliments all evening about this dress! Definitely would rent again!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to an engagement cocktail party and it was so comfortable and perfect for the occasion!
links_reviews_text: The dress is definitely a shift. It is not fitted. I am usually a pretty solid size 10 in dresses and the 8 fit perfectly. I got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: My first RTR rental and it was a hit!
links_reviews_text: I loved everything about this dress! I'm larger busted and I felt it was very flattering. I got lots of compliments and it was easy to dance in too!
Love how loosely it fit around my midsection. Very comfortable. I ended up purchasing this after renting.

links_reviews_title: It was the best dress of the night! So fun!
links_reviews_text: The dress was comfortable and so fun to wear. Size 8 was great...did not need spandex. I would recommend this dress for a fun dress that is anything but boring!
Super comfortable, nicely lined.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a Roaring 20s theme gala & I received compliments on it all night!
links_reviews_text: This dress fits true to size. It's a little short, especially if you lift your arms up, so i wore a pair of hot yoga booty shorts underneath to avoid a wardrobe malfunction. This dress really stands out & everyone asked where I got it all night.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a 1930's themed Casino Royale Charity Event.
links_reviews_text: This dress is comfortable while also being a show stopper. Strangers stopped me all night to give compliments. Love, love, love!

links_reviews_title: I LOVED this dress, and definitely stood out
links_reviews_text: The dress was true to size, very comfortable. Not form-fitting at all, even for someone with a pear shaped/hippy situation (which I was worried about). I could have worn either size 2 or 4 but went with the 4 as the length was slightly more. I rented this for a Gatsby/1920's party along with the UNREAL FUR IVORY CAMILLE FAUX FUR CAPE. The entire outfit was a HIT and so much fun to wear. I didn't get a great photo of the whole ensemble, sorry! But I highly recommend :)
I wore this dress for my bachelorette party, and it couldn't have been more perfect! It was a great length, true to size fit, and just overall amazing! I would highly recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments and it was perfect for a Nashville party (Draper James)
links_reviews_text: It fit similar to a shirt dress but with the flattering detail at the bottom and fitted at the top. I loved the lining along the sleeve to protect from the sequins getting scratchy
Very cute

My husband wants me to keep it because it fit so well. But the snaps are complicated, I needed to pin the top, and I felt uncomfortable all day about the potential of my bra showing at work. Loved the color and it has many gorgeous details.

The color and fabric of this dress are stunning! There's a high slit off center that opens when you walk but in a fun way that isn't too much (if you're worried about a more conservative function), but is also super flattering!

This dress is so beautiful and unique Looks better in person the intricate buttons on the waist are everything Has a high slit in front so I pinned closed Purple pink magenta color Light weight love love Fits true to size
Ordered a Large because bash can run small on my chest area but probably could have done a Medium. So easy to wear. Stretchy in the back. Would buy it!
Stretchy back so it fit well / was flexible for different sizes. Gorgeous detailing and a bright purple color. Loved!

I loved this dress. The color and cut are gorgeous. The tiny buttons are kind of a pain. It has a semi wrap bottom, which seems like a waist-high slot when walking. I wore with leggings, which dressed it down. If you want to wear without leggings you might need to size up so it doesn't open in the front when you walk.
Very beautiful flowy dress. I wore it for a galentines day dinner with my girlfriends.
No cons! I loved this dress! Great for a night out, church, or bridal shower!
Beautiful, comfortable, flowing. Gorgeous lightweight silk. Skirt tends to open when walking--easily solved with fabric tape. Loved this dress!
Love, love, love this dress BUT it's a wrap dress. The wrap closes almost exactly in the middle so I needed to safety pin the skirt together, otherwise it would flow open

What a comfortable and easy to wear dress! I could have sized down to medium but it wasn't available. The large fit fine though. The medium would have been more flattering. It's a bit time consuming getting in and out of this dress because there are so many buttons to undo but I really enjoyed wearing this. I did add a safety pin to the middle of the skirt because the slit goes all the way up and a gust of wind would have exposed my crotch without it.

Getting the buttons done and undone on this dress is a bit of a pain. Also, the wrap opens in the front without much of a wrap around. It was way to easy to flash more leg than I wanted to at work, so I had to be careful how I walked. The colors were really pretty, and I like the asymmetrical design. I got several compliments on it. I like it overall, but not enough to rent it again.

Loved this! Definitely considered buying. Fabric is so light and flows nicely. Slit is a bit high and with a little Breeze You could showing a little more leg than you mean but otherwise it was gorgeous.
beautiful dress . a bit large in the breast area, but still very classy. the slit is pretty high so if youre walking it peeks through a lot, but love this dress!

Beautiful purple pink color. Deep V which shows cleavage. Unfortunately the metal snap to keep it closed shows, which is not that great. I probably could've used some fashion tape to make it better but was in a rush. Watch out for wind while you are walking! I'm usually a size 2-4 and small was perfect
Great dress. Classy and flattering
The dress was flattering and easy to wear

This dress was perfect for me to wear to my daughter's wedding rehearsal dinner, which took place early evening on a warm spring day. The length & fit were perfect! It is a true wrap dress so be aware that the front opening could use a pin or two on a breezy day.
Great colors for me. Feminine and floaty!

As a "statuesque" woman (read "awkwardly tall"), I loath constantly tugging at sleeves that are too short. This dress fit perfectly and made me feel like a beautiful French doll. The color, black trim and lace skirt make it oh so slightly daring without being revealing in any way. I wore a black strapless bra with it. I got so many compliments. Another RTR grand slam!!!

I rented this for a Chinese New Year Gala and it was perfect. I am 5'4" and the dress was almost ankle length on me. It runs small but I did not size up and managed. The buttons at the neck and wrists are very hard to secure (they have the loop things) so you may need some help. This is perfect if you are looking for a dress to stand out in the crowd - it's very red & very lacy.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments at holiday party!
links_reviews_text: The dress does run small so I took all the advice I read and ordered a size up. This was the size I ended up wearing. The fit is quite lovely and was so easy to wear for my husband's holiday party. I am almost at the end of my first trimester and starting to show, this dress also was able to accommodate for that as well. Great dress - and I got so many compliments on it!
Perfect fit! Many complements on how beautiful it was and super comfortable. Will definitely rent again. Perfect for the holidays too :)

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly and made me feel like a dang queen. I wore it for a work party and got tons of compliments. It was winter in Atlanta so I needed something that provided coverage but, in the event of a rogue 60 degree day, was breathable. This gave me both. Would love to rent again in the future.
The neck and arm area were a little short for me which kept me tugging on the collar all night. It's a beautiful red that really pops.

This dress is gorgeous. I received many compliments in New York City from other women I passed at the restaurant we went to and the play The Lion King. I love the lace it is feminine yet the red color is strong. However it is extremely tight in the armpit/upper arm area almost to the point it's uncomfortable. There are also little buttons around the wrist that I left unbuttoned or that part of the arm would have been too tight too. I only got one size so I'm not sure if the larger size would have helped. My usual size is 4-6 and I wore the 4 again cause it's the only size I got, but other than the arms the rest of the fit was good. It was fitted at the waist then looser around hips- I was able to pull it up to use the bathroom. Being the material was looser bottom half it definitely didn't hold my belly in from all this vacation food, but I still felt beautiful in it. I did not wear a bra it has these two tiny little cutouts at the armpit area that add just a little cuteness to the dress. I am going to wear this again probably for Christmas pictures. It was worth the tight arms :)

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Got lots of compliments and it fit so well.
links_reviews_text: Definitely tight in the arms, but it fit perfectly! Spanx also helped...

Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this dress. At 5’6”, the length hit mid length on me. The pattern on the dress is amazing in person and the lace makes it unique. Pair with nude heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!

links_reviews_title: Full length option for petite ladies
links_reviews_text: This was a replacement that I didn't end up wearing because it would have been too formal for an intimate afternoon wedding, which was a little heartbreaking because it fit so well! Though the dress seems to be designed to hit at the ankle or slightly above for an average height woman, it worked well for me as a floor length gown. I loved the fit, it seemed proportional to my body (rare!), and it was very comfortable. It does seem to run small. I'm typically a 0, and the size 2 fit like a glove.
This is a very elegant dress I would have not have picked for myself but it looked great.

I didn't actually end up wearing this after all but I loved the fit! The lace on the arms wasn't stretchy at all so if your arms are larger you may want to skip this dress. It was very flattering otherwise. Again, the length wasn't quite right on me because I'm 5'3" but I don't think it mattered.

I loved this dress! I felt like a celebrity! And people definitely will stare at you like you're famous when you wear it. It's a really attention grabbing piece, so I had to make sure I held some good posture! I wore it to a fancy dinner, and I will say that I don't recommend it as a ''going out to eat a lot'' dress because the waist is not stretchy at all. Like not one bit. The wrists have the potential to be tight as well, but you could just leave the little wrist buttons undone and it would still look great. Overall, great dress! Hard to send this one back for sure.

links_reviews_title: Great pop of color, unique dress
links_reviews_text: This dress was a lot of fun and was quite comfortable. If you are between sizes, size down (I wish I had). Got called "Lady in Red" and a "Red Sorceress". Sure to make an impact with a dress this bright!
The color is saucy!!! The fit is fab. FYI Could potentially be tight in rib cage and arms. Lovely garment!

links_reviews_title: Great night made better with a beautiful dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! I had the chance to try it on in the showroom in San Francisco and I'm glad that I did. I never would have order this dress just from the photos online and I wouldn't have selected the 2R size. I normally wear a size 4, but the 2R fit great and was also a perfect length.
This fit perfect everywhere except for the busy- too tight on me. Otherwise a striking dress, would be nice for Dec holiday events
Runs small, not super flattering on short curvy women. Photographs well, well made.

links_reviews_title: the dress looked amazing! i got so many compliments
links_reviews_text: fit was great. dress looked beautiful
This dress has almost no stretch at all and I couldn't zip it up all the way - I highly recommend sizing one size up - runs small but seems like it would be really cute and classy if i could wear it!
I LOVED this dress, it nipped and flared in all the right places. the lace was a true eye-catching red. Length is classy and not dowdy.

links_reviews_title: I did not get a chance to wear this.
links_reviews_text: If you are petite, this dress is floor length but still beautiful. I normally wear a size 2 and this was so tight I could not zip it all the way. I needed a 4. Size up!

links_reviews_title: I didn't get to wear it.
links_reviews_text: I have an athletic build and there was no way this size was going to zip up. I never got to wear it.

I'm 5'5, 138 pounds and the size 8 fit. There is no give in the waist so definitely size up for your backup. I wore the 8 and received tons of compliments, but I would have been curious to see how the size 10 fit (I ordered a size 6 for my backup). The fabric is beautiful, and it was perfect for a holiday party. I felt festive and beautiful!

links_reviews_title: A little too red for my taste.
links_reviews_text: A bit tight across the shoulders, relaxed fit around the waist

This dress is beautiful. However, it runs very small. The opaque fabric is also very short on the one side. The lace is gorgeous. I wish it would have fit. I usually wear a 6, but would have needed a 10.

links_reviews_title: Went with another dress. The fit on this was atrocious.
links_reviews_text: Slits were placed so weird.

This dress seemed like it was going to fit perfectly until I zipped it up the last few inches. The shoulders and arms were extremely tight I I couldn't wear it. I was scared if I moved too abruptly it would rip.

links_reviews_title: Too tight in the arm area, couldn't move!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress but runs so small I couldn't move my arms.
Couldn't breath it fit everywhere but wouldn't zip up the rib section. So bummed it was very pretty. Well made great color.

links_reviews_title: felt great in this super sexy dress
links_reviews_text: fit well
It was super comfy. But it didn't come with the belt. This made it pretty flattering since, it hugged in the right places but baggy in the midsection.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for emceeing a 1920's themed event
links_reviews_text: Wore this to emcee a 1920 themed event. Stayed in place, was very flattering and loved that there were pads in the bust. Only issues was thin fabric and you should plan to wear a slip...but even that may show through. Figured better a line from my slip than show the world my goods ;)
Very comfortable and nice dress. They did not send the belt. Luckily I had a tori burch burgundy belt that worked.

links_reviews_title: Comfy, flattering, and great for warm climate
links_reviews_text: I rented this for New Years Eve overseas and wanted something packable that didn't need pressing. It was also warm and humid so the dress was airy and light. The belt was missing in the order but we had a huge dinner so I welcomed the looser fit.

links_reviews_title: I ordered another dress and it didn't fit at all. They overnighted this one and it was amazing
links_reviews_text: I love this dress! This dress was so comfortable and made me beautiful and sexy! I got many compliments all night! Hi he best part is you can dress it up or down.

Everything about this dress was perfect except the tie part in front! I'd tie it and my boob would pop out. No matter how I worked it! Luckily it slipped right off and I loved it without! Super comfy! Love the fabric but wear spank under! It shows a lot otherwise!
Great dress! Very flattering in my mid section but a little snug thru the hips but still looked great. Normally wear a size 8 and ordered a medium which worked perfectly. I'm 5'9 and 170lbs

I loved this fun, easy dress. The color is striking and I got so many compliments at this event. The XS provided more support in the bust, but I chose the S because it was a little bit longer on me. I wanted the longer, looser fitting look for the dress. It was so comfortable and I felt really confident in this one!
Great fit and the stretchy material is forgiving. Loved the vibrant color. Perfect for a summer wedding!

Absolutely loved this dress, great color and the back is truly sexy. The dress is also super comfortable and stays in place. My only complaint is that I received the dress without the belt, even after I had emailed RTR to ensure they included the belt, as is shown in the RTR stock photo. Thankfully from reading other reviews, I learned that the belt was separate from the dress and therefore, there were these secret holes in the dress where the belt was supposed to attach. I found some string in the same color and tied that around the front belt holes to achieve the cinched waist.

I don't normally wear dresses that don't have a good bit of structure, but I felt totally comfortable in this dress. It's a light weight fabric, but still has a good hang. I love that the design covered my stomach in a loose and flattering way.
Very comfortable and stretchy. True color is darker than the stock photo.

This dress accentuated my sex appeal (I can't give it all of the credit, haha!) The color was working for my skin and it was thin, requiring no bra, but had enough fabric and lining to keep me decent. I rarely go anywhere without a bra. It was perfect for a tropical beach wedding. The only thing I didn't like is that the fabric ballooned out in the tummy area. So, great for coverage, and I could eat all that I wanted, but not so cool when the wind blows and you look like a balloon getting ready to float away. I wore it again for a night out with the girls, and felt great in it. Although, it is a little dressy for just having drinks with friends. I don't think it looks much like the dress on the model.

links_reviews_title: RTR needs to send with the belt
links_reviews_text: I loved the dress and the fit was great, even without the belt. However, it would have looked much better with the belt and neither size that RTR sent was sent with the belt. Just be ready to either wear it without, or add your own belt. I'd say this runs TTS, but I sized up for room at the busy.

I was worried the small wouldn't fit but it did! I'm usually a small/medium. I have a pooch from having kids but I'm over all a small person, that's the front of the dress his everything! I still wore shapewear bc I just feel more comfortable. Got so many compliments all night saying how high fashion it looked!

links_reviews_title: Cute, well-fitting dress for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress was super comfortable and works well for anyone who worries about their midsection. I was able to go braless with no issues and the color was lovely. My only complaint is that the back of the dress is pretty revealing (i.e. everyone will know what type of underwear you have on unless you wear shapewear).
This dress fit great and was very comfortable. Fits true to size. Fabric was lightweight, color was beautiful. Great for larger busts.
Very cute and very comfortable wore this to Vegas for my husbands bday

This dress is cute but if you have an hourglass shape go up a size. The bottom of this dress was very tight. It almost made the fabric see through. The bottom of the dress is not seamed either, it looks like it has just been cut with scissors straight across. It is rough and there were a few stray threads.

links_reviews_title: Easy to dance, and very elegant
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me perfectly, it was super comfortable and was easy to move and dance in! Got lots of compliments definitely perfect for any wedding or party!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color! Perfect for a summer wedding.
links_reviews_text: Perfect length. Fit was true to size and hugged the body in the right places. Got compliments all night.
I rented the medium and large. The medium fit well but decided to go with the large since it was a bit more forgiving on bottom. It was very comfortable and received many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Being able to dance the night away in this dress was truly memorable!
links_reviews_text: The fabric was comfortable! The design of the dress was perfect for a windy day, no worries there. I wore a strapless bra, which worked great. It was really hot outside so sweat showed super fast with this fabric, but I wasn't the only one. I think the only way for this dress to be perfect would be to have pockets

links_reviews_title: It hung on my body perfectly!
