links_reviews_text: This dress is super light weight & was great for the texas heat! The color & fit was perfect

I loved this dress. It was flattering and comfortable. I received so many compliments. I'll be renting this dress in the other color for something! The only thing I wasn't a fan of was the hem isn't finished.
Can wear with regular strapless, true to size, so comfy
This dress got a ton of compliments. The only issue was it did ride up when walking. But the cut was perfect and allowed for eating which I think makes this dress an MVP

links_reviews_title: Form fitting party dress that is forgiving AND sexy
links_reviews_text: I was skeptical about this dress as clingy in a tropical location can be hit/miss. I wore this to dinner out and felt like a million bucks. I was able to go braless and still felt supported. I tried it on with belt and sans belt and the concensus via group text was no belt. The material breathes well and the color is bright and gorgeous. I didn't have to wear Spanx either (which is usually a must). This a great alternative to body-con dresses for those of us with a little tummy! Also, the dress was in great condition.

This dress was a showstopper for the wedding! Many compliments received on the color and fit. Very flattering and hugs your curves in all the right places. The material is stretchy and moves with you. Would definitely rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, slimming, able to dance all night!
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size (XS) and I'm very petite so it came just above my knees. Looked good with wedges. Con was that it came in the mail a little messed up so I had to improvise how it was supposed to be tied in the front. That was a little frustrating. In my picture it's hard to see the whole outfit but the color was gorgeous and I felt amazing in it!

Loved the design at the front because I felt like I didn't have to worry about eating too much! It was flattering on the back and not too revealing at the chest. I was surprised by the quality of the dress material which was a little thicker than expected. Lots of compliments!

Wore this for date night with the hubby and got tons of compliments. The color is rich and vibrant and the material feels great on your skin. The front panel was great for hiding midsection flaws and despite the straps thin appearance I found the top offered a decent amount of support. I'm 36/38DD and chose to wear a sticky bra for a smoother appearance but a regular strapless could be worn too. The only potential drawback I could see is for shorter wearers; I'm 5'11" (shorter torso, longer legs) and this fell below the knee for me.

This dress was absolutely perfect for my frame! And the best part... it was SO comfortable! I have an athletic build and a small chest, so I didn't have to wear a bra. And had no worries the whole night. Just got to dance and enjoy myself! Not to mention, I got complimented all night! Originally, I ordered a completely different dress that was more tight/form fitting and I felt it just accentuated my smaller chest. So, I sent it back and talked to the awesome RTR staff and they sent me out this replacement next day. This was my 4th time renting from RTR and certainly not my last! I actually think this was my favorite to date! I'm a happy customer and can't wait to rent for my next event! :)

I was excited to get this dress for my wedding anniversary dinner. I'm 130 lbs, 5'3" and had two kids, even wearing a small I always want to disguise my delivery belly. It arrived and seem to fit on top but was especially baggy in the belly. I'm sure if I went a size down it would've fit perfectly but I certainly could eat to my hearts content and I wouldn't be conscious of my belly sticking out!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and fun to wear!
links_reviews_text: Sexy, comfy, dressy, absolutely loved this dress!

This was my back up dress. As many stated it didn't come with a belt. I feel like the belt was needed. There was extra fabric that I wasn't quite sure what to do with. I loved the color and it was comfortable. I could see how the dress could be nice and classy for some, or too risky. If you are curvy in the bottom half it will accentuate that. I didn't end up wearing it as it was my back up style

links_reviews_title: Does not tie like the photos.
links_reviews_text: I dont understand what to do with this dress but it did not look like pics

It's very sexy, but I didn't end up wearing it since it didn't come with the tie/belt - it was too much fabric hanging on top (would've worked okay if I added my own belt). It's tight in the hip area so it can end up showing lines.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fall wedding at a gorgeous home.
links_reviews_text: Was really hopeful and excited for this dress for a fall wedding, unfortunately it arrived without the belt and didn't look right without it. I didn't wear it at all. It also arrived after 10pm that night, leaving me little time to adjust to find a new dress. Made the whole situation quite stressful.

links_reviews_title: SO COMFORTABLE! The dress didn't come with the belt, but I improvised.
links_reviews_text: This dress was super comfortable and the color was perfect for a July wedding. The reason I gave this dress only 4 stars was because the "belt" that cinched the waist was not included in either of the 2 sizes I received. I called customer service (which was AMAZING by the way) they shipped me another one in blue... that one also DID NOT come with the belt. The dress looked fine without it, but it looked way better with it, so I decided to make one myself. I just tied a ribbon through the holes as to wear the belt would be and it looked great! But other than that, the dress was comfortable, it was the perfect length for my 5'3" height and I didn't have to wear a bra because the liner inside kept everything in!

Loved this one! So lightweight and comfortable - perfect for life here in Florida. Would be a great travel dress since it doesn't seem to wrinkle. Kind of a mesh fabric with lining. I'm a size 6 (mostly) or 4 and the SR was a bit too large. I'll definitely rent it again, but in the XS. I prefer more fitted garments.
Comfy and easy to walk around in on vacation. You will definitely stand out!
Fit was true to size. Very comfortable.
I wore this to a wedding shower at a country club and it was perfect! It's true to size and very comfortable. Definitely recommend!
I'm a 6 usually and the small fit great...a little blousy on the top and the elastic wanted to roll a little, but loved the color and comfort of the dress!
Great, lightweight dress. Runs a little big so I sized down and it was perfect on my petite frame.
Perfect fit, very true to size. Great material, felt comfortable all night long and received lots of compliments. Layered with a denim jacket due to weather. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but not wow worthy for me
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner that had a Palm Springs 70s plus California cool theme. This dress is a beautiful color and wanted to love it so badly but I just didn’t love it. The waistband didn’t hug in the right place and it personally made me feel like a looked bigger in photo then I really am. But I do love the material, color and print so if you can make it work go for it!
great for curvy tall ladies, this is the first dress i feel comfortable in with one strap and a larger chest, highly recommend !
Liked the fit and color of this. It was very comfortable and felt flattering. The band would sometimes fold over around my back/shoulder which is why 4 stars but not 5. I'd definitely rent again.
Great dress! Beautiful color!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable dress that stood out in the crowd without being too much.
links_reviews_text: Usually not a fan of asymmetrical hems, I loved this dress' style, color, and material. The only thing that wasn't 100% was the fit of the sleeve, as it at times felt too high on my shoulder/neck but could not be pulled down without sitting strangely in the body/waist. Paired well with a nude heeled sandal like that on the model, dangly black tassel earrings, and a simple gold bangle; this was worn to a fairly casual summer rehearsal dinner. I would absolutely wear this again!
I didn't get a chance to wear on our vacation but did love the color and fun lightweight fabric. The arm hole has a ton of room so be mindful of your undergarments
Love this dress! Perfect fit and very comfortable and flattering

links_reviews_title: Comfy and flowy. Easy to wear. Wore for Mother's Day casual-ish dinner.
links_reviews_text: Flattering waist was slimming. Super comfy!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful colors but runs a little big
links_reviews_text: Very pretty. Runs a tad big so size down

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Cinco de Mayo/graduation party
links_reviews_text: Perfect for a Cinco de Mayo/graduation party. Flowy, comfortable, cool. Just not my favorite style.
I normally wear a Medium in this brand when it's a silk material. Since this was more blousy and flowing I went with a Small and so glad I did. It fit perfectly. I'm usually between a size 4 and a 6.

Nice color and style but this dress fit like a few of the reviews mentioned. I found it too big for my frame, the elasticity of the waist was not form fitting enough and too baggy to take for destination wedding/ vacation.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear this because it wasn't flattering for my high-waisted pear shape.
links_reviews_text: I loved the fabric and the colors of the dress. It was comfortable. In theory I would have loved it but it just wasn't flattering once I put it on. I felt like I looked wide and kind of shapeless, and I think it is because I have such a high waist and am somewhat pear-shaped. I wanted to like this and think it looks great on other people but just not for me.

links_reviews_title: Not a great fit - ran large.
links_reviews_text: This dress ran large and just did nothing for me. The frill on top was overwhelming and the fit wasn't flattering. I am 5'2" and have bigger hips/butt and am small in the middle. Not a good fit for me.
The fit is great and very flattering!
Loved this material and the concept of this dress! However it wasn't very flattering on me and visually added width. No go!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress a lot and will definitely rent it again.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, lovely material and color. Also like the length of the dress.
This was perfect for a rehearsal dinner! It hit me nicely at the waist (though I do have a short torso), and it was flattering overall.
No cons
Very flowy and loose--super comfortable! I had a great time dancing all night. Would wear again!
This dress was great! It's meant to be loose fitting except int he elastic part around the waist so was really comfortable. The color is very pretty and overall the dress is super fun!

I absolutely loved this dress! I was able to dance all night! The red color and subtle floral pattern makes this dress very unique. I got so many complements! I ordered the Medium and Large but didn't even try on the Large since the Medium was perfect.
It fit true to size. Fun pretty party dress.

links_reviews_title: Unable to wear - not for the short waisted
links_reviews_text: I’m 5’3” and curvy. The length was ok with open toe heels (about 3-4 inch height heel). However, the elastic waist is not friendly if you are 1. Short-waisted and 2. Carry any bit of extra weight in your midsection. The elastic black pattern made my waistline looks even wider than usual. Pulling it up over my natural waist made fit of dress look terrible overall. Pulling it down did not give any shape to my body whatsoever and widened me even more. Sending back without wearing.
loved this dress! got lots of compliments. sized down based on other reviews and it fit nicely. did not have issues with the neckline

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and comfortable. Loved it
links_reviews_text: A little longer than it seems. Stretchy and comfortable

links_reviews_title: didn't actually wear this dress. but I was cute on
links_reviews_text: I wish it was a little bit shorter
Fit great, easy to style with pumps and leather jacket
Got a ton of compliments! Super cute and flowy

rented for a charity banquet where the dress code was dressy western. wore with cowboy boots and look was right on for the crowd, but not really my usual style. comfortable easy to wear dress. husband liked it more than me!

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress. Soft free flowing fabric great fit. Look is true to image. Would be perfect for summer
links_reviews_text: The dress fit great. I was a bit apprehensive since the waist was elastic and those type of dresses are usually not very flattering for me since I am pear shaped. However, the free flowing fabric complimented my shape and the off the shoulder drew the eye up. Unfortunately, I did not get to wear it for the actual occasion since the weather became unseasonably colder than most early fall evenings.
Very fun pattern. Was a little big but likes the dress

links_reviews_title: The color and the silhouette. Loved that it was unique without being too showy!
links_reviews_text: The elastic waistline has to hit just right! If it pops up then your stomach will be more pronounced. If it falls right on your widest part then the skirt falls in a more flattering way.
So stunning and flattering. Got so many compliments! High quality material

I rented this dress for a gala. I got so many compliments. I'm 5'1" and wore 2" heels and the dress was well above the floor. The size 2 was the only size left. It was a little snug but the dress was a lot of stretch.
I wore this to a snowy winter wedding and I loved it. It was both classy and sexy and kept me warm throughout the night. Perfect for a winter wedding or a black tie/formal affair. Highly recommend!

I need this dress in my closet ASAP. I've never felt more confident or beautiful than I have in this dress. I wore it to a winter wedding and it was perfect for mid-December. It was easy to move and dance in without overheating. I will pursue owning this!

links_reviews_title: You have to rent this dress!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing. It is a bit tight so I did go with the bigger size for my comfort. But I got complements all night and and considering buying it to keep. I highly recommend renting this dress.
Great dress. Would definitely rent again. I usually wear a 6 but the 4 fit better, as this dress has a lot of stretch. So many compliments throughout the night.
It fit me great and offered subtle sex appeal while remaining classy.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a winter wedding!
links_reviews_text: Form fitting but stretchy so I had no problem moving around and dancing. I wore it with open-toed high heels to a winter wedding. It was perfect! I received MANY complements. I wish I could buy it!!
The size 4 fit well overall except being a little long, but that was expected. The mesh areas still hit in the right places though, and overall was a really comfortable dress. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: The dress was stunning. Perfect fit and style!
links_reviews_text: Glamorous
Beautiful yet edging perfect party dress

Absolutely loved everything about this dress! The sheer panel detailing makes it super unique and the slight trumpet skirt make it party ready. I received so many compliments when I wore this to a friend's December wedding. Fit is true to size, however petite girls should note that the sleeves are likely to be a little long! I simply folded them underneath and no one noticed. Length was obviously a little longer on me, as well, hit right at the ankles. Only negative I can say is that the neoprene-like material does not breath - since the arms are enclosed (and a little on the extra fitted side) I felt hot instantly dancing in this number, but made do!

Rented this dress in 2R because my regular size 0R wasn't available. After reading many reviews, it seemed like the dress was pretty stretchy and there wasn't a huge difference between the 0 and 2. Overall, the fit was great! It was form fitting yet comfortable and the length was perfect for me. I did not wear a bra because I didn't want to risk it showing when I raised my arms. The sleeves were long but I just tucked them in and you couldn't tell a thing. Would def recommend for a formal affair!
Stretchy, fitted, true to size. A little tricky since you can't wear a bra. Perfect length for my height. Lots of compliments and actually pretty comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Felt AMAZING and comfortable in this dress!
links_reviews_text: I felt this dress ran true to size. The arms were a bit tighter than I was expecting but the 4 fit fine. It had thick, great quality material. I got lots of compliments and also loved that I was covered but still felt a little sexy. ;) Highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Cute, subtly sexy. Loved this for a "black tie optional" wedding
links_reviews_text: I'm 4'11.5" so length is important to me. I ordered this after seeing it looked great on another reviewer at 4'10". it was about ankle length on me, and I wore heels similar to the photo. I did have to roll the sleeves under, they were long on me and I didn't want to have the bunchy look at my wrists. I would have preferred the chest sheer section to be a little shorter, but it's Regular not Petite so it worked just fine, it would just be something I'd have altered if I owned the dress. Wore nippies so I didn't have to have bra straps and nude spanx that were not noticable at all even through the sheer belly section. Really enjoyed wearing it!

I knew this brand fits me well, and this dress was no exception. The fit of the dress overall was like a glove. The sleeves we a bit long on me, but it looked fine when I rolled them underneath a bit, you couldn't tell. The length was perfect. I wore pasties with it instead of a bra, as I realized that my strapless bra was sliding down a little bit and then you could see the bottom underwire of the bra through the mesh panel underneath. So comfortable, would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, Sexy Dress for Cold Weather
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress to dress up as Morticia Addams for Halloween. The dress was perfect for the character and was comfortable to wear all night. It provides more coverage than I expected and I did not feel overexposed with the mesh panels. I will definitely rent again!

This dress was beautiful! I wore it to a charity event with my family. While I felt awesome in it I also found it to be a bit too sexy. My bottom breasts would kind of poke out the bottom into the sheer panels and you can't really wear a bra for the same reason (eek). But it was as comfortable as wearing yoga pants and I stayed warm!
Loved this dress and got tons of compliments. I felt covered and comfortable yet sexy at the same time! Highly recommend!
What a gorgeous and flattering dress. Perfect for black tie event/wedding. I'm 5'3" and the length was great. Very comfortable and good for dancing. Best dress! Sooo many compliments

This dress was absolutely amazing and the crazy part it was my backup and I preferred it to the dress I actually picked! I wore this to winter formal event and it was a huge hit. It was classic enough but, the cutouts made it so much fun. The coverage goes a long way when it's cold outside. I fit into both the size 4&6. I ended up going with the 6 because there was a little extra wiggle room and I wanted a more forgiving fit. The fabric is really thick so, you don't see any lumps or bumps which is comforting when you are in a fitted dress. Highly recommend this dress!
Perfect length! I'm 4'll and was worried this would drag but it was right at my ankle enough to see my shoes. Hugs you well. Love it!
Hugs all the right places, fantastically made, really comfortable!
Perfect for a law prom 30 degree weather!

Im 5'0 120lbs I usually wear a 2-4P but the reg fit perfect. Sleeves were long but i just tucked them under and it worked ! Fits tight but the material is perfect at keeping it all together! Would rent again !
Perfect for women with curves! Super comfortable and no need for a bra. The length was perfect and I used 4" heels. Would definitely rent this dress again!

I LOVED this dress and got so many compliments. I feel this dress is very true to size, was tight on my body but not in an inappropriate way. The sheer panels made it feel special, fun and sexy but in a classy, timeless way. Worn this to a friends wedding with blush, sparkled pumps and black/white tassel earrings from JCREW and got so many compliments. Would highly recommend and totally rent again!

links_reviews_title: The dress was unique AND comfortable- I feel like that's pretty rare!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely LOVED this dress. I was sad to return it, because I just want to wear it again and again. I was nervous at first, because I am short (5'3ish) and I do have curvy hips. I am a long distance runner so my legs are pretty muscley, which can make dresses weird sometimes. I felt like being short I couldn't wear a long dress and with hips that I am self conscious about, I wouldn't like how this dress looked on me. I was wrong- I LOVED it. My husband loved it and all of my girlfriends kept asking me where I got it. The material is thick, which was great because it dipped into the 30s/40s that night at the ceremony after the wedding (wedding was in a Catholic Church, and I felt fine wearing this). I ordered a 4, and the 2 was a backup size. The 4 was way too big on top for me and a little too long. The 2 was perfect- and made me laugh out loud that I was even wearing a two, because that's insane. Anyway, I'll stop my rambling and tell you, if you are hesitant about ordering this dress, DON'T BE! Order it. You will love how you look and feel wearing it, and your friends will want to steal it from you ;)
No complaints this dress was fab!
I rented both the 0 and the 2 but ended up going with the 2 because it fit a bit more comfortably in the arms. Such a fun twist on a classic black dress- you can't go wrong!

Comfortable and just the right amount of sexy for a black tie wedding. So flattering if you have curves and great length if you're short! Got so many compliments. Also photographs insanely well. The material is thick enough to keep you held in!

I rented dress for a Sweet 16. The 4 fit perfect and the solid material is thick, stretchy, forgiving. I'm a full C in the bust so I wasn't able to wear a bra, but, the material kept me in place all night (usually not the case). Tons of compliments! Get this dress! Sexy but classy. Perfect. Also, my friend who is small busted but similiar size also tried on the dress with a starpless bra and it looked great!
This dress is perfect for a fun black tie event! I felt great in it all night & super comfortable! It is hard to wear a bra with but i found that it was supportive enough on its own.

The 6 probably would have fit better in the shoulders and arms, but the 8 worked out fine. The dress is very fitted but the material is heavy and lays nicely on the body. I'm 5'4" and wore 5 inch heels, but the dress was a bit too long. It would have been ideal if it hit mid calf, but it ended up about 3 inches above my ankles. Sleeves were super long so I had to cuff them under, but they looked normal. Overall, it was a beautiful, well made, sexy dress. My husband gave it an A+.

links_reviews_title: This dress hugged my body in all the right places!
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing. The 4R fit so well but because I am very chesty (34DD) I felt more secure with the 6R so I had more coverage on my chest. This dress was super comfortable! The material was amazing and it was amazingly flattering! I have never received more compliments than I have in this dress! Definitely recommend and will rent again !

Wore this Nicole Miller dress to a local Dancing with the Stars charity event in January. I received TONS of compliments and felt so fabulous in this dress (and my husband loved it). Pictures do not do this dress enough justice! The fabric was great and thick enough that I was able to go without a bra. The dress covers all the right places but delivers the drama. The fabric was stretchy so it was super comfortable. With the sheer panels the better the fit, the better they lay. The sleeves are longer but laid perfectly so it wasn't an issue. I highly recommend this dress!! So many ladies asked me where they could find this dress, I pointed them all to RTR. This was also my first experience with RTR and it was wonderful! I will be back for my next event!

This was my first experience with RTR and I could not have been more impressed with the entire experience. The material is high-quality, thick and very stretchy. I have a small bust and the coverage was enough that I didn't have to wear a bra. This dress was a big step out of my comfort zone in terms of the sheer panels - but they were elegant and subtle. I received a number of compliments and would buy the dress, frankly, if I had the option. I felt confident, sexy and my husband thought I was hot, too! I wore a 0R and requested a back up size of 2R - but note to small busted ladies like me, if the top isn't tight enough, the panels collapse on themselves. Highly recommend this dress - and RTR in general!

Wore this amazing dress for a fall wedding and received endless compliments all night long! It is a long sleeved, modern, chic, make you feel amazing - upgrade to the LBD we are all looking for! It fit like a glove and hugged me in all the right places! Obsessed with the long sleeves! Only cons I can think of beside having to send it back , is that you definitely can’t wear a bra- wasn’t problem for me however as I have a smaller chest, and it can be a little long if you are a shorter gal but with the right heels you can make it work! Overall LOVED it!

links_reviews_title: A little long in the arms
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress!! It was the perfect mix of classy and sexy for a formal wedding. I am between a 4 and a 6 and I ended up wearing a 4. I have a very short torso and arms. The dress was long in the arms (I had to roll the sleeves...it wasnt very noticable) and wasnt very tight in the arms either. I was able to get away with not wearing a bra but was a little nervous because it wasn't super tight. I wish I would've ordered the 4 and 2 to try on just to see how the arms fit of the arms would've been! I actaully loved the length of the dress on me too! It hit right around the ankle!

Got both the M and L to try on. The M fit well, except for the chest area. I am in my 4th month of pregnancy so I did not have a huge bump. However, if I was any later, I probably would have not fit. The large felt more secure in the chest area, just make sure you have a strapless bra. I ended up putting padding in since I didn't have one handy & it help up well. Sleeves can be worn up or off the shoulder. Went well with a jean jacket, too! Overall, comfortable & cute.

Wore the larger (M) size due to lack of ruching/stretch--but still fit over the bump nicely! Perfect for a casual maternity photo shoot! Slit was a little high and dress a little tight--maybe not great if you had to do a lot of walking/sitting/dancing! Got tons of compliments!

I wore this at 36 weeks to my baby sprinkle. It was comfortable and had enough stretch in it. Not as much stretch as I thought it would but still had give. It was lined but still a bit see through. (I found out from my husband after the shower... ) I'm 5'8" and it was a good length; the slit made it a little awkward to sit in.

Loved wearing this Spanish number for my baby shower. I wore a sticky strapless bra which made my cleavage huge. Got tons of compliments as it hugged in all the right places. So comfortable. Glad I rented it.

Wore this for my baby shower at 29 weeks and received a lot of compliments. The medium fit but was a little tighter than I prefer so I went with the large. Although not a maternity dress, it fit well and highlighted the right parts. I felt the fabric was a little cheap in person, as it didn't look as well made as it does in some of the photos.

This was an actual maternity dress, so it fit in all the right places and did a great job at making me look slimmer, not tight at all. It was a little sexier than I would have liked for having grandmas around.Also the slit was a tad too high, few inches lower would have been better for sitting and opening gifts without feeling exposed. Overall I felt fantastic in it and I was comfortable all day. I would definitely recommend. Current weight is 180 and 36DD(bigger breasted may want to pass).

I wore this dress at 8 months pregnant. Can't tell from the photo really, but I'm 5'7" and nearly 200 pounds at 8 months pregnant. The dress was snug, could've used the XL, but it showed up all stained :-(. I made it work though. :-)

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a baby shower
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my baby shower and absolutely loved it. Almost bought it to wear if/when I get pregnant again. Probably not the BEST options for large chested women. 5'3" Pre pregnant weight 145, 160 at 34 weeks.

This dress was adorable. I really loved the look, but it's not a maternity dress. It's maternity friendly, so I'd recommend sizing up if you're in or near your third trimester, depending on the weight you've put on. I put mine on mostly in the belly - I really would have been more comfortable in a Small. There is no zipper so you have to shuffle it down from the top, which wasn't easy for my somewhat broader shoulders and new boobs.

links_reviews_title: This was the perfect dress for my baby shower at 28 weeks!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! I wore a Medium at 28 weeks pregnant and it was a great fit and super comfortable. The fabric is thick enough to smooth out everything, but is still light and summery. Very bump friendly!
I LOVED this dress. I wore it many many times between 19-23 weeks pregnant. It is so sexy yet can be dressed down or up. Highly recommend.
Super comfortable and stretchy!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a summer baby shower!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress. I wore it for my baby shower at 31 weeks pregnant. Let me tell you - having no zippers in a maternity dress is absolutely key. Nothing digging in, no wrestling with getting it zipped. The cap sleeves also made it easy to wear a regular bra since I was NOT dealing with a strapless or any other option on such a hot day. It felt great in it and got tons of compliments! I almost wish the fabric was a little thinner, but only because it was 100 degrees that day. Otherwise I really appreciated how the thicker fabric smoothed everything out. Highly recommend!

Very Pretty, feminine dress, but low cut. (I am small chested, but I still didn't feel comfortable wearing it to a baby shower for a friend where I knew a lot of middle aged women be in attendance.) I am 21 weeks pregnant, 128 pounds, and a 34A. There is some stretch, but I don't think this dress would work for me in the third trimester.

Love this dress SO much. I wore it to an outdoor summer brunch and again a week later to a maternity "baby bump" photo shoot. It's so feminine and beautiful... and so flattering! The model in the picture has the sleeves up, but I wore them off the shoulder and thought it looked so good like that. Definitely recommend for any summer occasion. It was a little right over the chest just to put on... but once it was on it fit great. I wore sticky boobs which I think is the best move.
Rented this for my baby shower. I'm 7 months pregnant both the medium and large fit but i felt most comfortable in the large. Would highly recommend!

I'm currently 6 months pregnant, my boobs are triple D, the dress feels like there is nothing on while keeping me stylish and cute for the day of my baby shower, definitely recommend for any event especially if pregnant!!!
I'm usually a S but saw that this dress was a bit revealing, so i sized up to M and it fit great

I was 34 weeks pregnant while wearing this dress. I rented it because I had a solo for our choir. My thighs are much thicker than the models in the photos for this dress but the slit still worked fine. The bust knot was adjustable which helped the fit a lot. I received a lot of compliments from fellow choir members and strangers. I docked this dress one star because there were a lot of little strings hanging off it and if I pulled it, it kept unraveling (ahh!) so I used scissors to trim them but it makes me wonder about the quality of the material. You can't tell from far away but it detracted from the experience.

links_reviews_title: perfect for my baby shower! Comfortable and sexy!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Was very comfortable. Wore the size medium for my baby shower and I am 7 months pregnant. Tons of compliments and fit really well. Would highly recommend!
Loved this dress! Made me feel sexy even with being 8 months pregnant. It doesn't have a ton of stretch so I would suggest considering that for sizing.

links_reviews_title: I wore it for Mother's Day.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. I'm 8 months pregnant and wore a medium. It was a little snug. I think a large would've been a better fit. Regularly I'm a medium. So I would recommend going a size up just incase. The fabric does stretch and is comfortable. Everyone loved it and I got a ton of compliments. Super cute dress for any special occasion or everyday use.

I really loved this dress. Overall it was really flattering and made me feel gorgeous! It wasn't as stretchy as I thought it would be for a maternity dress but luckily the medium just barely fit me. If you're in the third trimester I would recommend sizing up. The chest area didn't have as much coverage as I thought either so that's something else to consider if you prefer to be more covered up. All in all, great dress!
Can definitely be worn for non-maternity. I rented this for my bridal shower and it was perfect! Received so many compliments.

This is labeled as Maternity and is definitely not. False advertising...typically with Maternity sizing you choose your pre-pregnancy size so I chose small. This is also the same size I wear in most Maternity designers. I could barely get this dress over my chest, barely any stretch and just an awkward fit. Had I know. It wasn't actually maternity I would have ordered a Medium, maybe even a large.

links_reviews_title: I ordered this to wear to my baby shower. In XS and S. Neither sizes fit me
links_reviews_text: I ordered this to wear to my baby shower. In XS and S. Neither sizes fit me

I got this dress as my backup for my bridal shower. By the way, I am not pregnant and it fit perfectly, I'm 5'8 -140, athletic body type.. (Not sure what that says about me, lol). It's really cute! Wish I could have kept it for another event.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable at my baby shower!
links_reviews_text: I was 7 months pregnant at my baby shower. I normally wear a size 6 and got the LR and XLR as a backup. The LR fit perfectly and still allowed a lot of stretch. Felt very comfortable the whole time. The fabric is thick enough that you do not have to wear special under garments. Would recommend!

Very comfortable - very boobalicious - dress! A bit girlier than I normally wear, but, hey, that's what rentals are for. It was fine on my 20 week bump but I wonder if it would have fit in the 3rd trimester.
I'm not pregnant but this is apart of the mumu pregs and regs line so its for both. I loved this dress so much. It is so flattering
I got so many compliments on this dress! I was 32 weeks and it hugged in all the right places
The fit is great but the dress is a bit see through

Rented for my baby shower at 36 weeks. This dress had no stretch whatsoever. This dress can only be worn best if I was in my 2nd trimester. The dress had no maternity shape. No zipper. It couldn't go pass my belly. The "thigh slit" was more like a slit showing off my frontal private part (would have shown a pic but too much TMI going on there). So sad because it is a very cute dress. I'm usually an XS. The size up still didn't fit. I don't even believe the medium would fit even if I exchanged it for better size. I wouldn't recommend for your third Trimester, which is a time to feel comfortable as much as possible. Unfortunately, this "maternity" dress just made this mama feel more unpleasant. Ended up wearing whatever I had in my closet to my shower.

links_reviews_title: A beautiful baby shower surrounded by friends and family.
links_reviews_text: I did not wear this dress for my event as it didn't fit. This dress did not feel like it was made for maternity as it had very little stretch, if any. I recommend definitely going at least a size up, especially if in your third trimester.

links_reviews_title: Light and airy! Perfect for a summer day.
links_reviews_text: Very flattering cut! Love the slit up the side.
This was a really awkward fit - impossible to wear a bra with, and because my boobs are huge with pregnancy, looked insanely inappropriate. I returned right away.

links_reviews_title: Stunning color - definitely stood out amongst attendees of the gala
links_reviews_text: I was in-between Sm/Md. Definitely leave room for bloating after the meal this dress showed everything.
I thought the small was a little loose. Definitely could've had a tighter fit, some gaping in the bust and large around the waist but made it work! Would totally rent again and size down!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Bright Red Satin Slip for a Vogue themed event!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely love this dress! When I tried it on, it was longer than expected but it was perfect when I put on my heels (and I'm already 5'10")!i got so many compliments on this dress and was so pleased with the cherry red color and beautiful fabric! The only con I have to say is it was a little loose in the top, not sure if the straps were adjustable or not because I was in a rush and just didn't care enough to check because it was beautiful regardless!
This dress was perfect for NYE. I am usually a size 8 and that's what I wore or in this case the L. It was comfy with a touch of sexy. LOVED IT!

Loved the dress and received so many compliments! Felt like a sexy mamacita! Fit my curvy body very well! Wore spanx to flatten my belly just because this type of fabric isn't the most forgiving. Sad to send it back

links_reviews_title: Sexy dress, got lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: The fabric was thick and forgiving, and was very comfortable. Adjustable straps were great.
Dress looked awesome with heels and a cute jacket and with a fun sweater and tennis shoes.

Love this dress!!! Danced in it all night. Ate and drank, felt comfortable. I'm usually a small, but xsmall fit perfectly. Love the adjustable straps. It zips in the back. I have a very small chest, and I don't wear a bra.

links_reviews_title: Dress up or down; high quality and comfortable
links_reviews_text: Runs a little small, especially if you have a athletic build or are large chested. I normally wear a M but sized up to the L and am glad I did. The straps are adjustable so it fit nicely. Quality fabric!and well lined. Fun to dress up or down.

This fit like a GLOVE! It is so beautiful and comfortable. You can dress it up or dress it down, I decided to wear it for a casual day out. Really pretty dress, great material, stunning color and amazing fit!
Perfect fit, length, and material!

Wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner and felt awesome in it. I'm short (5'1") and it hit my ankles with a ~2-inch heel. Fit loose around the to torso (as the dress is designed), but since my bust is larger (34D), the chest part was a little snug, but still managed to work through it. The straps are adjustable so that's helpful- it just means a little more cleavage if you're ok with that. I got a ton of compliments on the simple yet super sleek style-- rent it!
Fit was too big and ultimately didn't match my husband's suit. I really wanted to like this dress better- would look better on a curvier body!

Perfect for summer wedding season! Usually I'm between a S or M, typically size 6, wore the small in this dress as it runs true to size but a tad on the larger size! Very comfortable with adjustable straps.
Beautiful red color. Really stands out. Dressed it down with a crossbody and tee over it. Loved this look. Little too big on me at the bottom bc I am more petite but made it work!

links_reviews_title: Loved the color of this dress! Got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: It ran a little bit big under the arm pits, but was still wearable!
This dress was comfortable, yet looked very formal. The bust was surprisingly large, though straps are adjustable. Consider sizing down.
Loved this dress!! Ran a little big, I'm typically a medium in dresses, but the SMR worked perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a wedding, the red stood out and was long enough to be worn at a formal venue
links_reviews_text: Top was a little loose but once tall fit was pretty spot on. Elegant, but comfortable enough to break it down on the dance floor!
The small was a little snug around my 36d bust. Otherwise very pretty.

links_reviews_title: Kind to bigger boobs. Spandex under won't show. Length was spot on.
links_reviews_text: Loved that the straps were adjustable. The thick material didn't show all flaws. The shape was flattering to my body type. My back up was the medium which has more fabric in the middle area and longer in length. Definitely would recommend!

I thought this dress was going to be slip-like material from the pictures, but it's actually quite thick. Not a bad thing, just not what I expected. I wore a size M, and the bust was actually a tad tight for my C-cup bust, but then the waist and bum area was big. I ended up pinning in the back to create more of a cinched waist. The color was beautiful and I definitely got compliments!

This was great for a date night with a leather jacket. It was classy sexy because it wasn't low cut, but still had the slit and the vibrant red, high quality fabric. Seriously thought about buying this one! So easy to just throw on and go.

i'm short so it's longer on me than on the model. i loved it. wore without a bra but you could see the inseam of the dress around the neckline. i had to steam it before i wore it because it held wrinkles easily from the garment bag. paired with a blazer cape and black heels
This dress was too baggy. I should have ordered M size. I’m 5’4 165lbs and D cup. It fit around my hips but was very loose in the armpit area.
As per size I am a true XS and this beautiful dress didn't work for me since the XS is more of a larger S size.
Should've listened to the other reviewers. The fit is just weird. Is not friendly for people with curves
Did not wear. Too small. Will try the medium.
too big
I'm usually a medium and this small was gaping around my bust. Also the material is not sheer, more of a sheath than a slip.
Too big around my breast a lot of extra fabric

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for casual Friday's at work
links_reviews_text: I loved the dress as soon as I put it on. I loved the way this dress made me feel throughout the day. Length is right about the knee and it's a super cozy fit. It has lots of stretch so I would size down in the future. Fabric is thick. Overall the dress is flattering and feminine.

links_reviews_title: Flattering and Forgiving in the Bust
links_reviews_text: Rented this for an animation meeting, I liked that the colors matched the cartoon (!). The dress is very comfortable and due to the stretchy material it doesn't tug around the bust, which is my continual struggle. The material is a medium weight and isn't super forgiving, so I'd be cautious or size up if your mid section is a problem area. The long flutter sleeves are super cute too. 100% adding this dress to my regular work meeting rentals list.
I like this dress a lot. Very comfortable. True to size especially with the thicker fabric.
Love this dress as it make your baby bump look so cute! Very comfortable and packs well for travel (doesn't wrinkle!!!). Will rent again.

I rented this dress as part of my very first rtr shipment mostly because I've never worn something like this before. The style is fun, with a circle-ish skirt and the flared sleeves. The fabric is thick enough to hide minor imperfections and is SUPER stretchy. As soon as I put it on I felt like a 1st grade teacher, possibly even one with a magic school bus... I wasn't thrilled with the fit, as the lines are not very forgiving for anyone with an hourglass or pear shaped figure, but it was fun enough for a day. I can say confidently that I will never buy this.
Eh, it's ok. Not actually that flattering over a pregnant belly, despite the room for stretch. Better for non maternity when it can hang straight
I dressed this dress down with vans and it was such a cute look! I'm 8 mos pregnant so being comfortable is my priority and this dress delivered.
This dress was super comfortable for my big baby bump. Got so many compliments. I had this for a while and actually dry cleaned it myself so I could hang onto it. Wore many times to work and for fun.

links_reviews_title: Didn't love but got a ton of compliments
links_reviews_text: This knit dress just wasn't that flattering in my opinion. The stripes are fun and certainly well made. Too form fitting even a size up to be shifty but too loose to give any shape. Added a belt. But again I got so so many compliments.
I loved the color and the shape! I wore it a few times for a few different occasions. It looked great with a bright sweater too. (Not pictured)

links_reviews_title: so many people loved this dress
links_reviews_text: great shift dress, soft material, lovely colors and leaves plenty of room for a growing baby bump. the rainbow of stripes make this look so fun I swapped out different color shoes and 3rd pieces to wear it a few times :)

Cute comfortable dress, it had a little more room than expected and the material was very giving. I thought on its own it was a little bland but with tights and a jacket or blazer it was really fun. Lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments, easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: Definitely hides your figure so that can be a plus of minus. Comfortable, probably would have looked cuter with a heel.
Comfy and striking. A little casual so wore with blazer. Tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to work with a pair of tights and knee length, suede boots. Perfect outfit.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me perfectly. I have an hourglass figure and am a little wider in the hips so the dress accentuated my curves very nicely.

I rented this to pair with a very colorful wool coat on a work trip to NY. It was comfortable and mostly flattering fit. Perfect stretch and length on me. I styled it with black tights and red suede booties with a red/teal/green tweed overcoat. Loved the whole look.
The large was too small so I got an extra large. It fit but just wasn't my style.

This dress is fabulous for work! It hit me right above the knee, and the long line of the stripes made me look taller & leaner. The cap sleeves hit at a flattering point on my upper arm (a problem area for me!) and, because of the way they're cut, don't pull the dress when you move your arms. The dress is super comfortable, which was wonderful for the long, long day I had. I loved that the cut was flattering and understated but the rainbow stripes were fun and a little whimsical (or is my bar for whimsy very low??). The only thing I didn't love was the was the stripes curved and distorted over my boobs. I'd rent this dress again.
good for work
This is by far my favorite rental. Super comfortable and versatile. Wore it to work, on a night out, and on a casual outing. It is comfty, flowy, colorful! Will definitely rent again.

It is a thicker material so great for early fall. It runs long but I am tall so worked for me. I also have a long torso and this is one of the only dresses where the waist hit me where it is supposed to. I would love to keep the dress apart from the price tag.
Day to night, great quality, vibrant colors
Draped awkwardly on me.
Good for work.
Nice fabric, super stretchy. I was feeling myself in this dress. The sleeves are kind of flouncy too which makes us a little nicer. Also super comfy. I wore for maternity too!
This is a gorgeous dress that fits beautifully and comfortably. It really popped with a bright chunky necklace and red earrings, plus a black jacket. I was very tempted to buy it.
Didn't wear, clinged in the wrong places, loved the colors and style over all. Just not for me.

links_reviews_title: Amazing Dress, Hard to Give Up
links_reviews_text: I am so tempted to buy this dress. Its fun, well made, and comfortable. the A line shape is very forgiving and the material has some stretch to it. Perfect for work or casual events. Falls at an appropriate length and the stripes are in a very nice pattern. I would 100% rent this again. I rented an XL, but think I could probably fit into the L as well, but it might be a little tighter. I would say size down if you want it to be more form fitting and stay true to size if you want more flow.
It fit so nicely!! Got so many complements. Only thing is that it stretches a little over my chest so the lines look curved haha but other than that, it's beautiful

links_reviews_title: Reviews said to size down but that didn't work for me!
links_reviews_text: Should have rented true size but didn't like enough to reorder.

I love this dress- it is so easy to just throw on and go. For a pear shape, it fits well without clinging or looking like a sack. I dressed it down with wedge sandals, but I think it could easily go a little dressier.
Loved it!
Very comfortable but definitely better for a long and lean body type. Forgiving but tended to make an hourglass figure look "blocky". It's a wear-it-once dress.
very well made. comfortable for work and daytime

links_reviews_title: Just did not work for small petite
links_reviews_text: Rented this with my unlimited and wanted to love it but I just couldn't get on board at the end and didn't end up wearing. The colors and the style are such a cute idea. But it was just a little too a line for my boyish figure and ended up making me look very wide in the waist. Also came past my knee as I am 5 2. You probably want to go down a size but as this was the smallest one, I had to send it back.
Wore this for work and loved it!! Got a million compliments.
This dress was a different material than I expected but it was super comfortable and fun for the office.

links_reviews_title: I love the pattern and quality of material.
links_reviews_text: The style is very flattering. I wore mine with a belt to cinch the waist some since it ran a little big. I used ally wear a size 10.
As stated above, fun and comfortable dress suitable for work. Probably would have looked even better minus my awkward mini-baby bump. Length was fine even with heels and my bump.
Standard work dress with a little fun (colors). Nice material

I ordered this skirt for an easy work-to-drinks after-work outfit and received so many compliments from my coworkers and random strangers. The material is light but there is a lot of it. It does bunch right around the waist which almost made me look like I had a little extra "fluff" around the middle. I actually ended up folding over the band which seemed to help a little, but I would recommend sizing down. I was okay with the length but it would probably be more flattering on someone a little taller.

I like this skirt for a one time wear. The fabric is much more vibrant than the RTR photos. It is a deep sky blue with a red, fuchsia, and orange paisley pattern. Great summer colors. The fabric is soft thin cotton. There is a lot of fabric so it is not the most figure flattering. My waist is my thinnest part and it looked like I had a big bump of tummy below the waist because of the fabric gathering. If you hold extra weight in your waist, this may not be a good fit. It fits with the waistband hitting just above the belly button.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a fabulous night with my best friend at a wine bar and to Korean BBQ!
links_reviews_text: Not great...this skirt wrinkles easily and is translucent. The fit was fine...I followed what other reviews said, as far as sizing was concerned, and found that the majority were right about sizing. The skirt is really, really cute...it just isn't worth the fuss of making sure it looks good.

links_reviews_title: Waist was too small; normally wear a 2 or 4 and ordered the 40 which is suppose to be size 4.
links_reviews_text: The fabric was more of a poplin like a button down shirt so it didn't really flow as it could have. It is also sheer as others have said. I would try another midi skirt, not this one.
I couldn't wear this :( it was way too tight. I rented a 44 which should have been a size up for me and it was uncomfortably tight
Lightweight, fun skirt. Unfortunately the waist runs super duper small so I couldn't wear it. Definitely size up on this one!
I didn't like the fit/style of this skirt. The waistband fit me around my belly button and then the full skirt started above my belly. Not flattering at all.

links_reviews_title: The waist did not fit me
links_reviews_text: Print was pretty but didn't end up wearing
The waist runs small. Material was somewhat scratchy and sheer. I did not wear.
I gotta of compliments but this wasn't a favorite for me. Super comfortable though. Allowed me to run around a work event all night long and still look cute.

links_reviews_title: From work to party. Loved❤️ it!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit!
Received several compliments on this dress it was fun to wear and no one else had one like it. It was really nice to wear, it was true to size.

This dress fit really well on my tall frame. My only complaint is that the size 12 fit tighter than the size 10. I recommend taking up their option of getting two sizes just in case. Overall, beautiful dress in person and the whole process of ordering and sending back was really easy!
Truly an easy fit all over. The color is a muted lavender. Not a stand out color, but a lovely dress all over.
Beautiful dress, a bit see through. It was too short for my body type.
This dress is true to size and very easy to wear. I did receive a ton of compliments all day at my Goddaughters baptism.

Normally I'm a 4/6. Everyone says this dress runs large so I did a 4....I wish I went with the 6. I like shift dresses that float away from the body. The 4 was much more fitted (not my usual style). I didn't have time to send it back for the 6 so I wore the 4. In pictures I thought it looked better than I felt in it.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, pretty, not too tight or fitted, classy, beautiful spring color.
links_reviews_text: Just right for Easter Sunday and fun with cowboy boots. I am a pear shape it complimented my figure. I got so many compliments. You will love this dress!! One negative is I wore it in 60 degree day and even with the lace it was somewhat warm

This dress was perfect for a spring wedding and received many compliments! Roomy enough in the waist for a night of eating and drinking yet did not fit like a bag! Loved the color and all the lace. Good quality too.
Loved!

Wore this to a work event to embrace spring vibes. It was nice but I wasn't in love with it. You should wear a strapless or skin tone bra with this as the straps will show in the back (and front, but that bothered me less). This dress has clearly been worn several times because the lace threads have begun unraveling slightly in places and is not as tight as I imagine it was originally.

I wore this to an afternoon spring wedding and it was perfect! I normally wear a size 8 but checked reviews and saw it runs big. I ordered an 8 and 6. The 6 was more form fitting (some may prefer that). The 8 hung just right and that is what I wore. I'm 5'10 and it wasn't too short on me. The sleeves were also very comfortable! Would definitely recommend.
This dress definitely runs large. I ended up belting it to make it fit better. Besides that, the dress is beautiful and comfy!

links_reviews_title: Got a ton of compliments on the dress.
links_reviews_text: Fit good, felt comfortable.

This definitely runs large! I normally wear an 8, and I wore this in a 6 (but maybe could've even done the 4). That being said it's beautiful! Very flattering, beautiful material and lace! It's a very light purple color, my favorite!
The dress was pretty, but a little short for my legs. I didn't wear it, but I thought it was a pretty dress
I rented this to wear to a fundraiser and ended up wearing it to several events. The color was a soft lavender. Good quality, fun for spring

I really liked this dress. I wore a size 10. I also got a size 8 as a back up and they both fit as if they were the same size. I received many compliments on it and it’s pretty comfortable to wear. Loved the color. Perfect for a wedding.
Runs large so order a size down. Great dress. Comfortable yet cute.
This dress is a gorgeous color and great fit. I received many compliments on this dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for my niece's wedding! The color was gorgeous.
links_reviews_text: I'm glad I read the reviews and ordered a size 10, down from my normal size 12. It an be hard to find a dress that not only fits my DDD chest but the rest of me too, and this one was perfect.

I am a size medium petite in dresses, so recently I've been wearing a size 8. Previous reviews said this dress ran large and to size down. I sized down two sizes and wore a 4 and it fit me fine but a 6 would have been roomier. I am 5"3 and 130 pounds. My measurements are 35-28.5/29-38 It was hard to zip up the dress by myself but i was able to get it ib
LOVED this dress! It was comfortable and the color was stunning. I received lots of compliments. I usually wear a 4, and the 2 was a better fit for me.
This dress was perfect. Such a pretty simple dress

This dress fit perfectly once I sized down. I'm almost always a size 6 and wore a size 4. Make sure you have a strapless bra for this dress - I didn't bring one and had to tuck in the straps. Also, it's heavier then it looks. I was pretty sweaty after a nite of dancing. Overall this dress was perfect for an outdoor wedding.

I rented this for a wedding and thank goodness I rented a back up because the dress runs VERY big, I wear a 8/10 and read reviews so I ordered a 8 and a 6 and the 6 was still WAY too big, and the lace is over starched and the sleeves were itchy. Beautiful color and pattern, but i would not reccomend

I really loved the color of this dress. It's so perfect for Spring! The lace is thick and high quality, but easy to move in and actually very comfortable. I did feel like this dress ran a bit big, so I'd recommend sizing down. It was definitely longer on me than on the model too, hitting me at my knee.
This is a beautiful dress in a lovely lilac color. I sized down because, as others mentioned, it does run big. A really, really pretty dress.
Beautiful dress, flattering and comfortable. Got lots of compliments.

Rented this suuuper last minute (day before!) and just crossed my finger the last size left fit me. I'm usually a size 2 and it fit well. I could have probably gotten away with a smaller size but I was comfortable in it and received compliments throughout the night! Perfect for Spring.

I ordered this dress to wear to a wedding. I wouldn't have chosen it based off the pictures, as the color appears white. However, I saw it in the store and fell in love with it. It is a light purple color, different than the pictures. It was comfortable to dance in, unlike other dresses with sleeves I have worn. Would definitely recommend.

I am a true extra small and this dress runs quite big! I ended up not taking it on my vacation but wearing it to a conference where it was more appropriate. If you are slim or a true size 0 or extra small it will definitely fit like a little tent. It is definitely a cute dress though and high quality, I still made it work
So comfortable... perfect for a warm afternoon wedding into a cool evening reception. Received a ton of compliments.

I love everything Shoshanna, and this dress did not disappoint! I'm sorry for the other gals who said it ran big. I thought it fit perfectly, and want to buy it! Felt pretty. Gorgeous color. Fit perfectly on me. And may not return it and just keep it forever and ever.
Very loose around the waist
True to size but not fitted. Very pretty.
The dress fit well and I really liked it.
Very cute dress. Perfect length and looks cute with a belt too. Would rent again
Dress was a little big on me but it was still very pretty on.

links_reviews_title: Wear to work by day and out by night. Versatile piece perfect for all day.
links_reviews_text: Extremely comfortable and cute. Perfect length and neckline for a casual work environment and dressy happy hour. Paired with knee high booties or could transition to spring with open toed heels!

links_reviews_title: Great for a regular day on campus or an event.
links_reviews_text: Love this dress! Super comfortable, gives great silhouette with the cinch at the waist, smooth feel of fabric. The slip does show on the neckline and I had to pin down some of the fabric at the waist. But the look makes it worth it.
This was such a fun dress. It's a little on the low cut side but I adjusted the slip and it was fine. Totally comfortable. Easy to dance in.
Lovely dress for a day out. Very comfortable yet fashionable!

The print on this dress is so cute. The awful part about it is the black lining underneath is not attached in anyway- I thought RTR accidentally sent me a wrong item because it comes separate. Because of this it rides up in a weird way. I safety pinned together to wear so it wouldn't move. That made it better. It also runs a little short. Just be advised

links_reviews_title: Flirty dress for all occasions, super cute!
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress with black tights and black suede cowboy booties and got a lot of compliments. I had to use a safety pin to keep the dresses pinned closed but no biggie! Like other reviews, this dress has no stretch, which is good to know so size up if in between. The flowing sleeves give this dress a little bit of an extra flair. Easily a dress for all occasions!
Super cute and the material was beautiful but there's really no stretch so you gotta be having a skinny day that day to button the side button

links_reviews_title: Great dress.. worn it to a baby shower. Got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: True to size and very flattering

Cute florals / colors can work for fall. Sleeves are super fun and material is light + silky. But, you definitely can't rent this dress without fashion tape on hand -- there is no way to stop the black slip underneath from showing unless you tape/pin/have a different slip (you can see this in other review photos). No rearranging works without a bit of extra help. Once I taped it down, it was great. I loved wearing it and will definitely rent again!

Loved this dress and got lots of compliments. As with other reviews, slip was a waste for me. Dress is VERY sheer. Slip and dress did not line up and kept moving... also neckline too low for my work environment. I simply wore dress over black tank top and leggings. Was very comfy and added a flare to workday clothes. I am not a floral person, but this one was so cute I could not pass it up!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for fall wedding but wouldn't rent again
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a family wedding and it is super cute! There is a slip layer and the dress is a wrap style. I wasn't sure which size would fit me best. Normally, I'd wear a medium but prefer to try on outfits first. The medium was too small but the large was too big where the slip underneath was showing in the chest area. The length was appropriate but I chose to wear tights because it was an outdoor wedding. If it fit me right, I'd certainly rent this again--otherwise, no complaints!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a bridal shower. I received so many compliments on the style and fit. Highly recommend. It was really comfy to wear.

Rented this to wear to a concert. It's super cute and flirty but oh boy, is it short. I'm 5'4'' and it's well above my knees. Luckily it was cold the night I wore it, so wearing over tights was just fine.

I rented the large based on other reviews. Although it fit since it's a wrap, I wish I'd gone with the medium. The slip that is separate is a true size Large and kept peeking out below and in the chest. I ended up using a safety pin to connect the dress in the front to hide the black slip. I would recommend the Large to those around my size (I'm a true size 8) but wear your own black slip. This dress is so feminine with the floral print and ruffles. I absolutely loved the sleeves! I will likely buy this dress.
Ran way too small

links_reviews_title: This dress is cute but completely sheer.
links_reviews_text: If you plan to rent, I would make sure you have some sort of slip to go under the dress.
Cute and fits but I should have gone a size up, I typically wear a medium. Very flattering and good length just should have gone a size up especially around the waist.

links_reviews_title: this is not what it looks like - it's two pieces
links_reviews_text: the slip shows through is not covered by the front of the dress in the bust, not as cute as it looks on the model in real life

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but ran too small for me (too much cleavage showing).
links_reviews_text: If you are large in the mid section it may not wrap enough to provide good coverage.

links_reviews_title: It was my high school class reunion.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and felt very comfortable in it. I had to pin the top together but after I did this, it was perfect.
It doesn't wrap perfectly, so the internal layer could always be seen. Not great

links_reviews_title: Very see through. I didnt notice until at the office...oops. cute fit.
links_reviews_text: Loved the colors and cut
Lightweight and dark florals. Pretty and flowy. Comes with a slip but deep V neck. I bought and added a snap to keep it closed

links_reviews_title: It's a beautiful dress and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Very flowly and beautiful! It's definitely low cut in the front so be aware.

links_reviews_title: Runs small but a great dress.
links_reviews_text: I read the reviews and it does run small. If you order a size up you should be fine. Light and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: snug and low cut on chest
links_reviews_text: A little snug...black slip rides up throughout the day. Probably should have worn a different slip with it.

links_reviews_title: Dress was very cute. Wore it for a baptism with some black heels. Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: The black under layer was a little big. The sheer over-lay was true to size.

I rented this for my rehearsal dinner and did not up wearing it. I am a pear shape and the bottom was too small, short and tight the top just hung down and open, exposing the slip underneath it. I wish it would have worked out, it has great potential for someone with a different build.
This dress is really big in the chest area. Not at all flattering. Very disappointed with this rental
This dress is layered (has a slip like dress). The slip is very small, straight cut with no stretch.
Dress is low cut even with included black slip. Otherwise cute. Not as short as I expected it to be.
too small, too short and paper thin material
Very cute!
This dress was great - it was a bit tricky to get the fit correct ( my chest was popping out, but I was able to get it secured correctly)
N/A
Runs small
Love this dress! For true to size just a little baggy around the bust. I wore this to a work event and parted it was black tights and knee high black boots.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it. Didn't fit breasts
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear it. Didn't fit breasts
Smallest XL ever received from RTR, suitable for a teen, very pretty

Throw some tights on and a cute pair of boots and this dress is perfect. It runs true to size, and can be worn with any standard bra. Great for any cups sizes and have a comfortable amount of room in the hip area. The sleeves are fun. Just a great piece overall

Chose this on unlimited as a possibility for an evening party in Mexico. Didn't wear it, as it was too gappy in the chest. Would work great for someone with legitimate cleavage. High marks for the design and fabric.

Loved this dress, I wore it several times for work and out with work friends. I had to add a cami to cover my breasts & paired it with a long cardigan to look more work appropriate. Would seriously consider purchasing this dress!
Fits really nice!
Spectacular!!!!!!! Elegant, sexy, fits great, don't wrinkles

I just never get tired of DVF. I'm 5'11 and I felt like the size 4 was made for me, fell to my ankle in flats. The snake print is gorgeous and the silk jersey perfection as always. Sometimes I wear a 6 in DVF so this may run big compared to other DVF styles. I wore for a date, on vacation, and plan keeping it for some work social events. Maybe I won't ever send it back...

The fabric is lightweight and stretchy and I like that the print has navy and pink, different than typical Black and white print. I tried to step out of my comfort zone with this one, but confirmed that I just don't like wrap dresses, the belted tie makes me feel like it accentuates my belly and the chest was cut too low for casual wear.

links_reviews_title: Very cute - pattern not for me
links_reviews_text: This dress was soooooo flattering shape wise on me. I actually ordered this dress because of the reviews saying it was more towards a pink blue black snakeskin, and I was! I have fair neutral skin and medium brown hair and this coloring pattern just looked funny on me so I didn't wear it. If this exact dress came in a solid or other pattern I would totally rent it and I could see how this dress would look good on others, just was t for me. It photographs VERY well.
This dress was comfortable and I felt put together. You can wear a regular bra. Very flattering and slimming look.

links_reviews_title: Jazzed up a low key night out
links_reviews_text: I have always thought maxi dresses were not for me, but this DVF wrap maxi expanded my horizons. It's super comfy, flattering and not-trying-too-hard sexy. I was surprised the print was navy and pink (I thought it was more black/grey from the photos), but I loved it. At 5'4-and-a-half and wearing pretty high wedge heels, the hem was brushing the ground which was totally fine but I could not have worn it with lower heels. I consider the low cut appropriate for evening but not daytime; it would need some help to make it appropriate for the office.

I grabbed this one as a backup for another dress and in the end chose this. I was surprised it wasn't too long (I'm 5'3") and was really flattering and especially slimming in photos. Got lots of compliments. Loved it.
Everyone saw everything when I tried this out at the grocery store. I had to hold the legs and chest together and push the shopping cart with my hips. So glad I didn't wear to work!

Loved this dress even though I did not end up wearing it - will definitely rent again once the weather warms up! Fits TTS, could be dressed up with heels or down with sneakers or flats. I am just under 5'4, and could still wear it with flats.

links_reviews_title: loved this dress.. lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: fit great .. typically a 2 but am a 4 in DVF - the wrap does swing open a bit for the slit while walking

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress and slight flare at bottom was fun
links_reviews_text: This fit beautifully and I had no problem with the bust. Did not gap and I'm a 36B. Amazing materially.

I think this is the first rap dress I ever wore. I did wear a Cami underneath of it it was too low-cut for me. It also was a little risqué when the wind blew with the slit in the front. Overall though I really liked it.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing it, but it looked great on.
links_reviews_text: Nice fit and hang.
Fits great
Lovely to have the snaps to hold bras straps. Everything stayed in place the whole night.
Nice weight to the silk jersey gave a flattering drape. Loved the fit.
Nice dress for an evening out. Love the DVF fit always!

links_reviews_title: It was a wonderful meal with my husband and 2 of our daughters.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and flattering dress. I wore it for one of the formal dinners on our cruise. The only slight downside is that because it is a wrap, the bottom portion doesn't stay put easily when sitting.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering dress! True wrap dress.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'4" hit right below the ankles great length. I wore with a tank top underneath so it wouldn't be too low.

links_reviews_title: Great fit, but needed a cami
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress--quality material and flattering fit (which isn't always true for maxi dresses on me), but definitely needed a cami for work.

I ordered 3 options for a party and this was the one I thought I'd be least likely to wear but it was fantastic. The fit was forgiving from the waist down and the snake print is fun/very on trend. I felt very studio54/70s but in a good way. Got many compliments. The dress also photographs well. I am a 4/6 who has been gaining weight the past few mos and the 6 fit easily. I would do true to size or size down in this.
Loved the easy, breezy and flattering wrap style. At closer look, the dress is actually NAVY and not black.

links_reviews_title: Great non-stuffy dress for a night out
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my husband's birthday dinner at a nice restaurant. The dress is incredibly comfortable, looked great, and came out of my suitcase wrinkle free. In the photos it looks grey, but it's actually purple in person.

I rented this bad boy for a "casual" day at work, not sure of how it would fit. As someone who's super tallish (5'10"), maxi dresses usually turn into awkward midis on me. This dress was a little bit longer than normal, which worked super well for me. The fit is INSANELY flattering and super comfortable on. The fabric is very soft and silky with a lot of stretch (without actually looking like it's stretched) and didn't feel too heavy even with the warmer CA weather. The color is surprisingly purple (more so than the photos), so be wary of that. All in all, totally loved this dress and will absolutely rent again.

I loved this romper, no special bra configuration needed. Casual but classy. Even wore sneakers with it for the hike to a military retirement event. I usually wear a 6 but was happy I ended up with the 8. Would rent or buy again for sure. Received lots of complements.
Only bad thing was the straps took a little time to adjust.
Fits true to size. Pockets were great.
I have a long torso so at times I felt like the shorts were riding up, but the fit was still perfect. I got tons of compliments!

I wore to an all white party at a vineyard. I ordered this outfit as a backup, but ended up wearing it because it was better suited for the outdoor summer event. I received a lot of compliments and was happy I decided to wear this one. It runs a bit large. I recommend ordering a size down for backup.

LOVED THIS! Would have purchased but a little more than I like to spend. Fit great. Nicer than average romper. I rented it for vacation but ended up wearing it to two separate work dinners that were more casual. It fit perfectly. It is a little poofy at the bottom. It didn't really bother me because it almost gave it an image of a dress. Rent this now!
The material is lightweight and the seer sucker is very cute. Easy to wear for everyday. Zipped is a little difficult and the design is almost too young - but still good for everyday wear.
This was the perfect romper for a walk on the beach. Structured and heavier fabric. Loved the shoulder detail, and the texture on the fabric. Would definitely rent again
Compliments all night! I love the straps and the flaps and the cinched waist.

I rented this for my honeymoon in the tropics and I got a ton of compliments. It was tight on my bust but would fit fine for someone else that's smaller. The material is great and not see through like I was expecting. I would rent again!
Very cute and comfy romper. Just sexy enough with heels, but not over the top. Back provides nice bum coverage. Would buy or rent again!

I love this romper, I'd buy it in a heartbeat. I often wear a 6 but I got this in a 4, but it was still a little roomy on the stomach and lower half. It was very comfortable and easy to wear, no need to tug or rearrange anything into the right places. It isn't sexy, but it's cute and really quite classy. I'll be wearing this for my bachelorette party on a beach.

links_reviews_title: This was such a cute outfit!
links_reviews_text: This runs TTS. If you're unsure size up because there is no give. It was lightweight and perfect for a summer shower in Florida. Really classy and appropriate
Super cute! Not sexy but cute! A little baggy in the material from the waist down.

This cute romper was a fashion statement all night. It was constructed well. I ordered a size up because I didn't know what to expect with this designer, but I probably could have stayed in my original size. Either way it still was super cute.
The color was a little grey because of frequent dry cleaning - a risk with any white item. But the fit was comfortable and flattering

My teenage daughter wore this for a summer party and it was perfect. Young but classy. The seersucker fabric makes it summery and the rose gold hardware on the straps dresses it up. Was a little loose but still flattering. Would rent again!
Fits perfect and is super comfy

links_reviews_title: Cute but just not my style.
links_reviews_text: Fit fine but it just did't fit my style.

links_reviews_title: It was too long! I am short so it wasnt the the romper, it was me :)
links_reviews_text: It was super cute! The material was nice and light. Would be great for summer

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a photo shoot.
links_reviews_text: This fit like an absolute glove and I loved it! It's roomy and not to tight but isn't baggy at all.

Really enjoyed the fabric and the ease of this look, can be dressed up or down depending on the accessories but overall great for all times of day! The arm bands can be a bit restricting but not extravagantly so. As a tall, busty girl, I have trouble with rompers however this one was able to accommodate impressively so!
N/A
don't have any

links_reviews_title: This was a fun romper to wear around town!
links_reviews_text: I appreciated that the straps adjust, but they kinda stick out the back. The fit was great, and I had a great time wearing this romper.

links_reviews_title: Really Cute and good for Pear shape
links_reviews_text: This romper was nice and light plus you can wear a regular bra with it. The zipper came fairly high on the back which would make it difficult to go to the bathroom. I got this romper as a back-up when my original back-up was unavailable.
