This dress is sexy and fun for a party! I wore it for my bachelorette party and got a lot of compliments. It's REALLY short though, so don't be thinking you can bend over, down, or any direction in this dress!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for after the wedding party.
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect to enjoy my wedding reception. I added a tulle skirt for effect and photography. But removed for line dancing. It was gorgeous. And sparkled awesomely. Loved it. Received tons of compliments.

This dress was a hit, I wore it for my bachelorette party and received so many compliments. The material is nice and thick so it does get a little hot while dancing but no worries about anything showing through. It was such a fun style and really made me stand out in the crowd. I would definitely recommend to any future brides!

links_reviews_title: Need a show-stopper? THIS is the dress. I will DEFINETLY rent Dress the Population pieces again.
links_reviews_text: Wore this as my 2nd dress for my wedding, it should have been my only dress! I received so many compliments, everyone loved this fun, SUPER sparkly dress as much as I did. I was nervous, being a 1st time RTR renter but all of the other reviews and photos put my mind at ease. I loved the keyhole opening in the back, I was able to wear my regular bra. This dress is SHORT. I'm 5' 1" and it hit well above the knee. Also, the arms were tight, but I do have meaty arms. The large was roomy, but I think I may have been uncomfortable in a Medium.

I ordered this for my bachelorette party and it was fantastic! I was a human disco ball and it was comfortable all night for dancing. I would not recommend renting this if you are not ready to be the center of attention :)
I loved this dress!! It's a bit heavy, but that's to be expected for a sequin dress. It's also lined really well so it's not itchy at all. I wore this for my bachelorette party and it was perfect!
Definitely makes you stand out in the crowd!
This dress was amazing! The fit was perfect and was just the right length. It looks great on and is a total head turner.

This dress is great for Vegas. It's comfy, and classy, but definitely short. I'm 5'7" 160lbs and a typical size 12- rented the L and XL but wore the XL for added length and it was "fingertip length" for me. It's very stretchy too! If you're renting for Vegas, FYI if you're having your rental sent to your hotel- be ready to pay another $20 in "handling fees." I had to pay $10 when picking up my dress at Guest Services. Also, track your package because mine arrived at the hotel 5 days early and I was worried they wouldn't hold on to it that long (luckily they did.) Also, don't bother trying to hunt down a UPS Dropbox. The most convenient place is a UPS Store at the Linq and I read before going that they also charge another $10 for "handling" even though the package is paid for and labeled. SO, check with Guest Services at your hotel. They will most likely send it out for you, still for the $10 but at least you'll save the trip to the Linq.
Loved this dress for my bach in Nashville. Talk girls be warned - barely covered my legs and I had to wear Nike shorts underneath.
I wore this dress to a cocktail style gala and everyone complimented me! When I shared pics on social media, even more people said they loved my dress!

links_reviews_title: Calling all Brides, Perfect Party Dress for a Bachelorette!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this gown. I wore it for my big night out during my bachelorette party in Savannah. I got loads of compliments. It sparkles like a dream, and is sexy without showing loads of skin. I ordered the Small and Medium. Both sizes worked, but I opted to wear the Medium, as it was a bit longer. The small was pretty short, especially if I raised my arms. The sequins did not bother or scratch my arms. Highly recommend for any brides. Nice that it’s not all white, but still makes you feel like a bride.
True to size. Absolutely a beautiful dress. Stood out all night!

I loved this dress and got a ton of compliments! As others mentioned, I can confirm it's very short - I'm 5'7" and I couldn't lift my arms without feeling self-conscious. But that didn't stop me from wearing it because it was so fun and it fit great otherwise :) It's not tight, but not a shift style either. I ordered a M and L and both were the same length, but the L felt too loose. Fun party dress, probably better on those ladies that have shorter legs/torso.

I got this for my bachelorette party and I was a little confused with the pattern in the pictures, but once I got it I realized that basically if you swipe the sequins one way they're white and the opposite way and their silver. I chose to swipe them all to the silver side as opposed to white and/or mixed. I got SO many compliments and I felt like a little disco ball. It was great! The dress is a little short (and I'm only 5'2" on a good day) but I wore "bloomers" underneath so I felt comfortable. I absolutely recommend!
Loved this dress!!! Fun, comfy, and fit true to size. Only con is that it is a lil short, but that didn't stop me from having a good time. Perfect dress for dancing!!!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for our wedding rehearsal dinner and it fit my mood and the atmosphere perfectly!
links_reviews_text: Really comfortable-although a bit heavy, super fun, definitely helps make you the center of attention. The only downside was the zipper was slightly difficult to work due to the sequins - but not a show stopper by any means!

Great statement dress, sequins made it a little bit uncomfortable to sit down and it was very short. I ordered the small and medium, the medium had a lot of room, but the small was way too short- and I am 5'1! Because it didn't have much shape, I felt like it was unforgiving in pictures and also you could see my bra through the keyhole in the back so I had to wear a backless bra. Overall a fun dress, I felt great in it at a gala at the art museum.

links_reviews_title: My bridal shower was fantastic! The dress topped off the day by shining through how I felt!
links_reviews_text: The fit was not exactly what I had hoped for when I saw the photo. It fit well but it wasn’t as flattering as I would have hoped. The neckline rose a bit high and it was uncomfortable after a few hours of getting up and sitting down. I thought it looked great though so I rated it 4 out of 5. Thank you for the prompt service and easy return!
very pleasantly surprised by how this turned out! Very cute and comfortable, perfect length for me as i am 5'6". got so many compliments and it photographs well!

links_reviews_title: I seriously am OBSESSED with this fun party dress!!!! This dress is a must wear!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit true to size! I could have worn the small but beware, this dress is HELLA short!! Ended up needing to wear tights bc the dress was so short! I ultimately went with the medium bc it was a little bit looser and a tad bit longer than the small!

Wore this to a winter white party and got compliments! Ordered a large with the XL as back up, ended up going with the XL because the weather warmed up and I didn’t want to wear tights with it. I’m 5’8 with a booty so I needed the extra inch of fabric to not completely expose myself. Other than that fit was great!

this dress made my birthday the best ever!!! I am usually a 6/8 and went with the M, if you're in between don't be scared to size down - there is a lot of forgiveness in the dress! This dress was perfect for my 21st birthday and I received so many compliments! I was hesitant to rent at first bc so many of the pictures of the dress I saw looked so different - some dull and some sparkly. I wanted a lot of sparkle so I just made that side of the sequins were showing all night! No biggie - rent it you won't regret

This dress is beautiful and was a show-stopper. The light catches the sparkles nicely and you look like a walking disco ball. As others noted, this dress is short so for my office party, I added leather leggings underneath to avoid flashing when on the dance floor.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments and photographs well!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a cocktail party in December, and it was definitely a show stopper! I received compliments all night, and I feel like it photographed really well too. I usually wear a size 2-4, and the small fit great (I even had a little extra room). However, the only reason I didn't give 5 stars was because I noticed some of the sequins were falling off throughout the night, and it was quite itchy under my armpits after a few hours.
I rented this for a girls night out in LA. It's SO COMFORTABLE and super flattering. The cut out in the back is high enough that you can still wear a regular bra. 10/10 would rent this again.

Looks grey-er than I expected, looked whiter on my monitor, but still nice. Given my cleavage-comfort-level, I'll be wearing this with a bandeau, but probably not necessary.. Totally bra friendly. There's lumpyness on the back because I have a short torso, but I think I'm comfortable with it's level (I am returning 2 dresses unworn because their lump levels were unacceptable to me). For your reference - my Size/Shape in these photos: 5'1", 145 lbs, 34DDD, "curvy" in the belly and bum, with a short torso. Pant size: 8-10 depending on the cut, they get stuck on my thighs or bum, and then can end up loose on the waist. OverBust: 38.5" Waist: 33.5" Hips: 40.5"

links_reviews_title: Great, fun dress. I wasn't over or under dressed - it was just perfect for a wedding guest.
links_reviews_text: True to size

Really accentuated my curves in a flattering way. However, it was really very low cut and there was no extra material to add a pin to close the top. Also, the skirt is a full wrap and blew open several times in the wind. There is a small liner but that barely covered my behind so didn't do much for modesty. It was almost a fantastic dress and would be amazing on someone with fewer curves
I wore this dress for race track event. It was a fun derby event and this dress was perfect. I received a ton of compliments. It was comfortable and very flattering.
I wasn't sure about the colours st first but it was very flattering on
Loved this but was so low cut I was embarrassed to go out in public.
didn't wear.
I received a ton of compliments on this dress. It was cute and comfy, but not something I will rent again. It's a faux wrap so you may have to pin the chest area...it loosened throughout the day.
I did not wear it as the zipper was not smoothed out. I guess the size overall fit me except I wasn't tall enough.

Ran true to size. The front did gap a little, so I did pin it in a couple of spots (along the waist and the bust). Otherwise, it was cute. The skirt did split open when I sat down, so I had to hold it together. But, it was a fun print.
Cons a bit short in the front.
Dress fits well and got tons of compliments - had to pin the chest area for work otherwise good to go!

My top is a 14 and my bottom is a 16. I wore a 14 and it fit perfectly. The dress is lined. It was a bit too low cut for me. I'm 5' 3" and it came to my knee. It looked equally cute with off-white pumps or white sneakers. Alas, no pockets.

it's pretty - i'll give it that. the print is different and really nice for summer. however, i will never for the life of me understand why so many of these dresses gape so crazy much in the bust, making them inappropriate for anyone with boobs (especially at work). i had to use TWO safety pins to pin this down so my boobs weren't out for everyone to see. length/sleeves are work appropriate, but beware if you have boobs. you'll have to pin it.

Great dress if you have a tummy, camouflages without the need of shape wear. Almost too much for the office, it's slightly too short (I'm 5'9 with long legs) and it's a little loose in the chest so views of the girls if you don't pin the top.
Fits true to size. Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments! Super comfortable
links_reviews_text: Runs a little small. I usually wear a 2, but the strap across my shoulder was really tight so I wore the 4 and was much more comfortable
Dress runs very true to size. I felt like an absolute princess and got compliments for everyone all night long! My favorite dress by far! Also extremely comfortable and breathe-able.

This is such a gorgeous dress! Super flattering and comfortable, allowed me to dance all night long! I wore the 10L even though my usual size is 8 and it was a little looser and more flattering in my opinion, but it does run true to size.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for Black Tie wedding!
links_reviews_text: I ended up renting this dress very last minute and it worked out! The top was a little bit loose so I kept having to pull it up, but it was a minor issue. Overall great dress! Received so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a black tie affair and got compliments all evening! Would rent again.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. I am 5'4" and the length was perfect when worn with 3" heels. Material was lightweight enough to be comfortable for dancing all evening and the slit also adds mobility.

I rented this dress for a formal wedding! Absolutely gorgeous And very comfortable. The size 4 fit but was not as comfortable as the 6, so I wore the 6. It was the most snug around the chest. I am a 34C , 5'3" and weigh 135. If you are short know that this dress will be long on you. I had to wear 5" heels and it was still a bit long

links_reviews_title: Beautiful black tie wedding in Mexico for 500 and I was the only one in this dress. That's a win!
links_reviews_text: Dress arrived clean and no wear and tear. Might have been brand new. I'm 5'4" so was nervous I'd be tripping on the dress but with heels, it worked out fine. If there had been a petite offered, I would have ordered that but only 8 regular was offered/available. Dress is form fitting so I needed a strapless bra and spanx. Would have been better with a one piece body shaper but didn't have time to go get that so had to make do. I think the dress was perfect for the occasion so was pleased with the whole experience. Will be back again as I've got a few more weddings coming up.

links_reviews_title: It fit and flattered beautifully. Tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit very well.

links_reviews_title: The perfect little black formal dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was fabulous!! I wore it to a formal wedding. The material is thick and good quality but also had a little stretch to it that made it easy to move in. Side note: it was a little on the form fitting side. It was classy with a little sass. I would 100% rent it again! For reference, I'm 5' 4" and wore approx. 3.5-4 in heels and it was a good length.

Absolutely stunning dress and very comfortable. Wore to a black tie optional wedding. I am 5'7 and the 0R was the perfect length. Only con was it was a little snug around the armpit but nothing I couldn't deal with. 10/10 would recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful and received compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: While the fit was a little snugger than anticipated, wearing spanx definitely helped - I ordered a 10 and 12, and I wore the 12. I'm typically a 10 though. I'm also glad I ordered the long. I'm 5'8, so with heels, the long was perfect! I would rent this dress again!

I ordered this for a formal wedding and received so many compliments! I loved the detail on the side of the dress. I also did not need to wear a bra with the dress. It was snug enough to provide support in that area. Definitely wear heels with this one.
Great dress, fit true to size. Felt amazing in it all night!! Very comfy!!

This was a beautiful black tie dress! Could not even come close to zipping the 0R but the 2R was a great fit. Nice and snug and well-made, no need for a bra. This is a VERY long dress for petites. I'm 5'3" and even with 5" heels it was hitting the ground. I wasn't surprised based on reviews but rented anyway because I liked the dress, and it was fine. But if you're shorter and don't already own extremely high heels, you will definitely need them to make it work. Worth it though! Great dress!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress BUT it runs small
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for the event I went to, but sadly it was tight at the top. Fit everywhere else. I have a fairly small toro so maybe going a size up would helps with comfort

This dress was amazing! I wore this for a formal black tie event and it was perfect. It was so comfortable, and elegant yet sexy with the slit and ruffle details. If I could change one thing would be the length. It is pretty long, but was okay with 4 inch heels (I'm 5'3 for reference). I received compliments all night long- would 100% recommend!

This dress Must run large because the 0R shockingly fit, while also being comfortable. **You will need another person to zip you into this dress. Super Long for my 5'1 height- carried trail with 4 inch heels i enrolled in the RTR unlimited subscription 2days before my event. This dress was only available in a 0R and 8R upon ordering. I'm usually a 2 or hemmed 4 in dresses, so i really did not expect this dress to fit, but figured id give it a try since I could order up to four items.

I definitely loved this dress! I got a ton of compliments. It fit beautifully, although I suggest sizing up one size. I ALWAYS wear a size 6, but had to wear the 8. It was comfortable and absolutely beautiful on.

links_reviews_title: Great dress to match a tux
links_reviews_text: I didn't need a bra the dress was perfect. Sexy but classy! Loved it
Fantastic dress. Comfortable and high quality. I had many compliments.
It was absolutely beautiful. Order a 8R and 10R went with the 10R for comfort it was a little lose on the top but not bad. The 8R was just a little tight around the bust area.

links_reviews_title: Classy with a touch of leg
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress. Received so many compliments. Felt like a million bucks

Rented for a southern wedding in July and it wasn't too hot, even though it's long. Material falls beautifully and it fit true to size (2R). It was pretty long, so for those vertically challenged (myself included) you need to rock some heels with it to not get swallowed.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for black tie optional wedding
links_reviews_text: Sleek, comfortable, stylish
This dress was perfect for the gala. It was comfortable and flattering. It's a bit long so petite women be sure to wear heels and be careful when stepping backwards in the dress.

I wore this dress for a black tie wedding and LOVED everything about it! For reference I'm 5'6, 119 lbs and I wore a size 0R. This dress hugs you in all the right places and was super comfortable to dance in. The material is thick enough where you can feel the quality of the dress, but it's not too thick/heavy to be in all night. Classy yet a showstopper at the same time!
This dress was perfect for a formal gala in the winter! The extra fabric on the neckline escalated how formal the dress was, while the actual shape was simple and easy to wear all night long!!!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, classic dress for formal occassion
links_reviews_text: Felt slinky and comfortable on. Very flattering. Decided to go with another more colorful option for the occassion, but thisnis a great dress!
This dress fit perfectly and was true to size! Very comfortable, but sophisticated and fun. I received many compliments!!

This dress was great. I recently had a baby and this was my first formal affair. This dress looked great and sort of hid my "mummy tummy". I used to wear a 2 before pregnancy and have been wearing a 4 or 6 since giving birth. I needed a 10 in this dress.

Worn to a black tie optional wedding. Ordered 2R and 4R. I'm 5'5" and wore with 3 in heels. 2R fit tighter throughout and was shorter (revealed shoes more). 4R was more flattering and slightly touched the ground. Slit was not revealing. Would recommend -- very classy and elegant.

I wore this dress to a work gala. This was a backup dress to my original order and at first I doubted it because of the ruffles. However, I absolutely fell in love! It fit every curve just right and was made of great material. The ruffles were unique and the slot felt super sexy. I definitely recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Held with amazing people in a wonderful venue.
links_reviews_text: Fit well since I ordered a size up.

links_reviews_title: Elegant and comfortable for black-tie and lots of dancing.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit just right and I opted to not wear a bra, that worked out fine. The only trouble was that it was a little too long for my heel height. I have really small feet so it's too painful to do more than two or so inches.... no real problem though I just had to lift it slightly while dancing and walking. Generally it was a very flattering dress.

links_reviews_title: It's a beautiful dress. It's classy and simple but the details make it stand out. Loved it.
links_reviews_text: I'm 130lbs and 5'3. After having a baby recently I still have insecurities with my midsection and was trying to rent a formal dress that didn't accentuate these. This was perfect. I wore the 2R and felt beautiful. I will say if you're 5'3 even with decent sized heels this dress was a little too long but still workable. Would absolutely recommend for any type of formal event.

I'm 5'2" and 115 lb. I wore 4-inch heels - it was 1 inch too long so I had to use Hem tape. The Size 2 fit me better in the body but was 1.5 inches too long so I went with the smaller size. I am pear shaped so the 0 was a little tight on my booty. Material is thicker, slit is too high to wear spanx! Overall felt very glam but wish it wasn't so long!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, runs true to size.
links_reviews_text: Top is a tad loose for not so busty women. Other than that stunning.
This dress was fantastic! It was super comfortable and received tons of compliments.
I wore this to a wedding and felt comfortable all night! Dress is very classy.

Wore for my bridal shower at work. It's amazingly soft, lightweight, and doesn't wrinkle. Fully lined, and not see through at all. I read the reviews and sized up, so this fit perfectly. So classy, rent this dress!!

The dress what beautiful and detailed. Even though it looked heavy in the pics, it was fairly light. Definitely size up, maybe two sizes up. I wear a six normally and first ordered the 10 and it was still to small! Got it in the 12 and it fit perfectly

links_reviews_title: Does not work for straight body type
links_reviews_text: It runs small that it is difficult to get in. The style does not work for my body type, but I can see it work for someone with an hourglass figure and delicate features.

links_reviews_title: Feminine, lightweight, and comfortable for hot weather travel.
links_reviews_text: My husband and I loved this dress. Beautiful neckline, silhouette, lovely embroidery in a subtle and feminine color, and absolutely loved the feel of the fabric. Wish I could've kept it. It was perfect for travel to 90-degree and humid Singapore. Light and flowing fabric that steamed well and laid nicely after 10 days in a suitcase.

links_reviews_title: Great in theory, not so much in design
links_reviews_text: Fit great everywhere except stomach. It was baggy and would bunch when I walked.

I am normally a 4/6 and wore this in a 12. I could have probably worn a 10, but overall small fit. Cuts low in front so you can't wear a bra; I wore the petal nipple Covers. The fabric of the dress is amazing, so light and flowy. Very pretty and feminine pattern. Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful summer dress for charity dinner!
links_reviews_text: This was a beautiful summer dress perfect for a charity dinner on the beach. Fit true to size and fabric was light and airy. Would definitely rent again!
Wore this to Lollapalooza and I've never gotten so many compliments in my life. Beautiful and lightweight. Low cut so I wore a lace bandeau underneath.

Such a pretty dress. However, it does run very small and has no stretch. The make of the dress is very straight, so if you are curvy, you will feel that the dress is tighter in the hips. I suggest sizing up! I am usually a size 0, but I wore this size US 2 and it was still a little tight. A standard bra works with this dress, but I did not wear one.

This dress is very feminine, dainty, sweet. It's too dressy/low cut for my workplace but perfect for daytime special events/dates. I had to size up from usual 6 to 8 since no stretch in ribcage/waist (I often have to do this with dresses that have no stretch), this made the top a tiny bit big for me. If you have any curves you will probably need to size up. Came to mid-calf on me. Semi-sheer from mid-thigh.

What an UNDERRATED dress!!!! I was worried this dress would be too informal for my simple, cocktail wedding, but the fabric was SO delicate and flowing, the fit was right on - I'm pregnant and my breasts are just the right size for the 8, with room in the middle for a growing bump. It's not fitted throughout, but still very flattering. I felt like a goddamn fairy, you guys. So pretty.
It's a lovely dress but it was too low cut for church or work. I wore a denim jacket over it.
This runs VERY small- order 1 size up

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, little tight on me.
links_reviews_text: Should wear size up.
Gorgeous dress but extremely low cut. Your bra will be showing all night. I covered it with my hair but I wouldn't want to wear this one if modesty was needed

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress. Super dainty and frilly. Very feminine.
links_reviews_text: Stunning dress. Just super tight in the bust. Couldn't wear.

I loved the fit of this, the tiers lay flat nicely but have good movement. the only bad feedback is around the chest - it has no darting for boobs, and is quite low and tight so it causes some weird looking cleavage.
Could not even get this dress on. Beautiful, but not even close to true to size.

links_reviews_title: This is an absolutely gorgeous dress. I got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I typically wouldn't pick this dress out, but I tried it on at the RTR store and it fit beautifully! I didn't get it for a specific occasion, but it was perfect for my mom's retirement party. You can dress it up with heels, or dress it down with flats and a jean jacket. The only con is that it's white so you can't wear it to a wedding.

This was a replacement for another dress. It's a beautiful, delicate dress that runs small. I'm normally a 4/6 and the inner layer inside this 8 was very tight and riding up. It did not look good on me, I think it would be ideal for a tall and thin person.

I am generally a 0/2, and this dress fit beautifully on me. I am quite small busted and it was a tad snug in the bust but definitely manageable and even comfortable. I love the design, material. It is ethereal, beautiful, and just a perfect dress overall.

links_reviews_title: Great summer/spring dress - low cut and not work appropriate if big busted
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, it was beautiful and the loved the tier layers.... super light weight but didn't wrinkle after sitting. Only drawback is it isn't work appropriate if you have a larger bust, it shows just a smidge too much cleavage. but would totally be perfect for a wedding/bridal shower/baby shower etc. Would recommend
Great dress! Received a lot of compliments. However, the mid section was big on me. Wanted to order a size down but wasn't available.

Complaints all night for the color and unique neckline. Comfortable for cocktail event. Neckline did take a few minutes and additional help to clip and snap together (note in case traveling alone or getting ready solo).
It has a relaxed fit and bunches up in the middle. I did not mind this.

One of my favorite rentals so far for work. Very comfortable and flattering fit. The fabric is thick and great quality. I love the design of the dress. I felt very professional and have already worn this dress a few times. I will keep this as a go to dress for work.
The dress fit perfectly
Im small in the breast so the side boob kept showing but the dress was perfect and i felt sexy and classy. Got compliments all night. Definitely a beautiful dress and worth renting for your event!
Lots of compliments felt wonderful on. My husband loved the dress on me.
Had my eye on this for a while and so glad I rented it

I really wanted this dress to work. It's BEAUTIFUL and I love the silky fabric and color. It's a stunner in person. However, it doesn't work for anyone with curves. It was tight in the hips, but weirdly loose in the chest. Would look lovely on someone slim!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and elegant style and color!
links_reviews_text: This dress is absolutely beautiful once you find the size that fits you. I originally ordered a 40 and while the top was fine, the hips were too tight. I would recommend ordering up a size or two, especially if you have a fuller bottom. The fabric does not have any stretch or give. Felt absolutely glamorous styling it with my hair up, chandelier earrings and black strappy heels!

links_reviews_title: Color was great and very stylish!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a night out in Vegas!

links_reviews_title: The dress was not only beautiful but incredibly comfortable. Highly recommend it!
links_reviews_text: Great, comfy fit. Very happy!

links_reviews_title: Just right for a Miami night!
links_reviews_text: Super chic! I got so many compliments on this dress! It does run a bit big. If I wore a regular bra, it would show. I had to wear a sticky bra so it wouldn't show. It does wrinkle easily as well! Otherwise it was very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a wedding. I can only say that the color is so vibrant it stands up on its own.
links_reviews_text: This is an amazing dress. The color is a showstopper!.I wore very simple but elegant earrings in a fine bracelet as this dress does not need much jewelry. My only concern was that it was very loose at the top and there is no room for adjustments. The bottom can be a little tight even if you wear spanx.I would rent this dress again!

Gorgeous color and cut. You dont need jewelry to complete the look but you might want spanx because the dress has no shape and can tend to make you look like you have a tummy. I was able to wear a strapless bra.
Had to tuck in for a shirt. Dress just was flattering on me, but eneded up loving it.
Pros: Fit great, beautiful blue color, gorgeous silk and elegant design. Cons: Clings in some places, material is fairly thin so may not be able to wear a bra/undergarments.

I donned this classy but sexy dress for a Party affair for NyE. The vibrant blue color was amazing as it stood out among the sea of sequins. Felt like the Belle of the Ball in this chic, stylish, sophisticated number. The dress runs small since its an italian designer so RTR personal stylist suggested i sized up to a size 8. So glad i did, b/c it fit perfect on my 5'1,pear sized frame. Large breast are not a problem im a D and felt completely comfortable. The silk - tie, high neck just makes this dress a wow one! Would rent again. Now hubby is a RTR fan.

There werent any reviews but i have unlimited so i rented a few options including this little number. I went a size up to be safe since I dont know this designer well. The size up was unneccesary, my normal size would have been fine. In fact, my strapless bra popped out on the side a bit too much so i probably would have had to go braless. The right size probably would have solved that problem. The dress is roomy in general so normal size is safe. The material is a tad thin, probably my only bugaboo about the piece, but the color is stunning and impossible to miss. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear the dress, the fit wasn't flattering in the hips.

links_reviews_text: not 4 me

links_reviews_title: I was not able to wear this dress.
links_reviews_text: I love the design and material of this dress! The color is also beautiful. I believe it would look beautiful on someone very tall and thin, or someone with a much larger chest. On me, it was large in the chest and gaped in the arms. It was also confusing trying to figure out how to get the neck attached correctly and to look right.
I didn't end up wearing this one. Was tight in the hips and just weird up top.
I really wanted this to work but it didn't. The neck was too tight and the waist too baggy.

This dress runs EXTREMELY large. Size 2-3 sizes down. I didn't end up wearing because it was too big. I also for the life of me couldn't figure out how to wear it! It's a bit confusing. Beautiful dress and great quality, wish it worked!

links_reviews_title: Looks and feels expensive, but lays weird on the body.
links_reviews_text: I so badly wanted to love this. When it came the color and fabric were so beautiful but I have a straight frame and it fell weird making me look larger than I am.
Didn't get to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Do not rent unless you're very tall
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fabric/color. The fit was SO awkward, fit on hips but loose everywhere else. Also super long. Felt like I was wearing a sack. Do not recommend renting

links_reviews_title: Too young a look for me. I'm over 50.
links_reviews_text: Fit fine
a 4 was swimming on me, couldn't wear it!
I tried this size and the size up. I am 5' 1" and they were both large on me. I felt the material was thicker and heavier than what I imagined or wanted. Neck piece is awkward
Easy to wear, loose fit. Received lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: I didn't get to wear it unfortunately
links_reviews_text: The dress itself is well made but the size ran a bit big and didn't fit the way it showed in the photo. There was some bunching in places and isn't flattering for someone with a more curvy figure.

links_reviews_title: didn't like the baggy fit around my middle
links_reviews_text: beautiful color but didn't fit and didn't wear
Runs very small
It was too big from chest
It fit my bum but was loose everywhere else. Might be better for a taller person

links_reviews_title: This blue is stunning! An attention grabber for sure
links_reviews_text: The snaps around the neck kept coming undone most of the night. It's meant to be snug but it pulls when you sit down unsnapping the dress. The snap is hidden though so there was no wardrobe failure because of it.
Loved this dress and will rent again. very unique

links_reviews_title: Really loved this but was too long on me.
links_reviews_text: Everything was so beautiful - only downfall was the clasp on the neck didn't want to stay connected.

links_reviews_title: Wore for engagement photos, stunning in pics, might be best for smaller chest girls
links_reviews_text: The dress has a stretch material around the rib cage. It has a lot of give. I am 34 DD and was able to fit into an extra small. If shoot straight on and you are more endowed, it can make you look larger. Overall, I loved it and was great to wear. Not a heavy material, easy to move in and was really happy with the length (5'7" and I'm not wearing heels)
Was absolutely perfect and also the fit was amazing. The quality is definitely designer. It is nice and flowy and great for a hot day.

Such a cute flowy, long (if you order the long), beautiful pattern. It just flows when you walk. You can wear the sleeves or just pull them down and it just blends in with the ruffles. It did have boning and was a bit tight getting zipped in the back, so if you're chesty the smaller sizes might be tough. Wore on a trip to Miami and am keeping to take to Martha's Vineyard!

links_reviews_title: Had to pin it together but it looked GOOD.
links_reviews_text: I have never received as many compliments on a dress as I did on this one. Absolutely perfect for going on a boat and ruffling in the breeze. The side panels were majorly stretched out -- I had to pin them together. Other than that, a beautiful dress and one I'll never forget. One guy told me I looked like a privileged pirate and another told me I looked like Dutch pottery.
Great and comfortable dress.
I'm pretty top heavy but that wasn't a problem!

I was on vacation in Mexico and I somehow managed to get food poisoning. Our first dinner out after the storm was over, I was not in the mood to dress up....I put on this dress and it was so effortless but looked great and fit great! It was a little big in the chest, and I'm 32D....but it wasn't too big to function! Very flows and light and hits the floor at the right spot!

Perfect dress for my honeymoon. I actually ended up wearing it more than once! I received so many compliments on this. I have a smaller bust so I was worried about the top staying up, but it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a surprise engagement shoot
links_reviews_text: This fit perfect! My boyfriend surprised me with a photo shoot on the beach and an engagement and I couldn't ask for a better dress
Wore this on a cruise with my best friend and was complimented by strangers repeatedly. If you're tall this is for you! Didn't need to wear a bra which is always liberating!
Beautiful and so comfortable! I received many compliments. I'm 5'8 and wore flats since it was a beach wedding. The length was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous off the shoulder dress perfect for a dinner event.
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress, unfortunately I could only give it 4 stars due to the fact it was made enormous on the top. The large fit my size 10 body very well except in the top. I'm smaller in the top but you would need to be very filled out in order to properly fit it. I did end up using clothing tape to keep the top close to my body so that when I bent over it wouldn't gap. Couldn't even tell it was taped and the rest of it looked great all night. I'm 5'5" and wore it with flat sandals. It was a little long for flats but with even a small heel it would have been a better length.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and stylish, perfect for a beach wedding
links_reviews_text: Fitted with boning throughout the torso. Dress is beautiful and flowy. Super fun to wear and didn't need any sort of bra. Would have worn a small, but the zipper was broken and the medium ended up working out, just a little extra room at the waist. I wore flats and the length was perfect (I'm 5'8")

This dress was so beautiful and fun for a beach wedding! There was enough boning/structure in the top that I was able to wear it comfortably without a bra. It was a little long, but the long was the only size available when I was ordering. I was able to pin it up and it looked fine. I’m sure the regular would’ve been a better length. I would definitely rent this dress again!
I wore this dress for my engagement pictures. I loved it and received many compliments! It does sit lower on your chest so I had to worry about cleavage but otherwise it was great.

links_reviews_title: It was very flattering. I loved it!
links_reviews_text: It was very long, but very flattering and sexy.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but tight in ribs!
links_reviews_text: As always I received many compliments. The overall fit of the dress was fine except right at the waist there is a very tight seem that made it almost unbearable. I wanted to get out of the dress most of the night! Have it 4 Stars because it looked nice and every other part of the dress fit fine

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress that feels so soft and flowy
links_reviews_text: The wedding was unfortunately cancelled so I wasn't able to get to wear it but I did try it on and it was beautiful!! I was a little surprised that it ran a bit big on me in comparison to other people that had similar body types and measurements

I am 5'8 and rented this in a medium in the regular length based on reviews and it was the perfect length. I wore this on vacation and it was comfortable and very flattering. Typically I do not care for a drop waist, but when angling my body to the side for a picture, it removed the drop waist look. I received many compliments when wearing this dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and comfortable, but long & low
links_reviews_text: Pros: unique, lovely cut and print. Very flattering. Lightweight fabric. Cons: too long on me at 5'3" and too loose in the chest for 34B cup. Hung very low on my chest.

I am normally a 4 and I went with a medium because that's all that was available. I really wish I had gotten a small. The medium was big. Also hard to wear with flats I had to tuck it up so I didn't trip over it
Love this dress! Wore in Napa to the wineries and it was just perfect! Light, flowy, and flattering. Dress up or down! Highly recommend!
Loved this dress and got a ton of compliments at an event. Fit like a glove. Would totally rent again.
The drop waist pattern on this dress is surprisingly flattering. Very comfortable. Loved the length. Plenty of compliments.
Lovely flow and very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: So this dress is beautiful but it was tough to get on for maternity
links_reviews_text: This dress is listed when you search for 3rd trimester maternity- however it was TIGHT. It has ribbing in the rib cage and as a pregnant woman- that area is hard. BUT I was able to get it on and suffer through the tightness for 30 min of maternity photos. I would love to rent this again after pregnancy! I got tons of compliments on it.

This was a beautiful dress that I rented for my brother's graduation party. The XS regular was not available (I'm 5'7) so I decided to rent the XS long and S regular for a backup. Both dresses were big on me, but I decided to go with the XS because the S was swimming on me. The chest area was still a little big and kept falling forward to the point where I wish I had double sided tape to hold it in place. I also decided not to wear the sleeves because of this reason - I just let them hang so the dress was strapless. I also had to tie the bottom of the dress because it was CRAZY long! I would've loved the overall fit of the dress had it fit like I was hoping. I definitely think it runs big and would be a good dress for women with a bigger chest.

links_reviews_title: Very cute dress, lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress and print, I will say it was a tad big up top which is rare for me (34D) but the rest of the dress fit perfectly and was so fun!
The way this dress is sown shows the attention to detail in quality. The seem down the middle forms a perfect V that just shaped you beautifully. Loved wearing this for my birthday in Curaçao

The dress is gorgeous. Received a lot of compliments throughout the night. The dress was going to be long on me as I'm 5'1 with a short torso. But I was able to wear this beauty by tucking the extra fabric and hiding it under the wire. I was surprised that the dress had a wire built around the midsection area. I also wore the sleeves up as I wanted to show less cleavage. Because the sleeve has elastic bands, I was able to wear the sleeves up without an issue. Overall lovely rental, great for vacation, summer weddings, or smart casual warm weather events!

links_reviews_title: This dress was great for an outdoor spring wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for an outdoor spring wedding! I usually wear a medium but wore a small in this dress and it fit great. The length was great for me. I wore about 2 inch heels and it did not drag the ground and I was able to dance all night. The material is light and comfortable. The straps did dig into my arms a little bit and I had a little bit of irritation the next day, but it would not stop me from ordering this dress again. Overall, a great dress and fits well!

I rented this dress for a co-ed wedding shower thrown for my fiancé and I. It was held outdoors and when I first rented it the weather was supposed to be high 70s...it ended up being low-mid 60s but I just put a jean jacket over it and it was perfect. I had to order the small long because the small regular wasn't available. I did have to wear about 2 inch wedges with it so it wasn't dragging the ground. It was so comfortable and I loved it! The print made it more fun than the all white dresses I have been wearing for other wedding showers.

This dress was SO LONG. I did not feel like wearing heels, so I folded it under and added a wide belt. Worked like a charm. Many compliments. Even when paired with my 4" heels it dragged the floor a little.
This dress is very pretty and I felt great in it! I am only 5'3 so it was very long on me even with heels. Great for formal night on our cruise! I got a lot of compliments!

links_reviews_title: SO PERFECT for a beach wedding!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a beach wedding in Florida, and it was more amazing than I could have imagined. I usually wear a 10-12 in dresses, and the large fit well. A tiny bit snug, but not to the point that I would say it didn't fit. I am 6' tall and the long length was perfect with flats. The sleeves were elastic and were comfortable around my arms. I did not need to wear a bra with the dress either which was a huge plus.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a family photo shoot on the beach and it was absolutely beautiful.
links_reviews_text: The off the shoulder sleeves could be bothersome if you are constantly moving. If you have a larger bust like myself I had to adjust a few times so I wore a strapless. Super flowy and very flattering.
Pros: Very flattering, comfortable for outdoors, lots of compliments Cons: Little/no stretch in the silhouette

Wore this dress on vacation in Grand Cayman and it was perfect. The off the shoulder sleeves were fun and flirty and the colors were perfect for a beach vacation. The dress does have a lot of fabric so it is on the heavier side. This is great for the cooler evenings but the dress can't be knotted up in the front like other maxis, the weight in one area pulls the dress down. Loved the dress and would rent again.
Super cute greath fit and super compfy runs true to size
Very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Very sexy but somehow also comfortable!
links_reviews_text: This is not a dress style that I would wear regularly, as it's quite short and tight, but I really enjoyed it for an evening! The fabric through the bust is really comfortable but close-fitting, so I wore it without anything else on underneath. The drapey fabric is super soft and lustrous. Very luxurious!

I am generally blessed with the ability to be able to wear most designs. Not this one. It was laughable how horrible it was on and I'm still not sure that I was wearing it correctly. I also think it was broken when I got it. I absolutely agree that this dress should come with an instruction manual. I thought it would be a cool "fashion" piece that would be "lady-hot;" it was not. Worth noting though that the materials used are beautiful and very high quality. All the more frustrating that it is impossible to wear.
This dress is so different and unique I absolutely loved wearing it. It does run very small though I'm typically a 4 and sized up to an 8.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful style, material and cut but runs VERY small
links_reviews_text: Ran very small was not able to wear it.
This wasnt even close to fitting... it runs extremely small! Made from awesome materials but should come with instructions bc it was not easy to figure out AT ALL. lol
The dress is a puzzle to get on. Actually never wore it because I couldn't figure it out. Fashion doesn't need to be this complicated.
I loved this. As other reviews state, it is a bit of a puzzle to put on but once it's there, feels effortless. Would 100% rent again.

This dress just did not work for me. It came with the bottom of the dress untucked and the upper part un wrapped. I couldn't figure out how to tuck it or arrange it so that it looked like the pictures. I would not recommend renting this dress. Rent the runway should sew the pieces into place to make it easier for the renter.
Twist design was a bit challenging to get on. I got 38 and am normally a 4 and it was a bit of a sausage in casing look being a size or so too small. Didn't end up wearing.

This dress has pretty colors and nice fabric, but it was IMPOSSIBLE to figure out how to put it on. It was also incredibly small. I couldn't even remotely zip it over my ribs and I am always a size 6 in dresses and pants. Just not a practical dress.

links_reviews_title: Couldn't figure out how to get this on
links_reviews_text: Literally couldn't figure out how to wear this...very confusing!

I wanted to love this dress....but I couldn't get it on. Once I pulled it out of the bag I knew I was in trouble. The draping was twisted and I literally could not find the leg hole. I hope someone else has a better experience with this one because the colors are beautiful! I am usually a 4/6 and though I did not get the dress figured out I would certainly advise sizing up.

I seriously do not know who could fit into this dress. I would love a stylist review because it seems like it fits great on the model and I love it in pictures. I couldn't squeeze it over one leg practically. I am a standard size 4 and got the equivalent

This is the second time I have rented this dress for an event. It hugs your curved in all the right areas and comes below your knee. I'm 5' 10" so on me it's below my knee. The back has a flattering detail w the zipper that runs the length of the dress w a back slit. The top is a little baggy to accommodate a strapless bra. It's a fabulous dress.
It fit well and is slimming, I chose to wear no bra and it was fine! My only complaint is the the large zipper in the back.
Such a gorgeous dress! Perfect for a Christmas party! The 4R fit perfectly but was a little loose up top. The zipper detail down the back just adds a little extra!

links_reviews_title: This dress was simple but gorgeous.
links_reviews_text: True to size but would recommend sizing down for small busts.

I ordered this for a work at home pick me up and had to take it off in less than an hour. The sequins literally scratched and marked me on my thighs and upper arm while just taking the picture and sitting calmly at my desk for a short while. I can't imagine how marked up I'd be if I was dancing and added alcohol. I'm a curvy girl but size 10 is my go to and this was tight. See my belly bottom tight. The look is fab tho! I really loved the look. Size up and may reduce scratching.
Loved this dress. It is very sexy and short so be prepared for that. Size 4 is my normal size and the size 4 dress fit perfectly! Would love to find a reason to rent this one again!!

I am someone who does not wear pink, or sequence. This dress for perfect and I received so many compliments. I did end up with terrible chaffing on my arms, but it was worth it! So sexy while classy. I did a Smokey eye with pink shades for makeup.
True to size. Loved the one shoulder and the pink was fun!
Felt like a Barbie doll! Loved the dress. The dress fit well around my bust but was lose around my waist. Super cute dress but needed the larger size for length bc I am tall (5'9")
Body skimming but not tight. Solid for dancing, sequins only scratched if the lining rode up. So sparkly and fun, lots of compliments

Fit true to size and very fun to wear. I'm a curvy, short girl and it worked fine for me. The only issue I had was that I was in jeopardy of a boob slip on the strapless side, lol. I felt like I had to keep pulling it up on that side. Might not be an issue for a less chesty girl.

links_reviews_title: Ill fitted but cool Barbie for grown ups material
links_reviews_text: Live for the pink glitter look on NYE but this just didn't fit well. Maybe better if you have less curves. Too right on the top and over my bottom and huge in the waist. Might have been better to size up and try to wear like a shift dress but I was hoping for something form fitted. Wore something else!
Beautiful material and color but the straps were too long. Made the fit of the bodice wonky.

I was extremely excited about this dress, but it is definitely not for my long legged crew! This dress fit great except for I ran out of dress! Didn't event cover my butt. Probably great for our petite friends out there!

very cute. it was a little large on me in the chest area so the strap & hanger hooks kept showing. wit fit well in all the other places though. I might try a 10 next time, Still a gorgeousk glowing party dress!

I rented this for my brothers wedding, unfortunately he ended up having a backyard quarantine wedding with immediate family only but I still wore it. I got tons of compliments on the photos, everyone loved it. Perfect stretch for 33 weeks of pregnancy.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a baby shower!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress at 32 weeks pregnant to my baby shower and received a ton of compliments on it. I ordered both the small and medium but if you're bustier or want a little more room in the arms I would go for the medium. I loved this dress and would definitely order again.
I wore this cute little dress to my bridal shower. It was elegant and classy with just a hint of sexy. The material was high quality and had lots of stretch. Very flattering fit.

The dress was very comfortable. I ordered a small and medium as my back up. The small was a size 2 and the medium was size 6. I really could have used a size 4 (which is still in the small category) as the dress is very form fitting but it wasn't available. Since the material is thick and stretchy I made it work and it still looked nice. The size 6 was too big. Highly recommend this dress-I got compliments all night!!

Loved this dress! Received so many compliments! It was a little difficult to open presents because you had to keep adjusting the shoulders but I would put up with that over and over because this dress made me feel fabulous at 34 weeks pregnant!! Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: I wore this beautiful dress for my baby shower at 31 weeks. I’m 5’6, 150lbs at the time.
links_reviews_text: This dress was very flattering and I received so many compliments. The material was thick and form fitting. Very pretty color. I recommend this dress!
Not the best photo--but this dress was classy and comfortable! I wore this to a corporate party on a yacht in January in California and stayed warm. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: You're gonna look hot in this dress!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my work holiday party. In a sea of basic dresses, this one made me stand out! I received so many compliments. Definitely worth it!! I actually want to purchase this dress to have in my closet cause the fit was too perfect. I ordered a L and M, and honestly both fit really well but I ended up wearing the medium purely for the length (I'm 5"1').

This dress has been worn many times but has held up fairly well. Super comfortable for what it is, I love the fabric. I felt very sexy in the dress but it did show every little line. I would say it runs true to size in body-hugging style. The fabric does stretch quite a bit but holds up, it's strong. If you are worried or don't like dresses so tight I say size up.
Loved this dress for our dear friend's wedding! It was snug in the right places and super comfy. I wore a 6, usually a 2-4 pre-pregnancy. Definitely worth it to rent!

links_reviews_title: Felt cute on daughters first birthday!
links_reviews_text: Totally cute dress and on trend. The color is a pastel pink, I wore it on my daughters first birthday in the spring and we were very on theme :) one of my favorite rentals!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my rehearsal dinner and everyone could not stop admiring it!

links_reviews_text: The dress is more like mauve/ beige than pink which I was fine with. I got a small and medium both fit I went with the small. The dress felt comfortable to walk around in and dance except at the end of the night it was a little irritated in the armpit area from lifting my arms I probably should've worn the medium for this reason.

I wore this for an event with my volunteer organization. I'm currently 28 weeks pregnant and 5'2" and around 154 pounds, pear shaped. When I wasn't pregnant I was usually around 130 pounds and size 4.
Perfect winter wedding dress. Fit so nicely and the material is thick to hide any unwanted areas. The folded piece at the top can ride up (especially if dancing a lot), but still a beautiful dress!

links_reviews_title: Had a great evening with a friend I hadn't seen in over a year at her college roommate's wedding.
links_reviews_text: This dress is a beautiful color and comfortable material. Unfortunately, I wasn't able to get a full body picture during the evening. I ended up going with the large, as the medium was too fitted for the event. I can definitely see myself wearing and renting this dress again, whether it be for another wedding or a different event.

I loved this dress so much! The color, the style, it was beautiful! It was very tight - I wore this to my rehearsal dinner and my only complaint was that the arm part that was just beneath the shoulders we very restrictive that it ended up leaving red marks that didn't go away the next day that I could see while wearing my wedding dress.
Received so many compliments on this. Body con but still flattering on my curvy body. Still classy and perfect for the occasion.

links_reviews_title: This dress is PERFECT for a early spring wedding!
links_reviews_text: The dress ran true to size. It had a lot of give, but did hug by hips and belly so I chose to wear spanx, which worked out perfect. The top of the dress gives the illusion of a slimmer midline and the length was perfect. I received a lot of compliments on this dress.

I was so excited to wear this dress, and it was even better than I imagined! I loved the fabric (super thick, perfect for cooler weather). The shape was my favorite part. I felt super sexy and I received a lot of compliments!
Super warm for summer. I should have read through the reviews more. It didn't breathe but was very stylish and cute

links_reviews_title: Dress fit like a glove Received compliments all night long.
links_reviews_text: Material is thick. I wore spanxs for a more hourglass shape.

links_reviews_title: It was a beautiful wedding and the dress was amazing
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect. It is pretty thick fabric but perfect for evening wedding outside. I received so many compliments I truly felt beautiful in this dress. I wore this to a formal wedding and it was completely perfect for the event.

links_reviews_title: I felt great in the dress.
links_reviews_text: I really like the dress and how easy it was to wear. You basically pull it on. Very comfortable.

This dress has beautiful thick fabric, and the color is the perfect shade of light pink! The asymmetric hemline and off-the-shoulder neckline make for a very sophisticated look. Would've given it 5 stars, except it is slightly transparent, and also undergarments are noticeable under it (even with spanx!)

I wore this dress at 20 weeks pregnant and felt like it hugged in all the right places to accentuate my belly without feeling like a blimp. The fabric is thick too which was great for a cool night. Highly recommend this one for fellow mamas!
Great quality and design. HOWEVER, I had a dress double at the same event. Rent the runway should qualify their rentals with events as an extra added service feature.
Loved this dress so much. Thick, forgiving fabric and comfy all night

Wore all day to three different events--my bridal shower, a professional event, and a bachelorette dinner/drinks outing and received SO many compliments. I was a little nervous by how tight it was but I mustered the confidence to rock it and felt so beautiful all day.

This dress was a huge hit! I received endless compliments. It does run small- make sure you get a size up for yourself! Also-the material is very thick, so it's better for cooler temperatures, and make sure your undergarments are seamless, because it will show every lump or seam! Get good shapewear and a no-show bra.
Beware! Shapewear is tricky- the dress is very tight and spanx can be seen on your legs. Otherwise, the dress was great. Little tight in the arms but after wearing it for a bit, you get used to it.
This dress fit well! While it does have some extra fabric, it is extremely comfortable and cute on! I loved this dress!

A simple, yet classy dress. The "off the shoulder" sleeves and asymmetrical hem give it just enough interest. A nice pale pink color. Fabric is very thick (not cheaply made). I'd say the large size is equivalent to about a size 8. I Absolutely recommend wearing spanx or other shapewear bc it's not very forgiving in the waist otherwise. Good value for the price paid
The dress fit perfectly. I am 5'1 and 128 pounds. I have a bigger bottom and hips and this dress was perfect. Form fitting but very comfy.

Loved the dress!! I received so many compliments throughout the night! The material was perfect as well for a snowy winter wedding in central PA. The only con was a small stain on the belly button area but it wasn't noticeable unless stared at. Would definitely rent again!

I rented this for my baby shower at 32 weeks pregnant. I am a size 0 pre pregnancy and the medium fit me perfectly. I received so many compliments and was super happy with the dress!vIt was comfortable but still sexy. Wish I could wear it again!

I love the color of this dress. The only issue i had was that the arms were a little tight and the flap that came over the shoulders and chest kept riding up.. i feel like i had to pull it down a lot. I ordered the small and medium and went with the medium... i almost wish i had the large to try on in stead of the small. I wore this dress for my baby shower and i got loads of compliments... i was 33 weeks pregnant and it was def comfortable... just a bit annoying with the shoulders...

links_reviews_title: Such a simple, yet beautiful dress that showed off my curves, but didn't feel too revealing.
links_reviews_text: The dress was comfortable and form fitting. It's so tasteful and I got many compliments on it. Literally fit me perfectly. It was tight enough around my shoulders to stay up, but not too tight despite the fact that I have broad shoulders. I wish I could keep this dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect slimming dress for formal occasion
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress for a February indoor/outdoor wedding in Florida. It's versatile because it is a thick, stretchy material that still allows you to breathe/shows no sweat! I could have worn the 2, but sided with the 0 because it showed off my bum a little better. I do caution shoppers that undergarment outlines will show - I wore a g-string and stick-on bra. Received a ton of compliments and it is a very nice hue of pink that can be work for almost any season!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'5, 137 with an athletic build. Wore the M b/c there is no zipper. Typically a size 4/6. Very flattering.

links_reviews_title: It was cute but sized up (def runs small). It wrinkles easy.
links_reviews_text: It was cute.

links_reviews_title: So much fun! You can steal the spotlight on the dance floor with this number.
links_reviews_text: Low crotch, a little tight, and low cut-so be prepared to wear a visible bra underneath or be a bit risqué, it has strap adjusters on the back which are V classy (not little plastic loops like on a bra)

I wear a very traditional small. Everything on the stress that perfectly except for the fact that the torso is very long so the crotch sits about 3 to 4 inches below where it should. The straps are also terribly long even when adjusted. I wish this jumper had better adjustable straps not buttons

links_reviews_title: Orange red color that stands out in the best way
links_reviews_text: This was actually quite comfy. The crotch area was a bit dropped but I think that's the style. I loved the lightweight fabric. I wore a bandeau under the tie because there's no way I was getting away with not covering my cleavage bc it really kinda smooshes it together (I'm a 34 C). Sizing was small - regular. I'm usually a small - I was an XS in this but sometimes I'm a XS in some brands so I can't say it was toooo off. I'd say stick to your normal size. For reference I'm 5,8" and 128
Only complaint would be how easily it wrinkles while sitting

links_reviews_title: Odd proportions, but I made it work
links_reviews_text: This jumper could be cute, but had really odd proportions. I'm 6ft tall, but even with that, the straps were extremely long...and that was on the shortest adjustment. I almost didn't wear it out because I knew as soon as I sat, I might have a wardrobe malfunction! Thankfully, at the last minute, I got the idea to crisscross that straps, and that made it at least wearable. Also, note that it's a very orangey red.
I wore this to the Beyoncé concert and I loved it. It's made for a short girl though
This was such a great length and the tie in the middle was adjustable. Very light material. Will def rent again. One of my favorites.
I'm a very true size medium in everything except this jumpsuit apparently. It was very tight and very unflattering as you can tell from attached picture. Recommend sizing up.

I received a lot of compliments on this one! The only thing is the straps are a bit long. Spanx are also a must as there are almost no seams in the middle so lines are almost inevitable. Highly recommend!

Fits a tall woman perfectly. I got a size M although I usually wear a S. This was a great fit. The trunk wasn't tight and the crotch wasn't either. Great fit for tall girl. Get a medium. Straps can be adjusted!
Be warned size up
Not flattering at all so you better be straight up and down and zero body fat and have a very long torso. The pants were short and the crotch was very long. Didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Didn't suit me and runs very small
links_reviews_text: I'm 130 lbs 5'5 and couldn't zip this size small. It looked a little too bare skinned for my taste and the fabric is pretty thin. It's a pretty color - red/orange
I could not wear it because it was too small on me

This was one of two replacement styles I ordered. This one was incredibly small for a medium! It wasn't attractive at all! Sadly the other replacement was way too big. My most disappointing RTR experience thus far. Pretty piece if you're thin, no curves, and order a size larger than you are.
I loved wearing this romper and will likely buy it. It was comfortable, hit around my ankle, and fit well
Fit really strange. Too short in the legs. It did not flatter my stomach at all.Overall not a good look.

links_reviews_title: Was small on the bottom and big on the top.
links_reviews_text: I was large on the top and tight in the hips

links_reviews_title: Size up at least one size.
links_reviews_text: Cute jumpsuit but this brand runs super small. I'm usually a 4/6 and I got a medium, I couldn't even zip it. I returned it for a Large and the large fit totally wrong. Instead of being way too small, it was too oversized in weird areas. The straps were huge and only have 2 adjustment options. Overall I never wore it and do not recommend it

This was sent to me as a back up due to an issue with an order, so not something I would have chosen. I tried it on anyway, and kind of laughed. The material is SUPER thin--like see through thin. It was definitely a high water on me, at 5'9", and the straps were outrageously too long. I felt incredibly exposed. Maybe it's for you, but it's definitely not for me!
It looked great on for the most part but had a somewhat odd fit
Large might as well have been an XS. Way too small.
I am usually a size 6 and the M was too small.

I'm 5'7 119 lbs, generally wear a size 0 (26 pant) and XS. I enjoy a clean well fitted look. This romper was adorable but ran small on me. I loved the flirty look but ultimately it was less modest than my taste cares for. Perhaps a better summer option v winter (which is when I borrowed it).

links_reviews_title: Did not wear but the fit is great
links_reviews_text: A little summery for fall
Loved the idea of this romper but the fit is way off. Long straps and if your torso is small over eccentuates it. Both tight and loose.
As the other reviews state, not a flattering fit and the crotch area is too large
Super weird fit, I'm 5'4" and the torso of this was SO long, the crotch was almost down to my knees. Material is also very unforgiving. Unwearable for me.

I rented this twice, in M and L. M was too tight to zip up the side, but because the top held me in place nicely without a bra and was super cute, I tried again. The L was too big in the top though and hung off me. For the right frame, this would be the absolute cutest--the color is great and I liked the material a lot, but I think one would have to have narrow hips and a thin lower body frame to make the top and bottom sizing balance out!

links_reviews_title: Worn wine tasting - issue with one of the straps that would not stay in place
links_reviews_text: Great color and lots of complements, but it was not very flattering. The pants part of the jumpsuit rides very low creating a saggy look.
This item looks lovely however it runs small

I'm very tall (5'11") with a long torso so the fit was actually perfect on me but it was just a little too see through for me to feel comfortable. I was also worried about sweat showing through it because we were going to be somewhere very warm, and the material just felt a bit flimsy. Also wrinkles very easily.

links_reviews_title: Looked great. Awesome color. Straps a bit long for me.
links_reviews_text: PROS: - Looked great - Hot color - High quality material - Very cute design / style (eye-catching and got a lot of compliments) CONS: - The fit wasn't perfect for my body since I don't have hips--made me look rather stick-like (like no curves) - The straps are a tad long even in their shortest orientation so felt like the top part was slipping down / low-cut OVERALL: - Would definitely rent again - Didn't give 5 stars due to the CONS listed above but loved overall
Cute for a night out fits true to size

This jumpsuit had potential, but for a petite and short person like myself the torso was way too long so the crotch dropped down too low. It made the fit off on me. Didn't wear it. Think it could work for someone 5'6" and up.

links_reviews_title: Too big and unflattering - Torso too long
links_reviews_text: I love jumpsuits but I couldn't get behind this one. the torso was actually too long for me, which is rare. (I'm 5'7", A cup, and normally a 2 or 4.) The fit also made my butt look like a pancake.

links_reviews_title: I couldn't wear it, I'm normally a 4 or 6 but this was the strangest fit!
links_reviews_text: Worst fit
Is really long in the midriff area and tight in the wrong places

This did not fit me well at all. It was super tight through the hips but also had a really long torso that hung below the crotch. It was too tight to pull it off as baggy with the low crutch. Did not even wear it out.

links_reviews_title: Everyone said I had the best dress of the evening! It truly was stunning and I felt beautiful.
links_reviews_text: My original order was messed up a few days before my event, so this was one of my backup styles but I’m so glad it worked out! Only cons were that the fabric is slightly heavy and the chest area fit pretty large. I was able to wear a regular strapless bra and still had a lot of room. Unfortunately fashion tape didn’t help because of the brocade fabric and I felt like I had to pull it up a lot, especially when dancing! Otherwise, a totally fabulous dress.

this dress was great! worn on a cold december night, the heavy material kept me warm! pockets are always a plus when it comes to a dress, i couldn't stop putting my hands in them. the pink was beautiful and i love how the dress comes up in the front to peep your legs. lot's of compliments on it! this dress runs a bit bigger, but is pretty tight at the top. i am normally a 4, and i wore a 2! it just fit around my bust and stayed up perfectly al night long.
Heavier than it looks.

links_reviews_title: Probably one of my first RTRs and I was hooked! I received so many compliments at the wedding.
links_reviews_text: Loved it on me! Worth it

I received lots of compliments on this dress, it looks much prettier in person. The pink color isn’t as light, so it can def be worn in the fall. I could have worn the size 4 or 6, the 4 was a little tighter but after dinner I was wishing I went with the 6. I am 5’4 and 128 pounds

I didn't feel like spending big money on a dress and this was the wisest choice! I got so many compliments on this dress. The length was perfect for me with the heels I wore. I still wore a strapless bra under cause I wanted some support up top, but besides that it was perfect!

I wore this dress for my engagement photos and I couldn't have been happier. I rented a size 2 and 4 because of other reviews regarding the zipper. The zipper is a bit of a pain due to the material but just takes a little help! The dress felt like a dream and it had pockets!! I felt like Cinderella!

This dress was perfect for a black tie summer wedding. The bust was a little tight. but the fit overall was great. very flattering. i got compliments all night. and it was definitely something different and out of the ordinary. And the pockets were AMAZING!
Gorgeous fabric. The fabric is a little heavy but I wore this for a June wedding it was perfect. Very luxe feel.

This dress is so Carrie Bradshaw! It is made of the most luxurious , thick fabric with a subtle leopard print running throughout. The dusty rose color and the high/low cut made this dress so perfect for a spring ball I attended in Philadelphia, PA. And it has POCKETS. It is a beautiful mix of classic style with a splash of trendy. I lost track of the amount of compliments I received on this dress; it was such a hit! I typically wear a size 10 pant but because of my shape, (smaller on top, a little curvier on the bottom ;-) I am usually able to get away with a smaller size dress of this style and ended up wearing an 8. You just can't go wrong with this one!

I would wear this dress over and over. I got so many compliments on the fit and the dress material! I'm 5'0 and was very worried it would be too long but with heels it was just fine. It was snug in the chest without being too tight or having to pull it up. It was so comfortable. I would rent this again and again.

This dress fit true to size, the fabric was high quality, not heavy enough to be bothersome but definitely had some weight. I got so many compliments all night on how elegant and unique this dress is! Having a formal in February, it was perfect to keep me warmer since the material is thick. The train does drag a little, but it's not an issue as long as you're aware of it. Great dress overall!

This dress, once fully zipped, zip like a gloves and I didn't have to worry about adjusting at all. The fit at the waist compliments my curves and I felt comfortable. The zipper gets caught midway- this happens to my rentals often. But if you have someone to help you zip it up it's definitely worth it the extra muscle, because it fits perfectly. I almost ended up using a larger size just to get the zipper to go up but the dress was too lose
I loved the fit of the dress, and I felt like a princess! It has pockets, too, which is so great. Very pretty color, as well!

I loved this dress, truly. It was fun, different and unique. I got a ton of compliments! The only thing I will say is that it made me look a little fat. It definitely isn't as slimming as a black dress but I didn't have to worry about sucking in all night because it is more loose. I had fun in it anyways!! Maybe I just needed a confidence check :)

Great dress. Fits true to size. However it was very "used". Definitely aged but the material texture hid the damage. The material is thick so the bottom hem was starting to stretch and hang lower then it should so I had to use safety pins to place back to its proper height.

links_reviews_title: Amazing I felt like a princess and got so many compliments! Loved the pockets too
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about it! Fit a little big. Maybe a little stretched from use. I have a 34 DD and wear size 6 jeans.

links_reviews_title: I'll Never Get Over This Dress!!
links_reviews_text: Pictures don't do it justice, this was hands down my favorite rental to date! Worn to a black tie optional wedding in Chicago, the dress received compliments all night. I've never felt more glamorous. Also HELLO pockets!! It was warm, made from a very sturdy, high quality fabric. HIGHLY recommend
I loved this dress! The top for perfectly without a strapless bra, but kept up all night long. Love the pockets!

I rented this dress for our engagement shoot and it photographed so beautifully!!! I would say it fits true to size since I usually wear a 00 and there is only a size 0R to rent, if it were 0P I think it might have fit a little bit better. Because it was strapless and there wasn't any inside lining that held the top up and I was walking / standing a lot for the shoot, I did have to pull up the dress quite often even though it wasn't that heavy but also I have a small bust. The layers are gorgeous and the high low falls beautifully. I'm 5'5", and with only kitten heels the dress barely dragged and i almost liked how it sat on the ground so i'd say the length was perfect. If you're taller / have higher heels the length shouldn't be a problem but can see it getting easily stepped on on a dance floor. The dress's is a little more of a purple undertone though still blush; the photograph on the model makes it seem like a very pastel pink. The texture of the dress also looks a little blankety but i still thought was nice. overall super comfortable and got many compliments!!
Loved this dress. Got tons of compliments and felt like a starlet! Loved the pockets and big flowing skirt. The color was beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Hi low hem and the fabric of this dress really made a statement
links_reviews_text: I wore a 6R, I am 5'10" and I wore roughly 2" heels and I'd say this dress is pretty long, but worth suffering all night in heels for. The dress runs SLIGHTLY big, especially in the chest.
Dress for great! I'm on the shorter side so the back was a little long, but other than that it was great! I got SO MANY compliments the whole night about how beautiful my dress was!

I rented this gown to wear to a military ball (black tie affair) and it stole the show! I received a ton of compliments and felt like a princess. The leopard print wasn't over whelming and the texture and subtle shine photographed really well. I added a petticoat (just a cheap Halloween one) underneath to give it a silhouette similar to what was featured in the model pics and a beaded belt to finish off the look. The dress fits true to size in the places that matter (waist and bodice), but the bust area was large even with an extra padded bar that bumped me up to D cups. It's nothing some tape couldn't fix, but if you are going to be doing a lot of big movements in the dress on the dance floor, it's a little annoying to fix.
