If not for the busy being an off-fit, I'd give this dress a five! Regardless, the dress fit well enough and where it matters most, and I loved wearing it!

The dress was a little larger than expected. I'm 5'9" and normally wear a 10, but the 8 fit me. The dress is beautiful and has pockets! I had endless compliments and loved wearing it! I will definitely be renting the runway again! Great first experience!

This dress was a great color and got complements all night . I liked that it had pockets and the top fit well and did not slide down. What I didn't like was that the dress seemed worn and had some dirt around the bottom that most likely couldn't have been cleaned . RTR needs to replace the dress with new ones or take it off rotation . Also, the material is very heavy, which I personally didn't mind because I was in doors . Would not be a good summer outside dress.

links_reviews_title: It was so easy to rent and return
links_reviews_text: It was perfect for our engagement pictures!

Absolutely adored this one. Like everyone else said, it generated compliments all night. It has a very sweet look, but the leopard texture and the high-low hem gave it a lot of interest. I wanted to keep this one very much. I felt like I was probably between the 2 and 4, due to bust size–the 2 was a little tight in the bust, the 4 was a little loose in the waist. I opted for the 2 to avoid having to pull up the dress at all through the night and that worked perfectly.

This dress was so fun! I received compliments all night and having pockets is a game changer. I pretty consistently wear a size two, this dress was quite large in the bust and waist so I would recommend ordering a size down for your back up. The fabric is pretty heavy so I struggled to dance all night without worrying it might slip down.

The fabric is really soft but thicker and heavy so I went with a size smaller to have a snug fit as to not be pulling it up all day. This dress was elegant and comfortable. The back has flowing movement and I loved it!

links_reviews_title: The subtle pattern really was the star of this dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress, the fit, the fabric, the cut! It was all drama in all the right places. I received so many compliments on it and just loved it. The fabric is very heavy so suitable for colder weather. The leopard pattern in this dress was such a unique touch!

Very beautiful dress. I got lots of compliments. The dress fit like a glove. I'm typically a 4 but got a 6. No need to wear a bra. Definitely wear heels. Lastly, the zipper sucks. So be sure to have someone help you with it. I find that's a "thing" with these formal dresses at RTR. Overall a great choice and you won't be disappointed.

I rented this dress for a black tie wedding and I had had my eye on it for a while. I'm always nervous ordering dresses, especially strapless because my boobs are a big reason I have to size up. The zipper on this dress is made to look invisible so it's small and sometimes hard to get up. I went with the 8 for this reason and I'm not going to lie, it took an extra set of hands to get me into the dress but, once I was in I didn't want to take it off! People were coming up to me all night telling me how gorgeous I looked and how much they loved the dress. I would recommend this dress 11/10 times. I did wear Spanx but that's more a personal choice and made me feel way more confident.

This isn’t ge style I would typically gravitate toward but I went with it because I’m pregnant and starting to show! Wanted something that could hide my bump and was structured enough to be flattering and comfortable, even though i’m a very strange shape right now haha! I usually wear a 6 and I ordered this in 6 and 8. the 6 was perfect. Loved the pockets! the quality of the dress was very high end. the condition was not great.
Perfect for a sister of the groom dress - was fun but not completely over the top. Back of dress was longer than I expected. Kept dragging even with a heel.

links_reviews_title: I loved this trendy gown because of the print and color that looks so much better in person!
links_reviews_text: Running true to size with room for movement, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up a size for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and loose at the hips. It works for most cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear nubra or strapless bra since this is off the shoulders. At 5’4”, the length hit tea length in the front and floor length in the back on me. The pattern on the dress is amazing in person and the close fit up top and loose fit below makes it pretty light and comfortable to wear. Pair with your favorite black, nude, or sparkly heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!

This was the perfect high low dress! The material and fit was incredibly comfortable and flattering. The length of the back of the dress gave it such an elegant look and the front made it easy to walk & dance in. Would totally rent again!

I wanted the feel of Grace Kelly in Old Hollywood and this dress was absolutely perfect. Classy, beautiful and unique. I got compliments and questions about where it was found. It's very feminine and soft and has a feel of the type of glamor that doesn't really prevail a lot these days. I really loved wearing it. Very comfortable and the pockets were a huge bonus!!

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for day/night formal event, some issues
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a red carpet event that started In the summer afternoon. Got a lot of positive reactions, although I may have been a little too fancy for the occasion or the crowd. Was a great daytime formal dress, color and cut made it fun and light enough for sunny afternoon. Pockets were great. High low hem beautiful for showing off shoes, although it dragged in the back like a train. Fit was ok, the waist was a little high on me so I needed thick belt to make it look lower. I felt it widened me at the waist and hips with all the thick fabric, so had to be careful about angles in photos. The pink color was iffy in photos too, gorgeous irl. The fabric was thick and pulled easily. My dress was in ok shape, with spots on the dress already showing quite a bit of wear, this kind of dresses don't seem to be made for many repeat wears. Zipper was difficult but not impossible.

I got a lot of compliments and felt like a princess. Loved the slight train. I do not usually like strapless dresses but loved this one. BUT The boning was starting to poke out of the top and jab me, also the hook for the eye and hook was barely hanging on to the dress. I could definitely tell it had seen better days. I don't think it was apparent to anyone else though.

Love this dress so much! Wore for a charity event and ended up purchasing. Have worn to dinner as well. Can be dressed up or down. I usually go with a small in dresses like these- but the XS fit great- however I tossed the slip and wore a nude bra and nude bike shorts underneath bc the slip was too tight in the chest.
It's nice that the dress comes with a slip dress because you really need it. It's totally see through. However, super light material and cute dress. Runs large

Wore this for a spring bridal shower and loved the blue color! Was very comfortable and was easy to move in. Ran a little bit big on the waist but has the drop waist anyway so it works. The button detail is super cute!
Flowy, fun and floral. Very flattering dress with tan slip. Lots of compliments. Could move around easy. I usually wear M and the S fit perfectly
This dress is so pretty on! The inside slip is a little fussy. But otherwise amazing!
too much fabric for a petite runs large comfy material and beautiful colors

This dress is very lightweight and "flowy"; perfect for a party on the beach! I don't usually wear a flowery, flowy look, but this was a great way to look on-trend AND be comfortable. There is a slip-like underdress which you need because the dress material is transparent. Excellent choice for warmer weather. Other reviewers commented about the multiple rows of elastic at the middle. Those were not a problem for me, and being long-waisted, this dress actually felt more comfortable than many other dresses (where the waist tends to be high on me). Loved this dress!
Not super flattering in photos but great color and very comfortable. Easy to dance in and not too short.

Wore this on a hot day for work. It was awesome. Lots of compliments. The slip it came with way WAY too tight on my bust. But all it needed was a cami under and it worked out well! I feel like it looked cuter if I bunched it up a little at my waist instead of having a drop waist.

links_reviews_title: I wore it to work, nothing special, just because I wanted to wear something pretty.
links_reviews_text: Lovely dress, so soft and flowy! It was a windy day when I wore it, so it blew up and around quite a bit, but the slip underneath helped keep me decent. I didn't find that the ruffle around the middle was a problem, I know some other reviewers said it was for them, but I thought it was feminine and cute, and it didn't seem to add any extra weight to my figure. It felt decadent, but still casual enough to wear to work (in a retail store).

All of the details of this dress are so sweet and feminine, but the dress made my hips look much wider. I loved the color and fabric and details so I wore it anyway but just pulled it up a lot to make it appear shorter since it made me look so much wider. I wear a size 0 99.999% of the time, but it made me look more like a 4...so if looking wider is something you are concerned about I would not rent. Beautiful, though!

links_reviews_title: Fun and flirty - perfect summer dress
links_reviews_text: I have never bought this brand before but I love it after renting this dress. This is a beautiful dress - love the color and so light! This is perfect for work but Also for a night out! Very versatile piece

What a beautiful dress! Perfect for a warm weather graduation. Was very comfortable with stretch at the waist and roomy sleeves. Would suggest sizing up if you have a larger chest, the slip was showing a bit as I have a smaller bust. Would dress up with a red lip if I rented again!

This dress is so pretty and light. The fabric is sheer and there is a nice separate nude slip for underneath. I loved the way it looked in the model in the photo but I felt that the little ruffle around the center made me look a bit thick (and my waist is not my problem area). However, that being said it is a nice dress and extremely feminine.

This dress was perfect for a work event I was hosting. I ordered the small, and wished it was the XS. The slip and the blue over dress aren't connected and I found myself adjusting my cleavage throughout the night so my slip wasn't showing. The waist is stretchy and I would recommend sizing down, this dress can be worn with a regular bra and undies. Very cute even though it was too big!

I rented this to bring along on vacation, for going out to dinner. I listened to other reviews and sized down... XS was perfect for me and I'm usually 4/6. Plenty of room in the elastic waist and hips. The sheer over layer is a beautiful flowy sheer fabric with many pretty details. The under layer was way too tight in the bust for me but fortunately I had one from another dress I could wear. I would not have been able to wear the one that came with the dress. So happy I rented this and would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful soft and flowing print dress
links_reviews_text: M was slightly big for a size 8. Pretty blue print that is perfect for spring. There is a nude underlining. I love the gathered waist and loose top and buttons. The slightly shorter length at the front makes the dress move nicely when I walk. Very comfortable and would rent again.

This dress was a surprise! I loved it so much! The elastic waistband made this dress so comfortable and easy to just slip on. It does run a little big so I would suggest going down as your backup dress. There was plenty of room all around the dress. The sheer material ruffles make this dress fun and girly and can be dressed down or up.
Fits ok; has a slip; dressier than I thought, a little old lady like but ok

links_reviews_title: I wasnt able to wear this but only because I ordered too big a size. Very pretty dress though
links_reviews_text: I think it runs big.

links_reviews_title: Not for me. Probably better for a taller gal.
links_reviews_text: This was a very lightweight flowy dress that I wanted to love but as a petite lady it just sort of engulfed me and was not flattering.
Love the print and fabric. The fit was a little too large so I definitely recommend sizing down.
It looked like a weird bunchy sack on me. Might work for someone who is much thinner than I am.

I got this as a replacement for a dress that was too small. I felt like this fit a little bit big, and wasn't sure how flattering it was as a result, but I loved the uneven hem (slightly shorter in the front and longer in the back). The color was a beautiful shade of blue with nice detailing.
Would have sized down. Too big didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous. Flirty and flowy. Perfect for a summer afternoon event.
links_reviews_text: As others described the nude slip will show a bit in the v of the dress. I personally like the little flash between the buttons. Plus the slip isn't adjustable so it is going to happen. The dress looks pretty and delicate. Would definitely recommend for a summertime event.
didn't love the longer in back but the color made up for it

This dress was beautiful, but was way too large on my petite frame. I was basically drowning in it. Overall the colors are beautiful and it's a perfect dress for summer! I loved the pattern, and I received a lot of compliments

links_reviews_title: The fit was a bit too big and awkwardly long for me
links_reviews_text: I had to wear a belt to shorten it. But other than that I love this dress.
Love the color and fabric

This dress is lovely. It fits a bit big in the mid section but I'm super narrow an flat so I'm sure on most bodies it would be perfect! I still loved it despite it being on the loose side. The fabric is so airy!!

links_reviews_title: LOOOOOVE this dress, may even purchase it. Beautiful, flattering, color and material are fantastic!
links_reviews_text: Everything about this dress from the style to the fit to the color... paired it with a soft red lip and I felt beautiful! Best dress ever!!
I wouldn't rent this if you're short. The fabric is too much in the shoulders and torso; it's built for long, tall girls.

Definitely felt sound of music vibes in this! Agree that is isn't the most flattering cut (on likely anyone) but nevertheless wore often. Did not use slip as it only added extra fabric and truly wasn't a very sheer dress. It's very pretty in the color and aesthetic of it, but not to show any shape (top is blousy and tends to make you look larger than you are) still loved!
ran a smidge large. paired it with tennis shoes and wore for a fun day look.

This is a super lightweight dress and was perfect for a baby shower. It is completely sheer from the waist up and while it comes with a slip, if you're large breasted the slip will not work for you at all so you need a nude bra or nude tank.
I loved this dress, and it worked, but the medium was far too big - I felt shapeless. Would have needed a small or even XS

links_reviews_title: The favorite item I've rented so far.
links_reviews_text: It definitely runs big, but the fit is SO flattering. I love how fun the dress is, while still remaining professional enough to wear to work.
missing a slip.

I had such high hopes for this dress! There is a ruffle around the waist that made me look like a had a roll around my waist and larger than I am. I LOVED the color, style but I just did not feel confident in the fit.
